478a2(rgyud 'grel): rim par sbyar// mtshon cha lnga'i rim pa'ang // nges par gzhung bzhin bya ba yin// gang yang bar chung skabs med pa// srung ba'i mchog tu de gsungs so// de nas phyogs mtshams legs brtags te// dam tshig
478a3(rgyud 'grel): shes thig gnyis dor// tshang zhing 'khrul pa med pa na// byang chub mchog tu nyi zla shar// de nyid bzhugs gnas yin gsungs pas// rdo rje 'am gzhan gyi theg lo ni// dkyil 'khor cha las 'gyur med bya// rang sngags
478a4(rgyud 'grel): nyi zla hUM bcas la// bsam gtan ldan par bya ba yin// mi bskyong ting 'dzin sbyor ba'i mkha'// sku gsung dkyil 'khor las byung ba'i// lha rnams phyi rol khyab par bya// drang ba stims yan lag ldan pa la// rnam gsum mtsho/
478a5(rgyud 'grel): pa rgyase bar bya// sgra dang ldan pas nges bstod de// mgron po kun mkhyen bdag nyid can// cig dang du ma yongs bral phyir// ma lus bdag nyid dgongs su gsolo// khyed la mos shing mchod pa dang // khams gsum yod/
478a6(rgyud 'grel): su bzungs bya zhing // rang bzhin mnyam par sbyar ba'i phyir// che ge mau dag dkyil 'khor gyi// las rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid// thugs rjes nye bar dgongs mdzad de// dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs nas ni//
478b1(rgyud 'grel): sa bzhi yongs su bzung bar mdzod// oM badz+ra sa ma ya satwa s+t+waM/ nges brjod rol pa'i gzi brjid kyis// thams cad dkyil 'khor rang bzhin du// gsal byas yongs su bzung bar bya'o// thams cad rang sems mnyam sbyor bas// sa
478b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi can yang de bzhin bsgrub// 'di ltar gang gi gsal 'gyur ba// sa bzhi rab tu mnyam zhes bya'o// tshad ni rkyen gyis ma nges te// mchog dang mchog dang mchog gis bzhi// slob dpon mthar nye'i lam gnas pas// /
478b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gsum 'phro zhing // sangs rgyas stong gi dkyil 'khor sogs// rdo rje'i thig tshang ngor tsam gyis// rgyang grags la sogs mtshan ma yi// dkyil 'khor phyag rgyar gsal ldan pa// ting 'dzin lhag
478b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gzugs brnyan yin// dag pa'i las kyang de bzhin te// 'dod pa'i lus su'ang mthun par sbyin// khru tshad nyi shu rtsa lnga la// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga rnams dang // bar 'a khyams bcas dang khro bo dang // mos dang sbyor
478b5(rgyud 'grel): bas rnam par phye'o// drug dang brgyad gnyis ldan pa la// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis rnam par brgyan// mtha' ma'i gong du shes par bya// brgyad dang bzhi la nges par ni// stangs sprul gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor te// phyag rgya
478b6(rgyud 'grel): dgu gnyis mtshan mas gdab// gang 'dod de ni phyir bar bya// shin tu phra ba gzhan dkyil 'khor// gtso bo thugs te rigs ldan pa// rnam pa'ang rim pa'i skabs su bshad// pad ma'i rgyu la kha dog sgyur/ bcu drug phyag
479a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas legs brtags pa// rnal ma cig dang lnga lnga ldan// ye shes rang bzhin shes par bya// kha dog sum ldan rnal mu dgu// ras bal las brtags sku gsung thugs// gtsang ma'i snod du legs
479a2(rgyud 'grel): bkod de// nyi ma zla ba'i gdan dgra la// thugs las ye shes 'bru grangs bzhin// phyogs bcu dus bzhi mdu na grangs te// mcho sbyar gsol ba gdab par bya// sbyor ba'i ye shes grangs mnyam dang // rdo rje gsum byin nges
479a3(rgyud 'grel): par bstims// dngos po rang bzhin mnyam byas nas// cung zad mchod pa rtag par bya// phyog sde mtshams legs par phye nas ni// so so'i tshad bzhin rgyas par dgye// mchog gi thig bran bzhi bcu bzhi// legs par
479a4(rgyud 'grel): kha dog phyi yang rung // rta 'babs brgyad po tshe mnyam zhing // 'khor lo la sogs nyis 'gyur yin// rdo rje lag chu har bcos pa// rta babs byed dang gsum du dbye// mtshan nyid rgyan gyis byargyan pa yi// grogs gsal ldan
479a5(rgyud 'grel): nam byin rlabs la// gnyis med ye shes thig gdab bya// ye shes dam tshig la mnyam bstim// kha dog dbyings dang ldan pa 'am// pho brang nyams dgur sgom par bya// AM sar+b+ba sho ta nAM hUM phaT// sku gsung thugs dang thig
479a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cang // 'khrul pa dag pas gdab par bya// 'da' bo med pa'i dam tshig yin// oM badz+ra su tra sa ma ya mai trig tra ma hUM phaT// ye shes rdo rjes mdor bsdus lnga/ dam tshig rjes su rim gsal de bya// ye shes skud pa'i
479b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags mtshan nyid// skud pa chad pas slob dpon 'chi// phyogs 'khrul pas ni gnyis ka nyams// rgyun chad lam la gnod par 'gyur// de phyir mkhas ldan sgrims te bya// kun tu rgyas par gyur pa dang // ting 'dzin ldan pas ye shes
479b2(rgyud 'grel): la ye shes thim par nges mchod de// dam tshig phyag rgya mu yis gshegs// de nas gang yang nyes pa med// rab gnas ldan pa'i thog 'gongs na// bde gshegs sku la btab dang mtshungs// sangs rgyas chos las ring
479b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur phyir// hI'i sgra'i phyag rgyas 'dzul bar bya// rin tshun lnga las byas pa'i tshon// in tra nI la zla 'od bzang // s+phu sha ra ga bya ru bzang // ma ra ga ta las byas dge/ de bzhin 'byor pa gzhan dag bsdu// mtshams sems khro
479b4(rgyud 'grel): bo la sogs phyir// kha dog nyi shu rtsa lngar ldan// snod rims ma 'dres dag byas la// hUM sogs yig 'bru gcig kyang lnga// kha~M dog rjesu 'thun byas te// yongs gyur nyi shu rtsa lnga'i lha// thabs dang shrIs rab ldan par sgom
479b5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu dus bzhi sku gsung thugs// yon tan 'phrin las ye shes lnga// snyoms pas yongs gyur dngos po lnga// sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs// ye shes rgyus las grub pa yi// dkyil 'khor rdzas su brtag par
479b6(rgyud 'grel): byus/ chos rnams bdag sems rtogs byas nas// byang chub sems nyid dag pa'i phyir// shin tu dkar ba'i mdog tu bstan// de rtogs bya phyir dag pa'i mdog/ chos rnams sems su sngon chags pa// pad+ma rA ga zhes brjod de
480a1(rgyud 'grel): chags dang chags par bya ba med// chags med phyir na dmar po'o// yon tan gter ldan zad mi shes// thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te// dbyings nyid mi zad gter gyur pas// kha dog gser gyi
480a2(rgyud 'grel): mdog tu bstan// 'khrul snang phyin ci log rnams lo// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// dbyings bsgrud las rnams rdzogs mdzad pas// kun tu las kun ljang gu'i mdog/ de bzhin nyid kyis dbyings nyid la// cis kyang
480a3(rgyud 'grel): mi tshugs btsas su ming // kha dog nag po'i dngos dang bzhini// de nyid mtshon phyir mthing gar bstan// ma mthong rmongs la ye shes sogs// bstan phyir tshen lnga dgye bar bya// sman pa rnams la lnga'i phyir// rigs kyi ye shes lngar
480a4(rgyud 'grel): shas bya// oM a sarba pa tsa rat+na sa ma ya hUM hUM// 'bru bcu zung ldan sor mo lngas// spu zhing snun pa ltar byas la// rdul tshon sbyang ba'i sngags phyag rgyas// bag med gyur pa'i nyes pa yang // bshad pa'i rjes su shes par bya// de dag
480a5(rgyud 'grel): bri ba'i tshi grwa ni// chas ldan dbang phyug thig bteg la// dang por dbang ldan phyogs nas bskor// de nas zhal dbang thob pa rnams// 'bru ldan rdo rje thal khu tshur// phyag rgya ting 'dzin ldan pA bri// lte ba rtsibs dang ldan bzhi la//
480a6(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs bzhi 'khor lo mu khyud bcos// kha dog so sor smram par bya// gru tshang bzhi dang gru bzhi'i// bar khyams sgo khyung ldan par bya// 'khor lo gcig gis yongs rdzogs pa// dkyil 'khor gnyis la rtag par bya// rdo rje
480b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phreng ba'i rim pa gnyis// kun la nges par sbyar bar bya// ye shes rin chen rim brtsegs tshul// thams cad sems phyir chad pa med// rdo rje nor bus mdzes pa yi// ka ba phyag rgya'i gdung bzhir sbyar// gzugs la sogs pa'i mchod pa lnga//
480b2(rgyud 'grel): bar snang khams su khrig par bya// zhabs dang pad+mo'i rin chen snod// gnam 'phyong las byung za ra tshags// chu 'phyang shar bu bya khyud dag/ rim bzhin kha dog mdzes par bya// rin chen ldan po'i dpag bsam shing // rtsa ba la sogs
480b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam phyi ba// phyi rol yongs su khyab par bya// 'khor gyi gtso bos yongs bskur ba'i// mchog gsum la sogs rnam mang ba'o// brgyan dang mchod par ldan pa 'bri// rnga yob lhab lhub 'phreng ba yis// nges par phyogs bcur 'brikra/
480b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya// rdo D+ho me ra'i lag chu ho// thams cad kun tu khyab par sbyar// dbang phyug chas ldan bsam gtan bya// dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum dag tu// gzhung nyid kyis ni gsal bar gsungs// yan lag brgyan rdzogs gzugs sku nyid/
480b5(rgyud 'grel): nyi zla pang ma rim gzhugs pa// dkyil 'khor sku'i mtshan nyid yin// phyag rgya gsal bkod thugs dkyil 'khor// tha sogs yang na hUM mu ni// mchod dang bri sogs phye ba ste// dkyil 'khor gsum du shes par bya// rigs kyi dbye
480b6(rgyud 'grel): ba gzhung gzhan 'gyur// rang sngags ti shwa badz+ra ldan// gang yang rdzogs par ting 'dzin bya// mchog la sogs pa khro bo'i tshogs// rdzogs dang rgyang dang phye nyid ni// tha ma'i dus su hUM nyid ni// dza la sogs po chung ngu'i yum//
481a1(rgyud 'grel): gang yang kha dog mtshan mar ldan// mkhas pas rab tu sgrim par bya// rab gnas yugs ni gsum yin te// bum pa rin chen las byas pa// lho dang mgrin par ldan pa ni// zha grum la sogs skyon spangs pa// kha dog
481a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i ras kyis kri// sna tshogs ljang gu rdo rje ldan// bdud rtsi la sogs brgyang ldan po// mi 'chi thabs sbyor rang gnas kyis// ye shes rdo rje'i chu dag ni// thams cad las la 'jug par bya// gzhan yang yab yum 'brel pa'i rgyu// nges
481a3(rgyud 'grel): par gdan dang ldan par bya// bdag nyid las kyi lcer zhugs pa// so so gang yin sgying drang sbyang // yan lag rdzogs nas mchod sbyar la// rang sngags zhal skor zlas pa bya// nges par khro tshigs byin ldan pa'i// yongs gyur byang sems
481a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rtse// dbang bskor ba'i mchog tu gsungs// lha dbang lnga sogs sprul po rnams// / rang bzhin 'ja' chen lta bu'i sku// nges par 'ong du gyur pa yin// thams cad las ni bdag phyogs te// gzhan ni rang gi phyogs su'o//
481a5(rgyud 'grel): dbus kyang phyogs kyi dang por bshad// gnyis pa slob bur shes par bya// dgos pa'i yo byad rab bsogs la// las kyi dkyil 'khor las rim sbyar// khrus byas dri dang ldan pa'i bu// nges par gnas su thal sbyar nas//
481a6(rgyud 'grel): spang de sems lnga bskyed par bya// de la lan du sbyin bya ba// e ma'o bde gshegs snying po las// rang gi rnam rtog las kyis sprul/ sna tshogs lus dang li ngos sbyong dang // gnas dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa// bdag dang
481b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gir so sor 'dzin// sus kyang ma bcings bcings myed de// bcings par bya ba yod ma yin// bcings med rnam par grol med de// ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos// khyod la rab tu bstan par bya'o//
481b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor don dang yon tan rnams// gsal byas rab tu spro ba bskyed// rdo rje des drongs hUM 'od zer// rdo rje sems dpa' rab gnas bya// de bzhin yan leg ldan pa la// rdo rje'i go chas khyab par sbyar// so shing kau shu
481b3(rgyud 'grel): srung srud chu// byin la las sbyar mtshan ma rtag/ gang zhig ngan par gyur pa la// rdo rje gnod sbyin sbyor byas te// mche ba'i phyag rgyas bsrung bar bya// oM badz+ra ya k+Sha kro ta sa ma ya daM tAM hUM phaT/ bar chod kun lasa? grol
481b4(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur// thams cad thams cad de bzhin pas// drag po me yis zlog par bya// las rjes shis par brjod par bya// dkyil 'khor la sogs gang byas la// rab gnas ye shes mi ldan rnams// srog dang bri ba'i nus pa
481b5(rgyud 'grel): med// de bzhin mkhas zhes rab sgrims te// bcos bu'i ras ni sna tshogs dang // brgyan 'phreng la sogs bro bas bskor// bum chu cung zad dbus bsdus la// rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg shar du sbyar// mchod pa'i rgyan rnams rgyas
481b6(rgyud 'grel): par dgram// ba'i rnam lnga legs byugs la// tsan dan dkar dmar u dum par// n+ya gro d+ha dang par pa ti'i// shing shun phye mas phyi bar bya// de dag la sogs bum chu rnams// de ngos min gzugs brnyan las shes
482a1(rgyud 'grel): byang/ rang gi dkyil 'khor legs mchod la// stong nyid ye shes gsang sngags kyis// sku gsung thugs sogs chos thams cad// gang yang mi gnas mi dmigs par// mig yor tshul du sbyor ba yis// nam
482a2(rgyud 'grel): la ni nam mkha' sgom// oM sogs 'bras bu hUM nyid las// dkyil 'khor gdan dang ldan par bya// rnam po'i dkyil 'khor rjes dag tu// yab yub las byung dngos po gsam// rjes su 'thun par gnyis spyad la// yig ge 'am
482a3(rgyud 'grel): gdan sdug phyag rgya la// sku gsung thugs ldan byin gyis brlab// ye shes gsal snyoms gzi'i brjid bskyed// rang gi bum pa 'am cig shos kyis// dbang bskur dbu rgyan ldan par bya// smon lam ye shes lnga 'bras bu// bu dang
482a4(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad yin// rin chen las byas dbu rgyan sogs// mdzes pa'i rkyen lnga dbul bar bya// rin chen 'phreng ba dbu rgyanA dang // gdub bu do shal sku rags dag/ 'byor pa'i dad pas bdag 'bul na// gnyis mang rgyan
482a5(rgyud 'grel): du bzhes su gsol// rjes 'thun smon lam longs spyod sku// cod pan thabs dang shes rab kyis// gnyis kyi mtha' la mi gnas pa'i// ting 'dzin smon lam ldan par bya// thur ma snyan gzhar rmang tsher dang // chan pa gser byas
482a6(rgyud 'grel): tshems shing dngos// dang po skyon gsal spu bregs la// shAkya'i dbang po las la sbyar// mngon shes gnyis dang shangs dag ni// sems kyis rnam grangs de bzhin te// rtsi yis chos kyi ro myong zhing // ma 'dres ston pa'i mchog
482b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// shin tu mnyam gzhag thob pa dang // dus gsum zug rngu dag 'gyur sra// shin tu mdzes par gyur pa las// seng sogs gdan rnams 'dul ba dang // nan tan gus pas phyag bya'o// sa pa la sogs ma lus pa'i// phyag
482b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas smon pa sngon bzhin bya// dug sogs rin chen snod ldan pa'i// chu gtsang la sogs sku khrus gsol// thugs rje lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas gzugs sku la// sri zhu gus phyir ras kyis sku phyis pas// las dang nyon mongs bag chags
482b3(rgyud 'grel): kun bsal nas// spyod lamau rnam par dag pa'i sgo thob shig/ yon tan lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas sku gzugs la// rin chen mdzes pa'i me tog dor byas pas// log lha'i nyon mongs tha pa kun bral te// lta bas mi ngoms mdzes pa'i
482b4(rgyud 'grel): sku thob shog/ mchog tu rnam par dag pa'i sku mnga' ba'i// sangs rgyas sku la gdugs mchog 'di phul bas// dam tshig sdom pa'i nyes skyon kun bral nas// ye shes thugs rjes ma lus skyob par shog/ rang rig thams cad mkhyen
482b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ye shes la// mun pa snang byed mar me 'di bltams pas// ma rigs 'thibs pa'i mun pa kun bsal nas// sangs rgyas la sogs spyan lnga thob par shog/ snyigs ma lnga nyid 'bras bu yongs rdzogs pa'i// rgyal ba'i sku
482b6(rgyud 'grel): dri chab 'di phul bas// gi dung ba zug rngu mya ngan kun bral nas// 'od zer mtha' yas 'gyed pa'i sku thob shog/ dug snga ma spangs sku lngar rnam dge pa'i// bde chen spu la dam rjes 'di phul bas// kun tu bzang po'i spyod lam yo
483a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i// kAn+da nas yongs su smin pa'i sku thob shig/ chos rnams 'angs spyad yongs su rdzogs pa yi// rgyal ba'i sku la gtor ma 'di bral bas// rdzas su sdud pa'i gdung ba kun thal nas// gas
483a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i longs spyod yongs su rdzogs par shog/ ye shes spyod yul yongs su dag pa yi// rgyal ba'i sku la mchod pa 'di phul bas// khams gsum dug gsum rtsad nas dag 'gyur te// sku gsum lhun grub zhing khams dag par
483a3(rgyud 'grel): shog/ thabs dang shes rab 'du bral med pa yi// bde chen sku la 'ga' na 'di phul bas// spyod yul byang chub sems su rnam dag nas// mtha' yas snyoms par 'jug pa thob par shog/ mtha' yas ldan dang bral ba med pa na//
483a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med sku la 'dod yon lnga phul bas// mtha' la zhen pa'i gdung pa kun bral nas// bde ba chen po'i thabs rnams rdzogs par shog/ gzi brjid khyad par 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor la// bla re la sogs lhab lhub
483a5(rgyud 'grel): phul byas pas// log par lta ba rnams dang yongs bral nas// 'byung ba'i rgyal po thub mang 'grub par shog/ byams mgon sku la snyoms pa'i dkyil 'khor la// rin chen ldan pa'i na bza' 'di phul bas// tha bas rgyags
483a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i spyod lam kun bral te// gzi brjid khyad par 'phags pa'i sku thob shog/ gling bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rin chen ldan// dpag bsam shing dang rdzing bu mdzes// sa bzhi khang par byin brlabs pa// lha dang lha mo ma yang
483b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ lhag pa'i ting 'dzin mchod par bya// 'phags pa'i nor bdun zhing dag pa'i// smon lam rjes su gdab par bya// bu dang chung ma yul khams dang // bran dang bzhon pa de bzhin te// sems dang rdzas kyi 'khor gsum po// yongs
483b2(rgyud 'grel): su dag par bya ba ni// tshogs kyi mchog tu 'di 'gyur ro// 'dod yon lnga sogs mchod pa dag/ mkhas pas gnas su stobs par bya// glu dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa dang // gar thabs rol mo nges par sbyar// bden pa'i mthu yis/
483b3(rgyud 'grel): bskul byas la// 'dod pa yongs su ma rdzogs par// nam yang bstan par bya ba min// oM barba ta thA ga ta kA ya bak+Shit+ta shrA badz+ra/ sa la sogs la phyag rgyar byas// rnam grol rim pa thob gyur na// dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyangs nas/
483b4(rgyud 'grel): smos ci dgos te de nyid yin// mnyam pa'i sgrub rdzas chen po dag/ ye shes bdud rtsi byin rlabs nas// bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la dbul// zhing gyur mchog dang mchog bran rnams// 'dab bzhi la gnas sa bon drug/ nyi zla'i
483b5(rgyud 'grel): steng du mkhas pas bzhag/ ye shes lnga 'am gsum gyis sbyar// khro bor gsal ba'i nga rgyal gyis// 'bru lnga lag gi 'od 'phros pas// mi shigs thig le hUM dkar po// rdo rje'i lam byung mkha' dbyings bzhag/ dbang skur
483b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba'i cho ga yin// dpe byad mtshan rdzogs sku nyid la// gtsug tu rnam par rgyal ba bzhugs// zla rlung sbyor bas 'og min du// rgyal ba'i sras su dbang bskur nas// dus gsum mchod po chen por sbyor// de ltar rgyal ba kun
484a1(rgyud 'grel): byas kyang // bsgral pa'i dngos po gang yang med// phung po lnga pa bshigs pa la// gzugs ni 'byung ba'i bag la zhag/ ma zhig na yang 'byung ba yin// rnam shes med pas bsang byas kyang // gnas pa nyid
484a2(rgyud 'grel): na dngos med pas// soms kyi rang bzhin do la ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas dgrar langs kyang // sus kyang zin cings song po med// 'o na thugs rjes gang bskul na// phyin ci lag lngas zlog byas nas// ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag
484a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyu dang // shin tu goms pas dbang skyur+ya te// byang chub zhing la dgod par bya// de rnam la ni sbrul zhes gdags// lha mo klu myo rigs ngan ma// dbye 'am yang na mI dbye bar// rang rig shes rab byin rlabs la// bde gshegs
484a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor kun bkod de// bdag nyid rig pa'i lhar bsgoms la// gnyis su med par ldan par bya// yum gyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro// sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus la// dgye sna maH
484a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi sbyin pas bstim// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor mnyes pa dang // 'gro ba ma lus bde thob nas// slar yang gnyis med dbyings su bstim// chags med tshul gyis rol par bya// de ni tshangs mchog rgyal po yin// sbyin
484a6(rgyud 'grel): sreg rnam pa bzhir gsungs te// sa dang rab gnas rnam gnyis dang // bde ba sbyin pa'i dus nyid du// dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan ldan pa'i// lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam bzhi ru// zhal du gyur pa'i mo bos la// laso bzhi
484b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa rab tu sbyin// mchog tshogs rnam bzhi ltar grangs bzhin// skabs bzhin rgyas par mchod par bya// de nas lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor du// 'jug pa'i cho ga bshad par bya// dbang phyug 'jug dang bzod par gsol// khrus dag
484b2(rgyud 'grel): dri dang lus dbul dang // bgegs skad lhur slab dam tshig sbyin de nyid dbog dang chu nam bya// bsgrags dang rin chen dor ba dang // lha dbab pa dang nan tan dang // mig dbye dkyil 'khor legs bstan dang // tshogs mchog yon tan
484b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam bco brgyad// 'di yis yon tan rdzogs par 'gyur// rgyas pa'i mchod pa lo gso sbyar nas// dbang gos ldan pas dbang phyug yin// gzhan dag gzhan gyis mdzes par bya// shar sgor 'dug ste dkyil 'khor gyi// lha rnams
484b4(rgyud 'grel): mngon byas rin chen ldan// 'bru lnga rdo rje dam tshig gis// sngags kyi sku sku gsung thugs yon tan// 'phrin las yo shes gnyis med sbyar// oM ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs// yon tan 'phrin las slang ba tshwa//
484b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid du ni mnyam sbyor bas// phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra sa mA ya ho/ skul ba'i dam tshig rjes dran pa'i// 'od zer gzi brjid ldan par bya// rab bzhin gnyis med gyur
484b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// rdo rje ye shes thob byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// pho brang snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// bdag gis slob ma gzhug bskal bzang dag gis lan sman pa// 'khor lo'i drung du dkri
485a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// thal sbyar gus dang bcas pa yis// phyogs bcu'i sras dang bcas pa la// dbang phyug sangs rgyas dag ltar bdag/ ma 'ongs rang bzhin sems can la// dgos pa gsum phyir lus dbus bya//
485a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi yon sbyin snod du 'gyur// tshe srung sbyor ba'i khro tshogs kyis// bar chod nges bskang mtshams gcad la// sgrib sbyang rnam shes cho ga yis// hUM las sems dpa' 'am gzhan yang rung // mtshan ma rdzogs pa'i ngas
485a3(rgyud 'grel): gtan bya// dam tshig chen po bdud rtsi lnga// rang bzhin 'bru gsum sku gsung thugs// gzi' brjid ldan pa'i byin rlabs lo// dam tshig sdom pa mchog ces bya// snying gar rdo rje bstan byas la// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang
485a4(rgyud 'grel): ba 'di// dam nyams ma 'dres med pa la// nam yang smra bar ma byed cig/ theg pa chen po ston byed pa// rang la skos dang smad mi rung // sku gsung thugs la rta ga gnas shing // ma lus sems can don gyis shig/ tsan dan dkar
485a5(rgyud 'grel): dmar sbyar byas lA// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rab gnas bya// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// rdo rje khro bo chen por 'gyur// rdo rje chu 'di btung bar gyis// oM badz+ra yak+Sha hUM/ de lta bas na bu khyod
485a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis// dam tshig 'di dag srung bar gyis// de bzhin pos na dngos grub pas// rdo rje bdud rtsi chu 'thung zhig/ oM badz+ra ung ga de ya hUM/ las gsum byin nas rab bsgrags pa// thabs dang shes rab sems nyid kyis// rtag
485b1(rgyud 'grel): tu dogs pa med gyis la// 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan spyod// gzhan yang stong khams thams cad na// shes rab dbyings dang 'dod yon gzhan// rab 'bring tha ma thams cad spyod// gzhan yang dam tshig nyams pa dang // skye bo
485b2(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig dam la gnod// brtul zhugs can gyis 'dir drongs la// snying la khrag chen btung bar gyis// sems nyid theg par rab nges na// nyon mongs 'dod lnga kun spyod kyang // pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin te// byas la mi
485b3(rgyud 'grel): gos sdom pa rdzogs// dkyil 'khor yid la mngon sbyar la// 'dod pa 'am yang na gzhan yang rung // ngor de 'brel pa'i lags bstan bya// rang gi dam tshig hrI dang bcas// dam tshig phyag rgyas lan gsum bstan//
485b4(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu ho yis dgugs byas la// nyes legs 'phrin las gsal byas la// phyag rgya bstims la bstan par bya// 'od zer thur mas dbye byas la// badz+ra tsog shu pra be sha phaT// 'khor lo mngon pa'i nga rgyal bya// ga
485b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs mtshon byed des blangs la// chos rnams thams cad gnyis min pa'i// dbyings su thim pa'i 'od zer gsol// cig dang spros pa thams cad med// dkyil 'khor spros med zlum po'i tshul// rang rig ye
485b6(rgyud 'grel): shes mya ngan 'das// ye shes sgyu dang 'bras bur ldan// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i yongs kyis bskor// thugs rje'i byin rlabs spros pa yin// ye shes bzhi'i dkyil 'khor spro// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes
486a1(rgyud 'grel): lnga byin rlabs ya mtshan bsam mi khyab// rang snang ba'i thabs las byung // bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs phyir// mtha' dbus med par rgyas par gnas// stong smon mtshan med 'od gsal 'jug
486a2(rgyud 'grel): de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir shar// sa rnams khyab par bkod pa'i phyir// der 'gro lam stegs brgyad dang ldan// rang bzhin ye shes 'od gsal phyir// nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan 'bar zhing // ya nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir// ma char
486a3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma 'bar ba'i gdan// zang med ye shes gter 'gyur bas// yid bzhin rin chen 'bar ba'i gdan// 'bras bu'i chos rnams yongs rdzogs phyir// seng ge la sogs bstan pa yin// ye nas mnyam nyid mi 'da'i phyir// rta la'i ljon
486a4(rgyud 'grel): shing rang bzhin gnas// thams cad la ni dbang sgyur phyir// 'jig rten lha chen rnams kyis bskor// thams cad rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir// sgyu 'phrul bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis// thams cad lha nyid rtag tu sbyor// thams cad ma lus
486a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor mchog/ mtshan nyid legs lar shrIs par bya// rang gi lha'i 'bras bu'o// gzhi phyir mchog tu'ang nan tan bya// bskal po mnyam po'i ye shes to// gnyer na nye bar 'byung ba'i// ya mtshan chen po 'byung bar nges// dang med
486a6(rgyud 'grel): nyams na phung bar 'gyur// lha spangs dge spyang don med pas// gang zhig phyag rgya 'di spangs na// nyon mongs ngan song gnas su skye// byang chub 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur// bla med 'gro ba'i rgyun chad nas// rigs chad nyid du gnas
486b1(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur// bdag nyid lha dang mnyam sbyor bas// yon tan chung yang 'grub par 'gyur// gcig dang du ma yongs bral ba'i// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par gsungs// de nas rig kyi bu mchog de// rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus// bu dang chung
486b2(rgyud 'grel): ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab tu gces dang yo ge 'thad dbul// dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod na// dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa yin// nye ba'i dkyil 'khor smos ci dgos// nyes pa thams cad dag par 'gyur// dbang dang dngos grub 'dod
486b3(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// 'di ltar shin tu nan tan bya'o// sgyu 'phrul dra bas legs zhugs pas// phyogs bcu'i dus bzhir gshegs pa'i// dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa yin// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'o// 'khor lo sngon du bzhugs
486b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// bsod nams bstan pa gang yin pa// phyis byas de bzhin lung bstan phyir// sgyu 'phrul bde chen dkyil 'khor bzhi// gtang dbul gnyis sa mo yang na lnga// byas te dang ldan rab zhugs na// 'dod pa yid 'ong mchog la sog
486b5(rgyud 'grel): mngon byas pa dang mnyam par 'gyur// gang zhig 'di la mos gyur pa// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du// nye ba'i sras su dgongs par 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin par rigs nges shing
486b6(rgyud 'grel): gdon rnams zlog cing ngan sa dza rkyong // longs spyod 'du ba rnam pa gnyis// ye shes spyan gyi gzhi ru nges// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ byang sems dkyil 'khor zab mi'i dbang // phan tshun rgyu dang 'bras bu ni// byi nang gtu
487a1(rgyud 'grel): ba nyid du gsungs// lte snying dbu mgrin yan lag bcas// rnam shes gcig gi rten gzhi ste// ye shes rnam pa bzhi bcu gnyis// gzhi dang rgyu phyir phyi rol don// dbang po yul dus gsang ba'i gnas// byang
487a2(rgyud 'grel): chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le che// khams la sogs pa'i bde ldan pa'i// kun rdzob nang gi don du bshad// tha dang min las tha dad pa'i// rang nyams bde ba'i ye shes ni// cig ces 'di zhes brjod du
487a3(rgyud 'grel): med// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du med// gsum tshogs sna tshogs 'byung zhing 'phro// byin rlabasas sna tshogs mtha' yas mchog/ don bsdus dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis// ye shes phyag rgya gsal 'gyur ba// bcu gsum la sogs
487a4(rgyud 'grel): mthar phyin pas// 'bras bu nyid du 'ang 'di shes bya// bden gnyis byang chub dbyer med pas// dngos po ming gis rdzogs par 'gyur// de dag nges pa'i ming bstan pa// snying po thams cad dus gsum gyis// gang yang yan lag
487a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du 'gyur// rgyu 'bras rnam par spang bar bya// rang rig mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil// ye shes bzhi 'phro 'khor lo'i tshul// 'das pa dag tu dkyil yin te// 'jig rten sna tshogs 'khor du gsungs// ting 'dzin rang
487a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin don shes bya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dkyil nyid de// rigs bzhi lha dang lha mo dang // khro bo khro mo 'khor yin te// lhag pa gnyis sogs don du gsungs// bco brgyad khams gsum snying po nyid// de dag 'khor de
487b1(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i khams// ye shes de bzhin lha de bzhin// byang sems rnam gnyis mthar thug phyir// des tshig las dang ngo bo yin// dngos po gnyis pa mchog yin te// sgyu rkyen ngo bo 'bras bu dang / las rim skyon yon brgyad shes bya// rdo bo
487b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi mtshan nyid kyis// dbye ba rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur// bdag gzhan nus pa gnyis kyi las// nying lag lnga phrag gnyis dang cig/ de dag phyi rol don shes bya// bde sogs spyod pa gsang bar 'gyur// rang gnas rang rig oM shes
487b3(rgyud 'grel): gsal// bcu dag bum pa'i rnam pa yin// dbang po mchog ni rgyal mtshan 'gyur// ma lus sems phyir longs spyod de// khyab pa'i mkha' 'gro srung bar byed// thabs dang shes rab bde ba'i lam// yan lag yan lag bcas g.yon
487b4(rgyud 'grel): bcings// kun tu 'phyo ba cod pan mchog/ dbu'am 'dud pa bcud ldan 'phreng // rdo rje phud sngogs bzhi bcu gnyis// nyi shu rtsi lnga 'byung ba'i dngos// 'phra rnyogs thabs dang shes rab mtshan// rnam pa sum cu de bzhin te// phyogs mtsham
487b5(rgyud 'grel): srung bar byed pa'o// phung po 'byung bcas dkyil 'khor cig/ rang bzhin lhun gyis grub de nyid// sngon byas sgyu 'bras dbyer med lnga// yang dag rdzogs pa'i pade chen po// rdo rje su phyir bstan pa yin// sku gnyis rang bzhin mtshungs pa ni/
487b6(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo bzhin du grangs 'jug ste// sku'i 'khor lo gdugs su gsal// reg sogs las kyi yum du 'gyur// phyag rgya grangs kyi rab 'bring rnams// rang bzhin rgyu las rkyen slong dang // ting 'dzin byed pas dbang skur 'gyur// kun
488a1(rgyud 'grel): la rgyas 'debs phyag rgya yis// rnam shes rang bzhin ye shes lnga// khams lnga bde byed rang bzhin ni// sku gsung 'phrin las yon tan thugs// spyod yul yongs 'gyur rgyu 'bras kyi// stong po mchog tu de gsungaso//
488a2(rgyud 'grel): phung sogs rtsa dang khams rnams kun// rang bzhin 'khrul pa'i tha snyad du// sna tshogs snang la gnas pa maung // rang bzhin ye nas zlum pa ni// las dang ngo bo dbang du 'gyur// 'chang sogs las kyi mtshan nyid lnga// yan lag dbang po'i
488a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor lngas// las thams cad la dbang sgyur zhing // rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga// snying sogs gnas pa las dkyil 'khor// sgra dbyangs gsung gi gsal byed dang // mi shigs thig le rang gi lha// sangs rgyas kun gyi
488a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid yin// 'di dag las su sbyong byed kyang // rang bzhin ma skyes sems kyi phyir// bsgo dang bsgo bar bya ba med// chags med tshul du rang bzhin gnas// gsum pa'i rang bzhin bshad bya ba// ma bcos rgyun gyi skad cig mas// de
488a5(rgyud 'grel): yis ma byas gang yang med// 'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun// rigs pa nyid du thams cad 'dus// sems dang chos su dbyer med par// mtha' bzhi yongs bral bde chen po// so sor zhen pas de nyid snang // dngos po ming gis
488a6(rgyud 'grel): 'thad pa nyid// snang byed rgyu yang de bzhin nyid// rang bzhin bde ba gnas pa'i lam// brgyud las bde ba myong bar byed// rang bzhin gnas pa'i// don du bstan// byin rlabs thabs kyis sbar ba'i phyir// thams cad spyad cing blang bar
488b1(rgyud 'grel): bya/ ma lus sems phyir gnyis med pas// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam bral te// mtha' rnams ci la'ang mi gnas pas// rang rig 'od gsal thams cad mkhyen// rang rig snang ba ma skyed phyir// sku dang ye shes bsam mi khyab// ngang nyid
488b2(rgyud 'grel): lhun gyis grub pa ni// rgyu 'bras snga phyi ma yin pas// rgyu'i dus nyid 'bras bu'i mchog/ de bzhin nyid du shes pa yang // sna tshogs zhe na las grol bar zong // yang dag nyid la yo rdzogs phyir// dngos po ming gnyis 'thad par
488b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// de phyir dus ga sum 'gyur med pas// bstan pa zhes su gsungs pa yin// 'bras bu rgyu la mi gnas na// phyogs gcig rgyu dang / rkyen dag gis// kun nas gleng bar rigs ma yin// 'ching bu nor bur dbang skur yang //
488b4(rgyud 'grel): de la ron cheni mngon rtags med// chos dbang sems la yod pa ru// kun bzangs rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// dbong mchog rang la med 'gyur na// bskur bas thob par mi 'gyur ro// dang po la sogs sems rims lnga// go
488b5(rgyud 'grel): nas gong du rgyun ldan pa// phyogs gcig rgyu ru spyir bshad de// rkyen dang thun meng 'brel zhes bya// rkyen bzhi snod kyi mtshan nyid gnyis// chags gnyid rang phyogs chung dang ni// yi dwags gti mug rtsod pa dang //
488b6(rgyud 'grel): nyes pa du ma'i rgyur shes bya// dregs skur phrag dog le lo yis// nyams sgrib dngos grub mi 'byung dang // 'bras bu kun kyang yal bar 'gyur// zhe sdang snying rje las ring ba// theg pa chen po rigs ma yin// khe dragras
489a1(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod kyis phyogs pa// bsam bya ring du spong bar 'gyur// sgra'i nga rgyal nyams pa'i gzhi// don ni nges pa ldan par gsungs// nan tan dam tshig mi byed pa// thar pa'i lam las ring bar
489a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// de dag thun mong spang ba'i rigs// ra bzhin gnyid kyis skal med dang // bus pa rnam gnyis ma ning sogs// thar lam gnyis lces ring bar 'gyur// rtse ba nan tan ldan pa dang // skyon zlog yon tan nyid du 'gyur/
489a3(rgyud 'grel): ci la'ang yid rings ldog pa med// skye gnas sems la rkyen thub pa// rmad par gyur pa'ang blang bar bya// dad pa'i tshul gyi snang ba ni// phyogs gcig rkyen du nges par bshad// ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya dag/
489a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor rdzas dus la sogs po// nus mthu mang po snang bar 'gyur// shes rab ting 'dzin nogs dang ldan// log spangs yang dag dug dang ldan// man dgra brtul bzhugs snying rjer ldan// las dang man
489a5(rgyud 'grel): ngag rgyun ma chang // rgyud goms las sbyor ma mthong dang // dngos lnga rdzogs phyir nyams ldan pas// de nyid de la snang bar 'gyur// rim pa skabs kyis tshul drag gis// ltos nas sgyu 'bras go 'byed pa// de ma
489a6(rgyud 'grel): thag pa'i mtshan nyid do// ting 'dzin la sogs rim bshad pa// mchog sogs phyag rgya gang yin las// rang gi rab gnas cung zad mchod// rang bzhin gsal bar byed pa dang / snang byed la sogs
489b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang skur byed// rtog tshogs sems phyir ma skyes pa// thab sku dang shes rab rang bzhin lam// ting 'dzin phyag rgyas dbang bskur nus// las rnams byed par dbang bskur ba'o// rnam shes nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid// sems phyir mtshan
489b2(rgyud 'grel): ma ma skyes pa// mi bskyod yab yum rang bzhin las// ting 'dzin thugs su dbang sgyur nas// dngos grub las rnams mngon byed shog/ hUM badz+ra g+hi ga/ muM dA du shwa ra ste// a bi shin tsa hUM/ mig gzugs sems phyir ma skyes pa// /
489b3(rgyud 'grel): sa snying yab yum rang bzhin las// ting 'dzin sems dpas dbang sgyur nas// spyod yul yongs su dag byed shog/ krI hi rA dzA ya// hUM laswe sa ma ya stoma?// a bi shrIn tsa hUM// reg shis rtag pa ma skyes sems// gshon rje yab
489b4(rgyud 'grel): yum rang bzhin las// ting 'dzin 'jog pas dbang sgyur nas// gdul bya ma lus thar byed shog/ ya mAn+ta krid hUM// badz+ra da ra ma hA kro tishwo ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ yid cho ste rang rig ma skyes pa'i// kun bzang yab yum rang
489b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin la// ting 'dzin phyag rgyas dbang sgyur nas// ma lus kun gyi byed par shog/ gsang sngags ldan par byin byas la// gnas stim rang gi phyag rgya gsal// shin tu rdzogs par dpung bskur bya// mgo lce snying lho g.yas
489b6(rgyud 'grel): zur la// zla ba a sogs 'bru lnga dgong // sku gsung yon tan las byin bsdu// sku sogs phyag rgyar gsasol bar bya// oM bdi gshegs sku'i ngo bo las// mi shigs rdo rje rgyal po'i gtso// sngags dang phyag rgya ldan pa
490a1(rgyud 'grel): s+yas// rdo rje'i skur nga bar shog/ oM sarba twA thA ga tA mA ha kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad mA kAh+nA// oM bad+ma gshegs gsung gling ba las// mi shigs rdo rje chos kyi dbyings// sngags dang phyug r+b+ha ldan pA ya sh+tsa// dza d+ha
490a2(rgyud 'grel): gsung gi ngo bor shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA bag badz+ra swa b+hA wa ang ma ko hUM// bde gshegs thugs kyi ngo bo las// mi shigs rdo rje thugs kyi thugs// sngags dang phye ge rgya ldan pa yis// rdo rje'i thugs kyi gtso bor shog/ oM
490a3(rgyud 'grel): na ma sarba ta tha ga ta ma hA tsi t+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM// swa mi 'gyur ba'i zhing khams las// ma skyes pa'i 'bras bu shar// ma bsags pa'i 'bras bu 'byung // tsor yang 'gyur ba'i ye shes kyis// rang dbang thabs kyim bsgyur
490a4(rgyud 'grel): bar shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pran+d+ha badz+ra swa b+hA ba ang ma ko hU~M// ha thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// 'dod chags chen po'i ting 'dzin lngas// las sngon kun tu grub spyang bas// ma lus mnyam par sbyor bar sh+log/
490a5(rgyud 'grel): na ma sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA a nu ra ga dz+nyA na badz+rA swa b+hA ba ang ma ko haM/ rin chen rab gnas las 'byung ba'i// rin chen mdzes pas dbu bar+d+han+da cing // rigs lnga 'dus pa'i pum+b+ha tshing sbyin// thabs shes 'brel pa rigs lnga'i nga
490a6(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i rgyun las de bzhon skyes// i chos nyid mnyam pa chen po las// ye shes gsal bas rnam par dag/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis// skye med chos la dbang thob shog/ oM mo hA shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ang ma ko haM/
490b1(rgyud 'grel): oM dag cing gsal ba'i bang bzhin te// skyon med sems nyid rin po che// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis// srid pa gsum la dbang sgyur sheg/ oM ma hA a tA ri sha na badz+ra swa b+hA bA ad ma ko haM/ swa khams gsum re skong rgyal po ste
490b2(rgyud 'grel): yon tan rin chen gter gyi mchog/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis// 'gro ba'i re skong rgyal por shog/ oM ma hA sa man tu dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha bA ad ma kaM haM/ nyes pa'i spyan bral dri ma med// skye 'gag med pa'i dngos grub ste// so sor
490b3(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa'i ye shes kyis// srid gsum nyes dmigs sel bar shog/ oM ma hA pra ta pra be sha ya dz+nyA nA badz+ra swa b+hA ba ang ma ko he/ ha dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor mthar phyin cing // grub pa las kyi bye brag las// byA ba nan tan ye shes
490b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis// skye 'gro dbyings su sgrol bar shog/ oM ma hA kri ta a nu ta na badz+ra swa b+hA ba adA ma ko haM/ rin chen rab gnas 'phreng ba bcing // tri gzungs dang ting 'dzin rgyu 'bras chos// byang chub phyogs rnams shes rab brgyan//
490b5(rgyud 'grel): mi 'jigs stobasau dang dpe byad mtshan// 'bras bu rdzogs par dbang bskur ro// oM rat+na ma le ka bi shin tsa tAM// ha khyung gi gshog pa rab spobs pas// klu rnams zol gyis gnon pa ltar// srid gsum yon tan rdzog
490b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzes cod pan mchog/ che mchog bdud bzhi zil mnan dbang thob shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA gu h+ya badz+ra ma le badz+ra a bi shin tsa hUM/ rab gnas chos 'a byung ye shes dngos// kha dog gnyis ldan dbang bskor bya//
491a1(rgyud 'grel): las mchog rab gnas rdo rje'i go/ g.yog pa'i tshul gyis sbyin par bya// mi shigs ye shes rdo rje ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi yald de// khyab pa'i tshul gyis dra ba yin// dbang mchog dam pa sbyin par bya// oM badz+ra
491a2(rgyud 'grel): rakra a bi shin tsa hUM// rdo rje rab gnas las byung ba'i// rgyal mtshan rin chen rtog ldan pa// de'i lag par sbyin par bya// hUM sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che// log pa'i lta ba zil mnon mtshan// thams cad tshor gtsod rin chen
491a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya/ yon tan mngon byung dbang bskur ro// oM badz+ra ke du a bi shin tsa hUM// mi bskyod rub gnas rin chen gdugs// snying po ldan par slar gnas bya// hUM gnyis med ye shes rtog bral ba// rmongs stsogs sems phyir rang bzhin
491a4(rgyud 'grel): steng // log 'byung rgyu 'bras ma gsungs pa// thugs rje skyob par dbang bskur ro// oM rang na tsen+da traM u bri shin+da tsa hUM/ sangs rgyas rab gnas lha m+bo'i tshogs// rol pa'i tshul du gus stabs bya// oM bza' dang bca' dang btung
491a5(rgyud 'grel): dang bgo/ rang sems rnam dag brgyan pa'i phyir// gnyis med rol pa'i dbang bskur bas// bdud rtsi yid bzhin spyi grub shog/ oM badz+ra to ru oM bi shin tsa/ sbyor ba las byung le ba rgan b+h+rUM// gang yin rnams su 'khor lo' khyung
491a6(rgyud 'grel): nyi zla'i gdan du sems byung bri// sngo gnyis zung las 'khril sbyor srul// ye shes spyan drangs cung zad mchod// yongs gyur nga'i phyag rgya gsal// nyan byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas sku// gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid// traM gi
491b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las// rin chen dkyil 'khor gsal sgo bsgrim// traM gsang ba'i gsang chen gsang mchog gang // gsang ba kun la snyan par bya// gsang ba'i don nyid brtag pa la// gzhan du smra bar bya ba min// gsal
491b2(rgyud 'grel): ba 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid// rigs gang yi ge'i tshogs mchog las// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro bsgom// oM dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras chen po// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zung /
491b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba thams cad mnyes mchod la// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par sbyor// lag pa 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid// hUM gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las// las kyi dkyil 'khor gsal
491b4(rgyud 'grel): spro bstim// oM khyod ni rdo rje las yin gyis// las rnams ma lus kun byon zhig// pho ny+dza'i 'du 'phro mang po kun// khyod kyi dgos pa byed pa yin// smra byed 'khor lo'o gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid nyid//
491b5(rgyud 'grel): hri'i phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las// chos kyi 'khor lo gsal spyo sdom// oM chos kyi rgyal po bla med kyis// dad ldan skyes bu ngoms par byos// rab 'bring tha ma'i blo can lha// mthun par gsang blugs gzhan du min
491b6(rgyud 'grel): bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid// oM hUM swA oM ha rnams las// dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro 'phrong sgo// rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor gas spro bstim// thim 'gyur dbyings nas
492a1(rgyud 'grel): byed por 'bar// oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che// dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po// dkyil 'khor kun gyi sbyin pa spyod// glegs bum 'phreng ba rgya gram ldang // 'khor lo
492a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dril bu sbyin// cung zad rab gnas gsal ma byas// dkyil 'khor bsgrub thabs gsal bar dbye// shin tu 'phra ba'i dam tshig mchog/ sor bzhi 'am yang na mdzub gang la// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor logs par brtag/ bcu
492a3(rgyud 'grel): drug phyag rgya phyi rim gsal// spyod lam kun gyi rgyud 'thun pa// bcud dang nyes par ldan pa la// zas srung gos rje dam tshig sbyin// las dang 'gag sogs legs par brlab// byin rlabs mchos pa chen po bya// gnyis med
492a4(rgyud 'grel): shes ror ldan pas// khrus sogs ldan pa'i bu rnams la// mdzem pa'i nyes dmigs sngar shes bya// ting 'dzin ldan pas thogs med sbyin// bde dang mtshan ma brtags par bya// bar nas phyag mthil phrad dkyil 'khor// phyi rol
492a5(rgyud 'grel): nang gi tshul du bshad// rig pas me tog dor bar bya// dog med bde bar ldan pa gang // sdug bsngal las grol zhes dbugs 'byung // thun mongs rigs mthun rtog byed kyang // ud pal dkar nag phyed dkrugs ldan// phyogs
492a6(rgyud 'grel): dang blo 'og 'bring du bshad// dri mchog spos dang chu rlung bdag/ lto ba 'phra zhing rgyas pa yin// zla ba mang bas nyung bar 'gyur// yan lag pad 'dri'i phyag mtshan can// shin tu mnyes shing gzi brji ldan// khong yangs dal ba
492b1(rgyud 'grel): gus dang ldan// skabs phyed spyan smra dang che ba// sngon nas shin tu'ang brtag par bya// las sbyor bshad pa bzhin shes nas// rin chen la sogs 'dod yon gyis// mnyes pa'i me tog dor bar bya// sems kyi dkyil 'khor legs
492b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan la// rab gnas las kyis rgyas par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum du// bdag gam yang na gzhan gyis brlabs// rlung khams dang po shes pa yis// dus dang rab gnas 'bras bu ni// gnyi ga la yang shes par bya//
492b3(rgyud 'grel): bde ba myong ba de bzhin te// mnyam par sbyor zhes dus nyid yin// gnas kyi ye shes bcu drug po// tshogs sbyor ba sogs dang po nas// mthar phyin sangs rgyas sa nyid de// gnas bzhin de bzhin dbye ba las// gnyis pa'i gnyis
492b4(rgyud 'grel): bar rab dga' sogs// pha rol phyin drongs mtshan nyid// mtshungs phyir rdzogs par bshad pa yin// de dag thabs kyi mtshan nyid ni// bla mo'i zhal las shes par bya// dbang po ma lus bcud 'odus pa// phyag rgya'i sems
492b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs thams cad kyi// rang bzhin gnyis med ma skyes pa// dang po byed phyir mi thob ste// de nyid gang la bstan gyur pa'i// rgyal mtshan mchog ni dbang por gsungs// sngon bshad shes bya'i mchog gyur pa/ gang dang ldan de
492b6(rgyud 'grel): shes bya'i yul// rten can rang bzhin bdag nyid phyir// 'dres pas de nyid gsal 'gyur ba// rnam shes thugs ni rdo rje sems// thams cad 'byung ba'i gter nyid dang // thams cad 'gro ba'i gnas nyid de// de yis ma
493a1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed gang yang med// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i rgyu// de las thams cad skye zhing 'byung // kun gyi phyag rgya'i rgyun yin te// bde ba'i byang chub bsgrub pa'i rdzas// de la thabs kyi lus zhes bya// ye shes rang
493a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin lus bstan pa// thams cad bdag phyir gnyis med cing // shes bya shes byed ma skyes phyir// thams cad mtha' stong rang rig nyid// stong pa'i stong pa'ang chen por gsungs// gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro/ 'gro dang 'ong
493a3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya ba min// shin tu rtag dka' mi dmigs la// mtha' dang dbus su rtag tu med// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang rig nyid// dmigs mang tshul du de snang ngo // dbyings dang dbyings kyi ye shes kyang // rang rig kho nas tsam du zad
493a4(rgyud 'grel): 'das dang ma 'das bdag yin pas// kun la smon cing chags su med// sems dang byang chub dbyer med pas// sems can ma lus thams cad dang // dus gsum chos rnams thams cad gsal// rnam par rtog pa mi mang ste// de
493a5(rgyud 'grel): yis mi mkhyen ci yang med// 'od gsal thams cad mkhyen dbang du// kun zang rdo rje sems dpa' gsungs// gang zhig cung zad ma lon pas// rjes su mthun pa'i yul nyid la// khyad par cung zad nyi ldan ma// yul gyi
493a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gsal bar bya// gang gis de dag nyams lon pa// lha mdzes rin chen mchog tu gsungs// rdo rje nyi ma thabs kyi rgya// de zla bsil byed shes rab dngos// gnyis med bde ba mtha' bral la// gdags pa
493b1(rgyud 'grel): yod phyir zung 'jug sku// ri dgas nor 'dzin spyi gzugs ni// ji ltar lhas pa der snang ste// rang gi ngo bo bstan du med// yod la rtsal na sgro brtags 'gyur// med la rtsal na skur btab ste// yod med gnyis las rnal byas na// da ni
493b2(rgyud 'grel): lung du ma bstan 'gyur// rkyen bral rang dbang ye shes ni// thams cad lhun grub rang dbang 'gyur// gar yang ma chags pad+ma bzhin// phung sogs ye shes phyag rgya dag/ bsam gyi mi khyab bsam bral bas// rang rig nyid du rang
493b3(rgyud 'grel): gsal bas// gcig dang du ma yongs kyis bral// gdul bya'i bsam pa rdzogs byed kyang // gdul bya bdag phyir dmigs su mong // de nyid shes rab thabs su rdzogs// tshogs gnyis nges rdzogs mchog ni// gdod nas dus gsum
493b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur med de// gang zhig rkyen gyis ma bskyed phyir// bstan 'gyur dbang gi mchog tu gsungs// dgos pa rang bzhin don min te// rgyu rkyen sgribs g.yog dbang du gsungs// shes rab thabs kyi ye shes tshogs// thig le bsam
493b5(rgyud 'grel): yes ye shes che// bdud rtsi bsil dro 'jam pa'i dbyangs// rtsa gnas pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// gong thabs rigs pa rlung mthu yis// bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro// 'od gsal 'phro bas kun la khyab// bde ba nyams
493b6(rgyud 'grel): bas kun tu thim// bzhi bcu gnyis sogs phyag rgya che// gzugs mdzes skyod pas phyogs bcur g.yo// snying po'i thig le mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis// ye shes dgye la mchod pa 'bul// zag pa med
494a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bsod nams kyis// ye shes sgyu ma rang snang ba// rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ gsang ba'i theg le nyid kyi dbyings// de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// phyogs bcu dus bzhi sngon
494a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i// sku gsungs yon tan 'phrin las thugs// ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba// dbang bskur mchog nyid dam pa yis// dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor nyid// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// rgyan
494a3(rgyud 'grel): du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor bas// thugs rje dkyil yongs kyis 'byung // zhi dang spyod yul de bzhin te// ngo mtsha cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos// gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te// thabs
494a4(rgyud 'grel): la bstan pa'i shes rab nyid// de lta bu'i ngang du byung // shes rab dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid// thabs kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'i phyir ye shes la ni ye shes rol// ye shes rol pa nyid kyang gsog/ rgyal ba sngon byung skyob pa dang // byin
494a5(rgyud 'grel): rlabs ston pa de bzhin te// bya byed nus mthu'i gzi byin gyis// sgyu ma rdo rje btsan po mchog/ ther zug rgyun lngas rab grol ba// ngo bo nyid rtag rdo rje'i sku// dmigs pa kun las rab grol te// rdo rje de bzhin nyid du son// de nas
494a6(rgyud 'grel): yang dag rdzogs pa'i// yon tan ma lus bdag tu gsal// sa sogs lha ngan las grol ba'i// rang sems ye shes mtha' dbus meng // yon tan bsam yas dngos grub kyang // rang gi ngo bo bstan par dka'// 'du
494b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bral med gzungs bde ba che// rje su 'das dang ma 'das rol// phyogs bcu sku gsung yon tan ni// du ma cig bral tshul snang la// dus gsum chos kun bdag cig phyir// mngon mkhyen thang ka'i dmigs yul grol// de la sogs
494b2(rgyud 'grel): pa mtha' yas mchog/ thabs chen thabs la byung ba'i sku// de ni byang chub rdo rje'i mchog/ bsnod bcung rim pa'i mtshan nyid ni// sems skyed las kyis dang rnams la// gnyis kyi nang du phon gdugs bya// bdag gzhan don byed brtson
494b3(rgyud 'grel): 'grus ldan// gnyis dang gsum du phye ba yis// las kun dngos grub thogs pa med// brtul zhugs rnam pa gnyis ldan pas// gzhan gyi longs spyod thams cad bya// 'bras bu rgyun la ming brtags pas// rigs dang mnyam pa'i
494b4(rgyud 'grel): brtul bzhugs kyi// las thabs nyams dang ldan pa la// 'od gsal ye shes thams cad mkhyen// bdag nyid kyis kyang gtang bar bya// de bzhin de nyid nyams thob pas// sems mthu' 'gro 'ong la gnas te// sa rnams slar la
494b5(rgyud 'grel): zlog pa ni// 'khor ba nyid dang spang du med// dbyer med kun bzang la 'god// dngos 'grub zhing gyur dbang phyug ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid de// 'bad pas mnyes par mi byed pa// bskal par sbubs dang mun nig so
494b6(rgyud 'grel): bde bas rab tu brel 'gyur zhing // thabs dang shos rab la sogs lam// shin tu ring bar 'gyur ba yin// nus mthu byin rlabs bde gshegs lung // nor bu rgya mtsho mkha' lta bu// sa bcu sems dpa' chen pos kyang // nus
495a1(rgyud 'grel): mthu gzu lums ma yin phyir// gus pas rim par blang ba rnams// gang zhig dbang rnams ma thob pas// nyan pa la sogs rtsom pa rnams// 'bras bu med cing klag par 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab bde
495a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i// 'bras bu rgyu las gzhan med phyir// bdag dang gzhan gyi bde spong ba// bskal pa bye ba mtha' klas par// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur// sems nyid sangs rgyas ngo bo'i phyir// lam yang gzhan na yod ma yin// /
495a3(rgyud 'grel): rmongs pas gzhan na rnye de mi 'gyur// thabs dang mi mthun sman pa'i don// zhi spyod bde byas bodo 'chol ba// bde ba 'dod pas rgyab kyis phyogs// shin tu lam ring sngon spyod pa// 'di la mi shong phreM dog mchog/ grang yang phan pas dbang
495a4(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba'i// dus 'di phyin chad rgyal ba'i sras// ngan song thams cad med pa dang // mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur// las thams cad la thogs med pa'i// dngos grub kun la dbang byed pa'o// dbang phyug chen po nyid du nges// lha
495a5(rgyud 'grel): mgo la sogs mngon byas nas// lus dang longs spyod pa yi// rigs 'dzin sA la rab gnas nas// 'jigs med kun tu bzang por sbyor// yum dang sgeg mo la sogs pa// de nyid byin gyis rlob par 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa
495a6(rgyud 'grel): rang rig gis// sangs rgyas nyid dang spyod yul cig/ de la sogs pa bsam mi khyab// yon tan rdzogs shing rdzogs mi 'gyur// kye mo'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos// thams cad kun la rang bzhin gnas// rang gis bdag snyom ma
495b1(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pas// kun la yod cing rang bzhin gsang // gzhan du min la shin tu gsang // don nyid kyis ni gsang ba'i sku// mnyam pa'i rdo rje can gyi gsungs// de phyir gsung ba'i don mchog 'di// b+hA ba spyan la bstan b+hAs na// dus min+da
495b2(rgyud 'grel): par ni srog zad nas// mgo 'gas snying yang tshig par 'gyur// khyab len gyis ni lcags sdud ltar// mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par// ngan song bskal par myong bar 'gyur// de bas rdo rje gsangadri mchog 'di// thams cad mkhyen
495b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i thugs rje yis// chos la skyon yod ma yin te// sems can don du shin tu gsang // theg pa sman dang phyin ci log/ de la gsang ba stan gyur na// rang bzhin gsang don mi shes par// 'phral gyi spyod yul de dag la// shin tu/
495b4(rgyud 'grel): nges pa don bzung nas// gsang don de nyid log par khrid// ma rtogs de nyid dmyal bar 'gro// de bas rab tu gsang bar bya// gsang bya spel bar byed pa yang // smra byed lcel zhing rmo zhing // sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur//
495b5(rgyud 'grel): de phyir rdo rje lce yod kyang // theg pa sman dang ma 'dres dang // skye bo phal la smra mi bya// gang yang sbyor ba mi shes sems blangs chags sngogs rang bzhi ni rmongs dbang dang blangs pa// rgyal zer nges par dbang 'gags bzod dkra
495b6(rgyud 'grel): skyed sogs bcu'i cig 'khrul 'khor nges lhung ba// de nyid rigs ldan cung zad dang blangs pade zlog thabs sbyor cig gis grol thar zhing // tshe sogs mang thob rgyu 'bras kun rdzogs thabs rgyal 'di dka' 'gro mang byang chub
496a1(rgyud 'grel): shog/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje las kyi rim pa zhes bya ba// dngos po gnyis pa rdzogaso// / bcom ldan 'das/ dpal kun tu bzung po la phyag 'tshal lo// dad brtson ldan pa'i slob ma yis//
496a2(rgyud 'grel): ri mo'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru// nus dang phan pa'i dbang thob nas// brtul zhugs ldan pa'i bu mchog la// ye shes rang gnas rdzogs bya'i phyir// sor bzhi 'am mdzub gang tshad ldan la// nyi shu rtse lnga rab bsnyams
496a3(rgyud 'grel): te// gdan dang phyag rgya yi ge sogs// rgyud bzhin mkhas pas byin gyis brlabs// blo ldan sngon nas shes bya ba// bcu drug nyi shu lnga gnyis tshwa // yon tan bcu gsum rab ldan zhing // mnyan drang sgo ring sems mA'i
496a4(rgyud 'grel): tshul// gsang ba'i gter du ming gis bzung // 'o ma'i spos chus mgo lus bak+Sha// tsan drin gur gum a kau ru zer lo// gon pAn 'dza ti shing tsha yis// dri zhim dang ldan chab kyis skabs// gsal ldan ma 'am byin
496a5(rgyud 'grel): brlabs pa'i// kha snying pad+ma la sogs la// gsang yum lnga drung khro mo bzhi'i// dbyibs dang khaM dog gsal bar bya// rang gi mchod pa lags sbyar la// yum+b+ha dang 'dzem ma sems ma yis// ji ltar 'dod pa'i las
496a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin mchod// zad mod gter la longs spyad phyir// rin chen snyim pa bkang nas ni// rdo rje sems gtso khyed la 'dud// thar lam chen po de 'dod de// mgon po dpa'o skyabs song zhing // theg chen khang par
496b1(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pa dang // mkhyen rab gsang ba bdag la gsol// bu 'dir shog cig ci bde bar// las spyod rim par 'gro ba dang // sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zung // rdzogs pa'i ye shes bde ba chen la// dmigs pa med par gnas phyir ru
496b2(rgyud 'grel): ser sna spangs pa'i dong yid kyis// gtong zhing rang sems bstan par zung // ye shes rang gnas rdzogs dbang sbyin// 'dod pa'i dngos pos rol pa'o// phyag rgya bzhi ldan 'gyur ba dang // rgyal po'i phyag rgya lnga ldan pas// stong gsuM
496b3(rgyud 'grel): yungs 'brur 'jug tshul gyis// dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drang mchod// shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las// bde ba'i 'bru tshogs gsal ba'i rgyun// rdo rje lam nas pad+mor dkyil// 'khyud dang bzlog pa'i bde ba yis
496b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus la// dgyes mnyam mchog gi sbyin pas bstim// sgo 'byed bde bas gyen du bskyil// de nas dbang phyug chen po des// mi 'gyur sgron ma sbrul bskyil cing // sems kyi thig le sgo phye ste// tsha
496b5(rgyud 'grel): ba chen po dbyangs bzhes nas// go 'byung rdo rje lcags brkyang nas// grub pa'i nyi zla snying po ste/ dkyil 'khor rdo rje lce'i sa byung // rtse nas bstims shing dkyil 'khor bsgyur// tshangs bsgo ba 'di gsungs so// da nr-i rgyal ba
496b6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi bla// thig le byang chub sems tshon po// nga ni khrag 'thung kun gyi rje// ye shes ril pa'i 'byung gnas gter// nga ni spyi dpal bla na med// skyon bral thabs kyi rgyal po yin// sems kyi dkyil nas drangs pa'i chu// khyed
497a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi lce la phab pa 'di// snying gi dkyil du bzung bar byos// rigs kyi bu mchog 'di phan chad// rdo rje sems pa'i thugs mchog zung // sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso bo yin// byang chub sems dang mnyam pa'i
497a2(rgyud 'grel): phyir// sems dpa' kun gyi mchod gnas yin// rigs kyi bu mchog ding phan chad// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi// bstan pa'i phyi nang zab mo kun// sems kyi dkyil du bsdus nas kyang // rdo rje lce'i sgo phye ste// bdud rtsi sman
497a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog dam pa 'di// dad ldan skyes bu ngoms par byos// gdul ba'i phyag rgya 'di yang spyod// phyi nang snod bcud rnam par dag/ rnam dag chen po nyid kyi lam// byed spyod thams cid tshogs gnyis rdzogs// 'gro don bde chen
497a4(rgyud 'grel): pad+mo sbyin// sems kyi chu na 'phong bar bya'o// rnal 'byor chen pos drim du bzung // yungs kar tshad tsamra rdo rje sems// gnas ngan len pa gsum sbyangs te// hU~M nyid ring po mtshams sbyar nas// thams cad bde ba chen po'i dbyings
497a5(rgyud 'grel): dag sngog las kyis ma bcos shing // bsgom zhing posgrubs pas mi 'byung ba'i// rnam dag sems kyi rin chen gter// rdo rje snying po ye shes kyis// khro rgyu lha kun gyi gtsor gyur cig/ shrI ma hA su kha badz+ra bo d+hi hUM ho oM// rdo rje
497a6(rgyud 'grel): snying gar legs bzung la// bden pa'i tshig ni 'di skad bsgo// oM mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes nas// ma brtsal phyin pas bde ba'i mchog/ ma ltas gasla ba yis spyan// gong na med pas kun gyi rje// ye shes rang gnas brdal
497b1(rgyud 'grel): ba la/ mi 'gyur g.yung drung sa bon shog/ oM ma hA gu ya// b+h+rUM dz+nyA na muN+Da la// dz+nyA na g+hA ya sid d+hika/ sarba ad ma ko haM// ye shes rang gnas su 'dod pas// thig le mtshan ma legs snyed nas// khrus dang mdzes par dbul bar bya//
497b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rang gnas rgyal pos byin brlabs te// rdo rje zla ba'i 'od zer gyis// rdo rje dbyings phyug rab byas te// rin chen snod du mdzes pa'i dkyil// rang gi sems nyid yungs kar bsdam// phab pas thig le dbang kur te// g.yos
497b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gung mo rin chen chos kyi sku// shes rab thabs kyis rdzogs par 'gyur// 'di dang skye ba thams cad du// dngos grub bde 'di ma spong zhig/ rgyal bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khyod las byung //
497b4(rgyud 'grel): spang na rdo rje dbyings phyag bsngal// bkug dang sdom pa ma shes na// rdo rje bskal pa mtha' klas por// chos sku thob par mi 'gyur ro// gsang ba'i don mchog 'di dag ni// lta ba sman la bstan byas na// dus min par ni sreg zad nas//
497b5(rgyud 'grel): mgo 'gas snying yang tshig par 'gyur// khab len gyis ni lcags sdud ltar// mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par// bskal par ngan song myong bar 'gyur// de bas shin tu gsang bar bya// de skad gsang ba'i las gnyer gtad // de
497b6(rgyud 'grel): nas rigs kyi bu mchog nges// ye shes rang gnas rdzogs bya'i phyir// dgug dang bkug pa'i thabs 'di bstan// bde chen bzang po'i mtshan ldan pas// rang bzhin ldan pa'i chos sku ste// bcu drug thabs dang shes rab gnyis
498a1(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod rdzogs sku gcig cha yas// gnas par med par rol zhes bshad// chos nyid thabs dang shes rab las// rtswa bzhi 'od bzhi sa bon drug/ mdor sdus snying po chos kyi sgra// de'i phyir chos kyi 'kho
498a2(rgyud 'grel): lo'o// dur khrod brgyad po kun bsdus pa'o// bcu drug gcig dang bzhi dgyes pa// khams gsum khyab pas sbrul sku'o// me dang rdo rje dbyings phyug gnyis// mnyam du gnas pas drag par bshad// rlung ngan bkug po'i gzhung dpying
498a3(rgyud 'grel): te// sa bon yang gis spro byed pa// las ni mthur du sel ba ste// bud med rgyud la gtum mor bshad// zla ba rgyas pa'i thig le gnyis// chos la thig ler bskul ba bzhin// de sogs mang po bkug pa kun// rdzogs pa'i skyed par bla mas
498a4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs// rang bzhin thig le mtshan rdzogs pa// yi ge med par byin brlabs pa// dbyings phyug med par byin brlabs pa// snang ba thob par 'gyur bas na// thabs dang shes rab gang yin gang min sku// bkug dang rlung phye phyi nang can//
498a5(rgyud 'grel): gsang stong gsang sgo sdom pa'i sbyor ba yis// mi rtog dngos po thob par bshad// dang po'i sku la reg par nus// de phyir rdzogs pa'i yi ge med// chus sgyu thob par the tshom med// yangs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan kA ni// 'bod pa med par
498a6(rgyud 'grel): shugs kyis 'byung // gsang dbang pad mar ldan 'gyur nang // chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis su// pha rol byin po nu spu 'bras rdzogs// sa bcu rim gyis bgrod byed rdzogs// kun tu 'ong gsal pad+ma spyan yang rdzogs// thabs dang shes
498b1(rgyud 'grel): rab sa yang rdzogs// yang dag rdzogs chen thabs dang ldan// shes rab bla med yang dag rdzogs// bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs// 'di ltar snang ba'i rnal 'byor pas// g.yeng ba med par zhugs byas te// brtson 'grus yu
498b2(rgyud 'grel): ba gcad pa nges// gdon mi za bar 'grub ces gsungs// dbang skur gnas pa grang thob pa// dus 'di phan chadang rgyal ba'i sras// tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs// ngan song thams cad med pa dang // mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur//
498b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs med kun tu bzang por sbyor// rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dbang gis gal po'o// rdzogs so// @#/ rgya gar skad du/ a b+hi shiny+tsa ar+tha nA ya hi sa du nA ma/ bod skad du/ dbang gi don nges par
498b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byed pa// gsang ba'i ye shes tshon pa la// sgyu ma'i rig pa'i thabs ldan pas// mos rnyed mngon du gyur pa'i sa// gnyis med gsal 'byams dang bas 'dud// sgyu 'phrul dra baM rdo rje sems// rgyud rgyal rgya mtsho dbang gi don// thams cad
498b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyud du ma bstan pa// bdag gis gsal bar brjod par bya// rang bzhin thob bya dbus gad+har gyang nor bzhin te// gzhan ming bdag la gnos 'gyur kyang // rang gi rang bzhin mi mthong yul med shes bral ba rtag dka' gsal mthong nus
498b6(rgyud 'grel): mi phyir// nam mkha'i ri bong can dang bya dang mdzub mo ltar bur bskul bral tshig gis ni// pa ni nus gsang rig brtan don rang gnas lam blos rim bgrod man ngag lung gis mtshan// rgyal sras mchog bzhin ldan 'gyur brgyad
499a1(rgyud 'grel): bdun dbang skur rang gi sa non dbang sgyur ltar// snod ldan chos bzhi ldan 'gyur mdo lnga bco brgyad dbang bskur lam bgrong sa non thabs// grangs mdo rnam pa'i lus bzhag gnas lugs lam thabs
499a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bras mthar phyin yul rnam bkod de// pra sran 'bras bzhin mo na mi 'byung phyir na thog mtha' bar dus gzhan min shes// thogs me'i mtshan nyid bshang bya ba// snod kyi thob bya pan tsa ste// til mar bzhin du ya gnas pa'i
499a3(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo lnga pa'i dang po nyid// rgyu'i dus na rdzogs pa ni// bum pa nang gi rtsa bcud do// bde ba'i 'khor lo gdung ba sel// gsang dbang rtsi sdong rgyal mtshan go// dngos po sems phyir longs spyod do// la la rA sa g.yas g.yon gnyis//
499a4(rgyud 'grel): bden lam spros ldan g.yas g.yon bsdus// lus kun khyab pa cod pan te// dbu ma char yang mdung ldan 'phreng // dpung sogs rtogs pa rtsa ba 'bring // 'byung chung rtsa lnga gtso bor rags// 'phra ba'i mtshan nyid yul de bzhin//
499a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam sman lus kyi phyogs cha bcu// phyogs mtshams bsrung byed khro bo ste// phra rags tshul gyi stangs dbyal lo// yid tshug chags bsogs rnam drug po// bya byed sbrul sku'i phyag rgya ste// rgyas par brgyad cu rtsa gnyis//
499a6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs nyid rgyu 'bras bcud ldan lo// stangs 'byal bcu'i ngo bo ste// gsang chos lus kyi mtshan ma rnams// las kyi sgo bsrungs brgyad gyur pa// sdud pa'i phyag rgya shes par bya// rnam shes ye shes lnga ldan pa//
499b1(rgyud 'grel): dbu brgyan rigs lnga lhun gyis grub// rnam lnga khams bcud pasnying po lnga// phan dbang rang bzhin gnas pa'i don// lam dus mtshungs pa'i 'di zhes bshad// gnyis pa'i ngo nyid nus gnas la// nyan sogs lhas kyis dkyil 'khor/
499b2(rgyud 'grel): lnga// rdza dbang rnam shes dkyil 'khor nyan// yan lag lnga la rab 'byam ste// smra sogs las la dbang sgyur zhing // rang bzhin gnas bya'i don du bstan// myong dbang 'chad pa'i mtshan nyid de// sgra dbyangs yi ge sgyur phyir ro// sgrom
499b3(rgyud 'grel): mdo rnyeng sogs lasna bzhi'i dbyibs// snying gi thig le bsgom lho ste// snod bcung kun gyi bdag po dang // bsam pa'i lam la sbyor phyir ro// las su 'di dag byed spyod kyang // rang bzhin ma grub sems medo phyir// bsgom
499b4(rgyud 'grel): dang bsgom par bya med phyir// chags me tshul du rang bzhin gnas// rang bzhin gnas don gsum pa ni// tha snyad gnyis spyod byang chub sems// me'i tha snyad kun rdzob don// yul mang ma mthong gsang ba'i ming //
499b5(rgyud 'grel): snang byed thabs kyang de bzhin te// rang bzhin bde ba gnas pa'i lam// khu bas rgyud pas bde myong ba// rang bzhin gnas lugs gsang ba'i dbang // thabs dang byin brlabs brel ba'i phyir// brtul zhugs
499b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas spyad cing blang // bzhi pa'i gnas lugs 'di bzhin te// tha snyad rig phyir mtha' bral bas// 'dzin dang bzung ba med phyir// rang rig gsal bas khyab gnas pa'o// lnga pa bde chen brtan pa nyid// rang
500a1(rgyud 'grel): rag rkyen med rang gsal ba// sku dang ye shes ngo bo nyid// dang nyid lhun gyis grub pa ni// rgyu 'bras rim pa'i dus bral ba// rgyu'i dus nyid 'bras rdzogs pa'o// thob bya rgyu la mi gnas na// phyogs dus rgyu dang rkyen
500a2(rgyud 'grel): dag gis// kun nas slong thob rigs med de// pra sran 'bras su dbang skur yang // de la 'bras bu snang ba med// dbang mchog rang la gnas par ni// dus gsum rgyal ba'i lung las gsungs// dbang rnams rang la med 'gyur na
500a3(rgyud 'grel): bskur bas thob par mi 'gyur te// gdod nas ldan phyir mtshungs pa ste// gzhi'i phyir thog mar bkod pa yin// lus gzhan bar ma'i mtshan nyid ni// ngo bo dbang lnga thun mong du// lus ni bcu dang drug gis rdzogs// snod dang
500a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor skur ba'i dus// rang gi ngo bo nges tshig dang // bskur rdzusra thabs dang rgyu dang rgyun// gnas dang sgrib srang thob pa'i tshad// chos dang dgos ched skyon yon gyis// mdor bsdus lus kyi mtshan nyid bzhag/ phan pa
500a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa'i don bstan pa// phan dbang bcul mos dang na// de nyid sbyin pa'i snod du bstan// rgyas 'bring dkyil 'khor ri mo ru// las kyi gzhung rdzogs pan dbang skur// dang po sems bskyeng 'jug dus su// rdzas kyi
500a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang bcu rdzogs par sbyin// ngo bo'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ni// mtshon byi dbang dang mtshon byed de// mtshon bya bdag la rdzogs pa ste// mtshon byed rab gnas ldan pa'i rdzas// thob bya gang yin ngo bo ste// rgyu
500b1(rgyud 'grel): rkyen 'joms pas bskor ba yis// bdag la nus bskyes rnol ngar brtags bzhin// bdag la phan phyir ming du brjod// rdzas ni rnams bcu'i ngo bo nyid// las kyi rim pa rgyas pa yis// bskur ba'i thabs kun gsungs
500b2(rgyud 'grel): ba yin// mtshungs ldan lhan cig rgyu yin te// mtshungs po rang bzhin gnas pa nyid// lhan cig byed pa rdzas bcu dngos// phyag rgya rang gi mtshan nyid dang // gdugs la mi bskyod 'bo gnas te// bum po rang gi byang chub sems//
500b3(rgyud 'grel): dbu rgyan rang bzhin snying po 'bras// 'phreng ba cod pan rin chen pad+ma// go chu rgyul mtshan rdo rje sems// bza' btung snang mdzod rab gnas ldan// dngos su las sbyor lhan cig rgyu// rkyen ni rgyu dang bdag po dang // de ma thag pa
500b4(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa bani// slob ma'i yon tan bcu drug nyid// chags gnyis rang phyogs chang dang chung // dregs bskur phrag dog le lo med// snying rje ldan zhing khang sems med// longs spyod mi tshigs nun tan ldan// yid ring lkog med
500b5(rgyud 'grel): rkyen thub cing // dang ba'i sems ldan thob pa'i rgyu// dkyil 'khor bskur rdzus dus nyid dang // ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya yis// nus mthu meng po snang ba nyid/ bdag po'i rkyen du brjod pa yin// dngos bcu skad kyi tshul dag
500b6(rgyud 'grel): gis/ snga phyi ltos nas go 'byed pa// rgyu 'bras tshul de de ma thag/ lte ba ting 'dzin nongs ldan zhing // log pa'i lha 'bras byin brlabs can// las dang man ngag rgyu ldan pa// dngos rdzas rdzogs pa'i slob dpon ni// rim pa
501a1(rgyud 'grel): nod pa'i yul du gsungs// gnas ni phyi dang nang gnyis te// phyi rol ring dang yul phyi dang // sgrub khangs nas lo rgyus can// blung byu de bzlog nas// de bzhin nang la snyoms gnyis// spyi dbang la bskur ba ste// brgyad
501a2(rgyud 'grel): par snying po dbu rgyan bum// gdugs dang cod pan 'phreng ba gos// go cha lus te rgyal mtshan lag/ bza' btung drag gi lam la'o// phyag rgya spyi bo 'am snying ga ste// gzhag pa'i gnas dang bstims pa'i gnas// de bzhin khong
501a3(rgyud 'grel): du chud pa gces// sgrib pa spong lugs spyi khyad par// las dang rnam smin phyogs cha re// skye gnas brgyad spong spyi'i ste// khyad par bkur gnas spyi dang sbyar// dbang thob ces pa'i tha snyad ni// spyad rgyu mngon sum thob pa yang //
501a4(rgyud 'grel): go mi 'gog cing rig la snang // tha mar sangs rgyas thob byed cing // nus pa gang skyes thob pa'i tshad// chos dang tshis ni nyan bshad de// phyi rol drangs don mnyan bshad rung // dkyil 'khor la so gis mtshan nyid bshad// brong
501a5(rgyud 'grel): dang g.yang sa shes phyir ro// dgos ched spyi dang khyad par ro// nus sgo 'byed dang sa bgrod phyir// skabs kyis rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur// khyad par rang gi don du'o// skyon mu mgo 'gas chos ma thos// yon tan che ring bde/
501a6(rgyud 'grel): ba thob// 'di dang phyi mar thob pa'o// nus pa'i snod ni bdag dang gzhan// gnyis ka'i don byed brtson ldan pa// khyad par snod ces bstan pa ste// bcu drug mtshan ldan spyi'i snod// phan bzhin ri mo'i dkyil 'khor dang //
501b1(rgyud 'grel): yan lag lnga sogs dkyil 'khor te// slob ma'i dus su nus dbang bskur// phan pa thob pa'i dus nyid du// ngo bo mnyam bya bsgom bya sogs// dbang po yan lag gnas gsal ba'o// bdag gzhan don la nus gsal ba// rdzas ni
501b2(rgyud 'grel): glegs bam rgya gram dang // 'khor lo phreng ba rdo rje dral// 'obyung ldan don yod snang mtha' yas// yi dam rigs lnga'i rab gnas ljon// thabs ni dbang sogs gnas lnga ru// so so'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed// rgyu ni rnam grang
501b3(rgyud 'grel): bshad bzhin to// bdag gnas mtshungs rgyu la sogs pa// lhan cig rgyu ru bshad pa yin// nus pa la dang ldan rgyu'i rkyen// bdag pa yan lag 'tshogs pa'i mthu// de ma thag pa nus rim lnga// bltos nas 'bras go 'byed pa'o// dmig
501b4(rgyud 'grel): pa mtshan ldan man ngag can// byin rlabs ldan pa pha nyid do// gnas ni rna ba snying lag dang // lci dang yan lag rnam lnga'o// mgrin pa phan dang nus ming ste// khyad par phan dang nyon mongs dang // tha mar rtog pa 'jil bar byed// thob pa'i
501b5(rgyud 'grel): tshad ni nus pa lnga// bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis ka'i dron// spyod sgo ma 'gags thob pa'i tshad// chos ni nges grol nges bshad rnams// snang byed man+da chad nyan du rung // dag pa gsang ba'i sgo 'byed dang // bsgom dang dbugs phyung
501b6(rgyud 'grel): rjes su sbyar// don gnyis mthar phyin bya phyir ro// skyon ni dbang med las brtson dang // de nyid glags pa'i rgyu ru 'gyur// yon tan don thar phyin byed pa'i// thams cad la ni thogs med pa'o// gsang ba'i dbang zhes brjod pa'i snod
502a1(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'i brtul shugs ldan pa yis// dam rdzas rnams la mdzem med pa'o// dkyil 'khor skor ba ni mdzub glang ste// phyi rol nang gi tshul du dbye'o// dus ni nus thob rdzogs sgrub pa'o// mtshan nyid
502a2(rgyud 'grel): bar mar 'jug pa yi// ngo bo rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur// khu ba ye shes ro ldan pas// mi rtog myong ba'i dus ldan pa'o// thob bya rang gi ngo bo yi// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med drug/ bla ma'o nyi zla ro ldan pa/ ma thob ra
502a3(rgyud 'grel): tu snang med gsang // de nyid byin pas snang med pa// bde dang mtshan ma skyes pa ni// dbang zhes tha snyad brjed pa yin// rdzas ni dngos dang nus pa ste// dngos ni nyi zla byang chub sems// bskur thabs chen mchog gsal la//
502a4(rgyud 'grel): nus pa skyed phyir thob pa shun// las kyi rim pa thabs brjod de// sor bzhi pa nas che mchog par// mtshungs rgyu lngar bshad gnas lugs de// lhan cig byed rgyu ro ldanA sems// rkyen ni burtul zhugs dang sems rgyu// yan
502a5(rgyud 'grel): lag tshang zhi'i nus pa dag/ sbyor mnyam ldan pa'i slob ma'i yul// skad cig las rim go ba byed pa// de ma thog pa'i mtshan nyid do// gnas ni gzhan dang stim gnyis so// sems kyi dkyil nas drangs pa'i chu// khyod
502a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi lce la phab pa ni// snying gi dkyil du gzung bar byos// gdams pa lce nyid gnas bskul nas// yungs kar tshad tsam sems 'od kyis// rang rgyud sa bon bsreg sbyangs phyir// rnam smin sgrib pa phyogs gnyis dang // khyod par
502b1(rgyud 'grel): ngag gi skyon sbyangs pa'o// thob tshad khu bas bsdu ba'i dus// 'od gsal phyogs pade mtshan mthong ba'o// bde dang mtshan ma' bu'i rtags// dpe don mtshon bya byed par shes// chos ni rdzogs rims ma lus dang // gdams
502b2(rgyud 'grel): ngag dpog po man chod nyan// 'dzin pa'i nyes dmigs gnas brgyad bshad// yon tan sdug bsngal las grol bstan// 'chad par gyur pa de bzhin no// gsum pa dbang gi rgyu phyir dang // tshe'i dngos grub thob phyir ro// /
502b3(rgyud 'grel): skyon ni chos rnams mi thos dang // rim pa gong du bgrod pa 'gag/ khyad par bzhi pa'i dbang sgo 'gags// tshe ring 'gyur ba'i nus med pa'o// yon tan rgyal ba'i skyes 'gyur nas// sgeg mo yum sogs byin rlob 'gyur/
502b4(rgyud 'grel): thob mo rnams kyi mthun mong ste// khyad par man ngag snod du 'gyur// ba ni pa'i dbang gi snod bstan pa// rigs pa'i brtul zhugs ldan pa'o// sems kyi dkyil 'khor le gas bskrun la// rab gnas sngar bzhin rgyus
502b5(rgyud 'grel): par bya// dkyil 'khor nang gi rtsa gau nas dang // pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// thun mong 'jug par gsang bar gcig/ bzhi lam ting 'dzin las rlung dgag/ stong du gyur pa'i dus nyid du// thig le mtshan ldan
502b6(rgyud 'grel): lag tu gtang // ngo bo shes rab ye shes ni// mtshon bya mtshon byed rnam pa gnyis// dpe dang don gyi bde ba yang // rgyu 'bras 'byung zlog skabs su shes// brag gdung gnyis phrad 'od gsal bde// bzlas pas lhan
503a1(rgyud 'grel): cig dag bral du// skyes pa'i gcig rig gsal ba yis// gsal ba mi rtog nyams rnyed pa'o// rig pa spros bral shes rab nyid// ma 'gags mi rtog gsal ba nyid// thabs kyi gsal bya dbang du brjod/
503a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzas kyi skabs kyi phyag rgya'o// zla ba ldan pa gtod pa'o// thabs ni dben pa'i tshig bzhin te// zab mo'i theg par grol byed pa'i// mi slu thabs kyi man ngag sbyin// don nyid mngon byed bden tshig go// rgyu ni bshad bzhin rnam pa
503a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis// rang rigs gsal rig mtshungs pa'i rgyu// bden tshig sbyin pa lhan cig byed// bcu drug phyag rgya zla ldan pa'o// las dang dag ga sogs sgrub goms pos// zla ba'i thig la gnyis bstan pa'o// rig pa'i shugs dang
503a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan sems bus// thob bya thob phyir rgyu'i rkyen// byed pa'i sdom pa la sogs dang // chu dang bsod nams ting 'dzin byin// phyag rgya'i yon tan 'joms pa'i mthus// bde ba skyed phyir bdag po'i rkyen// shes rab ye shes nyam
503a5(rgyud 'grel): len pa'o// bu la snang ba'i byin brla sa can// de lta'i pha ni dmigs pa'i rkyen// shes rab ye shes 'pho ba'i chos// rgyu 'bras go 'byed de ma thag/ bden tshig sbyin zhing bde bsnang ba'i// gnas ni rig pa'i pho brang ngo // bam
503a6(rgyud 'grel): cad rdos pa'i dngos bral bas// rang rigs gsal phyir shes bya'i phyogs// nyon mongs sgrib pa dka' nas sbyangs// si bcu sems la gnas par sbyong // shes rab ye shes thob pa ni// brag gdung lta bur phyed myong 'phrang
503b1(rgyud 'grel): de la brten nas rig gsal ba// gsal la rtog med nyams myong ba// rgyu 'bras byung tshul rten can no// de nyid thabs lon rten med de// gzhi phyir phyag rgya 'bras mi nyam// rjes su 'jug par bshad pa yin// bzlog skabs nyi zla nang 'dres/
503b2(rgyud 'grel): dus lhan cig dga' bral gnas su zin// de'i bde ba rtog med gsal// rten dang rten 'jug bshad bzhin no// gsang bshad khyad par thabs kyi mchog/ 'od gsal bde dang thabs rnams mnyam// bstan pa'i dbang la sbyang
503b3(rgyud 'grel): phyir dang // sangs rgyas mthar thugs bya phyir nang // shes shes pa shes ma rnyed na// rdo rje bskal pa mtha' glags par// 'od gsal bde ba med par nI// nam mkha'i chu skyes bzhin de skyon// skyon bzlog yon tan nyid du 'gyur//
503b4(rgyud 'grel): grongs kyi lnga pa'i ngo bo bstan// mthar thug bde ba chen po'i dbang // snad ni mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs ldan// dkyil 'khor lnga bzhi thun mong ste// dus ni phyi dang nang gi ste// phyi rol sa bcu mthar phyin dang // shes rab ye shes thob
503b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// nang gis rlung rgyu ba'i dus// ngo bo bden gnyis dbyer med pa'i// ye shes chen po'i thob bya de'o// nges tshig rnam grangs lnga par brjod// don dang ngo bo bsnyen bde chen// gnyis med bde ba mtha' bral ba// grub dang
503b6(rgyud 'grel): bde ba gcig par bde// ngo bo 'gyur med brtan par brjod// de nyid rten dang brten can dang // mtshon bya mtshon byed dpe dang don// dngos dang rdzas 'jug rim dang zlog/ de ltar grangs don shes bya'i// rten can pa
504a1(rgyud 'grel): ni nyi ma dag/ zla bar 'dres pa kha sbyar zlog/ sa lu yu sbubs chu 'dren bzhin// goms pas ri mos grangs pa'i rgyus// chu mar bzhin 'dres bden pa de ni// rgyu las skyes phyir rten can te// ngo bo mtshon phyir dpe ru
504a2(rgyud 'grel): brjod/ phyag rgya bral yang nyams med pa'i// gnyis mau da ye shes gsal ba ni// rten las 'byung ba'i rten med de// rjes 'jug rnal 'byor brda' zhes brjod// sa bon gnyis 'dres skyes pa ni// rgyu 'bras rim pa'i dbang du brjod//
504a3(rgyud 'grel): thig le bsgyur bas mthar phyin dus// skyes pa brjod pa'i dbang du brjod// rdzas ni phyag rgya nyi ldan pa'o// bskur thabs bzlog pa'i mun ngag dang // bde ba rin chen tshim sbyin pa'o// bden gnyis dbyer med bdag gi sems// ye nas gnas
504a4(rgyud 'grel): pa mtshungs zhes bshad// nyi zla ldan dus sbyin pa'i las// rim pa lhan cig byed pa'o// mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs rab ldan zhing // brtan pa'i dpal ldan dang pa'i bu// rgyu'i rkyen du brjod pa yin// bzlog pa'i ral rims man ngag
504a5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs// bde ba'i gzhi phyir bdag por brjod// brtan dbang nyams dang tshor ldan pas// bu la snang bus phra nyid yul// rim gyis bzlog pa bcu gsum po// thig le 'phos pas go 'byed pa// rgyu 'bras tshul de de ma thag/
504a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas ni khyad par thun mong ngo // sa bcu mthar phyin byang chub sems// rigs la gnas pa'i shes rigs 'phra// 'phra ba'i 'phra dang shes sgrib gnon// mun dang snang bzhin ma gsal dag/ tshad ni skabs kyis
504b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis 'gyur te// skad cig ma dang rgyun dbang du// zur 'jug bde ba gsal ba ste// dpe don cha gnyis dbye ba shes// chos ni 'bras bu pad+ma spyad// mthar thugs mA lus mnyam du rung // thig le nyi zla dbyer med pa'i// bdag kazha
504b2(rgyud 'grel): bde ba spong ba ni// bskal pa'i rnam grangs ji snyed pa'i// mthar phyin mi thob skyon zhes bya// yon tan ma lus lhun grub pa'i// mgo lus kha lce bya bas kyang // dus tshigs mi mthun mang brjod kyang // zad byed phyir rdzogs mi 'gyur ro//
504b3(rgyud 'grel): tha ma'i don gyi mtshan nyid ni// lam gyis bsgrubs pas 'bras bu ste// lam du rgyu dang 'bras bu ste// bdag yul gnyis kar shes par bya// phyag rgya ma la cig car te// pA la rim pa'i dbang du brjod// rim pa'i las 'bras skad cig/
504b4(rgyud 'grel): ma/ bcu drug dag ba ni mchog la bzhi// gang blal rtsa lnga tshogs sbyor lam// gnyis pa'i gnyis sogs tha ma ra ba// sa bcu 'og gos lo bcu gcig ste// pha rol phyin dang sa mtshan nyid// mtshungs phyir dpe don bde bar sbyor//
504b5(rgyud 'grel): 'pho ba yod phyir lam gyi 'bras// bzlog pa'i skabs su yang de bzhin shes// skabs kyi 'bras bu'ang 'di bzhin te// phan pa'i dbang bskur dus 'di nas// rgyal ba'i sras 'gyur lha'i ming // 'khor lo sgyur sogs long spyod
504b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan// dam pa'i gsang sngags spyod bskal ldan// brgyud nas kun bzang nyid du 'gyur// de yang sbyong dang khyad par ro// nus pas lha mi nor 'grub ste// bdag gzhan las rnams mthor phyung bas// bsod nams tshogs rnams mngon
505a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs te// bgrod nas sku gsum tha mar 'grub// gsang ba dbang thob 'bras bu nyid// 'od gsal phyogs kyi bde ldan pas// khams gsum kun da'i zhing khams mthong // de phyir bde dang mtshan ma rtag/ bzhi pa'i dbang
505a2(rgyud 'grel): gis 'bras bu ni// sa rims kun tu 'od thob nyid// rten pa'i rgyu ni brag gdung ste// sangs rgyas dang po de 'bras bu// yang na nyi zla 'dres zlog bde// skad cig rgyun gyis dpa don thog// lnga pa'i 'bras bu mthar thugs// nyi ma zla ba 'phrad pa'i
505a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyud// gsum pa'i bde ba'i ye shes ni// mying la mi 'dzin pad+ma spyan// rtsar gnas lhar gsal 'khor lo yis// lhar gsal mi 'dzin shes rab thabs// 'grod don lhun 'char thabs kyis// rang 'byung chen po ye shes sa// lam 'dres mi phyed
505a4(rgyud 'grel): kun bzangs// dngos po nyid du mtshon pa'i dpe// skad cig rgyun dus bshad bzhin no// skabs su 'phros pa dbang gi don// de dag pa ma'i spyod yul te// brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor las kyi yum// dngos su rten pas dman don te// 'bras bu
505a5(rgyud 'grel): 'ang mtshon pa'i bde ba skye// dus kyang skad cig dbang tsam ste// slob ma bshad pa'i snod ldan pa// bla ma rim pa'i drong thob pas// kun na byin brlabs skye bar 'dod// blo 'bring ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor du// slob dpon ting 'dzin gral
505a6(rgyud 'grel): non pas// drod thob slob ma dbang bskur ba// drod thob sa la sbyar phyir sbyin// rig pa'i lha mo dag dang sbyor// 'bras bu dngos su rigs su 'dzin thob// blo rab rigs 'dzin sa thob pa// bla ma bde bar gshegs nyid de// rang bzhin
505b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor chen po ru// rigs 'dzin sangs rgyas nyid sbyar phyir// ye shes phyag rgya mos dang sbyar// 'bras bu yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// rin chen rgya mtsho rje rje sems// sgyu 'phrul bu'i rgyud nyid las// byed pa yab yum sbyor ba yis//
505b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur chos bshad 'khor rnams kyis// rgyud rtogs sngon byung shes par bya// dkyil 'khor tha mar phyin pa'o// // sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i dngos lnga nyon mongs pa// rig pa'i kyi gnas bsrungs te bsdus pa'i// man ngag thabs
505b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog 'di thob don rtogs nas// lam gnyis rnal 'byor ma lus mthar phyin no// de ltar thabs lam don phyi nas// kun gyi theg chen don mthong ste// dug gi nang sel bde rnyed ltar// nyon mongs nyid kyis grol bar shog/ dbang gi don rab
505b4(rgyud 'grel): tu 'byed pa rdzogs so// / slob dpon chen po sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa'o// @// rgya gar skad du/ tsi ta bi du nA ma/ bod skad du// thugs kyi thigs pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la
505b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// ma byas spyan rdzogs khyab gsal 'jigs med kun ma spangs// mi phye gcig snang ma lus rang rig nyid du grol// swa ti ka bzhin dngos lngas mngon par rdzogs pa'i sku// zhar byung lnga gnyis bco lnga'i bdag nyid che la 'dud
