505b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum gnyis go l-i mchod byas nas// bcu par lnga gnyis gcig gsal bas// 'dir min lnga'i rig pa nyid// 'bras bcas pa tra shas bshad bya// bcu pa'i bcu drug nyams rnyed pas// sku bzhi'i dkyil 'khor khams thig
506a1(rgyud 'grel): le ji bzhin shes pa de nyid las// chos lo gyen du rim pa bzhin// spros bcas med dang ldan bsgoms pas// khyad par thabs kyis rims bskul nas// rim par skye ba'i ye shes ro// lha mig dag pas shes
506a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya// yi ge lnga dang gsum gnas su// mi dmigs ye shes rtags yul can// skar zla'i dkyil 'khor las byung ba// gnyis med thabs kyis rten shes na// gnyis med sems kyi snang ba'o// brtags bral shes rab 'di gsal
506a3(rgyud 'grel): 'i dzi phyi nang kun gsal rang rig dngos// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes che// me long lde bu'i rgya mtsho'i snang // thun mong sdig las grol bar 'gyur// de nyid stobs 'gyur rnal 'byor che// dkyil 'khor gsal ba'i thig la nyid//
506a4(rgyud 'grel): phan tshun rgyu 'bras tshul shes pas// chos khams g.yas g.yon tshul rigs lnga// rnam shes bdag po rten 'dus rnams// g.yas g.yon rims bzlog brgyad gnyis shes// dpung gsang lte khro bzhin te// bya byed hUM phaT gas
506a5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// ring mtshungs lha nyid drangs mchod bzlas// bcu gsum drag gi dkyil 'khor gnas// shes rabs thabs la rnam par brtag// thabs lAm rol mo'i mes bzhu ba'i// dkyil 'khor las byung gsang thig lo// bye byed gnas
506a6(rgyud 'grel): su lhag pa'i ro// gsal bas kun kyang ye shes blta'o// 'od zer snying po nye dang // ye shes thig le mnyam sbyor bas// shes rab snying rje gnyis med pa'o// bde ba chen por lhun gyis grub// gu re gum bzung ba slabs goms
506b1(rgyud 'grel): las kyis// bde chen yig gsum gnas bzhugs na// gsang sngags ngo bor rang gsal ba// dgyes pa chen por stobs par bshad// yungs kar lhung med bde ba yis// ye shes skad cig rim skye ba// rang bzhin rang snang chos kyi sku
506b2(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa sna tshogs ro ldan pa// bdag gsal 'dzin bral pad+ma can// gsang thig rang gnas rang rig pa// me la shing bsnan ji bzhin du// 'khor lo kun gyi bzhir gyur las// dkyil 'khor ma lus dngos yin phyir// lam gnas
506b3(rgyud 'grel): ku na tu spros thim pas// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis nyi shu lnga// ma lus snang bas// zhi khro 'dres mas thabs shes sogs// gdul bya bsamo bzhin dbang sbyor ba// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor mtha' yas rdzogs phyir ro// sangs rgyas
506b4(rgyud 'grel): snying po kha sbyor las// dkyil 'khor lnga sogs gsal med snang // rgyu tshul 'thun pas don byas kyang // bya byed gang yang dmigs mi 'gyur// rang bzhin mnyam rdzogs thig le pa// shes rab gsum mthar lam rim gyis//
506b5(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum kun mnyam lhun gyis grub// gcig dang du ma'i mtha'i brel bas// thams cad tshul nyid 'odi 'dra shes// lam 'dir gnas la sras bcas ril// thugs rjes ring nas byin rlob mdzad// bskal mang bsal bas 'di/
506b6(rgyud 'grel): thob ste// rgyal ba ma lus mdzad dgongs phyir// gang yang 'da' 'gyur rigs ma yin// de nas thams cad phyag rgya 'dis// blo ldan chags bral dang du mkhyen// 'dod tshol bsam mang thabs shom dang // dam nyams g.yo rgyus
507a1(rgyud 'grel): tshod len zhing // bka' gcig la spel bka' rkus pas// srog chad dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thob// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyang sdang // lhar bcas rnal 'byor smos ci dgos// de bas rab tu snod brtag bya//
507a2(rgyud 'grel): sgyu 'phrul thugs kyi thigs pa/ rdzogs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ g+hu yA b+h+r-i du u pe de sha/ bod skad du/ gsang ba'i thigs pa'i man ngag dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal li// gang la yi
507a3(rgyud 'grel): pa rnam pa brgyad du shes// gang la ci 'dra de nyid bsres pa yin// rnam bzhi bye brag drug las brgyad dkyil nA// don dam snying po de la phyag 'tshal lo// gang la snyoms 'jug de la yod pa la// de la yod de de la blta bar bya// gang lngas
507a4(rgyud 'grel): byung ba de las byung ba yin// de las de byung de nyid kho na'o// gsang ba'i shes rab thig le dbyings// bcu drug gnyis kyi dkyil na bzhugs// shes rab thabs kyi snyoms 'jug la// kun tu rgyas btab dkyil 'khor yin// bdag nyid
507a5(rgyud 'grel): chen po lnga blta zhing // thur du 'phro zhing gyen du 'bar// bde ba chen po'i mchod pa yis// gang gi snying po bskul bar byed// de 'od thig le mnyam sbyor bas// lnga gnyis drug gi dkyil na'o// bde ba chen po'i ro yis ni// dgyes pa
507a6(rgyud 'grel): chen por rtogs par bya// shes bya 'byung zad bsod nams kyis// de nyid sgyu mar rang snang ba// gzigs mo'i bde ba mtha' yas kyis// bde ba chen po'i 'ben la phog/ bcu gsum gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor lo// de'i thig le
507b1(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa'i dbyings// kun gyi dngos yin kun gyi gtso// bcu dang bzhi ni mngon rdzogs pa// gsum dang gnyis su yang dag gnas// kun gyis dngos por bdag gyur pa// de la dbang sgyur dam pa yin// nying la gnas pa gnas nyid
507b2(rgyud 'grel): la/ de la gnyis rdzogs lhun gyis grub// thams cad de'i rgyun du che// gnyis rdzogs thig le mnyam sbyor bas// snying rje chen po yongs kyis 'char// bcu'i sems can 'dul ba la// sgyu ma'i sems can sgrol ba yi// rnal 'byor/
507b3(rgyud 'grel): chen po 'od ldan spyong // 'di la rtags tu gang bdug pa// sasas rgyas sras dang 'khor bcas kyis// thugs rje nyi ma shugs las 'byung // de la bde byed bde ba sbyin// bskal pa rdul snyed grangs med du// thos bsam sgoms pa rob
507b4(rgyud 'grel): mtha' las// 'byung ba bde ba chen yin// slob dpon rten byed kye 'di lta// glang la gang med gang la'ang // de la de med de la'ang // dmyal bar bsreg dang sdug bsngal tshwa// de bsna gzhan du bstan mi bya// gsang ba'i man ngag
507b5(rgyud 'grel): thig le 'di// thig le chen po 'di snang bas// sems can kun gyi rang bzhin la// bde ba chen po snang bar shog/ gsang ba'i thogs pa'i man ngag/ slob dpon bi ma la mi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so//
507b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ma hA yo ga pradz+nyA pra be sha tsak+Shu u pa de shA nA ma/ bod skad du/ rnal 'byor chen po shes rab spyan 'byed kyi man ngag ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// dkyil 'khor gtso bo
508a1(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu'i mchog/ dam pa lha phyir phyag 'tshal nas// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud don mchog/ rang bzhin rkyen gyis mngon bya'i phyir// rgyud gsum snang bya rnal 'byor gsum// bya byed tshul
508a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis bdag nyid dang // tshig don dang ni de nyid can// rgyu 'bras thabs tshul 'brel phyir gsum// shes thob byed pa bar tshul la// ngo bo rkyen bshad thabs dang dbye// rim par mi brjod 'dir brjod pa// drang po bor mes
508a3(rgyud 'grel): mthar byed pa'o// lam gnyis thun mong rgyu dang mchog/ mchog la phyi dang nang ldangang // thabs dang shes rab lam gnyis kyis// nges byed mngon la steng 'og thabs// gcig shos gtser byed spyi blugs rim// bzhi bral
508a4(rgyud 'grel): lngas dbul las bzlog pa'i// rnal 'byor tshol mos rnams kyi// shi shi'i don phyir mdo tsam brjod// phun sum tshogs pa lhun grub rnams// gsang dbang mchog gis 'byin byed pa'o// sngon byas thabs mchog char
508a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog don// sangs rgyas zhabs kyis gsungs par shes// thos bsams sgoms pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis// rang 'byung kun dme lhun grub phyir// gsum gyis grol byung lam bshad pa// mtshan nyid gsum la
508a6(rgyud 'grel): gcig gzhi gsum// gtso mchog mtshan nyid dang po bshad// lam kun gzungs su bya phyir ro// de la brtag bya thabs ngo bos// nges tshig rtags rkyang dang // khyad par grol sa yon tan skyon// spyan mchog lus su
508b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bsgrags// 'ching grol byed pa lhun rdzogs kyang // dbang spyan mchog dang bral ba yis// srid rgyud 'bras bu ming tsam snang // dang po chu bo bzhi rgal ltar// snang ba gcig la gnyis tshul snang // ngan shos bdag
508b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan stong phur snang // de de rim por grub mo grub// mtha'i don rnams cir 'gyur brta ga/ mthong byed thabs kyang rgyud pa dang // rtags kyis mtshon cing gtan la 'bebs// dman la rgya gsum goms pa yis// brtan nas
508b3(rgyud 'grel): brtags spyad klung zhugs mthong // bsgom pa lam du bstan par bya// rim par skye la the tshom medo// shes bya dam pa rtags mtshon pa'ang // rang bzhin rtag sna dang 'bras bu'i rtags// dang po rang gi rigs pa yis// cho 'phrul
508b4(rgyud 'grel): snang ba'i 'byung ba dang // phyogs dang kha dog la sogs kyis// mtshon nas ji bzhin nyid rtogs byed// sems can ma lus thams cad la// ye shes lnga yis kun khyab kyang // rang gi rnam rtog bsgribs byas te// ye shes lnga'i
508b5(rgyud 'grel): dran ma mthong // mu mthong rmongs pa thams cad la// ye shes mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir// dkar dong dmar dang se rU ba dang // ljang gu la sogs nag pori bstan// 'od yis lhun grub rtogs par ces// cig shos mthar phyin
508b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyi// dkyil 'khor rten dang brten can ltar// snang ba'i gnas brgyan gdan sogs dang // rton cing rgya bzhi rgyan sogs mtshungs// btan tshig rgyas par lus bzhag na// tshad ma bka' gzhung gtan tshigs dang /
509a1(rgyud 'grel): sgra mthun don spags gtan tshigs kyis// gzhal bya bdag nyid tshe sogs blta// tshad ma bka' la dag mnyam grangs// rtogs pa bzhi dang bden gsum dag/ skabs kyis bya thabs mthar 'gyur
509a2(rgyud 'grel): yang // byed la gtsor brjod dag pa yis// snang ba ni spong 'bras bur byed// mnyam pas mnyam byed bdag nyid che// rtogs pa rnam bzhi'i gtan tshigs kyis// mi zad rgyun gyi 'khor lor byed// bden pa gnyis med zung du
509a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jug/ ldem dgongs man ngag gtan tshigs kyis// skabs kyis don nyid mthong bar byed// dngos po lo rgyus gtan tshigs kyis// bdag nyid chen po smos ci dgos// rang bzhin gtan tshigs lhun grub 'jug/ 'o na tang tha dad
509a4(rgyud 'grel): don la med// sgra mthun don spags rang dang spyi// mtshan nyid gzhal mtha' bral ba'o// chos kun rang dang sbyor btags pas// ma skyes thams cad mkhyen pa'i don// rnam pa kun ldan stong par snang // de phyir sku gsung thugs
509a5(rgyud 'grel): su snang // dngos kun gcig dang du mar bral// mtha' gsum dang ni bzhi bral lugs// khyad par can gyis de nyid mthong // de yang ma spangs bral bar brjod// rnam par dbye dang mtshon pa'i dpe// de bzhin nyid du tho tshom
509a6(rgyud 'grel): med / shes rab spyan gyis ngo bo nyid// gnyis kyis ngo bo skabs 'jug kyang // rgyu 'bras phyir na cig shos la// yul med rang rig mngon sum pa'o// bye brag 'dod gzhung gtan tshig kyis// zhor brjod bcu gsum rnam
509b1(rgyud 'grel): grangs tsam// mthong byed nges tshig mthong lha gnyis// sgros bral skur med don chen po// sa lu phub khrod snang med bzhin// yul med rang gsal nyams rnyed la// mthong zhes tha snyad brjod par zad// de phyir blta dang blta med pas// chos
509b2(rgyud 'grel): kun rang rig nyid snang ba// me long lta bu'i tshul bzhin du// mi rtog gsal nges tshig 'grub/ de ltar skyes mchog su ldan pa// dam la rub cing snying rjer ldan// pha la drin skye man ngag 'tsho'o// mi skyo don brtson chags bral 'byung // spyod
509b3(rgyud 'grel): zhib nyams nga g.yang sa med// de yod dmigs dang ldan pa'i rtags// rnal 'byor che la phyir rgyu dang // mu stegs zhor 'byung rig byed dang // ngo bo rgyur smra phyogs lung rten// bdun ste mnyam 'jog la sogs kyis// reg min de lnga
509b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi nas spags// lta spyod mi mthun smos ci dgos// bskal par sbyangs pas don mthong ba// phyin chad mi ldog sa la gnas// spyod sogs las kun pha rol phyin// gzungs kyi dam par rgyal bas gsungs// shes rab spyan
509b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan na// dkar phyogs lha mi stegs tsam las// spyad kyang mi tho bo 'chi bar 'gyur// nag po'i las spyod smos ci dgos// tshig tsam lha la rten byecing // dam med spyod cing sgo dgu yi// nyod pa byed de thar par dka'// stegs
509b6(rgyud 'grel): dradrabrang tsam gyis rnyed dka' bas// sgra 'dul bdud bzlog brtson par 'bod// de med nam yang thar mi srid// spyod dang skyon bcos mi zod cing // lci dang gdung med 'dod thob nas// mo khur spongs byed rigs ma nges// ltung byed
510a1(rgyud 'grel): de dang ma phrad cig/ de bzlog sdod ldan dpal du shog/ des kyang de bzhin 'tsho bar shog/ rab rib sel byed thur 'dra' 'di// dman phyir brtson byas gzhung 'gal spyon// rgyal ba rigs 'dzin mchog sum
510a2(rgyud 'grel): la bzod gsol gnyis med dang du bshags// ngal ba'i dge rtsas 'gro ba rnams// mi ldog spyan ldan sangs rgyas shog// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i shes pa'i mtshan nyid bshad pa// shes rab spyan
510a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byed ces bya ba// bi ma las mdzad pa rdzogs so// / lta ba dang theg pa la sogs po'i khyad par bsdus pa'i bslus byang // bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nu dang // rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten
510a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi khams na/ sems can phyin ci logs gi lta ba grangs med pa'i mdo rnam pa bzhir 'dus te/ phyal po dang / rgyang pan dang / mur thugs pa dang / mu stegs pa'o// de la phyal ba ni chos thams cad la rgyu dang 'bras bu yod med du ma
510a5(rgyud 'grel): gtogs te// kun tu rmongs pa'o// rgyang phan pa tshe spu phyi yod med du ma gtogs shing / tshe gcig la btsan phyug dang / mthu stobs bsgrub pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi gsang tshig la brten pa'o// mur thug pa ni chos thams cad
510a6(rgyud 'grel): ni rgyu dang 'bras bu med pa ste/ tshe gcig la skyes pa'i chos thams cad kyang glo bur du skyes la/ mtha' chad par lta ba'o// mu stegs pa ni/ chos thams cad la kun tu btags pa'i bdag rtag pa zhig yod par lta ba ste/ de yang
510b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu med pa la 'bras bu yod par blta ba dang / rgyu 'bras log par lta ba dang / rgyu yod pa la 'bras bu med par lta ba'o// 'di dag ni ma rig pa'i lta ba'o// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam la yang rnam pa gnyis te/ mtshan
510b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi theg pa dang / rdo rje'i theg pa'o// mtshan nyid kyi theg pa la yang rnam pa gsum ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'o// de la nyan thos kyi theg pa la zhugs
510b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lta ba rnams ni// ches thams cad la mu stegs la sogs pa yis sgra dang bkur bar btab pa'i ye med par blta ba dang / rtag pa la sogs pa yod par lta ba ni/ thag pa la sbrul du mthung ba med/ phung po dang / skye mched dang
510b4(rgyud 'grel): khams la sogs pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i/ rdul phra rab dang / rnam par shes pa ni don dam par yod par lta ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgoms pa'i rims kyis// 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi grub pa yin no// rang
510b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi lta ba ni/ chos thams cad la su stegs la sogs pas// sgo dang bkur bar kun tu rtags pa'i bdag rtag pa la sogs pa med par lta bu ni nyan thos dang mthun/ de la khyad par
510b6(rgyud 'grel): du gzugs kyi phung po chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig la bdag med par rtogs shing // rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob pa'i dus na yang / nyan thos ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mi ltos par/ sngon gomos pa'i
511a1(rgyud 'grel): shugs kyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bcu gnyis kyi sgo nas// chos nyid zab mo rtogs nas/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu 'grub pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi lha
511a2(rgyud 'grel): da ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i chos thams cad don dam par ni rang bzhin med pa yin la/ kun rdzob tu ni sgyu ma tsam du mtshan nyid ma 'dres par yod de// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu spyad pa'i 'bras bu sa bcu rim
511a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis bagled pa'i mtha'// bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'grub par 'dod pa yin no// // rdo rje theg bra la yang gsum ste/ bya ba rgyud kyi theg pa dang / gnyis ka rgyud kyi theg pa dang / rnal 'byor chud kyi theg pa'o// de la bya
511a4(rgyud 'grel): brgyud kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi lta ba ni/ don dam par skye 'gag med pa las/ kun rdzob tu lha'i gzugs kyi bskur bsgom zhing sku'i gzugs brnyan dang / thugs mtshan dang / bzlas brjod dang / gtsang sbra dang / dus
511a5(rgyud 'grel): tshigs dang / bza' dang rgyu skar la sogs pa/ gtsor yo byad dong rgyu rkyen 'tshogs pa'i mthus 'grub pa'o// gnyis ka rgyud kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi lta ba ni/ don dam par skye 'geg med pa lngas/ kun rdzobatu
511a6(rgyud 'grel): lha'i sku nyid rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par bsgoms pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yo byad dang rgyu rkyen la sogs pa gnyis ka la yang brten nas 'grub pa'o// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi lta ba ni/ rnam pa
511b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis te/ rnal 'byor phyi ba thub pa rgyud kyi theg pa dang / rnal 'byor nang pa thabs kyi rgyud kyi theg pa'o// de la rnal 'byor phyi la thub pa rgyud kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi lta ba ni/ phyi'i yo byad la gtso bor mi 'dzin
511b2(rgyud 'grel): par don par skyo 'gog med pa'i lha dang lha mo dang / de dang 'dro ba'i rgyud yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis/ 'phags pa'i gzu gas kyi sku phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan par bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i gtsor byas pas
511b3(rgyud 'grel): 'grub po// rnal 'byor nang pa thabs kyi rgyud kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi lta ba ni/ rnam pa gsum ste/ bskyed pa'i tshul dang / rdzogs pa'i tshul dang / rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul lo// de la bskyed pa'i tshul ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnam pa
511b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum rims bzhin du bskyed cing / dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bkod nas/ bsgoms pas 'grub po// rdzogs pa'i tshul ni/ don dam par skye 'gag med pa'i lha dang lha mo'i rnam par mi rtog/ dbu mo chos kyi dbyings las kyang ma g.yos la
511b5(rgyud 'grel): kun rdzob tu gzugs kyi sku yang gsal bar bsgom zhing / mnyam la ma 'dres par bsgoms pas 'grub bo// rdzogs pa chen po'i tshe lho ni/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad dbyer med par sku gsung thugs
511b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin ye nas yin par rtogs nas bsgom pa ste/ de yang rgyud las/ rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags/ skye mched khams rnams mang po kun/ byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil
512a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor nyid// sa chu spyan dang mA ma kI/ me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// srid gsum ye nas rnam par dag/ ces 'byung ste/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las pa'i chos thams cad ye
512a2(rgyud 'grel): nas ma skyes la// bya byed nus pa'i sgyu ma/ bde bar gshegs pa yab yum bcu la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yo nas yin pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ chen po lnga ni yum lnga'i rang bzhin yin/ phung
512a3(rgyud 'grel): po lnga ni rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas la/ rnam par shes pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzhi'i rang bzhin/ yul bzhi ni mdzes pa lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin/ dbang po bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' bzhi'i rang bzhin/ dus bzhi ni mchos pa'i
512a4(rgyud 'grel): lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin/ lus kyi dbang po dang / rnam par shes pa dang / yul dang / de las 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni kho bo bzhi'i rang bzhin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rdo rje kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhi/
512a5(rgyud 'grel): yul chos 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas ni kun tu bzang mo'i rang bzhin te/ de dag kyang yi nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin yin gyi/ de lam gyis bsgrub pa ni ma yin no// de ltar phyogs bcu dang dus gsum
512a6(rgyud 'grel): dang / khams gsum la sogs pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad rang gi sems las gud na med na/ ji skad du/ rang gi sems so sor rtogs pa ni/ sangs rgyas byang chub de nyid do// 'jig rten gsum po de
512b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid de/ 'byung ba chen po rnams de nyid do// zhes 'byung ngo // ji skad du/ chos thams cad ni sems la gnas so// sems ni nam mkha' la gnas so// nam mkha' ni ci yang mi gnas so// zhes 'byung ba dang / chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis
512b2(rgyud 'grel): stong pa'o// chos thams cad ni gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'o// chos thams cad ni yongs su kyis 'od gsal ba'o// chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa'o// chos thams cad ni ye nas mngon par rdzogs
512b3(rgyud 'grel): par sangs rgyas pa'o zhes gsungs so// / 'di rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul lo// rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul ni/ rtogs pa rnams bzhi lam gyis yod ches pa ste/ de la rdzogs pa chen po ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
512b4(rgyud 'grel): tshegs rdzogs pas// 'bras bu chos lhun gyis 'grub pa'i don no// tshul ni don la 'jug pa'o// rtogs pa rnams bzhi ni// rgyu gcig par rtogs pa dang / yig 'bru'i tshul gyis rtogs pa dang / byin gyis brlabs par rtogs pa dang //
512b5(rgyud 'grel): mngon sum par rtogs pa'o// de la rgyu gcig par rtogs pa ni// chos thams cad don dam par ma skyes pas/ so so ma yin pa dang / kun rdzob sku ma'i mtshan nyid kyis so so ma yin pa dang / ma skyes pa nyid chu bzla lngar sgyu ma sna tshogs
512b6(rgyud 'grel): su snang zhing bya ba byed nus pa dang / sgyu ma nyid ngo bo med de/ ma skyes pas kun rdzob dang / don dam par dbyer med pas rgyu gcig par rtogs pa'o// yig 'bru'i tshul gyis rtogs pa ni/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa ni a sti gsungs gi rang
513a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin la'am skyes pa nyid rgyu mar snang zhing bya ba byed nus pa ni oM ste sku'i rang bzhin/ de ltar rtogs pa'i rig pa ye shes sgyu ma mtha' dang dbus med pa ni hUM ste thugs kyi rang bzhin du rtogs pa'o// byin gyis brlabs par
513a2(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa ni/ dper na ras dkar po la dmar pos byin gyis brlab pa'i mthu rtsod la yod pa bzhin du/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas par byin gyis brlob pa'i mthu yang rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul gyis mthus byin gyis brlabs
513a3(rgyud 'grel): par rtogs pa'o// mngon sum par rtogs pa ni/ chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas par gnas pa de yang lung dang man ngag dang 'gal ba yang ma yin la/ lung dang man ngag gi tshig tsam la rten pa yang ma yin la/ rang gi rig pas blo'i
513a4(rgyud 'grel): gting du yid ches par mngon sum du rtogs pa'o// lam gyi yid ches pa ni/ rtogs pa rnam bzhi'i don rig pa de nyid rnal 'byor pa'i lam yin te/ de yang rgyu bsgrub pas 'bras bu 'byung ba'i dus la ltos pa lta bu ni ma yin gyi/ rang gi
513a5(rgyud 'grel): rig pas mngon sum du rtogs shing yid ches pa'o// de la mtshan nyid gsum gyis don mthar phyin par 'gyur te/ rtogs pa rnam bzhi'i tshul rig pa ni/ zhes pa'i mtshan nyid do// yang nas yang du goms par byed pa ni/ 'jug pa'i
513a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid do// goms pa'i mthus mngon du gyur pa ni/ 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid do// mtshan nyid gsum gyi 'brel pa dang / dgos pa dang / dgos pa yang dgos pa'o// de la 'brel pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'o// rnam par byang ba'i chos
513b1(rgyud 'grel): su rtags pa thams cad ye nas sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid/ rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas pa'i dbyings dang / byin gyis brlabs yin pa'i don rtogs pa ni shes pa'i mtshan nyid do// de bla na med par sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i rgyu yin pa'i
513b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir dgos pa'o// dgos pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rnam par byang ba dang chos dang / sman lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga la sogs par btags pa thams cad/ ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i mnyam pa chen po la blang dor med par spyod pa ni 'jug pa'i
513b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid do// de ni bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas su grub pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dgos pa'o// dgos pa'i yang dgos pa ni// kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i chos dang / sman lnga dang / bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i khyad par du bag
513b4(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad/ ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i mnyam pa chen po'i ngang du/ blang dor med par srid pa'i 'khor ba nyid ye nas bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid lhun gyis grub pa yin pas/ 'bras
513b5(rgyud 'grel): bu'i mtshan nyid de/ sku gsung thugs mi zad pa brgyan gyi 'khor lo mngon du gyur pa ni/ dgos pa'i dgos pa'o// de la bsnyen pa dang / nye ba'i bsnyen pa dang / bsgrub pa dang bsgrub pa chen pos/ don lhun gyis grub par gyur pas/ rnal 'byor la
513b6(rgyud 'grel): brtson par bya'o// de la bsnyen pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems shes pa ste/ de yang chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin du nga lam gyis bsgrub cing gnyen pos bcos su med par rtogs pa'o// nye ba'i bsnyen pa ni bdag
514a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid ltar shes pa ste/ de yang chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin yin pas/ bdag nyid kyang yo nas lha'i rang bzhin yin par shes kyi/ nga bsgrub pa ni ma yin par rtogs pa'o// bsgrub
514a2(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di ni yum bskyed pa ste/ de yang yum chen mo na mkha'i dbyings las/ nam mkha' nyid yum chen mo// sa chu me rlung bzhir snang / bya ba med pa'i yum ye nas yin par rtogs pa'o// bsgrub pa ni thabs dang shes rab 'brel
514a3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ de yang yum chen mo lnga'i shes rab dang / yum gyi nam mkha' stong pa nyid las/ phung po lnga'i sangs rgyas thabs kyis yang/ smon pa myed pa yA nas zung du 'gyur ba'i 'brel pa las byang chub kyi sems sprul pa tsam bral du
514a4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa'i rang bzhin/ ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i sgyu ma rol cing bde mchog sgyu ma'i rgyun la/ bde ba'i dus nyid na/ mtshan ma med pa'i don mi dmigs nam mkha' dang snyoms pa ni/ klong du gyur nas lhun gyis grub pa ste/ bdud
514a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam bzhi yang brtul bas/ mthar phyin pa'i don 'grub pa'o// chos thams cad gzod ma nAs rnam par dag pa'i yid bzhin gyi gzhal yas khang / rgyu yongs su mya tshang 'khor lo// ya~M nas bla na med pa'i dkyil 'khor
514a6(rgyud 'grel): du 'jug pa yang / thabs kyi theg po'i gsung thos pa ni mig phye ba'o// don rtogs pa ni dkyil 'khor mthong ba'o// rtogs nas goms par byed pa ni/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'o// zhugs nas mngon du gyur pa ni//
514b1(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub chen po thob pa'o// de ltar tshul 'di ni rdzogs pa chen po'i mthar phyin pa'i don/ yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa la lhun gyis 'jug pa ste/ skyes bu blo rtsal rab kyis/ ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i don la ya nas sangs
514b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par rig pas gom pa drug dal du 'gro ba yin gyi/ phal gyis bya ba ni ma yin no// phal gyis thos te ji ltar bsam kyang / bden zhing bzang zhing yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// yid ma ches pa dang / phul gyi blo la dka' zhing bden pa
514b3(rgyud 'grel): dang / bzang bar ma shes pa'i nyams dang sbyar nas/ kun kyang de dang 'dra snyam ste/ yo rdzun zhes skyes bu rab la yang bskur pa 'debs shing sun 'byin pa'i blo skye bar 'gyur pas/ rab tu gsang ba'i phyir/ gsang ba'i thegs pa zhes
514b4(rgyud 'grel): bka' stsal to// de bas na chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i don rtogs pa'i blo ma skyes kyi bar du/ theg pa'ig ma 'gro ba'i don byas nas/ 'dul bya mi za bas/ slob dpon gyis 'khor ba'i skyon dang / mya ngan las
514b5(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa'i yon tan dang / thegs pa thams cad la mkhas par byed pa yin gyi/ phyogs 'ga' tsam shes pas slob dpon gyis gzung du mi rung bar yang rgya cher 'byung ngo // lta ba'i khyad par bka' thub po dang / brtul
514b6(rgyud 'grel): zhugs kyang bye brag du 'gyur te/ dka' thub med pa ni 'jig rten phyil ba dang / mur thug go// dka' thub yod pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ rgyang pan pa dang / mu stegs pa ste/ 'jig rten pa'i dka' thub dang / nyan thos kyi dka'
515a1(rgyud 'grel): thub dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dka' thub dang / bla na med pa'i dka' thub bo// de la phyal ba ni rgyu 'bras la rmongs pa'i phyir dka' thub med do// mur thug pA ni chad par lta ba'i phyir/ dka' thub med do// rgyang phan pa ni
515a2(rgyud 'grel): tshe 'di'i khyad par drug bsgrub pa'i phyir/ gtsang sbra la sogs pa'i dka' thub can+da no// mu stegs pa ni/ bdag tu brtag pa cig yod pa de dag par bya ba'i phyir/ lus 'asun 'byin cing / me lnga rten pa la sogs dka' thab dang / brtul zhugs/
515a3(rgyud 'grel): log par spyod pa'o// nyan thos kyi dka' thub ni/ 'dul ba las sdig pa ci yang mi bya ste/ dge ba phun sum tshogs par spyad/ rang gi sems ni yongs su gdul/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin/ ces 'byung ste/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i//
515a4(rgyud 'grel): chos thams cad/ kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis ka so sor yod par lta bas dge ba ni spyod/ mi dge ba ni spong ba'i dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs spyod pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i dka' thub ni/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
515a5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa'i sdom pa la/ bskyen du 'tsham par tshar mi gcong // rdzu 'phrul la sogs sdig mi byed/ snying rje ldan zhing byams phyir dang / sems dge ba la nyes pa me ces 'byung ste/ snying rje chen pos zin na dge ba dang mau dge tham
515a6(rgyud 'grel): chos gang spyad kyang / sdom pa nyams par mi 'gyur bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i dka' thub ni/ snying rje bzhi bzung na sa spyod pa'o// bla na med pa'i dka' thub ni/ dam tshig chen po'i mdo las kyang / sangs rgyas theg pa rab nges/
515b1(rgyud 'grel): na nyon mongs 'dod lnga kun spyad kyang // pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin te/ de la tshul khrims phun sum tshogs zhes 'byung ste/ chos thams cad ya nas mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ snying rjes ni rten du med la zhe sdang ni spang du med de/ de ltar
515b2(rgyud 'grel): ma rtogs pa la// thugs rje mi 'byung ba yang ma yin te/ ji ltar lta bas ye nas/ ye nas rnam par rtog pa bzhin/ dka' thub dang brtul shugs kyang de ltar rnam par spyod pa'o// lta ba 'phreng ba'i gsang rab 'di// dmu
515b3(rgyud 'grel): long rang phye mig med ltar// shes rab thabs kyi rdul 'chang ba'i// skyes mchog yod na phrad par shog/ man ngag gi rgyal po lta ba'i 'phreng ba/ rdzogs so// / bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang
515b4(rgyud 'grel): po dang / rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// gnyis bsdus ma lus sems nyid la// lta ba'i bya byed gnyis med cing // rang gi ngo bro'ang ma grub pas// lta ba med pa'i lta ba ni/ lta ba'i dam pa kho nar 'dod// rmongs pa'i
515b5(rgyud 'grel): lta ba dngos dmigs pa// ljongs pas nam mkha' bsnyags pa rnams/ mtshan nyid ma dor bsngos bshad par bya// rgyu rkyen las kyis ma byas pa'i// gser go las byas rdzas rnams kun// ming dbyibs dngos las
515b6(rgyud 'grel): thaM dang kyang // ngo bo gsare du gcig pa ltar// rang byung rang snang byang chub sems// sgros bral rang rgyud min po'i yul// ming sgyu brtags chags bsrubs 'grub snang // rigs phyir phyi nang dngos kun tu// rang snang
516a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid so sor yang // sems phyir rtog med 'od gsal ba'i// sems nyid 'ba' zhig kho nas pas// cir yang snang la gzung du med// sna tshogs gnyis par mi phyed pa// bdagu po zung 'jug rdo rje'i
516a2(rgyud 'grel): skub cing snang ma spangs dngos mi dmigs// sprul rdzogs chos su ma 'dres gsal// de sogs lhun grub byang chub sku// mya nor ma bcos kun 'byung ba// de la de bzhin dbyangs zhes bya'o// cis kyang mo bsgribs ye shes mchog/ thams
516a3(rgyud 'grel): cing ma 'dres ye shes gsal// dngos po thams cad de nyid de// rgyud dkyil rdzogs chen sangs rgyas sogaso// rang bzhin ngo bor de brjod de// 'khor ba dkAr dag rin cheni gling // mya ngon 'das zla brjod med pa// tha snyad ci yang min pa stan
516a4(rgyud 'grel): ming grangs gdul bya'i ched du zad// de ltar rang rig rang snang bas// gang la cir snang dus nyid na// lta bya lta byed gnyis med pa// mthong ba med pa'i mthong yin yang // nges pa'i rkyen gyis ma nges dang // spyi'i snang gnyis rtags gsum du'i
516a5(rgyud 'grel): rang blo'i rgyun las grub pa'o// bshad pa bzhin du rang snang la// ma rig bdag lta brtags pa yin// zhor blos gud na 'dug pa dang // rdzas bems snang ba'i brtags pa gsum// goms pas nyams su skye ba nyid// log rtog rgyun la
516a6(rgyud 'grel): rtag gnas pas// nyon mongs las kyis cir snang ba'i// dngos kun log rtog tsam nyid las// 'phra dang zab pa yod min pas// 'khrul pa'i snang ba zhes su gsungs// rang bzhin shes spangs zlog pa'i phyir// chos nyid bya byed
516b1(rgyud 'grel): rigs pa gnyis// rang bzhin las kyi sra tha dang ngo // snod bcud rims sbyar theg bsam yas// dgongs gsung brlabs 'byung du ma las// rang bzhin cha 'thun gol ba gnyis// bye brag du ma 'ang gnyis 'dus te// ril lha byed po rtag pa gany+tsi
516b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang dngos po rkyen las 'byung // 'jig mtha' stong pa'i tshad lta'o// mos pa chung ngu ba dag ni// sems ni bzhir snang skad cig ma'i// rgyun la lta ba gnyis ma grub// so so'i ngo bo phra rab ni// bdag dang 'jig rten gzhir 'dod pa// chos tsam
516b3(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa'i spyod yul la// yor bor rnam par shes pa yis// mu rdzas lta bur lkog gyur pas// spang phyir rjes su 'gog byed pa'i// gzhan dag 'dzin pa cha mdun yang // 'phra mo phyogs chas ma grub phyir// dngos po'i ngo bo mtha' stong yang
516b4(rgyud 'grel): stong pa'i rgyun gyis stong pa 'ang // so so'i cha yis 'ching bar 'gyur// phyogs rtogs pa yis gzhung drug kyang // don ni rgyud bcas chos tsam min// rnam rig skad cig ngo bo nyid// dngos nyid snang phyir sems tsam ste// rmi lam khang sogs ji
516b5(rgyud 'grel): lta bar// dngos po thams cad skad cig ma'o// gang yang de snang dus nyid la// snga phyi kun bsgribs de lta nyid// gcig phyir cha shas rnams pas stong // nyi shar chu shel bai rlur sogs// brtags par dka' ba'i ye shes nyid// de lnga'i rgyun
516b6(rgyud 'grel): du rang gnas pa'o// rje su 'jug par byed pa ni// mi rtog ting 'dzin zhes bya'o// mi gnas theg chen gzhung gsum mdo// gzhan gyi dam pa'i don nyid// phyogs gcig le gnas yang dag min// rkyen snang se gol cha'i phyir// gnyis bral
517a1(rgyud 'grel): smra ba'ang rigs pas 'gal// gang yang rang grub ma yin te// lag sor tshogs kyis dngos min bzhin// brgyad phyed gzhan dbang snang ba yang // mthun snang la sogs rigs pa bzhis// nges par yod par kun
517a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgribs 'dod// 'dus snang don byed rgyu tsam la// chos dang ldan pa zhes brjod kyang // ngo bo mthong pa ming tsam phyir// rang gi mtshan nyid brjod bya min// gzhan snang rgyu dang grangs bral ba dang // bdag gzhan gnyis sgyus mi skye phyir// gang yang
517a3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi ngo bo stong // dusde gsum du yang ma grub pa// rang bzhin ngo bos stong pa nyid// ma byas mi 'gyur ma reg cing // ngo bos brjod med rigs bzhis des// shes bya bdan gnyis ngo bo nyid // mun snang bzhin du 'thang mon la// lo ma mtshon
517a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gzhan las min// gang yang gnyis las 'da' med pa// mtha' las byangs phyir dbu mar 'dod// theg pa mchog la bye brag ste// dmigs pa 'phra mo bya ba nyid// rang sems mtha' bzhi yongs bral la// rang rig ye shes
517a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan las min// rkyen snang glang ba'i ye shes kyis// mthong ba'i dngos po mthong 'jam rtsub// drug phyed rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du// mthong ba rnam par dag ces bya'o// dag pas lhas na kun kyang gtsang // rtogs pas bsams na ci yang
517a6(rgyud 'grel): 'grub// dngos kun rang rig mtshan nyid de// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis// lugs bskur bzhin du snang bar 'dod// ye shes byin brlabs// snang ba nyid// sdong ma chud par rims lta zhing // snang stong rim gyis brtan par byed//
517b1(rgyud 'grel): cho ga las dang rdzas bsogs pa// rnal 'byor gnyis dbang smra gzhung ni// thams cad sems kyi brlabs snang phyir// de nyid mtha' stong rig gsal bas// rgyu rkyen ma byas mtha' bral ba'i// rang bzhin chos kyi sku nyid do// kun gzhi sems btun
517b2(rgyud 'grel): tshul bzhin du// chos sku snang ba'i byin rlabs rol// rdor sogs rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor du// sangs ma rgyas po med pa ni// rang bzhin stug po bkod pa'o// rkyen lam rnal 'byor rnam gnyis kyis// mngon byas lhun grub rnal 'byor ni/ byin
517b3(rgyud 'grel): brlabs ya mtshan bsam yas kyang // rnal 'byor gsal ba mnyam par 'dod// rnal 'byor gsum po rims snang ba// gcig dang du mur smra ba ni// rang rig nyi ma'i snying po nyid// dngos gnyis las sogs byed pa'i phyir/ cho 'phrul gnyis
517b4(rgyud 'grel): las mi zhan pas// dbang sgyur thabs kyis rgyal bar 'dod// chos 'phrul yul sems tshul nyid kyang // thabs dang shes rab mtshan nyid de// phur sogs yab yum dkyil 'khor ni// rgyun min rang bzhin snang ba nyid // gnyis med byang
517b5(rgyud 'grel): sems ngo bo las// 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid ngang gis med// sman gyi rgyal po ma ki tas// gang la reg pa sman du 'gyur// dbang sgyur man ngag la gnas pas// dug sogs byang chub lam du 'gyur// thabs kyis dbang sgyur ma mchags
517b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thogs med shes rab spyan snang bas// rnam gsum ting 'dzin rims bsgoms yang // dbang sgyur sems kyis cho 'phrul lis// rgyu 'bras rim pa med par 'dod// rjes la thob 'jug rnal 'byor gzhung // ma skyes ring rig ye she
518a1(rgyud 'grel): ni rtsal rdzogs rol pa rang snang bas// grangs mdog ma des sku gsung thugs// rang snang phyag rgya bsam mi khyab// kun bzangs ril phyir blang ngor med// gang yang sems la gzhan min pas// rang bzhin
518a2(rgyud 'grel): cir yang ma skyes phyir// rtogs pa'i sgra bsam yul bral ba// kun gzhi bzang mo'i mnga' klong las// cir yang snang ba yum gyi dbyings// rang snang rol pa bsam yas kyang // b+ha ga'i klong las g.yos med de// 'du 'bral med pa'i bde chen
518a3(rgyud 'grel): bo/ sangs mi rgyas pa cig med pa'o// mang nyung grungs kyi lha rnams kyang // chu la nya ljang tshul snang bzhin// 'od kyis ting 'dzin shugs kyis 'gro/ gang zhig 'di las gnas gyur na// dam tshig spyod sogs gtsor ma gsungs// rang
518a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nyid mthun rang bzhin rdzogs// de phyir lha sogs khyad par 'phags// rnal 'byor ming gsum gzhung nyid de// dngos po de nyid ji lta ba// de bzhin ma log mngon byed pa// spyi men rang gi mtshan nyid du// rang rig mngon sum
518a5(rgyud 'grel): gsal dus na// rang snang mtha' bral rgyun las grol// ye shes nam mkha' dbus mtha' med// de bzhin nyid gshegs yang dag rdzogs// tha snyad gnyis kyi chos rnamaso ril// mnyam rdzogs bdag nyid chen po'i brgyan//
518a6(rgyud 'grel): las yon lhun grub byed dang bral// dngos de nyid kyang mdor bstan na// chos sems ye nas gnyis su med// thams cad ma 'dres yongs rdzogs pa// cir snang ci yang ma yin te// btsam bzhi byas dngos lhar 'dod pa'i// dngos
518b1(rgyud 'grel): po rnam drug la sogs pa// gang yang min phyir nges smyig ldan// yulo phrul gnyis med rang mi dmigs// kun bzang nyid kyis bstan dka' la// byed po chos can skad cig dang // sgyu snang rtogs pa'i rigs snang dang // brlabs dang
518b2(rgyud 'grel): cho 'phrul rtsal snang ba/ 'di la gdod nas yod ma yin// rig pa bzhi snang brlabs sogs pa// bltas pa tsam ste bye brag med// rgyu nyid rdo rje rkyen de bzhin// des na skye med 'gag sogs stong // bdag las gzhan pa mi snang zhing //
518b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag kyang 'di 'dri mi dmigs pas// snang med stong pa chen por gsungs// gnyis bsdus rjod snang thams cad kun// mi 'gog sems la gzhal med pas// 'dogs snang brtags par rung ma yin/ rnam pa kun ldan stong chen po
518b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas pas kyang sngar sangs rgyas// snang gsum grags pa'i chos rnams kun// 'di las brtags nas brtags snang phyir// thams cad kun snang gzhi rtsar bshad// gang la'ang gdod nas yod min pas// brtags
518b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams khyi tshul gsungs// dus gsum chos kun gcig khyad med // sngon med phyis med gdod nas byung // thams cad sems gsal de bzhin nyid// ma byas rgyun min phyogs med gsal// ye shes ming bzhi'i rang bzhin nyid// /
518b6(rgyud 'grel): mtha' bral bsam pa'i yul 'das pas// thig le chen po gcig tu nyid// be drug rgyun las yi nas grol// don dam nor bdun gzhan 'dod pa'ang // gdul byi'i ngo bo 'dod pa min// gang yang dam par mi lta na// ci bsam
519a1(rgyud 'grel): skyon med bya lam dang // rgyu shes slu ba med pa bzhin// 'di la go las yong ma yin// mnyam rdzogs bdag nyid chen po'i phyir// bden pa gnyis kyi snad las 'das// bzhi gnyis spros bral chos kyi dbying
519a2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gyis stong de bzhin nyid// gdod nas skye ba med pa'i dang // rigs bzhis nges pa don dam dngos// bu med mi gnas nges par 'dod// de nyid rang rig kho na'i phyir// stong nyid ye shes ngo bo las// b+hin+da brlabs snang
519a3(rgyud 'grel): ba bzhir gyur pas// yid bzhin nor ltar rims sbyang ba// rjes thob la stsogs theg pa'i gzhung // bden gnyis mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings// dngos kun ma bcos sems gsal bA// ma nor ma bcos de bzhin nyid// 'bras
519a4(rgyud 'grel): bu lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang // shes bya khyud 'gyur don dam gsum// de sogs bltos brtags brjod bral ba'o// ming bzhi sogs mtshon shes bya nyid// ye nas yin zhes ye shes kyang // gnas 'gyur lam dang 'bras
519a5(rgyud 'grel): skub su// rgyu yis gnyis dang bzhir 'dod pa// yul phyir rgyu 'thun skabs cig mA'o// rna la sogs stong nyid ye shes dang // don shes skabs kyi ye shes bzhis// don drangs kyis kyang khyad par 'gyur// kun ye rang
519a6(rgyud 'grel): rig shes gsal ba// cis kyang ma bsgribs nges pa'i tshig/ rang byung rang rig dbyings mi gnas// skabs ming bzhi phyir gcig med la// chos kun ma 'dres bdag gsal phyir// yaMs rnam grangs bsam mi khyab//
519b1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi 'ang // ye shes yul med cing mi shes// ma lus bdag la gsal rtog med pa// ye shes ming gnyis dngos gcig pa'o// // gang gis don 'di mthong gyur na// de bzhin
519b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid gshegs kho na'i phyir// ji bzhin pa'i dngos de bzhin// rtogs gnyis grol ba'i ye shes sku// ngo bo nyid rtag brjod las 'das// brtags sogs bAd+ya ka'i chos kun yang // sems phyir yod min ma dmigs
519b3(rgyud 'grel): bas// blang ngor byed dang don gyis bral// 'du shes rang bzhin ye shes kyang // 'du shes thams cad 'byung mi 'gyur// rang 'byung ye shes mngon byas pa'i// nyi ma bye ba 'od brdal yang // dus dang rnam pa thams cad
519b4(rgyud 'grel): du/ sangs rgyas par bya byed med pa'i// chos ni rdul tsam yong min pas// sangs rgyas med pa'i tshe rabs gsungs// bskal pa'i grangs dang tshe rabs su// dman pa'i blang dor ci byas dang // 'bring gi sku dmigs pa
519b5(rgyud 'grel): gril thob kyang // don 'di nyams su ma myong na// brtags pa nyid las ma gtogs par// spangs thob ngo bo gdod nas med// dngos drug dmigs dang gzhan don gyi// 'du shes rgyun dang byi las grol// bdag gi mu mtha' yas
519b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas// ji bzhin der gyur kun bdog rdzogs// de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag rdzogs// de sogs tha snyad tsam du zar// dman 'bras sku dang ye shes mchog/ dngos nyid shin tu rnam dag dang / gnyen med don bzhin
520a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par shes// ming gsum ldan pa'i 'di mchog gi gzhung // tshogs brgyad la sogs chos kun dang // dngos cig gsal bas tha dad pa// dngos med ye shes sna tshogs can// dngos nyid chos kun bral min//
520a2(rgyud 'grel): don 'di rnal 'byor mngon sum mo// mchog gis rang rig mngon sum du// rang grol gsal thob gnyis las 'das// ngo bo bsam rdzogs ril dang bral// sangs rgyas kyis kyang bstan dka' ba// dman don gzhung gis ka la rdzogs/
520a3(rgyud 'grel): de'i rjes 'jug tshong dag kyang // dngos de nyid la rnam med kyang // rang bzhin las kyi rtsa la rim pas// bcos phyogs sbyangs rgyud thabs rtsal gyis// mI bzlog rim pa sngon bya'i phyir// gtan tshigs bzhis sogs rims bkod
520a4(rgyud 'grel): pas// dngos de nyid shes kun smra ba yang // brtsal bral bya med don ma rigs// rjes sogs ltos ltas kho nar snang // rtse mchog gzhung gi tshad gsum nyid// bzhi sogs so so'i tshad ma yis// dngos de nyid sogs gang de nyid//
520a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas min tshwad dang de ru mtha'// spangs pa'i rang rig gang yin pa// khyu mchog mdo ris lta bu'i tshad// de phyir lam kun mkhas spyod yul// na mkha' rmad sogs rjes mthun par// myong bya'i nyams bsgyur mi 'gal rigs// tshig
520a6(rgyud 'grel): spangs yis ches tshad mar gsungs// ma lus sems phyir snang mi 'dzin// ci yang min phyir cir mi gnas// thams cad bdag phyir thob spangs med// bdag gzhan don bral cang mo 'gog/ lta sgom 'bris bcas gtan tshigs
520b1(rgyud 'grel): mdo// rgyas par mad+mo bzhi me long dang // nges bdun nges zin gtan tshigs drug/ tshul gyis nges pa bcu gnyis sogs// gzhung mdo tshad mar lta bar bya'o// gzhung ngan grib ma lta ba'i long phug bzhin// mi lus ma 'dres gzhung nub rmo
520b2(rgyud 'grel): don du// la sha nu me long 'di ltas bsod nams gong // 'gro kun dngos po'i de nyid mngon byed shog/ las shan lta ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba// bzhad pa rdo rjes mdzad pa/ rdzogs so// / pad+ma'i spyan la phyag 'tshal
520b3(rgyud 'grel): nas// lta ba'i rim pa bshad par bya// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// gser gyis rdzas ltar cig la snang // rnam grangs rnam po lnga gsum gnyis// shes nas bzhag dang slang bar bya// thams cad byang chub snying po'i klong // /
520b4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i 'khyil pa'i rang bzhin la// rang gi rtog rnyog ri bos mnan// rang rgyud rkyen kyis log snang ba// skye bo pa dang mu stegs pa// drug dang rtag chad snang bar 'gyur// dmus longs tshul du skye bo bas// mtho yor mi ltar brtags snang
520b5(rgyud 'grel): dmyal ba'i rang sems me sogs snang // yi dgas sdig snyems mi gtsang sna pra/ byol seng ma 'grogs gyen phur snang // mi la mthong yul 'dri nyid snang // de bzhin lha min go mtshon snang // lha la dge sems rin chen snang // cir
520b6(rgyud 'grel): yang snang phyir mthong mi bden// skye bo rtogs pas phrogs pa yis// snang 'phrul phyi nang lta bur snang // brtags pas brda'i tha snyad shar// rkyen gyis log tshul mu stegs pa// khrid byed drug gi ston pas bslus// mdor bsdus mu stegs
521a1(rgyud 'grel): chad pa la// glo bur tsam snang mtha' med de// rtag pa byas snang dngos por 'dod// de yang rgyu med rgyur smra ba// rang bzhin rgyur 'dod dbang phyug rgyu// ngo bo nyid la rgyu sgra dang // rdul phran rgyu ru 'dod pa dang /
521a2(rgyud 'grel): byed por+m+ma ru 'dod pa log/ gzhan yang mu stag zhar byung ba// phyi rol pa dang yang dag par// gsang sngags pa dang gi sang chen po// gnyis gsum lnga rnams rgyu'i tshul// gsum gnyis 'bras bu'i tshul snang ba// bdag tu
521a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'i gzhi la lha// 'jig rten 'das pa'i lta ba'ong // ci gr-i shos lta ba las 'phags pa// nyan thos rang rgyal mdo sde dang // kri yA u pa ya ngag dang // de bzhin yo ga'i theg pa dang // ma hA yo ga'i theg pa dang // a nu ye
521a4(rgyud 'grel): ga'i theg pa dang // a tI yo ga'i theg pa'o// chos tsam lta ba'i nyan thos pa// mdo sde pa dang bye brag pa// phyi rol rdul la rtsod byed cing // shes pa skad cig snang bar 'thun// de bzhin rang rgyal theg pa pa// phyi rol bcu ge nyes
521a5(rgyud 'grel): sgyu ma tsam// rdul yang phyogs chas ma grub 'phags// shes pa skad cig rjes 'thun 'dod// mtshan nyid theg pa'i 'ang rnam pa gsum// rnam rig pa dang rnal 'byor pa// de bzhin mdo sde dbu ma'o// rnam rig phyi rol tho ya
521a6(rgyud 'grel): mi/ sa ga mo rta ltar med bzhin du// rang rig rnam shes 'khrul snang 'dod// don dam ye shes skad cig 'dod// rnal 'byor dbu ma'i kun rdzob mthun// don dam stong pa ma skyes 'dong // mdo sde kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam// yul
521b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams logs nas snang bar lha// dam par mtha' gnyis bral ba yi// dbu ma chen por 'dod pa'o// kri ya don dam chos nyid lha// kun+da rdzob rang rig yon tan lha// rigs gsum dkyil 'khor snad par lha// skyo ba'i 'khrul pa
521b2(rgyud 'grel): med par 'dongad // gnyis ka rgyud kyi 'dod pa ni// lnga spyod gong 'og rjes su 'thun// yo gas don dam rnam dag pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes su// rtogs pa'i byin brlabs lha snang ba// skye bres de ltar mthong bar 'khrul/
521b3(rgyud 'grel): ma hA yo gas don dam du// rang rig gnyis med de bzhin nyid// rtogs pa'i cho 'phrul drug sogs pa'i// lhar snang dang la 'khor ba med// a nu yo gas don dmau du// bde chen rtogs po'i reg pa'i rtsal// kun rdzob lhan
521b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor snang // de phyir skye bos rtags pas 'khrul// a ti yo gA bden gnyis bral// thams cad rang rig rang byung ba'i// ye shes mtha' gsu bral ba la// brtags pa gnyis po gdod nas med// de phyir gser
521b5(rgyud 'grel): la gser mthong ltar// ji bzhini ma nor bden mthong yin// mnyam nyid rang bzhin ma nges pas// ji ltar brtags pa de snang phyir// dngos por brtags pa yod min de// yod na kun lnga mthun snang rigs// de phyir
521b6(rgyud 'grel): rang sems so sor snang // brtags pa cig yul cig med pas// 'khrul pa snang bar the chom med// des na gzhan dbang gi dong nas med// rtog sems 'gro ba so so sems// gcig ni dge sdig rnami smin te/ ma spya kun
522a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis myong bar rigs// de min yang drag don mi rung // rnam smin thun mong ma gyur phyir// cig min de nyid ma skyes pas// pha dang du yang mi rung ste// gcig dang tha dad las grol ba'o// dngos po sna tshugs brtan/
522a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ ming las grub pa'i gtan tshigs med// de phyir mtshan nyid ci yang med// ma grub pa las yod rtogs pa// sgyu ma'i skyes bu shes gyur gyi// rgyal ba nyid kyis mi mkhyen no// snang ba spyod yul ma grub phyir// dmigs pa'i shes pa
522a3(rgyud 'grel): yod mi rung // spyod yul ma skyes ye shes phyir// bsgom bya'i chos nyid gud na med// sems kyi ye shes mtha' bral phyir// bsgom pa po yang ga la yod// de ltar bsgom mkhan dngos med no// mi gnas ma rtog 'jug pa su// nam mkha'
522a4(rgyud 'grel): lta bu rang gsal ba'i// rang sems yo gau de lta'o// ci yang yid la mi byed na// yang dag don la phebs pa'i rigs// lus ngag ma skyes gzhi med phyir// skyil krung slu cang kha na meng // de bzhin sems kyang dngos bral bas// rtog spangs
522a5(rgyud 'grel): sgom par khar mi 'ong // de ltar rtogs pa'i sgom pa po// yal bar 'dug pa nam yang med// ci phyir bdag nyid de phyir te// rang reg dbyings la mo g.yos pa med// rnyog pa'i mtshan ma bzang dan+ta dang / ci skyes dgag par mi bya zhing // de
522a6(rgyud 'grel): don dran pas bral ba'ang yin// rang byung rang bzhin ngas smra'o// deper ni rkun mo tshor ma thag/ mo sbrang bros bzhir sdong gis zhi// lta po'i shugs las 'byung ba'i phyir/ chad du tshor ba rten mi dgos// de mi blo'i skad cig tu// rnam
522b1(rgyud 'grel): rtog rang gi de nyid lha// byis pa'i shes pa ldang mi nus// rmugs pas don nyid mi gsal pa'o// bying rmugs rab tu bying rmugs dang // shin tu bying dbang du mi btang // de bzhin rgod pa'ang rnam gsum// le lo snyoms las sman la sbyor// dog
522b2(rgyud 'grel): pas gol ba lhung ba gnyis// re brtags dang 'bras bu'o// 'khrul pa 'jug tu mi btub dang // lus kyi bya byed skyed la dga'// ngag gi tsa tse smra la dga'// yang dag don la ring ba'i phyir// bya byed grong yul gtam mi glan// skyon dang tshe
522b3(rgyud 'grel): ga'i las mi bya// dge ba las kyang g.yeng 'gyur de// sdig las mi bya smos ci dges// nyams dang g.yo dang goms pa dang // brtan pa'i nyams dang sbyar bar bya// don du 'di nyams bstan du med// de rtogs yang dag nyams dang /
522b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan// de tshe phyi nang gsang ba'i drod// phyi nang rtags kyang rim par 'byung // skyes kyang dga' brong sems ma s+yAng+ga// med kyang de la mi dga' med// de dag g.yo dang thob brtan na// rIm 'byung gsangs na dngos grub myur// klungs gsu
522b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i skyes mchog la// seng ge lta bu 'jigs tshogs bral// zos da nga ner gnyen ma chags shing // snying rje chen po ma bral na// chos nyid dang yang 'phrad pa'i rtags// ci spyod don las ma nyams na/ goms paste lngas su
522b6(rgyud 'grel): rung ba'i rtogs// 'di ldan dbang po phyed pa tsums mod// snang ba gang yang mi skyo zhing // yid la bya ba med phyir ro// lus kyis rim par bzod thob dang // chos brgyad spong len med pa dang // gang la yang nyon mongs mi skye na//
523a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di yang sa la bgrod pa'i brtags// yid la byed med dgag sdang med// 'du shes ma bzung rang gsal la// gang yang nyams su mi len cing // sems kyis mngon par ma phyogs shing // dmigs
523a2(rgyud 'grel): med tshul du rang snang ba// ba skad tsam du skem zhes brjod // yang dag don gyi sdeng med par// tshig tsam lha la khungs phyung zhing // bya med chos la blo gtad nas// rtsing chos phaT ral sbyong byed pa// rgyal ba'i dkas kyang mi
523a3(rgyud 'grel): skyob ste// dmyal ba'i 'bras bu the tshom med// rtogs pa'i mtshon rtogs brkyang ldan na// skyes bu de ni rgyal ba'i sras// steng mdo lta ba mthong 'dod pas// rang gis nga rgyal snyems byed pa// ri bos srog chags gnan pa
523a4(rgyud 'grel): lhor// nan yang thar pa'i khar mi 'byung // gsang sngags pa'i sgor zhugs nas// / yang dag don la mi 'dud par// mi ches zang zing las byed cing // rang dbang yod bzhin dbang med ces// smra zhing gsang don yal
523a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jog pa// phyi ma gar 'gro rtol med par+ya// gal mIng le lo las byed pa// e ma rang 'joms dpa' bo do// rgya mtsho 'dzings kyi phya 'od lhor// thugs rje zhags pa'i spyang thag yan// rang gis rang slus snying re
523a6(rgyud 'grel): rje/ le lo can la thar lam med// lta ba'i rim pa yi man ngag/ dka' ba dpal brtsegs kyis mdzad pa// snang ba bcu bdun rdzogs so// / dpal kun tu bzang po'i sems kyi rang bzhin
523b1(rgyud 'grel): gang yin pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu 'bras lus kyi rjes 'brang rig pa yis// gang zag blo dman rnams kyi don phyir du// rin chen g.yu ltar dgongs mdzes kun khyab don// theg dgu'i lha rim khas kyi gdang lta bu//
523b2(rgyud 'grel): kun bzang dgengs don rdo rje sems la stan// na gardzu ni bdag blo mun par shar// 'jam dpal bshes gnyen kun dga' la sogs pa// phyi rabs rdo rje 'chang gral 'byung ba'i mi// saM gser lta bur mi 'gyur brtan
523b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i blo// dad ldan rgyal ba'i thugs dang 'dra rnams khye // skal ldan dbang phyug rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob pa// dad can rnams kyi btsas su bzhag pa yin// shin tu rnal 'byor mchom gri mchog/ 'phags pa las
523b4(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'phags pa'i don// gser gling rin chen lta bu'i mchog/ 'di la sgrib byed chu 'byung dang // chu srina? nya ming lta bu'i dgra/ 'jig rten 'das pa'i rgyur zhugs pa'i// theg pa che chung rim dang // yo ga bzhi sogs
523b5(rgyud 'grel): gol sgrib rnams// so so'i khyad par rtogs chud nas// mi gnas mi sbyong theg pa'i mchog/ lhun po nga zhen 'phags rtswa rgya la nyid// che ba rtag phyir khyad par dbyi// sprul pa'i gsungs rab rgyu yid don// 'dul dbang blo
523b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin grags pa dag/ bsdu bo che chung gnyis bcos so// chung bsdus nyan thos nga rgyal te/ nyani thos 'dod pas gnyis su 'gyur// mdo sde po dang bye drag po'o// rang gi shes rab lta ba'i dngos// sbyor na yang
524a1(rgyud 'grel): dag lta ba nyid// mi rtog sdug bsngal stong bdag med// mi rtag la sogs dngos su 'dzin// kun rdzob bye brag 'dod gzhung nyid// snod kyis rdzas rnams dngos po 'di// rdul phran sil bu phan tshun
524a2(rgyud 'grel): pas// ma 'dres ne sing lta bu ste// mthu yi stobs kyis 'dus par 'dod// don dam shes pa skad cig ma// re rer yod par 'dod pa'o// mdo sde kun rdzogs phra ra ba rnams// 'dus pa'i rnam pa gcig tu 'dong // dron
524a3(rgyud 'grel): dam shes pa gcig par 'dod// spyod pa rang don 'ba' zhig pa'i// de la dbu mas bskyon brjod pa// yul sems dngos su 'dzin bcas pas// dngos ltar 'jog pa'i nyan thos khyod// 'khor ba 'di las mi 'das
524a4(rgyud 'grel): pas// 'bras bu'i skyon du 'gyur ba nyid// bka'i bden pa rnam bzhi las// dngos por 'dzin pas bka' don 'gal// 'jig rten dngos 'dzin rgyu 'di las// mya ngan las 'das pa thob 'dod pa// las dang 'bras bu 'gal
524a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir// khyod kyi 'dod pa bden pa min// rang rgyal nyan thos don dam 'dra// kun rdzob snang ba'i khyad par ni// gzugs kyis bsdus pa'i chos rnams kun// rten 'brel rgyu rkyen dbang sgyur na/ rmi lam tshul de
524a6(rgyud 'grel): logs na med// de ni kun rdzob khyad par 'phags// spyod pa lus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis// gzhan don shes 'ga' la'ang spyod pa'o// dbu ma'i theg pa bstan pa ni// yul rnams rmi lam ma grub na// de dang 'dra ba'i shes
524b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'ang rdzun gyi yul nyid la// don dam bden pa'i shes pa nyid// skye zhing dmigs par rigs pa min// des na rgyu 'bras 'khrul 'khor te// rgyu 'bras mi mthun 'gal ba yod// rdzun rgyus yang dag 'bras mi thog/ de phyir
524b2(rgyud 'grel): phan tshun spangs te 'gal// bsdu ba theg pa chen po la// theg pa phyi nong rnam pa gnyis// phyi pa rnam par rig pa pa// kun kyang rang rig yul med 'dod// de yang rnam bcas rnam med gnyis// rnam bcas dbyig gnyen thog med/
524b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhung // yul ltar snang ba 'di dag kun// rab rib sku mthong rmi gzugs 'dra// shes pa 'khrul pa'i gzugs brnyan phyir// de yang de'i ngo bor 'dod // rnam med shan ta rak+Shi ta// rjes 'brang zhes pa'i 'dod pa ste//
524b4(rgyud 'grel): rang rig gnyis med shel ltar dag/ de nyid dam par yod par smra// chos skyeng 'khor bcas 'dod pa ni// gzugs brnyan gzugs la sogs pa'i yul// gang ltar snang ying sgo lnga yi// mi rtog shes pa rnam pa lnga// /
524b5(rgyud 'grel): rjes 'jug ngo bo 'brel par 'dod// brtags pa'i 'khor ba'i chos rnams ni// yod de shes pa ngan rgyu bsog/ da lhur bsgrub pa byed pa po// de la nang bas skyon brjod pa// rang sems gnyis med shel lta bu// dag
524b6(rgyud 'grel): par lta bas dngos bcas skyon// yul rnams 'khrul snang rdzun rgyu dang // shes pa rang rigs don dam nyid// ngo bo gcig par 'dod pa ni// phan tshun spangs te 'ogal bar 'gyur// de min yul brdzun shes pa'ang rdzur//
525a1(rgyud 'grel): mdo de dbu mar brjod pa ni// yul rdzun phyir na shes pa rdzun// ngo bo gcig phyir de ltar 'gyur// rang rig gnyis med don dam min// skad cig rgyun tu yod phyir ro// gal te kun rdzob
525a2(rgyud 'grel): tsam du 'ang // yul sems gnyis su meng 'gyur na// tha snyad chad par 'gyur ba ste/ gzugs sgyu yin mi no la// sogs pa// nam du shes par mI 'gyur ro// nang pa rnal 'byor dbu ma ni// kun rdzob rdzun pa tsam du
525a3(rgyud 'grel): yang // yul sems gnyis med yul snang sems// kun rdzob rnam rIg ji lta bu'o// don ngam ma skyes stong par lha// de la mdo sdes rgal ba'i tshig/ kun rdzob rdzun pas mi 'gal la// don dam shes pa yod
525a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod na// yul rnams rdzun bzhin shes pa'ang rdzun// rang sems gnyis med don dam na// 'bras bu la'ang dgos med 'gyur// yul la snang du rung mi 'gyur// lam gyi stegs su 'ang mi 'gyur dang ka 'bras
525a5(rgyud 'grel): bu grub par mi 'gyur ro// brtags bya rang rig don dam de// gal te rgyu las ma byung ba'o// rang rig gnyis med dag pa 'am// rgyu la rten nam rang byung ba'o// glo bur ba rA raM mya rang byung ba'i// de dag de bzhin rig
525a6(rgyud 'grel): pa med // mdo sde dbu mas kun rdzob tu// yul sems rdzun pa sgyu ma tsam// snang ba'i yul sems so sor 'dod// dam pa'i don du gnyis su med// dbu ma phyi mo pa rnams ni// don dam gtso bo mi dmigs lta//
525b1(rgyud 'grel): kun rdzob mad+mo ste rnal 'byor gnyis// glang wA rung skye spyong spyi phyed // de gun byung chub spyod pa'i mchog/ rgyu cher gzhan don rdzogs par byed// gzhan la dmigs pa'i mtshan mo'i tshul// sbyar ba sdu bu'i bdag don 'byung
525b2(rgyud 'grel): de la sngags kyi kro ya bas// brtsad pa khyed kyi bden pa gnyis// so so rI lci po bden mod de// rgyal ba'i ye shes gnyis mang la// ri mos snang ba'i rgyus mi 'grub// de phyir rgyu 'bras 'khrul te 'gal// gal te kun rdzob skye
525b3(rgyud 'grel): ma nyid// don dam bden dang tha dad na// don dam bden par cig mi rung // cig la snga phyi snang mi rigs// shes pa gnyis kyis yul 'gyur bas// snga phyi re mos 'gyur snang phyir// lhan cig mi snang skyon du 'gyur// gal te
525b4(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo cig min na// phan tshun spangs te 'gal 'gyur zhing // bsod nams dang ni 'brel med de// des na sangs rgyas sku mi 'grub// thams cad don dam 'ba' zhig ni// tha snyad chad par 'gyur ba ste// sgyu ma tsam
525b5(rgyud 'grel): du'ang snang mi rigs// 'bras bu nyid la'ang tshogs mi 'byung // lam gyi chos su'ang mi rung ste// bdag gzhan don kyang 'gag par 'gyur// gal te bden gnyis dbyer med na// rang gi tshig rtsa la mi 'gal snang // kun
525b6(rgyud 'grel): rdzob bden par cig ca na// don dam mtshan mar snang mi rung // de min don dam dang bsgoms nas// rjes la sgyu ma snang zhe na// don ngam mtshan ma'i sa bon tsam// rigs pa ma yin gzhan yin na// kun rdzob rang
526a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin can 'dod na// sgyu ma tsam du'ang mi rung 'gyur// de bas dmigs pa'i shes pa'ang // cig la phyed phyed bden rdzun 'gyur// khyed kyang bya byed med 'dod ces// bsod nams ci nus spyod byed 'khrul//
526a2(rgyud 'grel): des na nga dung shed ma bye// byis pa gtso mchog khyed rnams kyis// gsang ba nga la reg mi nus// de phyir khro bo ye shes sku// don dam dang nyid snang bar 'dod// snang ba'i don dam dbyer med pa// mtha' yas ma bsgoms ches
526a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid drag/ grub pa bya phyir rjes 'thun spyong // de la rgyu 'bras 'khrul mi 'byung // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bka' lung rgyud// yo ga phyi pa rim pa gsum// bya byed rgyud dang rnam pa gsum// gdul bya'i shes rab dbang
526a4(rgyud 'grel): pos phye// de dag lha spyod khyad par 'gyur// bya byed kr-i yaM'i don dam du// kun kyang dag pa'i chos nyid la// mtha'i dri ma yai nas med// kun rdzob rang bzhin rigs gsum sku// kun kyang dag phyir dug gsum gsum// lha'i
526a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor yin par 'dod// ma grub tshul nas 'jig rten chos// mthun par bya phyir rje khol lta// dam tshig cho gas rdzogs byas nas// bshags dang mchod stong drug ldan pa'i// bzlas pas sdig sgribs dag
526a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems// chu dang lta bur grub shar ba// lha mchog rgyu phyir lhas rtsa la smra// khrus dang spyod pa'i gtsang sbra spang // 'di la yo gas rtsad pa'i don// kun rdzob lha dang rje khol ni// chos nyid dang la bzang ngan 'gyur//
526b1(rgyud 'grel): kun rdzob don dam pa dang na// lha yang ye shes sku min te// bsgoms pas 'bras bu snang mI rigs// don+da dam ngag rtogs kun rdzob tu// khrus dang gtsang sbra ci zhig sbyang // gal te bden pa re mos na// gsung ba'i don du'ang mi rung la
526b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyu 'bras mi mthun 'gal ba 'byung // ma grub cha yis khrus byed ces// lha spyod ya cha bdud kyi las// gnyis ka rgyud kyi 'dod pa ni// spyod pa bya ba'i rjes 'thun par// lta bas rnal 'byor rjes 'jug phyir// rigs dang lta bas
526b3(rgyud 'grel): khyad par 'gyur// 'di la yang yo gas bcas pa'i tshigau/ spyod pa gol bas lta ba gol// lha spyod ya cha bdud du 'gyur// de min rigs la nges med pas// grub pa'i 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor phyi ma'i 'dod
526b4(rgyud 'grel): ba ni// rang rigs dngos stong mtshan ma gnyis// dbyer med dbyings dang ye shes sa// byin rlabs rdo rje dbyings kyi si// shar lha grogs po'i tshul du mtshang// ma grub tshul gnas 'jig rten dag/ grogs la brten
526b5(rgyud 'grel): nas nor 'tshol mtshungs// spyod pa ting 'dzin gtso byed pa'o// 'di la nang pas skyon brjod pa// gnyis mdo rnam dag ye shes la// rgyud nas bskur snang bden zhe na// rgyu'i ye shes skad cig 'gyur// de min 'byung
526b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jug cha yis na// bden pa res 'jog skyon 'gyur bas// ye shes sku ru mi rung ste// lhan cig mi gnas 'gal bar 'gyur// grogs po'i tshul du lha byed pas// tha dad bdag tu tha dad de// 'brel ba med pas mi
527a1(rgyud 'grel): 'grub dang // des na don nyid la yang skyon// gnyis pa yod 'gyur cig ce na// rang la grogs su ltar mi rigs// des na bdag nyid chen po'i don// rang gi shes pa mthong ba min// ting nge 'dzin
527a2(rgyud 'grel): rtsor spyod dngos po mtha'// ji snyed bral ba'i theg chen med// de min rgyal ba nyid du 'gyur// dam rdzas 'dod yon sman pa rnams// chu yi mtshon bzhin spyod mi nus// de phyir gnyis med don la skyon// yang na shes pa
527a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis 'gyur bas// cig la rgyud gnyis ldang mi srid// des na khyod kyi lha spyod rdzun// lhun grub bka' lung skyed rdzogs gsum// thog mer bstan pa'ang rnal 'byor che// lus kyi dngos po gnyis sdus rnams// rang
527a4(rgyud 'grel): rig nyid phyir snang ba kun// yi nas ye shes sku gsal ba// dkyil 'khor gnyis drug la sogs shing // snang ba nyid nas rang bzhin med// des na mtha'i skyon dang bral/ snang stong bral ba'i de bzhin nyid// dang
527a5(rgyud 'grel): las rig pa'i lhar bskyed pas// tha mal rtog tshogs ma sbyangs dag/ gser 'gyur mun snang ji bzhin bya'o// cir snang rang gi rig pa'i phyir// lha dang lto ba yongs kyis mid// ting 'dzin ye shes bsgyur shar
527a6(rgyud 'grel): bas/ sus kyang ma byas byed med de// ngo bo gzhan nas 'ongs pa'ang med// des na bdagi nyid chen por lta// spyod pa bzang ngan gtsang sme sogs// gang la chags sdang blang dor med// bde myong mi 'gog/
527b1(rgyud 'grel): mi 'dzin phyir// tsho gas gnyis rgyun tu tshogs par byed// de la'ang rjes su rnal 'byor pa// skyon brjod khyod kyi lta ba'i don// mnyam nyid snang stong dbyer med dag/ yin na rig pas bskyes mi dgos// ye shes sku ya
527b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dus byas 'gyur// gal te bdag gis bskyed pos nA// snga bar bdag nyid ma grub pa ma// de min thug pa med par 'gyur// yang na bdag nyid dkyil 'khor nyid// tha dang ya nas 'bro la med pas// skyed du 'ang mi
527b3(rgyud 'grel): btub 'grub mi 'gyur// spyod pa blang dor med ce na// de nyid gtsor spyod blang ngor nyid// rnal 'byor mchog gi brjod pa ni// mnyam nyid bdag nyid chen po ni// rang la rang gis sgom cing dgos// bdag gis bdag la 'ang
527b4(rgyud 'grel): dmigs rung na// mdzub mo rang la reg par rigs// tha dang rang gi tshig gis 'gal// gal te mi sgom bya med na// rnam gsum rim pas smos ci dgos// thams cad bdag la ma'i skus// gzer la gzer bzhin 'byung mi rigs/
527b5(rgyud 'grel): yul med don la gtsor len pa// de nyid dmigs lha rtsa ba'i don// khyod kyang gal te lhun grub na// spyod dang 'phrin las dang len 'khrul// bya ba med pas sbyong ngo zhes// de nyid ched spyod thabs rten 'khrul// snang stong ye nas
527b6(rgyud 'grel): ngag 'a dong na// bsgrib pa gnas 'gyur dri ma'i tshul// blang ngor med pa'i spyod byed na// de nyid dang len snyoms sam ci// kun kyang rang rigs sems yin na// dbugs phyin dkyil 'khor skyes ci dgos// las bzhin
528a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro don rtsal ba yis// lhun grub mdzad pa ga la mthong // gu 'jo'i spyod dang ma bral phyir// rtsol ba'i chu bor bying ba yi// rjes 'jug rnal 'byor 'dod pa yi// snang srid bzang mo'i mkha' gleng lnga//
528a2(rgyud 'grel): ma skyes dkyil 'khor kun bzang shar// shar ba nyid na shar ba med// yab yum sras bcas bde chen po// lhun rje gos sa la skad cig gis// snying po dran brjod skur shor ba'o// 'di la rim pa'i rtsol ba med// rgya mtshor nyi
528a3(rgyud 'grel): zla shor ba 'dra// don gnyis ma rtsu la rdzogs par byed// spyod pa blang ngor med par spyod// de ltar ma nus nyams mi lA// de lta gong mas skyon brjod pa// thams cad bde ba chen po la// ma 'dres yongs su rdzogaso 'dod na// /
528a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma'i skye bskyed snyoms mas ci// khye'u bzhi rtog 'byung mi 'gal lam// mtshan mas 'gro don rdzogs 'dod nor// yab yum 'byed dang khwa degra grangs// rtsol pa drade chen don de 'gal// de phyir bya bral mthong ba med//
528a5(rgyud 'grel): gal te ma grub pos byed na// rgyu 'bras 'khrul te 'gal bar 'gyur// don gnyis ma brtsa la rdzogs shes na// skad cig dkyil 'khor bskyed ci bya// rang gi cing ba'i slongs pa khyod// bya byed don lo btang snyoms byed//
528a6(rgyud 'grel): de nyid rtsol ba ma yin nam// sbyo nga yul bral la dmigs par byed// de nyid yul dang yul can mod// bsam med rang la gsal bar 'dod // de nyid bsam spyod gtogs pa'i bzhi// bsgrub med ngang la don du gnyer// de
528b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid re dogs rtsa ba yin// de lha'i spyod yul bems po yin// klong chen dang la thigs mi 'gyur// de dag skabs kyis rang rang gi/ lha la zhen pas ldongs pa yin// ltung ba'i phyir nA ge la sa che// des na gol bsgrib thun mong ste// lta ba
528b2(rgyud 'grel): dmyigs kyis dbul ba dag/ ye shes nyid la bdag tu 'dzin/ rang la rang nyid yul du byed// don la don nyid rjesu 'breng // ye shes nyid la gsal bar 'dod// bdag la bdag nyid spyod mtha' 'chol// zin pa'i don la bsgrub par
528b3(rgyud 'grel): byong // byA bral nyid kyi bya ba med// bskyod med lam la bskyod par byed// mi dmigs pa la dmigs par byed// kye ma'o thugs rje'i gnas su rung // deng sang dus kyi gang zag rnams// ma rig ling tog ma sol bas// lto ba'i la
528b4(rgyud 'grel): shan ma phyed cing // lta ba'i mche ba ma mthong bas rgyud lung man ngag goms pa yis// rmangs dang rje dang rgyal 'dra la// kun rdzob mi mnyam don dam mnyam// de skad smra ba'i dmus long dag/ khrel 'bru mthu ba sa gzhi che// ma mthong
528b5(rgyud 'grel): tshul dang mtshungs pa'o// mig lta brtan pa'i 'di dag gi/ bza' bral dang las gnas mi 'gyur// de nas bskal ldan skyes mchog bu// ma bgrod sa la gnas bya'i phyir// rdzogs chen nga'i don la ltos// yod med stong pa'i mtha'
528b6(rgyud 'grel): la thud// kun gyi sku mchog ye shes zhal// 'dongs pas rmongs 'khrul dug gsum gyi// snying khrag 'thung zhing kun gzhi nyid// gtan nas phung byed nga la thud// zad pa'i dus na bskal pa'i me 'bar ba// mi zad 'jigs
529a1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs mnga' ba nga la 'dud// bskul pa'i chu chen rab tu 'khrugs pa 'bum// 'jigs byed des kyang ljags kyi mtha' ma sbubs// lug mtsho mtha' med bskams la phyag 'tshal 'dud// thor rlungs drag
529a2(rgyud 'grel): pos 'jig rten kun g.yeng ba// des kyang nga'i ba spu'i cha tsam bskyod mi nus// zil gnon sku tshad mnga' ba nga la thung// g.yo dang mi g.yo thams cad kun gsol ba'i// 'jigs byed pa lta bu la ji skad bya// sangs rgyas thams
529a3(rgyud 'grel): cad gsol bas nga ma zhos// byang chub sems dpa' gsol pos kha byugs tsam// da rung 'gro kun gsol byed sgribs shing skems pas nga la thung // 'on kyang ma sgrong rdzogs pa nyi du 'gyur/ lhag pa'i rnal 'byor lugs nyid
529a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ bslab pa med pa'i bslab pa nyid// bslabs rnams 'jigs byed bslab pa'i mchog/ dngos po spyod cig mtha' mi tshol// don la mngon du 'dod pa med// gza' bral dang la gza' mi byed// bya med don la de nyid kyang // che du lan
529a5(rgyud 'grel): cing rtsol ba med// rang sems ci la'ang 'brang ba dang // 'dod pa'i sems dang ye nas bral// de nyid las ni 'gyur ba meng // thig la chen po rgyal ba'i thugs// brtags na med la bsams na snang // dngos med cha lugs kun
529a6(rgyud 'grel): la stom// rang bzhin cig tu ma nges pas// rdzas kyi rnam pa cig tu'ang // logs mthong drug dang yang dag dag/ cir yang snang ba'i ngo bo nyid// rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin can// 'di 'dra rgyal bar brjod du med// gal te brjod
529b1(rgyud 'grel): kyang thebs mi 'gyur// sna tshogs snang ba pa'i sku// ji skad grags pa nga'i gsung // dran rtog rag shas de'i thugs// sna tshogs snang la ngo bo med// che bu lnga yis ye nas 'phags// thig le drug dang rang bzhin ldan// khams
529b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum bde sdug nga la rdzogs// de la bde sdug deng gi bral// dus gsum rgyal bar nga nyid shar// de la byung shar gdong nas med // gza' ltas med pa'i rta mchog la// de nyid du yang lta ba med// gal te gded nas dmigs
529b3(rgyud 'grel): lta med// thams cad mkhyen pa sgoms pa'i mchog/ ngo bo nyid ni dmigs su med// snang ba med pa'i chos nyid ni// ma rtsa la gzhag na bsgoms pa yin// de la gzhag par bya ba'ang med// bya byed don la yid mi rtog/ de ltar gang
529b4(rgyud 'grel): shes ting 'dzin mchog/ dmigs pa'i skyon byung 'gog mi byed// dron la gsal bas 'byung mi dgos// drod rtags snang la re ba med// thams cad bdag nyid chen po'i phyir// snod bcu do 'jig rten bde sdug bsngal// nyi zla/
529b5(rgyud 'grel): 'od gsil byed 'dod pa'i// ji srid cir snod spyod pa kun// bdag nyid chen po'i mdzad spyod pas// de nyid gsal bar spyod pa ste// de la spyod dang mi spyod med// 'gro don rgyun du mi byas rdzogs// yang dag si la ma song phyin//
529b6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs gnyis ma bsags lhan gyis rdzogs// ma bsgral stong gsum gnas su stobs// ma phul mchod pa kun la thimo/ ma blangs dngos grub rang lo shar// ma bsrungs dam tshig nyams pa med// ma nor thams cad rang
530a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang sgyur// ma ltas lta ba kun tu gsal// ma snyoms ting 'dzin yengs pa med// ma bcos rnam tog sgyu 'phrul bral// ma bsgrubs 'bras bu bdag nyid chu// ma sbyangs dus gsum 'du 'dul med//
530a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs bsgrib pa ye nas med// ma 'jing thugs rjes kun na bsgrubs// des na byas sbyin bya ba med// bya ba gang yang 'gag pa me de// de lta sus rtogs byis pa'i mchog/ bya med brtson 'grus par ched med// skyes mchos gang zhig
530a3(rgyud 'grel): 'o'adi ltar ltos// thams cad snang ba nga'i sems// theg pa mtho sman ji snyed po// nyi 'odi lta bur nga l-I snang // bskal bar dge spyang rtsol byas kyang // nga dring ma phrad sangs mi rgya// des na sdeng chen don la ltos// mthong ba nyid na chos//
530a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi sku// go ba'i yul na bde ba che// de la 'jig rten rang bzhin med// de nyid rnam dag 'jig rten yin// bdag nyid chen po donA ni nges par ston// ji bzhin byang chub snying po lnga// bsgrub bya lhun rdzogs bla med pas// nga zhes
530a5(rgyud 'grel): mang du spyad par zad// don du nga la 'di 'dra zhes// dngos bzhir bstan par nus pa med// brtan g.yo dngos por 'dzin byed cing // rtag chad gnyis kar slong zhen pas// snying po'i don la gol bar gsungs// shin tu
530a6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor chen po nyid// dngos por zhen dang gdod nas bral// 'jig rten phal par lhungs med// rtag chang gnyis la mi gnas pas// mu stegs lha la gnas pa med// stong nyid don dam ma skyes pa'i// phyogs la
530b1(rgyud 'grel): byA bral mi lta bas// mthong sbeng lta bsdu nga myi mthong // mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i sku mi bsgom// gnyis med don la gtsor mi 'dzin// skar bskyed 'gro don mi rtsom pas// yo ga phyi nang sngar mi lhung // byA med dang la bya ba'ang rdzog
530b2(rgyud 'grel): rtsol ba'i dud na gdung ba'ang med// de nyid don la bdag 'dzin na// de ltar lha bre 'di rtog pa'o// snying rje med pa'i gang zag rnams// deng song dus nu'ang 'byung ba dag/ kun bzang tshig tsam slu byed cing // sdeng med don
530b3(rgyud 'grel): dang mi ldan par// de ltar lta ba'i 'dir rtog pa'o// rgyu 'bras don la yid 'byung zhing // tshig tsam lta la rten pa dag/ sdeng mde spyod rtsing 'chol ba'i rgyus// bskal par bskal pa ci spyad kyang // snying po'i don dang 'phrad mi
530b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// des na zab mi'i spyod pa mnos// ci spyad kun bzang spyod par 'gyur// sdang chen don du gar ldan pa// rnam par dA kar spyad sdung mi bya// bsam gtan ro mchog rlung gnas kyang // 'gro ba'i b+h+ra ma spyi bos bkur//
530b5(rgyud 'grel): stong gsum sangs rgyas so shes kyang // snying rje'i don dang bral mi bya// skye shi med pa'i sdeng ldan yang // sems can sdom 'phril srog mi gcod// 'du 'bral med pa'i don sgrims kyang // 'jig rten 'phye g.yom las mi bya//
530b6(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin ma nges don shar yang // don du mi 'gyur rdzun mi bya// bdag nyid thig le'i deng gnas kyang // pha rol rdzas la bsams mi bya// khro gtum dang thung 'khrug pa'i bdud// snang ba'i yul nos bya ba med// de nyid
531a1(rgyud 'grel): la de med phyir// rjes 'jug de yang de bzhin no// de bzhin mo spyod de dag gang // rag sha yag sha'i rgyud 'dzin pas// theg chen rigs su gang chud pa// rnal 'byor chen po'i mang ci yod//
531a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas las ches spyang thag yan// bya byed rnal 'byor mchog spyod pas// spang med shes nas dkar phyogs kyang // ched du bya ba med ce na// sdig las mi bya smos ci dgos// lhun grub spyod dang bya bral spyod// thur
531a3(rgyud 'grel): rje chen po'i mdzad spyod dang // nam yang bral bar ma byed cig/ de ltararo rtogs dran spyod pa'o// gol sgrib ltung gnas g.yang sa yang // spang du med de thig le'i dbyings// lhung dang ma lhung tha skad bral// chos nyid don la
531a4(rgyud 'grel): ma bcos na// me dang dud ltar ltung sgrib 'byung // gdu dro 'du shes ma skyes pas// grol dang ma grol ma tsi yod// kun tu rgyu la 'jigs pa 'byung // phyin pa med na 'jigs dang bral// dwe na gang la dogs mi byaM// re
531a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sems spyod de bzhin te// re dogs med pa'i don ched bstan// gang dag dmigs pa dngos 'dris pa'i// ling thog gsal phyir thugs 'dra 'dis// rab rib nad bral rdzogs chen sku// mngon mthong kun gyis
531a6(rgyud 'grel): mchog thob shig/ pho dregs phyi la dang 'phung 'khrug/ bcos dka' gdung bral gdong 'das can// dad med chags bcings slu brid mkhan// sems med yal 'jog rnal 'jog byung / lci ba'i sems
531b1(rgyud 'grel): bral rang gar spyod// byil ma nor chung mtshang rdzogs po// lce mkhan thabs 'bru zol pa la// snying sbyor byung yang bstan mi bya// gA yu'i thang mA kras dgu rdzogs so// / bi mya las phan
531b2(rgyud 'grel): yul du gnya' la gtad do// I/ rgyu gar skad du// mA ya dza lin tra A der sha s+yA d+hA na/ bod skad du/ sgyu 'phrul dro byA mye long lta bu'i bsgrub thabs/ dpal kun tu bzang po l+ya phyag 'tshal lo//
531b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan gnyis med sgrib pa spangs pa yi// ye shes rang rig gsal ba'i mkha' dkyil nas// dkyil 'khor spro dang 'gro don sprul pa yi// mA lus thugs su chud la phyag 'tshal lo// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i gzhung
531b4(rgyud 'grel): lugs las// 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i phyir// ye shes skyed pa'i sgrub thabs 'di// rgyud bsdus bdag gis rtsam par bya// ma rtogs pa dang logs par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs// 'dul ba
531b5(rgyud 'grel): dgongs pa gsang ba dang // rang bzhin gsang po'i don rnams ni// yi ge sgra brtags ming tshogs la// brten pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon nas// khyong nas ga ba spras don 'byin pa// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas// zhes
531b6(rgyud 'grel): bsam bsgom la rab sbyangs pa'i// shes rab dmigs ldan rnams kyis zung // snod ldan dang tshal bzang la bstan// lus dang longs spyod stong la sbyin// slob dpon monyes par byas pa dang / sgyu 'phrul pa'i dkyil
532a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du// dam tshig rnams ni rdzogs pa yis// 'dod dang g.yeng ba kun spangs te// dka' thub spyod pas ma gdungs par// ting 'dzin pa'i mthun pa'i sa phyogs su// rab bde'i stan la
532a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dugs nas ni// byams dang snying rno dga' ba dang // btang snyoms mang pos rab sgoms nas// sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir// sku gsung thugs ni bsgrub bya zhes// bdag nyid bsam pa bstan byas te// rang nyid
532a3(rgyud 'grel): sa bon 'od zer lasau// sprul pa mchod pa'i tshogs spros nas// mdun du dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams dang // bla ma phyi sogs rnams kyis mchod// de nas sdig po bshugs pa dang // skyabs 'gro la sogs byas nas ni
532a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gegs rnams ma lus gi zhom pa'i phyir// sna tshogs rdo rje hUM las skyes// rdo rje sa gzhir bsam par bya// rnam rtog 'du shes kun spangs nas// bgegs kyi sbyor ba yod mi 'gyur// de bas rnam rtogs bgegs yin
532a5(rgyud 'grel): par// yang dag rigs pa nyid kyis gsungs// e ma ngo mtshar rmed kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang / skye ba med las thams cad skyes// skyes pa nyid na skye ba med// oM ma hA shu n+yA tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha
532a6(rgyud 'grel): ba ad ma ko haM// de ltar stong nyid rab gsal nas// snying rje yum gyis blangs nas ni// sa bon shin tu gsal bar 'gyuraro// rab tu brtan 'gyur oM kar las// shin tu phra ba'i a rnams spro// phyogs bcu gang bar
532b1(rgyud 'grel): glagras pa 'gyur ba// bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib med par bstan/ de las ming tshogs gsal 'bar kun// spro zhing bsdu ba de bzhin no// 'di ni rdo rje dngos 'grub kyi// brtan 'byung ye shes rgyu yin no// de nas mtha' dang dbus
532b2(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i// reg min chos 'byung bsam par bya// de nas yaM las byung ba yi// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// de steng yi ge ram las ni// me'i dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya// de yi steng du baM bsams te// de las chu'i
532b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ro// chu'i dkyil 'khor steng du ni// lam las ye shes sa gzhir rtags// b+h+rUM bi shwa bi shu d+hA// b+h+rU~M las ye shes gzhal yas khang // ye shes rin po che rang bzhin// rgyu rnams yongs su ma chad pa// bsod
532b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams ye shes tshogs rgyu sna pas// kun tu gru bzhir gnas par 'gyur// lhag pa'i ye shes glo 'bur mdzes// thams cad ngo bo gcig pa'i phyir// rtse mo kun tu 'dus pa yin// ye shes sku tshegs las grub pa'i//
532b5(rgyud 'grel): rin chen la sogs bye brag gi/ bsam mi khyab pas spras par 'gyur// rnam par thar pa'i sgo khyud la// rnam dAr brgyud kyi rna babs ldan// kun nas skor ba'i kha khyer l-I/ rol mo sna tshogs sprin dpung bzhin// phyi rang
532b6(rgyud 'grel): nang med kun tu nang // 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhis brgyan par 'khyams dang // dkyil 'khor ba ni bcu gnyis kyis brgyan// dbus su mi 'jigs seng ge'i khri/ brgya byin gyi phyogs glang po'i
533a1(rgyud 'grel): gdan// rdzu 'phrul rta ni ga shin rje'i phyogs// dbang gi rma bya chu lha ste// thogs med mkha' lding gnod sbyin phyogs// rang bzhin 'od gsal nyi zla dang // chags med pad+ma so sor mdzes// gzhan yang nyi za
533a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang // gdan ni sum brtsegs dag tu gnas// seng ge'i gdan gyi dbus su ni// dam pa'i yi ge sa bon bsam// de nas pad+mo rdo rje brtag/ so so'i snying po'i mtshan par bya// de la sangs rgyas sku nI spro// phyogs bcu'i
533a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten khams rnams su// sems can don ni mdzad nas su// phyag mtshan yongs su gyur pa las// kun bzangs yum dang ldan pa ni// zla ba'i 'od ltar dkar zhing sdang // zhal gcig phyag gnyis brgyan gyis mdzes//
533a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can// 'od zer sna tshogs 'phros po las// sprul pas sems can don rnams mdzad// kun tu bzang mo 'jo sgeg tshul// in dra nI la'i kha dog 'dra// rgyan dang dbu rgyan yab dang 'thun// phyag
533a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas rdo rje thugs kar bstan// g.yon pa dri 'dzin yum la 'khril// dbu ni 'jo zhing 'dud pa'i tshul// de nas yongs su skyod nas ni// gnyis med chags pa sbyor ba'i sgras// de bzhin gshegs pas kun bsdus nas//
533a6(rgyud 'grel): yab la de bzhin gshegs rnams thim// rdo rje lam nas byung nas ni// yum gyi pad+ma'i mkha' dkyil du// byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du las// ye shes dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa yi// de nas rjes su chags pa yas//
533b1(rgyud 'grel): sems can ma lus bsdus nus su// dkyil 'khor phyi rol 'khod nA sa ni// de dag 'jug par gsol ba 'debs// gsol ba brjod pa'i tshig gsan nas// thams cad dkyil 'khor 'jug par 'gyur// bdud rtsi 'od kyis
533b2(rgyud 'grel): reg ma thag/ thams cad rang nyid sangs rgyas shes// de ltar rgyal ba'i byin brlabs kyis// rang lus sangs rgyas shes nas ni// ngo mtshar tshig kyang brjod par byed// e ma rdo rje phung po yan lhag ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
533b3(rgyud 'grel): lnga ru grags// skye mched khams rnams mang po kun// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sa chu spyan dang mA ma ki/ me rlung gos ni sgrol ma ste// num mkha'i dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// srid gsum ye nus sangs rgyas
533b4(rgyud 'grel): zhing / thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin// sangs rgyas nyid la gzhan pa'i chos// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi gnyis so// de ltar ngo mtshar tshig brjod nas// de nas yid bstan bya ba'i
533b5(rgyud 'grel): phyir// gnyis med kun tu bzang po yis// ched du brjod pa 'di dag brjod// e ma phyogs bcu stong khams ya nas dben// srid pa gsum nyid dag pa'i zhing // snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan gnas// phung po lnga nyid mngon
533b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas// thams cad mchog gi snying po las// gzhan du rgyal bas chos mi btsal// nyid lo'ang gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos// btsal kyang rgyal bas mi mnyes so// de nas rgyal ba sangs rgyas rnams// so so'i zhing du
534a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khod par byas// yongs spyangs gsung gi yig 'bru ni// yab kyi thugs kar thim gyur nas// yum gyi pad ma'i chags blan gyis// yab yum gnyis med dkyil 'khor thim// de ltar rgyal ba snyoms zhugs
