534a2(rgyud 'grel): nas// bde ba'i 'bru tshogs mngon dran te// rgyu sdig po dang yig 'bru'i tshul// byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum pa// rab tu gtogs pa rnam bzhi yis// thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal por nges// de ltar rtogs pa rnam bzhi
534a3(rgyud 'grel): yis// rgyal ba'i sku ni mngon bskyed pa// in dra nA la'i kha dog 'dra// sku gsung thugs kyi dbu gsum ldan// ye shes drug gi phyag nyid la// rdo rje pad+ma ral gri ni// g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad// dril bu 'khor
534a4(rgyud 'grel): lo rin chen 'bar// g.yon gyi ye shes phyag na bsnams// g.yas pa'i rdo rje'i thugs kar bstan// gu yon pa dril bus yum lo khyud// thabs dang shes rab zhabs gnyis ni// mnyam pa'i btul zhugs skyil krung
534a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs// mdun dang rgyab med kun tu zhal// mtshan dang dpe byad kun gyis spras// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen las// thub pa'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs 'phro// rgyal ba rigs lngas dbu brgyan cing // sna tshogs
534a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan// btsun mo snang ba'i dbyings phyug ma// gzhon tshul 'khril ldem shin tu chags// cha lugs la sogs yab dang mthun// g.yon pa dril bu thugs kare bstan// g.yas pa nyi ma las
534b1(rgyud 'grel): la 'khril// phung po dbang po rnam shes kun/ rnam+bu sbyin+da oM du shes par bya// rdzogam+b+ha pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du bskum// spyi bIr yi ge oM bkod de// lce lha a ni rab tu gnas// snying ga lte ba chu sor na// hUM dang swA hA rim
534b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin dgong+ga// mig dang sna ba sna dang lhor// kr-i tI hI dzi rim bzhin bsam// mai NAM hUM muM dang bzhi// mig sog phyi rol rim bzhin bsam// de ltar yi ge rnams la ni// rgyal ba'i sku'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// ye shes
534b3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa'i thugs ka nas// 'od zer rnam pa meng po 'phros// phyogs bcu'i sku gsung thugs bsdus nas// bdag gi mdun du bzhugs pa la// tshig bshad 'di yis gsol ba gdab// oM ye shes rgyal po sku
534b4(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs// yon tan 'phrin las smang po che// de nyid du ni mnyamo sbyor ba'i// phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig/ bdag gI sku gsung thugs la ni// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor zhugs par gyur// oM sarba ta thA ga tA ma
534b5(rgyud 'grel): hA kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba ud ma ko hUM// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hU bAg badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko hUM// oM sarba ta thA ga ta mA hA tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA pra ad mu ko hau// de ltar sku gsung thugs gsum du// nga rgyal dbang du skyed
534b6(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// yum gyi sku'i dkyil 'khor dasod // gzugs sgra dri re rig la sogs// rnam smin mu du shes par bya yum gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// spyi ba mgrin pa gnyis su ni// lo rang ma ni rim bzhin bas
535a1(rgyud 'grel): sgyi ga lte ba chu sor ni// mu dang bya dang tam rnams dgod // mig dang d+hU bas+t+ra snrel// hUM trAM hrI a rim pa bzhin// mig rna swA m+b+hi'i phyi ros twa// dza/ hUM b+he hU~M/ rim bzhin sgrom// sku gsung byin brlabs
535a2(rgyud 'grel): yang ji bzhin// de nas yum ni byin brlabs bya// A~M AHhU~M swAd+na lnga// gnas lnga drug tu bsgom par bya/ de ltar yang ldum sku rdzogs nas// dkyi la 'khor chen po rnam sbya phyir// gnyis med chags pa'i sbyo don du
535a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje pad+ma byin gyis brlab// hU~M las rdo rje rab tu shrIs// maM li s+ye 'byung ba'i nor bu byam s+ya// a lA pad+ma skyed par bye// I na ma sarba tA thA ga tA An+d+ha rA gu bAdz+dza shrI b+h+yo ba ad ma ko ha// bsnyen pa dang ni nye basbyin
535a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa dang ni bsgrub chen+da po// yum gyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor sgo// byang chub sems kyi byin brlangs las// tha sogs yaM ge sprul par 'gyur// sa bon mtshan mas sku rnams
535a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs// sum bAn+d+ha gi hU~M dkyil 'khor // de nas 'gro ba rmongs pa la// bsnyen phyir dkyil 'khor gdon phyir mdzad// badz+rA d+h+r-ik+Sha/ swe d+hA d+yA shA ri// mI bskyod yab lus skyon nas ni// badrug nyid yi ni thim
535a6(rgyud 'grel): ra'agyung // mi dzin rje// swa rang na d+h+r-i ga~M/ oM a ra log/ ha prad nya drug la tri shar to/ maM mo ha ra ti/ thaM ra gar ti/ te badz+ra ra ti// kr-i ti tsa ya/ tri oM ka ra pa yo// tri ba ma da ma/ dzi sa ru ba na smaits+tsha
535b1(rgyud 'grel): la se ma mA ya tAM// tAM mA l+ye sa mA ya ho// hI gi ra ti rA ho haM/ a nIr ti ra gra ya mi/ me da ra nI swA hA/ b+h+ri swa raM ba yA sA hA/ hUM sA ra tsa ya swA hA/ muM shrI aM ra ga yA sA ha/ dza du pa pra be sha ya/ hUM pus pA a b+he
535b2(rgyud 'grel): sha ya/ baM d+hi pa su kau ni/ ho bAn+d+he tsi ta ho// hUM ya mAn+ta krid phyaT/ hUM big+hanAn+ta krid+yA phaT// hUM pUd+mAn+ta kring phaT/ hAM pradz+nyAn+ta kring phyeT/ oM badz+ra d+ha ra me hA kre ti shwa ri dzA lA nI hUM phaT/ oM rat+na d+hA ra ma hA kro tau shwa rI dzA la ni
535b3(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma da ra ma hA kro te shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM karma d+ha ra ma hA kro ti sh+tsa ri dz+wA l-i na hU~M phaT/ huM hUM hU~M badz+rI tsi ta oM/ a a A badz+ra pa tra sa ya a/ so so'i sngags kyis ston nas ni// brgya byin la
535b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs phyogs su gnas// ma thing gi drA ka ra pi ser leb rganA/ ljang gu'i mdog tu tshor ba yi// gauts+tsha bo gdan la rdzogs pa'i tshul// 'khor rnams sems dbye'i tshul du bzhugs// so so'i sku mdog
535b5(rgyud 'grel): yab dang 'thun// 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang // g.yas nas mthong thos snom pa dang // myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas// gru tshad la ni mthong byed dang // phos byed myong byed snom byed rnams//
535b6(rgyud 'grel): btsun mo yi ni tshogs dang bcas// mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang // bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan// sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa ni// btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas// yab yum bzhugs tshul
536a1(rgyud 'grel): phyug mtshan ni// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ hUM sgreng rtse mor rdo rje 'bar// zla gdul 'bru sgras dril bsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan// 'bru bzhi spras nas thugs
536a2(rgyud 'grel): kar bkan+da// mu sbreng rtse mo dril bsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga laswaM su 'khril// btud ngo 'dzum pa'i mdengs kyis l+ya// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// oM sbrang rtse mor 'khor lo 'bar// glu btul 'bru spras d+hil
536a3(rgyud 'grel): gsil zhing // 'khril pa'i tshul gyis chos la bstan// 'bru bzhi spras nas thugs ker bkan// lam bsgreng rtse mo'i dril bsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas
536a4(rgyud 'grel): nas thugs kar bkan// sna rtsi 'bar ba rin po che// zla btul 'bru smras gril bsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan// 'bru bzhi spris nas thugs kar bkan// me sbrang rtse mo dril bsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru
536a5(rgyud 'grel): lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i madrangs kyis lha// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bak+Shan// oM spring rtse mo pad+mo 'bar/ zla btul 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan// 'bru
536a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan // sde sbrang rtse mo dril bsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud do 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// hi sgreng rtse mo ral gri 'bar/
536b1(rgyud 'grel): bzla btul 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstanA// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// taM sgreng rtse mo dril bskyilnga 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis
536b2(rgyud 'grel): blta// ud pa la klu shing la sogs mtshan// mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin// las la 'khril zhing chos la bstan// dbu rnams 'byo zhing 'dud pa'i tshul// gong gi phyag rgya chen po bzhin// gnyis med dbyings
536b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi ngang du 'khril// bye byed khro bo'i phyag rgya ni// rgyud las gsungs pa bzhin du brtag/ mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can// gsalo 'tsher lhun sdug gzi brjid ldan// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po// 'bar
536b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrig pa ste// mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub gnas// dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa la// rgyal ba yongs su mnyes
536b5(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur// mnyes nas sems can don bya zhes// dkyil 'khor dam pa bstan gyur kyang // semasta can ma rigs gis bsgribs pas// dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i skal med 'gyur// rgyu la mchog thugs rje skyes nas
536b6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ de nas gnyis med sbyor bar 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems 'bros pas// oM sogs yi ge mngon par byung // sa bon las ni phyag mtshan 'bar// de las thub pa'i sku rdzogs te// so so'i snying po brjod
537a1(rgyud 'grel): pas 'dzin// mkha' dbyings sku gsung thugs gnas nas// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcur spros// oM mu ni kri swA hA// oM mu ni hUM druM swA hA/ oM mu ne suM swA hA/ oM mu ne br-i swA hA// oM mu ne
537a2(rgyud 'grel): k+ShaM swA hA/ oM mu ne ye swA hA// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcur ni// 'dul ba bzhi yis 'gro don mdzad// lham dang rab tu byung sogs dang // mngon par sangs rgyas bdud 'dul dag/ 'khor lo bskor dang chos 'phrul
537a3(rgyud 'grel): ston// mya ngan 'das sogs thub pa yis// spyod pa rjes mthun ston par mdzad// mngon shes drug po'i cho 'phrul gyis// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ston// sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyis// bye brag sna tshogs
537a4(rgyud 'grel): ston par mdzad// 'gro ba yongs su 'dul ba bzhin// byin brlabs 'dul ba ston par mdzad// so so'i bsam pa'i bye brag gis// lha dang mi'i theg sogs pas// thag pa lnga rnams so sor ston// rjes su bstan nas
537a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro btul te// 'gro ba sangs rgyas sar bzhag nas// slar byon par 'khyams thub drug bkod// de ltar dkyil 'khor rnams spros la// khyab par kun tu bltas nas ni// sgyu ma bzhin du dmigs nas kyang // se so'i
537a6(rgyud 'grel): yab yum bye brag la// lus kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par dgod// sku gsung thugs ni byi ni gyis brlabs// gtso bo yab yum bzhin du bya// ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir// rigs lnga'i dbu brgyan kun la bsam//
537b1(rgyud 'grel): thub drug lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang // byin brlabs dbu brgyan ma gsungaso// thugs kyi sa bon 'od zer gyis// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor spyan drung ste// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che// mi dmigs thugs kyi
537b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la// dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo // oM a ha hi b+ha ga bAn// ma hA ka ru ni kra tri sha ho// sa ma ya trAM/ dzaHhaM be ho// rang gi mdunu du mngon par bsam// zhabs bkru la sogs byas ni// oM dang mu
537b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis rtse sprad de// 'bru brgyad rnol te rtse ba sgyur ba// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// bde ba chen pa sbyin pa'i// bde ba chen po sbyin pa'i rgya// de nas tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab// oM ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs
537b4(rgyud 'grel): yon tan 'phrin las smad po che// de nyid du ni bdug sbyor bas// phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig/ oM badz+ra sa mA ya hUM// oM badz+ra sA ma ya taM// oM badz+ra sA ma ya ho// dzaHhUM baM ho// rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la/
537b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor bas// phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog/ de ltar ye shes dkyil 'khor dang // dam tshig dkyil
537b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor mnyam sbyar bya// dkyil 'khor kun la mnyam ltas nas// sgyu ma mig yor lta bur bsam// de nas lha rnams mchod pa'i phyir// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyor zhing // mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom//
538a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi snying po'i sa bon las// 'od zer mang po'i zer 'phros te// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mchod pa'i tshogs rnams kun bsdus te// bdag nyid kyi ni thugs kar thim// rdo rje'i lam
538a2(rgyud 'grel): nas byung nas ni// byang chub sems nyid mkha' dbyings nas// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer las// mchod pa'i lha mo'i tshigs spros te// rgyal mchog dkyil 'khor mchod par byed// de nas lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyis// de
538a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// dgyes pa'i glu 'di blangs par bsam// oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi// ye shes dkyil 'khor thig lce che// bsod nams dkyil 'khor sku yi tshogs// snang stong theg
538a4(rgyud 'grel): kun du rdzogs to// oM rdo rje bsod nams thig le che// rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan// rdo rje sgo chen mtha' yas pa// rdo rje rgya lnga po thig le che ho// oM sku gsung thugs kyi rdzogs pa che// yon tan 'phrin lus kun tu
538a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs// ye nas lhan rdzogs kun tu bzad // 'dus pa'i tshogs chen theg le che te// oM me dmyigs rgyu 'phrul mnyam po'i dbyings// mtha' yas kun nas sna tshogs 'bru// mtha' yas kun nas lhun gyis rnaM ma/
538a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs sku gsung thugs chen po ho// oM phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du// rgyal ba'i don rnams rdul phran sbed// sprul pa rdus phran pas mo yis kyis// skad cig yud tsam lhun gyis rtsub /
538b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ma lus thams cad sku gsung thugs// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che/ sku gsung thugs kyis kun tu khyab// sku gsung thugs kyi thig le che ho// de ltar rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// skyes pa yongasu rdzogs
538b2(rgyud 'grel): byas te// slar yang bdag gis thogs kar bsdu// de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni// gtang sbyar gnyis sam yang na lnga// byos tre dad pa ldan zhugs na// 'dod pa yis 'ong
538b3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par 'gyur// cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing // yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan// sngags kyis yan lag lnga rdzogs pas// ma nyams 'jug la rab brtson nu// zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam// bcu gnyis bcu
538b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi bcu drug gis// dbang sgyur rigs kyis dam pa 'grub// de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis// sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni// ye shes thig la de nyid la// ye shes thug le nyid srung bas// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha'
538b5(rgyud 'grel): yas mchog/ phyogs bcu duste bzhi rdzogs pa yi// zhing khams rnam dag gzhal yas dang // rgyu dang brel ba'i gzhal yas khang // 'khor lo'i gdan dang rol mo'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas
538b6(rgyud 'grel): kun// mthong nas nye bar bsnyen pa dang // rgya chen gsung las don 'byung ba// mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang ba'o// gcig dang du ma bral ba yi// mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs
539a1(rgyud 'grel): te// rang byung ye shes gnas mad snang // log par rtogs rtags rnam dag cing // 5shes dbyings las mi zhan phyir// sngags rje chen pos 'brel bas na/ 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snga/ de ltar rgyal
539a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog dngapal ldan pa'i// dkyil 'khor gsang ba sgrub pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgram// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thugs kyi dkyil lce dkyil 'khor
539a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ gsang ba'i theg le dkyil 'khor dbying ste// 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum// chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te// byang chub sems ni rdo rje'i tshogs// dbang po yul du rig pa rnams// kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la//
539a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yi// thugs kyi ye shes lngas ltar shing // snying po'i thig lde mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yi// ye shes dgyes la mchod par 'dul// zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis// ye
539a5(rgyud 'grel): shes sgyu ma rang snang ba// rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ gsad bu'i thig la nyid kyi dbyings// de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las
539a6(rgyud 'grel): thugs // ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba// dbang sgyur mchog nyid dam pa yin// dkyil 'khor lo gnas dkyil 'khor nyid// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs//
539b1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor bas// thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor yongs su kyis 'byung // phyogs dus dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mgon// sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrol ba'i phyir// bya byed med pa'i dkyil 'khor spyod // ye shes
539b2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// thos bsam sgom pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis// rang byung sku lnga lhun gyis grub// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig mchog/ gang zhig 'di la mos gyur pa// sangs rgyas
539b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// phyogs dus kun nas thams cod du// dkyil 'khor me lus bsnyen pa yi// nye ba'i sras su dgongs par 'gyur// gsang ba'i ye shes bsgom pa'i gnas// mkha' dkyil dang bla'i dbyings
539b4(rgyud 'grel): nyi zla// ye shes rgyal po yab yum bsgom// gang zhig glang chen myos 'dri'i sems// mnyam par bzhag pas btul nas su// sngags dang phyag rgya ru bstan pa// dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin las
539b5(rgyud 'grel): langs nas su// spyod lam rnams pa gnas nas kyang // snang ba'i dngos po so sor snang // lha'i dkyil 'khor nyid du lta// yang dag sgyu ma la sogs tshul// zas la sogs pa bza' ni// rgyal ba'i byin brlabs mngon
539b6(rgyud 'grel): bsdus nas// bdud rtsi lngar ni byin bslabs te// lce'i dbang po rab sbyangs nas// ye shes dkyil 'khor thugs kar ni// rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams tsams par bya// dam tshig nyams pa tshul bzhin bshags// yang
540a1(rgyud 'grel): na rgyal dkyil 'khor gyi// byin brlabs kyis ni rnam par sbyangs// sems can thams cad mthong ba na// snying rje byams pa'i sems bskyed de// sangs rgyas nyid du bya'o zhes// smyon pa'i sems ni
540a2(rgyud 'grel): khyad par can// blo can gyis ni rtag tu bya// de ltar dus bzhi'i nyin mtshan du// rnal 'byor tshul la gnas pa yin// bdag gis mi shes rmongs po gsal don tu// sgyu 'phrul gsang don sgrub pabs 'di byas te// bdag blo chung
540a3(rgyud 'grel): bas nor dang 'khrul mchis pa// 'phags dang mkhas pa rnams la bzod par gsol// 'di las bdag gis reg pa gang thob pa// 'gro ba blo zhan rnams kyis chos kun ni// stong nyid sgyu ma lta bur rab rtogs nas// ye shes
540a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med sku gsum thob par shog// sgyu 'phrul dra ba me long lta bu'i sgrub thabs// slob dpon chen po dz+nyA na dza yas mdzad pa'o// rdzogs so// rgya gar skud du/ sa twa 'adz+ra ma
540a5(rgyud 'grel): ya dzA kra ma pra ba nA ma// bod skad du/ rdo rje sems dpe'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i 'od kyi rim pa zhes bya ba// dpal rdo rje sel sa dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud dag gis// mthar phye ni lha'i rnal 'byor gyis//
540a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgom thabs rim pa mdo tsam zhig/ legs par btus te bstan par bya'o// ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs ni// 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang // rang bzhin gsong ba'i don
540b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni// yi ge sgras brtags mi tshogs la// rten pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon la// khong nas gab sngas don 'byin pa// ston pa rdo rje thugs gnas phyir// mnyes pa'i thabs kyi zin par bya// thos bsam bsgom la rab sbyangs
540b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis bzung // snod ldan dung tshul bzang la bstan// lus dang lengs spyod gtong la sbyin// gang la gsang chen 'di yod par// me mar mur gyi dong 'bigs shing // spu gri'i so dag
540b3(rgyud 'grel): gtams pa la// 'dzegs pa'i bu dag 'gro bar gyis// khong ni gnas pa'i yang khong du// lcags kyi sgrom bu kha bsdam mo// slob dpon nges par mnyes byas shing // sgyu 'phrul ri me'i dkyil 'khor du// dbang rnams thob
540b4(rgyud 'grel): bar byas pa dang // ston pa mchod brtson rtogs pa gsal// dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya rnams// ma nyams shes shing yo byad ldan// sngags drang cho ga yon lag kun// ching zhing lam la goms 'dod pas// khe grang
540b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod g.yeng kun spangs te// bka' thub gdung bas ma nyes par// gnas dang longs spyod ci bde dang // ma nyams blo ldan tshigs par sgrub// ri bo dben pa'i gnas mchog ni// me tog shing dang bkra shis bya// snyan
540b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sgra ldan par chad med// chu bo nub nas shar 'bab cing // bar snang mtshams bsam sgra ni nyung // rnal 'byor spyod la dges med pa// yo byad btsal sla mchog yin te// yon tan bzlog pa spangs par bya// bsam
541a1(rgyud 'grel): spyod mthun pa'i sa phyogs der// sa'i bya ba rgyas byas la// stong byed mgon rnams cim byas te// ji ltar 'dod pa bgo bar bya// bu mchog gzhug pa'i las rtsom pas// nyi shu 'am nyi shu rtsa lnga yi//
541a2(rgyud 'grel): tshad ldan stegs bu bcu gsum byug/ thig g.yog grogs mor ldan byas la// thig gdab cho ga phun sum tshogs// mkhas ldan chen pos bsgrims te bya// phur bu srad bu tshon phyer ldan// rab tu gnas byas byin ldan pas/
541a3(rgyud 'grel): 'og gi rtsibs bzhi pho brang lnga// che chen cha bran gsal ldan bya// btsa brgyad gnyis kyi pho brang du// dkar dmar thig le gdan byas pas// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshang bar bsgoms// gshegs gsol byin ldan rin chen
541a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshon// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i mtshon ldan pas// lte ba'i cha byed tshul bzhin bri// bcos bu ras ni sna tshogs dang // brgyan 'phreng btung ba'i bro ldan pas// dag par sbyangs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// bdag gzhan don phyir 'byor
541a5(rgyud 'grel): pa 'bul// dbang phyug thog mar rigs pas 'jug/ dkyil 'khor gsol gdab gnang zhugs par// bu mchog ser sna spangs pa nyid// gzhug skar langs bzhin rdzogs par bya// yang na dpag tshad rgyang grogs te//
541a6(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin gzugs bsnyen dkyil 'khor du'o// rnal 'byor 'dris goms 'dod pa yis// tshad med thugs rjes 'gro sgril zhes// dam bcas bstan te 'phar bstan nas// khams bsangs lus kyi lugs bzhin 'dug
541b1(rgyud 'grel): rang gi snying gi sa bon zang // 'phros pas bde gshegs mdun grangs 'bul// bla ma kun gyi yab phyir bsam// phyi bsogs nang gi lha mos mchod// phyag 'tshal mchod bstod bshags pa dang // yi rang skyabs gsol sems
541b2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed bsngo// mos pa'i dkyil 'khor mchod zin nas// sems phyir bdag la bsdus par bsam// bor chud bgags rnams gsal ba'i phyir// stong tshon gsal ba'i rigs pa nyid// skad cig sa bon rang gi lhar// gsal
541b3(rgyud 'grel): bas hU~M sbrul 'phro 'du las// zhe sdang rdo rje gsal ba yi// thugs kyi sa bon 'od zer las// mtshan cha rim spros par chad bskrad// slar 'dus rim bzhin steng 'og gur// dz+wa la raM gyis me dpung 'bar// ji tsam lcogs par
541b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshams bcad bya// ma rdzas chu bdag sa bon gyi// 'phro 'du bzlas te bsal bar sbyang // nyams chags bar chad gsal ba'i phyir// sgrub po rdzas bsags bgegs la gtor// mi mthun phyogs la gtor byas nA
541b5(rgyud 'grel): drag po gtum po'ang g+han nir 'gyur// dma? bcas snyan po shar phyi re ro// oM badz+ra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha nA hUM phaT// bi shud+d+ha a mr-i ta hU~M phaT/ dar mA a mr-i ta hUM phaT// thams cad dag gyur bdud rtsir gyur// srid
541b6(rgyud 'grel): pa phyi nang 'byung tshul gyis// snod bcud dkyil 'khor bskyed byas te// tshe 'pho yul bral bar ma'i lus// sgyu snang me gzugs 'brel pa'i bzhin// ting 'dzin gsum yang rim bzhin sgom// dngos rnams nyid na dngos med
542a1(rgyud 'grel): pas// rtog pa'i smra bsam yul lngas 'das// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te// de phyir dngos po dngos med pa'o// oM ma ha shu n+ya ta dz+nyA na badz+ra sde b+hA ba ad ma ko haM// de las snying rje chags pas bskul//
542a2(rgyud 'grel): lus dang ngag sems chos thams cad// gang na'ang ni mi dmigs pa// mig yor tshul du sbyor ba yi// nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom// rtsu ba med pa'i sems nyid ni// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin// sems nyid yi ge'i rang
542a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin te// yi ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin// yi ge mchog ni bsgom par bya// e/ rab tu brtun 'gyur a dkar las// shin tu phra ba'i a rnams spro// phyogs bcu gang bar gsal 'gyur nas// bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib/
542a4(rgyud 'grel): med par bstan// de las ming tshogs gsal bar 'gyur// spro zhing bsdu ba de bzhin no// 'di ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi// brtan 'byung ye shes rgyu yin no// ma dmigs stong chen gzugs brnyan a// yid kyis nam mkhar
542a5(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba las// snying sgog lte ba 'gro mdo rlung // las bzhi lus bzhin e mthing las// 'phro 'dus chos kyi 'byung gnas bsam// de skyeng yoM las gzhu dbyibs rlung // dud kA ba~M dkar chu dkyil bzlum// lam ser ri rab
542a6(rgyud 'grel): ser rgyas dbyibs// de steng raM las ye shes mo// dkyil 'khror sna tshogs puM du 'phro// yongs 'gyur ye shes gzhal yas khang // ye shes rin chen rgyu la so byung // ched mid rtsibs bzhi 'khor lo la// rtsibs bzhi mu khyud
542b1(rgyud 'grel): pan car ldan// glu chud zo 'bur bar khyams bcas// sgo khyud bzhir ldan lta babs brgyad// sti gnas lam gyi bgrod phyir ro// 'bras bu yon tan brgyad rdzogs phyir// rta rkang chu skyes rin chen sgrom// snum 'phyo bzhi las
542b2(rgyud 'grel): za ra chags// rin chen sgril 'chang shar bu khyung // rims bzhin dbyibs mdog mdzes par ldan// tha snyad sems phyir bum pa gcig/ rma bya'i mdongs ldan cir yang snang // mthon dman tshad med bya 'dab ldan// thub
542b3(rgyud 'grel): rje kun snyoms khyab phyir ro// yang thog mtho dman rim ldan pa'i// tha ma'i 'dab myas kun g.yegs par// ye shes rtsig ste se gol gtams// mi 'jigs kha nas mu tig hAr// pha khu mdzes pa'i ba dang ldan//
542b4(rgyud 'grel): dra ba dra phyod 'gul 'khor bar// gzugs sogs lha mos 'khrigs pa ste// sna tshogs mchod byed rol mo yis// par snang khams su sbyin dpung bzhin// sgo bzhi g.yas g.yon ljon shing // dpag bsam shing zung
542b5(rgyud 'grel): co tsong 'phel// dril bu g.yer ga thigs sgrogs pa// bkra shis byA snyan sgra sgrogs ldan// yid bzhin rin chen brgyan bskor bas// rin chen phung po bzhi gnyis ldan// thams cad la ni dab sgyur phyir// lha chen phyogs
542b6(rgyud 'grel): skyong brgyad kyis bskor// 'khor lo rtsings chen mu khyud ldan// rtsibs ldan po brang lnga pa nyid// bar khyams sgo khyud ldan pa la// dkyil 'khor bcu phrag brgyad gnyis ldan// pho brang dbus kyi lto ba la// mi 'jigs
543a1(rgyud 'grel): seng ge brgyad dang ldan// shar phyogs lte bar stobs glang che// lho ru rdzu 'phrul rta brgyad steng // nub kyi pho brang rma bya dbang // byang du 'phrin las shang shang brgyad// khri rkang par mdzes pad ldan pa/
543a2(rgyud 'grel): mazla ba lnga brtsegs ldan// nyi zla chu skyes sum brtsegs sems// nyi rkyang khro dang pad kyang thub// bya byed kun bzang yab dang yum// nyi zla pad ma rin tshon rgyas// gdan la mnyam pa'i skyil krung bzhugs// bdun phrag sum cu
543a3(rgyud 'grel): rtsa rgyad rlung // las kyi rim bzhin rnam smin lus// rdzogs bzhin dam pa'i sa don las// 'phre 'du gsum gyi sku rdzogs bskyed// rgyu'i a las hUM aM tAM/ a haM maM sogs yi ge bcu// phe brang lnga la rim bzhin bsam// rtsi
543a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi yo go e tre hI// dza dwang dz+waHhUM baM ho// dang // tra de du ha sogs pa 'am// yang na so so'i zung bcas pa'o// a k+Sha hUM drug par 'o khyams la// dziHhUM baM hoHsgo bzhi ste/ hUM chen nyi shu phyi rol tu// bskul pa'i me la rims
543a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bsama?// sa bron yi ge phyi ru thim// de dag 'du 'phro yongs 'dus pas// so so'i phyogs mtshams 'bar bar 'gyur// yongs gyur 'phra mi kun phra 'dus// phyag rgya chen po rdzogs por bskyed// tha snyad dag
543a6(rgyud 'grel): dag las skyed// bde gshegs rigs las shar ba'i phyir// rgyal ba bdag gi sras gyur te// sgyu'i 'khor lo bskyed pa'o// 'bras bu'i 'khor lo bsam pa ni// gtso bo thugs las shar po dag/ 'jig rten mas/
543b1(rgyud 'grel): po sras kyi mchog/ bdag gis bzung ste gsol ba gdab// hoHsems nyid theg par rab nges pa'i// dkyil 'khor brgyad cu rtsa gnyis rdzogs// sangs rgyasu rdo rje sems dpa' yi// tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor bsam yas pa'i//
543b2(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs su bdag sbyor cing // bskul bas gnas gsum gzer 'phros te// mngon sum sbyangs pas lugs ka bzhin// gyur pa 'phros pa'i yi ge gsum// yi ge hUM du gyur pa la// zla rlung sbyor bas gtogs nas
543b3(rgyud 'grel): ni// bskor te rtse ba'i thugs kar thim// rdo rje lam byung yum gyi mkhar// rgyu'i chos sku sems su gnas// lha rnams so sor sgra phyung rol// kun kyang 'od dpung sna tshogs mdog/ skad cig dran paM sau a ku ste// yongs
543b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur rdo rje dril 'bar bsam// 'phro 'dus 'gro don 'phags mchod nas// slar 'dus 'phro mo'i 'dus// phyag rgya chen po'i sku gnyis rdzogs// byed pa rdo rje yab yum gnyis// in tra nI lA'i kha dog 'dra// rang rtag rdo rje dril
543b5(rgyud 'grel): bu 'dzin// 'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bsam// nus mthu ldan phyir byin rlabs dbang // thugs ka'i 'od zer khyab skula' bas// phyogs dus bde gshegasu rigs lnga'i gshegs// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu rgyan dbang // de nyid
543b6(rgyud 'grel): rkyen gyi sngags kyi bskul// gnas gsum 'bru gsum 'phro 'du las// sku gsung thugs ldan lhar bskyed do// gsum pa'i sngags kyi nga rgyal bya// mtshon gang dkar dmar thig dkar shar// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gdon
544a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir// rdo rje skye mched gsang gnas brlab// kun bzungs spyi bo ljags steng snying // lte ba nAng gi gsang ba la// oM hUM s+thA aM hA rims bzhin// gnas dwer yaM la muM laM maM// paM taM bsaM pa ya ba yum bcwa
544a2(rgyud 'grel): rna sna kye'i phyi nang la// krI tIr+t+ti a/ me shrI hI rmi sogs brgyad// yum gyi gnas dor hUM trAM hrI// a sogs dziHhU~M baM hoHbzhis// sems ma brgyad po rims bzhin bsam// g.yas g.yon yan lag mkha' gsang la// hUM bzhi khro bo
544a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ru bas// yuM la dzaHhU~M baM ho// las// sgo ma bzhi bsam bco brgyad las// yab yum gnyis la rdzogs par bya// de nas gsang gnas byin brlabs pa// hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga phaT// de las pad+ma 'dab rgyad a// rje su chags pas
544a4(rgyud 'grel): tshul bzhin skul// phyag rgya bzhis rol dgyes sprin 'phro// mkha' la thig gdab gzhal yas gdan// bsams te sku rdzogs gnas pa nyid// gtso 'khor rims bzhin dza yIs gdon// phyi rol gnas su khyab par sbyar// b+h+rUM
544a5(rgyud 'grel): bi shud+d+he dz+nyA na tsa~M krA/ du ti ts+tsha kra nAn+ta/ su r+yA tsa kra r-it+nA pad+ma mA da l+yA// hUM badz+ra drig mu dA du shA ri/ oM sU twa badz+ra hUM/ oM ti shwA badz+ra A/ oM rat+na badz+ra traM/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la hUM/ oM d+hA ra mA badz+rA hriM/ oM s+yAng gra badz+re hUM/ oM kar ma
544a6(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra ha~M/ oM tsad tsa la badz+ra hUM/ oM dzi na dzaMg/ oM l-i sha ra ti/ oM badz+ra sang tra/ oM badz+ra la se oM/ oM badz+ra tsa oM// oM badz+ra du baM oM/ oM badz+ra ra ga oM/ oM badz+ra aM gu sha oM/ oM badz+ra su oM/ oM badz+ra de sha r-i ti oM/ swa
544b1(rgyud 'grel): rat+na dr-ig/ me mo ha ra ti/ oM oM badz+ra rat+na traM/ oM badz+ra ma l+ye traM/ oM badz+ra sur+ya traM/ oM badz+ra ke du trI/ oM badz+ra ba sha/ oM badz+ra ha sa tri/ trAM/ oM rat+na ra ti traM/ oM a ro lig/ bai rA ga ra ti/ oM badz+rA dar ma tI/ oM badz+ra gir ti hri/ oM badz+ra/
544b2(rgyud 'grel): tig sna hri/ oM badz+ra a lo ge hrI/ oM badz+ra tsi tre hri/ oM badz+ra s+tho ta hrI/ oM badz+ra pa sha hri/ oM badz+ra a lo hI/ hA prad nya drig/ taM badz+ra ra ti/ oM badz+ra kaR+Sha mA hA/ oM badz+ra niR+Sha ti hA/ oM badz+ra rak+kha ha/ oM badz+ra gne te ha/ oM badz+ra yak+Sha ha/ oM
544b3(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra gan to ha/ oM badz+ra san to haM/ oM badz+ra e be sha ha/ oM badz+ra a gu sha dza dza/ oM badz+ra pa sha hUM/ oM badz+ra po ta baM/ oM badz+ra gan de ho/ oM hUM hUM hUM/ badz+ra tsi ta oM/ a a a badz+ra patA sa ma ya/ oM/ oM mu ne kr-i swA hA/
544b4(rgyud 'grel): oM mu ne praM swA hA/ oM mu n+ye bruM swA hA/ oM mu ne srum swA hA/ aM mu ne kU swA hA/ oM mu ne ya swA hA/ oM badz+ra kro tA hUM ka ra/ hUM phaT/ kro ti sh+tsa rAk+Sha ye to hU~M/ oM badz+ra kro ta bi hUM phaT/ kro tI shwa ri la se gre hUM/ oM badz+ra kro tA ni
544b5(rgyud 'grel): daN+Da hUM phaT/ kr-i taM sho ri pre tI dze hUM/ oM badz+rI k+Sho ti ya mAn+ta ka hUM phaT/ kro ti sho ri tA na ba ti hUM/ oM badz+ra kro tA Ar+ya a tsi la hUM phaT/ kro ti sh+tsa ri mu hUM la hUM/ oM badz+ra kr-i ta hUM yA grI b+he hUM phaT/ kro ti sho ri tsan tra haM ya hUM/
544b6(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra kro ta a pa ra tsi ta hUM phaT/ kro ti sho ri sha ya bye ti hUM/ oM badz+ra kro ta a mri ta kuN+Da li hUM phaT/ kr-i ti shwa ri pa ya ba ti hU~M/ oM badz+ra kro ta tre log kya bi dz+ra ya hUM phaT/ kro ti shi ri ma ra ne hU~M/ oM badz+ra kro ta ma hA ba
545a1(rgyud 'grel): la hA phaT/ kro ta sha ri tsan ta mu ne hUM// de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal ston pas// so so'i gnas su rgyas par 'god// gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul// 'joms dang thub pas brkyang sgyum
545a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhengs// 'khor lo'i dbus la rgyal po yum/ mdun rgyab g.yas g.yon phyogs bzhi ru// sems dpa'i sems ma rigs bzhin gnas// bar khyams la ni thub pa drug/ rgyud drug sbyong ba'i phyag rgyar gnas// shar lho
545a3(rgyud 'grel): lha dang lho phyogs mi// lho nub byang nub yi dgas byol// byang dang byang shar lho min dmyal// mdun rgyab bya byed yab yum gtso// sgo khyud bsrung po khro mo bzhi// bskal pa'i me li khro zung pocu// phyogs mtshams srung ba'i
545a4(rgyud 'grel): tshul du gnas// de kun byin dbying nus ldan pas// 'gro don bya phyir tshul bzhin bsam+ba/ oM ma hA shu n+ya tA gnya' na badz+ra sU b+hA ba Ad mi ko haM// oM ma ha a ta ri sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba a me ko haM// oM ma hA sa man+ta dz+nyA na
545a5(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra swa b+hA ba adA mA ka ha~M/ oM ma hA pra be sha dz+nyA na badz+re swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM// ma hA krI ta a nu ta na dz+nye badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ka haM// oM sArba ta thA ga ta ma hA bAg badz+ra
545a6(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsi ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma go haM// dkyil 'khor dbang skur thim par 'gyur// byin brlabs rab tu gsal bar 'gyur// rin chen smug po gnas cig tu// mtshon gang sems
545b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' 'od ldan pa// thugs kyi sa bon brlabs pas bskor// kun gyi bdag nyid dkyil du bsam// thub drug sprul pa rab byung phyir// byin brlabs dbu brgyan ma gsungs so// mthing kha dkar po ser le brgyan// ljang gu kha dog gsal
545b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tsher 'bar// sems dpa' rnams ni rigs kyi tshul// ser dang dkar thing ser nag dang // dmar nag dud ka thub pa'i sku// sngo ser dmar ljang sgo bsrungs sku// khros pas bsrung phyir rtswa gnag pa'o// mthing ga hUM chen rnam rgyal
545b3(rgyud 'grel): dkar// dbyug pa sngo la gshed mthing gnag/ mi g.yo ljang sngo rta mgrin da mar// 'dod rgyal dung ka bdud rtsi ljang // khams gsum dkar ljang stobs chen dud// khro bo rnams ni khro dang mthun// kun kyang dur khrod chas
545b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan par// me dpung 'phros 'dus ldan pa'o// sku'i mtshan nyid dgu ldan te// mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul tsan// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi baN+Di de ldan pa'o// rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che// pad+ma ral gri dril bu 'bar//
545b5(rgyud 'grel): getso gzungs 'phel ba'i phyag rgya ni// sdor rtser 'chad bu thugs kau re bstan// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dri// rdo rje lcags k+Sha mda' gzhu brgya// rin+da tshinA myu gu nyi ma dang // rgyal mtshan sgor 'phreng 'dzin pa dang / pad+ma kha 'byed
545b6(rgyud 'grel): ral gri dang // 'khor lo 'dzin dang lce 'dzin pa// ral gri rdo rje 'phreng ba dang // mche ba khu tshur bcings pa'o// me long phig phor lcags kyu 'phreng // ri na chen me tog zhags gsil yab// pi bang mar me lcags sgrogs
546a1(rgyud 'grel): gdongs// gar 'dzin spos dril rma bya bum// gseg gshang par pu pi bad dang // go cha mdung phung po tI rtsegs// rin rkyen sgrom bu me dang chu// kun+da bzang mnyam bzhag ye shes 'phro// yum 'gyur
546a2(rgyud 'grel): mnyam rdzogs pad mo dkyil// yang na rdo rje dril bu nyid// lcags kyu zhags pa po ta ho// 'khor lo nI mgo rdo rje stir// zhugs gling dang ni drang srong nyid// zhing dbyug gshin rje kaM bzung ba// ral gri bad bral sti re dbyug
546a3(rgyud 'grel): gshog/ ba dan lce spyang brgyad be 'am thogs// rin chen mgo bo gsum gyi dbyug/ rdo rje rtse gsum ni 'go dang // thong bshol gtun shing g.yas g.yon phogs// yang na phyag drug mngon par rol// khro mo'i g.yas ni
546a4(rgyud 'grel): gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa rag tu ston pa'o// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che// mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las// dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo // rang snang dubyer med dkyir la// 'jug pa'i
546a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid minyam sbyor bas// phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa'i// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rabA tu rdzogs// nye byar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog/ ha hi b+hA ga bAn// ma hA ka ru ni ga tau sh+ya ho// sA ma ya s+t+waM/ dzaHhUM
546a6(rgyud 'grel): baM ho/ oM a hUM swA hA/ ba bab pa bi dz+ra dz+wa dzA dz+ra dz+re dz+wa sa sa sa sa sa ma ma ma ma ma/ ya ya ya ya ya/ oM a hUM swA hA/ oM ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs// yon tan 'phrin las rmad po che// nga nyid du ni mnyam sbyor
546b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i// phyag rgya chen po bdag sbyor cig/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya ho// sgo bzhir byin bstim bstan byas la// gnyis med phyag 'tshal tshogs phyir mchod// mi skyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi
546b2(rgyud 'grel): ge'u rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge/ lnga gnyis zung du spros pa las// sbyar ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu/ bskyed chen 'khor lo'i gzhol yas su// chom bu dkyil 'khor gsal bsgoms na// bskul bskyod thams
546b3(rgyud 'grel): cad phyag rgya yin// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar skrun// hUM sgreng rtse mor dzA rje 'bar// zla btul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar skan// muM sgreng rtse
546b4(rgyud 'grel): mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lha// rigs bzhi kun kyang gtso bo bzhin// g.yas g.yon mdzub mo oM la la// 'khor lo dril bu 'bar bar bsam// tha 'ong
546b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis la swa maM ste// rin chen dril buM rab 'bar ba// srin lag g.yas g.yon oM paM ste// pad+ma dril bu rtse la 'bar// the chung ha ti ral gyis dril// 'bru sgras bkan+da dang bstan 'khril pa'o// yang na rtsa skyed sngags kyis
546b6(rgyud 'grel): so/ g.yas g.yon ser rtser hUM traM hriM// a sogs zung bzhi nyi zla ste// rims bsams gung me rtse sprang pa// sems dpa' rdo rje yab yum mo// mdzub mo rtse sprad rin chen no// srin lag rtse sprad chos rdo rje// the chung
547a1(rgyud 'grel): rtse sprad las rdo rje// the bo mdzub mo rdo rje 'dzin// the bo gung mo rgyal ba 'dzin// srin lag the bong chags pa che// the chung the bong legs pa mchog/ g.yas rol hUM dza ho dang swa// mdzub mo gnyis sbyar rIH
547a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ gong mo gnyis sbyar rin chen don// smon lag gnyis sbyar rgyal mtshan te// rdo rje gzhad pa the chung sprad// tau dang he du sta rims bzhin// mdzub mo steng 'og rdo rje chos// gong mo steng 'og 'jam dpal mchog/ srin lag
547a3(rgyud 'grel): steng 'og 'khor lo mchog/ the chung steng 'og rdo rje smra// hri paM traM dang haMhi bzhi bsam// mdzub mo rgya gram rdo rje las// gung mo rgya gram rdo rje bsrung // srin lag rgya gram+ba gnod sbyin mchog/ the chung rgya gram khu tshur ro// haM hUM a baM sor
547a4(rgyud 'grel): rtser bsam// dza dang ho la sogs pa'o// gar du sbyar bas rdo rje 'chang // phyag rgya brda tshig chen po 'dris// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor byed par snang // rang bzhin dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs// klu gnyis phyag rgyar ldan
547a5(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// sa ler gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bebs// phyag rgya zlos po chen po ni// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam gnyis po// dgra par gsal bas phyag rgya yin// yi ge so sor gsal ba yis// gar du bsgyur bas mya ngan
547a6(rgyud 'grel): 'das// gseg par bi bang go cha dang // po ti sgrom dang mau chu rgyo// ji ltar gnas bzhin bca' ba ste// lcags kyu zhags pa dril bu sgrog/ yi ge gosal bas bzung ba'i tshul// khro bcu g.yas g.yon nyid hUM gis//
547b1(rgyud 'grel): gar du sgyur zhing rim bzhin gsal// dpel dang zhal gsil gsol mchod bya// mnyam pa'i sgrub rdzas chen po dgra/ bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshig la 'bul// lha yang rtag tu mchod byas na/ bdag dang gnyis su myed
547b2(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur// bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo// longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor thim// shes par rab spyad na// ngo mtshar 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyes// ri rab chen po'i gling
547b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi la// gnas pa'i sems can ma lus kun// bdag nyid chen po rtogs pa yis// dbyibs su yang ni sba bar bya'o// 'khril pa'i chos chen mnyam sbyor bas// bdag nyid mnyes pas mnyes par bya'o// /
547b4(rgyud 'grel): srid gsum sems can thams cad la// dga' bya chen po khyab par 'gyur// oM sarba tra thA gau ta A nu ra gA na swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM// thig le 'dres pas phyi nang gi/ lha mo spros te bdag nyid mchod// oM sarba tA thA
547b5(rgyud 'grel): ga ta ma hA puts+tsha ba dza swa b+hA byA ad ma ko hUM// mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni// sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshegs kyis// snod dang bcud kyis dngos po kun+da// ji ltar 'dod pa'i snyems phyir dbul// 'bras bu don gyi
547b6(rgyud 'grel): dgyes bya'i phyir// glu'i mchod pa tshul bzhin mchod// 'bogs bstod sems can grol bya'i phyir// drung dang zangs dang mud rtsa ra// pi bang gling bu ke ko ta// pheg rdob rdza lnga pi bang dang // dgu po rgyud mangs sgra sgrog
548a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyar// rgyal po 'khor bcas dgongs gsol te// tshogs phyir mchod pa rgya mtsho 'bul// rnal 'byor dbang phyug nyams chags bshags// las la don phyir 'phrin las bcol// grub pa'i
548a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod don gsol ba gdab// phyi dang nang gi pra mi yis// rnal 'byor bsgrub phyir bzlas par bya// phyi rol yan lag brgyad ldan pa'i// dam tshig ye shes yig gsal bas// rnam gsum ma 'khrul tshul gyis bzlas// oM hUM
548a3(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra sa to sa// badz+ra pra ban hUM/ muM badz+ra gdA na/ hUM/ oM badz+ra tsa tra ma da laM oM// laM badz+ra gau na dau pa sha laM/ sA rad na pra ba nI sAM// ma~M badz+ra gan d+ha pa sha maM// AM pad+ma ma pra pa na oM/ pa~M badz+ra gan d+ha pra pa na paM/ haM khang rtag/
548a4(rgyud 'grel): sna pra pa na hUM// tau badz+ra ga nu da pra pa na pa sha tau// yang na bskyed dang zlas thun myong // nang du yab yum zhal spyod de// dgra bcom med pa'i zlas pa yis// dbus kyi rtsa nyid 'phro 'du'i lam/ zhal nas zhal dang mkha' nas
548a5(rgyud 'grel): mkhar/ skor bas drug log bde myong du// bsnyen pa grangs dus mtshan ma yis// thabs kyi mchog tu de gsungs so// rims par goms dang nyams ldan pas// rje skye'i tshul du skad cig gis// yongs su rdzogs
548a6(rgyud 'grel): bar skyed byas te// de goms grangs med slob byed pas// bdag gzhan las kun byed pa'i phyir// skabs kyis dang por brjod pa yin// de goms rigs 'dzin tshe lo sbyor// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// dbang
548b1(rgyud 'grel): sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// lus dang phung por bcas pa yin// tshe la dbang ba'i rigs 'dzin 'grub// rigs pa 'dzin pa'i tshe nyid la kyis// bla med kun du bzung gyur pa/ lhag ma bcas dang lhag med pa'i// mya ngan 'das
548b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshul nyid kyis// 'di dang bAr mar sbyor ba ste// dper na khyung dang sreng gi bzhin// rnam smin rgyu mdung grol ma thag/ bar ma ye shes sgyu ma'i sku// mngon mtho rig pa'i sa la gnas// de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis// sku lha lhun
548b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis rdzogs pa ni// ye shes thig la de nyid las// ye shes thig le nyid snang ba'i// bsim gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ mngon 'gyur chu dang nyi zla bzhin// de nas longs spyod badre ldan pas// tshogs gnyis rdzogs
548b4(rgyud 'grel): phyir yod byad lngas// sna tshogs mchod pa rgyas mchod pa// rnal 'byor dbang phyug longs spyod de// sems phyir hUM gis longs spyod pa 'am// ye shes rol pa'i tshul 'chang ba// tha mal 'dzin grol de la sbyor// de phyir 'byor pa
548b5(rgyud 'grel): non tan bskyed// bdag nyid mkha' 'gro 'dul byed pa// dbang phyugro rgyal ba rigs lnga yi// bos mA dang ldan pas lhag ma nyid// gzhung gzhin btsal te tshim byas la// rjes su 'thun pa'i las stsol te// rong rang gnas su las
548b6(rgyud 'grel): dgye'o// rtog chad mtha' las grol bya'i phyir// dkyil 'khor rims bzhin snying la bsdu// mi dmigs dang las gtso bor bskyed// bskyed pa'i rdzogs par bstan pa'o// bar chod rgyun las grol ba'i phyir// rgya gram go
549a1(rgyud 'grel): dang khro lus byung // de nyid 'gro don nus ldan phyir// dbang bskur dbu rgyan cod pan ldan// bdag nyid spyod lam 'gre 'dug nyal// longs spyod dus bzhir mnyam langs tshe/ rigs phyir thams cad dkyil
549a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ltar// gsal byas tha snyad zhen las 'das// phyag rgya chen po nyid du 'gyur// de phyir lo lo gnyid sbyangs 'bad// de ltar teng 'dzin skyo ldang na// rdzogs pa'i bsam pa sbyor bya ste// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/
549a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsong ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings// 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum// chen po rigs
549a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi de bzhin te// byang chub sems ni rdo rje'i tshogs// dbang po'i yul dus rig pa'i rnams// kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la// bdag nyid chen po'i lhag pa yi// thugs kyi ye shes lnga ltar shing // snying po'i thig le
549a5(rgyud 'grel): mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis// ye shes dgyes la mchod pa 'du la// zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis// ye shes sgyu ma rang snang ba// rol mo dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog// de la sogs pa'i
549a6(rgyud 'grel): gdams ngag ni// bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o// de goms 'khor lo'i rims bsdus te// ma ta'i sgra la dmigs te 'dug/ de'i ngang las nang par dus// skad cig lha kun rdzogs bsams te// bstod chod la
549b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs rgyas par bya// rdzogs pa nyid du sbyor ba yis// na ta'i sgra yang mi dmigs sbyar// stobs 'gyur thams cad ye shes sras// skad cing rika pa gsal mthong ba// rdzob sdu pa'i rdzogs par bshad pa yin/ bdag nyid
549b2(rgyud 'grel): nam zhig 'pho ba'i tshe// ye shes sku nyid gsal bstan la// 'pho ba'i sems stobs drag po yis// bar ma yang shes gzugs skur sbyor// de ltar goms pas snga ma bzhin// tshe dang phyag rgya lhun grub rigs// nges
549b3(rgyud 'grel): thob rdzogs pa'i sngar sbyor ba// ye shes lha mo rol spyod dang // gsang ba'i rdzogs su byin brlabs kyis// skad cig lhun grub sa la 'gro// log par rtogs brtags rnam dag cing // ye shes dbyings las mi zhen phyir//
549b4(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje chen po 'brel pas na// 'gro drug dus gnas snang ba yang // mtho dman kun gyis gzugs snang yang // bla med byang chub skur snang ba// me leng lta bu'i tshul bzhin du// sna tshogs kha dog dbyibs su snang // lhun
549b5(rgyud 'grel): grub sku les ma g.yos bzhin// so so ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin// rtog pa rnams la 'khor bA'i lus// thar pa'i cha ston rgyal po dang // tshangs dang lha chen tha dad snang // bar pa rnams la dag pa'i sku// nyan thos
549b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams la dgra bcom lus// rang rgyal rnams la bas ru'i tshul// mos spyod mdo sder shAkya'i tshul// byang chub sems la rdzogs longs spyod// lhun grub rnams la rdo rje dbyings// zhi khro 'dus pa'i tshogs chen la//
550a1(rgyud 'grel): so sor mthun byas kun tu snang // dper na me long chu zla bzhin// 'gro 'ong med la kun tu gsal// so sor mthun byas kun tu snang // dper na me long chu zla bzhin// 'gro 'ong med las kun du gsal// gsal
550a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid sgyu mas mig yor tshul// tshul nyid dbyings las g.yos pa med// thar pa skul zhing ngan song spong // zhi ba phyogs cig shes bya spor// sa bcu ma nyi ma par sbyor byed cing // tshogs gnyis yang dag rdzogs byed pa'i// rgyal
550a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rgyu ba' nyid kyi sku// kun tu rin chen lta bu'o// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud kyi rgya mtsho las// gsong bas 'o ma'i tshul bzhin 'od kyis sgras// rim pa'i bsgrub tha bos gsal byed yi ge 'di// shes chung phyogs shar bdag
550a4(rgyud 'grel): gis legs par btus// 'di la nongs 'gal ra chod gyur pa dag/ mi dmigs sems kyi dag pa'i glong du gshegs// de lta'i dge rtsa lam gnas rnal 'byor kun// bskyed rims mthar phyin yang dag zhen grol nas//
550a5(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi thar lam mngon gyur don rdzogs te// mtha' yas 'gro don tshul bzhin byed par shog+sa// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i skyed pa'i rim pa ting nge 'dzin// dkyil 'khor lnga'i dbang du sbyar ba// 'od kyi rim
550a6(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes bya ba'i man ngag/ slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa'i man ngag/ 'od kyi rim pa rdzogs so// / rdo rje sems la phyag 'tshal nas// rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che// 'jug dang dmigs
550b1(rgyud 'grel): pa las 'das pa'i// bsam gtan bsdus pa 'di bshad do// sgyu 'phrul dra bas dbang bskur ba'i// rgyud dang bden pa'i dbang thob pa'i// sngags pa blo ldan dben dga' bas// sngon du bya ba kun byas te// bar chad rnam gsum med pa'o
550b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ rnyed nas cig pur gnas par bya// rang gi gzugs brnyan mdun bzhag la// slob dpon rgyal po rdo rje chos// zla ba dza yis spyan drangs thim// bdug sogs mchod de thal sbyar la// rdo rje slob dpal sangs rgyas
550b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal/ dus gsum bzhugs la phyag 'tshal bstod mngon sbyar yid kyis rnam sprul pa'i// dag pa'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol// drangs dgrub chu bo gcod pa'i bgegs// nyes byas ma lus bshags par bgyi//
550b4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu'i 'khor gsum dag po'i chos// ma chags spyod la rjes yi rang // dge pa mtha' bzhi dri ma med// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed do// mchog gsum rten pa'i zhing gyur la// gnyis med yid kyis sgrub
550b5(rgyud 'grel): su gsol// tshe rabs bskyungs pa'i las rnams kun// bsdus te byang chub mchog tu bsngo// sgrub rdzas pad+ma'i 'brus sbyangs la// zla 'bru'i steng du hri zin par// hri yis na mkha'i bdud rtsi dbab// sngags zlas bdud rtsi
550b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil bar bya// oM badz+ra tsi te sa ma hUM hri tha// dngos rnams nyid na dngos med par// rtog pa'i smra bsam yul las 'das// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te// de phyir dngos po dngos med pa'o// de bzhin nyid du
551a1(rgyud 'grel): gsal brtan nas// skyed pa'i phyag rgya rig pa nyid// a ma sbyar te bstan pa dang // 'od 'phros don byas byin brlabs te// gang ba'i nyi zla pad mor bcus// bstan pas gzhal yang rang gi sem// /
551a2(rgyud 'grel): sngon po hUM nyid rig pa'i dngos// dbyings la dbyings kyis bris pras te// gzugs dang bral bas kha dog med// 'od kyi phyogs kun sems su byas// slar 'dur lta bar bcas par grol// rnam lngas rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya yini//
551a3(rgyud 'grel): brten nas khams gsum skus bkong ste// dril bu thabs dang shes rab sku// zhal gsum phyag drug yang na gnyis// shu dz+nyA ta sogs brgyad pa'i sngags// rdzogs pa'i tshul du rdzogs dbang skur// zla stengs sgo gsum
551a4(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba'i 'bru// bsdu ba'i sbyor bas rlung bsdus te// dngos po sgo gsum phyag rgya gsum// dkar dmar thing ga dkyil yi ge/ phyogs bcu khyab pa'i hUM 'od zer// sgras bskul thams cad rdo rje bzhengs// rtse mo lcags kyus
551a5(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs la// e hau hI zhes dgug ste bstim// hUM dza s+pho ta ho yis bzhugs// mchod de rdo rje'i zlas pa bya// khams gsum dbang phyug mun gnas la// spro ba gsum gyis gsal gdab bskul// rdo rje gsum dngos
551a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pas snyim// rdo rje chos kyi gzi 'dar 'gyur// zla drug de bzhin lo zla bzhi// rig pa'i brtul zhugaso la gnas te// brtson 'grus yu ba bcad pa bzhin// rdo rje nyid 'gyur the tshom med// dbang po rnams gnyis
551b1(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs 'khyud// rdo rje khu bas mkha' bkang ste// thig le ba spu'i bu ga nas// 'dod pa drug dang tshom pa bani// sgos nas ma lus bdag nyid mnyes// prA N+ya badz+ra sngags kyis thob// de bzhin mnyam pa'i bsgrub rdzus dag/
551b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes bdud rtsis thim par dbul// dngos po 'bru gsum blangs nas su// rdo rje lce gzhag dngos grub 'gyur// oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi// ye shes dkyil 'khor thig le che// bsod nams dkyil
551b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor sku yi tshogs// snang stong thig le kun rdzogs ho// oM rdo rje bsod nams thig le che// rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan// rdo rje sgra chen+da mtha' yas pa// rdo rje rgyal po theg le che ho// oM sku gsung thugs
551b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi rdzogs pa che// yon tan 'phrin las kun tu rdzogs// ye shes lhun rdzogs kun tu bzang // 'dres pa'i tshogs chen thig le che ho// oM me dmigs sgyu 'phrul mnyam pa'i dbyings// mtha' yas kun nas sna tshogs
551b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phro// mtha' yas kun+da nas lhun gyis thim// sna tshogs sku gsung thugs chen po hU~M// oM phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sbrul snyed du// rgyal ba'i don rnams gdul phran+da snyed// sprul pa rdul bral bsam yas kyi sde// skad cig nyid
551b6(rgyud 'grel): la lhun gyi grub to// oM thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che// sku gsung thugs kyis kun tu khyab/ sku gsung thugs kyi thig le che/ ho/ hU~M badz+ra d+h+r-ig/ mu da du shwa ri s+t+waM// spyod lam
552a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa gsum du yang // 'bad de yengs ma med sems shing // spyod yul mtshan nyid thams cad la/ thig le 'am yang na lha mo drug/ nyid du sbyor bas mthong thos med// dmig rgyu la sogs mtshan
552a2(rgyud 'grel): ma lnga// bstan pas nyes pa'i rtsa ba med// 'dri mchog dkyil 'khor bri la sogs// skabs 'dir gags yin slang mi bya// de ltar goms rtogs rigs mchog nges// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// rigs 'dzin
552a3(rgyud 'grel): sa le gdon mi za// rgyud las rmos pa'i yon tan rnams// tshe 'dis mngon du gyur pa yis// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs te// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen mnyes// 'di ltar bsrubs shing sgom byas na// 'bras
552a4(rgyud 'grel): bu mngon du ma byung yang // tshe rabs skye ba thams cad du// las ngan kun tu skye mi 'gyur// theg pa sman par yong mi skye// bde gshegs 'byung dang skol mi 'gyur// sdug bsngal thams cad yang mi 'byung // lha mi mtshan
552a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs yongs su 'grub// mthar ni skye med rdo rje'i sir// 'grub 'gyur the tshom med ces bshad// sgyu 'phrul phyag rgya bsdam gtan rdzogs so// / rgyu la ba kun tu bzang po'i sgyu 'phrul las// ngang pas 'o ma
552a6(rgyud 'grel): blangs pa'i dpe bzhin du// rab 'bring kun gyis nyams su slang ba'i chos// gab sbas mngon du byung ba'i man ngag 'di// 'phangs med ser sna spangs las ma rtogs pa// dom med chags po'i 'khor dang ma phrad cig
552b1(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon pa ma las mdzad pa rdzogs pa// / de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ ye shes rgya mtsho rab zab thugs// dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter// nor bu rin chen yon tan mdzod// rdo rje'i yad/
552b2(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo// e ma'o bde gshegs snying po las// rang gi rnam rtogs lus kyis sprul// sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang // gnas dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa// bdag dang bdag gis so sor 'dzin// sus kyang
552b3(rgyud 'grel): ma bcings bcings med de// bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin// rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yis// nan gyis mkha' la mdud pa 'dor// nyon mongs 'khor po'i rgya dril nas// byang chub mchog la dgod pa dang // ma 'ongs sangs rgyas
552b4(rgyud 'grel): blo ldan don// bla med ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir// rgyud kyi don bsdus snying po 'di// ma nor btus tI bstan par bya// ri po 'dus pa'i rtse rnams dang // dben pa chen po'i sa phyogs dang // tsan dan+da nag tshal me tog tshul//
552b5(rgyud 'grel): yid 'ong bkra shis sems dga' ba'i// bdag dbang bar chad med pa'i gnas// der ni ting 'dzin bsgom par bya// bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams// ye nas sangs rgyas yin mod kyi// rtog pa'i dbang gis 'a'o/
552b6(rgyud 'grel): ba las// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // skye ba med las thams cad skyes// skyes pa nyid na skye ba med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi
553a1(rgyud 'grel): chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang // 'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag/ 'gag tsam nyid na 'gag pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang //
553a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa med las thams cad gnas// gnas pa nyid na gnas pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang // dmigs pa med las thams cad dmigs// dmigs pa nyid na dmigs
553a3(rgyud 'grel): pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang // 'gro 'ong nyid na 'gro 'od med// bsgrub pa'i gtsor ni ting 'dzin pas// ting 'dzin 'di'is byed par 'gyur// mun la snang 'byung ji bzhi/
553a4(rgyud 'grel): du/ 'gyur bas gser 'gyur sman gyi tshul// rtog pa'i dbang 'gyur ting 'dzin yin// de ltar ting 'dzin rim bzhin sgom// dngos rnams nyid na dngos med pas// rtog pa'i smra bsom yul las 'das// de bzhin nyid dbyings
553a5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes te// de phyir dngos po dngos med do// de bzhin nyid de spros med kyang // rang bzhin kun tu snang ba'i dbyings// sems can rnams la snying rje'i phyir// nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' sgom// dngos po med las dngos
553a6(rgyud 'grel): po sprin// sna tshogs rnam par 'byung zhing 'gyur// bzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni// chos rnams kun gyis rtsa ba yin// sems nyid yi ge rang bzhin de// yi ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin// yi ge'i mchog ni sgom par bya//
553b1(rgyud 'grel): a rab tu brtan 'gyur a dkar las// shin tu phra ba'i a rnams 'phro// phyogs bcu gang par gsal 'gyur nas// byang chub sems su byin brlabs te// bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib med par bstan// de las ming tshogs
553b2(rgyud 'grel): gsal 'bar kun// spyi zhing bsdu ba'ang de bzhin no// 'di ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi// brtan 'byung ye shes rgyu yin no// de las rgyal ba'i bzhugs gnas bsten// dbang chen dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bsgom// e yaM baM su laM raM bruM
553b3(rgyud 'grel): bi shud+d+he// ye shes phyogs pa ni dbus btags te// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub// lhag pa'i ye shes glo 'bur can// rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen por spyod// 'khor
553b4(rgyud 'grel): lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhis brgyan par khyams dang // kun tu gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan// rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtswa gnyis brgyan// seng ge glang chen rta dung khyung // nam
553b5(rgyud 'grel): namakha' lding gi khri tshon la// nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// a ka khA gau g+ha nga// tsa tsha dza d+he nya/ ta tha dA d+ha na/ Ta tha Da b+hA NA/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya wa ra la sha Sha/ sa ha k+Sha/ i I u U e e/ o au// A nyid sna tshogs par
553b6(rgyud 'grel): snang ba'i// ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis// sgra'i ming gis thams cad bsdus// mngon rdzogs rgyal por de nyid nges// de las spro dang bsdus pa yis// so so'i phyag mtshan gsal bar 'gyur// de las phyogs bcur
554a1(rgyud 'grel): rab spros pas// rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs dam bskul// de dgra slar ni 'dus pa dang // hUM badz+ri drig/ A~M dza nI dzig/ sA rat+na drigra/ oM a ro lig/ ha pradz+nyA drigra/ muM d+hA duSh+Ta ri// lam d+h+ye sha ra ti/ mA mo hA
554a2(rgyud 'grel): ti/ paM ra ga ra ti/ taM badz+ra ra ti/ k+Shi hi ra tsa ya/ traM a gar ba ya/ hri ha pad+ma baM d+ha ma/ dza ku ru pa na hI/ hU~M la se saM ma ya s+t+waMr+NatraM ma le sa ma yA ho/ nI gi ra ti ra ho ya haM/ a nar ti ra ga ya mi/ me d+ha ra nai swA hA/ b+h+rUM ni swa raM pa
554a3(rgyud 'grel): ya swA hA/ hUM swa ra tsa ya swA hA/ muM shri aM ra ga ya swA hA/ dza du pa pra be sha/ hUM pus pa a ba sha/ paM di pa su ki ni ho gan de tsa ta ho/ hUM ya mAn+ta krid phaT/ hUM prad dz+nyA ta krid phaT/ hUM pad+man+ta krid phaT/ hUM bi g+ha nen ta kr-id phaT/
554a4(rgyud 'grel): ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro ta shwa ri dz+wa la nI hUM phuT/ oM ma ha rat+na da rA ma hA ke taM shwa ri dz+wa la ni haM phaT/ oM ma ha pad+mo da ra ma ha kro ti shA ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ka ra ma da ra ma hA kro ti shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra tsi ta
554a5(rgyud 'grel): oM/ a a a badz+ra pa tra s+ya ma ya oM/ oM mu ne gring swA hI/ oM mu nI h+yaM trAM swAhA/ oM mu ne s+yai swA hA/ oM mu nai br-i swA hA/ oM mu ni k+Sha swA hA/ oM mu ne ye swA hA// gdan la rdzogs dang sems pa'i tshul// 'khor lo rgyal po
554a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mo dang // g.yas na mthong thos snom pa dang / myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas/ gru chad la ni mthong byeng dang // thos byed myong byed sdom byed rnams// btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas par gnas// bar khyams la
554b1(rgyud 'grel): ni thub pa drug/ mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang // bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan// sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa ni// btsun mo'i tshugs dang ldan par gnas// rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che// pad+ma ral gri dril bu 'bar// ud pal klu shing la
554b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs mtshan// rin chen myu gu rol gyi 'bar// pad+ma dkar po rdo rje 'bar// chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen ste// gzugs mdzes rin chen 'phreng pa dang // pi bang gar mkhan mchog nyid de// me tog 'phreng ba spos mchog dang // ma
554b3(rgyud 'grel): me byug pa la sogs pa'i// las la 'khril zhing chos la bstan// dbu rnams 'byo zhing 'dud pa'i dus// gong gi phyag rgya chen po bzhin// gnyis med dbyings kyi nang du 'khril// sgo bzhi khro bo phyag rgya ni// mi ma go gdengs
554b4(rgyud 'grel): dang rdo rje gnon// thong sbrul chen pos gnon pa dang // rdo rje rgya gram las kyis gnon// lcags sgyu zhags pa po ta ho// sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag kyong // 'dud tshul 'khril pa gong ma bzhini// thub drug phyag rgya sna tshogs
554b5(rgyud 'grel): te/ mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug tu bstan// sreg par dang ni paM byang dang // go cha po ti rin chen sgrom// me drang chu ru rab tu bstan// yum ni dmigs med chos kyi dbyings// kun bzang mnyam gzhag ye shes 'phro// yum
554b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur mnyam rdzogs pad+ma'i dkyil// gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs te// yang na de bzhin gshegs nyid dom// yang ni rdo rje thal mo nyid// mthing gi dkar po ser leb brgan// ljang gu la sogs sna tshogs pa'o//
555a1(rgyud 'grel): mnyen sdug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can// gsal 'tsher lhun stug gzi byin che// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khyil ba ste// mtha' dbus med par khyab pa
555a2(rgyud 'grel): snyed/ dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal pa dang // dbang skur byin brlabs tshul bzhin bya// aM ma hA shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ang ma kaM haM// oM ma hA a ta ri sha dz+nyA na badz+ra saM b+hA ba
555a3(rgyud 'grel): ad ma ko hUM/ oM mya hA sa mAn+ta dz+nyA ni badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ oM mu hA prad+ya ta pra be sha dz+nyA na badz+ra s+ya b+hA pa ad ma ko haM/ oM ma hA k+Shi ta a nu rtan dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM// oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA kaM ya badz+ra swa b+hA
555a4(rgyud 'grel): ba ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA ma bAg badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsi ti badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma k+Sho ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA gu ta ma hA a nu ra ge badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma kaM haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga tI
555a5(rgyud 'grel): ma hA pu tsa badz+ra swa b+hA ba ang maM ko haM// sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can// rin chen dbu rgyan 'phreng ba dang // dpung rgyun sa mo de la sogs// mdzes pa'i rgyun ni sna tshogs kyis// dbang mchog des ni dbang bskur ro//
555a6(rgyud 'grel): de ltar rtog pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang nas kyang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur// sems nyid rtogs pas sangs rgyas te// sangs rgyas gzhan du ma 'chol cig/ dkyil 'khor kun tu rab
555b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// 'di ni gsang chen nges pa yi// 'bras bu lum du gyur pa yi// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la// 'di las gsang ba'i nges don med// btsal kyang rgyal bas mi
555b2(rgyud 'grel): rnyed do// kun ni phyag rgya chen po'i mchog/ ma 'gags rnams pa cir yang smon// 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang // dam tshig bsgrub dang bsgrub pa dang // sgyu dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// phyogs bcu kun tu
555b3(rgyud 'grel): rab grags pa// gsang ba'i snying po las 'phros te// rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di// sde snod kun dang rgyud kun gyi// 'byung gnas bstan la nges par 'bebs// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor spyan drang phyir//
555b4(rgyud 'grel): gsal ldan ma 'am byin rlabs la// stong gsum yungs 'brur bzhug tshul du// dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drang mchod// e h+ya hi b+ha gra bAn mahA ku Ni ka dri sha/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dza hUM baM ho zhes brjod pas//
555b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ma lus 'dus pa dang // sku gsung mnyes par bya ba'i phyir// bstod dang mchod pa tshul bzhin blo// oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa'o// ye shes dkyil 'khor thig le che// bsod nams
555b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor sku'i tshogs// snang stong thog lo kun tu rdzogs ho// oM rdo rje bsod nams thig le che// rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan// rdo rje sgra chen mtha' yas pa// rdo rje rgyal po thig le che ho// rma
556a1(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs kyi rdzogs pa che// yon tan 'phrin las kun tu rdzo gus// ye nas lhun rdzogs kun tu bzang // 'dus pa'i tshogs chen thig le che ho// oM mi dmyigs sgyu 'phrul
556a2(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa'i dbyings// mtha' yas kun nas snang tshogs spro// mtha' yas kun nas lhun gyis thim// sna tshogs sku gsung thugs chen ho// oM phyogs bcu 'jig rten rdul skad du// rgyal ba'i don rnams rdul phran
556a3(rgyud 'grel): skyeng // sprul pa rdul phran bsam yas kyis// skad cig nyid la lhun gyis grub ho// oM thams cad mya lus sku gsung thugs// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che// sku gsung thugs kyis kun tu khyab// sku gsung thugs
556a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi thig le che ho// mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po 'di// sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis// phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas zhing // mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba dang // sna tshogs rin po che'i gzhi// mdzes par bris
556a5(rgyud 'grel): shing spras pa dang // kun 'byung rin chen phung por 'bar// dbyibs legs rdzing bu bro mchog bsil// rin chen khang bu sna tshogs dang // rgyan dang dpag bsam ldan pa'i tshal// glu dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra//
556a6(rgyud 'grel): bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs// do shal dpung rgyan se mo do// bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams dang // rang la mdzes par brgyan pa yi// lha dang lha mo rdul snyed kyi// blo gar la so gaus bsam yas kyis// phyogs
556b1(rgyud 'grel): bsrun mkha'i khams bkang nas// dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par 'bul// skal ldan gsal ba'i khyad par gyis// rims kyis yang nA gcig cur du// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyar zhing // mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen por
556b2(rgyud 'grel): sgom/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// dbang po yul du glang 'gyur ba// thabs dang shes rab ldan 'gyur zhing // mnyam pa'i ngang nyid rtogs gsal na// thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgyu/ bskyed chen 'khor lo'i gzhal
556b3(rgyud 'grel): yas su// thabs dang shes rab thams cad kun// gsal zhing 'od zer 'phro bsgoms na// bskul skyod thams cad phyag rgya yin// 'di ni spyi rgya chen po ste// bla med chen pos 'di skad gsungs// gsang ba de nyid nges pa
556b4(rgyud 'grel): yi/ snying po phyag rgya 'da' ka ba'i// mi skyong nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge/ rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge/ lnga gnyis zung du sbyor ba las// sbyor ba'i phyag rgyu 'byung ba'i rgyu// oM dang muM gnyis rtse sbyar te// 'bru brgyad bsnol te rtse
556b5(rgyud 'grel): spyad pa// rgyal ba'i kun dang many+dzus sbyor ba'i// bde ba chen po sbyin+da pa'i rgyu// 'bru bzhi sgras nAs thugs kar bkon// zla ba tu li 'ab+hU s+thAs dril gi sil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstun// 'bru bzhi sbas
556b6(rgyud 'grel): nas thugs khar bkan// muM gyi rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangos kyis lha// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kan ba kan// oM bsgreng rtse mor 'khor lo 'bar/
557a1(rgyud 'grel): zla btul 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan// 'bru bzhi sbas pas thugs kar bkan// lAm gyi rje mor dril bsil zhing // nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril//
557a2(rgyud 'grel): btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyi lha// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// swa rtse 'bar ba rin po che// zla btul 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan /
557a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi rtse mor dril bsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lha// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// a nI rtse mor pad+ma 'bar// zla btul 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing // 'khril pa'i
557a4(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis chos la bstan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs karA bkan// paM bsgreng rtse mor dril bsil zhing // nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btu de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lha// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar ba kan+da/ haM bsgreng
557a5(rgyud 'grel): rtse mor ral gri 'bar// zla ba tul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril pa'i tshul gyis chos la bstan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs ka raM bkan// taM bsgreng rtse mor dril bsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud
557a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta// de ni rgyal ba thams cad kun// dgyes pa chen po bskyed pa'i phyir// phyag rgya'i mchod pa chen po yis// de la chos sbyin dam pa ni// thog mar bdag nyid rtogs bsgoms sbal// de nas
557b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med blo yis ni// blo ngan sems can snying re rje// gnyis su med par bsgral bar bya// zhing 'gyur mchog dang mchog phan rnams// nyi zla'i dkyil du mkhas pa sdu bzhig/ nga rgyal lag gi 'du byed bsgom//
557b2(rgyud 'grel): hUM du gyur par rnam par dag/ dbyings su thim nas phyag rgyar gsal// skur gyur 'od zer 'phro bar brjod// gtsug tu rnam par rgyal ba bsgom// ngo mtshar ngan 'gror thar pa'i lam// shes rab mchog de byin rlabs nas//
557b3(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab gnyis med po// pad+mo la ni rdo rje zhugs// 'khril pa'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor ba// bdag nyid mnyes pa kun la mchod// ye nas skye med de bzhin nyid// sgyu mar snang ba'i mig yor tshul// sbyor
557b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang // rdul bya tsam yang byas pa med// mnyam pa'i sgrub rdzas chen po bdag/ bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la 'bul// bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bsgo// longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad
557b5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor thim// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i// dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bro gar phyag rgya'i 'phro 'du yis// 'dzul lAm na mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur// glu tshig sgra'i
557b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya yis// chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rgyan dang mgo ba'i phyag rgya yis// 'bar ba'i rgyal po thub med 'grub// bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgya yis// yid sbyin sku dang bdud rtsir 'gyur// A
558a1(rgyud 'grel): li kA lI'i phyag rgya yis// thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// shes 'jug mtshan nyid 'byor pa yis// 'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen// nus mthun can du gang gyur pa// rigs 'dzin rgyal
558a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i zhing du grags// phyogs bcu de bzhin gshegs pa yi// bde bshegs yon tan rmad po che// gzhan na yod pa ma yin na// lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos// rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis// phyag rgya chen po rdzogs 'gyur/
558a3(rgyud 'grel): zhing // gsal ba'i yid gnyis med pas na// dkyil 'khor chen po rab 'bar 'gyur// rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor ba// phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi// bsnyen pa'i dkyil
558a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rab tu rdzogs// nye bar 'gyur ba'i dam tshig mchog/ cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas nas// yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan// sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pas// mo nyams 'jug la rab brtson na// zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gnas/
558a5(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam par 'grub// de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyi// sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ste// ye shes thig le de nyid las ye shes thig le nyid snang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha'
558a6(rgyud 'grel): yas mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa'i zhing // zhing khams rnam dag bsom yas dang // rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang // 'khor lo'i brgyan du rol mo'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun// mthong
558b1(rgyud 'grel): nas nye bar mnyes pa dang // rgyal chen gsung las don 'byung ba// mthun pa'i ye shes rab snang ba'o// gcig dang du mar bral ba yi// mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs te// rang byung ye shes
558b2(rgyud 'grel): snang med snang // dbang mchog dam pa ma thob par// bsgrub kyang cung zad 'grub mi 'gyur// oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che// dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po// dkyil 'khor kun gyi spyad pa
558b3(rgyud 'grel): spyod// slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing // dbang rnams thob par ma byas par// nyen pa las bsdogs rtsom pa rnams// 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur// dbu rgyan cod pan 'grong ba dang // go cha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang
558b4(rgyud 'grel): gdugs dang / buM ba bza' btung dong // snying po lnga yis dbang bskur na// dus 'di phyin cad rgyal ba'i sras// ngan song thams cad med pa dang // tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs// mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur// sangs
558b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyus kun gyis 'grub pa'i gzhi// rdo rje dam tshig chen po ste// bla med mi spang bla ma bkur// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad// yang dag lam du zhugs la byams// gsang ba'i don phyir smra mi bya// de ni rtswa ba lnga rnam
558b6(rgyud 'grel): to// bsgrub dang bsrung ba'i dam tshig mchog/ gti mug chags dang zhe sdang che/ nga rgyal phrag dog mi spong ngo // dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen// dag pa'i snod chu mi 'dor ro// yan lag bcu'i dam tshig ste// ye nas
559a1(rgyud 'grel): dag mnyam rtogs pas spyad// gasbyang zhing bsgrub pa'i dam tshig lnga// rtsa ba yin te rigs med 'gyur// mi spang mi 'dor lnga nyid ni// yan lag dam tshig 'da' ka ba'o// mnyam la mnyam par sbyar ba
559a2(rgyud 'grel): yi// mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na// mnyam rdzogs chen po thob 'gyur bas// 'das na sangs rgyas ma yin no// rtsa ba nyams pa phyal ba dag/ gso la nye bar mi brtson na// skad cig yul tsam smra ma byed// nyams 'gyur nyes
559a3(rgyud 'grel): pa brjod mi ldang // rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams pas na// bsgrub pa thams cad log par 'gyur// yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs pa'i// 'bras bu mi 'drod bzhin du 'du// yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na// 'bras bu med cing ngan song
559a4(rgyud 'grel): lhung // dam tshigs 'di ni rdo rje che// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor/
559a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings// 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum// chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te// byang chub sems ni rdo rje'i tshogs// dbang po yul dus rigs pa'i rnams// kun tu bzang /
559a6(rgyud 'grel): po'i dkyil 'khor la// bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yis// thugs kyi ye shes lnga lta zhing // snying po thig le mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis// ye shes dgyes pa mchod par 'bul// zag pa med pa'i bsod
559b1(rgyud 'grel): nams kyis// ye shes sgyu mar rang snang ba// rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyi dbyings// de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// yang dag don gyi snying po 'di// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du//
559b2(rgyud 'grel): shin tu sbyangs la rab ge nas shing // dkyil 'khor ma lus brnyes pa'i sa// 'bras bu gsang chen 'di yin te// shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis zung // snod ldan dang tshul bzang la bstan// lus dang longs spyod stong la sbyin//
559b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du nams kyang sbyin mi bya// rmongs la byar bar gal te byin// dus med par ni srog zad nas// bsregs dang slebs la yun ring gnas// rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor du// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid la bsdu// hUM
559b4(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes ni rab brjod pas// chos kyi dbyings su thim par 'gyur// de nas snying po dran tsam gyis// phyag rgya chen por gsal 'gyur nas// go sgo mtshams bcad lus bsrungs te// de nas rnal 'byor chen po ste// 'gro sdo de 'dug
559b5(rgyud 'grel): nyal bzhi por ni// srog gi phyir yang myi gtang zhing // spyod lam kun tu ma nyams par// bdag nyid chen por rtag par bsgom// rgyud kyi don las btus pa yi// rin chen dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// ma 'ongs rnal 'byor tham
559b6(rgyud 'grel): cad dang // mtha' yas sems can don gyi phyir// bstan pas bsgrub pa kun byang nas// bla med byang chub thob par shog/ na mo/ rin chen dra ba mngon rdzogs zhes bya ba mthar phyin pa'o// rdzogs so// // de bzhin
560a1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ ye shes rgya mtsho bar ba zab thugs// dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter// rdo rje yid la phyag 'tshal lo// e ma'o bde gshegs snying po las// rang gi rnam rtog las kyis
560a2(rgyud 'grel): sprul// rang 'byung ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir// rgyud kyi don bsdus snying po brtsam// thos bsam bsgom la rab sbyangs pa'i// shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis bzung // snod ldan ngang tshul brtan la bzang // lus dang longs spyod gtong
560a3(rgyud 'grel): la sbyin// slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing // dbang rnams thib par ma byas pararu// nyan pa la sngogs rtsom po rnams// 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur// mnyi ma la snyam par sbyor ba yis// mnyam pa'i dam tshig la
560a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas na// mnyam rdzogs chen po thob 'gyur te// 'das nu sangs rgyas ma yin no// dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang nas kyang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur// sems nyid rtogs pa sangs rgyas pas// spangs
560a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyus gzhan du ma 'tshol cig/ gang gis glang chen myos 'dri si mus// mnyam par bzhag pas btul nas su// sngags dang phyag rgyar rab brtan nas// dngos grub la mtshan chen por 'gyur// dgon pa dben pa'i sa
560a6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su// tsan dan nags dang me tog tshal// yid 'ong bkra shis sems dga' ba'i// rang dbang bar chad med pa'i gnas// bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams// ya nas sangs rgyas yin mod kyang // rtogs pa'i
560b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang gis 'khor bas na// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // skye ba med las thams cad skyes// skyes tsam nyid na skye ba med// 'gag pa med
560b2(rgyud 'grel): las thams cad 'gags// 'gag tsam nyid na 'gag po med// gnas pa med las thams cad gnas// gnas pa nyid na gnas pa med// dmigs pa med la thams cad dmigs// dmigs pa nyid la dmigs
560b3(rgyud 'grel): pa med// 'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong // 'gro 'ong nyid na 'gro 'od med// bsgrub pa'i gtso ni ting 'dzin pas// ting 'dzin 'di yid byed par 'gyur// gser 'gyur sman dang munu sel bzhin// rtog pa'i dbang
560b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ting 'dzin yin// de phyir ting 'dzin rim bzhin sgom// dngos po rnam gnyis dngos med pas// rtog pa smra bsam yul las 'das// de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes te// de phyir dngos po dngos med pa'o// de bzhin
560b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid ni spros med kyang // rang bzhin kun snang gi dbyings// sems can kun la snying brtsi'i phyir// nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' sgom// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin// sems nyid
560b6(rgyud 'grel): yi ge rang bzhin pas// yi ge yid bzhin rin sprin// yi ge'i mchog ni bsgom par bya// a/ rab tu brtan 'gyur a dkar las// shin tu phra ba'i a rnams 'phro// phyogs bcu gang bar gsal gyur nas// bsdus
561a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'phel 'grib med par bstan// de las ming tshogs gsal bar snang // spro zhing sdu ba de bzhin no// 'di ni rdo rje dngos grub grub kyi// brtan 'byung ye shes rgyu yin no// e yaM khaM suM le raM 'bru
561a2(rgyud 'grel): bi sha bi shud de// ye shes phyogs dbus blos brtags te// dkyil 'khor bsam byas lhun grub ni// rdzogs shing rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen por spyod// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas
561a3(rgyud 'grel): lhag pa'i ye shes glo bur can// gru chad bzhis brgyan par 'khyams dang // kun tu gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan// rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis mdzes// seng ge glang chen rta dang khyud
561a4(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' lding gi khri chen las// nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// a ni skye med de bzhin nyid// kla ni thugs kyi ye shes shar// de las cho 'phrul gsum gyis bskyed// kun bzang mnyam gzhag ye shes 'phro// yum 'gyur mnya
561a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pad+mo'i dkyil// phyag rgya chen po'i sku gnyis rdzogs// bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag/ phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che// kun bzang ya nas yin pa'i phyir//
561a6(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab dgyes sbyin las// byang chub sems tshogs rgyu 'khor lo// 'bras bu rgyal po smin 'grub byed// ngo mtshar ming tshigs bzhi bcu gnyis// a/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+nyA nya/ Ta dza DaM b+hU Na/
561b1(rgyud 'grel): tA thA da d+ha na/ pA pha ba b+h+ra ma/ ya wa ra lA/ sha Sha sa ha/ k+Sha i I/ a u/ e ai o au/ a nyid sna tshogs par snang ba'i// ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis// sgra'i ming gis thams cad sdus// mngon rdzogs rgyal por
561b2(rgyud 'grel): de nyid nges// de las rkyen gyi sngags kyis bkul// sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis// drwa ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pa// 'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas kyi// rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'byin pa dam// dbang med rgyu
561b3(rgyud 'grel): rkyen 'tshogs pa'i mthu// de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen rigs// lhun gyis grub par bya ba'i phyir// rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor ba// rang gi ngang tshul der bzung nas// bskul
561b4(rgyud 'grel): tshig 'di yang rab tu brjod// oM ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs// yon tan 'phrin las spyad po che// de nyid du ni bdag sbyor bas// phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// ye shre
561b5(rgyud 'grel): zer gyis lus rtog sbyangs// gser zhun lnga bu'i sems dag las// gsum gyis byin rlabs 'od kyi 'bru// thugs kar thim nas sku yi dbyig/ rdo rje'i lam 'byung yum gyi mkha'// chos sku byang chub sems su gnas
561b6(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams so sor snying po'i sgra// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis sgra byung bas// byang chub sems su cig par thim// de nas snying po dran tsam gyis// a kA gsung gi phyag rgya gnyis// cho ga gsum gyi sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya
562a1(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i sku gnyis rdzogs// 'bru gsum 'bru lnga byin brlabs dbang // rdo rje pad+mor byin rlabs te// hUM lUswA rdo rje rtse lnga oM// pa las pad+ma 'dab brgyad e// rdo rje chags pa tshul bzhin bskul//
562a2(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta A nu ra ga badz+ra swa b+hA ba ang ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ti ma hA su kha badz+ra swa b+hA ba ang ma kau haM// yum gyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro// gzhal yas thig gtab snying
562a3(rgyud 'grel): po dgong // de ltas spro dang bsdu ba yis// thugs kyi phyag rgya bzhi bcu gnyis// de las 'phra mo'i spros bsdus pas// so so'i sngags kyis bskyed cing gdon// hUM badz+ra drig/ muM da du shwa ri/ oM dzA nA dzA ga/ laM d+he shwa ra ti//
562a4(rgyud 'grel): swa rAng na drigr-i/ mAM mo ha ra ti// a a ro lig/ paM ra gau ra ti/ ha prad nya dre gi/ taM badz+ra ra ti// k+Shi hi ra tsar+ra// hUM la se sa ya sto/ traM a garA bA ya// tr-i mA le sa ma ya ste/ hr-i ha hUM pad+ma ma b+he d+ha mA/ hUM gin+ti ra ho haM/ dz+nyAM ku ru pa
