562a5(rgyud 'grel): na tI/ a nir ti ra ga ya mI/ me dAr ya swA hA/ dza du pa pra be sha b+h+r-i swa rA ma ya swA hA/ hUM pus pa A be sha ya/ hUM su ra rtsa sa ma ya/ baM di pa su krI ni/ muM tra aM ra ga yA swA hAM/ ho gAn d+he tsi ta ho/ hUM ya man ti kr-ing phaT
562a6(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra da ra ma hA kro ti shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ hUM prad nya ta krid phaT/ oM rang na dar mahA kr-i ta shwa ra~M dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ hUM pad+ma mAn ta krid phaT/ oM pad ma dar ma ha kro ti shwa ra~M dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ hUM bi ge nan te kr-ing phaH
562b1(rgyud 'grel): oM kar mya da ra mahA kro ti shwa rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badz+rA tsau ta oM/ a a a badz+ra pad+d+ha sa ma ya oM/ oM mu na tAM swA hA/ oM mu ne hUM gr-i swA hA/ oM mu ne suM swA hA/ oM mu na praM swA hA/ oM mu ne k+ka swA hA/ oM mu ne ye swA hA
562b2(rgyud 'grel): gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul// 'khor lo rgyas po rgyal mo dang // g.yas nas mthong thos snom pa dang / myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas// gru chad la ni mthong byed dang // thos byed snom byed myong byed rnam/
562b3(rgyud 'grel): btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas// bar 'khyams la ni thub drug drang // mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang // bya ba dag na gnas par bstan// skye khyud bzhi la 'joms pa ni// btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas//
562b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che// pad+ma ral gri dril bu 'bar// ud pal klu shing la sogs mtshan// rin chen myu gu ral gri 'bar// pad+ma dkar po rdo rje 'byar// chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen ste// gzugs mdzes rin chen
562b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phreng ba dang // pi bang gar mkhan mchog nyid de// me tog 'phreng dang bdug spos mchog/ mar me byug pa la sogs pa'i// las la 'khril zhing chos la bstan// dbu rnams 'byo zhing 'dud pa'i tshul// gong gi phyag
562b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya chen po bzhin// gnyis med dbyings kyi dang du 'khril// sgo bzhi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni// ni mgo gdengs dang rdo rje gnon// thod sbrul chen pos gnon pa dang // rdo rje rgya gram las kyis gnon// lcags sgyu zhags pa
563a1(rgyud 'grel): bo ta ho// sgo ba ni gnas pa de dag kyang // 'dud tshul 'khril ba gong ma bzhin// thung drug phyag rgya sna tshogs te// mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug tu bstan// sreg par dang ni pi bang dang // go cha ba ta ran
563a2(rgyud 'grel): chen sgrom me dang chur ni rab tu bstan// yum ni dmigs med chos kyi dbyings// kun bzang mnyam bzhag ye shos 'phro// yum 'gyur mnyam rdzogs pad+ma'i dkyil// gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs te// yang na de bzhin
563a3(rgyud 'grel): gsheg/ sa nyid dam// yang na rdo rje thal mo nyid// mthing ga dkar po ser leb rgan/ ljang gu la sogs sna tshogs pa// mnyan lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can// gsang mdzes lhun tug gzi byin che// 'od zer 'phra/
563a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i chags tshogs chen po// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrigs pa ste// mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi// dkyil 'khor bsam yis lhun gyis grub// oM ma hA shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra b+hA ba ang ma ko hUM/ oM ma hA b+ha ra sha
563a5(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ oM ma hA pra ta pra be sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma kau haM/ oM ma hA s+ya man ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA pra ad ma ko hi/ oM ma hA kr-i tA a nu ta na dz+nye na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta
563a6(rgyud 'grel): mahA kA ya badz+ra swa b+ha ba ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA bAg badz+ra swa b+ha ba ad ma kaM haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsi ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba ang ma ko haM/ sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga// dbang dang byin rlabs
563b1(rgyud 'grel): kun bsdus thim// dkyil 'khor shin tu gsal bar 'gyur// sa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya byas// rnam grol rim pa thob par 'gyur// dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyangs na// smos ci dgos te de nyid yin// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor
563b2(rgyud 'grel): gsal skyed la// dbang skur byin brlabs rdzogs byas la// stong gsum yungs 'brur 'jug tshul du// dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs mchod// phyo gos dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che// mi dmigs thugs kyi
563b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor las// dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo // rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor ba// phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor ba tu
563b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs// nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog/ UM e h+ya hi b+ha ga bAn+tu mr-i hA kA ru ni ka tI sh+ma ho/ sa mA ya sto/ dzaHhUM bruM ho/ oM badz+ra sa ma yai oM/ aM badz+ra sA ma ya aM/ hUM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ swa badz+ra sa ma ya
563b5(rgyud 'grel): swa/ ha badz+ra sa ma ye ha/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya ste/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya ho// dzaHhUM baM ho// me tog dor la dngos grub gsol// gnyis med thim bzhugs brnyes par bya// sgyu 'phrul dra bas
563b6(rgyud 'grel): mngon rdzogs pa'i// dbang po yul du gang gyur pa// mnyam pa'i ngang nyid rtogs gsal na// thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgya// skyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// thabs dang re shes rab thams
564a1(rgyud 'grel): cad kun// gsal zhing 'od zer 'phro bsgom na// sbrul bskyod thams cad phyag rgya yin// gsang ba'i de nyid nges pa las// snang pa'i phyag rgya bda' dka'o// mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil ye gI/ ran
564a2(rgyud 'grel): chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge/ lnga gnyis zung du spros pa las// sbyar ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu// oM dang muM gnyis rtse sbyor te// 'bru brgyad bsnol te rtse sprad na// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'o// bde ba chen po 'byin pa'i
564a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya/ 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan+da// hUM bsgreng rtse mo rdo rje 'bar// zla gtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril pa'i tshul gyis chos la bstan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// mu bsgreng mau dril
564a4(rgyud 'grel): gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lha// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// aM bsgreng rtse mo 'khor lo 'bar// zla btul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril
564a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkAn// laM bsgreng rtse mo dril gsil zhing // nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyi lha// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar
564a6(rgyud 'grel): bkan// sra bsgreng rtse mo rin chen 'bar// zla btul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril pa'i tshul gyis chos la bstan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// ma~M basbrang rtse mo dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma
564b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lha// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// aM sgreng rtso mo pad+mo 'brar// zla btul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khrul ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan// /
564b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kAr bkan+da// phyi bsgreng rtse mo dril gsilnga 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lha// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// ha bsgreng rtse mo ral gri
564b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bar// zla btul 'bru sgras dril bsil zhing // 'khril pa'i tshul gyis chos la bstan// 'bru bzhi sbas nAs thugs kar ba kan// taM bsgreng rtse mo pad+ma dril gsil zhing // nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud
564b4(rgyud 'grel): de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lha// mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni// sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis// phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas zhing // mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba dang // sna tshogs rin
564b5(rgyud 'grel): po che'i gzhi// mdzes par bris shing spyad pa dang // kun 'byung rin chen phung por 'bar// dbyings legs rdzing bu ro mchog bsil// rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang // rgyan dang dpag bas mi ljon pa'i
564b6(rgyud 'grel): tshal// glu dbyangs tshigs su gcad pa'i sgra// bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs// do shal dpung rgyan se mo do// mdzes pa'i rgyan rnams sna tshogs dang // bza' dang btung ba'i tshogs rnams kyis// rang
565a1(rgyud 'grel): la mdzes par brgyan pa yis// lha dang lha mo rdul snyed kyis// bro gar la sogs bsam yas kyis// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nAs// dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par 'bul//
565a2(rgyud 'grel): skal ldan gsal ba'i khyad par gyis// rim gyis yang na cig car du// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyor zhing // mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom// thog mar bdag nyid rtogs sgoms sbrul// de nas gnyis med
565a3(rgyud 'grel): blo yis ni// blo ngan sems can snying re rje// gnyis su med par sgral bar bya// gsal ldan ma 'am byin brlabs la// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// 'khril pa'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor zhing // bdag nyid mnyes
565a4(rgyud 'grel): par mnyes par bya// mnyam pa'i sgrub rdzas chen po dgra/ bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la dbul// bza' dang bcwa' dang btung ba sgo// longs spyod lnga ldan thams rgyas kyis// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor thim//
565a5(rgyud 'grel): oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi// ye shes dkyil 'khor thig le che// bsod nams dkyil 'khor sku'i tshogs// snang stong thig le kun rdzogs ho// oM rdo rje bsod nams thig le che// rdo rje ye shes dkyil
565a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ldan// rdo rje sgra chen mtha' yas pa// rdo rje rgyal po thig le che ho// oM sku gsung thugs kyi rdzogs pa che// yon tan 'phrin las sku ru rdzogs// ya nas spyan rdzogs kun tu bzang // 'dus pa'i tsho gas chen
565b1(rgyud 'grel): thig le che// ho/ oM mI dmigs sgyu 'phrul mnyam pa'i dbyings// mtha' yas ye nas lhun gyis 'phro// mtha' yas kun nas lhun gyis thim// sna tshogs sku gsung thugs chen po ho// oM phyogs bcu 'jig rten
565b2(rgyud 'grel): rdul snyeng du// rgyal ba'i don rnams rdul phran snyed// sprul pa rdul phran bsam yas kyis// skud cig yud la lhun gyis grub haM// oM thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che// sku
565b3(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs kyis kun tu khyab// sku gsung thugs kyi thig le che ho// sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bre gar 'du 'phro phyag rgya yI// 'dzul lam nam mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur/
565b4(rgyud 'grel): glu tshig sgra'i phyag rgya yis// chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// brgyan dang brago ba'i phyag rgya yi sa// 'bar ba'i rgyal po thub med 'grub// bza' dang btung ba'i phyog rgyu yis// yid bzhin sku dang bdud rtsi 'grub//
565b5(rgyud 'grel): I li kA li'i phyag rgyu yis// thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de'i zlas pa 'phrul chen ni// rnam gsum tshul gyis ma 'khrul bar// sngags zlas 'phro 'du rgyun mi gcad// 'dris gasngal bstan pa
565b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog gis bya// shes 'jug mtshan nyid 'byor pa'i gzungs// 'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen// nus mthu can du gang gyur pa// rigs 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags// bsnyen pa rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor
566a1(rgyud 'grel): kun/ hUM zhes brjod cing thugs kar bsdu// skye med mnyam rdzogs dbyings su bstim// stong pa'i go chas lus bsrung ste// spyod lam kun tu btsal med par// dkyil 'khar ldan pa'i dkyil ma //
566a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba'i// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'gro dang 'dug dang nyal ba dang // ma nyams de'i dbyings na gnas// de yis
566a3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub snying po len// cho ga sngagasna dang yo byad rnams// rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i yo byad kyis// zhag ni sum+b+ha cu phrag drug gam// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// dbang sgyur rigs kyi drim pa 'grub// dri tshe bcu
566a4(rgyud 'grel): drug tshun chad kyis// sku lnga ljin gyis rdzogs pa ni// ye sheso thig la de nyid lo// ye shes thig le nyid snang bas// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi// zhing kham
566a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag gzhal yas dang // rgyu dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang // 'khor lo'i rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad kun// mthong nas nye bar bsnyen pa dang // rgya chen gsung las don 'byung
566a6(rgyud 'grel): ba/ mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang ba'o// gcig dang du ma bral ba yi// mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs te// rang byung ye shes gnas med gnas// phyogs bcu dus bzhi
566b1(rgyud 'grel): mngon rdzogs pa'i// bde gshegs ye shes rmad po che// gzhan nas yod 'ong ma yin te// lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos// rgyud kyi don las sgrub pa'i thabs// rin chen dra ba 'di bsdus pas// bcom ldan
566b2(rgyud 'grel): kun bzang sku gsung thugs// sems can kun+da gyis 'thob par shogs/ dra ba chung ngu rdzogs so// / thams cad dro bo mnyam nyid sku// bdo chen gar dbang sku gsung thugs// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor li'i
566b3(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka la phyog 'tshal te// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud dag las// lha'i rnal 'byor rim pa zhig/ sems can ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir// legs par bsdus te bstan par bya'o// slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing //
566b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang rnams thob par ma byas par// nyan pa la sogs rlom pa rnams// 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur// yi ge sgra btogs ming tshogs la// brten pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon te// khong nas grub sbas
566b5(rgyud 'grel): don 'byin pa// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas// 'di ni gasdang chen nges pa yi// 'bras bu lam du gyur pa yin// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la// de ltas gsang ba'i nges don med// kun gyi phyag
566b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya chen po'i tshogs// thos bsam sgom la rab sbyangs pa'i// shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis bzung // snod ldan dang tshul can la bstan// lus dang longs spyod gtong la sbyin// gzhan du nams kyang sbyin
567a1(rgyud 'grel): mi byang/ rmongs la 'phyar bas gal te byin// dus min par ni srog zad nas// bsregs dang sgribs par yun rings gnas// grang gas glang chen skyo 'dra'i sems// mnyam par gzhag pas gtul nA su
567a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang phyag rgya rab bstan na// dngos grubo ya mtshan chen por 'gyur// dur khrod chen por rab dben pa'i// ri bos bskor ba'i lcug ma dang // me tog 'phreng bas brgyan pa 'am// bde ba'i gnas su 'dug nas ni//
567a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'i dbang gis sdug bsngal zhing // gdug pa srid gsum gdul ba yi// nga rgyal chen po bstan pa'i phyir// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ting 'dzin bsgom// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun
567a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis gsang // skye ba med las thams cad skyes// skyes pa nyid na skye ba med// stong pa nyid du rabA bsil ba'o// snyingarje'i yumya ni bsgom par bya// nges pa las ni rdo rje che// de ltas dpal chen he ru kA/ 'bar ba chen po gA
567a5(rgyud 'grel): dgu yis// 'jigs pa yi ni dus ltar drug/ baM hU~M bi shwa bi shud dA// dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs pa'i// khrag gi rgyu mtsho 'khrugs pa'i dkyil// keng rus chen po ri rab kyi// steng gi 'barU ba'i klong dkyil na// yis
567a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // phyogs bcu rgya yongs ma chad pa'i// phyi dang nang med kun tu snang // 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// gru chad bzhos ni rnam par brgyan// gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan//
567b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i bar 'khyams gnyis kyis mdzes// thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi mas brjid // 'bar ba'i 'phro ba mang po 'khrug/ khyu mchog ma he gzigs dang stag/ gtum pa dom gyi spar bas ni// dbang phyug la sogs lha chen
567b2(rgyud 'grel): bzung // bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag/ khro rgyu la ye nas yin pa'i phyir// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas ni// khro mo dbang phyug mngon phyung ste// haM ho dgyes pa'i gi Ti mdangs
567b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis// rin chen pad+ma rgyas mdzad nas// gnyis med 'khril ba'i dgyes pas bstim// byang chub sems sprin 'phros pa las// hUM hUM hUM/ bi shwa badz+ra kro ta/ dz+wa la man d+hi/ phaT phaT phaT/ ha la ha la hUM/ 'jig rten drug
567b4(rgyud 'grel): gi phyogs bcu dag/ mtha' yas khyab par khro bo yi// dkyil 'khor stong gsum 'jig rten tsam// phyogs bcu'i rdul skyed 'byon por 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen po// dbu dang phyag zhags stong
567b5(rgyud 'grel): khams kyi// rdul skyed mtshon cha 'jigs pa de// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir 'gyur// 'bor chen glong go 'khor lo dkyil// dbang phyug che dang dur khrod ky-i// bdag po dregs po khyo shug gi/ gdan
567b6(rgyud 'grel): la brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// khro bo dkyil 'khor sprin phung yang // dpal ni khrag 'thung chen po dang // rin po che dang pad+ma dang // lus su gyur te phyogs bzhir bzhugs// de kun 'jigs byed chen
568a1(rgyud 'grel): po yi// cha lugs dam pa'i nga ro yis// 'bar ba'i glong na dbu gsum pa// phyag drug zhabs bzhi dri za dang // gnod sbyin srin po gshin rje la sogs pa'i// khyo shug bsnol ba'i gdan
568a2(rgyud 'grel): la bzhugs// btsun mo khrag 'phung chen mo rnams// so so'i sku la 'khril te 'khod// de nas dgyes ti ha brjod pas// byang chub sems kyi sprin dag las// dkar mo'i tshogs dang rkun mAM dang // rmod
568a3(rgyud 'grel): dang ni thal byed ma// spros mo dang ni gtum maM dang // da me sha can dang ma tshogs ma'i// tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang // ngo mtshar chas nas rngam mthon te// 'bar chen 'khor lo'i shar mtsham
568a4(rgyud 'grel): nas// 'khor bar 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis 'khod// de nas dgyes te he brjod pas// seng gdong mA'i tshogs drang nI// stag dang wa dang khyi dang gzhad kr-i ka dur+ya bya 'ug gdong che// tshogs
568a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams rang gi lag cha dang // ngo mun ru dag tu chas nas mthon// 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo yi// phyi rol shar gyi phyogs dag nas// 'khor bar rngam pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod// de nas dgyes
568a6(rgyud 'grel): te phaT brjod pas// rdo rje srid 'gro ma tshogs dang // gdong mi 'jig rten ro langs ma'i// tshogs rnams rang gi lag tsho dang // ngo mtshar chas nas 'jigs lan te// dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir rngam
568b1(rgyud 'grel): gzugasmra nas// dgyes pa'i sbyin lasna phyogs bcu nas// phaT ces grags pas thams cad khros// de nas dpal chen khyo bo'i rigs// lhun gyis grub par bya ba'i phyir// rang gi ngang tshul de bzung la//
568b2(rgyud 'grel): bskul tshig 'di yang rab tu brjod// mo sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni// 'jig rten ma lus thams cad kun// rgyal bu'i gling du sbyor bas ni// phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis
568b3(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i// ye shes gzer gyis lung rtog sbyangs// gser zhun lta bu'i sems dag la// gsum gyi byin brlabs 'od kyi 'bru// thugs kar thim nas sku'i dbyig/ rdo rje laM 'byung yum gyi mkha'// chos
568b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyu byung chub sems kyi gnas// lha rnams so so'i snying po'i sgra// hUM hA he phaT/ ces byung nas// byang chub sems su gcig par thim// de nas snying po dran tsam gyis// gsung gi phyag rgya gnyis rdzogasta nas/
568b5(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba yis// thugs kyi phyag rgya rab tu 'bar// de las 'phro mo'i sku spro bsngo// phyag rgya chen po'i sku gnyis rdzogs// oM ma hA shu n+yA tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ang maM ko haM// oM mahA
568b6(rgyud 'grel): a da ri sha dz+nyA na badz+ra b+hA ba ad ma ko ta// oM ma hA pra ta pra be sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ oM ma hA sa mAn+da dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ oM ma hA kri ta a nu ta na dz+nyA na swa b+ha ba ad ma rkaH
569a1(rgyud 'grel): oM sar+b+ba tA thA ga d+hA ma hA kA ya s+yA b+hA ba ad mya kro ha~M/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA g+hA tA mA hA bAg badz+rA swa b+hA ba ad mA kro hA/ oM s+yArba twA thA ga tA ma hA n+yai tA badz+ra s+yA b+hA ba Ad ma kau hA/ oM sUrba tA thA gau ta ma/
569a2(rgyud 'grel): hA a nu ra ga badz+ra swa b+hA bya ad mA ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pU tsa badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad mA ko haM/ rdo NAM pad+mar byin brlabs pa// hUM las rdo rje rtso lnga pra// ba lAs pad+mor gyur pa'i dbus// ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
569a3(rgyud 'grel): bsam// shA ta pa la sogs pa yis// bskul ba dag kyang tshul bzhin bya// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen po// bsgrub pa dang ni bsgrub chen po// yum gyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro// sangs
569a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus la// dgyes mnyam mchog gi sbyin pas bstim// de las dkyil 'khor gsal bar dgod// oM oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA shri he ru ka ma tsam d+ha sarba du sh+tsan ta kau ha na da ha pa tsi hUM hUM hUM
569a5(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsan+d+ra d+hA sarba dushAn/ ta ka ha na drA hA pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT// oM rat+na ma hA shrI he ru ka/ ma hA tsAn+da d+hA sarba du Sh+TAn+ta ta ka na d+hA he pa tsa hrI hUM hUM phaT/ oM pad+me ma hA shrI ha ru ka/ ma hA tse ni
569a6(rgyud 'grel): d+ha sarba du stan// ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ a~M karma ma hA shrI he ru ka mi hI tsan d+ha sarba dub+han ta ka he na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kro to shwa ri sarba dustin hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA
569b1(rgyud 'grel): kro ti shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM ma hA su r+ya rat+na ma hA kro ti shwa ri bi da ma hUM phaT/ oM hri shwa tA sa mA ya/ ma hA kro ti shwa ri ka'i hUM phaT/ oM sarba a mo ka ma hA kro ti shwa ri bi shwa hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ke'u ri ha/ badz+ra tsi'u ri ha/
569b2(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra pra mo ha/ badz+ra bai ta li ha/ badz+ra pu ka siM ha/ badz+ra ka sa ma hI ha/ badz+ra tsan d+ha li ha/ oM badz+ra sing ha mu kaM he/ badz+re bya gri su gra te/ badz+ra si la mu ka he/ badz+ra sh+lo na mu ka haM/ badz+ra kri ta mu ka he/ badz+ra kang ka mu ka he/
569b3(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra khA kha mu kha haM/ badz+ra a lu ka mu kA hwe/ au bad+d+ha ar+yA te dza te da dza/ badz+rA a mu ka hUM/ badz+re lo ga bi/ badz+rI pa smr-i pi la yaM ti ho// / b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo dz+ha b+h+yo Sh+To/ b+h+yAM b+h+yo d+ho b+h+yo b+h+yAM b+h+yo/ dz+yAdz+hats+tsha D+hAb+h+yAM b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+hU b+h+yAM b+h+yo b+h+yo/
569b4(rgyud 'grel): sa la sogs la phyag rgya byas/ rnam grol rim pa thob par 'gyur// dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyangs na// smos ci dgos te de nyid yin// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid rmi/ mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor los/
569b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drung ngo // snang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor bas// phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// nye bar
569b6(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hU~M/ e h+ye hi a na ya badz+ra dzaHhUM baM ho/ ho raM/ oM badz+ra kro ti sa ma ya hU~M/ oM khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa// thugs rje khro dpal rngam pa'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i
570a1(rgyud 'grel): byin rlabs rmad po che// da nyid du ni bdag la gsol// oM badz+ra kro ta sa ma ya sto// oM badz+ra kro ta sa ma ya phaT// oM badz+ra kro ta sa ma ya ho// a li u li tA la ta pa te// taM stau kho go
570a2(rgyud 'grel): na// ro ti kha raM yo gi ni kha hiM hUM ha hi phaT// smug nag sngo nag ser nag dang // dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i sku// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// ko rlon gos ni sna tshogs gon// rngam pa'i
570a3(rgyud 'grel): sgra chen 'jigs par bsgrogs// sbrul dang thod rlon nyi zlar bcas// stong gi 'jigs rten 'khor yug bcas// rdo rje dung chen gung ba dang // ral gri dgra sta ga shol la sogs// ring gi lag cha sna tshogs dang // /
570a4(rgyud 'grel): btsun mo 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang 'khril// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang // sgo bzhi'i phyag rgya rab mdzes shing // slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs// bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes// rang gi stan dang
570a5(rgyud 'grel): lag cha dang // ci bgyi zhes te chas te gnas// de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal bkod nas// mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar snang // hUM
570a6(rgyud 'grel): gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar// 'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi// khro gnyer glog stong 'gyur ba bzhin// mche ba zang yag za byed che he// hU~M rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir// tug chen ri rab 'bum snyil
570b1(rgyud 'grel): skad a a ha la'i gang rgyangs che// dpyugs pa'i thor rlung g.yeng ba che ho// hUM ra khros pa'i shes rab 'od po che// ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal// 'bar ba'i ye shes kun tu 'joms// sna tshogs ye shes
570b2(rgyud 'grel): thig le ho// hUM khros pa'i rgyal po sprin chen po// khros pi rgyal po char chen 'bebs// dkyil yid bzhin lhung bI gut+ta ra// sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le che ho// hU~M bdud kun gyi ni bdud chen po// bdud kyi bdud de bdud rnams 'joms//
570b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs par byed// 'jigs byed chen po'i thig le che ho// hUM rdo rje brag chen sra ba'o// rdo rje chu bo bdud chen po// rdo dz+r-IM me ste kun 'bar tshe// rdo rje rlung chen thor rlung che ho// yan lag ma nyams/
570b4(rgyud 'grel): yo byad lhun// cho ga rdzogs par shes pa yi// rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// nges par legs pa'i dgos pa 'grub// khro bo khro mo'i tshogs chen po// pha nye phyag nyan bka' nyan tshogs// ci bgyi las
570b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs tshogs rnams kyis// dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par byed// de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad kun// rang gri snying gur bsdu ba ni// hUM hUM zhes ni rAb brjod nas// 'dus pa de nyid ci bder spyod// de
570b6(rgyud 'grel): ltar dkyil 'khor bsdus nas kyang // rnal 'byor bdag nyid chen po yis// spyod lam kun tu ma nyams shing // lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom// phung po lnga nyid khro rgyal gtso// chen po lnga nyid dbang phyug yum//
571a1(rgyud 'grel): skye mchod khams rnams myu lus kun// thugs rje rnam pa'i dkyil 'khar tshogs// rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul// byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum par// rab tu rtogs pa rnams bzhi
571a2(rgyud 'grel): yis/ thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che ho// phyogs byucu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi// sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs// ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba// dbang sgyur mchog nyid dam pa yin// sgrub pa'i thabs
571a3(rgyud 'grel): thabs 'di bsdus pa yis// bsod nams bdag gis gang thob pa// dpal chen kun bzang sku gsung thugs// sems can kun gyis thob par shog/ de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa brgyan rdzogs so// / dpal
571a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi dpal gsum nyid ldan rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes 'dus ma byas// ma btsal lnga rdzogs skyon bral mi shigs dbyangs nyid ye shes 'du 'bral med// lnga yis grub nyid gnyis med dang gsal mi g.yo mi sems sems
571a5(rgyud 'grel): chen po// 'phrin las bzhi bcom dpa' bo rang nyid lha'i lha la gnyis med mos// gsang ba'i bdag po mngon gshegs gnas// lha klu gnod sbyin sbyin po dang / mi las skal ldan 'dus pa la/ dbang pos ji ltar
571a6(rgyud 'grel): lung bstan dus// rgyal bu rigs can ltas shar ba// 'brel pa snang la mngon brtags pas// thugs kyi sgrub pa mngon rtogs te// de nyid sgo nas de nyid grub// bstan pa'i dngos grub de nas thob/ don dam
571b1(rgyud 'grel): bcud kyis des rgyas// 'dod pa'i bsams pa de ru 'grub// smon pa'i lha dang de ru mjal// de nas rdo rje gdan stengs kyi// mdzam gling shar gyi phyogs mtshams su// pho brang dam pa rin chen nang // bkra shis dam pa'i
571b2(rgyud 'grel): khang pa ru// ku ku ra tsa in+d+ra tra po ti dang // si nga u pa ra tsa dang // sras mo 'go mu sa la sogs// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dbang thob nas// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon bsgrubs te// rdo rje 'chang sngar mngon du gshegs//
571b3(rgyud 'grel): de phyir sangs rgyas mtshan thob ngas// dam pa'i rigs can dra ma dang // de rjes ma 'ongs skal ldan phyir// snying phrag brgya'i rgyud dag las// gshegs shul lam mchog 'drir bsdus te// snyigs ma'i rgyud drag
571b4(rgyud 'grel): dus kyi tshe// dus kyi 'du la phyir bstan par bya'o// spyan bzangs 'gro mthu med pa yis// dmigs bu bral ba'i nyams stor bas// 'grod cing phyin par ma nus bzhin// rtsing po rmad god rang nyams kyis// gsang/
571b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i snying por mi 'gyur te// bud shing me tog 'bras bzhin 'gyur// de bas bla ma lung bzhin bskur// brtag spyo zhe gcod bzod bya ste// mthong ba'i gdung bu khu mi lta// de kun yum gyi don du bzod// dka' bas
571b6(rgyud 'grel): bsten na rdo rje rgyal// nyams snang mthong zer thob 'gyur te// de tshe rgyud chen gzhung gi yon// phul na thugs kyi nying khu ster// de yis bzhon pa bzang 'gro bzhin// gsang ba'i rdzu 'phrul stobs zhon pas// mthong
572a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jug mthar phyin bzhi bslong nas// ye shes snying po'i gnas su phyin// de bas rdo rje gnyer ldan pas// rgyang drung sems smra mkha' 'gro yi// gsang sngags ltas ston spro ba yis// ci nas
572a2(rgyud 'grel): brtags te bzang ldan na// mi ldog brtan byas rtas pa yi// shi sha gang yin lag tu gtang // ngan pa'i ltas mthing mngon shes pas// 'dod pa 'phro mo'i rgyur byed dang // kha dang grags pa che ba'i rgyu/
572a3(rgyud 'grel): byed cing bcud chen 'dzag dang 'gro/ ma chags ma rungs byed pa dang // zang zing mtha' gtong dbus 'ching dang // g.yon can ngo dga' lhag spyad skur// lkog na rang dgar byed pa dang // ngag la rigs nges
572a4(rgyud 'grel): bsams mi nges// bud med 'dod pas phyal pa drang // mun lkog phrad par 'dod spyod snyeg/ pho mo gtang trar ma sngags la// skal par dri bzhin 'khor 'gyur yang // thugs kyi bde ba spro mi bya// 'tshams/
572a5(rgyud 'grel): bar skur bstan gcan 'phran bzhin// de men be sbrel g.yang 'gyur bzhin// 'dod khaMs 'phrogs shing bcas 'phyar bas// mya gtogs spros na dur khrod gling // brgyad kyi mkha' 'gro bzhi ni 'dus nas//
572a6(rgyud 'grel): sha za srog la 'bebs shing lhung // de ltar brtags pa'i skal ldan phyir// rang bzhin ye shes rang gnas dang // der mthong der 'jug rnal 'byor bzhi// bar chad med bsgrub rnam par smin// sras
572b1(rgyud 'grel): sgyur phyag rgya lhun grub lam// mngon byas rim pa brjod par bya// de la dang po nyid spros pas// de nyid de yis shes bya ba// phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rang bzhin 'dri// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid// 'khor ba
572b2(rgyud 'grel): sems phyir bdag med pas// de phyir bzhin gshegs bsam yas// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs phyir// mya ngan 'das pa yod ma yin// de ltar rigs dang rgyud med par// byang chub mchog gi ngo bo
572b3(rgyud 'grel): la/ so so'i rang bzhin nges shes na// yang dag lam gyis bcos su med// yang dag gshegs dang log rtog gnyis// ngo bo nyid kyi sku gnas gyur na// de la bcos shing bsgyur du med// 'ching bu rin chen
572b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin mi rigs// de bas de lta 'di bzhin pas// ma rig log rtogs zhugs pa'i rgyus// las dang nyon mongs rgyu rkyen gyis// bcu gnyis 'khor lo gnas su sbyar// rten dang 'dod pa tha dad pa'i// bde
572b5(rgyud 'grel): sdug gdung pas nyam thag bral// rtsom med bzhi dus kun du nyams// rang bzhin nyid las nyam sa pa med// de lta'ang rgyal po phru gur 'khyams// de bzhin rigs la 'gyur med pas// shul daMn+da rang las gzhan med phyir// 'phrul dga'i
572b6(rgyud 'grel): tshul gzhan tha dad zer du min// de'ang rnams rnams gnas tshul gzhag/ 'bru lnga gnas pa'i thabs chen po// 'gro ba kun la rang gnas te// dkyil 'khor bzhi dang srog shing gsum// gnas na ke
573a1(rgyud 'grel): la sgra dbyangs ldan// e baM ma ya mkhrab ldan dang // snying po rlung sgrom granas na yod// de yid tA nu tA 'byin par byed// de don de nA chos nyid dang // ye shes yon tan las nyid dngos// rnal 'byor
573a2(rgyud 'grel): lam rim rang bzhin ldan// snod kyi 'od dbyibs 'phrin las bzhi// thig le bsnyen bsgrub rang bzhin ldan// bzhi brgyad kr-i re me rol// ra ya g.yas g.yon sbyin sreg ldan// gnas bzhi 'byung ba las bzhi ste// gsang ba'i
573a3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la rang bzhin ldan// gnas rten rtswa dang thig le la// bcu dbang lnga gsum dbang rnams ldan// gsang ba nang gi 'dod yon dang // dam rdzas lnga ldan mchod pa ste// de dag rang gnas mi 'du ba// rang bzhin gsang ba'i
573a4(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya// rang bzhin phyi nang gsang ba yi// 'du byed sprod pa dang gi gnas// chags pas 'khams 'grub cig shes kyi// rang bzhin ye shes 'grub byid pa'o// rdo rje phung po yan lag kun// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skur
573a5(rgyud 'grel): glags sogs// dngos kun chags dang ngang tshul gyis// las dang ngo bo 'bras bur gnas// chu zla rgyu ma sprul pa bzhin// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// bzhi rdzo gas phyag rgya ma 'dres gas ga// cir yang 'gyur zhing
573a6(rgyud 'grel): cir yang 'grub// bar ma lam dang 'bra sdu rnams// gang yang rigs rgyud rtag med pas// sems phyir kun kyang de de dang // gzugs gnyis mtshan gsum yod dang med// gnas ris sde cha yod min sogs// gnyis
573b1(rgyud 'grel): yul bral bzhin de ldan pa'i// don mchog lhu 'bras ye shes dbyings// bdun dang gsum phyir don dam la// dpag bsam shing dang rin chen ltar// de kun ngo bo nyid rgyur gnas// 'jig rten brtan g.yo la sogs pa// snang
573b2(rgyud 'grel): ba nyid na ngo bo med// de nyid chos sku chen po yin// rang bzhin dong gis de ltar gnas// ngo las gzhan pa'i thob bya med// kun kyang smin zin bgrod pa med// de nyid lam gyi'ang ngo bo ste// 'jug gnas 'byin pas che ba yin// /
573b3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad la// rang 'byung chen pos kun tu khyab// rang 'byung de nyid dngos med par// kun gyi phyag rgya'i rgyu yin phyir// de lta bu'i drung du nges// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te// thabs kyi phyag rgya
573b4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi rgyu// ming grangs med pa'i rgyu nyid dang // yongs su rdzogs pa zhes kyang brjod// gsum pa dngos por zhen pa'i// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba'i chos// ye nas rigs rgyud rtag min pas// so so'i gzugs smra
573b5(rgyud 'grel): dri re reg/ chos kyi bye brag tha snyad kun// 'dza' snang mkha' ltar ma 'dres shig/ 'dus ma byas pas 'dus byas snang // 'dus byas snang ba rdo rje nyid// rgyas 'gros ma mdzad ma bcos pas// rang bzhin rang gis dbyer
573b6(rgyud 'grel): med pa'ang // de mon zhen pas sgrol phyir las// ji snyad gnyis par bsam brjod 'dis// yul dang shes por snang ba yang // rong 'i byung yi shes rang snang zad// rgyu 'bras snang yang gnyis pa med// phyi nang gsol
574a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'ang nang nyid dang // de ltar ye shes rang snang ba// lam dang 'brasdu kun dngos pas// 'brel pa bdag phyir thabs chen pos// mngon byed rang las 'byung bar zad// shes rang la gnas pa'i le
574a2(rgyud 'grel): skye dang po'o// lhun grub dang la phyag btsal nas// dang por lam mchog shad par bya// gang dag rang gnas mthong 'dod dgoso// dus snad rgyu sbyin thabs grangs dngas spyod yon drod rtags tshad drung sgron// yan lag spros
574a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rtsa bar gzhag/ bsam gyis mi khyab ma mthong bar// bsam med dkyil 'khor 'jug byed pa// blun po mun sbrul blo can de// long ba'i grong khyer chen por 'gro// de bas mo rigs gri ling thog dmigs// ldongs pa rdo rje
574a4(rgyud 'grel): thur ma mkhan// mnyes thob sngon byas gzhung thos pas// spyan phye dkyil 'khor mthong bya dgos// de yang rang bzhin sbyangs pa yis// snod du gyur pa'i nye ring phyir// rims dang cig car ba ni cha yis// phyi bas rnal
574a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byor chen por 'jug/ bskal pa zhing gI rdul skyed du// shin tu sbyangs la rab gnas pa'i// shes rab mi wan+d+ra 'didor 'jug phyir// ring ba'ang rims dang cig car pa'o// snga ma bAng tAn+ta tra gAzhung nyid las// sa rnams
574a6(rgyud 'grel): khyad par bskong ba yang // gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam// theg pa bzhi'i nges 'byung la// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas// lam stegs sngon du rdzogs par sbyor// de phyir ma nges rigs mchog nas// mun
574b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i shes pa pa ste gnyer// rang bzhin sgyu yis smyung bar gnas// phal pa'i sems brgyad mthar gnas tshe// snying po rang bzhin mtshungs pa dang // gshes gnyen mgon la lung gnyis thos// yon tan mthong dang skyon
574b2(rgyud 'grel): mthong dang // kyis zer de yis skyon rmongs brod de nga ba// gnyis pa'i skyu ru gsungs pa yin// de bdag gsang tshogs dmigs pa ste// skad cig 'phel ba de ma thag/ drug las rtsa me bzhin g.yos ste// bzhi'i thog pa
574b3(rgyud 'grel): dang por zhog/ bdon zer de nas rims bzhin bgrod bya ste// rgyu nas rkyen gyis 'phar ba de dang zer// rnal 'byor rgyud la gnas pa la// 'di ston mgon la lung thos pas// de ji bzhin du gnyis dang bzhis// mchog gi
574b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yo ba'i sems 'byung 'gyur// bzhi des khong du chud smos pas// lhag par gzugs brnyan 'jug par byed// mchog gi dam tshig de ru byin// rigs nges gyur la phan pa bcu// nus pa gnyis kyi byin brlabs
574b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhag/ rang gi spyan mchog byed pa brtson// rgyu'i dkyil 'khor mthong bya'i phyir// thos bsam dam pa len par byed// kha cig dus mtha'i cig car pa// bskal pa rdul snying sngon sing nas// thun mong de rnyed sbyangs
574b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mtha'// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i don zhugs pa'ang // sngon byas 'di che nges 'byung ba// rims kyis sbyangs la cig car drod// la la dbang po rno ba dag/ theg pa chen po gnyis 'jug ste// ma sbyangs sgrub pa gsum phyir gyi// /
575a1(rgyud 'grel): mtho brtan myur rno rgya che yang // zab mo sgyu'i gang zag de// nyid kyang rkyen dang de rims pas// phye bas rgyu 'bras chen po rnams// ma nges 'jug dang 'di nyid do// de de'ang rang sems brtan pa'i dngos//
575a2(rgyud 'grel): bshes gnyen rnams dang ngo bos 'brel// de ltar bya byed snod bcud du// chen po'i lung dang 'brel pa dang // mgon dang bya byed thugs rjes 'brel// de phyir mchog lung rdo rje rnams// dang 'byul byed phyir rgyu rkyen drug/ ldan pas
575a3(rgyud 'grel): ma nges 'jug pa ni// dbang po ji bzhin myos rkyen gyis// rgyu 'am bya ba 'am gnyis ka'o// rnal 'byor theg par sbyor bar byed// de nas de bzhin 'dir 'jug pa'ang // spyan bzhin g.yo smon 'jug sems sbyor// gnas pas
575a4(rgyud 'grel): mthar phyin byed pas ni// ltos pa ring ba'i dus nyid do// ma nges so nas 'brel rgyu rkyen// ldan pa ste rnal 'byor mchog sbyor ba// mun pa'i zer tshul rtsa ma bzhin// g.yo slon 'jug pa sngon bzhin te// bdud ljon pa 'ang tan
575a5(rgyud 'grel): tA yIn// gzhung gi ngang tshul rang bzhin sogs// snod yon ldan pa brlabs pa la// gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru// 'jug pa bzhi'i yan lag mchog/ dang po nod du gnyen byed// gang de thos pas tshol
575a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'o tshe// rgyud gnyis rkyen gyis bzod thob pas// rang bzhin rang gis bzod thob pa// res smon sems kyis nyan rtson sbyor// gang dag mnyan bsam shes rab tshe// nyan cing thos 'dzin bsam pa dang // bsam pa'i
575b1(rgyud 'grel): tshe na stag spyod pa// gnyis po 'di dag shes pa'i rgyu// mkhan po lung dang man ngag bcas// lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen du 'dod// rang bzhin bdud dang mtshungs ldan pa// cig shes rgyu ru nges pa yin// de ltar ldan pas spyan chol tshe// /
575b2(rgyud 'grel): gtan tshigs rnams kyis sprul byas te// nor pa'i shes rab dmigs gsal nus// ma nor dmigs nas blang bar bya// gzhi dang gtan tshigs grub pa'i don// rnam gsum lta ba'i bzhi ro gzhug/ yang dgra rdzogs sangs
575b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas ston pa// sku lha 'dul ba'i 'khor rnams la// gsung lngas bstan pa de kho na// gtan pa phebs shing gzhan byed pa'o// de nyid dngos lnga tshul dang tshig/ brjod pa lngas mtshon byung ba bzhi// de la gtan tshigs dngos
575b4(rgyud 'grel): lnga yis// brda' sprid rjes su 'jug pa bstan pa'ang // bsregs bcad brdar ba'i gser bzhin du// dngos lngas legs par btags te dbab// de yang yongs su brtags bzhi'o// dbang po yul dang snang ba kun//
575b5(rgyud 'grel): yul rnams yod pa ma yin te// kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyid// dngos po sna tshogs par snang bas// 'khor dang 'das dngos zhe sdang brtag/ 'jig rten 'di na ci yod pa'i// ming dang mtshan mar 'dzin pa yi// log
575b6(rgyud 'grel): rtag so so rang spyi'i mtshan// ji ltar gnas par spyad par bya// dngos mnyes zhin dngos dus gsum chos// skad cig gcig la kun rdzogs phyir// de dngos mthong ba yang dag par// rigs bzhi kun kyang de ltar shes/
576a1(rgyud 'grel): kun brtags shes pa bar mar 'gyur// spyi'i yul lus med grib ma bzhin// med pas mi btub rang nyid la// mi btub mdzub mo bzhin dogs pa// gnyen po med pa dag min zhing // bar
576a2(rgyud 'grel): ma'i yul phyir nges tshig 'grub// de ltar lnga yis de de la// de de'i rang bzhin brtag bya ba'ang // rtog dang ldan pa'i mi rnams la// dngos po sna tshogs sems gsung sngags// de lu yan phyir chos tshur ston// brjod dang /
576a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dra bar brjo sprod pas// ngo bo nyid kyis bshad pa'i phyir// ma 'ongs don du gtan tshigs nges// yod ni skye gnas mi ldan pa// rang bzhin shugs kyis skye snyed don// ma btsal ngang gis snang byed pa// brjod med de nyid
576a4(rgyud 'grel): brjod dang 'dra// gang dag gzugs dang rnal 'byor gyis// mthong thos la sogs rang bzhin brda'// dpa' bo brda' dang dgongs pa dang // rang gi ting 'dzin gyis brda' spyod// dper ni sau 'og gla ser rlangs dang //
576a5(rgyud 'grel): me long nyi ma'i rang bzhin du// kun kyang rig phyir rang bzhin drong // rang bzhin dang gis brjod 'drar snang // kun kyang brag ca'i sku bzhin phyir// grag stong dbyer med rdo rje gsung // sgra thos nyid kyis de nyid du/
576a6(rgyud 'grel): so sor ma brtags 'jal bar byed// so so'i skad du brda' sprod ltar// tshig sbyangs med pa'i ngag lci bu// mos spyod grol bzhin brjod pa yis// brda sprod yongs su grol bar byed// dang po rgyud la
576b1(rgyud 'grel): dang phyir// gad mos grol b+ha yod mod kyang // thos bsam sgom pa'i mnyam sbyor zhing // rang 'byung kun ngam sgrub byed phyir// myi dmigs dang lus dmigs pa'i// chos 'phrul tshigs gis mtshon par bya// gsung lnga thon/
576b2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma tshul yang // rjes su tshig gis mtshon par bya// ngo bo snang tshig rang snang tshig/ ldem dgongs chog dang bkr-i drong rgyud// 'dod rkyen tshig dang rdo rje tshig/ rang rig mngon gus la tshig gis mtshon// thams cad gsang smrab
576b3(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo'i phyir// mtha' dbus med pa de bzhin nyid// dbyer med ngang du gnas pa la// ye shes rtogs pa'i don bya'i phyir// phyogs dang dbus su gnas par bya// kun la de bzhin sbyor bar gyis// yi ge tshig dang sgras spangs
576b4(rgyud 'grel): nga'i// brjod med dang du gnas pa ni// gsung nyid rang bzhin med pa yi// chos rnams thams cad ya nas dag/ thams cad thugs su gyur pas na// sgra dang tshig le gnas pa min// 'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun//
576b5(rgyud 'grel): yang drug shes pas rab brtags nus// rang bzhin med par cir yang snang // snang ba nyid na dbyings yin te// de ltar rtogs pa'i ye shes ni// kun la dbang sgyur rang dbang can// thams cad tshig gi sgra ltar gnas//
576b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni ye shes gsung mchog yin// chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ste// mtha' dang dbus med kun tu khyab// khyab dang khyab med rdo rje sku// sgra skad sna tshogs sgrags pa yang // dngos po med las dngos po'i
577a1(rgyud 'grel): swA/ ji ltar pri bang lag thog pa na// sgra ni sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur yang // dngos po myed de de bzhin nyid// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams la// de bzhin gsung mchog mi smra ste// sku yis
577a2(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams 'jal bar sten// me long bzhin du sku la snang // chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// ming dang tshig tu brtags nus ston// ji snyed mang po'i don brjod kyang // rdo rje'i gsung la spros pa med// spros med
577a3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid sna tshogs pa'i// kun la brda 'jal ye shes gsung // sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das// thams cad pad+ma chags med pa'o// dbang po rnam gnyis bsrungs pa yis// mkha' la nyi zla dus gcig 'char// mi 'jigs//
577a4(rgyud 'grel): tshul du zil mnan mthong // de phyir gtan tshigs las las brjod// de lta mod kyang bsdu nu gnyis// bzhi rjes mi dpyod cig rjes dpyod// rnam gnyis tshul gyis mthong bar byed// dbang po gnyis dang mthun sbyar ba'o// de la
577a5(rgyud 'grel): snga mas go bya ba'ang // sems can ma lus thams cad kun// ye nas byang chub snying por gnas// de phyir dpyad pa'i bya byed med// tshig dang yi ger mi mtshon te// sangs rgyas kyis kyang rnyed par dkru'o// rgyal ba'i
577a6(rgyud 'grel): sras po cang mi gsung // ma gsungs pa nyid rgya cher bshad// bshad dang nyan pa gnyis ka med// dpyod pa zhugs na rtog pa'i gzhi// rtog pa zhugs na dmigs pa'i rten// dmigs pa zhugs na 'dzin pa'i gzungs//
577b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pas zin phyir grol mi 'gyur// de bas gser lha gsar bzhin du// bdag phyir bya byed ma dmigs pas// rtog dpyod dmigs 'dzin mi tshol ba// de brjod nyid kyis de nyid mthong // sus kyang ma bcings bcings med de//
577b2(rgyud 'grel): bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin// bcangs med rnam par grol med pas// grol bar mi 'dod bcings dang bral// so sor gang la rtog med pas// so sor snang ba kun rtogs phyir// so sor rtogs pa'i mchog yin te// brtags pa
577b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i blo dgas yin// kha cig phyi mas grol byed pa// brjod pa'i dngos po spyod yul la// so sor rtog pa gtan tshigs rkyen// don dang mthun dang mi mthun pa// phyi ma mi mthun mtshon byed lhar// chos kun mtha'
577b4(rgyud 'grel): las 'das pa las// mtha' rnams gang yang dror med pas// 'di ltar 'di'i zhes bstan med// rang gi ngo bo bstan par dka'// 'on kyang yin min 'dzin grol phyir// mdor na ji ltar brtags bsams bzhin// 'gyur/
577b5(rgyud 'grel): bas kun gyis ngo bor snang // de mtshon ci yang yin pa'i phyir// sems chos ni yang ma yin no// de phyir ma yin kun yin pas// ci yang yin no lhun gyis grub// mtha' kun phyogs su ma chad phyir// mtha' dang bral
577b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir ma bral ba'o// gang yang ma spangs mi ldan pas// ma dral phyir na bral zhes bya// ngo bos phebs pas rgyas par 'gyur// cig shos mthun par bstan pa'ang // bye brag bsdus pa kun khyab ga sum// de ltar
578a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bsam yas pa// cha tsam brjod pa 'di lta mod// chos rnams yongs kyis dag pa yi// rnam bzhi'i tshul gyis don rtogs mngon// snod bcud rgyud rnams dag rtogs shing // mnyam nyid lhag pa'i
578a2(rgyud 'grel): mnyam nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor kun tu bzang po'i zhing // rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul// byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum pa// rab tu rtogs pa rnam bzhi yis// thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che// nyid las
578a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang sgyur nyid spyod phyir// bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyun// rnam dag bla med theg pa'i mchog/ 'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun// yang dag shes pas rab rtags nas// rang bzhin med las cir yang snang // snang ba
578a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid na dbyings nyid yin// gshegs sku sgras sna pa k+to sgyu mar snang ba gnyis// bzhi rtsa med de rang bzhin stong // rigs dang rgyud du rtag tu med// rigs dang kha dog dbyibs med las// phyi nang snong bcud thams cad snang // snang ba nyid/
578a5(rgyud 'grel): na chos kyis sku// cir yang 'gyur zhing thams cad grub// nyon mongs rang dang spyi bstan pa// mtshan nyid ma nor don rtogs na// rnam par byang ba'i lam du 'gyur// de phyir rang spyi'i gtan tshigs zhus// mitha' dang dbus
578a6(rgyud 'grel): med du mar bral// gang yang ma yin de bzhin nyid// dbyer med pa'i tshul rtogs phyir// mtha' dang bral ba'ang de bzhin no// 'byung ba chen po lnga rnams la// rang bzhin mang por gzhig bya'i phyir// gcig la yang
578b1(rgyud 'grel): lnga lngar dbye bya zhing // muM gyi dbyings su thim par bya// mu nyid sgra bsam yul las 'das// nam mkha' bzung du med pa ltar// snang srid thams cad de dang 'dra// rten sa gnyen khrus rten med rlung // gsal sreg me ltar shes par bya//
578b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin phung po dbang yul lnga// nyon mongs kha dog la sogs pa// don dang ngo bo cig ma 'dres// de phyir de yi mtshon rtogs byed// gtan tshig gtan tshigs brjod pa rnams// bsgrub bya gang yin shes don la// nges tshig ngo bo
578b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid sogs// gang nas 'bebs kyang rgyas par bya'o// thams cad 'jigs byed dam tshig dang // shes pa'i dam tshig ldan par bya// thams cad ma lus don 'byung ba// tshig gis mtshon pas gud na med// sgra nyid
578b4(rgyud 'grel): don gyis dngos po med// don gnyis sgra las gud na maud// ming tshig sgra la mi rten par// blo'i ting du gro bar byos// gsum bzhi lus don brjod bya ba// sngags mchog bla na med pa yi// mtshan ma kun tu mi brtags par//
578b5(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa'i brang du thams cad shes// kun kyang mnyam pa nyid yin pas// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// so so'i lta ba brjod mi bya// dag cing bla bar bya ba med// spyir ni log rtog bsam yas pa// ye nas
578b6(rgyud 'grel): yod pa ma yin to// so so'i 'dzin rtog bag chags kyis// bzung 'dzin dra bas bsgribs 'gyur te// ci yang med las cir yang snang // byang chub snying po'i gzhi las golo// bden min ma grol bcings pa dang // dus
579a1(rgyud 'grel): dgras 'joms bslus mi rtag dang // 'phags lam bral dgos btson ra chud// sdug bsngal mi 'jil rgyu phyir 'khrul// de bas mnyam nyid ma rtogs pasdu// dug lnga 'jogs spyod rgyud lngar 'khor
579a2(rgyud 'grel): dgra bcu dag la gtser len cing // dge dang mi dge mi mnyam pas// lha dang mi'i skye gnas te// mnyam nyid ma rtogs 'dod khrims 'khor// mnyam pa'i don nyid ma rtogs shing // tshad med bzhi dad bsam gtan
579a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi// rim pas so sor bdag 'dzin cing // gzug pa rnams kun la bdag du rtogs// 'di ni tshangs gnas rim par skye// mnyam dang gzugs med ma rtogs nas// ming bzhi med par ma shes na// skye mched bzhi la
579a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas 'gyur ba// srid pa'i rtse myo'i sA ru skye// rtag chung gnyi grar blo zhen pa// don gyi snying po nyid las gol bar gsungs// sa dgu dag pa'i ye shes ni// sa dgu ma spangs dang du bcom// gnyis med ma rtogs
579a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la// bden bzhi'i dngos po yid lto zhing // spyod dang myi spongs byed 'gyur na// 'di ni nyan thos sa pa yin// las dang nyon mongs thams cad la// mnyam pa'i don du ma shes shing // rten 'brel rgyu 'bras yod
579a6(rgyud 'grel): zin na// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyis// mnyam pa'i don nyid mi shes shing // kun rdzob don dam gnyis 'byid la// chos dang gang zag bdag med na// 'di ni byang chub sa pa yin// bla med theg pa'i nang nas ni// don dam
579b1(rgyud 'grel): du ni dbyer med 'ang // kun rdzob tu ni thams cad la// dag dang ma dag gnyis kar 'dzin// thabs kyi theg pa chen po ni// rnam par byang dang sdug bsngal dag/ kun rdzob tu yang dbyer med de// lta ba mthon sman de tsam mo// thabs kyi
579b2(rgyud 'grel): sta spyod chen po ni// bla med theg pa las 'phags pa// don dam du ni skor 'dun na// kun rdzob tu ni mnyam rdzogs so// yang dag skyes mchig dam pa yis// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med pa// yang dag nyid du rab tu rtog
579b3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa nyid las ma g.yos bzhin// thabs kyi phyag rgya chen por ston// thabs dang shes rab rnam par dag/ thams cad dag ces bya ba 'ong // dngos po gsal dag ma yin te// snang spyod nyid na rnam par dag/ de phyir kun rdzob brdzu ni
579b4(rgyud 'grel): mi lta// gnyis med mnyam pa ma shes pas// don dam dag pa chos nyid tsam// ye shes bzhi yon kun rdzob lha// re sgom bye ba las kyi sku// lhun grub mnyam pa ma mthong bso// chos sku rnam dag ye shes kyi// byin
579b5(rgyud 'grel): brlabs rdo rje dbyings sprul pas// blang dor byed pa rnal 'byor sa// de ltar mngon rtagasu dmigs phye na// ma nor don gyis grub mtha' ni// thig pa mthon dman thams cad dang // 'jig rten lnga pa thams cad kun//
579b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes chen por rab rtags nas// rang bzhin med pas tsor yang 'grub// rang bzhin nyid la mnyam pa med// mnyam pa'i don nyid ji lta bu// mnyam pa nyid rang bzhin gang yang min// kun yin ngo bo 'di 'drar med// /
580a1(rgyud 'grel): mnyam dang rtogs pa gang yang med// byang chub sems zhes brjod pa ni// gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro// rtogs med rang rig kho na tsam// sangs rgyas sems can sems la gnas// byang chub sems rnams
580a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ni// shin tu brtag dka' gting zab pas// ma dmigs mi dmigs dmigs su med// sems nyid de nyid ji lta bu// byang chub de ni sems yin no// sems dang byang chub du byer med pas// sems can ma lus thams
580a3(rgyud 'grel): cad dang // dus gsum chos rnams thams cad yin// yod las btsal ni spros brtags te// sgro btags brgyad du ltung bar 'gyur// med las btsalA na bkuru btab ste// bskur ba bcoM'i gnas su ltung // yod med gnyis las
580a4(rgyud 'grel): btsal byas nus// de snyed lung du ma bstan 'gyur// de phyir num mkha' yod med ces// blun po gang zhig rtog par med// mkhas pas nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// med par mi 'dzin yod min 'dzin// sems nyid yod
580a5(rgyud 'grel): med kun ngo bo// sgra tsam brjod rung don nyid kyi// ngo bo 'di zhes bstan dka' la// yod dang med ces ci byar yod// sems nyid ye nas sangs rgyas la// de min lta ba zlog pa'i phyir// gnyis med mnyam dang sangs rgyas
580a6(rgyud 'grel): dang // bdag nyid lhun grub chos dbyings dag/ byang chub chos nyid stong bsam 'das// de bzhin nyid dang skye 'gag med// mtha' bral 'das dang grol sogs su// bla dgas tsam du brjod pa yin// de nas tshig
580b1(rgyud 'grel): dngos tshig lam chad// sems nyid de kun rang bzhin la// de dag sgra brjod skad ci dgos// brtan rtag dka' bar rgyal bas gsungs// ma tshugs pad+ma 'dra ba'i// ye shes can gyi spyod yul te// kun dang thun mong de ma yin// de
580b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te// skyes bu blo rtse la rab kyis rtogs// de phyir blo can rnams kyis brtson// shes pa'i mtshan nyid dngos mi grangs// ngo bo rim pas phye ba yin// snga ma khwa cig mngon sum la// drug gam/
580b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyad gnyis gnas gyur phyir// shes rab dbang drug tshul nas brjod// nges par ma nor mthong ba yang // ye shes lnga ru gsal ba'i phyir// brgyad kyi ngo bo de nyid de// lnga dmigs byed pa med pa'i phyir// de bas yul med/
580b4(rgyud 'grel): rang gsal ba'o// dbyings dang rlig pa gnyis med bAr// de bzhin nyid du d+ho rje rigs// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang rig nyid// dmigs mod tshul du der snang ngo // yangs shing rgya che lhun grub ni// phyi nang snang snod bcud ye nas
580b5(rgyud 'grel): dag/ dag rtogs nyid kyang dbyings nyid yin// 'di ni rdo rje mnyam nyid yin// shes drang spyod yul gnyis med pas// thams cad ma lus cig pa'i ngang // ma 'dres yongs rdzogs gsal sbyong gzugs// lha dang lta bar
580b6(rgyud 'grel): bya med par// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams thams cad mthong // gang du'ang ma mthong spyan gyi mtshig/ khyab gsal rang bzhin go ba'i sgra// thos pa med pa thos pa'i phul// dang bas tshim byed chos kyi dri// snom byed med
581a1(rgyud 'grel): bar tshor ba'i shangs// don bcud nyams su myong ba'i ro// myong ba'i bya byed med nyid myong // yang dag don la reg pa nyid// reg pa kun dngos reg la dang // chos khams sna tshogs kun mkhyen pa// rang
581a2(rgyud 'grel): rig rgyal po rang snang ba'o// de bas bdag 'dzin rang gsal la// bdag bcas bdag dang bral po'i yid// don dang sems can rtog med gsal// rang 'byung yang shes thams cad mkhyen// yang ni rim pa don grags brjod
581a3(rgyud 'grel): don dam kun rdzob gnyis med mthong // dngos byas rim par rtogs goms rim// rnam bzhi lam dang sgo bzhi dang // bstan bsgrubs lam grangs nyams g.yo thob// goms bston mtha' ru phyin par 'phar// mnyam
581a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ngang las mi skrag pas// mngon byas nges pa'i shes rab dang // rnam pa kun ldan stong chen mthong // rang rig snying rje ye shes gzigs// phyag rgya cig sku 'bras bu lha// thams cad gsal ba'i lta ba dang // bar chud med
581a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshogs chen mthong // dbang sgyur mnyam nyid mi g.yo ba// ye shes kun mkhyen lta ba dgu// thos bsam so sor rtogs sgoms drang // rnal 'byor rim pa'i rgyud las skyes// de bas shes rab gsum la 'bod//
581a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyud don gzungs kyis zin pa ni// dam tshig dam tshig ces bya ba// rang gi lta ba dam tshig yin// sdom pa rnam pa bcu gsum dang // spyi'i dam tshig mtha' yas pa// thig le chen po dang du bsal// ji ltar spyad kyang sdom
581b1(rgyud 'grel): mi 'da'// spyod pa rnam pa gnyis po yang // thig le chen po'i drung du nges// ci la yang mi gnas kun la spyod// spyod pa byed dang spyod med mthong // bya byed med pa'i tshul gyis su// kun la thogs med par spyad// bzhi'i las dang
581b2(rgyud 'grel): cig po'ang // thig le chen po'i ngang du gsal// mchod pa'i rgyun dang log spyod kun// reg pa byang chub sems tshon po// cho 'phrul chen po'i ngang du 'dus// phul ba med pa thams cad mnyes// gzhal yas khang dang
581b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dang // khro tshogs 'du 'phro mang po yang // sems kyi cho 'phrul chen po yin// de bas rnam 'dun ring ba'i dang // chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// rang bzhin ngang gis dag nyid phyir// dab lnga ma brtu
581b4(rgyud 'grel): lhun gyis rdzogs// bco brgya rang rig cho 'phrul snang // e ma'o ma bsgribs sgrub chen po// grub pa chen po ye shes che// don du gnyer ba'i rnam grangs kun// rang rig byang chub sems chen po// ting 'dzin lta ba'i
581b5(rgyud 'grel): bye brag kun// rang rig snang phyir chu burar+ya dang // na mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin pas// rang rig ye shes nyid las min// sngags dang phyag rgya sems nyid phyir// brag ca chu zla 'dra shes na// 'ching brjod las nyid mya
581b6(rgyud 'grel): ngan 'das// de bas bya byed mnyam nyid rtogs// lta ba lta ba gtsor brjod mong // don du shes rab kun mnyam nyid// ded dpon rin chen ji bzhin du// 'dod mtha' bye brag 'dir shes dgos// shes rab rtogs
582a1(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyer chub che// bdag dang gzhan phyir bya ba rnams// shes pa'i gzhi las kun kyang spyod// thos bsams bcu spyod chen du gnyer// 'di yang rgyal pos sa khams dang // stobs can rtsal
582a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi drag zhan dang // mkha' yul che chung ji ltar bar// gzhi cig stobs kyi khyad par 'gyur// ye nas dbyings su cig pa na// de la nga dang bdag ma rtog/ rang bzhin rnam par dag pa la// btsang dang rtse ba'i blo ma byed//
582a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bde gshegs snying po bas// rkyen gyi rdul gyis gang la 'go/ shes rab mchog gis de ltar rtogs// ma lus kun 'dus du byings shes byos// de bres shes par bya ba rnams// dam tshig sdom pa'i ngo bor pyod//
582a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang gzhan phyir gtsor byed cing // dang po'i sdom pas kun kyang slob// shes rab chen po'i sbyin sreg gis// srid gsum sreg pa'i me yin te// yid kyis ye shes me'u 'bar// raM kun kyang chos nyid dong du
582a5(rgyud 'grel): sgral// gdod mthar lam gnyer spros pa gcod// grub pa bskyod dang 'jug pa'ang // bdag gzhan chos phyir dam bcas pas// bdag nyid la'ang gzhan don rdzogs// de bas byis par mi mtshungs te// kun
582a6(rgyud 'grel): lam skabs las shes par bya'o// gang zhig 'di 'drar mthong rtogs pa// dngos grub mchog gi snying po ste// chu srin phyag rgya de bzhin du// dang po don rtogs mtha' mi gtong // spyod yul kun tu tshad dpag
582b1(rgyud 'grel): med// kun nas nyon mongs spyod pa'ang grol// thun mong lam gnyis de bzhin pas// rnam smin gnyis med tshogs gnyis rdzogs// gang gis de ltar rtogs gyur pa// sgro bskur mtha' gsum las grol te// 'jug pa'i
582b2(rgyud 'grel): don rnams 'byin par byed// de bas bdag gzhan chos don rdzogs// rgya che zab yangs shes rab myur// zab pa'i don rtogs mi ldog pade// nga dang bdag med spangs pa bde// brtson pas rtogs pa lhur byed
582b3(rgyud 'grel): nadabang thob bde ba dag mthong zhing // rtsa ba'i drod las yan lag kun// shugs kyis 'byung bar the tshom med// de las mtshan ma byung ba ni// stobs kyis rtogs pa'i rlung ldan la// 'pho 'gyur mthong la 'jigs
582b4(rgyud 'grel): med cing // 'khrul pa'i khams la skyo ba med// grub pa'i gnasu la mi smos te// 'dod pa'i longs spyod mnyam par sbyor// sdug bsngal nyon mongs bzod chen te// las rnams gang lce khur mi lta// tan tra'i khungs dang 'gral
582b5(rgyud 'grel): med spyod tha mal spyod pas lhag par 'gyur// spyod pa rgyun gyi tshogs gnyis rdzogs// mdo lngas the dang brjod mi lang // rgya mtsho dang ba'i gzugs brnyan ltar// sgra rten yid la byed mon par// rang rig mngon sum dmigs
582b6(rgyud 'grel): bral bas// rang gsal gsum bral mi bskul pas// nges par rdeng du gang byas pas// thos bsam rten pa'i lha mthar phyin// 'on kyang sa dang sa'i rims// dbang po dang ba'i spyod yul la// nye ring drung bzhin stobs 'phel
583a1(rgyud 'grel): bsang rgyu rkyen gong 'og 'bras bur 'brel// gsal ba'i bye brag rim par 'gro/ de chas skabs ming brjod dngos cig/ gong gi don ltar ma rtogs pa'i// blo ngan mnyam par khungs phyung nas// ma rtogs le
583a2(rgyud 'grel): lo snyoms las byas// don ma grub pa ro ngan+da song 'gro// sems kyis mnyam pa mA rtogs na// tshig gi mnyam pas sangs mi rgya// de bas don tshig ldan par byos// 'on+da tang the tsom med par 'grug/ spyan bzangs lam
583a3(rgyud 'grel): zhugs ji bzhin phyir// lam kun zag cing 'ching ba'i rgyu// don du mi 'gyur phyir na klag// de bas don las 'grus pas gyis// de ltar don mthong gang dang gang zhig gis// gzhan du mi bsam de la 'dris par byas//
583a4(rgyud 'grel): skyes bus dam pa mchog 'dod pas// de la rtags 'grub gsal bar gyis// lam shes lam du 'jug bzhin phyir// 'jug pa rnams dang rgyu 'bras tshul// rang gnas mthong ba'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// /
583a5(rgyud 'grel): bodag nyid dang chen rtogs pas mos// rdo rje goms byed bshad pas na// snga ma snga ma gang dang gang // phyi ma phyi ma'i thabs dang rgyu// de bzhin phyi ma phyi ma gang // snga ma snga ma las 'byung 'bras// de ltar rgyu 'bras thabs
583a6(rgyud 'grel): 'brel pa// srid pa'i 'khor lo tshul bzhin du// dbang po brtson 'grus bzang ngan gyis// rnam par 'byed pa'i lus bstan pa// srid pa rdzogs pa'i smin tshul gyis// lhag par rngang ldan skyes bu yis// bsgom pa
583b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam bzhi zung ldan par// gdon ma nyid nas goms par byed// thig le chen po'i rang bzhin la// bsgom pa rnam gsum dus cig rdzogs// de ni de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings// de ni kun tu snang gi ngang // de ni rgyu'i rim par ldan//
583b2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs brgyad ye shes lngar rtogs pa// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur nas// ye shes wA ru gsal ba nyid// thugs kyis phyag rgya chen po'o// mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba yi// mnyam pa'i dam tshig le gnas na// mnyan
583b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs chen po thob 'gyur bas// 'das na sangs rgyas ma yin no// yang na dam tshigs 'di lta bya// ji ltar spyad kyang sdom mi 'da'o// byed spyod tshogs chen gnyis su 'gyur// 'gro dang 'dag+ha dang nyal ba dang // ma nyams de'i
583b4(rgyud 'grel): dbyings nas gnas// shes rab mchog gi rtag tu spyod// dbyings nyid la ni mi spyod phyir// dbyings nyid mchog gi gnas la spyod// de nyid mi gnas mya ngan 'das// rtogs pa'i ye shes yid bzhin gter// thams cad
583b5(rgyud 'grel): la'ang me long bzhin// ltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang ngo // shes rgyud ci yin gang gis ngo shes shing // bya byed 'phags kyis 'dug byed pa// gang zhig slong la spyod pa byang chub thob// rnam par dag pa'i g.yung drung
583b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas la// thams cad ye nas mnyam par rnam dag cing // me tog sa la gnas/ la rtog par mdzad// bsnyen du med pas sna tshogs 'byung ba yin// bdago med bdag chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gter// mi
584a1(rgyud 'grel): bkag pa las rgyu zhing 'byung med pa'i// rnam rtog nyid na ye shes rang bzhin te// rnam gsum snang ba rang bzhin stong nyid pas// rnam rtog mi skye ye shes brjod du med// thams cad sems kyi rang ste sems
584a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes gdags su med// ma bcos lhun gnas ye shes byang chub cing // phob rgyu med pas ye nas bde gshegs yin// nam mkhar bzung bas sprin gyis khebs par 'gyur// nam mkha' med par gang gis shes pa ni// /
584a3(rgyud 'grel): sprin dag 'byung zhing khe byas pas mi srid bzhin// bsgom pa'i sems kyang de ltar lta bar bya// ma bcos lhun mnyam ji bzhin dang bzhag dang // rgyu 'bras lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung // de bzhin nyid la
584a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas byas ni// nyon mongs sdug bsngal mi 'byung ste// rtag tu bde gnas byang chub nyid// mtshan dang dpe byad kun dang ldan// srid pa'i rims par smin tshul gyis// 'jug pa'i yan lag lnga ru bzhag// gang dag
584a5(rgyud 'grel): dngos kun rang rig phyir// shi ba don dam bden pa ste// skye ba bar ma kun rdzob yin// skye ba'i rim gsum gnyis med do// dang po lam la rten byed pas// de bzhin nyid du goms par bya// sngon dgos thabs dang /
584a6(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo dang // mi mthun bcos nyams spyod dam tshig/ drod rtags mtshan yon 'da' ka ma// rang gi 'bras bu rdzogs par 'gyur// skyes bu seng ge bzhin rgyu bas// sngon du ri mo rim par rdzogs// smyon pa mchod brtson
584b1(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa gsal// dam tshig ting 'dzin shes rab dang // byang chub sems dang snying rje lnga// lhag pa'i yo byad lnga rdzogs bya// de nas ma'i sems ldan pas// gnas drug thar par dgod dam bca'// tshungs pa'i gnas
584b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi sngon song bas// yid 'ong skyon med sa rtsal bslang // ran byas byi der ldan byas bsrung // pi bar stan dang ldan par bya// bar chad gsal zhing lam rdzogs phyir// tshogs dang sbyin sregs dpung tshogs 'bad//
584b3(rgyud 'grel): phyi nang 'brel chags thams cad kun// gzhan phyir dus rgyun sems kyis dor// khams dang ting 'dzin rkyen bsdus la// bar chad bsrung ba mngon rdzogs nas// longs spyod rig ma 'ang ldan par bya// 'tsho ba
584b4(rgyud 'grel): bzlog pa'ang nyer rdzogs nas// thun mong spyi'i mngon rje gas nas// mchod rten nye ba'i gzugs brnyan bzhugs// yan lag brgyad pa'i tshul bzung la// yongs 'gyur thim byas rjes la 'jug/ dag pa rnam
584b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum ma nor zhing // rang rig rgyal po goms pa yis// byang chub mchog 'di rnyed par 'gyur// de phyir mthong rjes de bzhin nyid// snying rje 'byung ba'i bzhi ru gzhag/ go rims 'byung ba'ang de bzhin nges//
584b6(rgyud 'grel): gang zag skal ldan cung sman pas// gzhan sel phyir dang don gnyer phyir// 'jug pa'ang snga ma gnyis don du// ma rig 'khrul pa'i 'dam dbyings su// ye shes sgron ma'i mnga' phangs nas// gti mug sur
585a1(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams gsal te// rang bzhin 'od gsal bde ba'i mchog/ mdor na sgrib tshogs sun snang tshul// chos dbyings mkha' dkyil yangs pa la// shes rab myur du don 'gro ba'ang // 'gro meda'ong /
585a2(rgyud 'grel): med mi gnas pa// byang chub sems mchog a rab bde// mun snang bdud rtsi tshul bzhin du// rtog pa'i dbang sgyur ting 'dzin yin// dom+b+ha du gnyer ba gang dag kun// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur// gal
585a3(rgyud 'grel): te rnal 'byor 'di min na// rgya mtsho gting gi pha bong ltar// bsgral par lam la btsal byas kyang // don med snying po skams pa yin// de phyir lhag ma chu bsnyams pa'i// bde ldan khrod pas chos bdun tshul// ldan
585a4(rgyud 'grel): byas rje btsun snang tshul bzhin// 'dzin rtsol med pa'i sems kyis 'dug/ de'ang gdamos dag shes rab kyis// stobs kyis bzhag pas goms par byed// sngon brjod bu des dben pa'i sar// rin chen lha ba lcib
585a5(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod kyis// gnyis byas slob bu'ang 'phang du bzhag/ bgegs sgras dbu bas chu bur gtim+b+ha// dngos grub myur du 'grub 'dod na// shin du mi dmigs dbyings sgoms pasdu// phyi ma'ang spyi lugs mthong rjes
585a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhag/ bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni// shin tu mi dmigs dbyings su sgo mo// rang rig nyid la gnas pa'i// sus kyang ma byas rang 'byung ste// thams cad de bzhin nyi du sbyor// gnyis med dbyings
585b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi ngang du sbyor// rang 'byung ye shes dkyil 'khor gyis// ma lus de bzhin nyid du sdud// sdud dang mi sdud gnyis ka med// yang dgra kho na nyid du'o// bsgom bya sgom byed ma skyes na// chos nyid sgom par bya ba'ang med//
585b2(rgyud 'grel): don dam sgom par byar med pas// gang la'ang mi 'jug zhug pa'i mchog/ bsam bya bsam par mi bya ste// mi bsam par yang mi bsam na// gang la rnam par mi sems pa// de ni rang rigs mnyam yin no// byang chub
585b3(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi de bzhin nyid// shin tu mi dmigs brtag dka' ba// yangs lnga rgya che gting zab pas// shes rab zab pas rtogs 'gyur te// gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro/ 'gro dang 'ong bar bya ba min// shin tu
585b4(rgyud 'grel): rtag dka' mi dmigs pas// mtha' dang dbus kyang rtag tu med// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang rig nyid// dmigs med tshul du der snang ngo // dbyings dang dbyings kyi ye shes kyang // rang rig kho na tsam du zad// gang
585b5(rgyud 'grel): zhig dmigs nas 'jug pa ni// de srid 'jig rten rgyang 'phan pa// 'jug med sangs rgyas yin par ni// dbang po nyid dang kun gyis gsungs// nges par bsam+b+ha zhing dmigs yod na// phra rab 'dzin thag 'dzud
585b6(rgyud 'grel): lta bus// de bzhin nyid 'di mi mthong ste// then thag 'jug sa mkha' bzhin no// rnal 'byor mnyam pa de bzhin nyid// ngo bo bzhin du drangs 'jug cing // nges tshig rnam pa 'byung ba yin// de bas kun la 'byor
586a1(rgyud 'grel): bar gyis// chen po sman pas mtha' gsal ba'o// ma skyes de bzhin nyid stong pa// sdod stong stong pa'i tha snyad bral// spros pa brgyad bral 'dod ma yin// gang gis rang sems mtha' dri ma//
586a2(rgyud 'grel): med pa de bzhin dag pa nyid// rnal 'byor mtshan med de bzhin nyid// gnyis medo lhun mnyam de bzhin nyid// grangs bzhi'i rim pa tha ma nyid// byin brlabs yon tan ngo bos brlab// bla ma'ang skabs mi mnyam
586a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid dang // lhun grub mtha' bral tha snyad med// stong chen ma skyes chos dbyings sogs// yon tan che re brjod par zad// ra ra' skabs kyi ngo bo dang // ming don nges tshig brjod pa dang // gtan tshogs yan lag du ldan
586a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ rnam gsum 'phrugs par 'byung ba yin// lhag pa'i don mchog gang yin pa// dngos rnams nyid na dwangos med pas// rtog pa'i smra bsam yul las 'das// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te// de nyid rang gsol
586a5(rgyud 'grel): mi g.yo ba// zhi gran sI lhag mthong zung du 'brel// thabs dang shes rab dbyings nyid de// dbyings la dbyings ni rnam par sbyor// shes rab dbyings nyid sbyor ba yis// byang chub rdo rje thig lce yin// de yang so sor
586a6(rgyud 'grel): rtog sgom dang // mi dmigs shin tu mi dmigs dang // rjes su mi dmigs rim pa yis// mi gnas mi rtog rlob sems med// rang bzhin dong gis bdag med pas// bya byed gnyis ka mi dmigs phyir// mal
586b1(rgyud 'grel): thar 'du byed kun dral ba// bsam med 'dug la sgom zhes brjod// 'du shes gang du'ang mi zhugs na// 'dod chags med par 'du 'dral med// de ltar de ltar mnyam 'jog tshe// gnas dang spyod lam sgrib pa rnams// nor
586b2(rgyud 'grel): par zin na mi phrog par// bya phyir mdo tsam brjod par bya// dmigs pa rjed dang bying rgod drug/ rtsol dang mi rtsol byed pa dang // dgos pa log pa bcu gcig dang // thun mong bdun de bco brgyad do// de bzhin g.yeng ba
586b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam drug ste// ngo bos g.yeng bo rnam shes lnga// phyi rol yul lngar 'pho bas g.yeng // bying rgod ro myong nang yin te// gzhan phyir dge sbyong mtshan ma'o// snyoms 'jug gzhan nam thug pa gzhan// de'i lugs la sems
586b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phro yin// nga'o snyam pas snyoms 'jug pa// gnas ngan len par the tshom med// dron 'byung rjes su 'brang ba dang // 'gog dang thor zug phyal ba dang // ched du gsum 'chos yod la byed// myong dang 'du shes gnas
586b5(rgyud 'grel): dmigs dang // sdud dang mngon byed re ba dang // sgrib pa lnga bcu rtsa yan lag/ 'jig rten dang po bsam gtan bzhi// snyoms 'jug bzhir gol sa dgu ste// ther zug chud pa'i phyin ci ldog/ bya ba mang la 'byung spyan
586b6(rgyud 'grel): zhing ngang thung 'khrug dang du bshad thos// 'khor zhing kha dog mthong pa dang // khams las gyur pa'i cha yang shes// de yis 'gro nyal 'dug sdong dang // longs spyod tshe na'ang rnal 'byor bral// 'u tshe dur kun
587a1(rgyud 'grel): slang gnyid// skam chags chod sems spre spyod rkyen// de ltar shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas// spong ba'i 'du byed brgyad ston pa 'am// so sor cung zad blta bya 'am// yang na rang 'byung rang zhir bya//
587a2(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar byis pa sher ma phye// bya byed mang por g.yeng bar gnas// bya byed mang pos bdag med pas// ting 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur nas// mtshan ma mnyam pa'i dbyings su gnas// dgog dang bsgrub pa ga la yin// cung zang
587a3(rgyud 'grel): khams kyi cha nyams pa// mi gsal mthong dang mi 'jug rdzogs// zin nas spyod lam dga' rten dang // mthun pa'i cho gas gso bar bya// spyod lam rnal du mi sbyor bas// so mthas chod na der bya zhing // dran pa'i thag
587a4(rgyud 'grel): pas bsdam bya ste// rnam pa kun tu mi nyams bya'o// de ltar ring rtson yun ring bar+ya// gnas pa'i gdon mthar 'phel ba 'am// g.yo thob goms bstan mthar phyin pa// mu lUs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// gang
587a5(rgyud 'grel): zag gzar po'i chu gnas tshe// kun rtags goms pa'i rdza mkhan gyis// mi sdod 'gro bas skyo bar byed// de tshe mgo la me 'bar bzhin// cung zad yod la de dag nyung // de tshe dal bus 'byung 'jug sring // de gom/
587a6(rgyud 'grel): ched du byed sogs dang // btang snyoms dang po blang bar bya// ngo bo lta bur mi skul bar// thun kyang nus na sun mi bya// ro myong dor bas de mthar phyin// shugs snang mthong la dga' brong med// gnyis pa bar 'ag
587b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshor thob la// khams dang tshor ba N+ya rtags dor// shin tu yun rings brtson pa yis// gong nas gong du 'phel bar 'gyur// bdag dang gzhan phyir bya ba kun+ta// slob g.yo nas bzung lnga'i bar// rnam par rtog med tshul gyis ni/
587b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kun la chags med rol// spyod dgu dor ba'i cig cha yang // mi dmigs mthun pas spyod ces bya// 'gro 'ongs med las 'gro drang 'ong // 'gro 'od nyid na 'gro 'ong med// gnas pa med las thams cad gnas/
587b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa nyid na gnas pa med// longs spyod med las thams cad spyod// spyod pa nyid na spyod pa med// nyams pa med spyod chags mi bya// mi 'gog mi zin tshogs gnyis ldan// bdag phyir kun la mi dmigs pa//
587b4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor myur thob pha tshom med// 'gro nyal 'dug sdong longs spyod tshe// de ltar spyod pas chos nyid du// byin brlabs sgrol ba cig shos te// gang yang gzhan phyir sems la rdzogs// gzhung las grags pa'i spyod
587b5(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams// skye bo kun gyis spyad gsungs pas// mes slob ci rmos rkyen mthong na// de dgra shes goms bzhi las spyod// shes 'jug kun kyang gzhan don du// las bzhi spyod cing bsgrub dbang che// lam kun
587b6(rgyud 'grel): skad cog chas sgoms nas// spyod pa'i 'khor lo mos sgom zhing // rang bzhin phab rdzogs mched mnyen nas// nus pa'i byin ldan rdzogs par byed// de tshe sdom pa thams cad kun// mos slob mi stong srung mod
588a1(rgyud 'grel): klung khyad par ting 'dzin dam tshig ldan// dam tshig dam tshig ces bya ba// logs na yod pa ma yin te// rang gi d+hU ba dam+b+ha chog yin// mi gtong phyir na dam zhes bya// sngar ldan de'ang 'dir goms
588a2(rgyud 'grel): byed/ de bas rang sems rtogs byas te// lce lo g.yeng ba yings spangs la// nga dang bdag myed mAnyam+b+ha par srung // de bzhin nyid las 'da' mi byed// de bzhin nyid ldan dam pa de// de las 'ad ste na tshig par 'gyur//
588a3(rgyud 'grel): sdo ma snga mar rdzogs byas pas// gong ma gong ma rgyud ldan pas// yongs su 'phar gyi sngon spyod min// 'phar bas spyod kun mngon du smra// de bas so so'i lta bzhi las// spyod sogs na mkha'i yul 'dra'o// zhing
588a4(rgyud 'grel): khams dbang po sa khams bzhin// stobs ni stobs ldan rtul bsgying 'dra'o// de ltar bya byed med srings na// lus ngag sems la drod 'a ste// bzod pa 'phra mo thob pa dang // 'gyur ba'i dbugs la dbang thob dang //
588a5(rgyud 'grel): don la sbrul du phebs pa ni// nges par drod gsum thob pa'o// gzhan du rdul phrani phyi rol dang // zla chos la sogs mtshan ma mthong // rig pa rlungs su 'bab pa dang // 'dod pa'i yul la mi 'gro zhing // 'phro
588a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur dag la mo nga ba// phyi nang chags yul zhon pa chung // snga bas spags pa nyams su 'byung // gzhan yul thugs sems phrogs pa dang // chos brgyad mnyam rdzogs phal cher 'byung // de yang dbye
588b1(rgyud 'grel): thob stan rims kyis// kun tu 'khor bar 'byung ba yin// grul ljong sbyin pa'i rigs de la// pha mas khyim tha ba lhas bstan nas// byed pas bsu zhing zang zing dag/ don du gnyer la brtson par byed// de bzhin rnal 'byor/
588b2(rgyud 'grel): sde tshol bya// drod rtags mthong ba'i brong tshul gyis// shin tu lem la brtson byed 'gyur// de phyir 'di dag rjes su bstan// phyi ma 'ang lam gyi stobs cha las// rtags sngon rdzu 'phrul snang bar 'gyur// de
588b3(rgyud 'grel): le snga ma phyi nang ste// phyi rol zad par skye mchog sngos// mthong dang pad mo 'od sogs mthong // nang du bzod thob bye brag dang // chu lnga rgyun las pags kyis bcang // mi phrogs myo krig dga' brod med// shugs
588b4(rgyud 'grel): snang brgyud po mthong ba 'byung // btso brgyad 'dud yul tshwa yang 'byung // mngon par shes pa rnam pa drug/ las kyi zag pa yed med pa/ sngon la dmigs pa'i mngon shes dang / yong su rdzogs pa'i mngo shes pa dang / khar chad med pa'i mngon
588b5(rgyud 'grel): shes so// dmigs pa 'gag dang 'phel ba dang // nyi shu lnga sogs yul khams mthong // gling grangs mthong thos rim pas phye// phyi ma stong gsum brgya yul dang // stong gsum stong sogs yul 'gyur//
588b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs// stong gsum stong phrag bcu rdul snyed// grangs medo brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul// de snyed yul 'gyur rgyal ba dang // mnyam pas phye bas lam rdzogs yin// de bas rgyu'i sems dpa' dang // skal
589a1(rgyud 'grel): mnyam phyir na brjod pa'i tshul// shes pa'i khyad par dgongs pa yi// bzhi yis phye bas rgyu 'bras nges// 'di tshe rdzu 'phrul rjes brtan dang // chos snang kun brjod cig car la// rdzogs
589a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'di tshe 'byung ba'i rgyu// nyams thar bzhi char 'byung skyid do// rnal 'byor rnams la rmi lam yang // gcer bur 'byung zhing dri ma dag/ byang chub chen po'i mchod rten mthong // dam pa mthong dang dam pa yis// sras dang spun
589a3(rgyud 'grel): dgongs byin brlab phyir// rmi lam mtshan mar bla ma mgon// snang bas dbang bskur byin rlob sogs// lam du 'jug pa lnga byed cing // bar chang legs nyos rtson lung ston// de'ang bdud dang cha dbye ste// byin rlob lung ston
589a4(rgyud 'grel): ltar snang ba// 'byung bas nyes byed bdud 'byung phyir// bdud dang cha btags kun tu ces// bar chad gsal phyir de dgra kun// bla ma nyid las gzhan du min// de bzhin nyid du mthong goms na// dge dang mi dge gnyis su
589a5(rgyud 'grel): mang / rnam rtog mtshan ma yongs mi 'dzin// rang bzhin yi nas 'od gsal ba'i// dge sdig med par shin tu bde// bde dang mi bde gnyis su med// ye shes chags med rnam par dag/ thams cad dbyer med ye shes
589a6(rgyud 'grel): yin// sems nyid dang bas a rab bde// longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad la// gtsang dang rma ba'i blo ma 'dzin// thams cad chos nyid ro gcig pas// gnyis su med par shin tu bde// shes rab che chung ting 'dzin gyis//
589b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ma nor gzhung lugs bzhin// 'khor ba ma spangs sdug bsngal med// gnyis med tshim pas a rab bde// thams cad ma lus cig pa'i ngang // lha dang lta ba gnyis ka med// ye shes sgron ma sbyang bar ni// phyogs
589b2(rgyud 'grel): bcu zhing khams thams cad mthong // 'di dag pha rol gnyis med phyir// 'gro dang 'ong bar bya ba min// yan lag stobs chen ma mchongs par// phyogs bcu'i stong khams thams cad gnan// 'di tshe spyod yul 'gyur mthong
589b3(rgyud 'grel): na// g.yeng gsal stong nyid dang la 'dug/ dran pas las kyi rgyun bcad de// 'dod khams lha mi theg chen sbyor// yang na gsang ba'i gser sgom du// mtshon gang 'od dang zla ba'i hUM// ring po brtsegs po mig thob nas/
589b4(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi 'phro 'dus 'od brdal 'dug/ snang stong dbyer med rnal 'byor mthu// mngon byas lhag pa'i chos skur sbyar// 'bras bu nyid la lam phyir te// phyogs mthun brjod kyi ris ma yin// spyod pa chen po'i rnal 'byor bstan
589b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i le'u ste/ gsum pa'o// / chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal te// snying rje chen po'i rnal 'byor bshad// rjes su mthun pa'i lus nyid kyis// yan lag sgo nas shes par gyis// sngon du steng goms rnal 'byor
589b6(rgyud 'grel): pasa' khams gsum thugs rjes bzung ba'i phyir// yan lag brgyad sngon bzhin byas nas// ye shos sgyu ma'i snying rje sgrims// bdag nyid dri ma gsal ba dang // stong pa'i mdud pa gshig pa dang // gdul byas la
590a1(rgyud 'grel): la dgod pa dang // phyag rgya cig pa'i sgrar bya zhing // rnal 'byor 'di nyid gnyer ba dang // bden pa gnyis su mi stong phyir// rnal 'byor 'di la gnas byas te// 'jug pa'i thun mtsham sna dus kyis bya'o//
590a2(rgyud 'grel): gang gis khams gsum 'das pa'i chos// thugs rje chen po'i ye shes su// mthong thos myong reg tshor ba'ang // so sor rtags rgyu'am rjes la tho bo// de'i sa ma lus chos so cog/ snying po yod pa ma yin te// sgyu ma
590a3(rgyud 'grel): dmigs g.yor sprul pa dang // mig rgyu 'ja' tshen chu zla bzhin// bdag dang 'gro ba ngo bo gcig/ gsal dang rtags pas tha dang phyir// cig dang tha dad gnyis med pas// bya med bya ba 'gog med par// mthong ba ma
590a4(rgyud 'grel): shor tsam du bya// rjes sam rtog spyo de sngon 'gro bya// de bras gnyis goms sgyu goms pas// dran pa'i spyi blugs ye shes gsal// sngon du btang ba gang yang med// na mkha' nam mkha' ji bzhin du// lus ngag
590a5(rgyud 'grel): sems dang chos thams cad / gang ni blang mo gnas mi dmigs pa// dmigs g.yor tshul du sbyor ba yis// nam mkha' la ni rnamakha'i sgyu mi// thams cad thabs kyi mtshan nyid de// thabs la thabaste ni rnam par
590a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyor// thabs chen thabs las byung ba'i// des ni byang chub rdo rje'i mchog/ thams cad du ni ye shes gsal// ye shes de ni ma yin pa// chos 'ga' tsam yang yod min pas// gdung 'dra ma sgral dus cig bsgral/
590b1(rgyud 'grel): bsod chen snying rje'i rang bzhin te// mi 'dod phan 'dogs byams chen po// mi 'gyod dga' mchog bral med snyoms// tshangs pa'i rgyu bzhi dus gcig rdzogs// mngon par gdung ba de la med// de phyir rgyu rkyen 'bras bu dang // dus dang
590b2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin 'khrul pa dang // tshul gyis nyams dang ngo bo dang // btsan ra lta bu brgyad la dmigs// de yis cig shes bzhi 'byung bas// pha rol phyin dang mtshungs su yin// de dag ngo bo nyid ston pa'ong // rnam grangs bzhin du
590b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa ste// don dam rnal 'byor ngo bo yis// phye bas zung 'gyur nges tshig 'byung // de la log rtog sgyu ma ni// chos dang bdag dang dngos po rnams// ngo bo yod la sogs rtags pas// rtog pa sgyu ma'i rlung 'gyur ba//
590b4(rgyud 'grel): skye dang mi bden slu bas 'grub// rten cing 'brel pa'ang shing rta bzhini// 'jig rten rnam rtog gzugs brnyan phyir// sgyu mA lta bur rkyen las skyes// 'phral snang bya ba kun kyang byed// rtog ci na rnams la mthun
590b5(rgyud 'grel): bar snang // gzugs brnyan 'di phyir brtags pas dben// de phyir thams cad rdzun pa tsam// ming las dngos med 'dod pa min// yang dag nyid du grags so tsog/ gnyis snang nyid na gang min pas// sems phyir ci
590b6(rgyud 'grel): yang rgyu med shar// snang la ngo bo nges med cing // ji ltar bltas par snang ba ltar// snang bzhin ther zug chad dang bral// rgyal ba'i sku'ang ma skyes par// rigs pa'i ye shes sgyu mar shes// khams gsum pa'ang do
591a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin pa/ thabs chen sgyu ma kun ngo bo// ye shes la ni ye shes rol// ye shes rol pa nyid snang gsog/ rgyal ba mngon 'byung skyob pa dang // byin brlabs ston pa'ang de bzhin te// rgyu rkyen
591a2(rgyud 'grel): rags pa med pa'i phyir// sgyu ma rdo rje brtsan po mchog/ 'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byaste snang // 'dus byas sna chog ste rdo rje nyid// yin phyir ngo bos tha ded min// dman pa rnal du goms byed tsam// 'gro la skad cog
591a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis mi 'chang // rgyud cig ma 'gags ma skyes pas// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang rig nyid// ye shos spyi mar mi g.yogs la// chu dang zla ba ji bzhin du// mtshungs par gsal bar ngo bor brjod sems las
