591a4(rgyud 'grel): ma rtogs chos med phyir// ye shes sgyu ma gzhan na med// sgyu ma nyid kyi chags bral ba// tha snyad tsam du sgom zhes bya// myi mthun sgrib pa'i dmigs gzung ba// rgyu dang ngo bo nyes pa ni// ma goms pa dang 'grus byed pas
591a5(rgyud 'grel): me dang du ba'i tshul bzhin du// bdag tu 'dzin pa rnam gnyis kyis// ting 'dzin bsgrib pa 'byung bar byed// sngon du ji bzhin nyid bsten mos// mtshams sbyor snying rje ga yung min pas// brjod kun 'bring dang nyung por
591a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung // skye spangs goms pas tha mal dkon// 'on kyang 'di nyid 'phro spu dang / ma nges sa phyor mkhar bcas mthong // pe mthong na ma nges mdog/ me chu rlung sa'i cha 'khrul pas// mi gsal mdog mthong khams 'khrul ltar
591b1(rgyud 'grel): sa g.yos mthong ba'ang cha dbye'o// sprin dang ling thog sun pa bzhin// gang de gzhung las grags pa'i skyon// pha rabs cha yis sgyu ma'i don// mau gsal shin tu phul bar byed// sngon bzhin rtog pa'i nad bcos pa// shos
591b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin so mtha' chod par bya// de ltar gyur na kun mo'i tshul// ma gsal rang bzhin dang bar 'gyur// rnam rtog mtshan ma ci ste sa kyang // ye shes sgyu ma rang snang phyir// chags srung re dogs mi 'byung ste// ye shes sgyu
591b3(rgyud 'grel): ma gzhan du min// de ltar ma ldan gang dag gis// tshor nas lo brgyud bcad pas zhi// yang na rtog pa'i gnas yul blta// de mthong mun pa rnam dgra spangs// 'dod min kha dogs mthong ba ni// 'byung ba bzhi'i
591b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyen pos gzhol// sngon bzhin sngar 'brangs phyis sngon byed// de ltar rang bzhin rkyen gyis skyes// tshor na thog ma'i nyes bsams te// skyo ba med la dor dran bcings// brod pas 'jug cing gzengs bstong bya// de lta
591b5(rgyud 'grel): de ltar brtson 'gyur pa'i// skabs su ye shes rnal 'byor nyid// 'phel ba'ang g.yo thob goms pa dang // bstan mthar 'gro ba ngo bo la// med kyang rab rim dag chas brjod// 'bro dgyes thim pas ru drag chu// cung
591b6(rgyud 'grel): zad thun gyi sum cher yod// bzhi cha lnga char de med thob// thun kyang nus shing gsal ldan na// chu klung ngal 'bab tshul bzhin no// sgo rten rdzas ltar rtog rlung gis// mi bskul bzhi la gnas pa'o// dbang po mngon sum
592a1(rgyud 'grel): gang byas pa// bskrad du bya med phyir mtha'// snying rje rgan pa'i rnal 'byung bas// hr-id gsum smra ma 'dra bar ni// rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma ngam pas shes// 'gro ba'i ched du go bskos te// 'gyu
592a2(rgyud 'grel): deltar swA nas shes// logs par rtogs brtag sde rnam dag cing // ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan cing // thugs rje chen+d+ra pos 'brel pas nA// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang // rjes su 'jug pa'ang de bzhin
592a3(rgyud 'grel): shes/ de bzhin nyid dbyings sna tshogs mang po thabs su snang // thabs nyid hU~M ma mig yor chu zla gzugs brnyan bzhin// de nyid rang rig ye shes tshigs med sna tshogs snang // thabs dang shes rab ldan
592a4(rgyud 'grel): pa mchog gi gnas gyur pas// ji ltar dpyad kyang zad med gnyis grub sgrub mi 'gyur// shes rab thabs chen mchog la yi nas rol pa yin// byang chub sems su rgyu gcig pas// rtsa ba'i snying rje chen po
592a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung // sangs rgyas sems can cig rtogs na// snying rje chen po skye zhes bya// brdal tshin bA ni kun tu snang // thabs chun kun mdzad 'od gsal bya mos// thabs cad dgyes mdzad dbyings ma gdung // sama?
592a6(rgyud 'grel): can ma lus thams cad la// snying rje thag pa ma chad par// nyon mangs las las sprul byed cing // byams pa dag gis mnyes par gyis// de bzhin 'khor ba'i btson ra la// stong rjes chags pa
592b1(rgyud 'grel): cher bskyangasan sa// nyon mongs 'dam nas 'dren par byed// snying rje chen po skyo ba med// de bzhin skye bo phal pa rnams la// las kyi sgrib pas ma gos shing // thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas par// dga' ba dag la 'gyod
592b2(rgyud 'grel): ma byed// sems can nga dang bdag med la// thugs rje gnyis rtogs mi 'byed de// bu gcig 'dra bar blo gzhag bya// thams cad dri ma myed par bya// mngon rdzogs rkyen bral sngon+da bzhin te// rnal 'byor nyid la gzhan
592b3(rgyud 'grel): don rdzogs// dmigs pa bdun gnyis gdul bya dang // ngo bo las dang phan yon gyis// phyogs gtad med de thun mongs gi/ chen po dag las slar 'gyur yin// bdag phyir spyod yul thams cad kun// ye she
592b4(rgyud 'grel): sgyu ma rang snang phyir// phyi nang sgrib med gsal ba'i deng // ye shes blo bstan shin tu bde// longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad la// gcing dang rme bA'i blo ma 'dzin// thams ca ye shes ro gcig pas// gnyis su
592b5(rgyud 'grel): med pas shin tu bang // de bas spyad dang mi spang len// 'dod yin la sogs ye shes rol// thu bo chen sten pa'i spyod yul ni// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// chos rnams thams cad dmigasu med// /
592b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sgyu ma cir yang 'grub// zag med zag pas rtog pa na// dag par ma gyur gang yang med// ye shes ma bcos kun tu gsal// rang bzhin rnam par dge pa'o// de phyir spyod lam thams cad kun// sgyu ma
593a1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes 'da' mi bya// rtsa ba yan lag thams cad kun// snga ma bzhin to nus pa 'phel// de ltar sgyu ma thob goms paste// 'khor ba'i chos la tshad med pa'o// byang chub sems kyis
593a2(rgyud 'grel): 'phrogs par 'gyur// mU 'khrul 'khrul la ya mtshan skye// don med 'dug la de bzhin te// rnam gsum lnga las 'phel bar snang // nyams rims 'phel ba'i mtha' rtags ni// shing bal lta bur yang ba dang
593a3(rgyud 'grel): lus kyi bzod pa 'phra thob ring // khams bde mi bde snyoms pa dang // phal tshor yod cing chos brgyad snyoms// de bas mang dang 'bring la snyam// kun kyang lnga las grangs 'phel zhing // ngo bo gsal la yun ring po'o//
593a4(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig drug 'dug phyi rol gyi// mngon shes 'phel dang cung zad bstan// gzhan pa'ang zhes pa cung zad 'byung // de bas rnal 'byor bstan par bya// 'di tshe spyod yul thams cad kun// rmi lam du'ang sgyu mar
593a5(rgyud 'grel): snying rje gang yang mthong ba dang // byin rlobs da ba skar byung mthong ba dang // bdud kyi spyod yum mtshan mir mthong // de stsogs spyang yang chu gas m+b+ha b+h+ya/ rje chen po goms byasta nas// rnala'i
593a6(rgyud 'grel): chen rtogs pa yis// dus mtha' med par de ltar sgom// yon tan na mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// spyod yul sangs rgyas nyid dang cig/ rgyu spyod bsod nams tshegs chen ldan// de ming ma chags ye shes che//
593b1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor phyi ma btsal ba med// nyid 'od sa bon dkyus dgra bzhin// 'pho ba med bzhin 'gyur snang tshe// sgyu ma bstan byas las rgyun spyod// 'phel bas lam dang sgrol mi 'gyur// phyi ma'ang ldan grangs gzhan dag la// mi stog
593b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang sbyor rig smA su d+he swA// lam+bu 'dir chu sbyin rdzogs bsgrub na// mtshan dang dpe byad kun ldan pa'i// dbang phyug chen po'i gnas nyid du// mngon du 'byung bar the tshom meng // ma rtogs le lo snyoms las byas// don ma grub
593b3(rgyud 'grel): par ngani song 'gro/ snying rje chen po'i rnal 'byor bsten pa'i le'u ste/ bzhi pa'o// / gnyis med dang la phyag 'tshal nas// phyag rgya cig pa'i rnal 'byor bshad// gang dag rdo rje gsum sgom pa'ang // snga par
593b4(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa'i lus kyis shes// spyi'i sa la sau sngon rdzogs pa yis// 'di nyid sgyu mthar mngon bya zhing // lugs sogs mtshan ma'i phyag rgya gzhag/ de la yan lag brgyad sngon bzhin// 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs bya zhing // /
593b5(rgyud 'grel): smras pa'i rgyu yis thob bya dang // rgyu stong rtogs zhen dngang du bya// rtog pa'i dung sogs gnas bsgyur zhing // gzhan dag smin par bya ba'i phyir// phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor shin tu gces// de la 'jug thabs rnamo gnyis te//
593b6(rgyud 'grel): sems sbyang ba dang lhar bskyed pa'o// snga ma gdams ngag shes rab kyis// 'jug pa'i gzhi'o 'di nyid de// a rab tu brtan 'gyur a dkar las// shin tu 'phra ba'i a rnams spro// phyogs bcu gang bar gsal 'gyur nas
594a1(rgyud 'grel): bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib med par bstan// de la 'am yang nA thugs yig ste// de bzhin yang nas yang groms nas// phyi nang snod bcud hUM du bsdu// yan lag rnam shes ye shes phyir// yi ge hUM/
594a2(rgyud 'grel): la shin tu bsdu// ni'i dmigs gis bltar yod par// 'dris nasde bdag gzhan don phyir spro// mchod don rdzogs nas smar bsdus te// hUM nyid mi dmigs dbyings su gsal// goms par bya ba shin tu glo ces/ hrI muts+tshas
594a3(rgyud 'grel): pa srin po'i tshul// rdzogs par bya ba zung du 'gyur// tshangs pa'i cha lugs rdzogs bya ba'ang // gang bsgrub yi ge so sor ste// spyir ni gleng bsgoms kun tu 'dra// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'dus// 'di ltar de nyid goms
594a4(rgyud 'grel): byAbya ba// sngon du mi dmigs dang nyid las// a dkar gsung gi phyag rgyar 'byar// shin tu 'tsher bar gras la snyoms la// thams cad ar ni gyur par sgom// de bzhin nyid du 'dris gyur nas// a lus ma'i dkyil 'khor
594a5(rgyud 'grel): spyi// e maM gsal bar 'byor gyur nas// hI gsal pad+ma chags med sgom// rin tshon 'byar baN+Di gzhal yas bsgom// nyi zla ga dAn dang gzhal yas khyang // thams cad bsdus shing gsal bar sgom// de dkyil yi ge hUM
594a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas par// mthing kha 'tsher la gsal ba yi// 'od zer 'phro ba rnam par bsgom// 'od 'phros dbyings su bslar bsdus nas// shin tu rdo rje 'phra bar sgom// rdo rje 'od 'phros gsal 'bar nas// dbyings su yang ni
594b1(rgyud 'grel): bstim par bya// de nyid sems dpa'i skur gyur pas// shin tu 'phra zhing 'dus par bsgom// de bzhin gnyis med gas gyur nas// sku gcig rdo rje dril 'byar bsgom// de bzhin nyid du gyur pa dang // dbu gsum phyag drug nyid du sgom//
594b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri 'bar// rin chen pad+ma dril bu 'bar// 'phra ba'i gzhal yas gdan dang ldan// gnas gcig ye shes sems dpa' sgom// spyi mgrin tsai ta gnas gsum du// byin brlabs rje rje gsum
594b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom bya// dbu'i gnas lhur yi ge lha// ye shes lha dbang rdzogs pus rgyan// blo'i shes rab che chung gris// yang nA phyag rgya chen po ste// chu lasau nya ldeng dzI bzhin du// bdag nyid phyag rgya chen po ste// zhal
594b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum phyag drug dag tu sgom// gzhal yas gdan sogs sde ma bzhin// yan lag lha dgu 'ang de bzhin no// de la shin tu goms par bya// rAg sha tshwa lug 'dzin pa'ang // rims dang gcig car mngon bzhin te//
594b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje cho go kha dog dang // gzhal yas la sogs bsgyur te bsgom// thugs kyi rigs gzhan mos pa'ang // 'bru bzhi sbyangs te gdan gnas cig/ rdo rje rnam gsum rigs su sbyar// sku dang yan lag de bzhin no//
594b6(rgyud 'grel): rim pa thob pa 'am cig car ba// brgyad mthar phyin papho ba ltar bskyed la// mchod pa'i byin rlabs skur bsgom te// yan log lhan rdzogs mchod stod bya// yan lag ma nyams sdigs 'das pa 'ang // bskyon bcu
595a1(rgyud 'grel): spangs te rnam gsum gyi// bzlas pa grags bzhin rdzogs par bya// spro bsdus bdag dang gzhin don rdzogs// phyi nang gsang ba gang mos su// bzlas brjod tshad du phyin par bya// dung na ye shes
595a2(rgyud 'grel): thig le blta// nyal bas nang par de nyid las// hUM sogs bsgyur te ur rdzogs pas// sngon bzhin brtson pas 'dris par bya// gzhal yas lha'i dkyil 'khor yang // sems kyi cho 'phrul rang snang phyir// lha la dmi
595a3(rgyud 'grel): med rig pa nyid// bzhi rdzogs sku de rang snang ba'o// rgyal ba rgyal ba rnams kyi sku// kun tu rin+da chen lhu bu ste// rdzogs par rtog med re ba snying // zad 'phel 'gro 'ong nye ring med// phyag rgya yod med grol ma grol//
595a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag phyir phyogs med blung dor med// bying rgod snyoms tsam mnyam gzhag pa'o// mi mthun 'di tshe dmigs bzung ba// yi ge nas gzung rdzogs pa'i bar// thun mong kun tu 'byung rogs 'phra// tha ma 'di la so mtha
595a5(rgyud 'grel): gcad// khyad par rab rib mag mog dri ba// gang chod dmigs pa tshad dang tshul// grangs dang cha lugs mdog dbyibs dang // kha dog 'ba' zhig rim par nub// de ltar gyur pa tshor bya ste// 'du byed rlung gis bskyod
595a6(rgyud 'grel): mi bya// de ltar zin pa de dag kun// khyad par gsum la'ang sgyu steng 'dug/ rjes las thob pa ma sun 'dug/ drug pa ri ltar sdong cher bya// bdun pa dbyibs dang sre bar bya// brgyad la spyi min bye brag gnas// bya min
595b1(rgyud 'grel): las kun dor byas te// spyod lam skyon rnams gtang bar bya// gnyis la khugs mod rgya cig la// goms pas 'phel ba gong ma bzhin// smag rgyu du ba srin me khyer// mar me nyi ma'i tshul dang sbyar// btang snyoms rims dang
595b2(rgyud 'grel): brtson pa dag/ skabs kyis blang dror nyams las shes// 'bru bzhis rtag tu mtshams bcad de// bdag nyid chen po'i tshogs mchod bya// nang gi sbyin sreg blang bar bya// gzugs sogs thog le 'am lha mo drug/ dbang po
595b3(rgyud 'grel): yul dang sbyor ba bya// zhi kho gang yin skabs kyis bsgyur// bdag nyid tshon po'i chos pa yis// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes// srid gsum sems can thams cad la// dga' ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur//
595b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro nyal 'dug sdod longs spyod kyang // nyon mongs rdzu gA bsngal tshe na'ang // theg chen phyag rgya mi btang ste// sngon bzhin sbyor bas myur du 'grub// rgyu 'bras mtshams sbyar bar ska/ bas kun// chos spyod dgu'i spros pa dor
595b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyud la ldan yang zang bya min// mo na mA'i g.yeng ba yin phyir ro// rdo rje gsum sgo phyag mo b+ha// phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor spyod pa lo// don ldan ma nyams dag byas nas// brtson 'grus cher bsteng myur bar 'grub// lha la lha rol bstod
595b6(rgyud 'grel): nams te// spyod lam chags gnyis med pa'o// gzhan phyir 'phro 'du rim par rdzogs// rkyen dang phrad pa'ang mi 'dor te// dus min gzhan phyir spros pa'ang len// gang 'tsham par don rdzogs byed// bdag phyir thun mong
596a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog bsgrub rnams// 'di bstan rnal 'byor the tshom med// 'di tshe sa gzhi kun ldan no// gsung gi gzhi las lhun bya zhing // phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor du// spyod yul kun tu bsdam par bya// phyi nang
596a2(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba shin tu 'phel// thob dang bstan pa'i char 'gyur te// ljongs spyod zhen pa med pa dang // dbang po yul du goms pa dang // rgyu ba ched dang thun mtshams thal// drod kyi bye brag kun dang ldan// rtags chen goms
596a3(rgyud 'grel): mthar mtshan ma lnga// dngos su mthong dang rdo rje gsum// skye mched mthong ba mtshan ma ste// grub pa dang po rtags zhes bya// dra mi rigs pa rgya chen mngon shes kyang // grangs dang yul gyis bla zla med// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i mngon
596a4(rgyud 'grel): shes kyang // g.ye thob 'byung bar the tshom med// lus ngag sems mthu'i rtag rnams kyang // cho 'phrul bzhi tshul g.yo thob byed// gzhan yang ston pas gsal bstan pa// rnal 'byor lhag pa'i stobs kyis thob// spyod
596a5(rgyud 'grel): lam nyid du nyes legs kun// gsal bar 'byung zhes shin tu bstan// bsam gtan 'bad pa bzang ba yin// bsgrub pa pos ni rtag tu mthong // sangs rgyas mthu drang mtshungs par mthong // sangs rgyas longs
596a6(rgyud 'grel): spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// bdag med par ni myur du mthong // sems dpa' chen po khams gsum pas// mchod par byed pa des mthong // ye shes chen po 'od dri'i gzugs// sangs rgyas byang chub sems pa yi/
596b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis// rtag tu mchod pa byas pa mthong // rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs chen dang // grangs chen rdo rje mchog dag tu// rmi lam dag tu rab gzugs mthong // grugs chen rdo rje gsung ba dang // byang chub
596b2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' 'khor lo can// sangs rgyas chen po phyag 'tshal ba'i// rmi lam 'di dag mthong 'gyur na// lus ngag sems kyi mthu las skyes// brgyad rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i// lha yi bu mo yid 'ong dang /
596b3(rgyud 'grel): khye'u dang bu mo dag mthong nas// de ni dngos grub thob por 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad rnams// zhing nu gnas pa nges par mthong // thugs ni dgyes par gyur nas kyang // chos mthong yid du 'ong la
596b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs// chos kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sku// sems can kun gyis yongs bskor ba// bsam gtan rdo rje la gnas pa'i// dam tshig sbyor ba mthong bar 'gyur// sna tshogs kun bdag skyed myod tshal// lha'i bu la
596b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pas brgyan// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlab pa// bsam gtan dam tshig can gyis mthong // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// de ni mngon par dbang bskur mthong // rigs 'dzin rgyal po chen
596b6(rgyud 'grel): bo yis// bskor ba byas pa de mthong ngo // rdo rje las byung sna tshogs pa'i// rmi lam dri med de mthong na// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// skye ba bla med pa 'grub// gdol pa khyi'i sbyor ba sogs// rdo rje 'dzin pas mthong nas
597a1(rgyud 'grel): mi blo ldan+da rdo rje sems dpa' yi// sems kyi gnas ni grub par gsungs// yi ge phyag rgya rnam gnyis kyis// skye mched mthong ba de bzhin no// lha'i sku ni gsal bsgom nu// bsod nams chen po thob
597a2(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur// de nyid chu zla'o shes rab ni// ye shes tshogs ni rdzogs par gyur// bdag nyid lha dang mnyam sbyor bas// yon tan chung yang 'grub par 'gyur// ye nas mnyam nyid sbyor bas su// lha nyid du ni
597a3(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu bsgo// b+hUngaM gAshegs kun dang mnyamA sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor kun+du dang mnyam par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor kun da mnyam pa'i phyir// sku gsung ye shes lnga rdzog so 'grub// yi dam lha yi
597a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid ni// de bzhin gsheg sa thams cad kyi// sku gsung rdo rje bdag po'i phyir// lha spangs dge spyod don med 'gyur// dum tshig bsrung dang sngags zlos dang // phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad pa gzhi'i// brtson 'grus
597a5(rgyud 'grel): che zhing brtan par bzung // rnal 'byor brtson 'grus chung 'gyur na// mi 'grub nye ni yang med par gsungs// ji ltar ral gri'i so la nan tan du// legs par ma bzung lag pa chod par 'gyur// de bzhin nan tan
597a6(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i gsang sngags la// phung po 'am yang na 'bras bu med par 'gyur// de bas bar chad brtson med na// dper na sa bon tshig pa las// 'bras bu 'dod pa dang 'dra ste// bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu med par dang //
597b1(rgyud 'grel): mi khom 'khor bar brgyud par 'gyur// gang zhig zhal mthong mos pa yis// bsnyen bkur mchod pa'i bsod nams kyis// mi dge mtshams med bcwo lnga sogs// las ngan sbyangs te rigs la sbyor// gang gis mi
597b2(rgyud 'grel): rtag mthong na'ang // phyag rgyu ma nyams gsal bzung ste// las kyi mi 'khor gang 'did du// a yaM stobs kyis bskul bar bya// rnam sbyin rigs lnga the tshom med// 'on te 'am ni rim pa yis// de nyid bar phyir lan
597b3(rgyud 'grel): grangs gzhan// che'am phyi ma 'am gzhan thob des// rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis// phyag rgya chen po rdzogs 'gyur zhing // gsal ba'i yid gnyis med pa na// dkyil 'khor chen po 'grub par 'gyur// de ltar
597b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom zhing 'grub byas no// 'bras bu mngon du ma byung yang // tshe rabs skye ba thams cad du// lA mi mtshan rdzogs sdug bsngal sel// bde gshegs 'byung dang mi skol zhing // theg pa sman li 'jug mi 'gyur//
597b5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub gzungs la zhugs pa yin// de byas lA mo 'di 'bral mi bya'o// phyag rgya bcing ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste/ lnga pa'o// rang gi lha lnga phyag 'tshal te// spros pa'i rnal 'byor bshad par bya//
597b6(rgyud 'grel): spros pa bzhi po de lta bur// gzhan pa 'grol phyir rgyas par bshad// rnal 'byor rnam gsum mngon rdzogs nas// sa la sogs pa phyag rgyar byas// ri mo rgyu 'am 'bur lugs sam// 'jim pa las byas
598a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ni// lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan khung bu dngos// ye shes byin ldan rten par bya// mu h+ma ba lo a mr-i ta// dmar chen phyi nang mchod pa bkram// rol mo mchod stsogs cha rkyen rnams/
598a2(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'os pa bzhin du bya// phyogs bcing brgyad kyi rim rdzogs nas// las kyi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis// mchod rdzas byin gyis brlab par bya// bdud rtsi chus bsang bgegs bskrang 'dug/ bsod nams yongs su rdzogs
598a3(rgyud 'grel): bya zhing rje spyod yul byin gyis brlab pa dang // 'khor lo sa mthar dbyung ba dang // tshogs la dus kyi bsgrub phyir sgom// dgug gtang bcing sgrol gso dang gsadu// 'pham rgyal ting 'dzin 'dris byed phyir// gang dag
598a4(rgyud 'grel): gdul bya ji snyed pa// spros pa'i las kyis gdon phyir ro// ci granas spros pa'ang rnam gnyis te// rjes spyi mthun par nI dang khro// de re re'ang tshul gnyis kyis// blo dang ldan par mtshan ston yin// rdza mo rim dang cig car
598a5(rgyud 'grel): gA tsha bas phyi ma bzhin 'jug pa// ny+tsi zla bza' skor dus gcig tu// chu dkyil dang bar gsal ba bzhin// sku gsal skad cig 'od du 'ab // snying po brjod pas 'khor lo shar// de mngon bstan pa bzhir 'jug pa//
598a6(rgyud 'grel): mthong dang snga mo'i rnal 'byor stobs// thobs pas shes bya brlab tshul dang // du ma gcig gis gsal byed pa'ang // ma bsgyur rnal ma'i dkyil 'khor lo// 'khor lo tshem bu grangs zhal phyag/ dang po bco brgyad bzhi bcu
598b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis/ rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rim par bslab// gnyis pa'ang bdag cag yab yum gnyis// gnas pa'i 'khor lo gsal bya ste// gdan ldan dbus na bdag po gnas// de la sems dpa' khro bos bskor// bstan nas
598b2(rgyud 'grel): mdun rgyub sku gsung thugs// 'khor lo rdzogs pa 'bru gsum brda'// mi'i dbang du tshem bu grwa sum// shin tu goms par byA byA yA ni// bstan nas g.yas dang g.yon nyid du// yon tan 'phrin las dkyil 'khor gzhag/
598b3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor de bang du tshwam bu lta// shin tu 'dris nas dus tshogs sbyar// gsum pa rtsa ba sku nyid du// bstan nas su gsum gtso bor gsal// gsum tshor med na yon tan gsal// lha rdzogs yab yum zung bstan nas//
598b4(rgyud 'grel): lnga po'i don spros bzhi po ru gnyis// mA bcos ngang gis gnas pa las// ye shes lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldan// de nyid yan lag spros bdug ste// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gsum
598b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phror 'gyur// stangs dbyal gnyis kyi phyag rgya dang // sangs rgyas stong gi dkyil 'khor yang // ri rab til 'bru'i tshul bzhin du// dpe byad mtshan gyis rnam spras pa'o// de ltar gtso mchog ldan byas nas// bya byed rigs
598b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'ang stong sgom bya// bcu gnyis drug gis 'od 'phro 'bar// nyi khri bzhi stong dus gcig gsal// phyogs bcu ma lus gzhal yas khang // nyi zla gza' skar rgyan dang gdan// bde gshogs dkyil 'khor ma
599a1(rgyud 'grel): lus sgom// bsam yas lhun grub nyid la slob// bzhi pa cig zhal gsum phyag drug/ bstan na gsum la'ang de bzhin te// lnga pa rjes su mthun goms nas// spros pa'i zhal phyag rdzogs gsal ba
599a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur ba'i 'khor lo'ang de bzhin te// dang po lnga bcu brgyad goms nas// drug cu rtsa brgyad de bzhin te// dbus kyi he ru bzhi po la// sku gsung khro bo mdun rgyab gsal// de bstan 'khor dang bcas par sgom// sku gsung thugs la
599a3(rgyud 'grel): bsten byas nas// g.yas g.yon pa 'phrin las khro bo// yab yum gsal nas 'khor lo lnga// rdzogs par sgom pa'i rims bzhin du// gang byas ma sun gyen du 'phar// rjes su mthun pas 'jigs byed kyang // 1
599a4(rgyud 'grel): dang gnyis dang gsum bzhi lnga// yab yum mthur phyin 'khor lo'i chas// lnga bcu'i chom bu gnas yul dang // sgom slas hUM chen brgya rtsa brgyad// yan lag bkod pa lha bcu brgyad// chas lnga'i grangs ni nyes brgya dang
599a5(rgyud 'grel): dgu bcu'i lha rnams yan lag ldan// rnal gcig phyag gnyis gsum drug dang // dgu dang bco brgyad kun ldan dang // nyi shu rtsa gcig bzhi bcu gnyis// dgu brgya stong brgyad brgya zhabs dang // grangs med bar du
599a6(rgyud 'grel): slob byed pa// rims thabs brjid kyi spyod yul ni// nyi shu gcig dang dgu brgya dang // grangs med mthar lame rim par ldan// de ltar ldan pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// zhugs slob mthar phyin par skabs su// rang bzhin
599b1(rgyud 'grel): yul nas dbab bya ste// bzhugs shing stan sogs ldan byas te// rdzas dang ting 'dzin rims bzhin mchod// bstod slong ldan nas bsnyen pa bya// bar skabs lhag ma'i gnas skabs nas// dam bsgrags bcol zhing las la dgye//
599b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khol lo bsdu srung spyod lam kun// khro zhi man ngag gzhung bzhin bya// phung sogs dkyil 'khor lhar snang ba// rgya mtsho'i gzugs brnyan ji bzhin du// kun rdos rang rig lhar gsal ba// gcog dang du ma yongs kyis med//
599b3(rgyud 'grel): gsal la yul ni mo g.yo ba// rnal 'byor ngo bor rgyal bas gsungs// rang bzhin spros pas rnal 'byor spros// de yang gdug 'dul khro zhi sproste// 'khor lo spros dang phyag rgya spros// chom bu spros dang zhal phyag spros//
599b4(rgyud 'grel): kun nas spros phyir 'bras bu'ang spros// spros pas nyams gsal rnal 'byor smra'o// 'di tshe li lo rnam gnyis dang // mtshan mtha' lnga dngos mthong 'dzin dang // rnal 'byor bdud kyi yul mthong ba// sprul pa grangs med dgye ba mthong
599b5(rgyud 'grel): dam par mdun mthong dam par smra// rgyal bas gsungs kun gsal mthong dang // dus gsum gsal shes mthong ba dang // rgyud drug lam gnas kun mthong na// de lo snying rje'i shugs 'byung dang // kun kyang gsal bar mthong /
599b6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang // ci la'ang thogs med 'gro ba dang // mkha' la sa gzhi 'dra 'dug dang // rgyal bas phyag brkyang lung ston dang // kun gyi skad du chos smra dang // snod bcud spyi gnas mthong ba dang // steng gsum mnyam par bkod
600a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / de nyid rang bzhin gsal snang dang // las su rung bas thogs med dang // dam pa'i don la sgom pa dang // 'jig rten gtso bos mchod 'byung rnams// rang bzhin rtogs na dam pa'i
600a2(rgyud 'grel): rtags// mi shes dga' blod byed pa bdud// khe dang grags pas phrogs pa dang // sngags pa thob pas mtshan ma g.yengs// re dang dogs pa cung zad yod// nga 'am nga zhes che bsu rgyal// tha mal pa'ang nyung la
600a3(rgyud 'grel): phra// rgyu ba'i gzung 'dzin bye brag shes// shes 'jug 'byor pas 'go thob cing // zung du 'brel pas bsgreng mthar phyin// 'bras bu lam shes bstan pa yis// bya ba med pa'i brtson 'grus blang // mtshan ma rang
600a4(rgyud 'grel): rig cho 'phrul pa// sems phyir mthong la re dogs med// dper na nam mkha' rang bzhin la// nyi zla gza' skar glog 'gyu dang // 'ja' tshon sprin mnga' 'khrul 'gyur yang // na mkha'i dbyings la 'gyur nyams med// chos kyi
600a5(rgyud 'grel): dbyings ni bsam yas par// sku gsung rmad 'byung ngo mtshar dang // mtshan ma sna tshogs snang 'gyur yang // de bzhin nyid la nyams 'gyur med// rnal 'byor stobs yon rdzogs 'gyur yang // bdag gnyis
600a6(rgyud 'grel): sod shes nga rgyal med// spyod yul mtshan ma gang mthong yang // ye shes rang snang nyid du sbyar// snying byed myos pa'ang 'phel ba'i rims// bskyab pa'i rim po ji bzhin te// sngon brgyan mod kyang 'dri slob pa/
600b1(rgyud 'grel): goms dbang ni rnam lnga'o// gsum lnga lha gsal cung zad g.yo// bar chad 'byung ba'ang dang po'o// de gsal thun gyi bzhi chu gsum gsal ba mi g.yo gnyis pa skye// thun kyang nub pa gsum pa'o// de nyid rkyen dbang mi 'gro ba//
600b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa'o byed par gnas pa yin// shin tu mi 'phrogs lnga pa ste// grangs la sbyar na mthar thal 'gyur// de bas nyams tshod zin pa zhes// rnal 'byor chen po'i lha spyod ni// ji ltar spyad kyang rang bzhin med// mkha' la bya chen
600b3(rgyud 'grel): lding ba bzhin// chu la rgyal chen 'phyo ba bzhin// mkha' lce rlung chen 'phyo ba bzhin// rnal 'byor lta ba de ltar lha// rnal 'byor chen po'i spyod pa ni// thams cad kun la dbyer med spyod// bde ba'i ro mchog myong 'gyur te// de la su
600b4(rgyud 'grel): zhig chags par byed// spyod bzhin ma chags ye shes yin// bde bo mchog nyid bsod nams tshogs// de lta bu'i ngang la spyod// 'di ni spyod pa rlabs chen yin// lta spyod ya cha ro ma gyur par// sngags 'chang rnams kyi rtag
600b5(rgyud 'grel): tu dpyad// lnga bzhi'i spang bya rmed spyod kun// bAdag dang gzhan phyir 'jol tog ste// gang yang byas la ma mthong zhing // tshogs 'gyur 'dam skyes bzhin spyod thabs// yan lag dri bang po rnam shes kun// rnam smin au du
600b6(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya// rdzogs pordo rje kyai le 'khor nyid du bsgom// yang na khros pa'i dkyil 'khor sgrom// gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs// rnam smin mu ji shes par bya// yul gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du sbyim// yang na
601a1(rgyud 'grel): mo'i dkyil 'khor sgrom// spyod yul lha dang lha mor rol// 'dod yon lnga po thams cad dang // sna tshogs snang ba thams cad kun// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // gzugs mdzes lha dang lha
601a2(rgyud 'grel): mor brtag/ thams cad kun tu bzang po yi// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la// thogs pa med par spyad bya ste// bsod nams tshigs chen yin par brtag/ de bzhin gshegs pa lngar yang brtag/ gzhan yang stong khams
601a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad na// shes rab dbyings dang 'dod yon rnams// rab 'bring tha ma thams cad dpyad// dang du blang dang mi blang ba// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu dpyad// chags pa med par gyur pa dang // dngos grub ya mtshan chen po ni// /
601a4(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig mdo bshad nang nas 'byung // spyod yul mthong thos thams cad kun// 'gro dang 'dug dang nyal ba na// dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi rnal 'byor pas// ma nyams pa'i dbyings na gnas// shes rab mchog gis brtag
601a5(rgyud 'grel): tu dpyang // yang na dam tshig 'di lta bu// ji ltar spyad kyang sdom mi 'dra'o// thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas lnga// byAsgrub cing srung bar bya ba med// dge dang mi dge gnyis kha med// de la bskyung du rdul tsam med//
601a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan phyir dregs pa'i srung bya kun// gang ltar 'tshim par gda' mi byed// rdo rje sems dpa'i bka' bshad pa'i// sdom pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid du ma srungs na// yag sha khro bo me dpal gyis// snying
601b1(rgyud 'grel): las drangs te khrag 'thungs nas// ngan song gsum du skye bar 'gyur// de'i sdug bsngal bzod glags med// de'i phyir lam bzhir ldog zag yod// shing bal lta bur shin du yang // dbugs kyi rgyu ba yun rings bral// rnal 'byor mkha'
601b2(rgyud 'grel): la bza' skar bzhin// gsal la mi g.yo spyod yul med// zhor las byung bas rdzog yI phyir// 'di zhes grangs kyi cha las 'das// las su rung ba'i rtags rnams kyang // sngon byung stobs su 'phel ba dang // khams snyoms rang
601b3(rgyud 'grel): lus bde bas rgyas// 'du ba bzhi bral bzod thob tshe// mngon shes drug dang rtsa lnga rdzogs// rab 'bring cha yis yul khams gling // tshun ched gsal zhing 'dul bar byed// tshogs drug dag pa'i stobs las gyur// rdzu 'phrul
601b4(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu cha g.yo thog/ thams cad skad mthun chos ston rjes// sa g.yos chos snang byed pa dang // yi ge sgrar byed kun brjod pa'o// 'di dag mthong dang bco brgyad dang // shugs snang brgyad mthong re ngogs gzhag/ rmi ldem
601b5(rgyud 'grel): gcig drang chos mthun par// 'byung ba gsal dang stan pas dbye// 'byung ba lnga nyid rigs kyi yum// bzang po ltas su lung bstun kun// lam 'di rdzogs par 'byung ba yini// bsgrub pa'i rigs 'dzin lam 'di nyid
601b6(rgyud 'grel): mthar phyin rigs kyi rgyu yin phyir// mtshan ma 'byung ba'i sa yin te// bar chad med tshogs skabs su'ang 'di'o// phung po lnga nyid de bzhin gshegs// dbang po rnam shes byang chub sems// yul dus byang chub chen
602a1(rgyud 'grel): myo yin// bdag rtogs rnam bzhi khro bo yin// rtag chad mu bzhi khro mo'o// de sems rang rig nyid ces bya// de bzhin mnyam rdzogs lhun grub pa'i// de bzhin gshegs dang ye shes lnga// rang
602a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung chen po'i dkyil 'khor sgom// rtog gnyis dral bya'i thabs mkhas kyis// lha gsal dngos po med snyoms nas// mthong thos la sogs med pa'i tshul/ rang rig ye shes gsal snyoms nas// rlung bzhin medA las
602a3(rgyud 'grel): ciri yang 'grub// rkyen gyis 'gyur ba'i dus byung na// spros pa gang yin gzung ba yis// las ngan lam zhes rgyun bcad nas// bar ma 'am phyi mar gnyis sbyor 'dzin// gang zhig nus gzhan skyabs med pa'o// 'phen pa'i
602a4(rgyud 'grel): 'brel pas sa bon gyis// tshe rabs kun tu bde thob nas// gsum dang mi skol spyod pas thob// snyoms las med par brtson byas na// lam+b+ha du rigs 'dzo ni thob pa yang // chos nyid dam tshig smon mAthu dang // yan lag
602a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par rigs 'dzin 'gyur// spros pa'i rnal 'byor rgyun chags pa'i// bso de nams ye shes longs spyod kyi// mun snang drog 'gyur ji bzhin du// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs mchog bsdus// spros pa'i rnal 'byor la
602a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i le'u ste/ drug pa'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas// bar chad med par sbyor ba 'o// bsgrub pa dris kyi tshogs bshad bya// bar chad med pa'i lam bsgrub pa'ang // bsnyen pa dang ni
602b1(rgyud 'grel): nye bsnyen dang // bsgrub pa dang ni bsgrub chen pos// rdzogs par skabs 'dir shes par bya// 'di yang lam bsgrub sbyor ba yi// cha'i dang po bsnyen pa 'di// byang chub sems rtogs 'grus pa dang // bsnyen pa'i dam pa yin pa'i
602b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir// sems chas snying rje man chad do// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// de phyir gcig dang spros pa'o// bsgru ba bo nyid ni bar chud med// dus kyi tshogs mtha' bsgrub chen ldan// mthar lam gang thob grub pa po// gsum
602b3(rgyud 'grel): pa mchod pa'i skabs su shes// gnyis pa gtso bo 'dir bstan pa// bzhi dang gzhung gis rdzogs par 'gyur// phun sum tshogs pa lnga bzhi la// bsnyen bsgrub bzhi yis gzhung bsrangs pa'o// gang dag mos pa ji
602b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du// zhi dang khro bos bsgrub par bya// de la snga mu gnas dang dus// yo byad ston 'khor bsgrub pa po// bsgrub thabs phun sum tshogs pa yis// bzhi dang sbyor bas gzhung rdzogs bya// de la spros pa mthar phyin
602b5(rgyud 'grel): bas// cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing // yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan// sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pa'o// rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// nges par legs pa'i dgongs pa 'grub// ston pa mdzed
602b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan chu bo rdzogs// gnyer ldan rgyud dang la sa la mkhas// man ngage drod 'chang ba// rnal 'byor mthar ldan shin/ tu bsten// ston pa mchod brtson rtogs pa gsal// dam tshigs sngags dang phyag rgya rnams//
603a1(rgyud 'grel): ma nyams shes shing yo byad ldan// 'khor gyis 'grub 'gyur mi ldan brlag/ sde dpung chen pos myi tshugs shing // sa dang bar snang shis pa dang // lo rgyu sna rnam gnyis ldan pa dang // yid 'ongs sa brnal
603a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par bya// rnyed nas chom bu'i grangasna bzhin du// che chung rkyen du 'tsham par bya// 'khor khung phyi nang ldan pa'i// rin chen byug pas bsrungs pa dang // rin chen spros pa'i gzhal yas khung // yid 'ong bya ba shin tu gces
603a3(rgyud 'grel): tshe grangs yar gyi brgyad la tsam// shin tu skar ma rgyu la rnams la// byang chub spyod pa cher spyod bya// gesang chen dngos grub myur ba'i phyir// gza' skar shis pas blang bar bya// zhag ni sum cu phrag drug grwam// bcu
603a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// dbang sgyur rigs kyi mchog bsgrub phyir// rnal 'byor brdzun chas rims bzhin du sgrub// gos brgyan bza' btung gsang ba dang // bsgrub pa'i yo byad lnga rnams drung // dkyil 'khor yo byad
603a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i rjes// dngos 'grub rten dang bar chang bzlog/ yo byad dag por bsdu byas to// tshe gsum bcad la byin gyis brlab// skyabs thabs yan+d+ra lag pa ni sbyar bya// gnas dang ljongs spyod ci bad+ma dang // ma nyams blon
603a6(rgyud 'grel): rab ldan pas// dang ba'i ngam mnos bzhin du bya// dam bcas ldan pas 'dus te bsgrub// yang na dpag tshang rgyang grags tshang // so sor 'tsham pa'i gzugs brtson bri// brgyan dang mchod so gos 'khor ba dang // phyi rol
603b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa la sogs te// phyin chad bsrungs skam rams bzhin bya// bsnyen pa'i don du sngon bya ba// rdzogs pa'i las rnams zin par bya// 'dus pas phyogs bcing rdzas brlabs nas// spyi 'am yang na re re zhing // chom bu'i dkyil
603b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rims bzhin sgrom// rnal 'byor thabs drang shes rab gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum du bsgom// sems dpa' sems ma nyid du sgom// so sor rigs dang phyag rgyu dang // ting 'dzin yang dag so sor gsal//
603b3(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi rigs te rigs kyi gtso// thugs kyi thugs te thugs kyi mchog/ khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi// chom bu gcig pa'i lha rnams bsgom// de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs// pad+ma'i rigs te sku gsung thugs//
603b4(rgyud 'grel): khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan rigs pa'i// chom bu gsum pa'i lha rnams bsgom// lnga dang lnga'i sbyor ba yo sa// chom bu lnga'i lnga bkod la// khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu// 'khor lo'i tshul du rnam par bsgom// byin brlabs dbang dang ldan
603b5(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// rang bzhin gnas nas dbab byas te// bzhugs dang bstan byas rim par mchod// rdzogs nas bstod de bsnyen pa bya// zin nas bsdu ste rnal 'byor tshogs// tshul bzhin mchod pa'i 'phrin las bya// nang nub mkha
603b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro lhag ma sbyin// bar chad zlog cing bsnyen pa bya// zla phyed phyed zhig nyi bsnyen pa// lha gsal 'phro 'dus snod du rung // bco lnga mar phyed bsgrub pa ste// 'phro 'du bsnol nas bsgrub par bya// zhag grangs tshangs nas
604a1(rgyud 'grel): rtags byung na// dngos grub bzlas bslang bsgrub chen po// de bzhin rgyud kyi zhag grangs bzhin// bar chad med par bsgrub par bya// spyod lam yo byad lnga spyod cing // dngos su mchod pa rnams gnyis po// gtsar
604a2(rgyud 'grel): dgos pa gang yin pa// phyi ma'i gdug pa 'dul bar shes// snga mra rgyas par bshad par bya// gros brgyan bza' btung glu gur rnams// hU~M du shes pas rab spyad na// ngo mtshor dkyil 'khor mnyes pa'i phyir// gsung sogs yo byad
604a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga po rnams// rigs phyir ma skyes ye shes gsal// chos nyid ye shes rol par sgom// cig shos tshe yang de bzhin no// phyogs bcu mtha' yas dus bzhi'o// thams cad dbyer med ma 'da' la// nyi zla shar ba'i
604a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas nang // pad+ma chags med gdan bting nas// rin chen dzad med pho brang sa// che chung tshad dpag myed pa'i// byang chub bde ldan dkyil 'khor lo// bde ldan byang chub rab bkod nas// ma lus thams cad dbyings
604a5(rgyud 'grel): bsdus nas// lus bskyod yan lag bskul gsogs na// dbang po lnga'i dkyil 'khor kun// phyag rgya chen po yin par bshad// lhag pa'i ting 'dzin 'ba' zhig gi oM// bri stsogs tshe na sgom pa'ang/ bruM dang tsakra'i dkyil
604a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du// pad+ma chags med gdan bting nas// thabs dang shes rab chags mang tshul// yan lag lnga po thams cad kun// rang bzhin yongs kyis dag pa dang // ting 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o// ye nas ma
604b1(rgyud 'grel): bcos yongs rdzogs kyis// lhag pa'i ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gyis// dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor// yan lag bzhi la rigs bzhi'i 'khor// kha dogs dbyibs dang phyag rgya dang // thabs dang shes rab gsal
604b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms te// phyogs bcur spros shing ngan song sbyong // gnas su bsdu zhing dkyil 'khor bstim// 'das dang mu 'das thams cad kun// bde gshegs zhing du rnam par sbyong // yan lag chen po lnga bskyod na// rigs
604b3(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i dkyil 'khor mA lus g.yo// 'gro lnga byang chub lam du mdzad// snyigs ma lnga yang rnam par drag/ bzang mdzes legs par gos bgos na// 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro bar 'gyur// de nas mthar thug med pa'i
604b4(rgyud 'grel): bar/ ye shes lnga yis brgyan par 'gyur// brgyan mchog mdzes par lus brgya ne nas// ting 'dzin 'od 'bar gsal bsgoms te// phyogs bcu gang bar dkyil 'khor spros// bdag nyid chen po'i dkyil 'khor
604b5(rgyud 'grel): lha/ mI dmigs de byings rgyas dkyil 'khor mchod// 'dod lnga thabs dang shes rab gnas// bde mchog ro yang myong bar byed// bag chags tshogs chen gnyis dang ldan// dro thabs gar gyi phyag rgya dang // glu dbyangs
604b6(rgyud 'grel): tshig gi sgra sogs no// phyogs bcu skye gnas ma lus kun// lhun grub rdo rje'i sku mthong zhing // chos kyi dung chen sgra yong thos// sgrib gnyis byung nas byang chub 'grub// bden mthong snyan grogs tshogs chen 'gru/
605a1(rgyud 'grel): ma chags ye shes tshe dang ldan// thabs dang shes rab thams cad kun// dbus nas shAr phyogs kha bstan te// seng ge stabs rkyen mchod par bya// dbang po lnga la yi ge lnga// gsal ba'i 'phro 'du ma ngan
605a2(rgyud 'grel): shes rdzogs// 'dod pa lnga la chags med rol// bdag dang gzhan don rdzogs par byed// chom bu gsal ba'i yab yum rnams// phan tshun 'od 'phro stim bya ste// dkyil 'khor 'bar ba gsal gyur nas// bdag dang phyogs
605a3(rgyud 'grel): bcu'i gnyis med sgom// phyogs phyogs rim bzhin kha ltas te// thugs sku gsung yon lhas kyi glu// blo tshig brjod dang ye shes rgyan// pro g+hu rigaswA lnga pyaM g+hA po// rnam lnga stan nas glu ldan bya// sreg ldan bro glus don
605a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis rdzogs// bza' dang bca' dang btung myur rnams// thibs dang shes rab nyid gnas shing // bdag nyid chen po mchod pa yis// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyis// srid gsum sems can thams cad la//
605a5(rgyud 'grel): bde ba chen pos khyad par 'gyur// bdud rtsir 'gyur zhing 'byung ba dang // bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad spel cing // longs spyod 'byung zhing ngan+da song skyed// cir yang gzhan du 'gyur bar 'grub// de ltar bzhi dang ldan pa yis// 'bra
605a6(rgyud 'grel): dang shes rab ldan gyur na// byin brlabs che rnams rdzogs par bya// bsnyen bsgrub gsang ba bzhi rim pa// thams cad gnyis med dbyings su sbyor// gnyis med dbyings nas byang chub 'bar// 'od 'phro 'bar bas phyogs
605b1(rgyud 'grel): bcur gsal// bde bas thabs chen thabs kyi mchog/ shes rab bde mchog brtan ldan rdzogs// rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan// phyag rgya bzhi dang lha mo brgyad// rdzogs rol nyi zla dus cig ldan// gnyis med zung du 'brel 'gyur na//
605b2(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus 'byung // thig le rdo rje'i gzugs su chags// mchid chen mkha' 'gro gsal bar 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis// dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pas// phyogs bcu dus
605b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra ba brtan pa yis// phyogs bcu dus pa zhi gshegs pa yi// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus dang // khams gsum 'gro rnams mngon du 'gyur//
605b4(rgyud 'grel): sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// dkyil 'khor brtan pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bro grar 'du 'phro'i phyag rgya yis// 'dzul lam na mkha' 'gro bar 'gyur// glu tshog sgra'i phyag rgya yis// chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// brgyan dang
605b5(rgyud 'grel): bgo ba'i phyag rgya yis// 'bar ba'i rgyal po thub med 'grub// bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgya yis// yid bzhin sku dang bdud rtsi 'grub// A li kA li'i phyag rgya yis// thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams
605b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub bya ba// gnas dang zla dang rdzas rnams ni// tshogs kyi mchog tu dmigs par gzhag/ nags tshal chen po dben pa'i sar// gzhung dang mthun pa rnyeng nas ni// gnod sprad sa gnan byin gyis brlab// sa gzhi mnyam
606a1(rgyud 'grel): pa rgyas par bya// sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdzogs sangs rgyu bya// dkyil 'khor lnga bcu brgyad bstan pa'i// cho ga yan lag rdzogs pa yi// rnal 'byor 'dus pas nges par 'grub// ston pa rdo rje rgyal dbang nan// rgyal
606a2(rgyud 'grel): tshab rgyal por mtshungs pa dang // dkar ma 'i dwangs chen 'phreng bar ldan// ljon tsug sdong reg mtshan rdzogs dang // rnal 'byor ming sring rtse gdung ldan// chom bu lnga 'om zung gis 'grub// dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dro sho chen// rdo rje dung chen
606a3(rgyud 'grel): dmar gyis bgang // dung dang srog shing gsar rnying dang // gzugs dang lugs chen dung mchog dang // rgyan chas bcu drug tshong ba dang // bsgrub pa 'tshe ba'i yo byad dang // bsgrub pa rdzas kyi yo byad dag/ zhing 'gyur mchog dang mchog
606a4(rgyud 'grel): phran dang // skyen bzlog yungs kar lce brog nA ga/ gu gul sprin dang bcas pa dang // rdo rje go mtshan bcas pa dang // ji snyed pa'i rdzas rnams kun// 'jigs byed chen po'i tong 'dzin dang // nyams pa med pa'i sems kyis
606a5(rgyud 'grel): spyad// bsngos te rmugs su bya ba'i phyir// ci 'dod snang ba bdag gis dgod// zhag ni sum ts+tsha phrag drug gam// drug bcu dgu ban+d+ha rtsa drug tu// 'jigs byung chen po'i dkyil 'khor sgom// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la//
606a6(rgyud 'grel): rdorjeng dang bcas pa'i bsam pa yis// re ba med par rab tu bsgrub// glu dang gar dang phyag rgya dang // byang chub sems kyis mchod pa dang // 'ja' la sogs pa'i yon tan dang // bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo//
606b1(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad kyis// mdor na tshogs rnams mngon du bsgrub// spyi'o bsnyen bsgrub mngon bzhin shes// bsgrub pa'i thabs kyi bsnyen bsgrub bzhi// drang po'i che na gnas chen der// rgyang grags dpag tshad la so/
606b2(rgyud 'grel): dang / lus ngag lus ni gsum gyi tshad// rang gi rig pas ci nus par// phyag rgya gzugs bsnyen snying po rnams// lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya// yo byad sngon bzhin byin brlabs nas// 'phags rgyal mchod cing phyi rol pa//
606b3(rgyud 'grel): bcu pa n+ti mnyes dang gnyis blo yang // sbyin pas tsham b+h+yas bgro bar bya// 'jigs byed dbang du bdag zhugs nas// khro bo khro mo'i 'khor du b+ha// gdan du gzer zhing phur bus gang gA/ rang bzhin phal pa mchod bstod de// bar chad
606b4(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin mchog gis bzlog/ thun mong bsrung ba'i 'khor lor bya// de nas gnyis pa rgyun rnams dang // bsgrub rdzas mchod pa ngam rdzogs nas// phyi nang gsang pas bsrung byas te// srin po rgyal po tshul bzhin munan// rtags ldan
606b5(rgyud 'grel): rdzas la byin parlabs bya// de nas rdzas rnams byin gyis brlab// de nas 'khor lo gcig pa 'am// gsum dang lnga ru sgom bya ba// 'khor lo bar 'khyams sgo rna dang // 'jigs byed 'khor lo rigs kyi gtso// btsun mo'i tshigs
606b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan par bya// zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas// 'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su// bdag nyid drag por bcos tshul du// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor sgom// de bzhin rdo rje pad+ma dang // rin chen ral gri tshom bu sgom//
607a1(rgyud 'grel): cig la'o rdo rje gsum myos pa// sku gsung thugs kyi 'jigs byed do// 'jigs byed lnga rdzogs dkyil 'khor ni// 'dus pa'i tshom bu lnga'i rigs// nyi shu rtswa lU sgra gsung thugs// yon tan 'byin
607a2(rgyud 'grel): las rdzogs par sgom// rgyan dang cha lugs la sogs pa// 'jigs pa'i tshogs ni dzI bzhin par// spyi 'om yang na re re ru// tshwam dam chen po'i cha lugs sgom// lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor dgu rgu ldan// byin dbang thob
607a3(rgyud 'grel): bu'i bad+mag dkyil lta// rab bzhin phab bkug bzhugs cing brtan// dgyes nas rim bzhin mchod pad+ma byaM// oM A hUM su rA to// ma hA pan tsa shri he ru ka/ man tA dz+wA la ma hA ma ni de li// kA ya bA ga tsi ta/
607a4(rgyud 'grel): ai au au/ d+hu hUM d+h+waM/ s+t+waM swaM sAM/ AM AM AM/ ti ha ta// badz+ra ma hA kA pa la khar ga dAn ta dan dz+wa la sr-i d+hI/ m+b+hah+nA shrI he ru ka A mai duM ai sIng d+yod b+hA be/ sang hA ra na hAM hUM hUM mAng+ku yau ga ad d+ha ma hA sa ma yaM// r+ye wA ru wa/
607a5(rgyud 'grel): a la la la so/ oM A~MHhUM su r+yA to ka ma le// ma hA su ka mA l+ye/ me nu s+yA ma na/ dza li d+hA na/ oM ba s+pho ka kha'i/ e le la lA ho// mchod bstod rdzogs ras bsnyen pa ni// ye shes mdun du lhag pA la// bzlas pa
607a6(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba gsum gyis bya// oM badz+ra ma hA shrI he ru kaM/ badz+ra kr-i ti shwa ri sarba dus stan hU~M phaT// ru lu ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hUM/ ru lu ru lu hU~M Sh+T+r-i hAM/ de sogs bzlas bai snyen 'phro 'du yis// bdun
607b1(rgyud 'grel): bar bskul dang snod byed pa// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'o// de bsnyen de bzhin bsgrub pA yang // 'phro 'du bskul dang dngos grub sdud// skyon bcu spangs te bsgrub pa ni// bsgrub pa'i dus su shes par bya// gcig la
607b2(rgyud 'grel): rdzas ltar tshur 'du ba// bsgrub pa chen por shes par bya// shel dang byu ru bung pa dang // mthing gi bud pa mang po dag/ rim bzhin bung ba me tog dang // mtshe la sor chen 'bab bzhin no// 'od dang dri dang sgra gzugs dang /
607b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang 'bar dang khol 'byung na// bar chad cha rnams brtag bya ste/ bar chod bskrad de bdag bsrungs la// zhag grangs tshad zhing rtags byung na// dkyil 'khor 'thun pa nyid du sbyar// gnas su stim zhing bstan par bya//
607b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas sngon+da bzhin rnam gsum thob// gsang mchog rgyas par bshud bya ba// zhing 'gyur mchog dang mchog phran rnams// nyi zla'i steng du mkhas pus gzhag/ nga rgyal lag gi 'du byed sgom// hU du gyur pas rnam par
607b5(rgyud 'grel): ngag/ dbyings su thim nas phyag rgyan 'bar// rkur gyur 'od zer 'phro bas brjid// gtsug tu rnam par rgyal ba bsgom// de bzhin gshegs par byin brlabs nas// rgyal ba'i sras su dbang yong skur// shin tu
607b6(rgyud 'grel): khro bo chen po yis// thabs kyi lha chen bsgral ba ltar// chos nyid rtogs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// gnyis su med par thal gyis bsgral// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// lam lnga'i sems can kun
608a1(rgyud 'grel): bkug nas// thams cad ma lus bsgral bar bya// phyi nang snod bcud ji snyed pa// gnas pa'i sems can ma lus kun// bdag nyid chen po rtogs pa yis// dbyings su yang ni bsgral bar bya// ri rab
608a2(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i gling pan+ti lA// gnas pa'i sems can ma lus kun// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// ye shes me chen sgom bya s+t+wa~M// thams cad ma lus bsreg par bya// dbyings su yang ni bstim par bya// srid gsum sreg
608a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i me yin te// yid kyi ye shes me ru 'ab// re ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i thabs// yau nas skye med de bzhin nyid// sgyu mar snang ba mig yor tshul// sbyor sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang // rdul cha tsam yang byas pa myed// de ltar bsgril
608a4(rgyud 'grel): pa kun byas kyang // bsgral ba'i dngos po gang yang med// phyung po lnga po gshig par bya// gshig nas 'byung ba'i bag la zhe// ma zhig na yang 'byung ba yin// rnam shes med pas bsang byas nas// rmi lam srog bcad tshul bzhin
608a5(rgyud 'grel): du gnas pa nyid na dngos po meng // sems kyi rang bzhin de la ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas dgrar langs kyang // sus kyang zin cing sod pa med// 'o na thugs rjes gang bsgral na// rnam rtog mtshan ma thams cad kun// /
608a6(rgyud 'grel): phyin ci log las bzlog bya ste// ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya dang // shin tu goms pas dbang bskur te// byang chub zhing la dgod par bya// de tsam las ni bsgral zhes gdags// bsgral ba nyid na sbyor ba yod//
608b1(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad bcad nas// byang chub gnas su bsgral bas na// gnyis med dbyings su sbyor ba yin// lha mo glu mo rigs ngan mo// dbye 'am yang na mi dbye bar// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen po// bsgrub pa dang
608b2(rgyud 'grel): no bsgrub chen pos// shes rab dbyings ma khrus byas la// bder gshegs dkyil 'khor kun bkod ngo // bdag nyid rig pa'i ltar sgoms nas// gnyis su med par ldan par bya// rdo rje dril bu lhun gyur nas// yuma~M gyi pad+ma/
608b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du// byang chub pad+ma'i bde thugs spros// sems lnga rim par zin pa yis// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus la// dgyes mnyam mchog te/ sbyin pas bstim// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor gsum mnyes
608b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa 'phro ba mang po dri thob nis// slar yang gnyis med dbyings su thim// thim gyur dbyings nas phyag rgyar 'bar// bde gshegs thabs dang shas rlob rdzogs// phyag rgya drug kyang yang dag rdzogs// bsod
608b5(rgyud 'grel): nams tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs// bsgrub pa nyi zla'i snying po de// dkyil 'khor rdo rje lce yis rlung // mkha' 'gro gsal 'bar tshe la sogs// yid bzhin sprin gyi bang gi por 'gyur// 'gro drug dus ga
608b6(rgyud 'grel): de dag snang // mchod pa chen po mnyam sbyor zhing // thams cad dbyings su sbyor bas na// ngan 'gror mi ltung yang ngag 'grub// 'di ni bsgral ba chen po yin// bsgral ba nyid na sbyor ba yin// sbyor ba nyid ni ma lus
609a1(rgyud 'grel): bskul// ye nas lha dang lha mo yi// dkyil 'khor yang dag sbyor ba dang // dbang po yul dus sbyor ba'o// phung po lnga nyid de bzhin gshegs// 'byung ba lnga nyid yum du sbyor// dus bzhi lha mo nyid du sbyor// rtag
609a2(rgyud 'grel): chad mu bzhi khro mo bzhi// thams cad ma lus 'byung ba kun// mnyam pa'i dbyings nyid rig par sbyor// thabs kyis srin mo rol pa ltar// sbyor ba nyid na chags pa med// ma chags pa la tshogs pa dang // tshigs pa nyid ni zin
609a3(rgyud 'grel): chags med// 'di ni tshangs mchog rgyal po ste// shin tu chags pa chen po yin// ma rtags pa yi spyad gyur na// yi dgas srin po'i gnas su skye// mchod pa 'am spyod lam thams cad du// chas brgyad brgyan rnams
609a4(rgyud 'grel): bgo byas te// bza' btung rjes su mthun par dpyang // bro gar glu chog ldan par bya// dbang po yul dus rig pa rnams// thabs dang shes rab ldan 'gyur zhing // mnyam pa'i ngang nyid rtogs gsal na// thams cad bde ba chen po'i rgya
609a5(rgyud 'grel): bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// khro bo khro mo thams cad kum// gsal zhing 'od zer 'phro bsgoms na// bskul bskyod thams cad phyag rgya yin// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i zhabs// rtag tu rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur// thabs
609a6(rgyud 'grel): tsheni re re spyod pa na// pad+ma chags med re re 'thung // rdo rje pad+ma de sbyor na// sems can thams cad bla na med// byang chub zhing du skye bor 'gyur// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lha rnam dang // khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sgom bya ste// dbu'i dkyil 'khor
609b1(rgyud 'grel): bskul bskyod na// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad g.yo// lag gi 'du byed bskyod byas na// rigs 'dzin zhing khams thams cad g.yo// rkang pa'i stabasra chen mnan mchongs na// sdug bsngal mi zad thams cad dang // bdud dang
609b2(rgyud 'grel): log 'dren thams cad mnan// yan lag thams cad bskul bsigs na// baM spu bu gau re re nas// khro bo rdul snyed grangs med spro// de'i sprul pa grangs med kyis// phyogs bcu khams rnams rdul snyad du// khro bre'i don rnams rdul phran
609b3(rgyud 'grel): snyed// thugs rjes 'dul zhing dbyings su bstim// bro gar glu tshig stangs stabs dang // ting 'dzin yo byad thams cad kun// zhi ba tshigs kyi dkyil 'khor lus// bro gar rtse 'jo la sogs bsgyur// 'khor gyi 'phra men tshim bya ste// dbang
609b4(rgyud 'grel): du bsdu dang sgom pa rnams// rgyas byas skye las bsdus te dpyad// de ltar bsgrubs pas the tshom med// thabs dang shes rab thams cad kyis// de lta bu'i longs spyod ni// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes// srid gsum 'gro/
609b5(rgyud 'grel): ba thams cad la// dga' ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur// rtogs chen sngon bzhin 'phel ba rten// gling grangs mthong ba drug kyang 'byung // sgra brnyan rmi lam dag tu yang // bde ba'i 'jig rten gnas rnams dang // skye ba gang dag 'dzin/
609b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // rigs 'dzin lung skyon brtag par bya// zhag grangs bcu drug tshun ched kyis// lus ma spangs par rigs 'dzin se// yun rings chos kyi bde sbyar nas// bla med rdo rje sems raba'i sar// dpe byad mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan//
610a1(rgyud 'grel): mngon shes drug ldan thams cad mkhyen// tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol// sangs rgyas zhing la dbang sgyur te// spyod yul kun tu ma 'da' la// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// de bas las dus rag
610a2(rgyud 'grel): lus sems// dor byas brtson 'grus chen pos sbyor// mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan 'da'o// rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis// 'di lta bu'i las byas na// 'bras bu mngon du ma byung na// lus ngag yid la dbang thob nas// sangs rgyas
610a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung dang skal nyams 'gyur// las dang 'brel pa'i byin brlabs kyis// thegs pa dman par yod mi skye// bsod nams ye shes dpung tshogs kyis// las kyi mun pa sbyangs pa'i phyir// ngan song gsum du yong mi ltung // gnas ngan
610a4(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod mi bde ba'i// ngan song brgyad du 'gro mi 'gyur// gzugs mchog dam pa ldan pa'i phyir// rdo rje theg mchog rjed mi 'gyur// tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs// lha ma'i gnas mchog sa skabs der// lus byad bzang zhing
610a5(rgyud 'grel): yan lag rdzogs// dbang po tshang zhing lcu ga rgyud med// skad gdangs snyan cing 'gro de ni byed// bdag gi longs spyod thams cad kun// gzhan la gnod pa med par 'grub// chen po che'i mthu stobs ldan// 'gro ba'i don dang yang dag ldan
610a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan la gnod pa yong mi byed// snying rje che zhing shes rab ldan// mthu stobs che zhing thabs ldan pas// bdag dang gzhan don rdzogs par byed// mthar phyin skye shi med pa'i sa// sangs rgyas yon tan rin po che// bkod pa'i
610b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas thams cad la// 'dod lnga drug pa ji lta bar// dbang sbyar dpyod pa'i dngos grub thob// de phyir dbang sgyur phyi ma'i dus// nyid du sbyor bas rmongs ci dgos// de ltar brtson 'grus ldan pas ni// mthong dang phyi mar ma gyur na'ang
610b2(rgyud 'grel): lan grangs gzhan du'ang bdun nyid las// mi 'da' rigs kyi dam par 'gyur// cho ga sngags dang yo byad dag/ bai co lnga rdzogs nas ma nyams ldan// nges par tshogs te tshogs dpyad na// 'bras bu sngon du ma byung yang // rgyal po
610b3(rgyud 'grel): bran mo ngan bshos kyang // 'byung nur chags pa'i rigs 'dzin te// mthong na dmangs kyi slar 'gyur zhing // kun la dbang sgyur stobs ldan pas// lce rnams re bya'i mthu skye bas// bsrung rjed mchod pa byed pa ltar// rnal 'byor stobs
610b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'gyur ba na// rdo rje dam can mang po kun// de'i dbang gi khur bar byed// spyod yul dor nas phyag rgyur rdzogs// la la de ltar de des na// de ltar ma gyur bsod nams so// tshe rabs skye ba thams cad du// las ngan lnga bcu brgyad spyod
610b5(rgyud 'grel): be'i// sa gnas kun tu skye myi 'gyur// nges 'byung bzhi'ang spyod mi 'gyur// rdo rje rigs mchog 'dzin+da 'gyur te// rnam smin thob nas sngon bzhin te// 'di la the tshom ldan min pas// sbrul ldan kun gyis rtags 'grub bya'o//
610b6(rgyud 'grel): bar chad med pa'i lam// tsho gas bsgrub pa'i lelu ste/ bdun po'o// / dngos grub lhag pa'i mchog nyid la// bsnyen bsgrub bzhi yis mos byas nas// bde chen sa la dgod pa'i phyir// mthar phyin 'bras bu'i mtshan
611a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid bshang // dus tshogs bar chad med sA nAs// lhag ma med dang yod pa yi// mya ngan 'da' bas mthur sbyor ba// thun mong lta bur zung du 'gyur// de la thog ma bshad pa ni// gcig dang du ma'i rnal 'byor ma//
611a2(rgyud 'grel): brtan nyid sa 'am de thob nas// zla drug bcu drug bsnyen bsgrub che// rdo rje'i lus su ma gyur par// stobs chu rkye ni smon zhan pa'i phyir// rnam rtog 'byung ba'i lkog lus gzhag/ rdo rje 'chang ser rigs pas 'gro// lha'i rnal 'byor
611a3(rgyud 'grel): gsal rdzogs smin// lus kyi rlabs bsgrib gyur pa'i// ka la bing ka mi 'jigs bzhin// bral nas snang byed de rnams smin// yid kyis lha'i gzugs bzung zhing // lus kyi rgya mdud dral gyur nas// phyag rgya'i sku nyid gsal 'gyur
611a4(rgyud 'grel): nus// rnam par smin ces de la bya// rgyu de mig rgyas ji lta bar// phyag rgya thob la ma rig pa'i// gzugs rdzogs stobs chen de kho na'o// de yang dgongs sa khyad par gnyis// dgongs spyod rgya mtsho snga phyi dang // rgyud mthun stobs chas
611a5(rgyud 'grel): ming grangs pa// lhag med 'byung med las lus med// mya ngan 'das pa 'am min ces brjod// dkyil 'khor rol pa'i tshul spyod pas// cho gas gnyis rdzogs pas bdag gi don// smin pas 'phrin las rdzogs byed pas// mi dor
611a6(rgyud 'grel): dgod pa gzhag kyi'o// de de'ang 'di dang phyi ma dang // lan grangs gzhan du rab 'bring gis// thob kyi skal bar ma 'gyang ste// dgongs spyod rtsom pa gtso phyir ro// gang de bral ma thag par du// brgya bzhi rdzogs par bdag 'gyur ba//
611b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje lnga sogs rig pas 'dzin// phyag rgya chen po'i rigs 'bras bu// de phyir rgya che'i bar chad med// lam mchog dbye sa gcig yin no// bar chad med pa 'am smin pa'i// mngon par shes pa'ang de ming can// mi 'gyur nges par 'gyur ba'ang
611b2(rgyud 'grel): yin// dpag tshad gling khams yul la sbyor// phyi ma dus kyi tshogs bsgrubs pas// dgongs spyod brtson pa stobs rdzogs dang // yo byad thabs kyi stobs las skyes// gzhan pa'i yo byad rtags pa na// dngos grub rol pa'i mthu
611b3(rgyud 'grel): las byung // thabs rgyus che bas so so'ang // lAm las skyes pas mchog yin te// de yang rgyu mo dus ngo bo grangs// dgongs spyod mngon shes sbyor ba'i tshul// bzhi gnyis lus kyis rdzogs par bshad// thabs dang grang ba sgyur bya
611b4(rgyud 'grel): shes rab rnams gsum goms byas nas// ting 'dzin mnyam pa'i don rtogs te// kun tu yongs pa chen por sgom// shes 'jug lnga rtogs goms pas ni// zla zhag rgyud bzhin bsgrub byed pas// rdo rje'i lus su the tshom med// ming
611b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi lus nyid de lta'o// zhag nI sum cu phrag drug gam// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// rab 'bring ji bzhin mi slu bar// dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// rgyu 'bras dus gcig rdzogs pa'i// rang rig nyid la dbang
611b6(rgyud 'grel): thob ste// tshe ni bcu dang drug pa'i// brgya brgya dag tu skur zhing gnas// lus ma bor bar sangs rgyas pa'o// don mthong 'jug pa mthar phyin pa// tshogs spyod bsgrub pa'i dngos grub kyis// lus khams skye gnas zag pa zad// rdo rje'i
612a1(rgyud 'grel): lus 'gyur tshe'i rigs// mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan 'das// lus ma bor bar spangs rgyas sa// 'jigs pa kun bral cho 'phrul tshogs// g+ha mi'i rgyal po skye ba 'dzin// lha dang mi dang tshangs pa'i// skye ba rnam dag/
612a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin mos kyang // khyad par sa la gnas 'gyur yin// chu byad de nyid kyis chos ston// gang dag mi 'jigs rtsi 'chang ltar// dbang sgyur 'jigs pa lnga sogs bral// drug bzhi'i yan lag kun rdzogs shing // rang dbang sbyor ba'i skye
612a3(rgyud 'grel): ba yis// stong gsum 'jig rten rgyar 'dul byed// sgyu'i drang po'i bskal mnyam pa'o// bdag phyir don du gnyer ba ni// brgya phrag bcu drug tshe yis rdzogs// gzhan du rang dbang thob pa'i phyir// bskal pa grangs med ga nas 'gyur
612a4(rgyud 'grel): yang // sku ni shin tu gzhon pa'i tshul// 'dul ba'i dus kyi 'pho 'dug byed// ngo bo sman dang thabs rigs 'dzin// rnal 'byor sgrol ma'i rigs 'dzin dang // lam mchog rdzogs pa'i rim pa'ang bzhi// bcu dbang dang por 'dra/
612a5(rgyud 'grel): mod kyang // de nyid mthu zag mi zag/ rgyu dang ngo bo rnam pa gnyis// de bas dgongs spyod smos ci dgos// gzhan las grub pas de rigs min// mchog la'ang yon tan mtshan chas brjod// lus dang phung por bcas pa yi// /
612a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas par dbang ba'i rigs 'grub phyir// lhag rton 'byung las lus bcas 'das// zag kun zad pa'i rigs chen 'di// ji ltar spyad kyang ldog ma byed// rang dbang thob pas dbugs phyung phyir// skabs 'dir bden pa bar mthong nas// mkhas
612b1(rgyud 'grel): rtogs goms spyod rig pa 'dzin// lha la sogs pa'i rdo rje 'dzin// ming rtog gzungs las ming thob pa/ yon tan grangs kyis bsnam mi khyab// bsngos sa zhing khams lung ston pa// rdo rje rdo rjer pos dbang bsgyur// mthong goms mthu' ldan rig pa
612b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid// snang ba rig pa 'dzin pa'i gnas// rigs snang gnas la nges pa med// skye ba cha byad don gyi 'gyur// chos rnam bdag phyir dmigs med phyir// chos kun mi mthong chos nyid kyang // mi mthong sangs rgyas thugs mi mthong // snod bcud
612b3(rgyud 'grel): mi mthong gang mthong ba// des ni yang dgra bden pa mthong // de bas thos myong rog sogs lam// shes 'jugs bar tshod med las skyes// de phyir mngon gsum rtogs mchog ni// rang dbang thob nas mngon bzhin te// zag gsum zag
612b4(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di la med// stan chung lam gyi 'du byed med// de'i re dogs chags bral bas// rim pa 'am rim pa med tshul gyis// stong khri la sogs grangs mang lha'i// 'khor lo gsal rdzogs rnal 'byor gnas// dkyil 'khor gnyis
612b5(rgyud 'grel): don grub mdzad// de ming dbang sgyur rnal 'byor de// brgya phrag cha rdzogs dus bar du// goms byas gnyis thob mtha' skad cig/ cha'i rdo rje dpa' bos sbyor// rigs 'thun mchog rgya sprul pa las// gsang thos bsam rig sgom sbyor/
612b6(rgyud 'grel): bas dkyus sar phyin pa cang shes bzhin// kun tu 'gro la bdag po'i don// rdzu 'phrul tshos snang rjes ston brjod// drug shes de ming ldan pa yis// dbang sgyur rtse ba rdo rje'i sku// bya byed rdzogs par 'gyur ba yin// bzhi'o/
613a1(rgyud 'grel): sh+tsab+h+ya/ phyog mus don+da spyod pas// nus mthu can gyur dbang can des// mkha' la 'phyo dang rigs 'dzin gnas// chu rgyun bzlog dang rlung mi 'gul// ri brag la srogs thogs med 'dzul// chu la mi 'bying
613a2(rgyud 'grel): mes mi tshig/ dug dang mtshon gyis 'jigs mi 'gyur// mi snang ba dang meng por sprul// gzhan yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// sgra srin rnams la dbang spyir dang // tshe dang dus la bsring btung dang // skyong gsum nyung 'brur shed
613a3(rgyud 'grel): ba dang // nyung 'brus stong gsum gang ba dang // pA spu gang bsdu'i bzhin no// sreg pa'i bskal pa bzhil ba dang // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bum dgye dang // skams sar chu 'byung bye ma gser// sol ba ljon shing dbyung ba dang /
613a4(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' rdo rje sra 'byung zhing // 'bar na maM'ang tshig pa dang // chur 'gyur 'bapA pa'ang de bzhin no// 'jig rten gtor lung bya ba'ang 'grub// dgug dang btang dang bcing dang dgrol// gso dang bsad dang 'pham dang rgyal// dzI ltar
613a5(rgyud 'grel): dmyigs pa bzhin du 'grub// sbrul dang gru can gzan gdug pa rnams// khyi bzhin phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// bdud dang gdug pa sna tshogasaM rnams// tshugs par mi 'gyur bran bzhin 'gyur// lus ma dor ba rA riT
613a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin sar// thugs rjes sprul pa'i byin brlabs kyis// so so'i skad dang mthun pa yis// so sor thar pa'i lam yang ston// ngan song stongs shing bskul ba dang // lam stegs dgod cing de dag nyid// theg
613b1(rgyud 'grel): chen lam la dgod par mdzad// thar pa bskul zhing zhi ba slong // sa bcu shes bya sbyong byed cing // bde gshegs 'khor la'ang chos ston mdzad// stong gsum brgya bcu'i 'jig rten rnams// g.yo dang rab g.yo shin tu g.yo// mdzad
613b2(rgyud 'grel): pa snang bas de gnas rnams// nad g.yos so'i rim sbyor bye // gsang ba sngags kyi sgra bsgrags pas/ kun kyang rmad 'byung sngags kyi sbrang // grags pas bdud 'dul dranu song skyong // 'gro bA ma lus don yang byed// las rnams
613b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kun byas nas// skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung thob// mtshan dang dpe' byed kun gyis brgyan// mthar phyin bya ba med pa 'grub// rgyud las gsungs pa'i lnga bzhi'o// spyod pa bcu gnyis 'phrin las rnams// dbang sgyur nyid
613b4(rgyud 'grel): du thogs med par// sngon bzhin yul khyon 'dul bar byed// skye mched rang 'byung ye shes phyir// de nyid gcig dang du ma'i mtha'// gnyis su med par sngon rtogs goms// mthong pas dri ma drug sbyangs phyir// de nyid gzung/
613b5(rgyud 'grel): sgra dri re reg/ shes pa'i bye brag rtswa wA bau shwadra// gcig gis yul lnga gcod byed pas// tshod dang ma tshad 'jigs rigs med// gzhan du lha'i rna ba dang // spyan gyis mngon par shes dang // ston gnas rjes su dran pa dang /
613b6(rgyud 'grel): rol rnams kyi sems shis dang // 'tsho 'pho skye ba mkhyen pa dang // rdzu 'phrul shes pa 'am zag zad shes// de rnyed tshul can yul shes pas// gang dang gang rnams 'dul bar mdzad// de meng mi ldog zag med dang // dbang sgyur
614a1(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi mtshan las brjod// bdag gam gzhan phyir dbang can des// sku tshe'i tshad dam ji snyed par// bzhugs mtha' rang gi grub sbyor ba// sngon bzhin rims dang cig car bu'o// de 'dra snga mra mthong ba'i la
614a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid du// rang gi shes rab gsum goms pas// rang lus rgyal ba'i phyag rgya che// gang snyoms mngon du gyur pa'i lha// phyag rgya chen po'i rigs 'dzin dar// yongs 'gyur lhun+da grub thob nas gshegs// phyi mi rigs mchog de
614a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid nas// sngon bzhin goms pa gsum byas pas// rgya dror cig car mthar 'gro ba// chos nyid dam tshig smon mthu'ang yin// de nyid bar ma bshad bya ba'ang // sngon gyi lus kyis rdzogs par bya// gcig dang du mu'i rnal 'byor
614a4(rgyud 'grel): pas// 'byung lus sems phyir rang bzhin lha// mthong goms bsags pa'i mthar bsgrub pas// kun 'gro'i bsgrib dag ngo bo'i rgyu// rnam smin tshil gyis 'grub bya med// snga phyi rgyu 'bras 'dod pa min// dus rims 'dod
614a5(rgyud 'grel): mon cig 'dod phyir// cig pas de nyid la ma byas pas// lhag ma bcas pas bskur bsgrubs mtha'// de nyid gyur pa nges pa med// ra sems phyag rgya chen po ste// goms pa mngon gyur lha'i sku// bsgoms pas gang yin mngon
614a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur sku// thun mong mchog gi mtshan dper ldan// longs spyod gnyis pa phyag rgya'i rigs// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang // pad mo ral gri rigs 'dzin 'gyur// rang lus sdod nas phyag rgya tshe// bsgoms pas sngon du gyur
614b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha// mtshan dpe bzhi dang mngon drug rdzogs// phyag rgya chen po'i rigs su grags// ye shes sku'i cha lugs can// 'byung ba rdo rje'i lus las grol// de phyir sku tshe tshad med de// bskur zhing mngon du bya dang bral// de nyid
614b2(rgyud 'grel): rigs gsum rigs bzhi drang // lnga dang mchog lnga'i rigs 'dzin pas// rnam pa bzhi ru mngon bzhin 'gyur// mtshan gyi ming grangs gnyis dang gsum// mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo zhing // dbang sgyur 'du byed dang
614b3(rgyud 'grel): bral bas// zag pa med pa'i sgom pa'i lam// mi g.yo rnal 'byor nyid du'ang brjod// rgyal bas lung bsten sngon 'byung ba// brtag pa'i bye brag 'di la'ang med// ye shes sku'i rnal 'byor pa// sangs rgyas gnyis pa'i
614b4(rgyud 'grel): spyan dgrongs kyang // rgyu bathun yod kyang mi g.yo thob// shin tu bstan pa'i rlung gnas pa// grangs can 'khor la mngon du snang // 'on kyang rnal 'byor rtsol ba can// mnyam gzhag drang las ma g.yos bzhin// stong gi
614b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten brgya stong phrag/ bcu'i rdul snyed 'jig rten dang // zhing grangs med pas brgya stong phrag/ bcu'i rdul snyed zhing khams su// sngon dang slad 'tshong la sogs pa// sprul pa'i lus kyi sna 'dul bar byed// bzhi
614b6(rgyud 'grel): dang drug sogs de bzhin no// drug dang lnga'i yan lag brkus// shes pa'ang 'dra mod bzhi sogs kun// da rnyed yul gyi khyad par dang // sngon rdzogs mthu dang gdul byas spogs// rang gi mi g.yo mthong goms
615a1(rgyud 'grel): dang // don du gnyer rims la sogs pa'i// lam+b+ha kun rdzogs pa'i stobs byin gyis// rnal 'byor bral nas lhun gyis grub// wA cig gnas pa'i dri ma dag/ brtul ba med par lhun grub mthong // de de
615a2(rgyud 'grel): mngon du byas pa yi// lhun gyis grub pa'i rig pas 'dzin// rang rgyud dag pa'i sangs rgyas de// sngon bzhin bzhi brgyad dgod par bya// sde ma'i rigs la mthu rdzogs pas// bshad pa bzhin du dri ma dag/ sangs rgyas gnyis
615a3(rgyud 'grel): pa shes rab gsum// lhun gyis grub pa'i rigs su 'byung // gnas der sngon bzhin gsum rdzogs pa// longs spyod gsang ba'i lung thob cing // rang gi dgongs spyod nus pa can// mthar dbyung ba'i dus la bab// de ltar dag pa'i
615a4(rgyud 'grel): shes pa nyid// sku lnga'i lhun grub rdo rje 'dzin// lhun mnyam dong la mi gA yo zhing // mi rtog nyid du bzhugs pa'ang // bag lo nyal ba 'joms byed cing // skad cig rag las rigs 'dzin mtha'o// cha byed rgyal ba nyid du ste// lnga po lhun gyis//
615a5(rgyud 'grel): grub phyir na// de 'dra de nyid rgyal tshab ston// de mi stong pas mi 'grub yin// nyid la skye shi maM mnga'i phyir// rdo rje sku'ang gdul bya la// sprul pa rnams ni 'da' tshul ston// don grub la sogs ji lta ba'o// bya ba lhun grub rnal 'byor gyi//
615a6(rgyud 'grel): rigs 'dzin chen po ni rigs 'dzin// tha ma'i ming grangs mthar phyin lam// rang rgyud dag pa'i sangs rgyas dang // de nyid dang ni mthar sbyor lam// yang dag rdzogs pa'i rgyal tshab bo// snga ma gsum dang dang po bzhi'o// cha lugs rang
615b1(rgyud 'grel): gri rgyal tshab sdung // bsam yas lhun gyis grub rdzogs pa'i// thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyan mchog 'chang // yi ge 'khor lo'ang mngon gzigs pa// mi g.yo ba la mi rtogs pas// da rung mngon par mi rgya ste// dus mtha'i skad cig
615b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis gshegs// de na dgongs spyod rgya mtsho kun// ye shes rtsal sogs bya med pa'ang // mthar phyin bya bral la sogs pa'i// ming grangs cha las brjod par zad// nyid phyir rdo rje 'dzin sogs la// skad cig dus kyis brlabs pa
615b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs// tha ma'i bag la nyal ba dang // bcom ldan 'das par gyur pa yin// de tshe de sgrib cha yod kyang // lhun grub rigs 'dzin sar bzhugs nas// zhing khams thugs pa med pa dge/ gdul phyir sbrul sku mdzad pa'ang // srid
615b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum 'gro ba bsamA yas su// thugs rjes sbyin pa bsam mi khyab// don dang mthun pa 'ba' zhig ston// mi mthun zhags pas 'khor ba gcod// la lar lhums zhugs bltam pa dang // la lor rab byung dka' thub mdzad// la
615b5(rgyud 'grel): lar khab dang rgyal srid dang // chos ston mya ngan 'das sogs ston// ris 'ga' zhi la res 'ga' drag/ g.yem la g.yem ston sdang la sdang // dregs la dregs dang mun la mun// rlung la'ang de bzhini mthun mi mthun// D+ha
615b6(rgyud 'grel): mtsho lta bu thabs dpyod dang // 'phrin las de bzhin pa yis dgrol// gsang ba'i tan tra ston pa dang // de bzhin bsdu ba mdzad pa dang // dman lus bsod nams ldan gnas su// sna tshogs lus can rigs la bskor//
616a1(rgyud 'grel): mngan shas drug ldan mtshan parang sdu sags// klan ma na ye shes ma dar bA 'i b+h+r-irA// yul dang chad med rgyal ba nyid// ji ltar me long lta ba n+yAm+b+ha// ma mthun mAn+tan+ta mA ga m+b+ha pan+d+ha b+hAr// d+har+d+has+thA bra Sh+Ta d+hA/
616a2(rgyud 'grel): g+his// bdag rtog mtshan ma kun bcom nas// rdo rje dbyings su brim par byed// bdag med rang rig ye shes kyis// dngos dang dngos med bag chags sregs// rang dang spyi'i chos rnams kun// sems kyi phrag dogs thams cad kun// rdo rje/
616a3(rgyud 'grel): popo med par rtogs byas pas// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor dang // rdo rje rtse mo'i mchog thob pas// yid chod min dang bdud sde rnams// tshwar bcad dpa' bos der rnaMs la// rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor ma 'di la// bsam yas lhun
616a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs kuni mkhyen mdzod// mnyam gzhag ye shes dbang skur zhing // don du gnyer ba'i smon lam mthus// nyi shu rtsa lnga gzhan las mrin// sku dang gsung thugs yon tan dang // 'phrin las rmad 'byung kun grags pa// gzhon
616a5(rgyud 'grel): nAs yo 'ong so ma yin te// rang 'byung ye shes gnas me yin// de bas ngo mtshar cho 'phrul chos// gzhan nas yod thob ma yin phyir// thabs la brten pas shes rab nyid// de lta bu'i ngang du byung // mAn snang 'gyur rtsi ma
616a6(rgyud 'grel): ki ta// ji bzhin ma spangs de nyid 'gyur// 'khor ba ma spangs rnam par dag/ mya ngan mi 'di' ye nas gnas// 'gro dang gnas par bya ba min// rtog pa thams cad ye shes tshogs// mnyam dang mi mnyam mi mnyam
616b1(rgyud 'grel): mnyam/ bya dang mi bya bya med byas// grub dang ma grub thams cad grub// de phyir rigs 'dzanA tha snyad bral// mthar phyin pa'i lam bstan pa'i le'u ste/ brgyad pa'o// // rang bzhin nyid du mngon rdzogs pa'i// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid la
616b2(rgyud 'grel): mos// srid pa rims dang rdzogs tshul gyis// mngon byas den yod bshad par bya// mtshan nyid tha ma'i ze ma ni// de bo tshul dang khyad par gyis// lus gsum don du snang ba rnams// ji lta ba bzhin shes par bya// lus gsum snga ma brjod
616b3(rgyud 'grel): par bya// sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid dang // yon tan 'phrin las rmad 'byung lo// lnga pa'ang lnga nyid ngo bor gnas// e ma'o yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// rgyal ba'i rgyal ba lha'i lnga// 'phags pa'i 'phags pa kun+d+ha tu bzung // de bzhin
616b4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs las de bzhin gshegs// rin chen nor bu bzhin du bzhugs// chos drug nor bus mtshon pa na// gcig drung du ma kun bral ldan/ de de rigs dngos rigs bral ba// nyi shu ltar ldan kun ngo bo// mos bzhin de rigs mthun
616b5(rgyud 'grel): snang la// yang dag nyid du 'di zhes med// lnga nyid lnga lngar ldan par snang // rigs bdag yang dag sangs rgyas pa// tha ma'i tha ma zhen bral ba// ye shes 'gro 'ong med kun khyab// gnyis med pa'i de bzhin nyid// ngang nyid 'gro 'ong med
616b6(rgyud 'grel): par shes// de bzhin bde tshon dang nyid du// zung du kun brel gnyis phyir gshegs// sangs rgyas sems can sem+ba la son// dbang phyug chen po'i skur bzhugs pas// gsang ba'i dbang po 'du bral med// dngos po gnyis la bde
617a1(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod// de nyid cha re brjod pa ni// 'jig rten 'das dad ma dngas kun// dus gsam rmos kun cig pa yi// rgyal ba nyid phyir sna tshogs chos// snang la rang bzhin med pa'i phyir// de nyid d+har mya kA ra/
617a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas// thams cad rang rig mngon sum snang // zhan mtha' kun bral kun chub pa'i// rang 'byung ye shes chen po nyid// glen gzhi 'dul snang phyir sku mchog/ 'dod khams mtha' nas rdzogs kyi bar// sdug bsngal kun dang 'dod
617a3(rgyud 'grel): bsams snyoms// 'go gzhi stang snyoms bde chen sogs// yul med kun rol longs spyod che// rta bdun ri bong can nyid kyi// gzhal yas khang las ma g.yos bzhin// kun tu tha dad skyeng ba ltar// 'gro 'od med 'dul kun sprul
617a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ ji ltar mkha' la 'jig med ltar// mi rtog kun dngos rtag chen po// rdo rje su mchog ste 'jig med// lte pa nyid du bsgrags// so sor 'dul ba ye shes 'ar// rgya mtsho'i tshigs dang shes bya'i// sgrub pa me ma'i spyong
617a5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' che// rgyal po lnga sogs rgyud sbyangs dang // mos spyod dang po 'am dbang sgyur rigs// rdo rje tshogs mthong phyir ming 'grub// de la de'i dgongs bshad pa// brjod dang badrar phyir nges pa// yi ge med par 'byul ba bzhi// yi
617a6(rgyud 'grel): ge drug cu drug gsum brgyas// 'byul ba lnga nyid tshul go ba// so so nyid dang gsang bdag gis// snyen cha lngar ldan phyir thos pa// gsang ba'i rgyud bshad thos zhes gsungs// rang bzhin 'brel dang dbang dang bso// ngang ba'i chu
617b1(rgyud 'grel): la nyi zla bzhin// ma skyes don gyis gsung mchog gis// smra brjod med par snang bar mdzad// rig pa'i ye shes mang lnga pas// de bzhin 'brel pa'i byin brlabs kyis// rang bzhin gsang ba'i rgyud rnams kun// nyi ma ltar bur
617b2(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar snang // me long lta bur chos brgyad kyis// mtshon pa'i dbang phyug sku mthong bas// byang chub sems dang sems dpa' che// rgyud la rdo rje'i don snang byed// grol thar lam dang 'khor ba'i sgra// drug gi rtsu pa yan lag tshul//
617b3(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa'i ngag ltar las can la// snang ba shi'i rna bas thos// ji ltar go dang 'dul snang ba'i// gsung rnams ngos la smras rkyen pa'i// sgra ltar grags stong dbyer med pa'i// mthong thos byed pa'ang de nyid mthu'o// dngos po
617b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis chos yan lag bcas// sems can phyir na stong chen po'i// ye shes zung du bral ba'i// bde ba chen po mchog gi thugs// nam mkha' lta bur sems gsal stong // chos spyir rong mtshan dbyer med kun// yul med
617b5(rgyud 'grel): me long ltar gsal ba// mngon gsum kun gyis mchog yin te// rnam par mi rtog mchog gri thugs// chen po lta bur thams cad la// mi 'byed blang dor med mnyam zhing // mnyam pa chen po mchog gi thugs// thugs
617b6(rgyud 'grel): rje chen pos 'brel ba dang // nyid kyi dbyings las mi zhan phyir// bya byed med pa rnam bzhi yis// 'gro ba kun bsgral thugs chen yin// chos dang chos can kun bral bas// rang sgyid dbyer med dus gcig tu// mkha'
618a1(rgyud 'grel): la 'ja' ltar gsal ba ni// mi phyed rdo rje thugs mchog gro/ phyogs bcu ma lus mi lus pa// rang rgyud med par rig snang ba// sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis// phyogs bcu ma lus sangs rgyas zhing
618a2(rgyud 'grel): lhun rdzogs rig pa rang snang ba'i// gzhal yas khang du gzung dang 'dzin// bral ba'i rang rig rten pa dang // rten can med pa kun gyi gnas// ma spangs lhun gyi sku rdzogs pa'i phyir// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor chen po'i rkyen// sna tshogs
618a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer phyogs bcur gsal// stobs sogs 'bras bu kun rdzogs phyir// gdan lha'i bye brag rang snang ba'o// 'dul ba'i bye brag tha dad pa// zhi dang khro dang mi mes nyams// gzhi phyir rnam bzhi rol pa rnams// gang la mtshams
618a4(rgyud 'grel): bar 'dul bar mdzad// rnam bzhi'i bye brag tha dad pa// re re'ang lde lnga'i tshul gyis snang // de rigs bzhi'i tshe 'dzin pa// las kyi r-igs la lhun gyis grub// rnam pa bzhi yis 'dul mdzad pas// phyogs kyis 'dul ba'i rigs ma yin//
618a5(rgyud 'grel): de ltar sbyangs mtha' skyes bu pa// rigs la char 'dzin byed kyang // cig shos sangs rgyas kun ngo bo// nyid du ste phyi drang ba tsam// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes brjod pa'i// tshul ni sme bsam brjod las 'das// de nod phyogs tsam brjod
618a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba// drong don snga phyir sangs rgyas pa// don dam cig pu ma yin phyir// chu la chu ltar cig pa med// cig shos dben pa ma yin pas// so so tha dad cha rigs med// bden pa gnyis med dbang sgyur ba// bdag dang gzhan gyi gnyis
618b1(rgyud 'grel): med de// so sor med phyir der son pa// mtha' rnams kun bral kun ldan par// rang gnas zhen bral mngon bral ba// ming brjod 'di 'drar gnas smra dka'// ngo bo gcig la rgyud 'dres men// shing gi me dpung ltar brjod pa// drang ba tsam
618b2(rgyud 'grel): ste de nyid min// chu la chu ltar 'dod pa'ang re'o// bden pa'i tshul gyis skyon brjod pa// dag pa'i ye shes gnas yin par// tAn tA nyid las grags pa dang // bder gshegs me gnas mnyam pa'i// ngang du byon gsung brjod
618b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'ang // mnyam pa gsum pa yin pa'i phyir// nges par rgyud 'dres ma 'dris pa'i// tha snyad bral ba'i tshul du gnas// thun mong min pa'i rgyal ming drang // bde bshegs de bzhin gshegs pa dang // bcom ldan 'das dang sangs
618b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dang // dgyes chen mchod sogs mtha' yas kyang // lus gsum grangs ming khyad par tsama?// mdo ru brjod pa chub par gyis// lnga dang lnga lngar lhun grub pa'i// rgyal ba gsum rdzogs so so'i// grub mtha' sa'i sangs rgyus
618b5(rgyud 'grel): las// grangs rdzogs ngo bo byin brlabs las// snang dung don byed che chung gis// pags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gsal// de tshul sa gzhi rgyu lde me dag/ rgyud cig 'dres dang grol slu ba// 'dir drang tsam yin bshad pa bzhin//
618b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyud kyis khyad par bsam las 'das// ming grangs thig che ni dman pa las// thun mong tshogs kyis bder gshegs shing // de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa'ang // dus kyi dbang phyir snga ma bzhin// gshegs pa nyid dam gas
619a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'ang // bya ba'i lugs kyis shes rab dang // cho ga'i rnal 'byor grangs rdzogs pas// 'bras bu lam byas bder gshegs pa// rdo rje 'dzin sar de bzhin gshegs// yang na bya rgod 'dab legs
619a2(rgyud 'grel): su// dgon phug bye ma 'dab sna ru// sa ri dbang kur ji bzhin nam// bA ra NA se'i bsil khang du// dam pa'i rigs can dbang bskur nas// rdo rje 'dzin thib ji bzhin no// thub pa'i dbang po de ji bzhin// gshegs pa rlud
619a3(rgyud 'grel): dang bya ba dang // gnyis ka rgyud lis grangs bzhin no// rnal 'byor gzhung gis don grub nyid// na ra dze ra 'gram logs su// dka' thub dka' ba spyod pa'i tshe// phyogs bcu sprul pa'i longs spyod skus// byang chub lnga
619a4(rgyud 'grel): stobs dbang bskur bas// 'og min nyid du don grub ste// sprul pa'i dka' thub khog pa nas// ye shes snang mdzad tshul du gshegs// ri rab rtse mor 'khor lor bskor// de yang rtog pa'i gzugs sku yin//
619a5(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes reb lam nyid kyis// 'gro 'od med par bder gshegs te// de bzhin lhun grub dang son pa// tshul dang dro bos khyad par rme// don grub dka' thub lus can la// phyogs bcu rgyal ba sprin bzhin
619a6(rgyud 'grel): du// 'dus pa gsang ba'i longs spyod kyis// srod dang tho rangs dus nyid du// nyi zla gsang ba'i dbang sbyin dbang // rol pa'i ka ra bstan pa yis// ye shes stan rdzogs dbang thob pas// de bzhin de bzhin gshegs
