619b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ de phyir thun mong rnam gsum las// byang ba bzhi dang chub pa bzhi// bde bar de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad // grangs dang ngo bo rtsal gyis 'phags// de nas rgyal ba bcom ldan 'dras// thun mong mchog
619b2(rgyud 'grel): lugs snga ma bzhin// so so lam+b+ha thabs shes rab kyis// rdo rje lta bu bzhi bskyed pas// bdud bzhi des bcom mya ngan bzhi// 'das shing mtha' bzhi'ang 'das pa dang // mi mthun gzhung gis sangs rgyas pa/
619b3(rgyud 'grel): lta dpyod ting 'dzin lam rim bzhin// grub pa'i mtha' las khyad par ba// lta bo'i sgrib pas phye ba yin// de nas dgyes pa'i longs spyod kyang // mdo dang bya ba rnal 'byor gnyis// rgyu las ji ltar grags pa/
619b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhino// gong gi dgyes chen yod tshad min// de phyir dgyes pr-i r-im+b+ha yod pas// saSh+Ti sangs rgyas rims yang phyir// ming grangs yon tan rgyu min te// ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par 'phag sa// // lam gyi rtsol
619b5(rgyud 'grel): bas ngal bA rnams// bred pa bskyad phyir kun tu 'o// rdo rje 'dzin pa drug po bkod par bstan// mthar thogs sa gsum tshwa las brjod// / de phyir sbyin tshwa lta bu ste// thabs mkhas 'didra yis
619b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan pa yi// thabs la brten nas mos bcug cing // sbyar bas 'dir grub rang thabs kyis// rang sa thob las ngo bos nyid// gcig par smra ba mun sprul pa'o// // mthar phyin pa
620a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste/ dgu pa'o// / 'gro ba lam log lam stor ga/ lnga dang lnga rnams bkri ba'i phyir// mi gnyis lam mchog 'di bgyid pa'o// ngal ba'i
620a2(rgyud 'grel): drage rtsa kun grol shog/ byang chub zhor byed kha grags gnyer// bcud chen 'dzag cing gzhogs dom can// tsug rgyal sgeg mo 'jag skyel drang // nags bya lta bur rkog g.yem sogs// tshal bsrung dam la
620a3(rgyud 'grel): mi gnas dang // gas ba'i gzhung la sran mi tshugs// gzhung mangs bsgrub la yid ches dka'// bla ma spyi bosa? mi len cing // zhes pas bskor zhing yongs la bskur// snod med rnams dang ma
620a4(rgyud 'grel): phrad cig/ mang yul khri babs su// dz+nyA na ku ma ras bsgyur ba/ lam rnam par bkod pa// sangs rgyas gsang ba'i man ngag rdzogs so//
621a1(rgyud 'grel): sgyu 'phrul man dag rnam bkod la sogs sku 'phrul gyi sgor las tshogs dang bcas pa rnams dang / mdo don bsdus dang skabs 'grel/ rgyan dam pa rim par phye ba ste bcu dgu bzhugs s+ho/
621b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rang gi lha la phyag btsal nas// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud dag las// dad can skal ldan don phyir du// man ngag rim pa brjod par bya// shar phyogs in+d+ra'i lung
621b2(rgyud 'grel): pa na// rgyal bu rdo rje brtsegs pa ru// rigs can in+d+ra bo ti ngas// gsang ba'i bdag pos mngon bstan pa'i// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i bsgrub pa yang // tshom bu lnga bcu stong dang bcas// phyag na rdo rje mngon bsgrub te// spong
621b3(rgyud 'grel): len brtul zhugs spyod pa'i dbang // dge bar bskul nas sdig pa med// de nas sa la sreg par byas// de bzhin pany+tsa a be sha/ rim par thob pa'i skal ldan bu// gdungs brtag rigs nges spyod kyang bstan/
621b4(rgyud 'grel): lhag sems ldan zhing bka' nyan pa// bla ma sgeg tu 'dzin byed dang // mAn ngag snying du 'tshud byed pra'o// rnal 'byor pho mo spyod pa yis// gdung ba mya spangase rnam+b+has la sbyin// log pa u lu spr-i sha kas// 'jug
621b5(rgyud 'grel): cing bcad pa'i nyams med ltar// 'dod pas smon pa'i rnal 'byor pa// brjod bral tshig gi rtogs min yang // 'phrul gyi me long bstan pa ltar// rtogs byed tshig gi mo long gis// mtshan rgyud spyan la snang
621b6(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i// pa tre sha yi rim pa bstan// rgya mtsho chu las ngang pa bzhin// kA yi bdud rtsi bdud bsdus 'da'// shi shi'i rgyud kyi mos rims gzhan// 'tsham par bstan na chud mi gson// rim grogs grol 'dod
622a1(rgyud 'grel): brda' zhen la// de nyid 'grogs pa'i pa te sha/ badren pa'i tshig gis byin gyis brlab// des brlan rig pa chu skyes yod// de la dran rgyud man ngag sbyin// des rtogs pa yi sgrol ma yis//
622a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yangs la sgrol ma'i man drag sbyin// rnam rtog chu rlung gis 'khyags la// thig le drod dbab pa tre sha/ chags pa me yis gdungs po lo// khams gsum rol pa'i man ngag bstan// mtshan mas mtshan ma grol
622a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod la// phyag rgya bsgom pa'i man ngag sbyin// de dag rnam smin re bo la// rgyu 'bras med par thob tshul bstan// des ston mos 'bral thun myong gi/ theg pa spros cher ma nges la// gsang ba'i yon tan khyad par can// ngo
622a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshar tshig gisau 'du shes sgyur// rim pa brgyad tshul bzlog bstan pa// 'jug pa'i rim pa mos pa 'dun// cig shos mthar bzhag gtsor smos kyang // de sngon bzhag ste brjod kyis zung // thun mong sgra yis spros
622a5(rgyud 'grel): 'chel bas// mchog la bdag med gang zag la// khyad par spyad pas bsgyur ba'i tshig/ de yang rgyud la sna 'di skad du// kha cig lta ba mnyam gnas kyang // spyod pa dag dang yang mi mthun// kha cig spyod pa rdzogs byed
622a6(rgyud 'grel): kyang // nyams pa'i lta bas yong mi shes// kha cig lto spyod gnyis ka med// bla med theg pa'i nang nas ni// don dam du ni dbyer med de// kun rdzob tsam du thams cad la// ngag dang ma dag gnyi gar 'dzin//
622b1(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa'i don nyid mi shes shing // kun rdzob don dam gnyis med la// chos dang gang zag bdag med na/ 'di ni byang chub sa pa yin// de sogs phyi rlung rgyu 'bras dang // 'jig rten thub par 'khrul par brjod// gsang
622b2(rgyud 'grel): chen nges par rgyud nyid las// yang dag skyes mchog dam pa yis// kun rdzob dron dam dbyer med par// yang dag nyid du rab tu rtogs// thabs kyis lta spyod chen por ni// bla med theg pa las 'phags pa//
622b3(rgyud 'grel): don dam du ni nor bdun no// kun rdzob du nyams rdzogs so// thabs kyi theg pa chen po ni// rnam par byang dang sdug bsngal dag/ kun rdzob dupung dbyer med de// lto ba mtho sman de tsam mo// zhes sogs tshogs gI brod
622b4(rgyud 'grel): skyed la// nges pAr ldem dgongs brgyud kyis gzhug/ mtshan myas grol ba brgyud byin pa// dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pA'i tshe// gang la bab pa'i lha de 'am// yang na lha kun cig phyi'i phyir// gang mos lha de yi dam
622b5(rgyud 'grel): bye// de'ang blo yis gnyis 'gyur ste/ rims su skad cig spros bcad pa// de nas yi ge brgya pa dang // phyag rgya chen po'i rim par bsamA// dbang bskur la sogs lhag pa'i lho// dgur ldan spyan drang bstim
622b6(rgyud 'grel): brtan mchod// zin nas bcu spangs zlas pa bya// gsal ba gsum ldan drod rnyed 'gyur// yan lag sngon du bdun rdzogs nas// mchod pa byin gyis brlab par bya// rtag tu rgyun gyi ting 'dzin spyod// longs spyod
623a1(rgyud 'grel): dang bral mi bya// gcig car pa na rang gi gzugs// rab gnas ldan pa bdun bzhag la// spos spyad khugs pa sngon byas la// gsal bar byed dang bye brag bstan// de ci 'dra ba bdun du byas ma// shon/
623a2(rgyud 'grel): tu goms nas rnam smin gzugs// bsgyur la de bstan nges par bya// de tshe bying rmugs skyon drug spang // rgod pa'i skyon gsum der byas te// 'gyur ba'i skyon bdun byung po ni// spyi la glanas mchog med 'gyur na// bye brag gang
623a3(rgyud 'grel): snang 'phrong la bzung // de nas rtog pa'i gzer chen po// 'gyur na ri ltar gdis chen bya// mi snang gzugs brnyan brlan par bya// mtshan snang rgyu ba de ru byA// shin tu gsal la mi g.yo bar// bsgyur thob ma lcogs med pa
623a4(rgyud 'grel): nI/ lha yi brtags dang lo rgyud kyis// zung du 'brel pa ched du bya// gdod ma'i mtshan ma sngar brtags te// nyams rims zin pas brtson 'grus sbyar// de yang rgyud las 'di skad du/ gsang ba'i snying po don nyid kyis//
623a5(rgyud 'grel): yi dam mi spangs rtag bsgom zhing // yi dam lha yi mtshan nyid ni// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// lha spungs dge spyad don med 'gyur// bdag nyid lci dang mnyam sbyor ni// yon tan chung yang 'grub par 'gyur/
623a6(rgyud 'grel): ye nas mnyam nyid sbyor bas su// lha nyid du ni rtag du bsgom// bde gshegs kun dang mnyam sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor kun dang mnyam pa'i phyir// sku gsung ye shes lnga rdzogs 'grub// yoM dam lha ni rtag sgom
623b1(rgyud 'grel): nas / rgyu 'bras lhun gyis gru pa yi// bdag gis kun la dbang bskur ste// rigs 'dzin gnas su skye bar 'gyur// phyag rgya chen po rtag tu bzhag/ sngags ni rtag tu brjod dur bya// sngags dang phyug d+ha rgyun mi bcad// rnag/
623b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor bsgrub pa'i lam yang yin// mi gtong sdom zhing 'dren pa yin// don mchog rdzogs pa'i gnas yin no// rtag tu mnyam bzhag phyag rgyu yin// dus gsum ting 'dzin 'byin sngags yin// yang dag don chen
623b3(rgyud 'grel): klu 'dod pas// dus mtshungs med par phyag rgya sngags// yid brtan drag tu bzlas bsgom bya// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub 'dod pas// rtag tu mnyam bzhag don rtogs pa'i
623b4(rgyud 'grel): spyi ni 'dza' tshun tshul 'dre ba'i// snang la rang bzhin med par sgom// 'khor rnams chu zla'i tshul shes par// gsal la rtog pa med par bsgom// lha yi sku ni gsal bsgoms nas// bsod nams tshogs chen thob par
623b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// de bzhin gzugs brnyan tshul shes na// ye shes tshogs chen thob par 'gyur// yid dam lha ste spyad byas na// ngan song ni bde rtags tu myong // bdag rten dbyer med phyag rgya che// gsal la brtson pa'i yon
623b6(rgyud 'grel): tan ldan// yid bzhin ma chags dbang skur ste// goms shing brtan par bya ba yin// de bas bar chad rtson med de// dper na sa bon tshig pa las// 'bras bu 'dod pa dang 'dra ste// bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu med par
624a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// mi khom 'khor bar gnas par 'gyur// dam tshig bsrung dang sngags bzlas dang // phyag rgya rgyun mi bachad pa bzhi// brtson 'grus che zhing brtan par bzung // rnal 'byor brtson 'grus chung gyur na// mi bsgrub
624a2(rgyud 'grel): nyen yang che bar gsungs// ji ltar ral gri'i so la nan tan du// skyes bu myur du ma bzung na// lag pa nges par chod par 'gyur// de bzhin nan tan med pa'i gsang sngags pa// 'chi 'am yang na 'bras bu med par 'gyur// rnal 'byor
624a3(rgyud 'grel): dam pa rnams kyis ni// sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams gsal// don dam ma nyams drug byas shing // brtson 'grus cher bskyed myur bar 'grub// 'di ltar bsgrubs shing bsgom byas na// 'bras bu che la mu sbyar kyang // dper na mang
624a4(rgyud 'grel): dang sgo nga bzhin// rnam rtog lus ni bor ma thag/ thams cad kun la dbang bsgyur zhing // rigs mchog dam pa thob par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam po'i// dngos grub mchog rnams yongs su rdzogs so//
624a5(rgyud 'grel): chu rlung can la drod dbab pa// gnas pa'i 'khor lo drug gnas pa// sprul pa'i gnas su sor tshad la// rtsa gnyis ri bong can tshes 'dra// gnyis kyi bar du byang chub sems// yungs kar tshad tsam rnal 'byor bya// yang na shi ra thig
624a6(rgyud 'grel): le gnyis// bskang ba bsam bya sngon smos pas// dam pa'i lte ba so ra bzhi tshad// thig le ldan dang mi ldan pa// rung ba rgyud pa mnad 'dra ba'i// ba thag nyi zer rgyang 'dra bsgom// rjes su bsten pa de nyid du// sor phyed yul
624b1(rgyud 'grel): lngalA kun rdzob sems// yungs 'bru'i tshad tsam 'od dang ni// khwa dog la yang mi gnas par// sgom pa'i ye shes myur bas ste// sum cu phrag drug gis ni 'thob// dwer ma tsakra'i pho brang du// mkha' 'gro yod med mdor bskul
624b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi// de la mkha' 'gro med pa ni// tsi hwa rta bdun pa dang ni// ri bong lcam sbyar ga 'u na// byang sems yungs kar 'bring tshad tsam// de la 'phro 'du gang yin pa// ri bong can la tshangs pa yi// chung ngu snang ngo thig le la// nai tu
624b3(rgyud 'grel): sgra yod de gnyis las// kha dog sna tshogs 'od ldan pa'i// sgron ma phyir 'byung chen gnas// de la brngubs pas 'dus pa'i tshe// bug chung 'phro bas gsal gdab po// de bzhin yang nas yang bsgoms na// ye shes
624b4(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha'i gzugs su skye// de las bzlog pa gang yin pa// 'khor lo 'dab brgyad lte dbus ni// ye shes snang ba'i thig le bzhugs// phyogs bzhir rang bzhin mkha' 'gro bzhi// rigs dang mthun pa'i kha
624b5(rgyud 'grel): dogs la// de las bzhi ste lam nas spro// ye shes snying po phog pasna gsal// mdor sgom ye shes snying rtsi la// gnyis med byang sems bde chen po// rta bdun pa yi snying po ltar// 'od dang kha dog ci yang snang //
624b6(rgyud 'grel): gang du ma nges bsgom pa ni// khams gsum dga' ba'i snang bas 'gegs// de dag gang 'phrod phyir bstan mod// shin tu ye shes myur ba ni// bde tshan longs spyod cho 'phrul rnams// gsal byas rig pas bskyed
625a1(rgyud 'grel): byas te// sprul thig bzhi las ma nyams pa// de tshad thig les chos la bskul// thim pas bde bskyod de bzhin du// ljongs spyod bde chen thug par bya// rim pas bde bskyed bde chen bdes// bde chen 'khor la
625a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhu byas te// rim thim zhu ba bskyed byis te// don dum ye shes de ru mthong // de dag kun la'ang bying rgod kyi// rkyen sog ste spongs pa sngon bzhin du// rang nyams g.yo thob bstan pa yi// tshe de bzung rtsol dang mi rtsol bya// 'jig
625a3(rgyud 'grel): rten+de ting 'dzin ro brgyad sogs// zhi 'gog la sogs ro brtags te// ma nor lhag pa'i shwe rab kyis// spyad dor blang ba'i bye brag shes// 'di dag rtsom pa'i rnal 'byor la// rgyal ba sras bcas byin rlobs mdzad// thibs chen
625a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag gang thob kyang // rnal 'byor brtson 'grus mi ldan na// bul ba ra'i 'bras bu bzhini// nam yang don yod ma yin no// rtog rlung g.yo ba rlung bzung ba// zhi ba bul ba drag po sogs// sgro ma bzung ba'i thabs rnams kyis
625a5(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pas rig pa'i phur po gdab// de dag thabs dang mtshan nyid dang // zin nas phra ba bslab pa dang // dgag dang lus bzung spyi ba rnams// mnyes byas bla ma'i zhal du zhus// mes tshig me yis gdungs pa yin// 'tsho
625a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing chags pas chags bral yang // mngon du bya ba de brjod pa'i// rnal 'byor thabs dang ldan pa yis// yon tan kun ldan mi mo dag/ mun dang lkog dang skye bo gnyis// rdzas dang sdug pas sems spros kyang / gang
625b1(rgyud 'grel): dbab phrad par skye bo byed// dam tshig rnam smin sems 'jog cing // gtso la gdung ba'i phyag rgya rtsal// gtan du rigs pa snying 'dra na// 'di dag bstan la sbyar ba'i gnas// bud med yon tan kun yod kyang // gnyis kyis sems
625b2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bskor dben du// 'dod pa phyal bar spyod pa la// dam pa'i man ngag mi bstan te// 'tsham par lha yi sku bstan no// gzungs su gyur pa de phyin tshong // rnal 'byor pas kyang rgya mi dpral// mi yus sngon bzhin sems
625b3(rgyud 'grel): phrogs nas// 'dod pa phyal spyod nyams byed pa// tshe 'di mi bde myong 'gyur nas// phyi mar dmyal bar ya re che// de'i sdug bsngal bzod reg tshang // rdo rje rgyal po ma yin pa// rnal 'byor pas ni de bzhin ni// de bas mi me
625b4(rgyud 'grel): gdam pa ces// yid 'ong gnyen gnas dbang bskur te// bslab pa'i rim pa bstan par bya// khrus byas gos rjes dmau tshig sbyin// chos bshad 'du shes sgyur bar bya// gzhung gzhin bdag cag byin gyis darlab// nyed
625b5(rgyud 'grel): sdem spyod dang tsum mi bya// rtse 'khyud sbyin pa sogs rnams kyis// yab yum snol ma cha skyed la// dgrol dang rgyas pa cho go bya// ye shes dbab pa mngon rdzogs des// cho ga de yis las byas pas// mgo
625b6(rgyud 'grel): spug smin langs mi mdog dam ri// 'dor dang smra mi shes sogs 'byung // de nas phyag rgya bzhi sogs pa// rgyud las gsungs pa 'di skad du// dgug dang 'dzin dang de bzhin te// bsdus dang 'khrol bas don bsgrub
626a1(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ bsdam dang mi stong dbang bsgyur te// bden pa sgra brnyan phyogs bcur sgrogs// shin tu skyeg pa'i gzi byin 'bar// yid bzhin rin chen 'phel ba 'bar// dbyangs skar yid 'phrog kazi ldan 'bar/
626a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs mdzes spyod bsku phyogs bcur g.yo// kun tu tshimi byed bro gsungs thi ma// lho mdzes rin chen phung po 'phro// 'od gsal 'phro bas kun tu 'bar// bdud rtsi gsil dro 'jam pa'i dbyings// 'jug dang ljang dang gnas pa dang
626a3(rgyud 'grel): smon pa byang chub se mo sna yino// gsang dbang pad+mar ldan 'gyur no// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis su// pha rol phyin bcu rgyu 'bras rdzogs// sa ban+d+ha rim gyis bgrod med rdzogs// kun tu 'od gsol pad+ma can yang rdzogs// yi ge 'phreng
626a4(rgyud 'grel): ba 'khor lo bsam mi khyab// yang dag rdzogs chen thabs dang ldan// shes rab bla med yang dag rdzogs// bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs par rol// rig dang mnyam pa'i shugs ldan pas// bdag dang phyag rgya rig
626a5(rgyud 'grel): snang phyir// rang snang shaus nyams rel bya ste// sa rim re res bkug rlung bzung // gtsug tor zla shas 'od 'dres pa// mu lhung shes rab ye shes myong // cig shos shugs lhun de ge mos pas// bcu gnyis chang phyin phyaka? N+ya
626a6(rgyud 'grel): lis rak+ta byang chub dus cig 'bar// gnyis mang zung du 'brel pa las// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'byung // sems 'dres brngubs pas sa rim thob// ma ho mo yi 'o ma dang // 'ga' 'ga'i nyi shing brlo kyis pa//
626b1(rgyud 'grel): de thabs rdzogs par mnyes byas la// bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o// rdzogs so// / rnam rtog grub mtha' ma sgyur ba'i// blo la brda' grol man ngag bstan// bden tshigs brjod pas blo byin brlab// rdo rje sam
626b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i zhal bstan pa// dub thabs do bo khyad par dang // yon tan skyon gyis rdzogs par bya// ma nges sra 'am thun mong nas// sems cher skyes pa 'angar zhugs pa'i// mnyan gsan thun mong byin brlab pa// dbang lnga rdzogs
626b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i shi shwa la// lhag pa'i lta ba ces 'dzin yod// las kyi mtha' la 'jug 'dod tshe// brdo'i 'grol byin gyisra brlab par bya// dgrol thabs rnam grangs gzhal bya dang // grub mtha'i dngos po lus bzhag go// rnam par dbye ba
626b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam gnyis te// rgyud dang bstan la dbab pa'o// rgyud pa nye ring rnam gnyis te// gang zag so sor rtog pa'i sa// mthong mi ldan la sngon song ba'i// gsang ba'i zhi gnas bstan byas pas// shugs dang dpyad pa gnyi gro mthong
626b5(rgyud 'grel): de min rgyun tsam sogs med pa// rgyud las 'di skad gsungs pa ste// chos nyid rten cing 'brel bris na// chos nyid don rnams gsal 'gyur te// rang dang spyi yi don rtogs nas// sgyu rga na 'chi med rtogs 'gyur// ci phyi ru zhes na/
626b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dang // sngags dang bdag rnams sems nyid phyir// ngo bo cig 'brel mthu ldan zhing // cig dang du ma rtogs par 'gyur// dngos po bstan la dbab bya ba// rim pas zlog ste gzhal bya ba// 'jig rten 'di ni ci yod
627a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'ang ming dang ba snyad 'dzin pa dag/ so sor mtshan nyid 'jig byas na// rang bzhin myed de yang dag nyid// rang 'byung chen po'i ye shes kyis// thams cad sangs rgyas ning du spyod/ ma bcos ma byas dang
627a2(rgyud 'grel): gis gsal// ye nas 'od gsal sangs rgyas zhing // zhes pa rgyud las gsungs pa'i phyir// brtags pa'i spyod pa gnyis lngas gzhal// rnam par byung dang nyon mongs gnyis// so sor yod pa ma yin te// nyon mongs gnyen
627a3(rgyud 'grel): bcos su med// thams cad dbyings su ro cig pas// cis kyang mi tshugs gong na med// ban+d+had lngas gzhal bya rnams gnyis dang // sgrub pabs gautan tshigs bcas gsungs pas// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das la brtag/ 'du
627a4(rgyud 'grel): ba spyod yul ma gyur phyir// brtag pa'i yul du ji ltar rig/ sems la mya ngan 'das zhes pa// de nyid 'das par rung ma yin// gal te 'das pa'i snang ba la// gzhan nyid dang pos lkog tu 'gyur// de ba'i na 'khor dngos po
627a5(rgyud 'grel): yang // snang dang rtags pa gang la gzhal// snang ba rang gi mtshan nyid ni// brjod pa min te rigs snang phyir// gzhal byar rigs min skye bo yi// yul min grub pa'i mtha' ltar snang // rtags pa nang la spyad do zhes
627a6(rgyud 'grel): rten spyad bzhi ru rigs pa min// 'on te rang la nang du yang // ltas te dpyad zhe de nyid ni// log rtog spros po'i skad cig ma// snga ma 'das dang phyi ma byung // de la rten par rtag mi rigs// de ltar skad cig mi brtan po// so sor
627b1(rgyud 'grel): rtog par gnas 'gyur na// zhen 'gag rang la bstan mi rigs// nges par bzhag pa'i gzhal bya ni// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi// rang gi mtshan nyid mi 'dod de// de ltar nang du zhen pa yis// phyi rol mad la yod ltar nang // zhen dang
627b2(rgyud 'grel): lta ba gnyis la brten// de de shes pa skad cig ma// de ltar da ltar thad rang bcang // lta ba'i tsho na gnas gyur pa// gzhal bya med par dogs pa'ang // zhen pa shes kyi spyi yul yin// skad cig gnas 'gyur shes nyid do// de bas
627b3(rgyud 'grel): yul sems ma 'dres phyir// zhen snang 'jam la skyo ba med// 'on te yid 'gyur zhen pa 'ang // skad cig mnyam pas 'gag pa med// de tshe rtags gzhi yod mi rung // dgas na zhen pa'i yul rnam pa ni// gtan du dag pa ma yin
627b4(rgyud 'grel): phyir// so sor spyod kyang zhon yul mthing // rang dang spyi mtshan ma lus la// shes rab dbang po yul phyi stsol// mdor na kun brtag sa dus bzhis dang // 'das dang sdug bsngal kun meng la// don du zhen pa ltar snang la// rten te
627b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrol byas mtha rnyed 'gyur// de ltar rang snang spyi la'ang // gnyis gnyis snang ste rgyud nyid las// spyi yi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// yang dag nyid kyis rab brtags na// rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid de// rmad sti tshan gnyis
627b6(rgyud 'grel): su brjod// rang gi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// chos dang bdag dang dngos po rnams// ngo bo mo la sogs brtags pas// rtog pa sgyu ma'i rlung 'gyur te// log rtog spros pa rgyun nyid la// ma rig de sogs nyon mongs lnga// rang mtshan
628a1(rgyud 'grel): kun ni rtags nyid bstan// so so'i rtsal rnams 'dzin gyur pas// thabs chen du ni rnam par 'phro// de skad rang rig rang snang phyir// rang gi mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid// de ltar rang spyi bzang dang ngan// gzhal
628a2(rgyud 'grel): bya grub mtha' lung bstan no// de rjes bskrun la dbab bya ba// de nyid mtshon pa'i thA spyad pas// de nyid bstan la dbab pa dang // dngos po grags pa'i the snying la// brten te bstan la dbab pa'o// khwa dog ma yon dbyibs ma yinA// gar+tha
628a3(rgyud 'grel): su ma yin gang yang mAni// de la ji bzhin nyid dra bab pa// gzhi bzhin brjod pa'i tshig rnams kyis// dkar po dkar por mtshon pa bzhin// bsam brjod 'dras pas de nyid mtshon// de yang ji ltar rgyud las gsungs// gzhi
628a4(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i sems nyid ni// pho mo ma yin ma ning min// mtshan nyid ma yin rigs brgyud min// kha dog ma yin dbyibs ma yin// gnas su ma yin gang yang min// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te// thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu
628a5(rgyud 'grel): thabs las thabs byung thabs bsam yas// thams cad ma lus rnam par drag/ nyid kyi dbyings las mi zhan phyir// bde dang mi bde gang yang med// thams cad dbyings su ro gau tsig ste// de bzhin nyid kyi ngang brtsan par// yang
628a6(rgyud 'grel): ngag nyid kyis de skad bshad// bshad dang nyan pa gnyis ka med// de bzhin nyid du yang dag 'du// kun gyi 'byung gnas byed pa'o// de yis ma byas gang yang med// kha dog dbyibs rigs gang yang min// shin tu brtag dka'
628b1(rgyud 'grel): sus mi rig/ byang chub sems kyi theg pa ni// kun lnga khyab cing mi gnas pa// kha dog gnas dang dbyibs ma yin// yon tan mchog gi snying po ni// rtog gi spyod yul de ma yin// byang chub sems zhes brjod pa ni/ gang nas ma 'ongs
628b2(rgyud 'grel): gur mI 'gro// rtog med rang gi kho na tsam// mnyam po'o don nyid ji lta bu// mnyam nyid rang bzhin glang yang min// dngos rnams nyid nA dngos po med pa'i// rtog pa'i smra bsam yul las 'das// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes
628b3(rgyud 'grel): te sade phyir dngos po dngos med do// sus kyang ma bci bcing med// bcings par bya ba yod ma yin// bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i// ye nas lhun grub sangs rgyas chos// rgyud las de ltar gsungs pa yis// btsongs pa bdag
628b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid mi dmigs phyir// so slor rtog pa grol mi 'dod// gzhal med 'ching grol med bstan pas// ma nor go ba gzhal ba'i mchog/ bden pa'i tha snyad de yang yin// chos nyid spros bral brjod bsam med// sangs rgyas byang chub
628b5(rgyud 'grel): bla dgas rnams// mI bA smA phyir na bden brtags tsama?// ngo bos de ltar rtog nyid mtha'// bshad pa'i dngos la dmal bya ba// thA snyad bsku lwa brten nas ni// blo rgyu che gA rkyen ldan pas brtag/ de yang brtan tshigs rnam bzhis
628b6(rgyud 'grel): dab // de de'ang thun mong min dang yin// depe dang stag gi lus bzhag go// dang po spros pa gzhal bya ba/ rtogs dag mnyam dben bdag nyid rgyus// rang 'byung ye shes gtan la dbab// rtog yul min phyir ni nges//
629a1(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pas gzhal ba ci phyir na// rgyu cig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul// byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum pa// rab tu rtogs pa rnam bzhi yis// thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che// rgyud las 'byung phyir
629a2(rgyud 'grel): de rma la rigs// dang po sangs rgyas sems can rnams// phyi nang snod bcud so so yi// rgyu las grub pa de yi phyir// mi cig rtog ngan sgrol bya'i phyir// rgyud las mngon du gsungs pa dang // gzhan yang gsungs pa 'di lta s+ho// /
629a3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi steng 'og bcur// rang 'byung chen pos kun tu khyab// rang 'byung che nyid dngos med por// kun gyi phyag rgya'i rgyu yin no// ma pa ces rgyun gyi skad cig ma// de yis ma byas gang yang med// gzhi rtsa med

629a5(rgyud 'grel): grwa/ gtan tshu gus smos pas yid ches bya// de bas 'khor 'das snod btsod rnams// zhi 'gyur gzhi las g.yos med ltar// kun dngos rig pa dang snang phyir// ngo bo nyid kyi rgyu ru cig/ bdag spyod yul dus snang ngo cog/ rang
629a6(rgyud 'grel): gi kun gzhi'i de bzhin nyid// ji ltar ltos pa snang ba'i phyir// sems nyid 'od gsal cig pa la// don dam bden par rim pas bzhag/ yig 'bru'i tshul ni a oM IM// 'bru gsum sgra dbyibs kyis mtshon
629b1(rgyud 'grel): nas sku gsung thugs kyi 'bras bu rtog de yang 'di skad gsungs pa ste// dngos kun ji ltar brtags bsam bzhin// 'gyur bas sems snang kun dro bo// sems nyid rig sogs gang min phyir// 'di 'dra ma skyes skad cig
629b2(rgyud 'grel): med// ma skyes yi ge don gyi gsungs// brjod dang 'drar snang phyir nges pa'o// don dam nyid nA thams cad du// 'phro ba ma 'gegs ye shes te// snang stong thams cad shes rab doma?// dbyer med o tre chos kyi sku// de nyid ye shes
629b3(rgyud 'grel): lnga rdzogs te// stong pa'i ye shes dngos po med// me long ye shes rtog pa med// mnyam nyid ye shes bzang ngan med// so sor rtog pa ma 'dres gsal// bya ba nan tan mthar phyin pa'o// de phyir A~M gyi don dbyibs mtshon// /
629b4(rgyud 'grel): lcug pa'i don dam kun rdzob gnyis// rtogs pa'i lta ba'i byin rlabs kyis// ba ra na se'i ras mtshon ltar// rtogs pa'i spyod yul zung 'jug par// byin rlob phyir na sgra 'jug ste// rgyud los 'byung ba 'di skad du// dkar
629b5(rgyud 'grel): po chen gyis mdog bsgyur te// dug kyang sman du 'gyur ba dang // de bzhin dug gsum byang chub ste// 'gro ba byang chub lam du sbyor// de ltaru tshul gsum brjod po yis mthong ba gang yin shes rab spyan// de yang mngon
629b6(rgyud 'grel): sum gzhan spangs te// sgra tshig rten bral zhen tsame yin// yul min rang rig dben dbyer med// blo gting go bas mngon sum phul// ming tshig sgra la mi brten par// blo yi gting du go bar byos// rtogs par byed dang
630a1(rgyud 'grel): byas pa'i phyir// ming nges tshul ni sgrar 'jug pa'o// 'o na bden gsum rim pa yis// mthar phyin par du rtog sa rigs phyir// gtan tshigs 'jog pa'i rigs pas 'gal// lta ba'i ngo bo'i rim
630a2(rgyud 'grel): par dogs// bsten pas gzhi mthong yod mod kyi// gsum gyis gsum mthong mthar byed phyir// byed la brjod pas the tsom med// rigs pa dam pa nyid du nges// des na don gyi gtan tshigs kyang // ngo bo cig la thabs
630a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis phye// dper na me dang tsha bzhin nam// chu dang rlan phyir ji bzhin no// lta ba'i rnam grangs brjod pa kun rang bzhin ngo bo'i chos tshul gyis// tshon chu cha re so sor bstan// ci brjod ming grangs ngo bos cig/ dag pa gsum drang
630a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi sa gzhal ba'ang // snod bcud rgyud rnams dgu rtogs shing // ngag mnyam rnagasu don rtogs bsgoms byas shing // zhes gsungs phyir na 'di smos te// dgra gsum bden gsum bden bzhi dag/ mnyam pa bzhi lnga'i
630a5(rgyud 'grel): skabs 'chad de// tshul gyis bdag mnyam so sor brtag/ nyid la dbang sgyur nyid spyod phyir// bdag dang gzhan dang rtogs pa'i rgyun// rnam dag bla med theg pa'i mchog/ dag pas snang ba spong zhe na// thams cad dag ces bya/
630a6(rgyud 'grel): ba yang // dngos po gsal dag ma yin te// snang spyod nyid ni rnam par dge/ chos rnam yong gi dag pa yi// rnam bzhi tshul gyis don rtogs mngon// rgyu rnams rab tu dag pa dang // 'bras bu yongs su dag 'gyur te// don
630b1(rgyud 'grel): dam dmigs med rang bzhin dang // kun rdzob sgyur mar ye nas drug/ rgyu yi mtshan nyid drug pa ni// phyi rol chen po lnga rnams te// sems nyid gzung 'dzin gnyisu snang ba// bzung ba'i yul nyid 'byung ba che// rgyu nyid rang gi sems yin
630b2(rgyud 'grel): bus// 'byung ba chen po rgyu lus dag/ 'bras bu yo ngas su dag pa ni// sems can kun gyi rus pa ste// rdo rje byang chub sems yin la// sha ni pad+ma rak+Sha yin// dri cheni dri chu gur gum chu// so so'i lus la gnas pa dag/ don dam dmi
630b3(rgyud 'grel): med dag pa nyid// phyi nang chos rnams thams cad kyang // gang gi ngo bo'ang ma yin te// skye 'gagra med par ye nas dag/ kun rdzob ye nas dag pa ni// sgyu ma'i rang bzhin thams cad snang // chu zla'i tshul du mi dmigs gnas// mi
630b4(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa nyid sna tshogs snang // de bzhin gshegs dang ye nas mnyam bla na med pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // ngan snod gnas rnams ma lus kun// rgyu nyid rang bzhin gnyis ka dang // rang bzhin ye nas de bzhin no// 'bras
630b5(rgyud 'grel): bu rnam par dag pas na// 'jig rten bar+d+ha nA gra yo la sogs pa// snang ba nyid na dro bo myed// de nyid chos sku chen po yin// gsum dang bzhi brjod dgos ched ni// rmongs pa gsum bzhi dag ma dag/ 'dzin pa'i lha na bzlog
630b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir// rnams grangs brjod kyis ngo bo cig/ cis kyang ma go mi sangs pa'i// so sor snang zhing me thun pa'i gzugs// bdag dang bdag med tu rtogs pa// de lta bu yi dang du snang // rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ste// /
631a1(rgyud 'grel): de yi mi snakhyen ci yang med// rnal 'byor lta ba de lta bu// tshig gis sgra phyi yong mod kyang // don gyis cig par rdzogs par bsgom// mtho d+ha man kun gyi gzugs snang dang // bla med byung chub
631a2(rgyud 'grel): skur snang ba// me long lta bu'i tshul bzhin du// sna tshogs kha dog dbyibs su snang // shes rab chen po rnams dag pa// spyod yul thams cad dag par 'gyur// shes dang spyod yul gnyis su med// de bzhin nyid du ro cig
631a3(rgyud 'grel): gau mnyim pa gsum bzhi lnga bshad pa// gnyis kyis chod par sbyar ba ste// bdag gzhan che chung wAr dgrol phyir// mnyam nyid lhags pa'i mnyam nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor kun tu bzang po zhing // mnyam pa rnam bzhi don
