631a5(rgyud 'grel): tsam// kun brtags spros pa chad pa'i phyir// rnam grangs don dum zhes kyang bya// skabs kyis yongs su 'grub par smA// de la rgyu rgyun tshwa phyed na// 'dus snang dngos po ma skyes pa// don dmo mnyam par 'di de pa de//
631a6(rgyud 'grel): rten cing 'brel pas bsgrubs pa'i mtha'o// yang dge sgyu ma'i tshul gnyis so// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan med de// de nyid ngo bo de byings nyid las// rnam dag dbyings cig tshul nyid do// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnam
631b1(rgyud 'grel): ni log par rtogs pa tsam nyid las// phra zhing zab pa'ang yod ma yin// log rtog nyid la nyid spyod de// gzhan du g.yo ba ci yang med// de bzhin bya ba dang ni yo ga pA// don dmya rang rig gang yin pa// spros dralnga rang
631b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin dag pa dang // rnam dag dbyings kyi ye shes lnga// don dam 'dod pa kun rdzob du// rigs gsum rigs lhar 'dod pa dag/ bdag nyid chen por ma rtogs phyir// thun mong mnyam par nga smra'o// lhag pa'i kun rdzob
631b3(rgyud 'grel): tsam du yang // rad rigs snang phyir 'bras bu lha// snang dong don nus ngang gi dbani// de phyir lhag pa'i kun rdzob bo// de nyid rang sems dbyings ye shes// 'bras bu lngar rdzogs brjod bsam 'das// de phyir lhag pa'i
631b4(rgyud 'grel): don du ma rgyu// ye shes sgyu mirar+ya snang ba dang // l-ig rtag sgyu mar snang ba gnyis// sgyu ma yin phyir rang bzhin mnyam// mnyam pa nyis la mi gnas pa'i// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs te// ye shes gnyis kyi
631b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyi la 'khor la// thegamachog rdo rje ma lus rdzogaso// dpe byang mtshan rdzogs dpag tu med+ma// thams cad mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor la// rang 'byung ye shes 'pho ba yis// dbyings dang rig pa gnyis min pa'i
631b6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin nyid du rdo rje rig/ 'on te kun kyang gnyis med na// mnyam zhes brjod pa ji lta bu// mi mnyam bltos pa rgyu ma yin// yang dag tha dad de yang rdzum/ de lnga kun rtaDa mi mnyam las// bltos nas de ldog mtshan
632a1(rgyud 'grel): phyir brtags// don tu ye nus mnyam nyid lA// mnyam par zhes pas 'dod brjod bral// mnyam pa rnam lnga'i dam tshigs ni// don dam skye 'gag med mnyam pa// chos rnams ma lus thams cad
632a2(rgyud 'grel): kun// de bzhin nyid dang stong pa mtha'// yang dag nyid dang chos kyi dbyings// mtshan nyid med dang dmigs su med// gzung du med cing smon pa med// ye nas myal ngan 'das pa yin// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid
632a3(rgyud 'grel): // nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// kun+da rdzob sgyu mar mnyam pa ni// 'dus byas dngos po sna tshogs ni// sgyu ma'i tshul du thams cad snang // 'phral sbyang bye ba kun kyang byed// rtog pa kun gyi mtshan mar snang // 'di dag
632a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad gzugs brnyan te// bya byed snang zhing dngos po med// tshu zla'i tshul du thams cad snang // thams cad snang la rang bzhin med// don dam kun rdzo ba dbyer mud ni// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// gzhi
632a5(rgyud 'grel): rtsa med las thams cad 'byung // maud dang yod pa gnyisnga ka mina?// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med de// 'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas snang // snang ba nyid ni dngos po med// dngos med de ni sna tshogs pa// de nyid sgyu
632a6(rgyud 'grel): ma mig yor tshul// 'byung ba chen po lnga rnams ni// de bzhin gshegs pa lngar mnyam po// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' las// ya mtshan sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur ba// gzhi rtsa yod pa ma yini te// rang bzhin ngang gis
632b1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar 'byung // so so'i rigs tshegs snang ba ni// phabs chen drug tu brtags pa mnyam// mtshan+da nyid so sor gnas pa ni// shes rabya dbyings kyi ngang du mnyam// tshogs brgyad ye shes lngar mnyam pa// rnam rtog kun
632b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhi me yin pa// rang bzhin med pa don gyi gzhi// 'di ni chos kyi dbyings zhes bya// de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes so// rnam par byung dang nyon mongs kyi// gzhi rten rnam rtog kun gyi gzhi// bag chags mun pa'ang dngas byas//
632b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad me long lta bu'i tshul// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// nga dong bdag tu mi 'dzin cing // kun kyang dbyer maung dang yin pas// thams cad mnyam nyid ye shes yin// thams cad kun la lung rtog cing /
632b4(rgyud 'grel): rtogs dang brtag par bya ba med// dus gsum dus yang mi dmigs pa// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes yin// log rtog dbang po'i spyod yul spangs// dbang po yul rnams dngos med par// thams cad dbyer med de/
632b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nyid// bya ba grub po'i ye shes yin// mnyam pa rnam lnga de dug rtag/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// ye nas rang bzhin med pa dang // thibs chen lhun gyis grub par brtag/ 'dri ni yang dag rtogs pa yin//
632b6(rgyud 'grel): gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag byang chub sems// rang bzhini dbyer med gdong mtha' mi 'byed cing // ye nas mnyam pas rgyal ba rgya mtsho yin// 'gro 'ong med pas dus gsum cig par rdzogs// dbye bsal
633a1(rgyud 'grel): med phyir bzang ngan blang ngor med// rnamu rtog nyid na ye shes rang 'byung ste// rnam rtog mi skye ye shes brjod du med// ma spangs mtshan ma kun+da bral yod med pas// dran byed mi spong 'khor rgyun
633a2(rgyud 'grel): mi 'byed de// ma snyigs mi 'byed mngon sum sangs rgyas la// blo yi rigs pas spyod cing nan tan dang // mtshon cing brten pas byang chub thob mngon te// shes spyad ci yin gang yin de shes shing // bya byed las 'beg
633a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi rta 'dug byed pa// gang zhig blo la spyod pa byang chub 'thob/ chen po yum lngar dag pa dang // phung po sems phyir rigs lngar dag/ tshogs brgyad ye shes lngar mnyam pa// snod bcud rgyu yi kun brtags pa// bden/
633a4(rgyud 'grel): ba kun rje ba don dam dang // gnyis su ming dang rnam gsum yang // de gsum nyid du mnyam pas gsal// skabs kyis kun brtags yul rnams ni// ming tsam ngo bo'i rgyud med pa'o// rigs patsir snang don byed
633a5(rgyud 'grel): dang // rtog ma lA mthun snad ma nges dang / phyag rgya'i dbyings mdog gsal bas 'grub// skor bdun rdzogs dang bsaM brjod 'das// dro bo rgyus 'grub shes bya yi// mchog gyur shes rab dam pa yi// yul yin/
633a6(rgyud 'grel): rtog ge'i ma yin dang // mi bslu nges pas sgra 'jug ste// thun mong stong brjod bral tsam min// lnga dgur rang rig rang snang phyir// tshul gyis phye ba'i ngo bo nyid// smra brjod bral te bsam yul min// phyogs bral ngo bo
633b1(rgyud 'grel): dbyer med pa// shes can yang rab yul yin phyir// de ni bden pa chen por bshad// bden pa gnyis ka dbyer med pas// 'phrul dga'i tshul te tha dad min// de bzhin bzhi yang lhag pa'i gnyis// rjes mthun thun mong bden
633b2(rgyud 'grel): pa yang // skye bo'i yul 'das rigs pa yis// grub pa thun mong grags par zad // bdag nyid chen po'i rkyen tshig gis// ji ltar gzhal bye 'dir brjod pa// log rtog rgyu 'bras bdag gzhan ltar// rnam pa 'di kun
633b3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi/ rang bzhin mahA pa'i rnam shes nyid// rang 'byung ye shes gnas med snangahA// mdor na tshogs brgyad rtog snang ba'i// shes yul cig kyang ji lta bar// bsam pa bsten tshe de snang phyir// kun dngos gzhan bral bdag
633b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid che ho// byams cad rigs phyir bdag brjod kyi// snang bkag rnam pa cig ma yin// gang zag chos dang brtag pa'i bdag/ rang rgyu spyod yul bral las bdug// rgyu 'bras yul lta bzlog phyir las// bdag
633b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid chen po 'dri 'dra med// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// chos rnams sna tshogs snang ba yang // bdag las gzhan pa ma yin pas// kun+da la smod cing chags su med// sems dang semaso nyid ji lta bur//
633b6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub de ni sems yin no// sems dang byang chub dbyer med pas// sems can ma lus thams cad dang // dus gsum chos rnams thams cad yin// thams cad ma lus chos so cog sems dang byang chub nyidadu
634a1(rgyud 'grel): 'ubang dbying drung dbyings dang ye shes kyang // rang rig kho na tsam+b+ha du zad// dgu dang stong phrag brgya bcu bzhi// byang chub sems las gzhan du min// gzhal yas khang dang dkyil 'khor dang // khro
634a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs 'du ba phro mang po yang // sems kyi cho 'phrul chen po yin// sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pas// sangs rgyas gzhan du ma 'tshe lnga cig/ kun brtags lo rgyus brjod byas puswa// ji bzhin nyid don rma lu bya bA// dper
634a3(rgyud 'grel): na 'jig rten mi rnams drag/ pha mes lo rgyus bshad byas na// rigs rgyud cig gis cig shes ltar// chos kun gzhi rtsa rma la byas na// gser las tha dad dbyibs snang ltar// rang rig cir yang snang phyir gzhi// de nyid rtogs//
634a4(rgyud 'grel): med rang snang las// rgyud med gzhi rtsa ga le rnyed// de nas lo rgyus rtags byas pas// gzhan bral rigs snang bzang ngan med// rtags pa'i dri bral ma 'dres gsal// don gsal so sos mtshon tshig phye// dngos tshig tshul
634a5(rgyud 'grel): sgras thA dad kyang // don du smra bsamra bral ba cig/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// gzhi rtsa med las thams cad 'byung // gshegs sku rgyu myur snang ba dang // log rtog sgyu mar snang ba gnyis// gzhi rtswa mang de rang bzhin
634a6(rgyud 'grel): stong // rigs dang rgyud du rtag tu med// rigs dang kha dog dbyibs med las// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad snang // snang ba nyid na chos kyi sku// cir yang 'gyur zhing tham cad 'grub// / gtan tshigs gnyis
634b1(rgyud 'grel): 'i lus gzhag pa// rang bzhin rang spyi mtha' bral dang // rnam par dbye ba'i gtan tshigs kyis// rang 'byung ye shes snyan par smra// de dngos dang rang bzhin la'ang // rang bzhin dngos dang rnam dbye ba'o// dngos ni spyi bshad
634b2(rgyud 'grel): chos so cog/ rgyu rkyen byed pos byas min par// rang bzhin nyid kyi snong tshul gyis// phye ba'ang ngang gis mtha' bral drag/ rang bzhin yong gis mnyam pa dang // rang bzhin thams cad mkhyen sogs gsal// chos kun
634b3(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin mi dmigs phyir// 'khor ba yongs su dag par 'gyur// rang bzhin yod gis dag pa'i phyir// mnyam pa'i dbyings su yang dag rtogs// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs phyir// mya ngan 'das pa yod ma
634b4(rgyud 'grel): yin// de bzhin nyid dang dbyer med phyir// rtags tu rang bzhin 'od gsal gnas// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// chos rnams mya lus thams cad kun// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan na med// rlung bzhin dang
634b5(rgyud 'grel): gis bdag med pa'o// 'di ltar snang pa thams cad kun// bdag la gud na cig kyang med// bdag nyid shin tu mi dmigs pas// nyon mongs nyid kyang byang chubo shing // chos rnams thams cad bdag yin pas// gang
634b6(rgyud 'grel): du 'gro zhing gang du skye// 'jig dang skye ba'i dngos po med// dngos mod de la su zhig sang // rang bzhin rnam par dbye ba ni// de ltar gtan tshigs kun lo 'ang / khyad par sbyor gzhan yang dngos po kun// /
635a1(rgyud 'grel): rang rgyud med de ming tsam dang // dngos po ma nges cir yang snang // rnam bzhi'i dang po rgyud las kyang // yang dag nyid dang log rtog nyid// ngo bo nyid kyis gnas 'gyur na// de las bcos shing sbyar du med// ye nas
635a2(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo yod yin na// nyon mongs spangs shing byung bsgrub med// zhes gsungs dngos po rnam nyid la// rigs rgyud yid na dUr red pas// skyon gnyis 'byung ngo rtag par grol// de phyir snod bcud 'gro ba'i rigs// snang ba tsam ste stan
635a3(rgyud 'grel): dred min// de phyir ming tsamA rgyud med de// chos rnams ming du brtags pa tsam// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang // ming tshegs khyod par snang ba yi// zab chen+da spyod yul log par rtog brtags ming tsam pa// thams cad ming
635a4(rgyud 'grel): tsam sangs rgyas kun// yi ge'i 'brel ba nyid la gnas// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni// log par rtog pa tsam nyid laso// phra zhing dra yod ma yin// log rtog nyid lnga nyid spyod de// gzhan du g.yo ba cig kyang med//
635a5(rgyud 'grel): log rtog rgyu 'bras rgyun nyid kyang // gzhi rtsa meng dbyings skad cig ma// rnam par dag pa dbyings nyid tshul// ma rigs pa yi 'khrul rtog gis// nga dang bdag tu med pa la// so so'i mtshan ma dngos pos bzung // 'dzin pa'i dngos
635a6(rgyud 'grel): po yod na do// chos rnams thams cad ming tshig tsam// so so'i rang bzhin nges zhes na// yang dag lam gyis bcos su med// thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te// snang ba nyid na 'ja' tshon bzhin// rang bzhin med par
635b1(rgyud 'grel): kun tu snang // de nyid chos sku yin par bshad// de dag me yi tshwa ba ltar// rang bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin te// chos kun rang spyi bstan pa'ang // skyabs kyis rtags pa der red med// kha cig rang gi mtshan nyid du// zhen pa snang ba lta bu
635b2(rgyud 'grel): la ras sri chu gsher la sogs dang // nyon mongs rang ga'i mtshan nyid dang // snying rje skyob la gdungs pa dang // byams po mi byed phan 'dod spogs// mya ngan 'das lam 'bras bu yi// rang gi mtshan nyid so sor 'ding // zhen pa
635b3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid mi rtag sprul// stong bdag med pa'i spyi ru 'dod// la lar rang rig thabs tshun du// ma 'gags snang ba rung mtshan+da te// drangos su rnam par byung pra yi// mtshan nyid yin pa ci ru 'dod// nyon mongs rang dang spyi bstan pa// mtshan
635b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid ma nor don rtogs na// rnam par byang ba'i lam du 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub kyang // gang na med de de nyid yin+da// nang gi chen po lnga nyid kyang // rang dang spyi yi dron rtog na// mtshan nyid med par rnam pa drug/ rang
635b5(rgyud 'grel): gi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// chos dang gang zag bdag dngos rnams// ngo bo yod la sogs rtags pas// rtog pa sgyu ma'i rlung 'gyur te// phyi yi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal skyong bdag med// sa rig pa ni/
635b6(rgyud 'grel): spang du med// ma rig yang dag bsgrub du med// thams cad dbyings ni gcig tu thim// so so'i rtsal rnams 'dzin gyur pas// thabs chen du ni rnam par 'phro// mtshan rnams rang bzhin mi gnas pas// shes rab dbyings/
636a1(rgyud 'grel): su rnam par spyod// sgyu ma'i dngos po rtog pa ni// rtog pa de nyid mi dmigs phyir// mi dmigs de nyid sna tshogs snang // skyes pa nyid na chos nyid cig/ zhe sdang spyi yi mtshan nyid ni// yang dag nyid kyis rab brta
636a2(rgyud 'grel): nam/ rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid de// gnyis med zhe sdang spyad du med// 'dod chags mtshan nyid rtogs pa ni// rnam par byang ba yin pa'i phyir// chags pa ma chags gnyis mod pas// 'dod chags mtshan nyid spang du med
636a3(rgyud 'grel): phrag dag mtshon nyid rtog pa ni// rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid de// dog pa spangs med yangs bsgrub med// de bzhin mtha'o bral gtan tshigs kyang // bltos nas mi rtag kun mtha'i phyir// yod med dbus dang rtag chang dang //
636a4(rgyud 'grel): cig dang du ma la sogs pa// mtha' gsum dang ni bzhir grags pa// thug pa thug mthar ci smos kyi// bral dang 'das dang med brjod sogs// bltos brtags phyogs zhen yod phyir motha'o// de dag 'khrul phyir 'di skad du// yod
636a5(rgyud 'grel): las rtsal ni sgros brtags 'gyur// med las brtsal na bkur bAtab ste// yod med gnyis las btsal byas na// de ni lung du ma bstan 'gyur// 'di ltar snang ba thams cad la// mngon sum+b+ha tshad mar rtags mthong yang // snang ba
636a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid na dngos po med// de bzhin yang dag nyid du rtogs// gang zhig stong pa'i ngang yod ces// med pa'i rang bzhin rtog pa ste/ ri bong rwa dang ma sham du// tshig tsam gdags su rung mod kyi// thams cad ming tsam stong nyid med//
636b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ma lus stong zhes te// dran med sngos pa ma yin pas// rtog med rang bzhin 'od gsal bas// 'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun// gdos pa can gyi chos min te/ shes rab 'ba' zhig kho na'o// thams cad ma lus de
636b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin te// de ni gang yang dmigs med la// skye dang 'gag dang gnas pa dang // 'ong dang 'gro ba'i dngos po med// de bzhin rang gi rig pa yang // mtha' dang dbus med du ma yin// gang du mi 'gro kun tu khyab// kun la de
636b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin mi gnas pa'o// gdos pa can gyi chos min pas// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// rig pa dpyang du gyur pa na// spyod par bya 'am mi sbyong bya// thams cad dbyer med dang yin pas// kha dog dbyibs dang rin+da po che//
636b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad khyab dang yungs 'bru'i tshul// bas ma yas mtha' dbus med pa'o// yod med dbu mar mi dmyigs shis// sgyu ma mig yor lta bu'i tshul// cig drung du mor bral ba yi// mtha' dang dbus maud de bzhin nyid//
636b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs te// rang 'byung ye shes gnas med snang // phyogs 'dzin lha dang dgrol phyir drang // mtha' bral 'dod pa 'dir gzhug phyir// mtha' dang bral zhes bya mod kyis// mthu kun+da rang rig
636b6(rgyud 'grel): rang snang phyir// 'di la bral dang ma bral dang // grol dang ma grol phyogs zhen modo// ye nas mtha' gnyis mo bcings phyir// grol bar tha snyad 'dogs pa'ang med// rnam par dbye ba'ang phung po dang // 'byung ba la
637a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs dngos kun la// de dngos snang re'ang bye brag gis// brtsegs pas ril por zhen grol nas// cig kyang dngos kun der re med// rang rig lhun grub bdag nyid dbyings// phung po lnga po gzhig
637a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya// bshig nas 'byung ba'i bag lan// ma bshig na'ang 'byung ba yin/ sa chu me rlung nam mkha' kun// rang bzhin med par bshog pa'i phyir// gcig pa lnga lngar dbye bya zhing // mum gyi dbyings su thim bya zhing // dbyung
637a3(rgyud 'grel): po yul dus snang ba kun// yul rnams yod pa ma yin zhing // kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa nyid// dngos po sna tshogs par snang ste// snang ba'i dngos po rnams gzhigs na/ so so mtshan nyid dngos med pas// gzhigs/
637a4(rgyud 'grel): nas nam mkha'i ngang du zhe// num mkha'i de nyid lngas gzhigs na// mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings su thim// 'di la mos pa gzhug phyir dang // gsang chen don du ma mthong bya'i phyir// brjod kyi dngos kun dbyer med la// rnam
637a5(rgyud 'grel): par dbye las gzhan nas min// de ltar de dag gang rung gi sna// tshwa ste kun gtan la phab gyur na// rang 'byung ye shes gnas mdo snang // rgyu rkyen ma byas ye nas gsol// tshwa su nyid phyogs bral bsam+ba brjod rnams
637a6(rgyud 'grel): bral phyiri mtshon par mi nus kyang // mtshan mas mtshon te bkri ba'i phyir// sbyin dang me long tshul lta bur// dngos kun gsang sngags nyid snang bas// mtshon par ma gyur med pa'i phyir// dngos kun mtshan nyid ji lta bar//
637b1(rgyud 'grel): rang 'byung theg chen shes rab kyis// nam mkha' gzung du med pa k+ShaSh+Ta// snang srid thams cad de dang 'dra// chos rnams thams cad sems yin to// sems ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin no// jik+Shar sa gzhi chen po la// sems kyis zin
637b2(rgyud 'grel): dang ma zin pa'i// skye 'khrung ma lus thams cad kun// tham+ba ca kun gyi gnas brten te// de bzhin bla med theg pa la// sangs rgyas byang chub kun kyang gnas// theg pa mtho sman thams cad 'byung // thams cad theg tshon
637b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyings su 'dus// ma~M yis thams cad kun bsreg ste// rtog tshogs ye shes dang du bsreg/ chu yis smras cing 'khrub ltar// kun la de ltar rig par gyis// chos rnams ye nas rlung dang 'dra// de la bzung du med pa ltar
637b4(rgyud 'grel): kun+da la de ltar 'byor par gyis// ma btsongs nas ni dI ltar gnas// thams cad 'byung bya'i gnas yin te// snang ba nyid na 'ja' chen bzhin// rang bzhin med par kun tu snang // de nyid chos sku'i yin par bshad // sgra rnams
637b5(rgyud 'grel): ji snyed brjod pa yang // dngos po med las dngos po'i sgra// brjod dang sgra yi dngos po min// chos rnams sgra ltar shes par byos// bsnam byA dri yaM dngos po yang // yod pa ma yin kun tu bsrung // chos rnams thams
637b6(rgyud 'grel): cad dri nged 'dra/ dngos med sna tshogs 'byung zhing 'phro// the tshom med pa'i shes rab kyis// chos kun de ltar shes par gyis// yul dang dbang shes dngos med par// 'tshegs pa ro yi dngos grub ltar// chos rnams ma
638a1(rgyud 'grel): lus thams cad kun// gzhi rtsa med las thams cad 'byung // phung gzhi shes pas dbang 'gyur na// reg bya sna tshogs myong ba ltar// chos kun rig pa dbang 'gyur na// sna tshogs snang la dngos po med// yang
638a2(rgyud 'grel): na thabs dang theg pa'i phyir// dngos po dngos bcos pas rtogs// nyon mongs dug lngas dug lnga sgrol// dug rgyun rkyen gyi ngo bo dag/ rang 'byung ye shes rang snang phyir// de ltar sus dran nyid kyis grol// de la 'dod chags 'dod/
638a3(rgyud 'grel): yon lnga// mthong thos dngos dang rkyen bzhi kun// rig phyir rang snang mthong thos bral// mngon par chags pa'i gnyis 'dzin med// gzugs snang ye shes rang reg gzugs// sgra brjod rang snang rig pa sgra// dri zhim chos
638a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi yin na de// ro bro de bzhin nyid kyi ro// reg bya rang 'gyur ye shes rig/ log rtog yul lnga ming tsam du/ snang las rang rgyud med pa'i phyir// rang rig snang spyod yul med// kun la de ltar 'byor par gyis// yon tan thams cad tshogs//
638a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis 'gyur// de ltar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// 'di la mi bya cig kyang med// gzhan dag ti ngo 'dzin bsgyur ba dang // spyod thabs 'dul drang tshod byed dang // yang dag dug lngar byed sogs pa 'ang // drang ba'i don de thar
638a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lam// spyod dang spyad par bya med par// rang snang grol thar thabs chen mchog/ de bzhin gzugs dang tsher ba dang // mtshan 'dzin 'du byed rnam shes lnga'i// mtshan nyid rang rig nyid snang phyir/ snang stong dbyer
638b1(rgyud 'grel): med tshor stong bral// mtshan nyid yod med bya byed med// dran spong dbyer med rang snang phyir// phung po bzhi po ye shes su// gcig pas rnam shes rang 'byung ni// banags kyang dbye ba bsam mi khyab// spyan la mtshan pas
638b2(rgyud 'grel): grol bar byed// kun gyis yang dag rtogs bya'i phyir// de bzhin chos sku'i gzugs brnyan bstan// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// ye shes lnga yi kun khyab kyang // rang rigs rnam rtog sgrib bya ste// ye
638b3(rgyud 'grel): shwas lnga yoM don dam mthong // ma mthong rmongs pa thams cad la// ye shes lnga nyid bstan pa'i phyir// dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang // ljang gu la sogs nag po bstan// byang chub sems nyid dag po'i phyi ra// /
638b4(rgyud 'grel): shin tu mdog ni dkar ba bstan// de rtogs bya phyir dA kar ba'i mdog/ chags deng chags par bya ba med// chags med rtogs phyir dmar ba'o// zad 'phel med pa rtogs bya'i phyir// mdog ni gser gyi
638b5(rgyud 'grel): mdog tu bstan// 'phrin las kun rdzogs bya ba'i phyir// ljang khu'i mdog tu bstan pa yin// bsgyur du med pa rtogs bya'i phyir// kha dog nag por bstan pa yin// de bzhin kun+da la shes par byos// mtha/
638b6(rgyud 'grel): dbus med de de bzhin nyid// dbyer me dang du gnas pa la// ye shes rtogs pa don bya'i phyir// phyogs dang dbus su gnas par bya// nyon mongs gsal bar ye shes gsal// de phyir shar gyis mtshon pa
639a1(rgyud 'grel): yin// nyon mongs ma rigs rgyu bral nub// rang 'byung ye shes bdag nyid drung // sdug bsngal gdod nas dag pa yi// don rtogs bya phyir de byang brjod// de ltar rang rig shar nub byang
639a2(rgyud 'grel): yon tan rdzogs pa mtshan phyir lho// de ltar chos rnams ma lus kun// de bzhin nyid kyis dbyings su 'dus// phyogs rnams ma lus thams cad kun// de bzhini nyid de zlum pa'i tshul// phyogs rnams kun la
639a3(rgyud 'grel): de ltar lha// de bzhin rten dang brtan can gyi// bye brag nang brtags phyir bstan pa// mtshan phyir rtags te de sgo nus// rang rig rang snang 'jal bar gyis// gru thabs skabs su brjod zin te// lhag pa'i mnyam nyid
639a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes don// mi grangs cir yang bstan mod kyang // don du smra bsam yul las 'das// thabs de rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid// phyin ci ma log shes rab spyan// ming grangs shes rab snyan shangs ljags// sku yis de
639a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid thob myong tshor// don reg mthong sogs ma nges pa// kun yod yid nges byas pa'ang // yul med mngon sum mchog tu gsal// ming grangs dgo dang mnyam bden nyid// tshul gyis brjod kyis tha dad min
639a6(rgyud 'grel): de dag dbye ba 'ang chos can gyi// grangs dang blo yi phyir bshad kyi// de la grangs su nges bzung med// de bas ngo bo cig par bden// skabs su gong 'ang ngo bo'i don// brjod de 'di ltar brjod pa'ang yul// med kyang mthe
639b1(rgyud 'grel): ba bye drag gis// brjod kyis don 'di 'jal bar g+his+yA// kun+da ba s+yA mar+ya zhal mthong ba'i// thams cad mig yor+yA s+yA ma'i tshulA// snang srid ma lus thams cad kun// chu zla'i tshul du 'drar shes shing // yul dang rtog pa
639b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med par// gang gis de sbyar rig pa de/ de nyid rdo rje'i zhal mthong yin// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor yang dag ni// chos dbyings pi dag dang dpyir med par// mnyam pa sbyar zhing dag pa'o// thams cad byang chub spyan
639b3(rgyud 'grel): grub cing // de ltar gang gis rtog 'gyur la// de ni ye shes mig can yin// de yis yang dag snying po mthong // gzugs baum+ban dkyil 'kho yang dag nI/ chen po rags pa zabs su rtogs// so sngo'i mtshan nyid
639b4(rgyud 'grel): shes rab rtogs// gnyis med 'brel pa thabs chen yin// kun+da kyang shes rab dang du gnas/ shAng dang gdas pa cid kun// de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos phyir// yod dang med pa gnyis su med// gnas dang mi gnas da bye
639b5(rgyud 'grel): ru med// mnyam pa'i dbyings su thams cad 'dus// 'dus med gnas su 'bebs pa yi// thams cad de lta bu yi dang // de rtogs rdo rje zhal mthong yin// rgyur byaste phung po lnga rnams la// gzhi rtsa de bzhin nyid du
639b6(rgyud 'grel): cig/ sgyu mar snang ba gzugs brnyan tshul// snang ba nyid nas dngos po med// dngos med de nyid sna tshogs ston// rtogs tshogs lha yi dkyil 'khor du// de sems rig pa nyid ces bya// thams cad dbyings 'gyur
640a1(rgyud 'grel): kun+ya tu bzung // de rtogs rdo rje zhal mthong yin// kun kyang yi ge'i mying tshogs bzhin// gang yang dngos po yod ma yin// dngos med de nyid sna tshogs snang // snang ba nyid na gang yang min// bya byed
640a2(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs kun kyang byed// dngos po med de yang dag nyid// de ni cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i// sa rdo dran med ma yin te// de nyid tan du 'od gsal yin// rdo rje sems dpa' de ltar gnas// rdo rje rigs dang dbyer maud
640a3(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin// thams cad ma lus pa yi dang // blta dang lta bar bya med pa'i// ye shes sgron mya sbreng bar ni// phyogs bcu'i zhing khrims thams cad mthong // thams cad lhun gyis grub pa dang /
640a4(rgyud 'grel): sgyu ma mig yor tshul shes pa// gnyis ka rung rig nyid du 'dus// de nyid yang dag yin par bshad// sgra deng tshig tu brjod pa nau// yang dge don gyi snying po min// ming tshig sla la mi brten par// blo yi gting
640a5(rgyud 'grel): du go bar byos// thams cad ma lus chos so cog sems las chos ni gzhan med// sems dang chos su dbyer med pas// byang chub lam ni ring pa min// byang chub sems zhes brjod pa ni// glang nas ma 'ongs
640a6(rgyud 'grel): gar mi 'gro/ rtogs med rang rigs kho na tsam// sangs rgyas sems can sems la gnas// yangs shing rgya che lhun grub ni// phyi nang snod bcud ye nas dag/ ngag rtogs nyid kyang dbyings nyid yin// 'di na
640b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mnyam nyid do// yul med slob par gzhi cig la// dang po bzod gsol des pa gsum// mi dmigs ye shes lta ba dang // phyag rgyu mi spro bar chad med// lhun grub slob pa'i mtha' lha gsum// rnal 'byor rim pas phye
640b2(rgyud 'grel): ba yin// khyad par rgyu yi theg pa dang / sngon du brjod de gzhan gsungs pa// theg pa bzhi'i nges 'byung la// theg pa ci go gis 'bras bur gnas// sa rnams khyad par bkod pa las// gsang ba'o snying por 'gro ba
640b3(rgyud 'grel): lam// theg pa dang po bcu drug mgon// gnyis pa bzhi yi lha spyod srung // gsum pa bcu gnyis nges par bstan// bzhi pa thag pa'i mdor bsdus nas// bla med theg pa'i dbyings su rung // ma rtogs pa dang lag
640b4(rgyud 'grel): par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs// 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba rnams// rang bzhin gsang ba ma mthong phyir// log pa'i tshogs te lam stegs tsam// gnas thabs ji bzhin
640b5(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba med// ngan song 'gro drug sna tshogs rgyu ba yang // 'khrul pa'i blo log pa nyid snang ste// de bzhin nyid dbyings 'gyur ba med// bdag dang bdag gis gzhan rnams ni// log par rtogs pa tsam nyid las
640b6(rgyud 'grel): phra zhing zab pa yod ma yin// dman dang khyad par yod par zad// bdag nyid ma mthong shes rgyud ma 'byongs pa// gzhan du 'tshol zhing rmongs pa'i sems can gyis// bstan kyang ma thos mtshon kyang ma mthong
641a1(rgyud 'grel): na bdag dang gzhan du 'tsho bas sangs mi rgyu// de dang ma bral ston pa mi mthong zhes// bgrod par 'dod pas phyin par mi nus te// rgyu 'bras gnyis med shes rab bsgribs phyir ro// 'di la sna
641a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs zhen pa dang // rtag chad bdag gi lta ba me de// chos tsam+bu r+dz+dza sa mr-ing+ga skad cig med// rgyu 'bras med de phyogs stong grol// dam par snang ba bral ba min// dmigs pa'i lha ru 'dod pa min// lhun grub rnam mkhyen rtogs
641a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// yon tan rgyud las 'di skad du// dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni// dang po don rtog mtha' mi stong // chu srin phyag rgya ji bzhin du// spyod yul kun tu tshad dpag med// rnal 'byor don dri mya ldan pa yis// nyon mongs
641a4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshang ba'i cho sa sgyid kyang // rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba yin// thabs dang shes rab rtogs pa yin// dus gsum+b+ha sdug bsngal gnod mi 'gyur// thubs dang shes rab sngun gyur pas// phyin ci log nyid byang chub lam// don
641a5(rgyud 'grel): rtogs don bzhi rdzogs par 'gyur// thebs dang shes rab ma rtogs pas// ma grol khams gsum 'khor ba yi// thabs la mkhas pas ma zin na// ldum gyi dge spyod sdig spyad kyang // mtho ris lha dang mi ru skye/ skye
641a6(rgyud 'grel): shi med pa'i sa mi 'thob// chos rnams dag par mi shes te// thabs dang shes rab ma rtogs pas// nyon mongs bcad dang spangs kyang bcings// mnyam pa'i gsang don mo rtogs nas// dbu la rang rgyal nyan thos dang // lha
641b1(rgyud 'grel): mi 'dod dang khams gnyis lha// sems can dug lnga spyod pa dag/ rang rang lha spyod mo chod tsam// smin thob thar dang lhung bas 'khrul// de rtogs dben pa byin brlabs te// zab mo brjod pas don snang byed// slob ma lhun grub byin
641b2(rgyud 'grel): bas pa// chos rnams thams cad skye med paso// shin tu brtan pa'i dbang tho bo 'gyur// rang rig yaye shes 'od gsal bas// thams cad mkhyen pa'i dbang yang thob// chos rnams thams cad dbyer med pos// kun la sbrid phyir gsang
641b3(rgyud 'grel): dbang thob// spyod cing chags pa med pa'i tshul// kun kyang rang bzhin zlums pa'i phyir// phan tshun bco lnga'i dbang thob ste// thams cad bdag nyid chen po'i chus// yul lha dri dbyangs khrus kyi mchog/ rang sems yod shes lnga
641b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs brgya no// rang rig thabs dang shes rab kyis// kun tu khyab pa cing phan mchog/ bdag nyid 'bras bu lnga snying por// ye shes rgyal ba kun gyi bcud// rtag rgyan ye shes 'phreng bar bshad// stong chen bla med go cha'i mchog/
641b5(rgyud 'grel): kun gzhir 'gyur med rtogs chen po// sdug bsngal gdung pa dang gis sangs// snang grags rnam rtog sku gsung thugs// sems phyir de nyid rgyas btabya pa'o// rang 'byung zhalnga du kun brngubs phyir// mA lus longs spyod dbang phyug che//
641b6(rgyud 'grel): rang rig ma 'dres rdzogs gsal bshad// de nyid dang gsal mi g.yo bsgom// brjid 'drar thams cad rig gsal thos// 'gro 'ongs med par las rdzogs dbang // kun gyi bdag 'gyur sems nyid ni// dbang phyug rgyal po'i
642a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang rdzogs so// de sogs lam kun rang rdzogs phyir// 'jug dang bya ba don gnyis med// rgyu 'bras ye nas dbyer med phyir// re dang dogs pa ga la yod// de brtan 'jam pa g.yo thob brtan// slo slabs
642a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bar the tsom med// des brlan rig pa'i me tog can// de la dran rgyud gnyis sbyin te// spyod lam gzhir sgom man ngag dang // 'da' ka'i dran pa sbyin pa'o// de ltar ldan pas grub pa'i phyir// spyod lam dran dang dro bo dang // btsas nyam/
642a3(rgyud 'grel): spyod dang lam 'grub pa'o// 'gro nyal 'dug sdod longs spyod kyang // skad cig dran bskul rang snang du// yul myed rang gsal mi g.yo ba// theg chen sgom las me nyams pa'o// ri dogs bral ba'i sems kyis zung // 'du 'bral
642a4(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i sems la brtan// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang rig nyid// dmigs med tshul du rab snang ngo // rnam rtog nyid ni ye shes phyir// gnyen pos gang yang byed med pa// cheng du rten pa 'khrul pa'i lam// cir yang ma myong yu
642a5(rgyud 'grel): bral ba// yang dag don nyams myong ba ste// de bzhin zhen bral rim pa tsam// g.yo thob brtan par snang ba yin// thams cad mnyam nyid rgyas btab phyir// de tshe mnyam nyid 'da' mi bya// mnyam rdzogs ting 'dzin goms gyur
642a6(rgyud 'grel): nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa thob 'gyur// de yang rgyud las rim par gsungs// shes rgyud ci yin gang gis ngo shes shing // bya byed las 'phags gyi ni 'dir 'dug byed pa// gang zhig blo la spyod pa byang chub 'theb// rnam par
642b1(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i g.yungs drung sangs rgyas la// thams cad ye nas rnam dag cing // mi rtogs thig lar gnas la rtogs pa mdzad// snyad du med pas sna tshogs 'byung ba yin// nam mkhar bzung bas sprin gyis khebs par 'gyur// nam mkha'
642b2(rgyud 'grel): med par gang gis shes pa ni// sprin bzhin 'byung zhing khebs par mi spyod do// bdag med bdag chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// ma bkag pa las 'ba' zhig 'byung med pa'i// thams cad sems kyi ngang rten sems zhes bdag
642b3(rgyud 'grel): tu med// ma bcos lhun gnas ye nas byang chub cing // thob rgyu med pas ye nas bde gshegs yin// e ma'o ma bsgrubs sgrub chen po// blang dor med pa'i sa chen po// grub pa chen po ye shes che// mi g.yo 'du 'bral med pa'i gzung
642b4(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa'i ye shes yid bzhin gter// thams cad la'ang me long bzhin// lhas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang ba'o// bya byed med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// de nas byang chub snying po ldan// byang chub sems su rgyu cig pas// rtsa ba snying
642b5(rgyud 'grel): rje chen po 'byung // mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba'i gzungs// mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na// nyams rdzogs chen po thob 'gyur bas// 'das na sangs rgyas me yin no// de bas rang sems rtogs byas te// le lo g.yeng
642b6(rgyud 'grel): ba yongs spangs nas// nga dang bdag med mnyam par bsrung // thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas la// bsgrubs shing bsrung bar bya ba meng // de bzhin nyid la gnas bcas na// nyon mongs sdug bsngal mi 'byung ste// rtag tu bdegan
643a1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub nyid// mtshan dang dpe byad kun dang ldan// shes rab rnam gsum goms byas nas// ting 'dzin mnyam pa'i don rtogs te// kun tu yangs pa chen po bsgom// rgyu 'bras bus cig rdzogs pa
643a2(rgyud 'grel): yidarang rig nyid la dbang thob ste// tshe ni bcu drug drug pa yi// brgya brgya dag tu bsku' zhing gnas// lus ma bor bar sangs rgyas sa// sngags 'chang sal por rtogs byas nas// bo dag nyid chos nyid skye
643a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gag med// dang las ma g.yos par gnas ni// phyag rgya chen po thams cad kyang // rdzogs pa phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs// thams cad dbyer med ye mnyam la// ma
643a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dres rgya yongs ma chad pa'i// gzhal yas khang dang nyi zla ye// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub ni// sku gsung thugs ni bsam mi khyab// de bas yang dge skye mchog gi/ spyod lam rnam pa thams cad du/
643a5(rgyud 'grel): par rtog med tshul gyis ni// thams cad kun la chags med rol// mthong thos yul sogs gang snang yang // rang byung rang snang rang rig laswa// gzhan pa'i dran pa mi bya ste// ts+tsha yul bral bas nyams mi bya'o//
643a6(rgyud 'grel): 'pho zhing 'gyur bas mthong ba dang // bdag nyid dran bskul ngang nyid las// mi g.yo dran pas rgyun tu zung // rang gnas mthong bar 'gyur ba yin// skal ldan gzhan zhig 'pho ba na// bde ba'i tshig bshad byin gyis
643b1(rgyud 'grel): brlabs// dran pa ma nyams bar du bya// las zad rang snang gnas 'thob 'gyur// yang na zla 'od thugs yig rnams// rim bsdus 'od zlum gsang lam nas// phyir byung brdal bas snang srid kun// rang sems chos nyid ngang du gas
643b2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// // de ltar men ngag gang 'phrod las// 'jug tshe stan du lus bsrungs nas// rnam rtog 'byung ba'i lus ltos par// rdo rje drag pos srung byed cing // rab 'bring thun mtshams shes bya yis// legs
643b3(rgyud 'grel): par bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa// rgyu 'bras re ba ma chad la// rgyu 'bras med par bstan pa bshad// 'thob tshul rgyud kyi 'dre tshul dang // thams cad mkhyen tshul de na mdzad tshul// legs bshad dang po thob pa'i tshul// lha
643b4(rgyud 'grel): spyod gdang can rnal 'byor pas// bsgoms pas zhan mtha' rim gsal sangs// mtha' dbus med pa'i ye shes gsal// bde ba chen po'i dang du byin// de bzhin nyid du 'gro du med gshegs// bdud bzhi ma bsam
643b5(rgyud 'grel): bcos pas rgyal// lhun grub yon tan rdzogs lnga yang // rang gi ngo bo mtha' yul 'das// tshul gyis rnam par phye ba yin// lhun grub thams cad mkhyen pa yi// dran mchog rang rig mthong goms pa// rgyu las 'bras
643b6(rgyud 'grel): shur gyur min gyi// 'bris bu rang nyid shar bar zad// rgyal po phrug gu spyod log pa/ na shing byed sa thams cad kyi// bdag gyur lta bur khams gsum pa// ye yin mthong goms rtags bral ba// longs spyod
644a1(rgyud 'grel): bral bas kun bdag nyid// ye yin mngon du byas par zad// kun rtags gnyis zad brjod pa'ang // dper na rmi lam bde sdug can// gnyen po mi dgos snying sangs pas// de bral nga yi bde ba thob// de
644a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bde dang sdug bsngal bas// nyams thag spang min// shes goms ma rig rang bral na// gdod nas lhun grub rnam mkhyen pa// grub zin ngang gis mngon dga' ste// 'bras bu rang shar kyar 'dod pa// rtog pa'i gyong bral rim pas
644a3(rgyud 'grel): brtags// man las yin par grub par med// thog mtha' bar du 'bras nyid phyir// 'bras bu'i theg par brjod pa yin// kun btags zad nas nges byas la// thob ces rtags kyis gzhan nas min// e ma'i snying por ya
644a4(rgyud 'grel): bcas pas// 'jigs byed dbyings nyid kun bzangs phyag rgya'i mchog// rang bzhin sku gsung thugs chen po// byang chub lhun grub brdal ba yi// snying po nyid ni snying por bcas kun gnas// de nyid rdzogs pa'i ngang las dngos grub/
644a5(rgyud 'grel): kun shar kun tu gnas// dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi// rin po che dang 'byung ba kun// de dag rdzas yod ma yin te// rang sems bsod nams brtan pa yin// ngo mtshar cho 'phrul smad kyi chos// gzhan nas yod 'ongs
644a6(rgyud 'grel): me yin te// thabs la brten pa'i shes rab nyid// de lta bu yi dang du byung // de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis// sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa na// ye shes thig la de nyid la// ye shes thig la nyid snang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mahA
644b1(rgyud 'grel): yas mchog/ mdor na rang rig kun gzhi nyid// byang chub snying po rang bzhin gyi// ye shes sku dngos kun bral ba// rgyal ba'i dngos gzhi thams cad du// mthong bzhin nges par ma byas la// gtor brtags des la gnyed brtags
644b2(rgyud 'grel): zang // de thob rgyud tshul ji lta ba// so so'i rnal 'byor tha dad pas// bsgrub pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe// rgyud dag lhun grub rgyal ba rnams// rgyu de cig 'dres na'ang 'di skad 'byung // phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi// zhing
644b3(rgyud 'grel): khams rnam dag bsam yas dang // rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang // 'khor lo'i rgyan dang rol mo'i cho gas// dkyil 'khor ma lus pas mi yus kun// mthong nas nye bar mnyes pa dang // rgya chen gsung las don phyung ba
644b4(rgyud 'grel): mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang ba'o// rgyud drug 'khor ba'i lus snang ba// rnam rtog mthun pa'i las snang ngo // sku mchog rdo rje 'od snang ba// mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang ngo // de phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // ye shes rgyu ni
644b5(rgyud 'grel): ma 'dres te// gcig na des lung 'di dag 'gul// cig la mthun snang sgra mi 'jug/ gal te snga phyi cig 'gro na// stong pa'i murari thim rigs pas 'gal// snang ba spyong pa'i skyon du'ang 'gyur// mtha' la thugs pa ba tsam
644b6(rgyud 'grel): med// so so'i grub mtha'i khyad par yang // mi 'byung snyam pa'i skyon du 'byung // so sor bsgrubs phyir cig mi rung // gal te rgyal ba rang rgyud 'gyur// rang bzhin nyid kyis cig go zhe// sems can rgyud kyang de 'drar 'gyur//
645a1(rgyud 'grel): 'on te de ltar mi cig na'ang // rang rig rang 'byung mngon byas la// snga phyir sangs rgyas bla dgas btags// rang 'byung rang la shar bar zad// rang 'byung rigs pa rgyud med par// so sor ma 'dres gang gis
645a2(rgyud 'grel): rung // 'on te rang 'byung cha gnyis 'gyur// de phyir cig pa'i rigs pa sre 'gal// don mdzad ri mos 'byung bar 'gyur// spyan drangs byon dang ma byon 'byung // sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes brjed pa// dngos po rnams kyi de nyid
645a3(rgyud 'grel): ni// de la gnyis pa yod par 'gyur// phyir gzhi yi dron dang 'gal// mi cig gtan tshig rgyas pa med// lung las 'byung ba 'di skad du// mkha' la 'ja' tshen sprin yang mang // nam mkha'i dbyings su thams cad bsdus//
645a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mkhyen nyid bsam yas kyang // chos kyi dbyings su thams cad bsdus// rdo rje mnyam nyid thugs su chud pa'i sa// mnyam rdzogs chen po'i lhun la rol pa mdzad/ bde gshegs dbyings nyid de bzhin nyid
645a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa// dus bzhi rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par 'u ba// rang bzhin dbyer med gdong mtha' mi 'byed cing // ye nas mnyam pas rgyal ba rgya mtsho yin// nam mkha' gang ba'i rgyal ba dang // nyag cig snang ba'i rgyal ba
645a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis// sku dang gsung thugs cig las med// 'dul ba'i ngo gang khyad par la// mi mthun so sor snang ba zang // de sogs mthun gsungs dka' dang 'gal// sangs rgyas du ma'i mthar 'gyur ro// de de'ang nges pa 'di ltar zhog
645b1(rgyud 'grel): drang don nges don dbang du na// rigs lnga ye shes khyer grub snang byed bu las ni// shAkya thub 'gyur mya ngan 'das// me tog bkod par mA glags snang // thun mangs sangs rgyas rgyud rer snang // ye shes skad cig gi phye
645b2(rgyud 'grel): nas// don mdzad mthun 'dod ltar snang ba// drang po'i don de nges pa yini// nges par rgyal ba thams cad kun// ngo bo cig dri tha dang min// ngo bo nyid ni ci 'dra na// brjod bsam 'das kyang phyogs mtshon nA/ thabs chen ma 'dres
645b3(rgyud 'grel): cig stong 'das// shes rab dbyings cig du ma dang // yod bral 'di zhes bstan dka' ba'o// der cig bshad pa'i mtha' mi 'gyur// rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes dang ye shes rigs dang rgyud// dbyibs
645b4(rgyud 'grel): dang kha dog mtshan gnas dang // rang bzhin nges par dang med phyir// dngos po rnams kyi de kho na// sems kyi chos nyid rang 'byung gi/ ye shes cha gnyis yos ma yin// cig po kun ldan kun bral ba'o// de nas ye shes
645b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyud 'gro med// de phyir sprul pa'ang 'gro 'ong bral// des na cig dang du ma'i mtha'// dbus bral ma spangs ngo bor cig/ de la la las cig par ni// cig bden du ma'i tshul gyis ni// mi cig thi tsom zab 'byung // de lta'i rgyud du
645b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin byed pa// 'tsho nyid brlabs ltar thams cad kun// gdod nas rang 'byung ye shes cig/ ye shes 'di ni 'di 'drar dka'// mtha' mdzad ma lus der snang phyir// dus ma nyid du cig pa'o// du ma rgya chad yod 'gyur/
646a1(rgyud 'grel): na rang 'byung kun snang bden mi 'gyur// bde gshegs mi gnas mnyam nyid dang du byen// thabs chen ma 'das rnam par thar pa yi// dmigs med bde bar gshegs pa nyid// ye shes dbyings su
646a2(rgyud 'grel): thugs chud pa// thabs dang shes rab dbyings nyid dam pa'i mchog/ rtog med ma 'dres yongs rdzogs pa// rigs su bstan drang thim pa med// dus bzhi phyogs kun bdag cig phyir// kun mkhyen thad ka'i dmigs yul
646a3(rgyud 'grel): grol// de phyir skad cig skye 'jigs med// 'gro dang 'ong ba'ang de la med// log par rtogs rtags rnam dag cing // ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir// thugs rje chen pos 'brel pas na// 'gro drug gnas ma lus snang //
646a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gnas la dkyil 'khor nyid// rdzegs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// brgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor las// thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor yongs
646a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs 'byung // phyogs dus dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mgon+da// sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrol ba yis// bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod// rnam par med pa'i tshul gyis ni// thams cad kun la chags med rol//
646a6(rgyud 'grel): gdul bya'i don ched bsam mi khyab// rgyal ba'i rgyal ba rnams kyi sku// sna tshogs cir yang snang mos kyang // kun tu rin chen lta bu ste// zang 'phel 'gro 'ong 'dug par mdzad// dper na me long chu zla dang // gar mkhan lus
646b1(rgyud 'grel): dang brag ca dang // nyi 'od lta bur don mdzad pa// lhun grub dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // sku gsung thugs sprul cir snang ba// de la skad cig rgyun tu ma bral ba// dmigs bya dmigs byed mi dmings dpagra med bsam mi khyab//
646b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rang rig dkyil 'khor sna tshogs brjod mi lang // mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab khyab med khyab pa'i dbyings// ye nas kun gsal dkyil 'khor rnam 'phro spros pa med// ye nas kun khyab dkyil 'khor bsam yas
646b3(rgyud 'grel): zhing gi rdul snyed du// ye nas rnam 'phros snying po kun gnas pa// de ltar ston pa'i bla ma yang // shaus rab mchog brtan ting nge 'dzin// thob cing dam pa'i mdzad dang ldan/ khungs su rgyad pa'i dbang phyug pa// dman pa'i 'du byed
646b4(rgyud 'grel): spangs shing dben// dang dal thugs rje chen gnyen srung // dam pa de dang phrad nas ni// gzhan gyi yul la mi 'jug par// rigs dang skyon la mi rtog par// snying du bzung zhing snying du bya// sleb ma ma nor rigs can nam// rigs rgyu
646b5(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i rnal 'byor pa// bla mya rigs 'dzin sreg tu 'dzin// mun ngag rin tshun gter du 'chang // ting 'dzin shes rab rtsal du rdzogaso// lhag pa'i ye shes nyi mar 'char// dad dang brtson 'gas rgya 'bas rdzogs// rtsol bas kyi
646b6(rgyud 'grel): ngag stong brlag kyang // mi skyo bla ma mi slob la/ bde ba thob pa'i yan lag yin// bla ma rdo rje srogs 'gyur te// sgo gsum ze la rgyu g.yo med pas// mi phyed rgyun tu bstem na 'grub / na ma yengs shing sdu
647a1(rgyud 'grel): bsngal gyur pa pha rol la// mi sems 'di yis 'dod 'tshal bsku// dngas dang skabs kyis 'dul byed cing // zhe gzhog dngos sku bskur ba dag de yi sdug bsngal bzod drug chad// rdo rje bla ma sems can nAn/
647a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal sras yid kyi blo can des// sku gsum dregs dang dran spyod pa// bags kyi tshor na blo ma des// gter mdzod rig pa'o sgo sdom ste/ man drug mi tho'i rgyu yin pas// b+h+rUM glang rkyen med mo 'grub ltar// man ngag med na 'gyu
647a3(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur// des na bla ma srog yin pas// lus ngag sems kyis dus gsum du// rang srog bral ba'i las mi byed// grags rnyed 'dod pa'i sems log gis// nyams rab 'gyur ba'i las mi bya// de ltar byed pa'i slob
647a4(rgyud 'grel): bu gang // drag pos spang ngam yang na ni// tshig gis brid cing bgyangs la gtang // thugs kyi bde ba sro sro'o// blo med dkyil 'khor ston pa po// yon tan zad med sbyin pa yin// byang chub lam chen 'dren mdzad pa//
647a5(rgyud 'grel): chags med zhing du 'god pa yin// nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad gcod cing // 'khor ba'i lam rnams stong par byed// mA rig sun sil sgron med yin// long po rnams kyis dmigs su med// de la rtag tu mchod
647a6(rgyud 'grel): byas na// sangs rgyas byang chub thag mi ring // rdo rje slob dpon smad mi bya// byang chub ston pa'i 'dren pa po// long pa'i dmigs bu 'dren dang 'dra// nyon mongs sdug bsngal mtsho skems yin// slob dpon de la
647b1(rgyud 'grel): smod pa ni// dper na mun khung sgron bsad na// mthong ba'i don mi rtogs pa bzhin// sdug bsngal nyams thag yun rings su// bskal pa mang por myong bar 'gyur// de bas gus pa rtag tu gyis// lus la dbang ba'i rgyal po bas//
647b2(rgyud 'grel): shin tu gtso bor blang bar bya// mi 'khrug blo zab rkyen thub cing // sems can ngang tshul kun bor nas// gang gis yid kyang mi 'khrugs cing // bud med 'gug pas gtso la 'bul// gzungs thub gsang la mkhas pa yi
647b3(rgyud 'grel): nges pa can la shin tu gtang // thogs pa med par 'dod pa spyod// bud med yon tan kun yod kyang // 'dod chags kun dang mthun spyod pa// nams kyang 'khor ba'i gting rje ste// man ngag bstan pa'i gnas min pa// /
647b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag nams kyang sbyin mi bya// dad pa che zhing chos la gus// chags par rlan par bka' nyan zhing // gnas la dga' zhing lung nyen po// rigs nges btung ba'i lag tu gtang // dam tshig mi ldan spyod pa rtsing // spro bung
647b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags rab tu tsho// gnyid med chang dad brtson 'grus chung // slob la mi gus nan tan med// slob dpon mi dran gdung sems chung // mun dang lkog dang skye bo la// gar dben 'phrad par 'dod spyod cing // 'dod chags/
647b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgral lam de dag la// tshig rnams gsang ba smra byed pa// 'jig rten 'dod pa dga' rnams phyir// gal te smos pas byin na ni// rims dang nad kyis srog bcad de// sreg dang skems par yun rings gnas//
648a1(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i don mchog 'di dag ni// lta ba dman la bshad byas na// dus min par ni srog zad nas// mgro 'gas snying yang 'tshig par 'gyur// khab len gyis ni lcags sdud ltar// mi 'dod bzhin du
648a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang med par// ngan song bskal par ltung yang 'gyur// de bas rdo rje gsung mchog 'di// thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs rje yis// chos la skyon yon ma yin te// sems can don phyir shin tu gsang // theg pa dman dang /
648a3(rgyud 'grel): phyin ci log/ de la gsang ba bstan 'gyur na// rang bzhin gastang ba'i don mi shes// 'phral gyi spyod yul de dag la// shin tu nges pa'i don bzung nas// ma rtogs de nyid dmyal bar 'gro// dper na gtsub shing me gtsub
648a4(rgyud 'grel): na// gtsub shing nyid kyang 'tshig par snang // gzhan yang 'tshig par 'gyur ba bzhin// chos don zab mo me dang 'dra// skal chung shes rab smin pa dang // bre ngan rgyu 'bras rmongs pa rnams// thos ma rtogs ga
648a5(rgyud 'grel): bsngal myang // dam can rdo rje mkha' 'gro tshogs// mos pa bzhin du 'dug gyur nas// sha khrag zos te sdug bsngal 'gyur// de byas rab tu gsang bar bya// thos bsam skem la rab sbyangs pa'i// shes rab mig ldan
648a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis ni// snod ldan dang tshul bzang la bstan// lus dang longs spyong gtong la sbyin// shes rab rgya che blo yangs po'i// blo brtan snying rje dang ldan dang // rang bzhin ngang tshul bzang la bstan// gzhan du sgyu par
648b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba min// 'di lta'i man drag sbyin byed pa'i// bla ma rdo rje srog gyur te// gsung rab rgya mtsho ma bshad kyang // nam zhar snying du nan tan+da bya'o// 'di thob de yi rgya nyams na// nam zhar thar pa'i khar ma byung // gang zhig 'di
648b2(rgyud 'grel): lde mas gyur pa// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du// dkyil 'khor ma lus bstan pa yi// nye ba'i sras su dgongs par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i rigs mchog 'dzin pa de// 'jig
648b3(rgyud 'grel): rten gtso dang 'khor gyis bskor// dam pa mchog dang dam pa yis// sras dang spun dgongs byin gyis rlob// bde gshegs nyid kyis yul bzhugs pa// 'jigs med kun tu bzang por sbrer// rgyud lung man
648b4(rgyud 'grel): ngag don bsdus pa'i// rgyal ba sngon 'byung ston byed pa// dus mtha'i skud cig de nyid la// rang 'byung ye shes ston du ston// bstan pasdu rgyal ba'i gral bu 'jog/ ye shes 'phrul gyi lde mig gis// rdo rje'i tha tshig
648b5(rgyud 'grel): sgo phye nas// yid bzhin rin chen gter phyung ba// skal ldan mchog gi spyad du gsol// khong na gnas pa'i yang khengs su// lcags kyi spro bu kha bsdam mo// gnas ni brag dang tshu la bzhag/ srog bral kha bzhin brtsa
648b6(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// man ngag gi bcud// rgyal ba'i shul/ rigs 'dzin rnams kyi yum// rnal 'byor pa'i lam/ man ngag rnam par bkod pa rdzogs so//
649a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ tsit+ta bin+da pa tre sha nA ma/ bod skad du// thugs kyi thigs pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan dpal rder sems dpa' gtso// kun mkhyen rgyal ba kun kyi thugs// 'khor lo snying
649a2(rgyud 'grel): po stan+da mdzad la// gnyis med yid kyi sa phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje sems// gsang ba'i snying po'i rgyud dag les// rin chen bcud thugs skal ldan phyir// legs par bsdus ste bstan par bya// rgyu mtsho
649a3(rgyud 'grel): las ni chu thigs bzhin// ye shes rgya mtsho thugs kyi thugs// mi 'jigs phung po ji bzhin du// ye shes thugs kyi bcud gsum pa// rang bzhin bde gshegs gdul bya'i phyir// snang ba gsum gyi ngo bo /
649a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud kyi dbye ba rnam par bzhag/ gcig la gsum gyi ngo bo yang // 'khrul pa'i snang ba gsum du 'gyur// des na snang ba bzhi drug tu// lung rigs kun las gsal bar bshad// yan lag rdo rje rnam bzhi pa// tho
649a5(rgyud 'grel): mar bstan pa byang chub sems// 'gro ba mang po'i sems rgyud rnams// log rtog ngo bo rgyu rkyen gyis// tha dad dus ni gser bzhin du// rang 'byung ye shes tha dad med/ de yang 'tshang grol gnyis ka bdag/ me long dang
649a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i g.ya' bzhin du// phan tshun spangs pa med pa la// byis pa bzhi dang rten zhes smras// mkhas lhun grub smra bsam las 'das// 'di skad gsang ba'i rgyud nyid las// bde gshegs sgyu mar snang ba nyis// rigs
650a1(rgyud 'grel): dang rgyur du brtag tu meng // gzhi rtsa mod de rang bzhin stong // rigs dang kha dogs dbyings med pas// phyi nang snong bcud thams cad snang // yang ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba las// bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i//
650a2(rgyud 'grel): ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos// bstan phyir spro ba sna tshogs mdzad// gsungs pas rang bzhin rgyud nyid ni// ma rigs ye shes tha dad med// nam mkha' dang pa'ong sprin gyi gnas// dang ris can gyis bsgo ba sbyar// rtog
650a3(rgyud 'grel): sems ma mthun sems nyid du// gcig pas rang sems thugs med las// dper na Ar+ya dzam+b+ha la// na'u le'i rkyal pa rin chen char// rgyal po yang dag dron gyi gnas// bram ze dam pa rtse rwa pa// dbul po tan ta'i grong khyer dang //
650a4(rgyud 'grel): rigs dran sha ta ra yi gnas// gdol pa'i grong du rin po che// sna tshogs rin chen phal pa lnga// bya tshub grang pa lted ras hru la// sha khrag rus pa rin chen sil// gcig la so soR+Sha snang ba bzhin// spyod yul tha dad snang bA 'ong // rlung
650a5(rgyud 'grel): sems rkyen kyis snang ba tsam// ngo bo rigs rgyud phyogs med pas// de la de bsgyur snang bstsal lo// spyir ni lag rtog bsam+b+ha yas pa// ye nas yod pa ma yin te// so sor 'dzini rtog bag chags kyis// rang gis sgribs shing
650a6(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu 'khor// 'di skad gsungs pa'ang thog mod nas// sems las logs su ma gyur cing // rgyu rkyen las ni glo bur ba'i// spyod yul snang dus thog mtha' med// sems rgyud gnyis kun lhun grub pa// nor bu rin chen lta bu
650b1(rgyud 'grel): lu 'gal ba 'dus zhes thog spyan brjod// phan tshun spangs par gang 'dod pa// dreng mos rtsi sbyang byubs pa bzhin// gsang ba'i don mchog ga la yod// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang // ye nas ngo bo yod min na// nyon
650b2(rgyud 'grel): mongs spangs shing sbyang du med// so so rang bzhin ngas she na// yang dag lam gyis bcos su med// de gsungs phyir na rgyur gnas pa// shes blo gzhi zhes gnyis su smra// bsam pa chos nyid de bzhin ste// de la yod pa de la med//
650b3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su rtog pa bdon zhe na// de dang de la 'brel med pas// nam yang sngon bzhin bden pa min// mi rtog pa yi sems rgyu de ldan// thams cad dag ces bya ba 'ang // dngos po gsal dag ma yin te// snang spyod nyid la rnam par dag/
650b4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pas log rtog spang du med// sprin dang 'ja' tshen snang ba'i tshe// rang bzhin stong par dang gis gnas// yang dag rgyu yis theg pa pas// kun tu rtog pa dron dam pa// yod na nges tshig med dogs pas// dang zhing glasal
650b5(rgyud 'grel): dag gang 'dod pas// bsam pa dag la de yod ces// so sor ston pa rtog pa'i blo// dag pa mnyam nyid gnyis med dag/ ldog pas phye ba ji bzhin sgrar// gang zhen bsgrub pa'i phyogs 'dod pa// gang ga ngar rtsi' mi bzhin
650b6(rgyud 'grel): du// spyod yul bral la 'dod pas gdungs// ye shes dngal gnyis rtog srus// lhun grub dang la ye dam za// gang shes mi gtsang spos dri dang // tshar ma'i nang na so spos dr-i dang // thams cad rang rig byang chub sems//
651a1(rgyud 'grel): de ni lung gi tshad mar bshad// yod las btsal na sgro btags te// meng las btsal nas bskur btab 'gyur// yod med gnyis las btsal byas na// de'i ni lung du ma bskrun 'gyur// de gsungs phyir na rigs//
651a2(rgyud 'grel): yod min// yod med dgag bsgrub blun po'i blo// de bas sems kyi de kho na// kun tu brtags dang gzhan gyi dbang // yongs su grub pa'i bye brag du// bya ba de dang de maud de// de ni smra bsam med mi 'jog/ rang 'byung kun la rgyas
651a3(rgyud 'grel): btab pa// rang bzhin kun dang dbyer med pa// med pa bzhi ltar gnas pa med// bden pa rnam gnyis dbyer med phyir// dgag bsgrub med pa'i smra bsam grol// thams cad ye shes pa yi phyir// mi mthun 'dus par brtag tu
651a4(rgyud 'grel): med// 'dod bzhin shing ltar gnas pa lnga// ji bzhin sgra ru rtog pa 'khrul// badren pa gnyis su med pa'od// mkha' dang 'ja' sprin+da snong bu bzhin// snang stong kun tu rang gsal ba// rang bzhin dag gis snang ba'o// bdag dang bdag
651a5(rgyud 'grel): du ma brtags pa'i// so sor snang bzhin mthun pa'i gzugs// de lta bu yi ngang du snang // des gsungs lung gi bgrong dang bla// phyin ci log gAny+tsi si yang dge ste// mya rig pa nyid ye shes smras la// nyo ni mongs sdug bsngal
651a6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub mchog/ de gsum don gyis de 'phos med// mar me'i dus na mun ldan pa// blun po mun snang re mos mthong // mkhas pa ngo bos re mi lha// 'khor ba chos nyid de bzhin no// spangs pa med par kun brel

651b4(rgyud 'grel): blo dro la yod do zhes// bskur pa gang yin chad lta ba// de dang de nyid chad lta ba// de dang de gnyis tha dad cing // mi sne de kun 'byung thog ma 'byung // la las ldog pa gnyis med las// snang smra 'ang lhan cig med pA dang // brtan
651b5(rgyud 'grel): ba mi btub gzhir myi btub// NA rkyen spo bas rigs pa med// don gnyis yod med rigs mye las// de yi s+thA na rnying bzhin paste// sman gyi phan snod ji bzhin du// thams cad ma lus rgyu TIg las// mi mthum
651b6(rgyud 'grel): bar so sor snang // de gsum phying ni rkyen gyis che// lung las kyang ni 'di skad du// rgyu drug 'khor ba'i lus snang po// rnam rtog mthun pa'i las snang ngo // sku mchog rdo rje 'od snang ba// mthun po'i ye shes rang snang ngo //
652a1(rgyud 'grel): de bas sems kyi de bzhin nyid// mthong ba dag dag dang ma dag gis// dbye bas spyod yul so sor snang // de la ma spang mi dmigs phyir// mtshon pa yod med 'dogs pa 'ang med// dgag pa med
652a2(rgyud 'grel): pas glang med phyir// mtha' yi gzhung du bsgrub mi dgos// ma rig 'tshungs par ldan pa'i phyir// dus gsum rgyun tu don mthong med// mig gis mig bzhin de lta bas// gnyis snang snga phyi long brtags nor// sdom
652a3(rgyud 'grel): ni dus dang rgyu rkyen dang // tshul dang ngo bo rang bzhin nyes// tun nyid las gsungs pa ni// thog ma med nas sems yan dang // phyin ci log la 'jol nyog spyad// gal hA ma byung byung 'gyur na// 'jig rten thog ma 'byung bar
652a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs pa dang // lhan cig byed pa nye len 'phel// rang 'byung rigs rgyad med pa nyid// de yis snang phyir tan+ta las// sngar gsungs don gyi dang po'o rgyu// ngo bo nyid kyang gzhan du med// sngon gyi
652a5(rgyud 'grel): me long rnam gnyis ltar// gdod nas ldan pa gnyis med pa'o// kun tu rtog pa rnam gnyis po// goms pas mnyam du 'byung dang gsum// de yi rkyen gyis lhas snang ba swA// 'od ma lta buru phyi mar snang // khams
652a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum 'di na gnas pa kun// dkar nig bcu yi dang po ste// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsam gtan bzhis// bcu bdun gnas ris spyod yul snang // snyoms par 'jug pa'i mthu ldan na// rtse mo bzhi yi spyod
652b1(rgyud 'grel): yul snang // rgyud lnga lam du dug lnga ste// tAn+d+ha'i sa ma ya las 'byung // phyi nang 'khor los gnas bskyod pa'ang // khams gsum tshwa yis nges pa med// 'khrul rtog bstan pa'i spyod yul ni// snga so'i phyi nang snod bcung
652b2(rgyud 'grel): dang // lus dang longs spyod che dang las// bde sdug bar ma tha dad po'o// sgyu mas bslus pa'i mo bzhin du// nor pa'i spyod yul rang bzhin snang // srid rtsa nyes pa bdag lngas phyir// sdug bsngal myong zhing lam dang bral// de lta bu

652b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbyings ni bsam yas par// sku gsung yon+da tan 'phrin las rmad byung dang // 'jig rten gtso mchog sna tshogs rnam mang yang // chos kyi dbyings la nyams shing 'gyur ba med// de dang bral ba'i sgyu nA bzangs rnams//
