652b6(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis// mos bcud sbyar bsam yas pa'ang // gdul bya'i snang ba zhes su brjed// de dang de rkyen de de yis// ji bzhin de bzhin mngon byed pa// rim pa bzhi dang lnga pa yis// rgyud stegs nyid du sbyor ba'i phyir// 'di
653a1(rgyud 'grel): skad rgyud las gsungs pa ni// theg pa bzhi yi nges 'byung la// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas// gcig la gnyis la gnyis la drug/ phyin ci log la mos bsogs la// rang bzhin grub mthar
653a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa gnyis// tha ma ldog dang ma log pa// ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs// 'dul ba dgongs pa gsung ba dang // sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// zhes gsungs thugs
653a3(rgyud 'grel): rje'i sar gyur pa// so so'i snang rkyen bsdum yas nA// mchog rkyen rgyu du ni rnam gsum ste// gsang ba'i snying po rigs gnyis lce// sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje sems// spyi gcod mngon bzhin bstan pa gsum// rkyen 'di yi ge
653a4(rgyud 'grel): las bskal snong// shes rab 'brel bzhi yid pa'i phyir// dbang po phye ba thugs thogs gsungs// dang por mtshon pa'i ming gsum ldan// dris pa lung ni rgyu 'dri'o phyir// // dngos po gnyis pa'i legs snang ba// bden
653a5(rgyud 'grel): pas 'brel pa gnyis su med// de nyid gnyis med 'jigs bral ba// gsol brtan las kyis lha yi ming // // de gnyis bstan pa'i dngos gzhi bas// spyi lung nges pa gnyis pa'i mtshan// brtags pa bstan pa'i don bcud
653a6(rgyud 'grel): des bzhi yis kun la mi snang bas// kho na nyid gsum ldan bden pa'i// ming gis mtshon las lhag pa'i don// tshogs rgyas kyis kyang mtshon mi nus// de bas gzhon nu'i rtogs pa bzhin// yi ge bsdus par don rgyas
653b1(rgyud 'grel): par// brda' 'phrang tha snyad bsdu ma yin// gsum pa'i mi la mes pa'i blos// so sor 'dod pa shes rab thabs// nyi mas mdzes pas rin chen ltar// ming gi sgron mas she rab thabs// 'bring la snang ba mched pa'i phyir//
653b2(rgyud 'grel): sa pa bye brag thigs par dazhar// rang bzhini las kyi snod gyur la// bgrong thabs gnyis su yan lag rkyen// thog ma bar dang tha ma'i yul// lnga dang gnyis dang gnyis btan no// dang po'i yul la rgyu rkyen dang // bzhi
653b3(rgyud 'grel): bcu gtod pas rdzogs pa yin// phabs dang shes rab rgyu ying ni/ snga ma'i ston pa gnas 'khor sdud/ dus bstan drug nas rin chen sgron// gsang ba'i 'og min gnas kyis phye// yi ge bzhi yis shes par 'gyur// gas
653b4(rgyud 'grel): ba tshad ma gnyis dang 'brel// blo gros rgyu la thun mong mchog/ bla me rang sems ye shes che// gzhi dang las kyi gnas ston la// ye shes mang po shes pa'i bdag/ bstan pa'i bcud thugs bsdus dngos po// bkra
653b5(rgyud 'grel): gsal lung la dus bzhi mnyam// de de yod de de rtog 'gyur// thun mong pa la mtshan nyid gzugs// ston pa rang 'byung rdo rje 'dzin// rgyal tshab rgyud ni skyes bu gnyis// rang bzhin dus gi sum chos las meg/
653b6(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod chen po kun tu zhal// mos pa mtshan grangs rdul snyed la// mnyam bzhag longs spyod chos ston pa// ming gzhi ldan pa'i skyil krung gnas// de yi rton pa rang bzhin bzhi// chos dbyings 'og min gsang ba na
654a1(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig 'dus pa'i rin chen khang // ma spangs lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i phyir// dbyings tshad rtse mo sgro 'bur dang // 'bur 'phang rtse mo rgyan gdan ni// bdag nyid dang ni bdag po dang // longs 'gul
654a2(rgyud 'grel): sgo dang phyi yi brgyan// snang ba dri za gnas bzhi pas// khyod khang spyod yul po yi phyir// kun tu phyi rol-I de la meng // chos kyi 'khor lo shes rab thabs// ma chags res bkang 'bras bu'i gdan// ye shes du ma cig bral bas// sna
654a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs snang la rang bzhin med// de nas de la de gus pa// rgyal tshab rgyud dang rgyal-i sras sems// 'jigs byed thugs rje sprul pa dang // dad pas 'brel pa brgyad sogs 'dod // de ni ston tshul 'bab pa dang // gyad thabs 'greng
654a4(rgyud 'grel): bar guzhugs pa'o// tshad las 'das pa'i grangs 'dus pa// chos dbyings mu mtha' med par khyab// nor bu rin tshan sku mnga' ba'i// gsang bdag de yi bdag po'i phyir// tan+ta thugs bsdus mos bzhin du// kun ma ra dang
654a5(rgyud 'grel): spyod tshere snang // de ni de yi thugs skyes phyir// de yi den ni des bsdus rigs// sku yis phye ba'i 'khor rnams la// so so bstan pa'i dus snang yang // lhan cig pa la dus cig snang // gang gis mthong rtogs tshegs tshe na dang //
654a6(rgyud 'grel): dus bzhi mnyam las ma g.yos kyang // de'ang rang bzhin mnyam pa'i dus// rtag pa rgyun tu thugs rjes 'jom// mthar phyin dag pa'i dus la 'byung // de tshe rang bzhin nges lung snang // gsungs lnga tshul gyis cig las
654b1(rgyud 'grel): snang dang mtshon byed bstan par de brjod de// de dag mtshon pas rang mtshan sgra'o// 'gro ba gang gang gzugs snang yul// rigs mthun dga' byed mi mthun pa// sbyar med 'jigs gzugs snang ba ltar// rgyal ba'i gling
654b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi 'di de bzhin no// de rjes rkyen gyi gleng bslang ba// ston pas stang dang 'khor gyis zhus// skabs las gleng bslang ston dang 'khor// gnang 'dri rkyen du gang gyur pas// de des gsungs la mi rag pa// nges pa'i tshig 'bru/
654b3(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo'ang de// skabs kyis dris phan smes ci dgos// dris lan brda bas nges par 'grub// thabs sbyor shes rab gang tshe 'ang // rkyen byed 'byung la ma reg pa// 'khor dang gzhan gyi don phyi ru// rgyu tshogs thugs rjes 'da' bar
654b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// brjod bya rang bzhin gsang ba'i rgyud // / de ji bzhin du rjod byed dag/ ston pa rgyu don lam dang tshig/ 'brel pa rim dang 'chol 'khrugs pa// rgyu 'bras thu dang tha ba byung ste// gleng gzhi rjes su nges par 'gro//
654b5(rgyud 'grel): tan+t+ra le'u'i grangs bsdus pa// me long bcu yis mtshon sbyar ba// bcu yi 'dren par shes kyis bsdus// bye brag bdag dang gzhan shes 'gyur// seng ge mchongs pa'i chos cig ltar// rnam grangs tshig lam chos cig tu
654b6(rgyud 'grel): bya tI mchongs pa de bzhin pa// tan+d+ha'i tshig don dums su gcod// ka la bing ka chos bzhi pos// rnal 'byor can gyis 'phang gcod do// rul sbal 'gros kyi chos gnyis pos// 'bru stong mi bzhag gzer bus
655a1(rgyud 'grel): gdag/ dus kyi 'bru char chos gsum pos// bka' yi tshad gsum skabs sbyar snang // glag gi gzan gyi chos gnyis ltar// don gyi dmigs bzung gags gsal lo// sna phrug 'dzag pa'i chos
655a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ltar// ldem dgongs bsang ba brgyad kyis sbyor// dang mo 'gros chos rnam gnyis ltar// gzhan don dbu zhabs le'u mtshams 'brel// me long chos ltar mtshon pa'i dpe// kun lta de mtshon thog du dbab//
655a3(rgyud 'grel): ji 'jigs phrug gu rtsa la sbyor ltar// 'bru tshig don gyi go rim bsdebs// tshig don mos par bshad pa'i phyir// rnam par phye bas ma 'dris gsal// thabs dang don la rang bzhin pa// tshig gis mtshon byas des
655a4(rgyud 'grel): snang byed // / ston pas gong gis gang zhig la// gtad pa gang sti gtad pa'i phyir// rgyal sras sdus mdzad ma 'ongs sogs// mi nub spyan rtses phyir gtad pa// shes byed yul de bsgom bya min// de yi phyir na
655a5(rgyud 'grel): 'ang shos dgongs mod// skabs su byung bas 'dir ma yin// bar du mos pas lam gzhol sdom// thun mongs mchog ste tha ma gnyis// dngos spyod rjes su gzhol ba dang // pha rol phyin par shes rab gzhol//
655a6(rgyud 'grel): de de'ang cig gi rim sbyor ba// rjes su mthun par bzhin ston// snga yi sngon spyod rjes 'brang ba// lam snod skal bas phye ba la// mtshams bdag gis ni grol byed pa// gzhi dang rang bzhin stobs las 'byung // de las khams
655b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi spyod pa yis// phye bas dang po lhur gnas pa// rims dang rdzogs par smin tshul du// rims dang cig car snang ba ni// gzhi ra tsa gra a mi tsa// rang gnas grol ba gyen 'gro ba// de la brten pa'i rim pa yi// bye brag bskyed
655b2(rgyud 'grel): tshe yin no// phyi sa dbang po gsang bu gnyis// nor bu skyes bur ldan gyur pa// bcu drug bzhi rtogs phyag rgya bzhis// kha sbyor g.yo ba'i rten gnyis las// rten dang mthun pa'i bden mthong ba// mchos pa gsum dang bden
655b3(rgyud 'grel): mthong du// shes rab gsum gyis mi 'byed pa// rang dag sngon du rdzogs phyir thob// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba'ang // gtso dang yan lag rnam bcu'o// kun gyis don du gnyer byed pa'ang // mchog tu bya ba sngon bzhin gnyis//
655b4(rgyud 'grel): cig ni blo mchog skal ldan rnams// nges par khong du chud gnas pa// gnyis su med par byang chub sems// sems bsgom rnam gsum dus cig rdzogs// de las ldog pa rten 'brel bzhin// lha yi rim bstan don du
655b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyer// sngon du yan lag dang po sngam// dgos ched thabs dang ngo bo dang // skyon+d+ra dang yon tan rim pas ni// dbang po mchog ni rdzogs par bshud// gzhan gyis kyu mig gsal ba dang // mchog gis spyan rab mngon
655b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'i phyir// lha ngan go cha sngol byed pas// the tshoms med pa'i bde thung ces// gling bzhi phal la re re bdun// lhun po gnas lha'i rim pa bzhin// rigs min rang bzhin bltos lta bas// phyogs bsgrub mi mthun 'gags pa
656a1(rgyud 'grel): ngag/ cha yod dug la mi reg bzhin// gang gis shes na mi gnas pa// bsam gyis mi khyab ma shes na// bsam meng rnal 'byor gnyis don med// gang gis de ltar chub byas pa// stong rtogs rnal 'byor rdzogs
656a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub// gang gis thog mar rten pa'i thubs// ting 'dzin bye brag las spyod dang // yan lag mang po 'ang rnams grangs kyi// gtan tshogs thun mong yin med pa// rgyud las grags po rkyen byas te// ri rgyal lta bur mthong ba ces/
656a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyu rkyen gang gis nges bskyed pa'ang // the tshom yid gnyis som gnyis pa// med la brjod kyis nges thogs med// dgrag bsgrub med pa'i rgyud las byung // // dbang po drug gi char snang yang // spyan la mchog
656a4(rgyud 'grel): tu brjod pa ni// shes rab yul du dbyer med pas// mngon sum rtogs pa rtogs pa'i mchog/ rang rig ye shes tshogs cig po// shes rab spyan gyis dam pa bas// de la phyi nang med pa'i phyir// chos nyid rang gi mtshan nyid mthong
656a5(rgyud 'grel): de lta'ang log rtog mi zad pas// 'khor sgyur rgyal po'i stobs bzhin du// rang mtshan mthong yang de lta bas// 'khor lo sgyur rig khyad par 'gyur// gsang ba'i rgyud la khyad par du// lha dang lta bya med pa'i phyir// ye shes smon
656a6(rgyud 'grel): ma sbyang bar ni// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams thams cad mngon// de bas spyi la gang zhig zhe na// gsang sngags yid yul gang gis snyed// rdo rje yid kyi sla sgrol bas// 'dus ma byas la dmigs pa dag/ nges par 'da'
656b1(rgyud 'grel): mnyam lta ba'i// rjes la rnam 'dir mi rtog ces// phyogs mthun rnal 'byor skyed 'dod pa// nges 'jog rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin can// kun tu rgyu dang gzhon nu ltar// go mchog thob pa'i khyad par ni// rigs brgyad mthong ba
656b2(rgyud 'grel): ba las// lta ba'i khyad par gsungs pa'ang yis// rnam grangs dam pa'i sgras gol ba// de yi sgra la dza bzhin rtog/ de mi mthun pa ldog byed pa// dbul po lta ba kha na'o// bzhi pa 'di skad lung las 'byung // thabs la mkhas pa
656b3(rgyud 'grel): ma zin na// lam gyis dge spyang stegs bcas kyang // mtho ris lha dang ma ru skye/ skye shi med pa'i las mi thob// lnga pa'ang 'di skad bstan zhe na// dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni// dang po don rtogos mtha' mi stong // chu srin
656b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya ji bzhin du// spyod yul kun tu dpag tshad myed// de rjes gtso mcheg goms byed pa// 'byung rlung 'dus bral tshul bzhin pa'ang // rang la yan lag rdzogs pa yis// gang du 'du shes med grasalwa ba'ang // gang dag
656b5(rgyud 'grel): bcu dang ldan pa nAM// sgyu ma las kyang gnas bsgyur ro// 'pho ba med par bzhis snang bzhin// // de yaM yan lag de bzhin pas// rgyu las thob par rang gnas pas// snang ba kun tu khyab par ni// phyi nang med par mthun
656b6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs bye// de yi stobs las skyes pa ni// rten 'brel bzhi pa nas 'byung ba'angadi // cig shos skye ba'ang ji bzhin pa// gnyis la gang mos gnyis tshul gyis// bzhi pa dgu dang ldan tshul gyis// rang gi cha rkyen tshang
657a1(rgyud 'grel): bu yis// de la zhen pa grol 'gyur zhing // bzhi ldan ldan na ldan tshul gyis// gang mi mthun pa'i rgyud 'phel bzhin// de yi gzhi las tshangs ya ma// gzugs can spyod par gnas pa ste// rgya mtsho gza' dang
657a2(rgyud 'grel): skar ma 'am// 'brel bzhi rdo rje cho gas sam// bslab pa rang gi rkyen tshangs pas// lung bcu ldan na des spro 'am// yang ni de nas longs spyod sbyar// lnga pa rnal 'byor 'ba' zhig gis// 'das tshul gnyis thob sa 'ang yod// de dang mi
657a3(rgyud 'grel): tshangs longs spyod lnga// rang gis bzhi bzhi thabs bzhi dang // ldan pas grangs tshangs rtags thung na// dkyil 'khor mthun sbyor thabs gnyis pos// yan lag tshad na zag pa med// de min lan grangs gzhan nyid do// rgya mtsho
657a4(rgyud 'grel): rin chen bzhi yo 'di// phog pas ji bzhin mthong 'gyur pa// 'di ni thar lam mi sbyar nas// sangs rgyas sa la gdon mi za// yan lag gnyis pa 'dir shes ste// de dag las su rung byed pa// dgos ched rnam grangs dus
657a5(rgyud 'grel): dang ni// skyon dang yon tan bsdom gyis rdzogs so// // bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyis phyir// 'bri sogs mi dgos goms par ces// gsang rgyud nyid lus gsungs pa yi// glang po dam rdzas shes spyad dang // /
657a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod yon nyon mongs nyi shu lnga// nag pos 'dul ba ji snyed pa// thun mong ming ste de ga dkar// khyad par lam dang mthun pa'o// zhen pa'i lam la de nyid de// ji ltar du ga la dug nad bzhin// bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis
657b1(rgyud 'grel): ka lA// tshe dang mkhas pa'i thabs kyis spyod// cig shos pa de dmangs rje dang // bram ze rgyal po lnga rim bzhin// shes rab bslab bya mang po kun// brtson pa der byA yod ma yin// de la de goms mtshon pa ltar// 'jug pa gsum/
657b2(rgyud 'grel): la yid tshangs thabs// cha mthun gdams ngag bying rgod dang // 'bru sogs rims dang ldog la brten// gtsang ma rigs kyi mthun bzhin du// mthong goms bzhis mthus spyod yul spyod// lnga pa sri zhu rgyal chos ni// dang po bzhin/
657b3(rgyud 'grel): du longs spyod lnga// shin tu spros spyod brang bar bya// lnga par lta pA ga tso bo yin// de nas bzhi ni zag bral nas// lcags zangs gser dngul go rim bzhin// bdag gzhan yul gyi khyad par 'gyur// snga ma rgyud ldan rtsol ba med//
657b4(rgyud 'grel): rang rang slob pa gang yin pa// skabs sku gtses pa khyab pa de yin// lam dang sa yi rims sbyar nas// spyod par grags la mchod pa la// snga ma go mthar phyis 'jug che// ngas na rong rig spyod yul blang // khyad par dor ba ma
657b5(rgyud 'grel): phyin med// glang po rang gar spyad pa ni// don du mi 'gyur gzhi dbang bas// so so'i rnam spyon chad las 'das// de la de yi de yod phyi // de des gnyis po mi ltung thob// so sor spyang thob grags pa bzhino// bsag bya gnyis
657b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur bri bar 'gyur// bya ba'i sdom ni dgos tshod dang // ngo bo rnam grangs nges tshigs dang // bya thabs skabs dang khyad par dang // skyon yon dgu yis rdzogs pa yin// bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga dang // dam chos phyir
658a1(rgyud 'grel): na rnam lnga'o// shing la chu bzhin dang blang ba// rab 'bring tha ma nus tshad sbyar// gdul bya phyi nang zung bzhi po// gdul bya'i mthu tshang rnam ba ni dang // cig gis kun 'dul mthu la sogs// lnga po gang yin
658a2(rgyud 'grel): de bo'o// zung du phyi nang bzhi phyir dang // 'phel bye gnyis po 'phel phyir dang // dgug dbang bzhi po sdud dbang bzhi// gdul bya rnam gnyis 'joms phyir dang // sgyu ma ston du bstan zin phyir// nges tshig nges par 'grub
658a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yin// don gyis dmigs su gzung ba'i phyir// rang bzhin lam dang thug rjes phye// bar ma thabs dang shes rab la// snga mi gnyis dang phyi ma la// shes rab ting 'dzin rnam gnyis dang // longs spyod lhag pa gzugs
658a4(rgyud 'grel): brnyan gnyis// de la phyi nang gsang bar bshad// ngo bo rjes su zhi ba gnyis// phyi la nang bgegs dgra zhi ba'o// nang la nyon mongs rtog zhi ba'o// rgyas par gnyis po gso dang 'brel// na shi lo thog rtsi zhu sogs
658a5(rgyud 'grel): tshe dang rigs rgyud longs spyod dang // bsod nams bzhi po nang 'bras bu// dbang ni dgug dang sdud pa gnyis// phyi rol da ra'i rnam pa dgug/ myi mthun rnam gnyis dbang po sgyur// rang sems 'bras lnga bsdu bar bya// /
658a6(rgyud 'grel): mngon spyod bsgreng dang mnan po dang // smyo 'bog byad dang skam pa dang // rmongs dang gtan por rgyud gzhan la'o// rang gi phyi nang dgra bgegs 'joms// thabs ni thabs la gsang ba nang // khams bzhi khams
658b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum las sbyar ba// shes rab phyi dang nang gnyis te// phyi rol tshad med gnyis las bzhi// lhag pa gzugs brnyan rnam gnyisna dang // mchod rten sgro dang sbyin sreg ste// phyi ma la glanasna bsgrub pa dang // thab brgyad 'bru ba/
658b2(rgyud 'grel): khung bcas dang // phyogs dang kha dog dus gnyis dang // phur pa lha dang sems dang yum// bsgrub po ling+ge me mchod dang // dkyil 'khor yo byad tshang por sbyar// bya thabs gtso bo sbyin sre ga la// skyabs su dgos pI/
658b3(rgyud 'grel): ling ga gdab// bro stobs bcas pa'i cha rkyen no// de dag rtsa ba'i mchod mnyes so// gtan me mchod sbyin sreg ma rims// smon lam lhag ma'i lus dag go// skabs ni dbang dang bsgrub pa dang // mchod bshags tshe dang
658b4(rgyud 'grel): dus bab tshe'o// khyad par zag bcas b.ro chad med// mthar phyin lham gyis phyi ba 'am// shes rab dbang po rnams gsum gyis// rus mthu byin rlabs yul ngo bo'o// thabs dang bzhi dang khyad par ba// skas ka'i gang
658b5(rgyud 'grel): bu'i ji lta ba'o// mi skongs mi 'phyed mi rdzogs dang // don gnyis mi 'grub de yi skyon// de las ldog pa'i tshul ldan pa// yon tan nyid du shes par bya// sa bzhi sdom ni ngo bo grangs// mgos ched dus dang che ba dang
658b6(rgyud 'grel): yon tan rkang thabs skyon dag go/ nges par dmigs su shes par bya// gsang sgor zhugs pa thabs dngos kyis// sgo gsum rang gi srung bya las// rgyal po bka' rtags ji lta bar// mi 'dral sdom pa de ngo
659a1(rgyud 'grel): thun mong gzhung gzhan 'gro don du// khyad par tsa ba yan lag de// mdo rgyas rab 'bring tha ma'i grangs// tran+tar gsungs pa pAstan par bya// theg chen sA lu khyad par ba// skabs kyi lam mchog mi
659a2(rgyud 'grel): mthun bsrung // skyon yon cha yis ched che ba// de dang de yi nges cho ga 'grub// rang spyi'i gdul bya'i sbyong bsags pa'o// bsrung bya'i rim par yod pa'i phyir// sa lom gang thob de yi tshe// de la de dgos de bsrung ba// nyams su
659a3(rgyud 'grel): blang ba'i dus la bab// skabs dang 'byor na phan yon gnyis// bsrung bya mchog lo bskur ba'i phyir// // smon pa bla maud srung thub na// tshul khrims sdom pa thams cad rdzogs// bya byed med byaR+Ya nyam sa pa'adu med// ma
659a4(rgyud 'grel): nor gnas pa'i phan yon ni// rnam grangs rjes 'jug spyi rgyud grangs// gzungs dang thob pas dbye ba 'ang // bdag dang gzhan dkris grangs rdzogs pa'o// de de zhig ral 'byung ba yi// dmigs shes gtso'i rtsa ba lnga// le lo med pas
659a5(rgyud 'grel): myos lcogs sbyor// de la nges par rdzogs gzung ba'o// la pa la log pa dang // zlas zhar nyon mongs dbang steng dang // bdud kyis bslus dang rang bzhin ngan// brgyud rgyus dka' thub ral pa dang // dus 'di phyi mar grag zhan gyi
659a6(rgyud 'grel): spyi dang sgo skyon gnod la gnod// bkod pa rgyus las bdun gsungs pa// sdom ni ngo bo khyad par grangs// dgos pa thams dang dus nges tshig/ yon tan skyon gyis gzhi ru bzhag/ gnas skabs bdun du snying po len// bkod
659b1(rgyud 'grel): pa gang rdzogs de ngo bo// dang po rang bzhin nyid mthar phyin// // gdul byas zhi dang khro bo de// mos pas sku gsung thugs yon tAn// 'phrin las gtso bo phye bas lnga// rtsa ba de'ang skabs kyis grags// mchod pa
659b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang dang 'phrin las bsgrub// bzhi yang gtso bos grangs rjes mthun// kun las 'jug pa bcu bzhi dang // sum cu rtse lhur gyur pa yin// de yi rjes su drug sbyor ba'o// bzhi po'i dus su bdag gzhan phyir// // drang dang
659b3(rgyud 'grel): rten dang 'brel pa dang // bsgom dang bsgrub rdzogs mchod bsgrub phyir// shin tu nan tan blang bar bya// sa yi sbyang thabs go rims dang // de yA cho ga thabs dag ni// rang bzhin la sogs bdun drag la// gang la yod pa kun yod do//
659b4(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab las kyi bya// dkyil 'khor mngon du 'grub par 'gyur// bdun gyi gtso snying gang gang lo// de yi 'khor ldan nges pa'i chog/ lung las glags pas the tsom med// tha da cig gis bcings dang bral// 'phrul
659b5(rgyud 'grel): 'grib phan yon thob 'grub bzhi// bye brag so so'i grangs bzhin no// de las bzlog pa'i skyon cha ni// grangs kyi rjes su nges byar 'gro// mnyes par byed pa'i sdom tshig ni// dgos tshad ngo bo grangs skabs dang // skyon dang yon
659b6(rgyud 'grel): tan la sogs pas// ji lta ba bzhin shes par bya// / bdag gzhan don rtogs mnyes skong pa// 'di dang phyi mar thob pa dang // yon tan bka' las gsungs pa bzhin// che skyon mi 'byung bya phyir ro// bye byed bya ba
660a1(rgyud 'grel): byed 'dus pa// dgyes tshim 'gyur ba'i sdom pa nyid// 'jig rten spyod yul mos bya'i phyir// phyag dang phyag rgya glu gar tshig/ phyi nang gsang rdzas dgos spyod pa// srog dang ldan pas bden gsum tshul// mchod
660a2(rgyud 'grel): pa gsum las spros pa dag/ dkyil 'khor gsum gyis gnas dge las// dngul phyir dgos ched rjes bzung bas// las spyod bsgrub dbang mchod tshon// dus kyis rjes zhugs yon tan dag/ spyi dang khyad par dus kyis na// 'di
660a3(rgyud 'grel): dang phyi mar gang thob pa// bdag gzhan don gyis gnyis su 'gyur// de las bzlog dang mi bskong g.yel// nyams chad mthu byin bral bar 'gyur// thob par bya ba'i sdom tshig ni// dgos tshad rgyu rkyen ngo bo grangs// thabs
660a4(rgyud 'grel): dang thob tshad dus snod dang // yon tan skyon dang dkyil 'khor sbyar// don 'gyur bzhi las khyad par du// bdag gzhan don nus tshogs las bsgrub// byung dang chub par 'gyur bas myur// de lta de yad phyir nod bya// lung dang
660a5(rgyud 'grel): man ngag las 'byung ba// rgyu gnyis rkyen bzhi yan lag snyan// drug la gnas pa'i thob bya de// ngo bo nyid ces rnam par bshad// rtsa ba rnal ma lnga pa co brgyad// sbyar ba lnga la sum cu drug/ dkyil 'khor las kyi rjes zhugs/
660a6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ snod rim sbyor ba'i las rdzogaso bya// sno la til mar ngar rim bzhin// nus mthu gzhan la nges par bzhag/ lam gyi shes rab sngon 'gro ba// thabs la de nyid rim par bslab// gnyi ga'i sa yi dkyil 'khor gsuM
660b1(rgyud 'grel): dang po drud rnyed mi ldog pa'i// rim pas las rig ye shes kyi// rim pas rol pa rgyud nyid las// drang brtson gsum dang btul zhugs gsum// gang la yod pa de yi snod // 'di dang phyi ma'i phan yon grangs/ rgyud las gsungs pa de bzhin
660b2(rgyud 'grel): te// de zlog rang yin chos nyid dang // gsang ba ma nyams ltung 'jigs pa// si ma gtang ba'i rdza sna spyad ltar// 'gyur ba gsang ba'i rgyud kun ltos// don+da du gnyir bya thob bya yis// // phye ba gnyis sogs sdom pa'i tshig/
660b3(rgyud 'grel): dgos ched ngo bo grangs thabs dang // dus dang skyon yon glengs thabs dang // thun mongs mchog gi dngos grub rnams// bdag gzhan thob nas don bzhi phyi re// gong gi sgo gang thob 'dod pa do// yan lag bcu ldan gnyer rdo ba'o// /
660b4(rgyud 'grel): mngon shes tshe dang rdzu 'phrul lngas// su gsung thugs kyi thun mong dag/ bsgrub thabs mi mthun grags pa dag/ zag meng 'bras bu mchog lnga po// // bsgrub pa'i gnas su grags pa dag/ sngags dang phyag rgya bsten pa
660b5(rgyud 'grel): dang // phun sum chog sa po bzhi ldan nas// brtags shing byin gyis brlabs pa der// tshogs skyes bsnyen bsgrub drangs dus mtshan// so sor phye bas rgyud gsungs bzhin// rnal 'byor stobs goms 'byor po dang // sngags
660b6(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag rgya snyan pa dang // mi lcogs med pa gang yod pa// cha rkyen tshang pa dbang sgyur mngon// yol bas mi 'byang mi thob bcu// bye phrag rgya las gong du chud// de las bzlog pa de phyi mar// lnga lnga thob pas mngon nyid rdzogs//
661a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang phyag rgya'i dam tshig ni// dgos ched ngo bo grangs thabs dang // nges tshig gang du dgos pa dag/ yon tan skyon dang spyod yul bshad// sbyang zhing nye bar bshad pa dang // thob pa lnga po rdzogs bya'i phyir//
661a2(rgyud 'grel): ga'i ched du shin tu ceste// yi ge 'dus pa grub pa bzhis// mthu can rnyed pa gang yin pa// bzhi rdzogs nyid las mi 'da' ba// gang la snang ba de ngo bo// drag sngags gzungs zhes bya ba dang // rtsa bskyed las bsnyen las rim dang // mchod
661a3(rgyud 'grel): pa sngags dang brgya bzhi la// chen po'i rang bzhin ting 'dzin dang // mtshon pa mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dang // yum dang 'dzin bsam bca' ba'i dam// bsam dang bca' dang rang bzhin dang // 'phro 'du las kyi phyag rgya dang // bde bar rang
661a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bzlas bsam dag/ las kyi phye ba grangs mang po// skyon bcu le lo dor ba dang // skyon brgyad pa'i brtson pas sbyar// mthu byin ldan zhing don mi 'da'// de phyir ming gi sgra 'jug pa'o// dkyil 'khor dgos pa'i dug lnga dang /
661a5(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhi che na'o// sngogs dang phyag rgya rab bstan na// dngos grub ya mtshan cher 'gyur byas// yid la bsam pa thams cad 'grub// ral gri sau la bzung nyes ltar// nan tan med pa gsang sngags pa// phung
661a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing 'bras rnams med par 'gyur// gsang ba gsum la mos rims dang // gang la spyod pa de yul lo// mtha mar rig pa'i drong tshang pa// nye bar sbyor ba pa de ni// gang gis bsgrub dang ting 'dzin sbyor// zag lam sbyor ba
661b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs gnyis grangs// thabs dang shes rab ting 'dzin grangs tshad gnyis las grags pa dang // legs sbyangs thob nas zag pa med// thigs pa tha ma snga ma'i rgyus// thog ma'i sdom tshig mthar phyin pa// bde gshegs rgyal
661b2(rgyud 'grel): banyid yin no// de phyir bcu yis 'bru sbyar ste// rusbal bsgyur shugs blang bar bya// de yul byas snyed don la 'dung // thugs kyi thigs pa las// gdul bya dag pa'i snang ba'i le'u ste// gsum pa'o// / rdo rje yan pa
661b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa sdom// mtshan nyid tha ma lung bstan pa// rigs pa 'dzin dang rdzogs sangs rgyas// rdza ma tho ba tshul rnam grangs dang // nges tshigs gnas su rnam par bshad// lhag ma yong me 'da' tshul gyis// 'di ring bar mar
661b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa sbyor// rnam par smin pa bya ba tsan tshul// dbang sgyur phung po 'jigs pa med// phyag rgya chen por bdag lus snang // nyi shu rtsa lngar rang snang ba// de la de yi rtsol ba can// ma chu rlung gi rigs gnas bzhin// gang rigs
661b5(rgyud 'grel): zin pa mi gtong ba// dang po b+h+ring dad+h+r-i bya ba byed pa dang // mar rgyud 'dzin gsum gyis 'grub// de yi bzhugs gnas de sa mid de// sems nyid gnas snang gang yang rung // bye ba bya ba'i grub pa dang // 'thob tshul nga
661b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu grangs// spyad yul gzigs dang thugs rje sprul// mdzad pa ye shes bzhugs tshul sdom// bang ga gi dbang du 'di skad du// dpag bsam shing dang rin po che// de dag rdzas yong ma yin te/ rang sems bsod
662a1(rgyud 'grel): nams btun pa yin// ngo mtshur cho 'phrul smad kyi chos// gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te// thabs rtul bstan pa'i shes rab nyid// de lta bu'i ngang du 'byung // gzhan gyi don du 'di skad du// bya ba ma lus kun
662a2(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// mthar ni skye med rdo rje'i sku// gsungs pa'i srid pa tha ma la// rdo rje 'dzin sku'i rdor gsum las// sprul pa drug gi dbang po yis// mdzad pa rdzogs nas sangs rgyas tshul// gsang ba'i skabs la'ang shes par bya//
662a3(rgyud 'grel): med sems su mngon byas la// bden gnyis dbyer med rdo rje'i sku// chu yi zla ba lta bu la// rang bzhin kun dang thi mi dang // sku gsung thugs yon 'phrin las las// brgyan gyis 'khor lo rang bzhin gnas// thams cad mkhyen
662a4(rgyud 'grel): yul 'di skad du// leg par rtog brtags rnam dag cing // ye shes dbyings las mi zhan phyir// thugs rje chen pos 'brel pas nA// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang // yang nA rnam rtog mi mnga' ste// sna tshogs kho dog
662a5(rgyud 'grel): dbyi bas+t+ra su sta // bde gshegs rang bzhin thams cad phyir// suR+YA r+dz+dza tA'i gzugs brnyan bzhin// skad yang 'gro 'ong ga la yod// de yod na ni gzugs brnyan can// sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgralnga ba yis// byu byed med/
662a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dkyil 'khor spyod// dus gsum rigs pa'i rdzogs sangs pa'i// log rtog tha dad dag pa yang // ye nas mtha' yas grol ba'i phyir// gcig dang mi cig brjod bsam 'das// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni//
662b1(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// rgyud lus gsungs dang 'gro blo yi// rgya mtsho'i chu dang rlabs bzhin no// // mkha' la 'ja' bzhin rgyud don bkrags la 'dis// mi shes nga rgyal snyol zhing nyon mongs dgra rgyal ba// dpa' bor
662b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshon ni rnam lcags shags te 'dra// rgyud kyi don bcud 'khor lo dang ltar dang blangs pas// mi shes dra bar chud rnams gsang ba'i snying par shog// / thugs kyi thigs pa las// bde gshegs kyi spang ba'i le'u ste/ bzhi pa'o//
662b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyu 'phrul spyi gtsang rdzogs so// // sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa'o// bi ma la mi tAs mdzad pa'o// dgrag pa rdo rjes mdzad pa'o// rma rin chen mchog gis bsgyur ba'o// // rdo rje sems dpal phyag
662b4(rgyud 'grel): be tsal nas// rang gi las dang bla ma yi// man ngag thob dang rtogs pa'i// nus pa'i shes stabs ci yang pa// nang gi ling rtog shes rab mig/ mdongs pa'i 'gro rnams sgrol bya'i phyir// sgyu 'phrul khog gzhung dbye ba brtsan//
662b5(rgyud 'grel): sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud dag gi/ tshig don dgongs shug bstan pa yang // yi ge gab pas mi mngon pa// bzhi po dngos po lus nyid dang // don du gnyer ba'i lam nyid dang // mngon 'gyur 'a bras bu lus bzhag pa'o// /
662b6(rgyud 'grel): bstan chos thog mo'i mtshan nyid ni// 'bru lngar 'dus pa'i thabs chen po// 'gro ba kun la gnas pa'i phyir// rang bzhin rgyud kyi ngo bo las// 'gro ba rnams kyang rgyud nyid de// gzhi phyir rgyu ru bstan pa yin// de yang
663a1(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo nges tshig dang // rnam par dbye ba gsum du 'gyur// thams cad rang rig byang chub sems// gsung lnga la sogs lhun grub pa// mtha' rnams kun las yongs grol ste// ngo bo bzung du med pa ni// nam mkha'i
663a2(rgyud 'grel): chu skyes ji bzhin de// lung gi tshad mar gyur pa ni// rgyu bzhi zhes su bstan pa'o// // thams cad rdzogs pa'i des lung ni// rgyud gsum tshod dang des 'brel pas// rang bzhin rgyud kyi ming du grugs// mtshon byed rgyud kyang de bzhin
663a3(rgyud 'grel): no// // rigs dang rigs su nges pa'i sku// du bya'i ba rnam pa gnyis su gsungs// sems can skad cig shes pa nyid// bde gshegs 'bras bu snying po'i rgyud// ye nas yin phyir rigs rgyud de// chos nyid rang bzhin
663a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ni// 'gro rnams kun la khyab pa'i phyir ro// g.yo ldang smon 'jug gnas mthar phyin// des skyes phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir// rigasu nges zhes grags pa yang // ngo bo'i tshul nas rang de bzhin rgyud// // de yi
663a5(rgyud 'grel): dang las rgyu rkyen bdun// 'dzom pas 'khor bar snang pa yang // byed po nyes pa'i tshul dang yang // ngo bo snod bcud 'khor ba'i dus// yoM nas chos kun sangs rgyas ste// // rgyu bzhi rang 'byung ye shes pas// / rgyu'i ngo bo
663a6(rgyud 'grel): gdod nas dag/ ma rig pa nyid ye shes phyir// 'khor sgyu ma btsos rang bzhin mnyam// 'phral du chags sdang ye shes lngar// ye nas ma bcos gsal ba ste// nyon mongs drang phyir sku gsung thugs// yin phyir rkyeni yang
663b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas so// rgyu rkyen 'bras bu'i rang bzhin pas// ma byas 'bras bu sangs rgyas te// rdo rje phung sogs sangs rgyas pa'o// nyi ma'i snying pos mun pa bzhin// rang bzhin dang la 'khor ba med// lus bzhag par mu lam rkyen de//
663b2(rgyud 'grel): lham gyi ngo bo snang khri gos dang // dgos pa nges tshig che ba dang // gzhung gi rnam drug bstan pa'o// mngon byed rkyen mi rnam pa gsum// ngo bo sems lnga skyes pa ste// mngon sum snang tshul dang ba'i chur// nyi zla 'char bzhin skad cig gis
663b3(rgyud 'grel): byin rlabs rig pa snang ba dang // skal sbed rgyud nas thub pas ston// ye nas lhun grub sangs rgyas chos// gdul bya gnyis la rgyud pa dang // sngon sum sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir// byin gyis brlabs dang tshig gis bstan// rgyud gsu/
663b4(rgyud 'grel): tshong dang tshig 'brel pas// mtshon byed yi ge'i rgyud ces bya// thun mong ma yin des rgyud phyir// gzhan las gsang ba'i che ba brgyad// rgya mtshor chu klung kun 'bab bzhin// theg pa kun 'dus yang rtser bstan// gsang ba'i snying po
663b5(rgyud 'grel): nges pa 'di// gsang ba kun gyi bdag nyid phyir// rgyud rnams kun gyi rgyal po'o// sde snod kun dang rgyud kun gyi// 'byung gnas bstan la nges 'bebs phyir// bstan pa 'byung gnas lung gis 'grel// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor
663b6(rgyud 'grel): sa lus la// 'di las gsang ba'i nges don med// dgongs pa'i zhe phugs gnag pa'o// // sa rnams khyad par bkod pa yang // gsang ba'i snying por 'gro bas na// 'bras bu rnams kyi thug sa'o// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor
664a1(rgyud 'grel): ma lus pa// brnyes nas sku lnga rdzogs pas na// lnga par 'das pa gshegs pa'i tshul// 'byung dang ma 'ongs thams cad kun// 'di yis lhun gyis grub byed phyir// ma 'ongs rnal 'byor rnams kyi lam// de
664a2(rgyud 'grel): 'phyir 'bras bu nges 'byung 'ad// thams cad rgyud las shin tu 'phags// gzhung gi dbye ba rnam pa gsum// rab la mtshan dang 'bring la dbye// // tha ma 'bru gnyer dgrol ba'o// rab mtshan tha s+yA do gsum du grags//
664a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyu 'phrul snying po lung spyi yi// lag gi rtsa bzhin dbul zhabs rtags// bska' ba can gyi phyid phyir ro// glangs ka 'bring gi don bstan pa// gleng gzhi bsgreng dang rgyud don dang // dgos 'brel bstan pa dbye rnams dang // skabs kyi
664a4(rgyud 'grel): dgos pa rdzogs par 'gyur// // gleng gzhi byed pa'i ngo bo dang // dgos pa byed pa'i don nyid ni// thun mong gleng gzhi rnam gnyis dang // thun meng men po gsum du shes// grags pa thun mong ngo bo ni// thub drug skyon/
664a5(rgyud 'grel): pa stong gsum pa// khyad par shAkya thub pa nyid// rgyal srid btsun mo 'khor spangs nas// rab tu byung sogs mdzad pA yi// rgyu yi 'khor lo bstan pa sgrogs// 'gro drug 'khor dang rnam bzhi sogs// shin tu bkod pa'i/
664a6(rgyud 'grel): dus su gsungs// khyad par thun mong 'di nyid du// ston gnas dus 'khor sdud bstan sogs// mtshan nyid gnyis kyis dgrol 'gyur yang // 'dul yang so sor snang 'dra'o// thun mong ma yin ston pa nyid// yab
664b1(rgyud 'grel): yum chags sbrul rol pa dang // gsang ba phun sum cho gas drug gis// yig bzhi'i sgo nas byin brlabs kyi// dbang skur ma brjod rgyud bshad pa// kun yum med pas gsal ba dang // ngo bo yang ni 'di lta ste// ston pa gnas
664b2(rgyud 'grel): dang sdus pa 'khor// dus dang ston pa rnam drug ste// smyon pa'i rang bzhin brgyad dang ldan// bdag nyid dbyed pA kun tu bzang // 'chad pa'i skyes bu rigs lnga ste// mtshungs pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i phyir// lngas kyang ston pa gsung
664b3(rgyud 'grel): mi 'grel// gnas kyi rang bzhin de bzhin nyid// ngo bo rin chen gzhal yas khang // ye shes rgyud dang gru bzhi dbyibs// rtse mo tshad med mo tshun nyid sems// phyi dang nad med rgya ma chad// yon tan rdzogs rgyan rnam thar sgo//
664b4(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs yon tan rgyan du go/ rgyu 'bras brgyad nyid rta babs skad// // gsung byung gA phywa ga na rdo rje yIs// thun mong ma yin nges pa'i rgyud// dris lan mr-i mngon don gyis bsdus// byin brlabs mi yul grags pa yis//
664b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi tshad dang mdo dang khyab// brjod med nam mkha'i mtha' klas gang // ngo bo mi zhun rigs lnga dang // rig pA ye shes byang chub sems// drad pa nyan pa'i lha chen rnams// 'gro ba 'dul ba sprul sogs so// dus kyi
664b6(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo mnyam nyid do// skal pa can la kon pa dus// mtshon bya rang bzhin bzhi'i rgyud// sgo skur bral bar bstan pa ni// mtshon byed sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste// mdzub mo'i ro bong can bzhin no// dgos pa gleng bzhi rnam pa gnyis// ldan
665a1(rgyud 'grel): cig 'khor la go phye ba// thun mong ma yin khyad par gyis// thun mong rnam gnyis bcas pa yin// 'gro ba chags can spong med la// longs spyod rdzogs su btsun mo dang // gnyis med rol sogs bstan pa
665a2(rgyud 'grel): dang // mthun pas mthun pa dgrol phyir ro// skye bo chags can spong 'dul la// byin rlabs shar ba'i thub pa nyid// mi yi skyes pa bzhes snang nas// bcu gnyis la sogs rdzogs mdzad do// rnam dag mchod rten rdo rje'i gdun// rang 'byung
665a3(rgyud 'grel): mngon par rdzogs tshul snang // // de bzhin gleng bslang rnam pa gnyis// thun mong ma yin rnam pa gnyis// yab yum chags sku rol pa dang // dgyes ltar 'khor la dbang skur dang // rgyud don 'byung phyir brlang zhes bya// de yang skye bo
665a4(rgyud 'grel): chags can don// thun mong gleng bslang ston 'khor dang // thams cad snang nas dbang thob 'khor// nyid kyis rtogs nas 'gro don du// bka' stsal don gyis zhus dang lan// snang bar don gyi tshig tu byung // sku gsung thugs kyi spro bo mdzad//
665a5(rgyud 'grel): de ni skye bo phal ba'i don// dro bo don blung tshig phyung ba'o// rgyud don ldum dang yan lag ste// de yi gdul bya bsam pa gnyis// dbang gi lam yang gnyis su brjod// / thun mong ma yin rnam gnyis s+ho// thun mong lam stegs nyid tsam du//
665a6(rgyud 'grel): pha rol phyin bcu rgyu 'bras spyod// ma yin pa yid bsam dbang gis// grol lam thabs su bstan po yin// grol lam mthong dang sgom gnyis ste// dag mnyam gsum bzhi bzhi dang lnga// bden pa gsum dang rtogs pa bzhi// ldan pas//
665b1(rgyud 'grel): rang rig mngon sum du// nges par chod pas mthong ba'i lam// mtshan nyid dang por bshad pa yin// bsgom pa skye dang de bzhin nyid// skyed dbang srid pa'i chos lugs su// ye nas gnas mthun de zlog phyir// dang po ma skyes snying rje
665b2(rgyud 'grel): dang // phra rags mang por snad pa ste// dngos grub myur du grub 'dod pas// shin tu mi dmigs dbyings su bsgom// ting 'dzin de ni goms pa dang // thams cad sgyu ma mig yor dang // sprul pa'i tshul du shes par bya// ji bzhin
665b3(rgyud 'grel): yang dang yang goms nas// phyi nang bsnod bcud hUM du bsdu// gang sgrub yi ge so so ste// phyir ni gong sgom kun tu 'dra// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du bsdu// yang na zha la gcig phyag gnyiste sam// zhal gsum phyag drug rtag tu
665b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom// de yang phra dang ring ba dang // groms par rI mis 'dris par bya// de bzhin goms nas rigs lngar bsgom// bzhi bcu gnyis dang stong tshogs skyo ba// de goms tshe yi rigs 'dzin du// sbyar nas mngon par sangs rgyas
665b5(rgyud 'grel): tshul// de yang lnga goms gsal phyir dang // ral gyis rim pa nges par bzhag/ de khro nyid de cig car ba// bsgom pa'i rim pa bslab bya bral// ma bcos ji bzhin mnyam gzhag na// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor
665b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung // mi gnas gnas la gnas par bsgom// // thabs las rgyud dang rim par ni// man ngag ting 'dzin stobs 'gyur zhing // rlung 'gag las la goms par bya// shin tu bde ba 'byung ba'i rgyu// gsang dbang
666a1(rgyud 'grel): pad+mar ldan 'gyur na// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis su// bcu dang gsum gyi rgyu 'bras rnams// rdzogs phyir rims dang zlog shes nA// byin brlabs shugs kyi rang snang 'thob// dbang po yul btsAs ldan
666a2(rgyud 'grel): gyur nas// gsang pa mchog gi 'phrul chen po// dkyil 'khor rdul snyed grangs med dang // phun sum 'tshogs pa'i lhun grub rnams// gsang dbang mchog gis 'byin par byed// thabs kyi lam la 'bad par bya// 'jug dang thob phyir lam
666a3(rgyud 'grel): brjod de// skye bo nyid sgrol phyir bzhag ste// las su rung nas lam mthar phyir// lam gyi yan lag rkyen bshad pa// rjes mthun spyod pa lta ba dbang // bsgrub dang mchod pa 'phrin las dang // dkyil 'khor la sogs brgyad kyi rdzogs
666a4(rgyud 'grel): skyabs kyi gtso dang grogasde pos bsdu// du yang bdag gzhan don du'o// rjes su mthun pa'i spyod pa yang // skabs kyis ting 'dzin stobs chen bshad// bye ba byed la bya med la// dang po dpyod par bshad pa yin// snying rjes chung ma
666a5(rgyud 'grel): zos par 'dzin// thabs kyi pha rol phyin spyod pa// gnyis pa lam dang mthun pa yin// chos spyod bcu yi cig cha la// gnas pa gsum pa brjod pa yin// gnas dang ljongs spyod ci bde la// ma nyams blo dang ldan pa la/ ting 'dzin
666a6(rgyud 'grel): langs te spyod pa ni// grangs kyi bzhi pa spros bcas pa'o// kun kyang dus ni nam langs tshe// sgo gsum phyir na nges tshig 'grub// bshad pa'i gtan tshig ldan pa yis// sti dang lta bar bya med pa lhun grub shes rab sgron ma
666b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid// rang bzhin gsal ba spyan gyi mchog/ ngo bo yang de ltar nyid du shes// yul med gsal phyir lha zhes spyod// rim par bgrod phyir dbang bshad pa// ngo bo nus phan gsal dbang shes shin tu bstan pa'i ngo bo lnga'o// dgos
666b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i skabs kyis skabs phyed dang // bshad pa bzhin du shes par gyis// ngo bo bzhin du grangs 'jug pa// dbang lnga rdzogs bus bco brgyad rgyas// dus ni rnam pa gsum du ste// phyi nang dkyil 'khor rnam gsum du// rim par
666b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur ba dang po ru// ri mo bzhengs gsol phan nus bskur// bskyed pa'i rim pa slob pa'i dus// rdzogs rims gdam ngag sbyor dus su// gsang dbang bskur ba sor bzhi pa'o// dkyil 'khor bstan pa shes bstan phyir
666b4(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo'i dus kyang lngar 'gyur ste// rno la ngar btugs nus pa bzhin// nus pa skyes dang thob pa'i tshad// rgyu rkyen rgyu dang bdag po dang // yul dang de ma thog me drang // ngo bo kun la skabs su sbyar// dang dang brtson 'grus
666b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum ldan dang // brtul zhugs sum ldan slob ma laM// rgyu cig la 'am tha dod la// gang ldan chud ma zos pa sbyin// bskur bas rkyen gnas las nyon mongs// shes sgrib chu phra rnams dag pa// yon tan snang phyir ming du
666b6(rgyud 'grel): brjod// // slob dpon mnyes par byas shing // dbang rnams thob par ma byas na// las rtsim 'bras med lhung bas rtsom// gang yang phan pas dbang skur pa'i// dus 'di phyin chad rgyal ba'i sras// phyir mi ldog phyir
667a1(rgyud 'grel): yon tan no// mA mau yon tan yan chad nas// rdo rje 'dzin sogs skyabs kyi thob// bsgrub pa 'jig rten pa dang 'das// 'jig rten pa yang 'di lta ste// ro langs tshe pra bsgrub pa dang // lha chen po dang rgyal ba
667a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi// gdug pa klu 'dul rgyal blon bzhin// chung ma dbang du bya ba gnyis// ro langs rkang mgyogs dam tshig bsgrub// mi snang gzugs bsgrub lha klu mo// rgyal blon dmag dpon zhang blon bsgrub// tshe 'di'i ched phyir 'jig rten pa'o// yi
667a3(rgyud 'grel): ge sgyu 'phrul tshogs bsgrub pa'o// rdo rje sems dang sman bsgrub dang // rigs lnga bsgrub dang yul lnga sems// byin dbang bsgrub pa rnam gnyis sogs// phyag rgya rdzas dang thabs spyod la// rten pa'i bsgrub pa gsum du bsdu//
667a4(rgyud 'grel): de ni du gnyer phyir bsgrub mtshan nges// tshogs gnyis rdzogs phyir mchod pa ni// ting 'dzin sbyar sgrol dmo rdzas dang // 'dod yon blo dang sems kyi sprin// rol mos lnga sogs dbang bskur dbul// gnas su stobs phyir
667a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa ste// thun mongs khyad par yon tan ldan// gdag gzhan don grub 'phrin las ni// mchod rten phyag brgya'i sgo dang ni// ho bro klu dang rdzas kyis bya// na so gzhon dang rigs 'phral dang // skye rgyu med dang zla bral dang // las
667a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dus su sbyar bar shis// las kyi nus mthu cher ldan phyir// sngon nas btsal bar rab tu gces// zhi la dang la rgyas la dga'// dbang la chags dang drag khro sems// 'di yang las rkye stobs cher 'gyur// rgyal
667b1(rgyud 'grel): bcig bsgoms kun la sgrub// byed kyang skabs kyis lha yang ba ni// bsgrub gzhi'i gzung phyir dam tshig ni// ngo bo mdo rgyas gsum du shes// mnyam pa'i dam tshig gsum du mdor bstan pa// 'bring du rtsa ba bco lnga ste// rgyas par
667b2(rgyud 'grel): sum rgya drug bcu'o// yang ni rtsa ba'i rtsa ba dang // rtsa ba'i yan lag yan lag rtsa// yan lag+na yan lag bzhi ru bsdu// byed pa'i ngo bo ji bzhin no// dgos pa spyi dang khyad par gnyis// rtog pa 'dul dang las don 'grub// 'dul
667b3(rgyud 'grel): dang sdom dang dam tshig sogs// 'dus par gsungs pa che ba'i mchog/ dpe yang skabs kyi rnam pa myang // sa bzhi so mtshams mkhar sogs pa'o// nyams skyon spyi dang khyad par gyi// gnyis 'gyur rgyud nas gsal
667b4(rgyud 'grel): bar ston// gso thabs rtsa ba yan lag+sa gi// skabs dang sbyar te gzhung bzhin pas pa// yon tan mad+mor bas+t+ras+yA s+phu ru bas+thAn+da/ khyad par rang rang skabs su shos// rang bzhin ye nas sangs rgyas pa'o// nges tshig skyon
667b5(rgyud 'grel): yon skabs kyis 'gyur// dkyil 'khor skabs kyis bdun gsungs te// thog myur rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni// rang bzhin nyid dang lhun grub ni// 'bras bu skabs kyi gsum du 'gyur// chos nyid rang bzhin
667b6(rgyud 'grel): spros bral te// rang bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa lnga nyid// khams dang skye mched la gnas pa'i// lhun gyis grub par rgyas pas gsungs// 'bras bu mthar phyin 'og min na//
668a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa dkyil dang 'khor gyi tshul// de yang zhi khro rnam gnyis te// nges par sku gsung thugs su 'gyur// ngo bo du ma shes bral ba'i// nges tshig skabs kyis gnyis su 'gyur// mos blos len
668a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ting nge 'dzin// dkyil 'khor lhag pas gnyis su gsungs// rang bzhin de nyid 'dris pa'i phyir// de bzhin ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gyis// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus kun// nyid kyi dbyings la thim bya ba// chos sku
668a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya sgom pa nyid// rang rig mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil// ye shes bzhi 'phro 'khor gyi tshul// 'bras bu mthar phyin bsgrub pa'i phyir// lhag pa'i ting 'dzin rnam pa gnyis// gdul bya'i don phyir zhi khro dang // las dang
668a4(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams bsgrub pa lnga// de yang sku gsungs thugs gsum ste// zhi ba sku dang gsung dang thugs// sku yi cha lugs bzhugs tshul dang // sku mdog brgyan sogs shes par bya// thugs kyang phyag rgya bca' ba dang // 'dzin
668a5(rgyud 'grel): dang bsam pa las sogs pa'o// gsung gi rtse ba bskyed pa dang // bzlas pa spyan drang me tog dor// bstim dang dngos grub gsol ba'i sngags// byin brlabs dbang skur la sogs sngags// de dag ngo bo shes par bya// /
668a6(rgyud 'grel): khro bo lhag pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// su gsungs thugs bshad bzhin sbyar// lhag pa bsuM yA gra na spyi ting 'dzin rten phyir gzugs brnyan ni// gnyis su byi brag shes par bya// gzugs bsnyen dkyil 'khor yang dag ni// chen po
668b1(rgyud 'grel): rags pa thabs su gtogs// mtshan 'dzin yul gyi dkyil 'khor ste// ye shes snang phyir gzugs brnyan no// lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan rnam pa lnga// dbang ni phyi nang bsod nams tshogs// bsgrub dang 'phrin las dkyil 'khor ro//
668b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang la mdzub gang sor bzhi'o// zhi rgyas 'bring rnam gsum ste// khru bzhi brgyad dang bcu gnyis dang // bcu drug tha ma 'bring gi tshad// nyi shu 'am nyi shu rtsa lnga yi// rgyas pa'i tshul du gsungs pa ste// logs re tshad du gsungs
668b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// bsod nams rten ni mchod rten tshogs// tshogs la dpag tshad rgyang grags so// bsgrub pa tshe spu la sogs pa'o// skabs kyis dkyil 'khor gsum pa'o// de dag sa cho ga stegs rtsig dang // 'go ma g.yeng dang
668b4(rgyud 'grel): thig sta pon// pri dang rgyan dang rab gnas dang // las kyi gzhung lugs bstan pa'o// khro bo skabs kyi de bzhin shes// 'phrin las rnam bzhi ngal brgyad dang // gzugs brnyan skabs su bshad pa yin// zab phyir bang
668b5(rgyud 'grel): sems dkyil 'khor ni// rten dang brten can tha snyad gnyis// dbye ba phyi nang mthar thug 'gyur// ye shes lnga yi ro ldan pas// dkyil 'khor zhes su brjod pa ste// ngo bo gsang ba'i khams gsum mo// cho gas ni 'byor/
668b6(rgyud 'grel): pa rnam gsum dang // chom bu cig gsum lnga pa'o// de re'ang skabs kyis gsum gsum ste// dga' ldan lha dang dgyes ldan mi// 'byor ldan yo byas lnga bsags pa'o// mthun dang tshad phyir tshogs su brjod//
669a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam grangs gnas dang longs spyong lha// ting 'dzin spyod yul 'bras bu lha// bdag gzhan don chog la sogs kyis// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor yan lag shes// mtshan nyid bar ma gnas dus su//
669a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa'i stobs kyi rkyen du gsungs// rgol ba po dag tshor bcad phyir// brjod dang 'brel pa dgos yang dgos// brjod pa brjod bya rjod byed dang // rang bzhin rgyud dang ston pa 'am// mtshon bya mtshon byed rgyud gnyis so//
669a3(rgyud 'grel): 'brel pa yang ni 'di lta ste// dkyil 'khor gzungs mar 'brel pa dang // gzungs me dbang dang 'brel pa ni// gsang dbang mchog ni non tu bshad// dbang thob bsgrub la nges bzhugs pa// dngos grub rnam gnyis thob pa'i
669a4(rgyud 'grel): mo// gdul bya zhing dang 'brel bar gsungs// yang na rgyud gsum 'brel pa ste// mtshon bya mtshon byed rgyu 'bras tshul// shes dang yul du 'bras du'o// dgos pa'i lam rkyen rnam pa brgyad// don du gnyer phyir dag
669a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// dkris pa'i dgos pa 'bras bu nyid// dgos pa bsgrub phyir yang dgos so// rgyud la ldan phyi rgol ba bzlog// m+b+hi nub bsten rgyus yun ring phyir// gtad pa'i ngo bo rnam pa gsum+b+ha// byung po po dang blod myed som
669a6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor mig can la sogs pa'i// rtogs dang bsrung dang gdas pa yi/ kha snyad tsam du gted ces bya// skabs kyi dpe yang rnam pa meng // rtsod pa che 'phra mi 'thad pa// sbyong mi tshogs pa gleng bzhi'i rul//
669b1(rgyud 'grel): bden brdzun 'dran pa'i gleng bslang tshul// so sor rkang thabs rgyud bshad dpe// de gzhung bcos pa lam gyi tshul// tha tshig mi 'da' gtad pa bzhin// 'dra phyir mtshon pA dpe ru glags// shes rab tha ma'i don bstan pa//
669b2(rgyud 'grel): bshad tshul snod dang sbyar ba ste// bshad tshul pha dang spyi dbang gnyis// pha yis 'bru gnas lan btab pa// khog dbubs gcad bzhi por gsungs// spyi ni bzung bzhi gcig gi ste// thun mong khyad par slob pa'i sa// yon
669b3(rgyud 'grel): tan so so'i mtshan nyid ni// de yi bsam pa mthun phyogs su// rmad 'byung tshul gyis de bzhin no// tha ma don gyi lung bstan pa// ngo bo dbye ba rnams pa gnyis// lam du rgyu 'bras mthar phug 'bras// che la dbang dang phyag rgya
669b4(rgyud 'grel): che lhun grub rigs 'dzin la sogs pa'o// lam dang 'bras bu thun mong brjod// thar thug bskyed du bya ba med// 'bras bu'i ngo bo sku gsung thugs// yon tan 'phrin las sogs pa'o// de yang skabs kyis lnga lnga ste// mtshan
669b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid cig dang du ma med// log par rtog dang sems cig pas// thugs rjes gzigs dang byin rlabs 'byung // de yang zhi khro la sogs sku// tha dad snang la snang ba med// bsgrub pa mthar phyin 'bras bu brjod// lam dang
669b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu bcas pa yang // 'phral du byas pas 'byung min ste// sems can dus na lhun rdzogs ste// rgyas par bdag gis mi bkod de// yig mangs 'jigs dang brjod 'das phyir// rnam par phye nas ma bstan no// rigs
670a1(rgyud 'grel): pas skabs su sbyar byas shing // tha snyad ji snyed gsum du bsdu'o// 'gro mang lhan cig ling rtog gis// mdongs pa'i rgyud don ma shes 'dres// bdag gi yi ge 'di bgrod pas// sems can dmus
670a2(rgyud 'grel): long mig phye shog/ 'di rtog 'gro ba gzhan don du// bstan pa rgya tshar dpel bA yan// kun kyang yang dag mig ldan la// log lha ma lus tshar gcod shog/ sgyu 'phrul man ngag gsal pa'i sgro me zhes bya ba rdzogs//
670a3(rgyud 'grel): blo rno zab dang myur ldan zhing // rgya che ba dang blo yangs drang // ral gri rgya mtsho'i ri po dang // nam mkha' mkha'u glong rdul phyan 'dra// dang ring tshul shis rang bzhi na bzang // dad pa snying rje ldan pa ni// chu bo dge slong rengs pa
670a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dra// nyi ma 'byor rtsi pha m+bu bzhin// mtshan nyid lnga gnyis cig ldan pas// de la log drung ma phrad cig/ I// // bcom ldan 'das rdo rje thugasna la phyag 'tshal lo// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud mchog las// bskal mchog
670a5(rgyud 'grel): dbang mchog lnga ldan pa'i// dam pa'i yul lnga mthong goms mthar// byed phyir mtshan nyid gsum brjod bya'o// shes 'jug mtshan nyid 'byor pa'i gzungs// 'bras bu smen+do byu rgyu dang rkyen// nus mthu can 'gyur
670a6(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs rigs// yan lag 'byung ba'i bzhi ru bkod// bsgrub po'i rnal 'byor rgyud bshad pa// dbang po yul du snang ba kun// yul rnams yod pa ma yin ste// kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa nyid// dngos po sna
670b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pas smad la'o// dang po pa yi rtag bzhi ru// de bzod 'chol dang 'phel rims dang // nges pa gsum dang thog ma'i tshe// so so rtogs rgyu gzhung thos pa'i// dbang mchog tshig yul byas la rten// phyed pas rgyu byas
670b2(rgyud 'grel): bsams thog che// gzhung las grags pa'i gtan tshigs lnga// sngon 'byung rjes sogs las nyid dang // mi mthun mthun pa'i gtan tshigs ces// des nA rang spyi mtshan yul la// gshAsau gnyen bdag po rims 'di
670b3(rgyud 'grel): zag/ dang bas 'dod dang bag chags rgyu// shes rab spyan mchog ring rig nyid// gdod nas shes rab lnga yis mtshungs// gces smos la sogs lhan cig byed// de dag sgo nas 'tshol byed pa// kun tu rgyu zhing 'dod smon
670b4(rgyud 'grel): byed// de yis gzungs 'dzin spyod yul mtha'// yod mod lung du ma bstan las// tshol ni skyon gsum 'du mi skyed// de dag mi 'dor bral la tshol// 'on kyang gnyis rdzogs gnyis med dI ni// kun yin gang kyang min
670b5(rgyud 'grel): po'i phyir// phyogs bral phyogs bdag bsam brjod 'das// thams cad mkhyen don bco lnga bcod// sems chos ye nas dbyer med phyir// brgyad drug shes pa shes rab mchog/ nges pa nyid du med rgyal bas gsungs/
670b6(rgyud 'grel): de tshe g.yo smon 'jug pa'i dang // ngo bos 'brel phyir gzhi nyid nas// 'dir 'jug nges pa'i don du rung // la la thun mong lam rnams nas// rkyen rgyus 'dir zhugs slob par des// kha cig sems brgyad nas rgyud de// skal
671a1(rgyud 'grel): pa zhing gi rdul snyed nas// thun mong mchog lam sbyangs pas 'phyang // thun mong sA mthar byas pa'i tshe// yang dag sgra gsung thugs bcwo lnga// byin brlabs 'tshal bar mo sna snang byas// 'khor los pa
671a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba'ang nges// tha ma'i chen gaslong ste y-is// dngos skyon sngon 'byung sa mi shes bya// rjes su 'jug pa'i shes 'chol tshe// mos bya ba dud dab gis na// bde ge sh+lo gas sgra g+ha s+ya m+b+ha tshu gyis// sa sor 'tsham par ba
671a3(rgyud 'grel): la dpag// bskal pa gsum na sbyangs byA yis// bzab mos gsang thos bzod thob des// chos sku gsung gi tshul bzhin du// brjod med drin gyi sna bstan la dbab// longs spyod rdzogs spyi'i gsung lta bu// dgongs pa
671a4(rgyud 'grel): brda' yis btan la dab ba// sprul pa'i tshig gis gsung lta bu// brjod pa tshig gis rgyal bar bya// mngon par byang chub gsungs de bzhin// rig pa brlabs kyis gtan la dpeb// rdo rje sku yi gsung lta bur// gnyis
671a5(rgyud 'grel): sring mtha' bral don gyis dbying// la lnga ngo bo nyis gsung ltar// snang srong mthong thos nyid kyis 'bebs// gsong po ste yi gsung ste bu// dpyod pa skyabs kyis 'debs par 'gyur// lo sngon 'byung bstan pa bzhin//
671a6(rgyud 'grel): ji bzhin don dam nges pa'i tshig/ rang rkyen mtshan ma'i gtan tshogs dang // ldem dgongs sbyor ba'i gtan tshogs dang // bkri dang rgyan po'i gtan tshigs kyis// so so'i blo la nges byed cing // be rtag yul yongs su
671b1(rgyud 'grel): byed cing // de dgra las kyi gtan tshigs 'gyur// de nas gtan tshigs dbang brtsan par// gtan tshogs ma gyur gang yang med// de las re zhig tshig dbang du// dngos po brtan la phebs mi phebs// dbab med ston pa'ang de
671b2(rgyud 'grel): yon te// mthong snyed byed phyir dgos yod la// so sor rtog pa'i yul du 'gyur// 'tshol tshe dgos phyir de ltar dris// de la cig shos thun mong mchog/ thun mong grags pa rnam bzhi sogs// thun mong min pa rnam pa gnyis
671b3(rgyud 'grel): tshig don mthun par 'bebs pa dang // gtan tshigs don tshig mi mthun pas// gtan la 'bebs por byed pa'o// drang po tha snyad gtan la 'bebs// de bzhin nyid 'bebs dag mnyam rtogs// bden bdag gnyis med la
671b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'o// gnyis pa ci yang ma yin la// ci yang yin dang grub ma grub// de sogs don 'dod ci yang min// phyir yin phyir grub phyir ma grub// phyir brjod bstan tshigs la sogs pas// myi 'dra ba lces rgyu ngo bo'i phyir//
671b5(rgyud 'grel): de dag gtan tshogs 'gyur bar nges// de yang skabs 'dir de la brten// de des yul dang shes pa dang // 'das 'khor snang ba shig bya ba// med na mi 'byung tshul nyid dang // de ma grub pas de ldog dang // snang ba rang snang thabs
671b6(rgyud 'grel): chen de// snang bzhin ma grub shes rab nyid// bar ma sems rtogs rnam par thar// lnga bzhi gnyis sogs snga phyi 'phel// lam grangs 'phel ba'ang 'dir shes ste// skabs skabs nyid du the tshom med// de mthar bzhi
672a1(rgyud 'grel): mthar rded ldan pas// dbyings dang rig pa gnyis med pararu// de bzhin nyid du rdo rjes rig/ gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang rig nyid// dmigs med tshul du der snang ngo // byang chub sems snang thams cad ni// shin tu
672a2(rgyud 'grel): brtag dka' gting zab pas// ma dmigs mi dmigs dmigs su med// sems nyid de ni ji lta bur// byang chub de ni sems yin no// skams dang byang chub dbyer med pas// sems can ma lus thams cad dang // dus gsum
672a3(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams thams cad drang // thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sem+b+has dang byang chub nyid du 'bye// yongs shing rgya che lhun grub ni// phyi nang snod bcud yi nas dag/ dgu rtogs nyid kyang dbyings nyid yin// 'di ni rdo rje mnyem
672a4(rgyud 'grel): yin no// byang chub sems zhes brjod pa ni// gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro// rtog mi de rang rig kho na tsam// sangs rgyas sems can sems la gnas// mnyam pa'i don nyid ji lta bu// monyam nyid rang bzhin gang yang min
672a5(rgyud 'grel): mnyam dang rtogs pa gnyis ka med// thams cad lhun gyis grub pa dang // sgyu ma mig yor tshul shes pa// gnyis kwa rang rig nyid du 'dus// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// rang bzhin yi nas dag pa yis// sus
672a6(rgyud 'grel): kyang ma byas dang gis gsal// ma chags pad+ma 'dra ba yi// ye shes can gyi spyo da yul ni// kun dang thun mong de ma yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul de// skyes bu blo rtse lo rabs kyis rtogs// thams cad ma lus
672b1(rgyud 'grel): cig pa'i ngang // lha dang lta bar byar med pa'i// ye shes sgron mar sbreng ba ni// phyogs bcu'i zhing kham+b+ha sa thams cad mthong // thams cad ma lus don 'byung ba// tshig gis mtshon las gud na med// sgra nyid don gyi dngos po med//
672b2(rgyud 'grel): don nyid sgra las gud na med// sgra dang tshig tu brjod pa ni// yang dag don gyi snying po 'bya ni// ming tshig sgra la ma brten par// blo yAM gting du gro bar byes// dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni// dang po don rtogs mtha' mi gtong
672b3(rgyud 'grel): chu srin phyag rgya ji bzhin phyir// skye bar bgrangs kyang lhung mi 'gyur// tshong dpon lom mtha'i bsam pa bzhin// bsgrub pa'i rigs 'di rigs 'dzin bzhi// shes rab dang po smos pa gsum// bar du rgyu 'tshams
672b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu gnyis// bar tshad med sbyor shes rab rims// mtha' gsum kun 'gro mi g.yo dang // mthar phyin shes rab rims shes dgos// bdag nyid mi mthong shes rgyud la 'byongs pa// gzhan du 'chongs shing
672b5(rgyud 'grel): rmongs pa'i sems can gyis// bstan kyang ma thos mtshon kyang ma mthong pas// bdag dang gzhan du 'chol bas sangasma rgyas// ma g.yo bkod pa bsrung bar rol// ma dzad pa gnas stobs rim don gnyer
672b6(rgyud 'grel): 'ching zlos ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor dang // dam tshig 'phrin las spyod pa dang // mchod pa dbang dang bsgrub pa dang // phyag rgya sngags kyis lta ba rnams// shes chod bya'i tshig tsam min// de bas lam 'di bye brag
673a1(rgyud 'grel): mthong // thig le chen po'i rang bzhin lnga// bsgom pa rnam gsum dus cig rdzogs// de nyid ma bcos mi g.yo'i phyir// de ni de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings// de nyid kun gsal ye shes phyir// de ni kun tu smra
673a2(rgyud 'grel): gi dang // 'bras bu'i chos rnams klan dngos phyir// de ni rgyu yi rim par ldan// rang rig byang chub dkyil 'khor dang // thams cad kun la 'khyil bar gnas// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi
673a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas// gzhal yas khang dang dkyil 'khor dang // khro tshogs 'du 'phro mang po dang // sems kyi cho 'phrul chen po yin// dam tshig dam tshig zhes bya ba// gud na yod pa ma yin te// rang gi lta ba dam+ba tshig yin// snum
673a4(rgyud 'grel): ba rnam pa bcu gsum dang // spyi'i dam tshig mtha' yas pas// thig la chen po'i ngang du gaskul// bya ba med pa'i tshul gyis su// kun la thog pa med par skyed// bzhi yi las dang cig po 'ang // thig le chen po'i
673a5(rgyud 'grel): dang du gsal// dngos por zhe na bcom bdag dbang bsdus// bdun brgyad zug du gnyis zhi mthong // spyod pa rnam pa gnyis po yang // thig le chen po'i ngang nges phyir// cig la mi gnas kun la spyod// spyod par byed
673a6(rgyud 'grel): dang spyod par med// mchod pa'i brgyan dang longs spyod kun// bya byed gnyis rnams las de yang // rig pa byang chub sems chen po// cho 'phrul chen po'i ngang du 'odus// bdag nyid chen po'i ye shes las// ba
673b1(rgyud 'grel): lha ma btsal dus cig rdzogs// thob bya thob byed thob byas pa// rig phyir gzhan nas thob ma med// sgrub me spang med chos nyid du// 'gro med 'ong med de bzhin nyid// thams cad gnyis su med pa la// bsgrub dang bsgrub pa gal
673b2(rgyud 'grel): yod// dper ni sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul ltar// don du gnyer nga'ang chud par byas// brag ca'i sgra dang chu zla bzhin// sgra gzugs mtha' dang bral bar rtogs// phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid ni// phyogs bcu dus bzhi ra gsheg
673b3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// sku gsuM nga thugs dang ye shes lnga// bdag dang dbyer med phyog rgyu rgyu// phyag rgyu bzhi bcu gnyis po la// thig la nyid las gzhan pa med// sngags zhes rab tu brjod pa'ang // don dam kun rdzob dbyer med
673b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru// sku gsung thugs kyi yaM ge oM// de sogs yi ge bzhi bcu gnyis// rtag tu mnyam bzhag phyag rgya ni// dus gsum ting 'dzin phyir sngags yin// rnam par dbyer

674a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis// yod phyir cig la gsum gsum ldan// des na spyi dang bye brag shes// gong gi don ltar ma rtags pa'i// blo ngan mnyam par khungs phyung nas// ma rtogs le lo snyoms lus byas
674a2(rgyud 'grel): don ma grub par ngan song 'gro// sems kyi mnyam pa mA gtogs na/ tshig gis ma nyam sa pa slongs mi rgyu// de bsdu don tshig ldan par byos// 'on tang the tshom med par 'gru// bsgrub pa'i rkyen 'jug rnal 'byor spyod//
674a3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor rkyen yang rnam lnga ste// skor bdun dngos nyid rang rig pa// don dum ku nu gyi rgyu yin phyir// lhag pa'i rgyu de dang po re bsgom// bsam bya bsam par mi bya ste// mi bsnam par yang mri bAsam mo// 'du shes kun
674a4(rgyud 'grel): bral ti 'dzin mchog/ de pes rang sems rtogs byas te// le lo g.yeng ba yongs spangs ste// nga dang bdag med paR+Ya mnyam bskyang // mnyam pa'i dam tshig 'brel mi bya// yid shes+t+ra de bzhin nyid mi dmigs/
674a5(rgyud 'grel): smos 'tshogs brkyang spyod yul rnams// mi rtogs gyur pas dus gcig gsal// de phyir thams cad mkhyen sgom yin// de ltar rmyi la rten pa yis// gnyis phyir 'tshoms sbyor ti 'dzin bsgom// de yang gnyis
674a6(rgyud 'grel): ti phyag rgya dngos// phyag rgya shes mos dus min phyir// mi sgom cig shos rang rig la// sdug bsngal nyon mongs dang gis med// kun tu rang gsal ye shes lo// gnyis medo don gyi gdung ba'i mchog/ yongs
674b1(rgyud 'grel): sgrol las kyi skyabs kyis phul// de mthong de la zhen par bya// de ltar mthong goms su yod bya// gnyis las gsum gyi skyo ba'ang 'byung // de la bstan par don bsgrub phyir// 'bras bu'i ting 'dzin rims bzhin

674b5(rgyud 'grel): bstan nas spros pa'i rnal 'byor la// zhi khro gang lnga sngon byas po'i// zhal phyag grangs dang phyag rgya'i grangs// gsum dang lnga dang dgu rtsa cig/ dgu brgya la sogs zhal phyag dang // rigs gsum lnga dang

675a2(rgyud 'grel): rab dang // ting nge 'dzin 'bring mthar phye bas// dus der rnam smin lus de nyid// rdo rje lus gyur tshe la sbyor// mi ldog sa la nges par phyin// shes rab ti ngo 'dzin mun pa yi/ sman sngags la sogs che las 'phags/ 3/

675b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis// don byed ci smos dang po bcu// gzhan la ston cing bkri bar byed// spyod lnga mos slob cing 'dzin dngos// gnyis kar g.yeng mor grol bar spyod// dbang sgyur thabs kyi spyod 'dra yang // rnal 'byor mthu yis khyud

676a1(rgyud 'grel): gas gyur ba// ga sa bzhag tu'i bA mA lA// de man phyug rgya chen po sbyin las kyi lus s+yA smra rnal 'gyur spyan// ma rag tshul ming btags pa// sbyin pa'i ye shes+t+ra lus su 'gyung //

679a1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ rgyu la 'bras bu'i mi btags kyang // gsal zhing gsal bas gsum du 'gyur// 'di dgra mtshan nyid bsdu ba ni// shes 'jug mtshan nyid 'byor pa'i gzungs// 'bras bu smin
679a2(rgyud 'grel): byed rgyu dang rgyun// nus mthu can du gang gyur pa// rigs 'dzin rgyu la ba'i zhing du grags// pA ra me go mas pa'i lus nyid ni// srid pa 'byung ba'i rims tshul gyis// rang bzhin yan lag bzhi ru 'gyur// de dag

679a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum ma nor zhing // rang rig rgyal po goms pa yis// byang chub mchog 'di rnyed pa'i phyir// mtshan nyid gnyis pa'i dang por bzhag/ bden gnyis rgyu 'bras tshul dag gis// don dam skye 'gagi med
679a5(rgyud 'grel): pA s+t+waM// kun rdzob sgyu ma cir yang 'gyur// mnyam nyid gus ba dkyil 'khor dbyings// dbyings nyid ye shes thig le'i ngang // de nyid gzugs brnyan sgyu ma'i tshul// snang byed nyid na ma grub pas// ye shes
679a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu lnga// bden pa gnyis su mi 'gyur phyir// ye shes sgyu ma rjes su bstan// ye shes sgyu ma'i lus nyid ni// rang bzhin cig tu ma nges pas// cir yang med la cir snang // rdzu 'phrul/
679b1(rgyud 'grel): mngon par shes tshul gyis// cig dang du ma ma nges pas// byi nang snod bcud hUM du gyur// phra mo'i lus su sems drapas gsungs// phung sgrogs rang bzhin dkyil 'khor tshogs// 'di la rim pA yod/
679b2(rgyud 'grel): min te// shes bya sdud pa'i tshul dag gisu// du ma dngos po cig gis snang // skal pa sman pa'i don phyi ru// nges phyir rjes su bzhag pA yin// yan lag mtshan nyid 'drir gsungs pa// du ma cig bral
679b3(rgyud 'grel): shes rab kyis// zin pa thabs kyis mi'i chang zhing // nges par tshogs su 'gyur ba'i phyir// yo byad lnga sogs ldan par bshad // 'di dag dgos pa'i don yin no// de yi yang sgos bstan par bya// ting
679b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin spyod pa 'brel goms dang // yo byad cig gis thabs chen po// ting 'dzin yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir// drug sogs mang po'i ro myong yang // ma lus bdag las gzhan med phyir// mi dmigs mkha'
679b5(rgyud 'grel): dang snyoms pa yis// dgyes pa chen por ljongs spyod pa// dbang po yul du sbyor zhes bya// 'khor ba spangs med sangs rgyas zhing // rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor lhun gyis 'grub// bdud bzhi bcom pa'i dpa' ba
679b6(rgyud 'grel): ni rjede las snang phyir der bzhag go// 'di dag phal gyi yul min phyir// gzhan dag rgyud dang 'di nyid du// ma gsungs shin tu gab pa yin// yun dang rtsod par skal med phyir// ngang gis blo dman
680a1(rgyud 'grel): sgra goms nyung // ser sna rang phyogs khengs sems kyis// dul bcas gus pa'i bsnyen bkun med// rdo rje spun la de bzhin te// lam kun blo dang mi 'tsham phyir// chung ngus mya ngam 'da' bar sems//
680a2(rgyud 'grel): gang yang phyogs ma chub pa dang // sman pa gnyis la rgyab phyogs pa// gsang ba snying po'i snod min phyir// kham par sdeng ge'i zho mi blug/ rmongs dang 'phyar bas gal te byin// dus min par ni srog zad nas// sregs
680a3(rgyud 'grel): dang sbrebs par yun rings gnas// 'gro 'gas snying yang 'tshig par 'gyur// khab len gyis ni lcags sdud ltar// mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par// bskol par ngan song myong bar 'gyur// de bas shin tu gsang bar
680a4(rgyud 'grel): byA// br-in+da mtha' bzhin du gsum gnas shing // chags gnyis bral ba'i sbyin+d+ra bkur can// shes rab rgya chen blo yangs pa// snying rjes sems can+da mi bslu zhing // blo brtan dang tshul bzang la sbyin// gser phyi sa blug pa'i
680a5(rgyud 'grel): seng ge'i zhos// zho dunA thams cad 'thor bar nus// de bas lam 'di snod brtag bya// dang po yan lag bcas pa'i lus// rgyu rkyen byed pa ngo bo dang // rang bzhin mtha' drug gis rdzogs 'gyur// yang dag gshegs
680a6(rgyud 'grel): dang log pa gnyis// ngo bo nyid kyis gnas gyur na// de la bcos shing sbyar du med// yi nas rang bzhin dbyer med phyir// nyon mongs spang zhing sbyang sgrub med// so so'i rang bzhin nges zhe na// yang dag lam gyis
680b1(rgyud 'grel): bcos su med// de byas yang dag blo chen gyis// thams cad dngos po med par bshad// 'khor ba sems phyir bdag med pas// de phyir de bzhin gshegs bsam yus// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur na// phyin ci log nyid
680b2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub lamA// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs phyir// mya ngan 'das pa'ang yod ma yin// de shes bya phyir sgyu sogs dbye// ma rig lhan cig mtshungs pa'i rgyu// gti mug ming gi rnam grangs te// rang rig nyid la
680b3(rgyud 'grel): nyams med phyir// gnyis med don cig yin pa ru bshad// chos dang bdag tu dngos po rnams// ngo bo yod sogs btagasau bu yi// rtog pa sgyu ma'i rlung 'gyur byas// phyi nang rten 'brel gnyis 'khor phyir// srid pa'i
680b4(rgyud 'grel): nyes dmig sde bdag las byung // rnam rtog rlung gi sems yin phyir// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// byang chub snying po yod par lha// rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsol ba'i// byang chub snying por thams cad thim//
680b5(rgyud 'grel): dwe phyir rang bzhin ma skyes pas// thams cad mying tsuma? snod nyid medo// thams cad ma lus stong zhes te// swa rdo drin med ma yin pa/ rtog myed rang rigs 'od gsal ba// 'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun// brdos paca
680b6(rgyud 'grel): gyos chos min ste// shes pa 'ba' zhig kho na'o// de phyir brtan g.yo ma lus kun// sgyu ma'i rang bzhin bya byed kyang // snang ba nyid na ngo bo med// de nyid chos skur rang gnas pas// kun bzang rdo rje sems dpas
681a1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs// nyon mongs las kyis lhag cig byed// nyon mongs rlung dang spyi bstan pa// mtshan nyid ma nor don rtogs na// rnam par byang ba'i lam du 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub kyang // gang
681a2(rgyud 'grel): na'ang med de de nyid yin// sgyu ma rtsal 'dzin thabs su 'phros// mtshan rnams mi dmigs shes rab sbyor// gnyis med ye shes byang chub sems// nyon mongs spyi yi mtshan nyid ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med
681a3(rgyud 'grel): rang mtshan chags sogs snang ba ni// rnam rtog nyid na sems nyid de// rang bzhin rang rig 'di gsal phyir// nyon mongs ye shes spang bsgrub med// rtog zhen ngo la sgyu snang ba'ang / sems nyid rang bzhin ma skyes pas
681a4(rgyud 'grel): de nyid yi ge sgras mtshon ste// smang stong gnyis med chos sku'i rgyu// las rtogs mi mthun tha dad phyir// rang mtshan rgyu ma lngar snang ba// rang bzhin dpyis las mi g.yos kyang // gdul bya so so'i don byed pa//
681a5(rgyud 'grel): cha gnyis ldan pa'i yig tshul gyis// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po yin// de ltar sgyu nas don lga dag/ rang rig sgyu ma lngas gsal ba// sems phyir cig dang du ma med// bden pa gnyis kar dbyor med phyir// de bzhin
681a6(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin dbang sbyar na// ye shes lnga ru gsal ba nyid// yi ge rdzogs pa'i tshul nyid kyis// thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin// de ltar don lnga dag pa nyid// mya ngan 'das pa'i rang bzhin la// thobs dang shes rab ma
681b1(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pas// ma grol khams gsum 'khor ba yin// de ltar nges par cis mngon na// sngags kyis yongs su zin pa'i dug/ kun la gnod pa byed mi nus// thabs dang shes rab rtog pa yis// dug gsum sdug/
681b2(rgyud 'grel): bsngal gnod mi 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa la// nyon mongs thams cad byang chub rgyu// lus dgra yang gsum rang bzhin ni// snang gtod gnyis med sku gsung rgya// chos kun rang bzhin dag ba'i
681b3(rgyud 'grel): phyir// las rnams yongs su dag par 'gyur// ge srung sngags bla nu med pa ni// thabs kyis ji ltar zin bzhin grupa// bsam gyis mi khyab nges po med// thabs le mkhas pas mi zin na// lam gyi dge spyang
681b4(rgyud 'grel): rtogs bcas kyang // mtho ri s+yai lha drang mI ru skye// skye shi med pa'i sa mi thob// thabs mkhas snyi rjes zin pa ni// mtshams med sems can ma lus kun// byang chupA snying rjes bsad na yang+ga// bstod na mas
681b5(rgyud 'grel): dpag tu med pa thob// nyon mongs phyin ci log gi las// thabs la mkhas pas zin gyur yang // grol lam thar par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kun gyis// 'dul ba'i dbang gis bya byed pa//
681b6(rgyud 'grel): sngon dang smad 'tshong ston pa'i lhung // byang chub sems dpa' spyod tshul bzang // pal la med par mi rung yang // sngags mchog shin tu bzab pa yi// skye bo kun gyis bya bar des// des na rang bzhini dag pa
682a1(rgyud 'grel): yin// de dag mngon par bsgrub pa ni// mu bcos rgyun gyi skad cig ma// de yis ma byas gang yang med// dbang po yul du snang ba kun// yul rnams yod pa ma yin te// kun gzhi'i rnam par shes
682a2(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid// dngos po sna tshogs par snang ba'o// nang dang nang gi phyi rol gyi// rnam rtog sna tshogasu snang ba yang // dngos po med dbyings skad cig ma// de nyid rnam par dgra pa'i lam// yang dag gshegs dang lag rtog dang /
682a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang sprul pa mang po'i tshogs// phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad kyi// dri la bsad cing bzung du med// kha dog gnas dang dbyibs rigs min// de nyid ye shes rab snang phyir// sna tshogs snang brda bzhin lha//
682a4(rgyud 'grel): rang rig nyid la sna mi zhan phyir// snang stong gnyis med byang chub sems// skyes bu dam pa mchog 'dod pas// de la rtag 'grus gsal bar gyis// de yi 'bras bu mthar phyin ni/ rgyu 'bras meng+ga par dus cig
682a5(rgyud 'grel): ste// thams nAd ming tsam motshan nyid do// yi ge 'bru gsum rdzogs par 'gyur// mi zad brgyan gyi 'khor ltos bsdus// tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol// spyi 'jig meng bI'i dbyings l-I bAn+d+ha
682a6(rgyud 'grel): de dag ngo bo nyid bstan pa// sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang // gnas dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa// mi mthuni bde sdug myong bar 'gyur// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni// log par rtog sa
682b1(rgyud 'grel): ba tsam nyid las// phra zhing zab pa yod ma yin// log rtog nyid la'ang nyid spyod de// gzhan du g.yo ba ci yang med// log rtog rang bzhin rang rig phyir// thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sems nyid las ni gzhan med/
682b2(rgyud 'grel): sems dang byang chub dbyer med pas// byang chub lam de ring ba men// cig phyi ri rang rig rkyen 'brel pas// rnam par dag pa dbyings nyid tshul// nyid la dbang sgyun nyid spyod phyir// bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyun// /
682b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam dgra snod bcud rgyud mi dmigs// l-I dpu nga yan lag pa mi su Na 'bru lnga ma skyes shes rab yum// skye mched khams rnams rdo rje'i cho gas// rnam shes ye shes dkyil 'khor du// dag phyir 'bras bu
682b4(rgyud 'grel): theg pa'i mchog/ nges 'byung kun gyi bsgrub byar gsungs// dmigs bya dmigs byed med tshul gyis// shin tu gsal ba'i mngon sum pa// dro bo nyid ni dmigs su med// de ltar 'khor ba ngo bos dag/ de ltar
682b5(rgyud 'grel): de drug mtha' rtags na// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin mau skyes phyir// 'khor ba yongs su shes pa na// mya ngan 'das zhes de la bya// 'jig rten 'di ni ci yod pa'i// ming dang tha snyad 'dzin pa dag/ so so'i mtshan nyid
682b6(rgyud 'grel): bshig byas na// rang bzhin med de yang dag nyid// rang 'byung chen po'i ye shes kyis// thams cad sangs rgyas zhing du sbyor// ma bcos ma byas dang gis gsal// ye nas 'od gsal sangs rgyas zhing //
683a1(rgyud 'grel): phung sogs mA skyes ye shes gsal// snang stong gnyis med byang chub sems// sku dang ye shes bsam mi khyab// gang gis de ltar mngon sum pa// mtha' rnams lta las yongs grol ste// spyod
683a2(rgyud 'grel): yul yongs su dag 'gyur ba// mtshan nyid drang por shes par bya// dpalnga gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa bsdus pa las// rang bzhin gyis gnas pa'i don rjes su shes pa'i mtshan nyid de// rim pa dang pa'o//
683a3(rgyud 'grel): dA nas nyams su blang ba'i don// mtshan nyid blar ma bshad par bya// de nyid gzhi yi dpes mtshon ste// rgyu 'bras tshulha gyis 'byung ba yi// srid pa skye ba'i rim+b+ha pa ni// khams drung las kyi rkyen dag gis// sum mtho
683a4(rgyud 'grel): snying lkog lte ba yi// 'byung bzhi'i las rlung rim 'dus pas// don rnams snang ba 'bral 'gyur zhing // dengs ma'i snying por zhugs pa na// gnyis med 'dzin pa nyams pa yin// thams cad 'dzin bral snang ba'i
683a5(rgyud 'grel): mthus// bar ma sgyu ma'i sku thob ste// sngos dang bral bas sa sogs min// phyis 'byung cha byed yongs bzung bas// rdzu 'phrul thogs med las las byung // dbang po yan lag yongs su rdzogs bas// dngos po kun
683a6(rgyud 'grel): la thogs med cing // 'dod ldan snod bcud gsal bar snang // 'od kyis dpag tshad bye ba gsal// zhag bdun nyid du gnas par gsungs// de nyid rnam shes skad cig ma// nyon mongs las rlung 'phongs
683b1(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid// sa bon gnyis dang lhan cig pas// ming don gnyis su 'gyur ba yin// stong phrag bdun bcu gnyis gnyis bcud// ma lus 'dus pa'i nus mthu can// gsum 'dres tha dad tshul cig pa// rang gi las kyis rab
683b2(rgyud 'grel): bskul ba'i// rlung gi 'jug pas 'phel byed de// rtun shing lta bur gyur pa dang // de la yang ni de bzhin pas// yan lagA chos rnams rdzogs par byed// rlung gis bskul nas sngon gyur pa// gang yin de 'drar bdag 'dzin
683b3(rgyud 'grel): sems// ngesnga par snying la gnas pa yin// rim gro las kyi sa lus smin cing // brda yis dag kyang grol bar 'gyur// de nyid kyis ni rnam shes gsalnga// dngos po kun kyang shes pa nyid// yul zla zas nor dbang byed pas//
683b4(rgyud 'grel): chags gnyis la sngags 'jug par byed// rkyen ldan phung po rgyas pa des// rigs la sogs pa rgyus pa de// thams cad las lnga thogs med cing // gzhan gyi don yang byed par nus// kun tu kun nas rtags pa yi//
683b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba lhun grub nyid du snang // rang bzhin dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyang // thabs dang lhan cig mi gnas pas// gzung 'dzin 'ching ba bcings par 'gyur// de nyid tshul gyi 'jug sdigs pa// rim pa yongs su rdzogs
683b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir// lam gyi tshul yang de bzhin shes// rim par rjes 'jug don nyid ni// sngon du bya ba'i las byas nas// shin tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su// rang bzhin mnyam pa'i rjes mthun par// de bzhin nyid dang
684a1(rgyud 'grel): mnyam sbyor zhing // dam pa'i don gyis bsgom par bya// byang chub tshogs su gzung bar gnas// mchog du bde ba'i zhi gnas pas// mnyam rdzogs chen po mthun sgom zhing // byang chub sems su brtan par
684a2(rgyud 'grel): bzung // bya ba med pas bya med bya// mi gnas pa la gnas par bsgom// gtan tshogs rgyas pas lus bzhug na/ dgos ched thabs dang mi mthun dang // bcos nyams rjes su spyod pa yis// rim 'di yongs su shes par bya// 'jig
684a3(rgyud 'grel): rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'ikau/ chos rnams ma lus rang bzhin ni// ma skyes sems las cir yang snang // de phyir bdan gnyis rgyu 'bras tshul// gser las byas pa'i rdzas rnams kun// mi las mtshan ma so sor yang // thams cad
684a4(rgyud 'grel): gser gyis ngo bor cig/ sems nyid rig dang ma rig las// 'das dang mi 'das cir yang snang // thams cad rang rig ngo bo'i phyir// rang bzhin nyid kyis dag pas na// sgyu ma stong sogs rnam grangs dang // bden gnyis dbyer med ye
684a5(rgyud 'grel): shes dang // dkyil 'khor la sogs don rnams kun+da// de nyid rjes su brjod pa yin// rang bzhin gtan tshigs sngon sreng blo// gsum sogs gtan tshigs tshig rje sA su de rjes nyams blang dgos ched ni// dkyil 'khor bsla
684a6(rgyud 'grel): yas lhun grub pa// mi dmigs dbyings nas don 'byin byed// ma btsas ji bzhin pa bzha' dang // lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung // mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las// ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang sgyur nas// ye
684b1(rgyud 'grel): shes sprul pa sna tshogs 'grub// spyod yul thams cad mAN+Da la// ljongs rdzogs sku dang sangs rgyas zhing // ji ltar 'dod pa smon na 'grub// yangs shing rgya che lhun grub ni// phyi nang snod bcud ye nas dag/ dag rtogs nyid kyang
684b2(rgyud 'grel): dbyings nyi yin// 'di ni rdo rje mnyam yin no// lhun grub ji ltar 'dod snang ba// gnyis sogs mtshan mas bsgribs pa'i phyir// ji ltar byis pa shed ma phye// bye byad mang pos g.yeng bar gnas// bya byed mang po bdag med par//
684b3(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang sgyur nas// mtshan ma mnyam pa'i dbyings su gnas// de dag dang po'i lus zhes bya// dngos grub myur du grub 'dod na// shin tu phra zhing zab par bsgom// bdag dang bad+ma gi gzhan rnams ni// shin tu mi dmigs
684b4(rgyud 'grel): dbyings su bsgom// rang bzhin mthong las don med phyir// de nyid rjes su mngon byas pas// thabs kyi dam par de bshad de// yang dag gnyis med byang chub sems// snang stong gnyis sogs gang yin zhing // phyogs
684b5(rgyud 'grel): dang gnas pa yod min pas// rjes su 'jug phyir mi bsam zhing // gang la'ang gnas pa bya ba min// gang zhig dmigs nas gsal ba ni// bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa mA ni// yod medad+ma la sogs mtha' dbus chos// gang yang
684b6(rgyud 'grel): dang du ma blangs zhing // sems kyis mngon par ma phyogs pa// tha snyad tsam du mnyam bzhag go// bsam bya dmigs su med pas na/ bzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang bzhin nyid// dmigs med tshul du rang snang ba// bsgom
685a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchog tu 'di gsungs so// yid la byed dang bying rgod dang // myong gzugs 'god dang 'gags 'bras dang // chags bral re dogs bdag nyid dang // 'chos dang gnas dmigs sdud pa dang //
685a2(rgyud 'grel): mngon byed ther zug phyul ba dag// bdagi dbang 'du shes mtshan ny-id de// 'du shes stong pa ting 'dzin mchog/ stong pa'i 'du shes ma rab sems// de phyir rgyu ba rtsing zhing sogs// g.yos 'khrul dbang gis cir snang yang //
685a3(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin sems nyid yin par shes// mtshan nyid gang du 'ang mi dmigs na// las su bya ba med pa'i phyir// tha snyad kun las grol 'gyur te// mi rtog ye shes gzhan du min// gang zhig bsam zhig dmigs yod na//
685a4(rgyud 'grel): nges par de nyid g.yeng sa yin// ci yang yid la mi byed pas// gol sar lhung ba ci zhig ltung // rang bzhi ni gnas dmigs med gsungs la// zhen blos gnas dang dmigs byed pa// gzung 'dzin zhes ni de la brjod//
685a5(rgyud 'grel): mi dmigs bsam pa gang spong ba// de nyid rjes mthun ting 'dzin yin// ring du byas pa'i rang nyams dag/ drag dal chu dang cho ga ting gi/ sems kyis brtan pa'i nyams bzung la// gzugs sgra reg dang rlung la
685a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs// snang yang dmigs par mi 'gyur na// gang yang zhen par ma gyur yin// lus sgra shin tu g.yeng 'gyur yang // cig shos 'jug med tshul gyis bstan// rang rigs shin tu gsal ba yang // ngo bo dmigs
685b1(rgyud 'grel): su med par gsungs// de rjes mthun pa'i spyod pa yang // las dang spyod pa thams cad la// rang bzhin bdag phyir mi dmigs shing // byas mthong zos pa ci yang med// gang yang bye med tshul gyis bya// shin tu'ang zhi bar
685b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba'i rigs// dpal gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bsdus pa// de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa ste// gnyis pa'o// // de nas gsang po bshad bye ba// ting 'dzin de ni goms pa dang //
685b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rang sems rnam pa'i phyir// thams cad sgyu ma mig yor dang // sprul pa'i tshul du shes par bya// de nyid shin tu goms par bsgom// de nyid rgyas pa'i lung bstan pa// rang bzhin ngo bo spyod pa lus// 'jig
