685b4(rgyud 'grel): rten sna tshogs smyung ba yang // rang rigs rnam rtog gizugs brnyan phyir// sgyu ma'i tshul du thams cad snang // 'phrul stong bya ba kun byed kyang // rtog pa kun gyi tshad mar snang // 'di dgra thams cad gzugs
685b5(rgyud 'grel): brnyan te// byas byed snang zhing dngos po med// chu zla'i tshul du thams cad gnaHsa// thams cad snang la rang bzhin med// rjes su dran par byed pas kyang // thams cad sems kyi rnam pa ni// don gyi rtsa ba mchog yin//
685b6(rgyud 'grel): te// thams cad ngogs med ma chags pa'i// rang rig ye shes de bzhin nyid// phung sogs sna tshogs thabs snang ba// ye shes sgyu mar rang snang phyir// snang stong gnyis su ma yin pas// thabs dang shes rab
686a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan par gnas// groms blos ci spyad mi gos te// bsag byA gnyis su dris par 'gyur// rang bzhin ye nas de bzhin no// sngon goms rang rig snang ba'i chos// sngos pa can gyi chos min pas// rig pa
686a2(rgyud 'grel): rang dbang sgyur ba yis// khams sogs ji ltar bltas bzhini snang // rgyu 'bras dbyer med sgra phyi med// de nyid lam phyir mnyam par sbyor// thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te// kun+da kyang skabs las shes par bya//
686a3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid 'du bar 'gyur ba ni// gnyis snang bral ba mnyam pa'i dbyings// rang dbang 'gyur ba'i thibs nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor thams cad zad med 'phro// thams cad rang rig sgyu ma nyid// dmigs med tshul gyis snang
686a4(rgyud 'grel): ba yin// yan lag gsum pa bshad par bya// srid gsum sgyu ma 'dra bar ni// thugs rje'i spyan spyan gyis gzigs par 'gyur// rjes mthun thugs rje gsal mdzad kyang // rang rig nyid las mi zhan phyir
686a5(rgyud 'grel): mngon par gdung pas non mi 'gyur// rtsa ba byang chub sems nyid rtogs// thabs kyus pha rol phyin par spyod// dmigs med snying rje chung mi gsan// ma chags thabs mkhas spyod pa yis// dron dang mthun pa 'ad
686a6(rgyud 'grel): zhig byed// mi mthun zhags pas 'khor ba spyod// sa pa'i dpyod par da gsungs so// // dpal gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bsdus pa// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa ste/ gsum pa
686b1(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag btsal nas// phra mo'i ting 'dzin bshad par bya// thams cad rang rIgA sgyu ma'i phyir// phyi nang snod bcud hUM du bsdu// gang bsgrub yi ge so so ste//
686b2(rgyud 'grel): spyir ni gang bsgoms kun tu 'dra// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'dus// yan lag lnga dang rnam shes nyid// yi ge hUM du shin tu bsdus nI yi mig gis ltar yod pa// rab tu 'dris nas spro bar bya// phyogs bcu gang
686b3(rgyud 'grel): nas bslar bsdus bstim// hUM nyid mi dmigs dbyings su bstim// rnam shes lhums su zhugs par bshad// hUM nyid a 'am ma dang gnyis// shin tu gsal zhing 'tsher ba la// thams cad yi ger gyur/
686b4(rgyud 'grel): byas te// bsdu sa nyi zla gang sgril bsgom// sa bon gnyis kyi bdag nyid pas// rang bzhin hUM ga bdag nyid de// 'dres phyir ming gnyis thob pa yin// phyag mtshan hri lAs pad+mor snang // thams cad rang rig snang ba'i
686b5(rgyud 'grel): phyir// byin brlabs 'od zer gzhal yas khang // dang snyogs tshul gyis nyi zla gnyis// skabs 'dir mi 'byed tshul phyir rmos// shes rab cig las byung ba hUM// mthing gA 'tshe ri la gsal ba yi// 'od zer phyogs
686b6(rgyud 'grel): bcu'i hU~M bsdus pa// rlung gi mtshan mar shes par bya// mchig gu lta bu rdo rje'i gzugs// rjes su mthun pa'i 'phro 'dur ldan// de nyid sems dpa' yab yum sku// shin tu phra zhing 'dus par bsgom// mtshan
687a1(rgyud 'grel): dang dpe byad thams cad ldan// zhal cig phyag gnyis yang na drug/ rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri 'bar// rin chen pad+ma dril bu 'bar// phra ba'i gzhal yas nyi zla ldan// nges par snying la gnas par bya//
687a2(rgyud 'grel): der ni ye shes snying po ste// de ltar gnas cig gnas gsum dong // gnas lnga drag tu bsgom par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyu dang // ye shes lngas rgyas gradab par bya// de nyid shin tu gnas pa dang //
687a3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin phyag rgya chen po ste// gzhal yas phyag mtshan gdon la sogs// phra ba'i tshul de snga ma bzhin// mtsho na gang ye shes rdo rje'i sku// rtag tu skying la gnas par bya// sen zlum nyi zla gang ba la// yungs 'bru 'bar
687a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i hUM gnas pa'o// rang bzhin sems dpal-i spyan dra nas la// ye shes dam tshig la mnyam bstim// bdag nyid chen po mchod par bya// rtog tu nang gi sbyin sreg gtang // rang sngags 'phreng ba'i 'khor lo yis// shin tu
687a5(rgyud 'grel): gsalci zhing bde la gnas// 'gro nyal 'dug sdong spyod lam kun// theg chen sgom las nyams pa med// chos spyod rnam dgu rab spangs nas// phyogs cig spyod la gang gnas pa// rtse cig ting 'dzin nyid du gshad//
687a6(rgyud 'grel): mtsho sogs rang gi don du min// yan lag ma nyams sngogs bzlas shing // 'dod pa kun la longs spyod bya// lus dang ngag sems brtan 'gyur na// byang chub rab 'byams thob par 'gyur// don ldan ma nyams dag
687b1(rgyud 'grel): byas shing // brtson 'grus cher bskyed myur bar 'grub// sngags sgom ma nyams phyag rgya gasngal// cho ga yo byad gtsor mA gsungs// lha yi su rnams gsal sgoms pas// bsod nams tshogs chen rdzogs
687b2(rgyud 'grel): por 'gyur// de nyid chu zla'i tshul snang bas// ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs par 'gyur// gang gis mthong mos mchod pa yis// thun mong sdig les grol bar 'gyur// 'di ltar bsgoms shing bsgrubs byas na/ 'bras
687b3(rgyud 'grel): bu mngon du ma gyur yang // tshe rabs skye ba thams cad du// lha mi mtshan rdzogs sdug bsngal sel// bde gshegs 'byung dang skal mi 'gyur// thog ma sman par 'jug mi 'gyur// rdo rje'i rigs su nges pa yin//
687b4(rgyud 'grel): dpal gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bsdus pa// phra mo'i tinge 'dzin gyi rim pa ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas spros pa'i rnam 'byor bshad// de nyid nus mthu ldan pa ni// wA spyod 'brel par
687b5(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'i phyir// de nyid sku gsungs thugs kyi bdag/ de nyid thabs dang shes rab ldan// longs spyod sprul mchog rdzogs pa'i phyir// byang chub mchog tu nyi zla shar// de nyid bzhugs pa/ nas yin par
687b6(rgyud 'grel): gsungs// gzugs sogs rang bzhin spros bcas pa// 'od zer 'phro ba'i 'bru gsum ste/ yang na 'o da 'od zer phyag rgya lnga lo/ lnga po'i don spros bzhi bcu gnyis// gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas
688a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ khro 'dul sna tshogs de bzhin te// ma bcos dang gasdig gnas pa la// ya shAs lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldan// de nyid yan lag spro bdag ste// cig
688a2(rgyud 'grel): lnga'ang bzhi bcu gnyis su 'phro// de ltar gAtso mchog ldan byas nas// rigs bzhi rgyal mchogs de bzhin ste// bcu gnyis gnyis kyang der shes nas// drug gi phyag rgya 'od 'phro 'bar// blo yi shes rab che chung
688a3(rgyud 'grel): gis// rim pa bzhin du bsgom par bya// phyogs bcu ma lus gzhal yas khang // nyi zla gza' skar rgyan dang gdan// pad+ma gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus bsgom// nyi zla gza' skar dus cig tu// rgyu mtsho dngas
688a4(rgyud 'grel): par 'char ba ltar// de ltar rtogs go mos rigs mchog des// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// mkha' la 'phyo dang rigs 'dzin gnas// chu rgyun bzlog dang rlung mi 'gul// ri brag la sogs thogs med
688a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzul// dug mtshon 'byung bas tshugs mi 'gyur// 'byung ba lnga la dbang sgyur zhing // lha srin rnams la dbang byed 'gyur// nad sal longs spyod dran seng sbyong // dgug gtang bci nges sgrol gso bsad dang // yungs 'bur
688a6(rgyud 'grel): stong gsum dgang bsdu dang // bdug dang gcan zin la sogs pas// tshugs par mi 'gyur bran bzhin 'gyur// lus ma spangs par rigs 'dzin sa// bsod nams ye shes longs spyod kyis// yi ge 'khor lo tshegs
688b1(rgyud 'grel): chen mnyes// thugs rje smra sprul sku byin rlabs kyis// so sor thar pa'i lam yang ston// zhi ba phyogs cig shes bya sbyong // sa bcu mnyam par spyod cing // bde gshegs 'khor las yang dag byed// las rnams ma
688b2(rgyud 'grel): yusu kun byas nas// spyi shrI ma~M dpyi'i g.yung drung thog// mtshan dang dpe byang kun gyis brgyan// mthar phyin bya ba med par 'grub// de ltar cho ga rdzogs byas shing // sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pa'i// rnal
688b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor 'tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// dris par legs pa'i dgos pa 'grub// gsang ba la sogs yo byad lnga// dgon pa'i gnas su bsdu byas te// rin+da chen spras pa'i gzhal yis khang // 'khor khring phyi
688b4(rgyud 'grel): na ldan par bya// bde ba chen po skyed pa'i phyir// yo byad rol mo bde ldan dgod// yan lag dbang po rnam shos dang // gzugs sgra dri ro rig la sogs// dkyil 'khor bshad bzhin gsal bar bya// gos skyes
688b5(rgyud 'grel): yo bya de bzhi po las// sems phyir m+b+ha bsgres ye shes brtag/ chags meng tshul gyis rol byas na// ngo mtshar 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyes// rgyan dang bgo bas lhas brgyan nas// yan lag dkyil 'khor
688b6(rgyud 'grel): gsol rdzogs pas// khro gar gru tshig la sogs pa// thams cad gzhung bzhin rdzogs par bya// bza' dang btung ba'i tshogs rnams kun// tshogs med tshul gyis bsgom par bya// bdag mchod kun
689a1(rgyud 'grel): mnyes thams cad 'grangs// kun la phan pa'i sman yin te// rnal 'byor bdag nyid chen po yis// thams cad bza' zhing brgyan par bya'o// lha mo klu mo rigs dran mo// dbye 'am yang na mi dbye bar//
689a2(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i gnas su spyad par bya// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen ma// bsgrub pa dang ni bsgrub chen pos// rtsa gnas pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// badra ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gnaste// bdag nyid chen po mchod pa yis// sangs
689a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas sprin tshegs mo lus mnyes// srid gsum 'gro ba thams cad la// dga' ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur// rang bzhin gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor yang // skad cig gis ni gnal bar byed// lam dang sa gsum yongs
689a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs phyir// thabs chen theg pa theg pa'i mchog/ mchog dang mchog 'phran la sogs pa// chags med thugs rjes dor mi bya// sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bro gar 'du
689a5(rgyud 'grel): 'phro'i phyag rgya yis// 'dzul lam nam mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur// glu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis// chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rgyan dang 'go ba'i phyag rgya yis// 'bar ba'i rgyal po thub med 'grub// bza' dang
689a6(rgyud 'grel): btung ba'i phyag rgya yis// yid bzhin sku dang bdud rtsi 'grub// e li ka la'i phyag rgya yis// thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje pad+mar ldan po yis// rak+ta byang chub dus cig 'bar// gnyis med zung ngu
689b1(rgyud 'grel): 'brel 'gyur na bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus 'byung // 'gro ba'i don rnams lhun gyis 'grub// rnal 'byor chen po'i spyod pa ni// thams cad kun la dbyer med spyod// bde ba'i ro mchog myong 'gyur te// de phyir de la
689b2(rgyud 'grel): tshugs pa med// spyod bzhin ma chags ye shes yin// bde ba'i mchog nyid bsod nams tshogs// de bas lam 'di tshogs su bshad/ lha spyod ya tshor ma gyur pas// sngags 'chang rnams kyis rtag tu spyad// bla med
689b3(rgyud 'grel): theg pa'i nang nas ni// dan dam du ni dbyer med la// kun rdzob du ni thams cad la// ngag dang ma dag gnyis kar 'dzin// thabs kyi theg pa chen po ni// rnam par byed dang sdug bsngal dag/ kun rdzob du yang dbyer med na/
689b4(rgyud 'grel): lta ba mtho dmanu de tsam mo// thabs kyi theg pa chen po ni// bla med theg pa las 'phags pas// don dam du ni skor bdun la// kun rdzob du ni mnyam rdzogs so// de phyir bden gnyis dbye ba med// thams cad dog ces
689b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba yang // dngos po grasal dag ma yin te// snang spyod nyid na rnams par dag/ gdod nas de bzhin gomes byed pa// lam gzhan rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor yin/ tshim bu'i grangs nr-i ma nges ste// dang por ngam nos
689b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du bya// le lo bgyid snyoms med pa yis// the tshom med par bsgrub byas na// bdag nyid chen po lhun grub pa// zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi drug gis// dbang sgyur rigs kyis dam
690a1(rgyud 'grel): pa thob// de tshe bcu dang drug pa yis// brgya brgya dag tu sbyar zhing gnas// lusam bor bar sangs rgyu smra sa// mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan 'das// su lnga lhun b+his rdzogs par 'gyur// / dpa snga
690a2(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bsdus pa// snang ba rnam par 'byod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pas ste/ lnga pa'o// // de nas mthar gonas bshad par bya// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// rim pa
690a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga yis mnyam sbyor bas// rang 'byung sku ngam lhun gyis grub// de mtshar cho 'phrul rmad kyi cho sna// gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te// thabs la brten pa'i shes rab nyid// de lta bu'i ngang du 'byung // rang rig nyid la gan+da
690a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni// sus kyang mi byas rang 'byung ste// rang 'byung chen po'i ye shes kyis// ma lus de bzhin nyid du sbyor// sbyor dang sbyor ba gnyis ka med// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim// nyid la mtshan nyid yod ma yin// sha
690a5(rgyud 'grel): rab dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid// thabs kyi phyag rgya rang snang ba// tha snyad ma lus ye shes dngo swA// ye she so lA ni ye shaM so rol// ma bkag tshul gyis rang snang ba// saur don bzhin ro myong yang // rang rigs nyid las gzha
690a6(rgyud 'grel): med phyir// bde ba chen po'i ye shes la// gzung ba'i mtshan ma yod ma yin// mi rtog tshul gyi// longs spyod pa// ma chags pad+ma dag gi slu// 'das dang mi 'das dngos po kun// rong rig ye shes byang chub sems// /
690b1(rgyud 'grel): snang stong gnyis su ma yin pas// ye shes dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// rang rig bsam yas phyir yang snang // gdul bya'i dbang gis brjod mi lang // byang sems lhun grub rang snang bas// 'phro 'du'i tshul du bdar bstan
690b2(rgyud 'grel): no// spros bral thugs kyi chos thams cad// snyoms par khyab pas rje nyid de// 'bras bu lhun grub byin ldan pas// mtsho yi rlabs tshul kun tu snang // bsam byas lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir// zhing khams rnams dang 'gro/
690b3(rgyud 'grel): kun la// rdo rje 'dzin nas rtsi shing tshogs// so sor mthun po'i sku snang yang // stong nyid dngos dang bya byed med// chu zla'i tshul du kun snang yang // byini rlabs khyab tsong 'i gro 'ong med// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lus nyid ni// sangs
690b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyi spyi gzugs ste// snang stong gnyis su ma yin zhing // grangs dang tshwa chung mtha' dbusau kyang // 'di lI sus kyang dmigs mi nus// nam mkha' lta pur mtha' bral ba// 'od zer phyag rgya gdan rdzogs pa//
690b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan dang bral ba sa gnyis ka mi ni// zhi khro la sogs sku gnyis tshegs// lhun gyis grub pas cir yang snang // rim pa 'am rim pa med tshul ni// gdul bya'o bsdam pas phye ba yin// dus gsum du yang mi 'gyur
690b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir// rtag chen rdo rje'i sku zhes gsungs// bden pa gnyis kyi mtha' las 'das// dngos kun bdag phyir ming tshig tsam// thams cad tshig gi sgra ltar gnas// de nyid ma skyes sems yin phyir// rang bzhin brjod med
691a1(rgyud 'grel): don yin kyang // sgra rnams sems su lhun rdzogs phyir// gsung ni ga tshig tu ma brjod kyang // thar dang mthar thams cad la// ji ltar 'dod bzhin gsal bar snang // de phyir brjod nyid brjod pa med//
691a2(rgyud 'grel): gdul bya ma lus thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid las myi zhan phyir// gang zhig de nyid gyur pa yis// sgo gsum sdug bsngal ma 'dres pas// log rtog rgyun tsam sbyang ba yang // rang snang tshul gyis rtogs med par// sgyu ma'i tshul
691a3(rgyud 'grel): du gsol bar gsungs// de bas 'das dang ma 'das chos// rang rig byang sems ngo bo'i phyir// snga phyi cung zad yod min pas// mtshan nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs par// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis sngon nas so mkhyen// /
691a4(rgyud 'grel): so sbyor snang ba thams cad kyang // rang rig rgyal por yang dag du// rong rig de nyid thams cad yi na// spyod yul rang rig ye shes phyir// rlung snang ye shesta ngo bos stong // mtha' rnams bral ba'i rang rig la// mu skye sa den snang
691a5(rgyud 'grel): me long bzhin// thams cad bdag tu gyur pa'i phyir// tha snyad gnyis ka dang gis stong // mtshan nyid bA sa ma yas snang ba yang // sems phyir so sor dmigs pa med// rang bzhin rnam dag ye shes la// byA byed dmigs
691a6(rgyud 'grel): par yong mi 'gyur// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni// rtsa ba lnga zhes brjod mod kyang // brjod pa'i mtshan nyid yod med de// mtshan nyid med par so sor snang // de nyid thams cad mkhyen pa nyid // mtshan nyid
691b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med dmis sdu mi 'gyur// gnas pa med pAR+Sha kun+da tu khyab// phyogs bcu snang grags bsam yas pa// rang rig nyid las mi zhan phyir// yon tan rin chen bkod pa dang // ye shes brgyan gyis spras pa yi// zhing gi
691b2(rgyud 'grel): yon tan bsam mi khyab// phyogs bcu dus bzhi zhing sbyor pos// dog yungs tshod kyang dpag tu myed// sangs rgyas spyi gtsug lta bu'i mtshan// ye shes rgyu lus grub pa'i phyir// 'di zhes cig ces brjod du med//
691b3(rgyud 'grel): zla ga med bsod nams lhun grub pas// ji ltar bltas pa de ltar snang // gdos pa can gyi chos min+da zhing // thams cad rang rig dbang sgyur bas// stong par bya 'am mo stong bya// thams cad dbyar med dang nyid pas// rtog pa med lnga/
691b4(rgyud 'grel): cir yang snang // gzhan gyis smig du myed pa yi// po de'i skor ni rin po che// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis// byA byed med par rnam pa zhi mdzad// sgyu mi'o tshul du rol mdzod kyang // bya ba byed dang dmigs su myed// 'das dang
691b5(rgyud 'grel): ma 'das bsam yas pa// ma lus mams phyir dmigs su med// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// gnas dang ngo bo dbyer med de// de nyid rig pa rang snang ba// sna tshogs mtshan
691b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid rnam par rol// thams cad mkhyen nyid bsam yas kyang // rang rig nyid du yang dag 'dus// de nyid thabs tshan ma 'dres snang // spyod yul 'phrog med spyod mo lang // gnyis med thugs rjes dbang gis na// 'gro drug dus
692a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas snyoms par zhugs// rang rig nyid las mi zhan phyir// dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid du gsungs// des sogs mtshan nyid yon tan grangs// stong gsum cig dang thams cad kyi// mgo lus kha
692a2(rgyud 'grel): lce cig rdzogs pas// bskal pa mtha' klas par brjod kyang // de dag mthar thugs yong mi 'gyur/ mtshan nyid rmongs la mdor bsdus pa// bsgrub bya ma lus mngon gyur pas/ bsam bya bslab pa kun las grol thams
692a3(rgyud 'grel): cad ma spangs bdag nyid phyir// gang yang 'du shes thams cad spangs// gnyis med thugs rje chen po yis// mdzad pa gang yang 'gog pa med// sku gsung phyags rgya cir snang yang // rang bzhin rdzogs phyir 'gro 'ong
692a4(rgyud 'grel): med// yum sogs bde bo kun ldan yang // rang gi ngo bo mi dmigs pas// mtha' rnams kun las grol ba yin// khams gsum bdag nyid chen po'i phyir// sems can kun gyis sems la son// sems sogra
692a5(rgyud 'grel): zhen mthas ma reg pas klucig pu rab tu che ba'i lha// de bzhin nyid dang dbyer med phyir// 'di la spyod yul yod ma yin// // dpal gsang ba'i snying po de kho ni nyad nges pa las bsdus pa// bsam yas ldan
692a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim po ste drug pa'o// // yongs rdzogs rgya che mtshan nyid rtogs dka' rlabs ldan rang rgyud rgya mtsho yi// mtshan nyid rjes mthun gnyis bral yig gsum gnyis gab sbas te ra
692b1(rgyud 'grel): chod don// snying rjes goms shugs mthong nyams 'brel pa dgos don dang por phreng ba gsal byas pas// rjes 'jug la sogs gnyis bcings ma lus de nyid shes grol goms thar shog/ rim pa drug pa/ slob dpon sgeg
692b2(rgyud 'grel): pa rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// // dpal rdo rje sems dpal phyag 'tshal lo// gzhi ldam 'bras bur bcas pa'i chos// dris ldam dam bca' mthar dbyung ba// lung dang man ngag rigs sgo nas// rtogs par bya phyir rnam
692b3(rgyud 'grel): bshad bya// dang po rnam pa gnyis bstan te// ngo bo'i gzhi dang brtags pa'i gzhi// gzhi yi ngo bo mtshan nyid dang // nges tshig dpe yi rnam pa dang // snang tshul gnyer gyis rtogs par bya// ngo bo thams cad sems nyid de//
692b4(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi dpe bzhin gnyis su med// mtshan nyid mtha' rnams kun bral bas// ci yang bzung du med pa'o// tha snyang gnyis kyi chos rnams kun// mA lus 'byung phyir gzhi zhes bya// nam mkha' rgya mtsho rin chen
692b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs// nye ba'i dpe yis mtshon pa'o// rgyu rkyen bral ba'i skad cig ma// rang snang nyid du byung ba'o// lung dang man ngag yang bzung du med pa'o// blo gting yod chos gyur par bya// brtogs gzhi gnyis su bstan
692b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chos// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das par gsungs// 'khor ba'i rgyu rkyen ngo bo dang // dpe dang mtshan nyid byed po dang // 'khor tshul nyes po'i dus rnams su// nges par bstan phyir mgon pos bshad// 'khor ba'i 'byung
693a1(rgyud 'grel): d+hu rnam pa bzhi// rgyud mtshungs lhan cig nyer len pa// bder gshegs snying po ma rig dang // rnam smin bag chags nyon mongs pa'o// rkyen gnyis bstan pa'i las gsum du// kun brtags ma rig
693a2(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs lnga// ngo bo snod bcud 'jig rten gyi// snang dang zhen pa'i chos rnams so// za chu tsA sogs med dpe bzhin// kun tu 'khor zhing mched pa'o// 'jig dang chags dang stongs dang gnas// rgyu rga na 'chi bzhi ldan pas// mtshan nyid
693a3(rgyud 'grel): bar zug ma yin pa'o// rgyun dang bcas pa'i skad cig mya// las kyi byed par brjod pa'o// rten 'brel bcu gnyis tshul dag tu// phyi nang gnyis kar 'khor ba'o// 'phags lam bral nas sdug bsngal myong // nyes pa rnam pa gnyis
693a4(rgyud 'grel): su gsungs// thog ma tha ma med dus nas// yang dag don ma rtog so pas nyams// mya ngan 'das pa'i mtshan nyid dang // nges tshig rnam grangs gang la snang // mtshon pa ma grub tshul don bstan// ngo bo med bzhin kun snang bas// /
693a5(rgyud 'grel): cig dang du ma las grol te// mtshan brjod mtha' rnams kun bral ba'o// skye 'jig chos rnams bral pa'o// sgyu 'jig chos rnams bral 'gyur bas// mya ngan 'das par de brjid do// rnam grangs gnyis su brjod pa ste// theg pa
693a6(rgyud 'grel): mthong dman bye brag gis// phyogs gcig pa dang mi gnas pa'o// mya ngan 'das par de bstan pa'o// mya ngan 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid// de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba dang // de yi sgrub pa rgya chen nyid// gdul bya 'khrul la snang ba'o//
693b1(rgyud 'grel): chu bo rgal ba'i gru bzhin du// 'khor ba'i chu bo rnam par rgal// btson ra thar pa ji bzhin du// 'ching ba'i mdud pa las grol ba'o// gzhi po sems nyid ma grub pas// sbrul snang chos kun ma nges te// cir yang brjod du med pa'o//
693b2(rgyud 'grel): dbu ma rnam pa gnyis yin te// grol lam thabs su rnam par bstan// dbu ma'i dang po ngo bo dang // rkyen dang rnam grangs mtshan dpe dang // bslab tshul rIm pa bstan pa dang // gleng 'og dgos pa mthar phyin spyod// ngo bo shes rab rnam
693b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyis// sems bzho skyes par bstan pa yin// tshig dang yi ge rkyen nyid las// brten dang rtog par byed pa yin// mtshan mar bsgom pa'i rim pa yang // de bzhin nyid du bsgom pa yi// bye brag rnam pa gnyis su gsungs
693b4(rgyud 'grel): khron pa sgron ma'i dpe bzhin du// grol lam sgo nas rtogs sgom bya// thun mong lam lngar bslab pa dang // khyed la so so'i lam bzhin bslab// sngon du goms par gang byas pa// gong ma gsol bar 'gyur phyir ro// thun mong
693b5(rgyud 'grel): khyad par gnas skabs la// ting 'dzin drod tshad nyams ldan na// la mo mthor phyin pa zhes su bshad// ting 'dzin khyad par gyur pa'i phyir// rjes mthun spyod pa'i gzhung bzhin spyad // dbu ma gnyis pa bsnyen po ni// rnam grangs
693b6(rgyud 'grel): gong ma ngag thabs nyid de// rtogs tshul rgyu rkyen ldan pa yis// shugs kyis snang tshul gser 'gyur bzhin// gdas ngag steng dang 'og gi sgo// thig le rkyang par bcas pa nyid// thabs rnams sngon du goms byas pa//
694a1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin nyid du 'gyur byed pa// ting 'dzin khyad par dbang gi rgyu// thabs kyi rgyu rkyen ngo bo dang // nges tshig bskur ba'i rim pa dang // mtshon dpe dgos pa bstan pa'o// khyad par rgyu rkyen lngar bshad de//
694a2(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i dgongs dang rlung gis dus// sbyor ba'i thabos dang bsod nams las// phyag rgya yo na tan ldan gyur pas// dngos po lhan cig skyes pas myong // de phyir thabs su bstan pa yin// ngo bo nus phan gsang po'i chos// shes rab
694a3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes bde chen po// 'ching ba'i las rnams spyad pa yis// 'gro bar 'gyur phyir ming du brjod// dad dang brtson 'grus gsum dang ldan// brtul shugs gsum la spyod pa la// go rim tshul du 'tsham par sbyin// rgyal po'i
694a4(rgyud 'grel): phru gu dug 'gyur bzhin// dbang thabs rnam gnyis nyams len bya// rim pa dbang gis bskyod phyir dang // thun mong lam gyi khyad par gyis// sgo 'byed thob phyir bstan pa yin// tha ma'i don la ngo bo dang // mtshan nyid yon tan bstan
694a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // mdzad spyod thugs rje'i snang tshul dang // gdul bya gzigs tshul don rnams kyis// 'bras bu don bzhin rtogs par bya// dang po sku gsung thugs rnams dang // yon tan 'phrin las lngar bsdus pa'o// mtshan nyid bzhi
694a6(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa'i phyir// mo lus cig min tha dad min// 'bras bu yon tan lhun grub pas// yid bzhin nor ltar snang ba'o// 'phrin las rnams bzhi mdzod spyod kyis// bya ba med par don rnams rdzogs// thugs rje'i chen po'i
694b1(rgyud 'grel): gdul bya lta// rtag rgyun rang bzhin shugs gsol dang // yulnga dang phrad pas 'byung bar snang // nyid las mI zhan don rnams kyis// me long tshul du gzigs par 'gyur// gzhi lam 'bras shes bya ba rnams// bla ma mkhas nyams
694b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa li// dri ba drug gi tshul nyid las// rnam gsum tshul gyis zhu bar bya// bla ma mkhas ldan de nyid kyis// bu rnams mami shes mdud dgrol phyir// rnam gsum lan gdab gzhung nyid la// 'gro gcig rnam dbye'i dri tshul
694b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis// lan gdab yid ches gyur par bya// gal te gzhung las brtsod 'gyur na// dam+ba bcas sgrub ste don nyid ni// dpe don gtan tshigros gsum ldan pas// shes bya de nyid mthar phyin bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i
694b4(rgyud 'grel): dgongs brgyud pa// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i don nyid las// rim gsum don nyid bsdus pa yis// mA lus mngon par sangs rgyus shog/ de lta'i dge rtsa tso mi ches pa// bdag gi rgyud la yongs smin te// blo med byang chub thob
694b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur nas// mtha' yasa? sems can 'dren par shog/ bdag blo mun por 'phags pa yi// dgod pa nyi ma shar ba yi// nyams dang lung la brten pa yi// brtsams nongs 'phags la bzod par gsol//
694b6(rgyud 'grel): sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i man ngag rim pa gsum pa rdzogs so// // bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje kun tu bzang po la phag 'tshal lo// dad pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal nas// thams cad mkhyen
695a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid mngon dang pa'i// rnal 'byor chen po rnams don phyir// sems bskyed cho ga bshad par bya// brtsom pa'i dang po med pas na// dpag tu myed pa'i sgo spyod kyang // sa bon rgya mtsho 'di med pas// mthur
695a2(rgyud 'grel): phyin 'bras bu mi snang ste// de nyid sdug bsngal sa bon 'gyur// de bas gzhi 'di goms par byos// // de la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan/ 'byung khungs kyi rtsa bar nges pa ni sems yin
695a3(rgyud 'grel): to// gzhung las/ de bzhin gsheg sa pa rnams kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu ni byang chub kyi sems so// rtsa ba ni snying rje chen po las byung ba'o// thabs kyi mthar phyin pa'o ces 'byung ba dang // rigs kyi bu
695a4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos byang chub sems kyi sa bon lta bu'o// zhes pa dang // tshos rnam+b+ha sa kun kyaM yo byad ni// snying rje byang chub sems yin te// yo byad de dang ma ldan nA// don rnams grub par mi
695a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ tshad myed snying rje bskyed pa dang // byung chub sems la dga' ba ni// sngon du 'gro ba'i mchog yin te// bsgrub po pos ni nin tan+do byA// rtsu ba byang chub sems nyid rtogs// tha byes kyi pha rol phyin par spyod// snying
695a6(rgyud 'grel): rjes chung ma zos par zung // gdon mi zo 'bar 'grub ces gsungs// zhes pa la sogs pa rgyas par gsungs so// / de dog gi khyod par ni// dper na sa chen po ni sems can thams cad kyis
695b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tsho ba ste// 'gyur ba med cing ldan du 'phyan 'dogs pa la re ba med do// de bzhin du sems dang po skyes pa yang / snying po byang chub la thugs kyi pad+ma du// sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba ste/ 'gyur ba med cing ldan du phan
695b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dogs pa lA re ba med pa'o// dper na/ rdo rje rin po che chags kyang gser gyi rgyun khyad par can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa ste// rdo rje rin po che'i ming yang mI dor la// dbul thams cad kyang ba zlog go// de bzhin du tham
695b3(rgyud 'grel): cad mkhyen pa nyid du skyed pa'i sems rin pa che bsgrub pa dang ma ldan yang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cud zil gyis gnon ste// byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang mi 'dor la// 'khor ba'i 'bul ba las kyang bzlog go/
695b4(rgyud 'grel): dper no seng ge'i phru gu'i dri mnam pa'i rdzi phyogs na gnas pa'i gcan zan thams cad kyang 'bros par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sems bskyed po'i byang chub sems dpa' gang du phyin pa'i sa phyogs na gnas pa'i log
695b5(rgyud 'grel): par spyod pa'i sems can thams cad skrag por 'gyuro// gnas 'drir bskyed pa rtsam gyis 'jig rten gsum po bla mar bcas pa'o// chos nas nyan thos bdud kyi sde rnams zil gyis gnon zhes gsungs so// thabs chen
695b6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba'i spyod pa'ang 'di nyid de// 'di med rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad thag pa gsum ston mi srid do// skad cig tsam yang dad pa'i shugs skyed de yang myur du 'jam dpal gzhon nur
696a1(rgyud 'grel): ts+tsha gas ba gas shing shAkunanA dam rgyag cog kyang smra y-im+b+ha/ ts+tsha mas pA stan+d+ha sa gang rgyun gnas dum pa rab tu sngags// klung dag 'dir na mdun rgyu// dkyur/
696a2(rgyud 'grel): yid kyis phyogs byed pa// de ni dngos dang 'dra ba ste// 'bras bu la yang mtho dmun med// byang chub sems kyi bas rnams gang // de la g+harA te gzugs yod nA/ nam mkha'i khams ni kun gang ste// de ni de las sdug par 'gyur//
696a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa rgyam po gsung gi// de sas skye bskyed mdor bstan no// das po gnyis dang rlom pa bani// gan dang dbang po yi byung // tshig rnams sams bskyed sdos pa'i ngas// gdum las kyis skyid pa dang /
696a4(rgyud 'grel): shes bzhin bshags pa rnam bcu gcig/ las kyi gtso bor gang len pa// de ni ldog par ma gsungs te// cung zad tsam gyi las rnams kyang // rgya mtsho bzhin du mi skam zhing // 'bras bu bdag gzhan gnyis la snang // de bas
696a5(rgyud 'grel): nan tan+da snying pos gyis// / kun+da rdzob sems ni sgying rje'i mchog/ sdug bsdu lnga bcu gcig yul byas te// gdung bas bsgrub pa'i sems bcas pas// dgon skyob bdag por yid la byed// bdag bde rje dang don 'dod
696a6(rgyud 'grel): bde ni ldog pa ma gsungs so// 'khor los dpung gi tshogs 'dren bzhin// de ni sangs rgyas chos rnams 'dre na// sa dang rgya mtsho nor bu bzhin// yon tan don dang snang ba rnams// snying rje chen po nyid las 'byung // me long
696b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bsgrib byas pa/ dngos grub grags su bral gsungs so// bu dang zhe 'gras spyod pa yis// byang chub sems dpa'i ming med na// sangs rgyas khas ches rnal 'byor ci// // don dam nges par rab bshad pa// ma g.yos kun gzhi'i
696b2(rgyud 'grel): ngang du bshad// rang bzhin snang ba'i gser tshul ltar// gnyis su med par rgyal bas bshad// dri de nge ga pur nus pa bzhin// mtshan ma med par sems mi dmigs// sems nyid gang yin chos nyid de// chos nyid kyang ni de bzhino//
696b3(rgyud 'grel): chos sems gnyis med ldan gyur pas// bla mod byang chub chen por bshad// nam mkha' gar khyab chos kyis khyab// chos nyid gar khyab sems yin pas// phyi nang gnyis med sems su gsal// mos dang rgyun dran mngon 'gyur bar
696b4(rgyud 'grel): yid la byed pa'i sems dag gis// don 'di yongs su rdzogasmra bar brjod// // g.yo zhing smon par byed pa ni// rang bzhin mtshungs par ldan pa dang // zhar 'byung lhan cig byed pa dang // yon tan mthong thos rjes 'jug dang // byin
696b5(rgyud 'grel): rlabs shugs kyis 'brel pa bzhi// rkyen gyi rnam pa 'dus pa yin// skad cig cung zad sa bon las// bca'o me bzhin du skye bar gsungs// lhag par 'phel ba'i gang zag gis// snying rje skye dang lhar ldan pas// don gnyis rgyu/
696b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di shes nas// goms par mang du byas pa yis// zla ba yar gyi ngo bzhin du// je che je mang mngon 'phel bar// dam bcas 'jug par bya ba yin// lhag pa'i bsam pa mngon byas te// 'gyur ba med par gnas par bya'o// dngos
697a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhi gnyis la rab brtan pa// 'jug pa'i skyes bur de bshad do// phyis 'byung sdom pa'i dngos po la// rgyun dang dum bur gang gnas pa// gnas pa'i sems su rab tu brtan// de nyams gsum du shes par
697a2(rgyud 'grel): bya// gnas pa mang po'i mthu rdzogs pas// mngon byas rkyen gyis mi 'phrogs shing // bsgrub bya rkyen gyis mthar phyin pa// klong yangs num mkha'i dkyil 'khor la// sprin med nyi ma 'bum gyis bdal// mi skye mi 'gag ngo bo lus
697a3(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar bltas dgu'i der snang bas// don gnyis lhun grub rtog bral ba// mthar rdzogs sems suM rgyal bas gsungs// bsngo gzhi sgrib bral nyid du bstan// yul nyid lnga yi dbang po ni// rim pa gsum gyi mtshan nyid can// snying
697a4(rgyud 'grel): rje chen po brlan ldan pas// khe grags 'dod pa'i sems gsum spangs// shes bya bar ma kun mkhyen pas// ma 'dres don gyi tha snyad rnams// nad dang sman gyi rim bzhin byed// ston pa'i mchog du 'di gsungs pas// dang po'i
697a5(rgyud 'grel): rim la gnas pa'i mis// brtson 'grus dga' ba'i las rnams gyis// 'du shes smyon par bzhag ste blang // cung zad 'gal ba'i sems med par// rtag par gdung pas rmongs byed pa// de 'dra bral bsam gsungs so// /
697a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang 'gyur rdo rje dam can rnams// byin rlabs gnyen pa'i sems dag gis// las kyi stongs su 'gyur ba'i phyir// zhing khams byed pa'i rdul 'das pa'i// sangs rgyas 'khor bcas bzhugs par bya// de dag rtag tu
697b1(rgyud 'grel): mngon byas ma ste/ shes bzhin rang gi sdom pa bsngo// smon lam dbang gis gzigs par 'gyur// muN+Dal bdud rtsi'i dris byug pa// tsan dan bdud rtsi'i chus sbyangs pa// dri zhim rgyas kyis rab brgyan ste// rin chen 'byor bas
697b2(rgyud 'grel): lhag thogs bya// sna tshogs yol ba'i phyi rol 'dug/ kha sbyar ban d+ha'i bum chu sbyin// dril bus rdo rje'i ming brtags byas// sangs rgyas 'khor bcas gzugs brnyan dgram+ba// sna tshogs mchod pa rgyas pa dag/ 'khor gsum dag
697b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems kyis dbul// khur gsil rol mo rgyas par sbyin// 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma dang // 'gro drug sbyin po chen po'i dang // dug gsum spangs pa'i sems kyis gtang // sems skyes mtshon pa'i rdo rje yang // rtag tu
697b4(rgyud 'grel): bcang bar bya byA yin+da// drang po 'das dang 'jug 'dod dang // g.yo bar mkhan pos gsol btab pas// ma~M khan+de pos gsol ba btab nas ni// dad pa'i sems la gnas su gzhug/ dgos po'i yo byad rang 'byor nas// dge ba'i
697b5(rgyud 'grel): bar chad bzlog pa'i phyir// rdo rje mi shigs gur bcing bya// bum+b+ha chu gsum po byin brlab phyir// bdud rtsi 'khrul pa'i dran pa yis// bgegs bskrad pa yi rang bzhin du// 'bru lngas ye shos chu rgyun dgug/ mA lus
697b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa'i khro bzhi ni tshogs// bskyed dang spyan drangs mchod tshogs sbyar// sngags bzlas gsol btab bu byin brlab// khrus byas dri zhim rgyan ldan bu// yol phyir phyag byas thal sbyar ste// dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag
698a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba 'don pa'i ded dpon che// sdug bsngal chu bo rgyun bzlog dang // don gnyis bdag gis mngon byas pa'i// thabs kyi las mtha' gang lags pa// rim pa yang dag bstan pa'i phyir// thugs
698a2(rgyud 'grel): rje nye bar skyed mdzad de// de ring gnang ba mdzad par rigs// maM lus phyogs btsun bzhugs pa'i// sngon gyi dbang po ji snyed pa'o// rgya smra pad+ma spyan drangs mchod par bya// sangs rgyas lta ba'i mos byas pas// log bzung na
698a3(rgyud 'grel): du gnas por bya// thal sbyar zhing la lus dbul bya// bi shud+d+haM dang sgye sngags kyis// tsan dan+t+ra bdud rtsi chu skyur de// dad pa'i lhar skyed byin gyisau brlab// rin chen bsnyen pas gsol btab pas// rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams/
698a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis// thugs rje nye bar bskyed mdzad do// dmi tshig dam byi ces rimi paM bzhin// bdag la byin gyis brlabs par rigs// rab tu gtor ste 'dril pa brtag/ rdo rje'i ming+ga yang sbyin par bya// dang khyod sbyangs rgyas dkyi
698a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyis// rIm par rab zhugs nges pa yin// dam tshig 'dod pa'i sems bskyed cing // gzhan don rab dga'i snyems ldan pas// bshags pa'i mchog gis rab shogs s+ho// dag po'i sems kyis brlab par gyis
698a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dab rgyad pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la// brtan nas spang cing mos byed de// mtha' rnams bral ba'i byang chub sems// mi rtog mi gnas nam mkha' nyid// chos rnams de 'drar mos pa dang // mthong sgom lam la gnas pa dang //
698b1(rgyud 'grel): mthar phyin thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// dam bcas yid kyis brtan par bya// rgyun yang de bzhin bstun par gsungs// de yi yon tan dpe rnams kyi// nges par mtshon pa bzhi ru bshud// brtun pa'i byang chub sems bskyed// /
698b2(rgyud 'grel): ma rig bzhi dang bcas pa'i sems// skad cig rgyun gyi las nyon mongs// mthun par snang ba'i bltos pa'i chos// rmi lam bzhin du nyams thag rnams// dran pa'i snying rje gdung sems kyi// khung pa'i zhing du mngon byas
698b3(rgyud 'grel): pA// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho bzlog pa'i phyir// cho 'phrul las dang sku don rnams// rgyu lci bas grangs mtha' mi rtogs so// mngon 'dod bya ba'i mos pa dag/ brtan par bskyed cing rgyun gnas pa// sems kyis sngon
698b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gnas par bya// thal sbyar gus pa'i lus gnas ste// dang por gsol ba'i tshig bshad bzhi// sngon du btang nas gtam par // dkyil 'khor mchod pa sbyin sreg bsogs// gzhan don grangs ma ji snyed
698b5(rgyud 'grel): pa// tshe 'di gnas tsam+ba mtha thug par// nam yang rgyun tshad ma gyur cig/ thun mongs thabs kyis spyod drug dang // mi mthun 'dul ba'i spyod pa rnams// de bzhin bston par bsgrub pa yis// 'gro mi 'dul med par
698b6(rgyud 'grel): shog/ dam bcas rim pa'i sdom pa rnams// tshigs bshad bzhin du sems kyis bsgrub// don gnyis 'gyur ba'i lus spyod dag/ lus kyi le lo spangs pas byas// don med spyod pa sems kyis gnan//
699a1(rgyud 'grel): snying po bshad dang phan pa'i gtam// ma gtogs rgyun bcad de// le lo spangs pas gsum bsgrub byA// tsa co nam yang ma yin pa// sangs rgyas chos su de bshad do// bsam btan shes rab rab ma dang /
699a2(rgyud 'grel): snying rje sdom pa bsngos pa'i sems// g.yeng dang bying rmugs rnam spangs pas// bsam b+ha brtag par gang dran pa// sangs rgyas chos bzhir 'di bshad do// sgo gsum chud par mos grub pas// rtag tu rang nyams
699a3(rgyud 'grel): slong byed pa// dam chog sdom pa'i gzhir shes bya// sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs thob 'gyur// rgyus par yon tan brjod mi lang // / khung pa'i zhing du g+hu re rnams la// sdug bsngal yin yang mthar
699a4(rgyud 'grel): phan spyod// stong cing mtho sems rab spangs pas// 'khrul pa ji snyed brjod mi lang // 'di 'dra ba yang snod ma smra// rgan po bla ma'i 'du shes byed// phrag dog can la sems ngan med// dpag tshad du ma'i mthar
699a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas bya// man ngag zang zing lan spangs sbyin// 'gron ga nyer rgo sna med dbang du bya// don yod sdig pa dang du byung // ma bsngos 'tsho ba rtags tu sbyang // glags dang 'gran nor dge ba dor// nyams la snying
699a6(rgyud 'grel): rje gtang snyoms spang // don 'gyur phyir ni bdag dge spang // de ni ldog par ma gsungs so// 'dzin spangs pa'i sbyin pa bzhi// 'chang bas sbyin pa bzlog par bya// lus 'dod dum bu'i sems dag gis/
699b1(rgyud 'grel): sprul sku thob phyir sbyin par bya// nyams song log lha sun dbyung phyir// skal ba'i sbyin pas bzlog par bya// bsam gtan ro mchog rlung gnas kyang // theg sman spyod pa do ba med// 'dod pa'i sems kyis grong mi
699b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyer// bzlog pa'i sems kyis grong rgyu ba// chos kyi skyes kyis 'gro bar bya'o// // nad dang sdug bsngal can g.yos byed// tshul khrims bsam spyod lhur mi 'dzin// mnyes dang bral na dag par gsungs//
699b3(rgyud 'grel): brtsod pa'i rtsa ba sems dran dang // rnam smin dran par bzlog par bya// khong khro nyes chen bral 'gyur pa// 'di ldan byang chub sems dpa' med// chos spyod bcu la dam bcas nas// thun mongs zhen pa bzlod/
699b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya// sdug bsngal bsam pa nAm mi 'dor// snod mu bltas la sems mi brtan// de la don 'gyur spang mi bya// phan byed rnams la lan myi glan// mya ngan ci yang gsang bar bya// sgro bskur spongs ste/ yon tan
699b5(rgyud 'grel): brjod// ngan byed mthong ba med smon dang // spos nga ni mthong ba de bzhin ste// smon lam bdag gi zhing du btab// bzang por spyod dang dngos po bzang // mchod rdzas mthong ba ji snyed pa// bdag zhing kun gyis spyod par
699b6(rgyud 'grel): smon// gdug pa sangs rgyas zhing gnas dang // 'gro ba sprul pas don byed dang // byin pa bsam gtan bden rnams dang // bsam rtsis chos kyi bsam pa dang // 'greng ba sems can don bstan dang // dpa'i bdud
700a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi g.yul 'joms dang // thams cad spyod bzhin ma gos dang // srog gcod khro'o 'phrin las dang // 'dod chags mnyam par sbyor ba dang // rku byed dngos grub len pa dang // ri bo rtog pas mi
700a2(rgyud 'grel): phrogs dang // chu rgyun chos spyod rgyun ldan dang // 'bras bu sku dang ye shes dang // me tog rnam grol phung po dang // yul khams rnam dag 'jig rten dang // kha zas ting 'dzin ro mchog dang // skom dang snying rje chu 'thung
700a3(rgyud 'grel): bsogs// khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can la// smon lam yid kyis zin par bya// gzhan phyir bdag kyang de bzhin smon// rtsa ba'i spyod pa gsum bsogs// sems skyed sdom pa blangs nas mthong // nyams
700a4(rgyud 'grel): med bsam pa'i dran pa dang // shes bzhin lta bas brtag dngos ste// gang zhig sngon goms dbang nyams pa// 'gyod dang bcas pas sor gzhug bya// yi ge la sogs bzo mtha' rnamaso// rtsol bas rgyun tu 'jug byed pa// /
700a5(rgyud 'grel): goms te smra bar ma gyur pa'i// dngos sde gang yang yod ma yin// spyod lam rnam gsum dran bya ba// byang chub sems dpa'i ming thob ste// de ni ldog par mi 'gyur ro// dper na phyug po nor sdod pa// med par gyur pa sor 'jug
700a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// spyod pa mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor pas// zhig pa bzhin du mi gonas te// gzhi 'am 'on to gzhan dag gam// dbang por gyur pa'i rten dag la// sngon du maN+Dal mchod sbyar nas// me tog phyag 'tshal lus gus pas// 'gyod
700b1(rgyud 'grel): sems dngos po gang gis bshags// de bzhin slar yang blang bar bya// bdag dang dngos po 'bras bu rnams// mi dmigs sems kyi bshags bya bar// de ni nyes par mu gsungs so// 'di ni shin tu gsang ba'i chos// bdag gzhan
700b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ka'i don 'gyur phyir// sdom pa rnam grangs 'phel mi bya// 'dod pa sbyin pa'ang de bzhin no// thun mong rab tu zhen pa bzlog pa dang // bslab pa mthar chub de las grol ba'i phyir// las mtha' sems bskyed cho ga mdor bshad
700b3(rgyud 'grel): bas// 'gro ba mtha' dog byang chub sems ldan shog// se myos skyed pa'i tshig mdor bshad pa rdzogs so// // / rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// de ltar ston pa mchod byas nas// lam gyi rnal 'byor rnams don phyir//
700b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud gsum nges par gsol byed cing // dam tshig chen po mdor bshad pa// lam gyi rgyud la zhugs pa rnams// bslab pa gsum la gnas byas nas// don gnyis mngon du byed pa yang // nang ris la la mun snang phyir// gcig
700b5(rgyud 'grel): gis 'thad pa ma yin la// la lo cha mthun spyad pa'i rigs// gdul bya skabs kyis rim spyod pa// sangs rgyas mdzad pa 'di gsungs so// / gnyer 'di lung gis lus bzhag nas// ngo b+ho rnam grangs bsrungs thabs dang // nyams//
700b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyu lnga rtags skyon yon gnyis// bskang thabs dpe dang mdo bcur bcang // ngo bo rtsa ba bzhi dang ni// thun min thun mong yan lag gnyis// rtsa ba chen po mdor 'brel lo// dam tshig rnam pa'i grangs dag ni// sems can grangs/
701a1(rgyud 'grel): dang log rtog grangs// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi mkhyen phyir// rtog 'dul gnyen po dam tshig grangs// rgyal ba nyid kyis rdzogs pa las// 'on kyang rmongs la mdor gzung ba// byang sems rnams gnyis
701a2(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon drug/ mched bzhi sngags gsum phyag rgya bzhi'i// gsang bcu rtsi bar shes par bya// spyad pa lnga dang mi spang lnga// dang du blang dang bsgrub de bzhin// shes bya lnga rnams thun min bshad// yan lag skabs su shes par bya/
701a3(rgyud 'grel): thun mong dam tshig mdor bshad pa// mdor bsdus bdag gzhan don gnyis so// rnam grangs skabs su shes par bya// bsrung ba'i thabs ni 'di lta ste// rang lus rgyal po'i phyag rgya che// sems can khams kyang der shes shing // snang
701a4(rgyud 'grel): stong gnyis med ye shes sku// byas mthong zos pa thams cad la// sems phyir gang yang byas snang med// dran dang shes bzhin mngon bstang la// dus gsum rgyun du ma dran na// theg chen bsngags par ci zhig tshud// lha spyod dam
701a5(rgyud 'grel): tshig 'brel pa yi// spyi dang 'dren dang dam tshig dbang // nyams chag skong dang shes rgyud 'grol// man ngag lung gi slob dpon rnams// lus la dbang ba'i rgyal po dang // khu bo ma dang pha dang mig/ snying bas lhag pa'i tshul
701a6(rgyud 'grel): ltas te// sgo gsum zol rgyu med pa ni// yi dam lha ltar rgyun du bsam// bsrung rim 'chang bzhin shes par bya// mtha' yas sems can rang rig phyir// gang yang bdag las gzhan min dang // bde gshegs snying po
701b1(rgyud 'grel): yun ring phyir// / ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rang bzhin yin// spyi yi mchod de pha tshan bzhi// sangs rgyas chos zhugs ring ba dang // lta spyod mthun pas nye bar bshad// pha cig dam tshig nang 'dres pa// zhang tshan pha spun spun pas
701b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang // lhag par bltas te srung ba ni// lus kyi zas nor monyes bya ba// sbur ma lta bur 'phangs pa med// gtan bting khur sogs las bya ba// bran bzhin nges par dang du blang // bla ma'i rigs 'khor de bzhin du// nor
701b3(rgyud 'grel): zas blangs pa rnam smin+da phyir// til phub tsam yang mi 'dag cing // mal gos chags sogs 'gong mi bya// mchod rten bshig dang 'dra por gsungs// brdeg bsad sku 'phrog spyod pa ni// spos su bya ba ci smos kyi//
701b4(rgyud 'grel): rtsed me lus su bya ba mino// bdag gis skyon sras yon tan bsgrags// tshul brjod pa ni nyams par 'gyur// bskyon bskur la sogs mtshan nyid drug/ bre mo gtam du zur mi bya'o// yid kyis ge yo rgyu phrag dog dang //
701b5(rgyud 'grel): mngan sems dpya sems nor la brkam// se gol yun du'ang bya ba min// shin du gdung zhing brtse bar bya// spyod lam cis kyang mnyes byed cing // dka' yi zur yang mI bcag pa// de ni sdig par ma gsungs so// /
701b6(rgyud 'grel): tsa ba skyed dang las sngags kyis// dam tshig las dang chos dang ni// sku nyid phyag rgya chen po bzhi// rang gis sgo gsum yi dam gyi// sku gsung thugs su mngon sbyar la// rtag tu bzlas pa byed pa ni// byang
702a1(rgyud 'grel): chub gzung la zhugs pa ni// rab kyis chu bo'i rgyun bzhin nas// nyin gsum tshan gsum nyin cig du// ma spangs pa yi ngag gis bzlas// 'bring gi zla gcig dus drug du// dus bzhi'i bar du mi
702a2(rgyud 'grel): bcad cing // pha ma bya ba'i rnal 'byor pas// zla re rAm ra ba'i dus dag du// brtson pas 'bad de mi phyed pa// byang chub sa bon brlag pa yin// tshogs dang gtor ma de bzhin te// tha ma lo zla mi zla'o// lha zab spyod pa glang po
702a3(rgyud 'grel): dang / lha mi gzungs dang grub pa rtogs rnams// spyi gsang rnam pa bzhir bshad do// bsgrub pa gnos dus grogs dang rdzas// rab tu gsang la bsgrub par bya// gsang bar 'os la mdor spu na/ phud dang ga tor ma tshogs
702a4(rgyud 'grel): ngag dang // ban+d+ha phur pa mar mo snod// rdzas dang lag tshe dkyil 'khor rnams// skye bos mthong bar yod mi bya// dril bu rnga chung la sogs sgra// skye bos thos par yong mi gdungs// grogs po spyod dang mtshangs rnams dang // sems
702a5(rgyud 'grel): can kun kyang ni ngan spyod dang // kun la gnod pa'i spyod pa rnams// shin tu gsang na byang chub rgyu// gnyer gtad pa ni gdam ngag ste// sngar bshad slob dpon rnams kyis so// gsang sngagaso skyon yod ma yin skye// sems
702a6(rgyud 'grel): can don phyir rab tu gsang // gsang thub dngos grub mi yal bas// shin tu gsangs na byang chub rgyu// gsang phyir gdam ngag sna tshogs gsungs// dam nyams dam las log pa dang // dam med dkyil 'khor
702b1(rgyud 'grel): ma mthong zhing // 'dres dang ma 'dres thams cad la// sems kyis brtan par mi bsam zhing // las kyis thams cad sbas la spyang // ngag gi rdo rje rtse yod kyang // brjod pa dag tu bya ba min// de dag rtsa ba bzhir bshad do//
702b2(rgyud 'grel): thun+ta mr-in yan lag bshad bya ba// sbyor sgrol ma yin len pA dang // rdzun sgra dag brlang dpyad pa lnga// rang bzhin gyi nI sbyor sgrol dang // dbang po yul gyi sbyor sgrol dang // ting nge 'dzini g+hi sbyor sgrol dang // mngon du phyung
702b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sbyor sgrol lnga'o// gnyis ni shes bya thun min bshad// ting 'dzin bslab pa thun mong gsungs// mngon phyung dam tshig chen po la// byed pa'i tshig lngar shes par bya// lha spyod ting 'dzin 'brel goms pas// dkon
702b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog slob dpon sku dgra gnyis// daum+b+ha nyams log dang 'khus pa dang // 'dus par 'ongs dang yongs la gnod// dam dgra dran po'i ngang tshul can// ngan srong gsum dang bcu po ni// rnal 'byor kun gyis dang du
702b5(rgyud 'grel): blang // grangs kyis rtsu ba bcu bzhi'o// ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgyu rnams// shin tu goms pas dbang bsgyur ro// byang chub zhing du dgod par bya// ting 'dzin sngags rgyas bag chags sbyangs// rnam shes lhur bskyed/
702b6(rgyud 'grel): 'og mon 'phang // ye shes tshogs byang rdzogs par 'gyur// phung po byin brlabs mchod par bsgo/ bsod nams mchog du 'das 'gyur ro// / de ltar bsgral ba'i dgos tshod kyang // byang chub sems/
703a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phel sems can pado// sgyu mAny+tsas bdag gis dam bya skongs shing // lasna ngan byar chad skyug yun phung // rang gis bsags med ngan spyong+tha las// bde lAm 'di las gzhan med do// thabs kyi spyod
703a2(rgyud 'grel): pas 'ching 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dang 'dul dbang gis// sngon dang spyad 'tshong ston yang lhung // khe dang spyod pas de ma ni phyir// thabs chen lam la gnas pa yi// skye bo kun gyis bya bar 'byung // 'ga' na'i dam tshig
703a3(rgyud 'grel): chen po ni// log chags yid 'ongs spangs pa yis// don gnyis mngon du byed pa yi// bid can dung tsan ri mo can// bon glang can dang lcug phran can// sdong cig mo reg phyal ba brgyad// mnyin drang ske ring sted smad phyed
703a4(rgyud 'grel): yan lag 'phra 'jam tshogs dmig zlum// dpral ba'i dbyes tshe smin khyugs ring // dmig phra dkyil nAs ut+pal mdog// chu zheng gnyis ka 'bring du bshad// lus dang chu klung ga bur dri// gsang thub shes rab spyod po
703a5(rgyud 'grel): dal// dad ldan 'grogs shing dang che ba// gsang ba'i gaunas su spyad par bya// dbang bskur dam tshig chos gsum bshad// lus la rigs lnga'i rdul tshon dgye// thabs la mkhas pas skabs kyis sbyar// de ma tshig
703a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam grangs bcu gnyis kyi// dngos grub yon tan bsam mi khyab// slob bu smin cing las rnams 'grub// skye gnas ngan 'gro ris drug nges// thabs kyi theg pa 'di bshad do// mtshan nyid chad dang rnam grangs dang /
703b1(rgyud 'grel): ltos pa'i kun rtags rnam pa gsum// dngos po de nyid la rdzun shes// thams cad rang rig snang phyir bden// / shes nas kun sgra skyes bu'i yul// dkon mchog gsum drang slob dpon mched// sems can gnod
703b2(rgyud 'grel): par 'ongs pa la// rdzun du smra ba'i dam tshig bya// gang la gsang bar bya ba rnams// gsang bcu las 'di rdzun bcu sku// bsrung ba bcu bdun nyams su blang // zhing bcur gyur pa'i nor bcu dang // mtshan ldan gzungs dang bkra
703b3(rgyud 'grel): shis rdzas// sras chos 'phel 'chang byin tsan rdzas// bsrung ba yod dam med pa'i nor// phyug po ser snas bcings pa'i nor// ming gis blangs la tshogs su bsngo// dam tshig bcu bdun spyad par bya// zhing bcur gyur
703b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems can la// bslang tshig bcu yo zhe bcad cing // drag shul spyod pa sngags dag dang // gzungs la glang por sbyor ba'i tshig/ slob bu snod bcos zhes gcod dang // 'byung po zhi gcod rdu mo pa'i sgra// snod ldan
703b5(rgyud 'grel): bu la rngam chos bshad// ngag gi dam tshig bcwo lnga bsrung // mu~M spang dam tshig bshad par bya// yang dag dug lnga log dugA lU// bshad pa'i thabs mkhas 'dod chags dang / 'dod spyod sems kyi rgyun shes nas
703b6(rgyud 'grel): shin tu zhen pa lam du gsungs// zhing bcu rlag byed zhe sdang mchog/ lha ngan 'joms pa de bzhin te// thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa yin// mngon par mtho ba'i lta ba dang // ting 'dzin nges par sran tshugs pa//
704a1(rgyud 'grel): shin tu rgyas pa'i mchog tu gsungs// lta bas phyogs ris mi phyed dang // spyod pa blang dor mi byed pa// theg pa chen po'i gti mug go// lta spyod sman la phrag dog cing // dam 'dres la sogs spong
704a2(rgyud 'grel): byed pa/ phrag dog dam tshig bsrung ba'o// ldog drug sems can kun ldan pa// dug l-I rang rig rong snang phyir// dran pa thams cad shes pa la// shes pa thams cad rtsol ba yin// rtsol ba sems phyir thabs mkhas/
704a3(rgyud 'grel): pau// thabs mkhas rang rig ye shes te// nyi ma'i dkyil nu mun med ltar// ye shes rang snang ma rtog pa// nyon mongs 'khor ba dang gis med// de shes rang rig ye shes la// spang bar bya ba dmigs mi 'gyur// dam/
704a4(rgyud 'grel): tshig bco lnga la gnas pa'i// rnal 'byor chen po don gnyis rdzogs// kun gyis blang ba'i dam tshig lnga// dri tshan dri chu mAM sa dang // tshul ma lhag pa'i sems rnams la// grub pa bzhi yis rgyan pa'i phyir// nad lnga
704a5(rgyud 'grel): bsal phyir blang ba dang // gtsang dom rtog sbyang phyir blang dang // thun mong dgos pa lnga phyir dang // rigs lnga 'grub pa'i yon tan nI// sdug bsngal 'grub pa'i yon tan ni// bcud lnga btung dbang la mo gyi mchog/
704a6(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi lus la brten shes na// yo/ tan brjod las 'das pas gsungs// phye ba'i dam tshig sum cu nyid// skabs kyis dang du blang bar bya// bsgrub par bya ba lnga rnams la// rigs dang ye shes
704b1(rgyud 'grel): yang yum lnga// gcig lnga lngar shes par bya// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// gcig kyang lnga lngar phye bas na// bzhi bcu lnga yi bye brag rnams// mtshan nyid shes nas bsgrub par bya'o// shes pa lnga la bye brag dang //
704b2(rgyud 'grel): phung po lnga dang 'byung bya lnga// dbang po yul dang yan lag sor// nyon mongs dam rdzas shra dang ni// phyogs dang kha dog 'gro ba dang // snyigs pa bag chags lnga lnga po// bdun bcu la sogs 'khor ba'i tshe sau// ye shes/
704b3(rgyud 'grel): sku rigs yeb yum sogs// rang bzhin dang gis kar dag pa// blo la nyams su ljon pa ni// spyod yul yongs dag rnal 'byor pa'o// // thun med dam tshige me dor bsdus na// bdag gzhan don tu shes par bya//
704b4(rgyud 'grel): rkye na 'gyes lus mdzes 'dus lha dang // chang dang dregs spyod khang sems dang // rdo rje gsum pog phyag byed dang // che ngag dge smod sdig stong dang // le lo ser sna snying gnyer dang // khro btum shes bzhin sngon mi
704b5(rgyud 'grel): gtong // bka' gcog sdig pa'i grogs bsten dang // bag medo spyod dang dam bca' 'dor// chog mi shis dong ngom la dga'// spang bya nyi shu gcig bzlog pa// bdag don mchog du gyur pa ste// kun gyis bdag
704b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid khur bar 'gyur// / pha rol phyin drug chos spyod bcu// rnam bzhi las kyi spyod pa dang // mthun 'jug thabs kyis spyod pa ni// theg pa chu dang mu stegs chu// 'gro ba drug gi spyod pa rnams// 'dzin dang
705a1(rgyud 'grel): nyam nga med par spyod// don 'gyur ci yang nyams su blang // bzhi bcu bzhi la sogs pa yis// gdul bya ma lus dor mi bya// bsrung bya de dag grangs bAr+Na ba la// dran dang shes bzhin gyis sdod pa//
705a2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen por gsungs// // nyams par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dag ni// mi chos blun po'i lasu byed dang // bdag stong gzhan smod zur 'dzon mkhas// khe drags nyid kyis 'du ste brnab// rdzasA la chags sems
705a3(rgyud 'grel): rang phyogs che// chang dang rang mthong lta spyod bsnyems// chos la phyogs ris ngoms rkyen dang // gsang chung le lo gtsang dam che// sgro bskur grogs kyi nyams len dang // 'khor ba'i rigs rgyud spel 'dod cing // gcig pur
705a4(rgyud 'grel): mi gnas 'dul dga'// nyi shu nyams pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// sngo rtags sngon du 'byung ba ni// nyam nga po yi nad rnams dang // dgra bgegs gnyin la bden mi 'jug/ 'khor dang longs spyod yid 'ong bral// ya kha ma nyes
705a5(rgyud 'grel): kha yogs 'byung // brtsams pa'i las la 'bras med cing // yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs 'byung // gal te nyams la rtags med par// legs par snang na mI rung ste// badre ba zad byas gtan du sdug/ gal te ma nyams
705a6(rgyud 'grel): rtags byung na// sngon gyi rnam smin zad 'gyur phyir// skang so'i las la brtson byas na// ngan song sdug bsngal myang mi 'gyur// / nyams par gyur pa'i skyon rnams ni/ byang sems dam tshig spangs par 'gyur//
705b1(rgyud 'grel): skal bar dge ba ci bsags kyang // bzhi rten med par 'gyur ba yin// 'khor ba'i khams su zag par 'gyur// sku yi dam tshig nyams 'gyur na/ ya nga'i nad stsogs sdug bsngal che// dus min tshe zad bar chad mang // skal bar
705b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dmyal bar ltung // bde bas rab tu 'brel par 'gyur// gsung gi dam tshig nyamasna 'gyur na// bgegs rnams thogs med 'ong ba dang // rkyen dang ye 'drog mang ba dang // chos la byin rlabs med 'gyur zhing // skal pa gnyis/
705b3(rgyud 'grel): su dmyal bar ltung // bsgrub pa'i thabs las 'gyangs par 'gyur// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyur na// smyo 'bog dbang po nyams dang chas// myos shing lkugs pa'i gnas su 'gyur/ gang yang bsgrubs pa rtags
705b4(rgyud 'grel): med tsong // lce lo zhing rmod la sogs pa'i// dmyal bar skal pa gsum du gnas// rtsa ba kun nyams phyal ba dag/ gso la nye bar mi brtson na// rdo rje dmyal bar de ltung ste// dmyal ba phal pa thams cad kyi// sdug bsngal
705b5(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu bsdoms pas ni// de yis 'bum gyis char mi phod// sangs rgyas stong gi 'od zer dang // byang chub sems dpa'i 'phrin las kun// rgyun tu mdzad kyang phan mi 'gyur// bskul pa ther 'bum la sogs su//
705b6(rgyud 'grel): de ni mthon par mi 'gyur te// 'jig rten 'jig na gzhan du 'pho// se gol gcig gis phyin par byed// de bas shin tu nan tan gyis// yan lag dam tshig nyams 'gyur na/ longs spyod mang du 'phel med dang /
706a1(rgyud 'grel): theg pa che la 'phyas 'dogs shing // thun mong mchog gi dngos grub rnams// shin tu rnying bar gyur pa dang // kadul bya'i don rnams yul bar 'gyur// lha spyod ya chur gyur pa yis// theg pa bya
706a2(rgyud 'grel): nang 'dres pa nyid// bka' yi byin nyams grub par dka'// bsrung ba'i lha rnams g.yel ba dang // zab mo'i chos las ring 'gyur zhing // skal par ngan song sdug bsngal myong // rnol 'byor sngo skams nyid du 'gyur//
706a3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor skyes bu chen po des// dam tshig ma nyams gzhung thub na// lus la nad nyung mtshan ldan zhing // 'khor dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang // thun mongs nyes byas dag 'gyur dang // srid pa gsum la dbang gyur zhing //
706a4(rgyud 'grel): theg tshon zab mo don thob 'gyur// gsung gis lha mnyes drin thob 'gyur// mthu dang byin rlabs bsas mi khyabA// las rnams dus su 'byung bar 'gyur// bsam pa thams cad yongs su 'grub// thugs kyis
706a5(rgyud 'grel): skyo du ba med pa dang // man ngag snod 'grub dngos grub nye// dgongs zab don la mkhas po dang // lha rnams kun gyis dbang skur 'gyur// yan lag dam tshig ma nyams na// rnal 'byor sgyus bu chen po yis//
706a6(rgyud 'grel): skyon bzlog pa nyid yon tan ste// bdud bzhi 'joms shing ngan song skyong // theg chen lta spyod gzhung srong bas// lha rnams 'gro zhing bsam pa 'grub// don gnyis yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// theg chen
706b1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig la gnas shing // 'og ma'i 'dul sdom dam tshig gsum// bsgyangs pa med par thub pas na// dge slong byang chub sems dpa' dang // de ni rnal 'byor chen po yin// nyams na bskang ba'i thabs rnams ni//
706b2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems kyi dum nyams na// mkhas la blangs te gnas par bya'o// sku yi dam tshig nyams 'gyur na// gang la nyams pa der slong la// nor zas 'byor pa mnyes phul nas// gang nyes tshigs du bshags
706b3(rgyud 'grel): byas la// phyin chad sdom pa legs par bci'o// gal te grongs chad gyur pas na// de yi slob dpon bzhugs pa la// de tshe gong ma bzhin du bshags// med na mnyam pa brgya la bshags// de yang snyed par ma gyur/
706b4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ de dang ma nyams pa gsum bkug la// sbyin sreg ma thab rab brtsigs la// dkyil 'khor lha la mchod rjes su// spyan drangs gsang mtshan la sogs mchod // gong du smos pa'i yon rnams ni// dbang po
706b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum la dbul bar bya'o// gal te gus pas mi len na// gnyis ka rdo rje dmyal bar lhung // de bas myur du tshangs par bya// gsung gi dam tshig nyams 'gyur na// sgo gsum sku gsung thugs nyid du// nges par
706b6(rgyud 'grel): shes na skyongs par 'gyur// bslab pa bldab kyis bsab pa dang // bsgrub po chen po gsum gyis bskang // thugs kyo dam tshig nyams 'gyur na// 'gro drug sems sa gsal rtogs na// bdag nyid bdag la
707a1(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba med// mi rtog ting 'dzin klong zhugs te// ma yengs blo la 'dris par bya// yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur nA/ gang 'das de nyid sor bcug la// brgya rtsa brgyad kyis tshogs kyis bskung //
707a2(rgyud 'grel): de ltar nyam su blangs na 'grub// sgra rtags sdug bsngal 'byung mi 'gyur// / dam tshig chen po'i dpe bstan pa// sna bzhi lta bu'i rang bzhin pas// las dang 'bras bu'i chos rnams kun/ dam tshig med pa
707a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba srid// so mtshams dag gi rang bzhin pas// bsrung ba thub dang ma thub las// nyes legs stobs chen 'byed pa'o// rin chen lta bu'i rang bzhin pas// dngos 'grub dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung // ma mkha/
707a4(rgyud 'grel): lta bu'i rang bzhin pas// 'di yod thams cad shor bar 'gyur// rno rdal mtshon gyi rang bzhin pas// 'khor ba'i dro ba ma lus gcod// phra ma lta bu'i rang bzhin pas// dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus bskyang // rgya mtsho/
707a5(rgyud 'grel): lte bu'i rlung bzhin pas// brlabs chen dus smra 'byung bar byed// mu~M dpya wA bu rang bzhin pas// gang mchongs thams cad 'tshig par byed// dri bzhin rtsi sman rang bzhin pas// 'khor bya'i gcong rnying mo lhas 'byin/
707a6(rgyud 'grel): la po lta bu'i rang bzhin pas// phyogs 'ge' bsnyen pos rim gyis 'tsho// rgya mtshor nor len tshong dpon bzhin// thog ma nas mthong 'di phyin pas// 'di la shin tu nan tan byos// / dam chog pa
707b1(rgyud 'grel): tshig zhes bya ba// gu na yod pa ma yin+d+ra ste// rang gi sems nyid dam tshig yin// ji snyed snang ba'i chos rnams su// rang rig rkyen 'brasdu nyid snad pas// cir snang cir srid rang rig nyid// 'gre log spyi gtsug grwar
707b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro yang / snying po'i don las 'dra' mi srid// rang bzhin dam tshig chen por bshad// rang bzhin lhun grub dam+b+ha tshig la// rig pas phyin ci ma log na// sngon snying rtags pa'i chos med pas// lta bo'i dam tshig
707b3(rgyud 'grel): chen por bshad// de don blo la 'dris pa yis// spyod lam kun tu ma nyams par// ting 'dzin rgyun gyi dam tshig ste// sangs rgyas ny-id dang spyod yul cig/ 'di la bsrungs pa ci yang med// nyams bya rdul tsam
707b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung mi srid// nam mkha' spyod la 'dzin med pas// lhag pa'i dam tshig rnam bzhir ldan// srung g+hu lus 'dir 'dus phyir// dam tshig kun gyi mdo zhes bya// // sgyu 'phrul rnam bkod gtor tshogs rgya
707b5(rgyud 'grel): mtsho'i rgyud rkyen las// lam 'bras snying po me lcong bcu gcig gi skye mtshon pa// 'khor l-i ngag m+bu chu'i tshul gyis bsgrags pa'i blos bsdus pa'i// dge rtswaso kun kyang dum gnas 'gro kun byang chub myur thob
707b6(rgyud 'grel): shog/ dam tshig gsal bkra zhes bya ba// slob dpon chen po sgeg pa rdo rjes mdzad pa'o rdzogs so// // bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// rang gi lha la phyag btsal nas// lam bzhi dag
708a1(rgyud 'grel): yod bya ba'i phyir// las snod skal bas gnas gyur pa// dam chag phrag rgyus gsungs pa de// thun mong mchog gi srung bya rnams// rnal 'byor cha la gnas pa yi// bdag dang gzhan dang chos
708a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis phyir// gzhung tshul srung po 'di ma bye// snga ma srung bar bya ba ni// mtha' yas gsungs pa mdo tsam du// nges 'byung bzhi yis gzhi rnams dang // dka' thub 'dzin med sems kyis srung // gzhi phyir gzhan yang lus
708a3(rgyud 'grel): ngag gi/ brgyan po 'gyed rnams dor ba dang // mtshon thogs 'phong rtseng mchod rgyug dang // ma rabs thor bu'i spyod kun dor// ngag gi bzhi dang grol dag rnams// nam yang smra bar bya ba min// nyon mongs drug dang
708a4(rgyud 'grel): byi rgong bsogs// skyon sems bye brag bsam mi khyab// gang dag don med de ldan pa// kha na ma tho 'phel ba dang // skye bo'i gnas su mi 'gyur bas// 'khor ba'i mtha' mar srung thag yan// byang chub ched phyi
708a5(rgyud 'grel): gang yang spyad// de dag las sdug spyod pa gsum// snyoms kyis zin par gang spyod pa// sangs rgyas sku gsung zad por 'gyur// phyi ma rtsu ba yan lagyu pas// lnga bcu'i brgyu dang drug cu dang // nyos bad+ma'i slang byam
708a6(rgyud 'grel): lus pa// bko' lung gnyis kyi rjes su snyegs// ban ci nyid lag zhes bya ba'ang // dang po nyid nas thabs spyod dang // shes rab nyid kyis nyis 'gyur yin// de des srung bya bcu gsum ste// byang chub sems ni blo mang
708b1(rgyud 'grel): lha// zhing khro'i lha dgu nyid dang bcu// bcu gnyis bsam las ma 'da' zhing // thun mong mchog gis tshad med pa// bden gnyis byang chub rnam pa bcu// bla med gsal bas nyams mi bya// lha spangs dge spyang don
708b2(rgyud 'grel): meng 'gyur// bdag nyid lha dang mnyam sbyor na// yon tan chung yang 'grub par 'gyur// de phyir dus gsum 'da' mi bya// bla ma bskur ba'ang sgo gsum gyis// lus kyi srung ba'ang bdeg sogs las// thing klang
708b3(rgyud 'grel): rtswa mdu'ang bya ba min// 'dod yon lnga yi mchod pa dang // gsang ba'i snod du dug mi spyod// 'gro ba grang po'i phyogs spang dang // gdan sa gdan sogs mi brlam dang // 'greng 'dug ngan spyod la sogs spang // rgyan 'dogs/
708b4(rgyud 'grel): ze ldi de bzhin ste// ma rabs spyod pa kun spangs la/ spyod lum zin tshogs ste gnas bye// rdzun dang phyi ma dag rtsu ba dang // 'khyal pa nAm yang mi bya ste// be phogs ma yin brda skong dor// lkog du tshul brjod
708b5(rgyud 'grel): nyams par 'gyur// yon tan brjod cing snyan par smra// ca co lnga sogs ma yin pa// sangs rgyas rdo rje gsung thob 'gyur// dam pa ston pa'i bla mau la// chags sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang // phra dogs drug
708b6(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i sems mi bya// ngan du mi sems lci bar sems// pha ma yi dam 'ang bar bsam// rtag tu gdung ba rgyun mi bcang // byang chub gzungs la zhugs pa yin// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi bcang // zhi khro
709a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bdun gnyis cig/ phyogs bcing rten dang khang pa'i sngags// rtsa bskyed las rnams bzhi yi sngags// dbang bskur byin bsdu gsang sngags dang // spyan drang stim bstan phyag 'tshal mchod
709a2(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum rgyun du gzhi yin phyir// nam yang rgyun bcad spang mi bya// yang dag lam du zhugs pa'i grogs// snum pa mA yin slang mi bya// zla ze rI ma yin+d+ra gzungs mi spyad// lta spyod mtho ba'i gong mau bcang // dbang dang
709a3(rgyud 'grel): du mi tshig dI ba zhin+na ste// kun tu yangs bag zon phrig can// skurarA stis mchod byed dga' bar spyod// rdzun sogs rnam bzhi spang ba dang // bya ba mi smra tshulI brjod// stun+ma smr-i zhes pa gsong por smra// bden tshig sri zhu'i sgra
709a4(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'o// sems kyi sngon bzhin dug lnga dor// madran sgyu sems mi spang ba dang // mig 'drar lta zhing gdung bar bya// gnod sems spang dang rnam bcu'o// gsang ba'i phyir ni mI smra ba// spyi dang bar gsang bzhi bzhi dang //
709a5(rgyud 'grel): 'os dang gnyer gtang+ga rnam pa bcu// sems kyis brtan par mi bsam zhing // ngag gis brjod par yong mo bya// lus brdas brtan man sum cu'o// yan lAgau dam tshig lnga gnyis la// cig la bcu phrag gnyis
709a6(rgyud 'grel): su dbye// dang du blang ba'i dam bsgrub rdzas// bsgrub rdzas lnga yang rtsa ba brgyad // brgyad cha re zhing dang snyigs lnga// re re'ang rnam par bcu ru 'gyur// zhing bcu'i bdud rtsi'i de bzhin pas// rnam par dbye ba nyi shu
709b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gzhan rang bzhin zhi dang gnyis// rdzas bcu thabs spyod shes rab spyod// bcu bcus nyi shur 'gyur ba 'dra rigs// mi spang lnga la bcu gnyis te// zhing bcu thabs kyi mdzad pas 'joms// shes rab rlung bzhin med par
709b2(rgyud 'grel): grol+la// thabs dang shes rab zhe sdang gis// bdag gzhan don+da rnams rdzogs par byed// yan lag bcu yi dam tshig la// thabs kyi mdzad pa mi 'byed cing // shes rab gnyis meng+ga mi 'byed pa'i// gti mug bcu
709b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis 'dra' mi bya// de ltar thabs dang shes rab bran+du// gnyis ni sdeng du gyur po yi// lhag pa'i nga rgyal mi 'da' ba// nga rgyal chen po'i dam tshog go// zhing bcu thugs rjes mi stong pa// rig+sa sna lnga'i yum
709b4(rgyud 'grel): la thabs kyis rolo// ting 'dzin thabs dbang rang bzhin sbyar// shesta reb don dang 'du 'a bral med// mya rtogs gnyis dang log rtogs gnyis// nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems// gsang sngags phyi yi TIg
709b5(rgyud 'grel): g+ha sum// gsung skor mdzad pasna mi chud cing // shes rab don pas mI chud pa// phra dog chen po'i dam tshig go// de ltar sum brgya drug cu rnams// bdag gi rdo rje mcho go gsum po s+ya// log par myi stod sdom pa'i
709b6(rgyud 'grel): dngos// sa gzhi lta bur srung ba yin// rgyas 'bring stong rtsa brgyad dang ni// saM ya 'bum sde bdag gzhan phyir// srung ba'i rgyang dag las grags pa// gsum gyi srung ba sngon bzhin no// dam tshig 'di ni rdo rje che// sku gsung
710a1(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag// 'grub 'gyur 'dir bde rtag pa yis// dbang phyug chen po nyid du 'gyur// byin rlabs gsum gyis mdzad pa dang // nye 'du las byed rtag du srung // yid 'ong gter 'dod
710a2(rgyud 'grel): bsam 'grub cing // phun sum tshogs yon rgyud las 'byung // myong la dam tshig rdo rje chu// bzhag cing go bas bsgrags byas na/ rgyud lnga tha tshigs gral 'gyur na// rag sha yag shar gyur nas kyang / bsad nasA dmyal
710a3(rgyud 'grel): ba chen por rgyud// de yI sdug bsngal bzod glegs chad// swa ma ya'i tAn+ta las// nyes gsum thos pa 'dra nyam ngan// 'di phyis mthong myong smos ci dgos// de bas rgyun du mdo bshags bsngo// gang dgra sa gzhi med
710a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dag/ tshul 'chos phyir ni yon tan brjod// nye ste sgra rdo rje'i dam ldan mi na// lhag par bdag ldan smos phyir ro// rnal 'byor lam mtha phyin bya zhing // bdagA gzhan drin phyir phra rgyus bsdus// ngal ba'i dge rtsa gang yod
710a5(rgyud 'grel): pas// mtha' yas rdo rje gsum rdzob shog/ dam tshig phra rgyas bstan pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tsho lo lo// gtan tshigs gnyis rjes rims 'brings nas// rang nyams goms

710b1(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba la// rang bzhin thugs rje chen po dang // lhag pa gzugs brnyan gsum du bshad// ting 'dzin lhag pa'i longs spyod nang // khams bzhi'i khams ni gsang bar bshad// rang rig ye shes rgyal po yis// phyogs
710b2(rgyud 'grel): bcu ma lus rgyas btab bas// mi dmigs mi dmigs dmigs su med// thams tsAd rung rig khro bor gsal// dmigs med nyid lnga dbang sgyur ba// ji ltar snang ba de ltar snang // thabs dang shes rab ldan pa l-i//
710b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma'i spros pa dang gis med// na mkha'i mkha' dkyil dang ba yis// yid bzhin tshogs rnams kun byung ba// sna tshogs 'byung zhing 'od 'phro 'bar// thugs rje'i byin rlabs rmad po che// 'gro ba sna tshogs

711a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs khams gsum sbyangs// rab rib dag pa'i rang rigs gis// sku gsum rang bzhin mthong dbang sgyur// goms pas bzhi 'joms dran song spyod// ting 'dzin las kyis mchog tu bshad//

711b1(rgyud 'grel): mnyes pa'i dgyel pa yi sna// phyogs bcu kun tu khyab par 'gyur// mtshan ma rnam rtog kun+da sbyong zhing // rtogs dka'i ye shes mngon du 'gyur// khams gsum bcwo brgyad bdag nyid de/ ma lus rtsa bar 'di shes
711b2(rgyud 'grel): bya// gsal ldan ma 'am byin rlabs la// las bzhi'i dbyibs ldan ho khung du// las kyi bde ba'i lha bskyed cing // stong gsum nyungs 'brur 'jug tshul du// dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te// nyung 'bru/

712a4(rgyud 'grel): po dbang rtswa mngon spyod pa'o// kha dog las kyis skyer bar byaM// shug pa tsan dan dkar po dang // u dum+ba ra 'o mra'i shing // zhi rgyas yam shing shes par bya// dmar la dri zhim shing rnams dang // dug shing tsher ma can

712a6(rgyud 'grel): byed pa yin// sbyor ba dbang ste ling ka'i rdzas// 'o ma 'bras chan rdul phye dang // me tog dkar po gtor ma zhi// ldong ros dro chan zho dang phrum// me tog gser phye rgyas pa la'o// zangs phye bu ram 'bras
712b1(rgyud 'grel): dmar dang // ram bu pad+ma'i rak+tar sbyar// thams cad gdung pa'i gtor ma yin// dug rnams lcags phya rdo phye dang // ra kyi khrag dang sha chen dang // dur sol mud ka'i chan+da rnams ni// gsod par byed pa'i gtor ma yin//
712b2(rgyud 'grel): mar dA kar tilA dkAr nis dkar tshun// mngar gsum can dan dkar po'i shing // thams cad ye shes bdud rtsis te// tha ma la ye shes me skyed ngo // zho dang maR+Ya snying bu ram 'bras// rgun 'brum sha chen sbyar ka
712b3(rgyud 'grel): dang // dri zhim ser zhing rgyas pa la'o// dan ti shing la shrang tsi dang // dmar po'i shing tshwa dag gis ni// thams cad 'gugs pa'i mchog du gsungs// dug dang tshal chen skye tshe mar// srana? chen khrag sna sna tshogs
712b4(rgyud 'grel): dang // tshor ma ba lang shwa chen bsod // 'bras bu'i don phyir 'tshogs par bya// sa bzhi legs par spyang byas te// dkyil 'kho zlum po rim pa gsum// khru grang sbyangs dang zhed du yin tu zabs da gyen du phyed

713a1(rgyud 'grel): su pad+ma sA zer ti snying ldan// gzhan yang rin chen gnyis dbyibs su// rims pa la sogs rjes su sbyar// zhugs pa ser pos skor bar bya// thams cad 'phel byed dkyil 'khor yin//
713a2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus 'o'abar// ha~M khung zla kham sngangs pa la// rdo rje pad mo 'od 'bar dang // lcags sgrogs gtams pas mdzes par bya// dbus su pad+ma hriM snying ldan// gzhan yang 'odab brgyad de bzhin
713a3(rgyud 'grel): du// tha mau srom shing mdzes pas skor// zhags pa dmar po sdud pa yin// dkyil 'khor gru gsum rtsegs pa la// dur khrod sol bas khyab par bya// rtse gsum rdo rje sdengs pa dang // thod pa lcagasu sku bsnams/
713a4(rgyud 'grel): pas bskor// hUM bcas rdo rje'i rnam pa yin// dbang phyug zhags pa nags po bri// gzhan yang sdang spyan bskrad pa yi// khro zhal shin du 'dzegs pa byi// me dpung 'bur bas rab mdzes pa'i// 'dri ni gsod//
713a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchog tu gsungs// bong chung lus mdzes zla ba'i mdog/ g.yas 'khyil lus la de bzhin shes// skad gsal sngags zlos yid mi s+ho// khro ba spangs pa zhi la sbyar// ba lad ser mo gru bzhi la// rna ba
713a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gram glang ring sha rgyas// yan lag zla mang la mkhas// ngal zhing blo gros ldan pa ni// 'phel ba'i dus su shes par bya// dmar po zla gamo mdzes pa'i zhal// yan lag rgyun nas rnam par spangs//
713b1(rgyud 'grel): thabs mkhas brtson 'grus ldan pa ni// thams cad sdus par byed pa yin// nug mo gru gsum rtsing mgo ma// khro gnyer can la gel bag can+da// gtum zhing brlang tshig 'jom bag med // sngags zlos brtul
713b2(rgyud 'grel): shugs ldan pa ni// tha ma'i dus su 'di shes bya// rang rig sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// thams cad rang dbang sgyur bdag phyir// bsgrub pa'i gtso bor 'di gsungs so// ma lus sems ni mtha' bral phyir//
713b3(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhini rnam dgu mngon byas pas// sems gter rtog togs dkyil 'khor phyir// byin rlabs bsdus 'phel sngon du bsgom// thams cad byangag phyir tha mi dang // shin tu zhen pa nyid kyis 'grub//
713b4(rgyud 'grel): chags pa chen po nyid du bshad// rang bzhin cig phyir rdos med 'jig/ log rtog khros pa'i sems kyis bskul// yang dgu zhe sdang chen poR+Sha gsungs// bdag gzhan gnod pa'i sems dang ni// sbyor
713b5(rgyud 'grel): bu dran pa'i rig sngags las// khams rkyen+da las g+hor snod mang ba// nyon mongs bag chags sdug bsngal rnamaste// thabs phyir cig kyangang+ga dor mi bya// yon+ma tan 'phelnga med nyung ba'i phyir// tshe dang longs
713b6(rgyud 'grel): spyod sgo gsum gyi// yon tan mngon par mi ldan pa'i// 'jig rten pa dang 'das pa yi// yon tan bsdus te bstim pa dang // sems ni rin chen go ter gyi phyir// byin rlabs 'brel pa snang bar 'gyur//
714a1(rgyud 'grel): mos 'dud med pa lus rkyen can// las gsum bdag gzhan don gyi phyir// gsum pa las la sbyar bya zhing // lha yang de bzhin gshegs par bya// zhing bcur gyur pa'i sems can rnams/
714a2(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'i chos 'jig ma rungs pa// dpa' 'os dgos pa yod pa'i phyir// kun la phan pas de bya'o// dngul lam dkor po'i shing rnams la// mgo bro rgyu mdung rtse zlum po// steng 'og logs la khro bcu sgom
714a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phro 'dus bder gshegs phur pa la// sngags dang phyag rgyu sna byin brlabs pas// mtha' skor yan lag gnyis la sbyar// gsIr rAm ser po'i shing rnams la// mgo ba rgya mdud rtse grub bzhi// b+hU noms
714a4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin rin chen khro// zur bzhir gnas pas lus gonas bzhi ro// btab pas yon tan 'du bar 'gyur// zungs sam dmar byor shing rnams la// mgo bo rgyu mdud rtse zur gsum// de bzhin chags pa'i
714a5(rgyud 'grel): phur par shes// zla gam mtha' lnga dbang po sbyar// dwe dag bsgyur te 'dus pAr byA// lcags sam nag po'i shIng rnams la// mgro bo rgya mdu rtse zur gsum// de bzhin rje rje phur brlabs pas// zur gsu
714a6(rgyud 'grel): lus ngag sems la sbyar// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med // las byed nyi shu gcig du'ang gsungs// sbyin dang sreg pa'i gnas gnyis te// sangs rgyas rigs kyi sprul pa'i phyir// las thams cad
714b1(rgyud 'grel): la thogs med 'jug/ sku mdog chu lugs las bzhin shes// d+hU d+he sgom zhugs tri shul 'dzin// rigs kyi phyag rgya gdab par bya// oM tri hI hUM sa bon snying // ug+ni dwe ba zhal bzhi'i sngags// 'od 'phro 'bar byas
714b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bar bsgom// zhal bzhi sbyin pa'i lhar bshad do// gzugs brnyan lta bu'i gzhal yas ni// 'od 'phro 'bar bas khyab par sbyar// rgyal po'i lus mdzes 'khor lo 'chang // rgyan rnams zhi la dkar ba dang // 'od
714b3(rgyud 'grel): mar 'bar lhan lha ner sgom// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// kun kyang gti mug rdo rje'i tshul// 'khor lo 'od zer ldan pa yi// khams gsum sems cad khyab par bya// sa byin oM dang rang sngags ldan// gzhan
714b4(rgyud 'grel): yang de bzhin shes par bya// rin chen dga' spro ser sgyu ni// 'od zer 'bAR+Ya bA rIn chen can// sngagasna stsogs gnan ni sde ma'i tshul// sprul pa rjes su mthun pa ste// dza hU~M baM hU~M 'don par byA// 'dod chags rdo rje lcags
714b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrog dang // mdog ni dmar rmug 'od po che// sngags ni yi ge raM dang hri// phyogs bcur khyab pa'i hri la bsdu// gzhan la'ang de bzhin shes par bya// zhe sdang rdo rje gtum por 'bar// dung kha nag po'i mido ga 'dra
714b6(rgyud 'grel): la 'bar bas sngon dmar me rtog 'khrug/ nyi zla thong sprul gdug pas rgyan// seng gi glang chen stag rngam dang // cod stong rngam pa'i phyag rgyar ldan// sgra skang drag po khams gsum 'khrug/ sgrub byed phyag rgya
715a1(rgyud 'grel): goms pa yis// gang la dmigs pa 'grub par 'gyur// dbyar dgun ston dpyid las rim dang // snga dro gung dgrongs nam phyed dus// las rim btsams shing shis par gsungs// rdzas dang yo
715a2(rgyud 'grel): byad ldan byas la// sa gzhi sbyang ste gzugs brnyan sbyar// stong gyur mgon las bcol zhing // kun kyang tshim bya bgro ba bya// shing gnyis mchod rdzas legs bkod de/ kha dog me dar legs pas dgab// ling
715a3(rgyud 'grel): kau'i gnas ni gzugs ba rnyan tshul// ming dus ljon pa phur bus bskor// rdo rje gur gyis phyogs bcing bya// nyi mu zla ba gnyis gnyis kyis// gzhong pa snod kyi rdzasra rnams la// las kyi hUM las 'bru lnga dgod//
715a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phro 'dus bdud rtsi'i kha dog ldan// mang zhing ste cho gis ro dang ldan// dkyil 'khor las kyi gzhung srang lo// sna tshogs mchod yan rgyas par dbul// tshigs kyi dkyil 'khor legs par rtag/ mchod
715a5(rgyud 'grel): pa chen pos sbyar bar bya// sa bon rang gi 'bru 'od zer// ye shes dkyil 'khor bskul ba dang // khams gsum byin rlabs bsdus byas twe// bsgrub bya nye bar sbyar bar bya// / srog dang ldan pa'i bzlas pa
715a6(rgyud 'grel): ni zhal gyi rong sngags khri 'bum du// rnam gsum tshul gyis dag par bya// shin tu stong 'gyur rgyas par bya// khams gsum pa yi dkyil 'khor ni// rngam zhing 'od zer 'bar bar sgom// bdag nyid
715b1(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin phyag rgya che// mtshan ma gzungs dang rang sngags gdon// rol pa'i pho nya bka' nyan tshogs// phyag rgya bzhi ldan sgra skad drag/ khrums gsum dkrugs te bral byas nas// bsgrub bya sngon du sbyar bar bya/
715b2(rgyud 'grel): khan gsum lan bdun mngon byed pa// hUM dang dza dang spre la sogs// 'dren pa'i mchog du de gsungs so// brtan nas reng gi gtor ma sbyin// ting 'dzin so sor legs pau sbyar// rnam shausra lus btsud yig
715b3(rgyud 'grel): bsdus la// gsum bsdu lhag mo spros byas lnga// bsnyen po'i tshul du gsal bar bya// rang phur gsal byas sa bon che// ni sogs der bsdus gnas bstim la// 'dod bzhin ting 'dzin bzhi yi bya// yungs kar
715b4(rgyud 'grel): bcas bskul 'od zer dbya ba// dzaM ltar dmyigs pa 'grub paR+Sha bsam// mtshan ma ming du bsdus pa la// mkha' las 'od 'phros bag tshugs sbyangs kA rang rgyud sa bon ar gyur bA so+o// ma skyes dbyings
715b5(rgyud 'grel): nas gsal ba'i hUM// mtshon gang 'od kyi sems dpa'i che// ji ltar mngon gyi de bzhin du// smon lam byang chub lam du zhugs// lkug pa'i skabs las shes par bya// phyed ni ral gri zer bu 'amo mtshon
715b6(rgyud 'grel): cha lngas// gdul du byas te thod pa dag/ rjes su mthun pa'i gzhal yas su// byin la sor sor gdan ldan sgom// me dpung 'bar ba'i tshogs chen du// me lha ag+ni dzas bkug la// phyag rgya bzhi yis
716a1(rgyud 'grel): des sbyar la// raM zhes bya bas me s+pharA la// gzar bu rigs kyi mtshan bcas pas// 'dod yon bdud rtsi rgyas par 'bul// de dbus 'khor lo gsal btab ste// gnyis pa'i lha rnams
716a2(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs bstim// mar dang shing bu chan la sogs// dmar gyi arga rgyun tu dbul// cig min thams cad bdud rtsir gsol// yan na lan gsum rgya rtsa brgyad// stong dang 'bum du dbul bar bya// dus gsum
716a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa 'ang de bzhin te// dbang med zhal du thim par 'gyur// ming dang las bzhi'i sngag sA kyis dbul// 'grub 'gyur the tsom med ces bshad// gzugs brnyan lu gu rgyud skor la// oM sogs tshogs
716a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor du/ rjes su su mthun pa'i lha sgoms la// slas dang bya'i mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// khams gsum ma lus gang bar bya// srog dang ldan pa'i bro stabs gar// phyogs bcu ma lus kun
716a5(rgyud 'grel): brtul nas// bsgrub bya dbus su legs brtags te// sa bon 'od zer las bzhin du// bstims nus bsam bzhin 'grub par 'gyur// rjes su mthun pa'i smon lam gdub// zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor bcas
