716a6(rgyud 'grel): pas// jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun// thal ba bzhin du bklag nas kyang // drag po'i las 'di 'grub par mdzad// 'dod chags rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni ma lus kum//
716b1(rgyud 'grel): skad cig yud kyis dbang mdzad de// dbang du ma gyur med par mdzod// nga rgyal rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// gzi brjid ldan pa 'khor bcas kun// dpal dang bzi brjid chen po rnams// yud tsam gyis ni rgyas
716b2(rgyud 'grel): par mdzod// gAti mug rdo rje 'khor dang bcas// 'jig rten khams rnams ma lus kun// yud tsam gyis ni zhi mdzad de// thams cad zhing gyur dbyings su rol// hUM gsum bcas te bskul ba las// ma lus
716b3(rgyud 'grel): 'grub pa'i mchog du gsungs// rim pas bzlog ste brtsam par bya// khrag 'thung chen po la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen po yis// las dang dngos grub ci 'dod par// thams cang ma lus byed pa yin//
716b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad ldan chen po la sogs pa'o// bro gar glu tshig chen pos ni// 'du bar 'dod na 'du bar byed// 'phel bar 'dod nu 'phel bar byed// chos mo chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen pos ni// lha ner
716b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod na lha ner byed// rmugs par 'dod na rmugs par byed// seng gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen po yis// thams cad kun la bza' bar byed// gdul cha tsAm yang med par byed// gzhang
716b6(rgyud 'grel): gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshog chen mos ni// thams cad kun la 'byin par byed// de dag rab tu nyams par byed// slas dang byi mo'i bro gor gyis// rbad cing gtang bar bya bas te// kun la
717a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad byed pa yin// bya byed yan lag rdzogs pa yis// thams cad sdud dang mnyam pa dang // de dag sbyor ba zhi 'gyur zhing // sku gsung rdo rje'ang 'jig 'gyur na// khams gsum de dag
717a2(rgyud 'grel): smos ci dgos// bdag nyid 'dul ba'i dbang phyug du// las bzhi mnyam bzhag khro bo yis// 'khor gyi khro rnams de bzhin gshegaso// phra med tshogs rnams bskul bsdus la// las bzhi'i dkyil 'khor nyid dag du
717a3(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma kha chu 'dod pa sbyin// mngon tshe dpal tshon he ru kA shin tu gdug cing gtum bag can// khams gsum ma lus 'dul mdzad pa// dbang dang byin rlabs rmad po ci// lha chen la sngogs dbang bsdus nas// 'khor
717a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams dbang phyug slas su byas// so so'i lngas la bskos pa de// ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas bzhin// ma thogs myur du mngon par phyung // dram bcas bzhin du ma byas na// ji ltar rang rigs mnas bor ba'i// dam
717a5(rgyud 'grel): bcas de las 'das gyur na// mgo 'gas snying yang tshal pa ru// ya ka shA khro bos gtub par 'gyur// de pas rnal 'byor sngags 'chang gi/ ji ltar bcol ba bzhin du byos// gal de las de ma byas na// rang gis khas
717a6(rgyud 'grel): blangs mnas bor bzhin// mgo lus tshig nas dmyal bar 'gro// rnal 'byor dam la gnas gyur pa'o// las rnams yongs su bya ba dang // 'khor rnams bu cig gzhin du skyongs// phra men ma yang dngos grub
717b1(rgyud 'grel): thobs bcol ba'i ltas rnams myur du gyis// dkyil 'khor snying la bsdu byas te// lhag mas mchod de gshegs su gsol// gsung phyir legs paR+Sha nan tan bya// sgyur 'phrul sbyin sreg gi rim pa mdor bsdus pa//
717b2(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon bI mA la mri trAs mdzad pa rdzogs so// // bcom ldan 'das thugs rje'i 'dren pa byed pa po la phyag 'tshul lo// sgyu 'phrul chen po'i rgyud dag lasaso// rtog pa'i dra ba sreg pa dang // brdos byas thuT
717b3(rgyud 'grel): rjes sbyang ba'i phyir// ro srig las kyi phreng ba tsam// rtogs pa'i dra ba bAs le nas ni// sku lnga ljin gyis 'grub par shog/ dang po de nyid lus bzhag pa// bgegs bskrad pa dang bcas pa dang // gdags dang sbyong dang
717b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur dang // thab khung sreg khang slob dpon dang // las gzhung sbyin sreg bsdu bas te// lnga gnyis tsog gis don rdzogs 'gyur// mdor bsdus spyi yi don du 'dod// de dag rgyas par bshad pa ni// tsi nus pa
717b5(rgyud 'grel): yis rnam par dbye// e raM khams gsum ma lus kun+da// za byung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor g+his// khog srungs lhan cig skyes rdzogs la// bdog dang bsnun dang gzhom pa dang // 'phros skye rten la gnyis
717b6(rgyud 'grel): med bya/ srung ba'i 'khor lo'i cho ga yas// dam tshig sems dpa' srungs te bzhag/ de ltar grangs dang zhag dus su// yang dang yang du gnan te bya// khrus dang rgyan dang byug pas te// phyi dang nang gi
718a1(rgyud 'grel): lnga gnyis la// brgya pa gnyis dang drug pa ni// chu la lan grangs mang bzlas te// mchod rten de la bkru bar bya// mi 'chi bcu phyed spos mar dang // dI yis de la yang dag byug/ zhun chen
718a2(rgyud 'grel): khu bar btsos pa yi// ras kyis steng nas yang dag dkri// spos mar thor lcog de la dkon// dgul ngo rgyan yang dgas par bya// phung po lnga yi gnas dag du// rgyal ba rigs lnga'i phyag rgya dgod// rtsa ru yum
718a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i phyag rgya dgod// rnam shes dbang po yul rnams su// sems dpa' sems ma 'dzom pa dang // 'joms ma rim par dgrong do zhes// mnyam pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa yin// rgyu drug 'khor ba'i gnas
718a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams su// thub drug sa bon dgod pa yin// kun bzangs yab yum de bzhin ste// sdong bu re la lha rnams kyi// ma nor rtsa ba'i snying po dag/ ras chen rgyu las byas te gdugaswA// mya ngan 'das par gsungs
718a5(rgyud 'grel): yin/ ro ye phyi rol shun pa la// 'gro drug sa bon bkod nas ni// 'od zer 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba yis// rim gyi sna sbyang ba'i las su bya// dbu rgyan cod pa ni 'phreng ba dang // rdo rje dril buM la sogs pa// dang mcho
718a6(rgyud 'grel): byin la stegs la bzhag/ de nas mi thab tsam bya ba// khru bzhi ngo yi tshad byas la// mthur du brus te dkyil 'khor du// za byed dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dgod// rdo rje me ris mtshan pa ni// thab lung yin
718b1(rgyud 'grel): par gsal bar gsungs// phyi rol ka ba bzhi btsugs la// 'og ma sbrengs pas sum rdzogs bya// bar ba shing gi rdzas dbus su// pad+ma ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la// khro bo brgyad kyi snying por ldan// dbus su me yi/
718b2(rgyud 'grel): sa bon dgod// bzhin phyogs shar du bstan te dgod// ro la gzungs thig brtags nas ni// blo kaur bzhi nas drangs byas lA// bla ma bzhi'i phyag dru gtang // sus rtsegs yang thog chen po drar// ras sam gro ga
718b3(rgyud 'grel): shing shun la/ thugs dz+haiM dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis// lding bur byas te gdags par bya// des nas rdo rje rgyal po yis// rang bzhini me yi 'phro 'du bya// rdo rje kar mA las mkhan gyis// srung dang sprad pa
718b4(rgyud 'grel): nas rtsams te// las kyi 'phreng ba rdzogs par bya// rdo rje rgyal paM br-i ma yis// mtshamasau med lnga dang nye ba lnga// lci ba bzhi dag la sogs pa/ rI yau nyes b+ha sbyang zhing bshags// rdo rje skabs sbyor bya
718b5(rgyud 'grel): ma des// skabs skabs dag du mchod pa dbul// bkra shis gnas kyis smon lam btab// skabs sam kun gyi mjug du gdab// rdo rje grangs kyi ljang 'dzin pas// grangs bzung dkar byung bla mar
718b6(rgyud 'grel): dbul// sdig pa'i gnag byang bshags shing sreg// bzlas brjod 'phro 'dus rtog tshogs rnams// sbyangs te rang rang lha ru brlab// tshogs dang yo byad mchod pa kun// rim pas mdun du snang byas la// de las
719a1(rgyud 'grel): raM sgyed raM las me// skyed de rang bzhin spyan drangs bstim// i li u lista pa tis// tshogs kyi mchod pa skabs su sbyar// mchod dang stong pa rim pa bzhin// me yi lto bar gzhal
719a2(rgyud 'grel): yAs khang // lha dang bcas pa rim par skyed// gong gi dkyil 'khor gsal btab la// gnyis su med par bstim byas la// mchod pa'i rim pa gong ma bzhin// stod pa la sogs de dang mtshungs// me
719a3(rgyud 'grel): yi ltas dang bzang dang ngan// rim pa bzhin du brtags pa bya// de nas rdo rje bsdu ba lis// rim pa bzhin du sdus byas la// dam pa yin na sku gdung rtag/ g+hu ma bsdus la mchod rten nam// sku 'am
719a4(rgyud 'grel): gtsug lag zhal zhal lam// thAngad+ya kA'i rIm+b+hi b+he ba 'am/ sa dang bAsl-is wA ro lu br-i// smin+ta dwe s+yA byA bas mkhasmai br-i sa br-i shrAng+ga/ de nas bak+Sha dang byAg+ma pA drAng // kA shwe gis s+yA gI stsol ba rimra bzhin+da b+ha// tshen+na
719a5(rgyud 'grel): bsdus te rol mo yiswA// rgya mtsho chen por stsol te gting // 'kho ba'i seMrtog 'a khrul bas shin tu nyon mongs byanas be do// dral cing sreg dang brdos bcas spyang phyir dri mong gra shis
719a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyen gdung ba dag gis kyang // rdzu 'phrul rtogs dka' rngam pa rgya mtsho'i mtha' yas rgyud chen gyis bsdus pa'i// ngal ba'i dge rtsas 'gro drug rgya mtsho'i sems can bsngos bcas 'di kun zag
719b1(rgyud 'grel): med shog/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba ro sreg las kyi phreng ba rdzogs so// / slob dpon bi ma la mi trAs mdzad pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ye shes rang gnas kyi rgyal po lnga phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'dzin la phyag btsal nas
719b2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ri nga gnas mngon 'dod pas// dngos dang bar ma rnam sbyang phyir/ dpe chung rang gnas bshad par bya// rgyu dngadang rang bzhin rgyud nyid dang // rang bzhin nang gi dkyil 'khor dang // 'phro tshul por ma'i mtshan
719b3(rgyud 'grel): nyid dang // lus bsnyen gasdang ba'i dkyil 'khor gsum// de dag ting 'dzin las rim dang // rang gnas skyung po'i rim pA dang // bdag nyid 'dabA ka'i man ngag dang // mthar gnas tshul gyi tha snyad bcu// rang
719b4(rgyud 'grel): granas rmongs pa'i don phyir dbye// dang por gnas gnyis de la yang gnyis// bde gshegs snying po ma rig la// ma rig bdag lta mtshungs pa'i rgyu// kun rtag ma rigs nyon mongs las// lhan cig skye rgyu rgyu
719b5(rgyud 'grel): yi rgyu// gnyis la rkyen gyi rnam par 'dod// mtshams sbyor rnam bzhi zhen bcas pa// rlung gi rkyen gyis 'ongs mtshungs rgyu// rten sems len pa khrig dang bcas// phro mo 'dod skol sems kyis 'jug// lan
719b6(rgyud 'grel): rten 'byung ba nges ldan pas// thal ba 'bru mar sha rus ltar// mi 'gyur nges 'gyur ba yin// sum cu rtsa brgyad phrag bdun rlung // lhan cig byed rgyu rkyen du 'dod// las rlung dang po zho chags tshul
720a1(rgyud 'grel): kud spyad mya yi rtsibs las 'bud// cung zad sku bar 'gyur ba yin// mdzod ces bya bas zlum par byed// rab 'byed khrags shing mchi gu ltar// yang dag sdud pa yan lag gi/ rtsa ba lnga
720a2(rgyud 'grel): bo 'byung bar 'gyur// zad kyi'i phro rgyu de bzhin 'byung // 'khyim byed de bzhin lnga rdzogs byed// zlog rgyu ro byed pa nyid cig rdzogs// rnam par 'byed pa bu gudong // sra byed kun nas sgo mnyam pas// sra zhing
720a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyu la bai lta bur 'gyur// rdo rje bug sbyong kha sU nas// gan+d+ha ga khrag chu 'thung dbang po zlog/ yon po'i sgos ni nang khrol 'byung // zhor 'byung spu rgyus zhes pa'i las// rus po'i tshig dang nad rnams ldan// sgras skom/
720a4(rgyud 'grel): byed pas de sems skyes// mas thos lte bar 'dzin cing phan// rgyud pa'i sgos ni rgyus pa g.yog/ pad+ma nyi shu rtsa 'byung ste// phyogs bzhor lnga lnga cig la'ang brgya/ nying lag phyogs cig nyi khri la// mdun rgyab
720a5(rgyud 'grel): saM ga stobs zhes bya// g.yas g.yon mthur ldan rten pa'o// de dag nyid lag ni lag na'i da bdun// dag gi bar taM ba spu 'phel// kha dog dkar dmyur ser por ldana?// bdud rtsi dbang pos snying mig 'byed//
720a6(rgyud 'grel): dbugs rgyu dbang po rnams kyang rdzogs// 'bri steng dbang po dang bar byed// snyan mgur dbang po'i lam mthur ldan// las byed dbang po gsum rdzogs byed// shin tu sra bas rus pa bstan// yang dog bskyed
720b1(rgyud 'grel): A// kun tur+dz+dza/ gA rnams 'byung // yang dag 'dzin ni phyugs pa g.yogs// sprin 'dzin de nyid mdog ldan byed// gro khyer 'dzin pas khrag drangs byed/ skye ba mngon grub spu rnams dang /
720b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyus pa sbyin mo 'brel par byung // phan yon chen pos la sa bzhin du// sgra don phyi'i yul grub ste// dmigs pa med pa'i rjes the ba la// dpe yi tshul gyis bar ma yi// lus dang phyi ma'i spyad yul snang // de phyir
720b3(rgyud 'grel): 'pho ba'i tha snyad du// brtags pas yod par shes par bya// bar mo'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ rnam rtog 'byung ba'i lus spangs nas// dngas mA las 'byung yid kyi lus// phyis 'byung dbang po yan pog
720b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs// las kyi rdzu 'phrul shugs dang ldan// sgyu ma lta ba'i lus dag gis// thegs pa med pa kun la 'jug/ dpeg chad byA ba brgya stong yang // 'od kyi rnam par 'gengs par byed// 'dod khams snod bcud
720b5(rgyud 'grel): ma lus pa// lha migo dge pas mthong bar 'gyu ra// 'gro ba'i lam dag nges par shes// re dang dogs pa cung zad nyung // tshe ni zhig bdun 'gyur du gsungs// 'chi ka'i myan ngag rab shes pas// 'di tshe nges
720b6(rgyud 'grel): par 'byung bar 'gyur// ma skyes rang bzhin ye shes la// e raM khaM su aM dkyil 'khor// me dpung 'bar ba'i klong yangs su// rang rig ye shes rang snang ba// skye 'gro 'byung ba nags tshal kun// ma lus
721a1(rgyud 'grel): khrag 'thung rdo rje'i rigs// mthing nag 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha can// lcer bu rngams mtshungs tIl glang sbyar// khros pas rngam langs khams gsum 'khrug/ bsgrub bya'i dmigs
721a2(rgyud 'grel): su len par byed// dur khrod ras kyi dkyil 'khor la// khrag 'thung drug cu rtsa drug rnams// rim pa gsum du rtsegs pa ni// byin rlabs dbang gis mdzes pa yin// rngam tshul gzo byin ldan par sgom// ye
721a3(rgyud 'grel): shes spyan dngos mtshang gsum sbyar// zlas pa srog dang ldan par bya// thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis// rang bzhin yid kyis dmigs byas te// gcig dang gnyis su med tshul gyis// sangs
721a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyis ngo bor sgrom// bsdu ba'i sbyor bas kun bsdus te// byi ni brlabs rtag par gsal bar bya// bsgrub bya khrus byas dri dang ldan// nges par shwar sgo nyid du bzung // dkyil 'khor dang po gsal
721a5(rgyud 'grel): byas te// sprul pas mtshams btsod bum pa bzung // bshad pa bzhin du bsgrub bya dgug/ nges par gzugs la pheMb ste bcings// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa 'dir shes te// 'phro ba'i 'od zer thugs dam
721a6(rgyud 'grel): bskul// 'dus pas bsgrub bya gnas sbyangs nas// rtog tshogs dkyil 'khor nyid du bslab// slob bu sbyangs pa'i rim par gsungs// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor sgo phye nas// phyag byas bskor
721b1(rgyud 'grel): te gsol ba gad bya// sgrib sbyang rung gris lhar+ya bskyed la// 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas bsrung bar byAk+Shata kring+ga la sogs nges sbyo ba'i// sngags dang nyungs dka sprul pa yis// nges grangs gtso bo'i mukha' la
721b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhag/ de dag 'od zor ma nga po yis// nyon mongs mun pa dag byos nas// gas ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong bar bya// rigs drug spyong ba'i 'od zer gyis // sa bon rnam pa drug sbyangs te// ye shes chen
721b3(rgyud 'grel): po'i ros gang bas// ma lus 'joms pas rgyas btab pa'o// 'bru bzhi nges par bstan pa'i tshe// sgra dbyangs gsungs gis bstan pa rnams// nges par ston phyir bzhi ru 'dod// thams cad rang
721b4(rgyud 'grel): rig byang chub sems// dwe ni lung gi tshwad mar bshang // tshad bzhis phab pa'i don bzhi ste/ dgra pa rnam gsum tshul gnas shing // 'bru lnga 'dus pa'i thabs chen po// 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas//
721b5(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin sngon du byed rgyu ni// ngo bo dang ni rkyen nyid de// 'jug ldang la sogs byang sems lnga// nges par skye ba ngo bo yin// thabs dang shes rab ma ming rgyud // rten pa'i yig lam rkyen du gsungs//
721b6(rgyud 'grel): khong nas gab sbas dona'i byin pa// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gonas// rang bzhin gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// dkyil 'khor snying po gser sgros la// chos nyid yos yon dang // rang rgyud bzhi lo yan lag brgyad//
722a1(rgyud 'grel): 'od bzhi la gnas rnam shes bzhi// sgo lha rtag min zhor la bshad// sa bon zung gsum nyid dang bzhi// 'od dang snod bcud tshul du glanas// chos nyid lha min dung 'gro zlum// kun bzhi'i
722a2(rgyud 'grel): A~M gyi snying por ldan// ye shes lha ni gru bzhi yid/ snying po hUM ni bde bshags thugs// yon tan dmyal ba yi dgas e// zla gam gsungs gi rang bzhin yin/ dmaR+Sha nag sdong lnga oka? zhol dbyibs
722a3(rgyud 'grel): de ni blo rmugs snang yin te/ shes pa gsum la snyoms par 'gogs// drug po nyid du'ang bshad pa yin// de dbus snying po ye shes rgyu// dar srang mtshal khu gser gyi rlangs// nyi ma'i mi long dang
722a4(rgyud 'grel): dgra ni/ 'byung ba bzhi yi dbus ma yin// bde ba'i dngos m+b+ha na mkha'i khams// 'byung lnga shes rab rigs kyi yum// chen po rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs// thabs dang shes rab las nyid kyi/
722a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor kun kyang gaskul byed // nam mkha'i khams kyi dkyil 'khor 'dis// thams cad na mkhar byed pa'i phyir// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ lus can kun la yod par
722a6(rgyud 'grel): bshad// sgrub pa'i bzhi ru 'di shes bya// 'khrul dbang mi gnas tha snyad du// rnam shes 'phos par gsungs pa ni// nyi 'od sa bon skur sgra bzhin// rgyu las 'bras bu gzhan min gyi// 'di nas
722b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phro bar 'gyur ba'i chos// gdul bya tsam yang med par gsungs// sa chu me rlung bzhi yi rlung // sum mudro snying gi lte ba la// rigs rnams kun+da gyi rten yin te// las rgyu zad dang rkyen dgra gI// ston+da dbang yan lag
722b2(rgyud 'grel): nyams pa na// tshogs drug sar thi mau gsal mi 'gyur// sa dag chur zhugs lus nyams med// de nyid mar zhugs bu ga skam// mai rlung 'gro bas drod nyams 'gyur// rlung gi snying po thig le'i rten// rtsub cing
722b3(rgyud 'grel): pha ma 'don par 'gyur// theg le'i me long dbugs bzhin du// mdzes dang che chung gsal bar byed// rtog pas 'du shes brgyad skye'o// me tog 'phreng bas kha dog bsgyur// pags bgos spu dang sen mo 'phel//
722b4(rgyud 'grel): bdun phrag lnga po yang byed kyis// mtshan ma thams cad 'phel bar byed// g.yo byed byung ba'i sems skye'o// dang bas phyin ci ma log pa'o// 'du shes lnga po 'byung bar 'gyur// de dag rang bzhini gsang ba'i las// /
722b5(rgyud 'grel): chags bsogs rang bzhin bzhi bcu gnyis// shin tu gsal por byed par 'gyur// thogs med rkyen gyis mgo lus bsgyur// rang bzhin sems dpe' lhums nas 'byung // rang bzhin ye shes rdo rje yis// rdo rje
722b6(rgyud 'grel): phung po zhes gsungs so// rang bzhin gnas rgyud rnam pa gnyis// sems ni rang rigs ye shes te// ma bcos lhun gyi skad cig ma// de yis ma byas gang yang med// me rigs mun 'khor klad pa ni// ji snyed
723a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i chos// phyi nang rten 'brel gnyis su 'khor// mi mthun bde sdug myong 'gyur ba'i// dbang po yul du snang ba kun// rang rgyud yod pa ma yin te// kun gzhi'i rnam par
723a2(rgyud 'grel): shes pa nyid// dngos po sna tshogs par snang bas// gnyis snang chos kun rnam rtog bshad// rnam rtag nyid na ye shes to// ma skyes ye shes brjod du med// thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sems nyid las ni/
723a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan med phyir// 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad kun// sdod pa can gyi chos med do// rtog med rang rigs 'od gsal ba'i// shes po 'ba' zhig kho na'i phyir// 'jig rten brtan g.yo la sogs pa// snang ba nyid na ngo bo
723a4(rgyud 'grel): med// de nyid chos sku chen por gsungs// rnam dag rang bzhin rgyud nyid la// sgom dang sgom par bya ba yin// mtshan ma'i nyes skyon dang gis myed// gnas dang 'byung ba ma lus kun// rang rig ye shes gzugs su skye//
723a5(rgyud 'grel): sku dang ye shes bsam mi khyab// rdo rje phung po yan lagra ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grogs// sa chu spyan dang ma ma ki/ me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma sa te// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// skye mchod
723a6(rgyud 'grel): khams rnams mang po kun// sems dpa' sems ma'i dkyil 'khor yin// gsang yul dbang po rnams shes rig/ ma lus 'joms phyir khro bor gsungs// rtog bcas mtshon ma las skyed phyir// yul te las
723b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis mi gnas bshad// yid chos bzang po bzang mo'i mkha'// so drug las byung bde ba'i dus// tshugs sogs yang dag nyon mongs drug/ ye shes drug gi sa bon drug// 'dul phyir sprul pa nyid du gsungs// sku dang
723b2(rgyud 'grel): gsungs thugs yon tan las// nyi shu rtsa lnga rang bzhin gnas// ye shes chos nyid yon tan ni// ting 'dzin gsum gyi ngo bo yin// de snying dngas ma'i thig le ni// bsnyen bsgrub bzhi rung shes par bya// de dbyings las
723b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i dkyil 'khor te// bzhi brgyad rtsi ni 'khor lor gsungs// gsang ba'i skabs las shes par bya// bdes gang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis rtse// sa bon rgyus te yi ge gsung // bde thugs rdo rje sku gsung ldan// bzhi cu
723b4(rgyud 'grel): rtsa gnyis gsum 'phror 'gyur// cig kyang khams kyi bde bar ldan// zung gsum 'od kyi gong bur gsungs// rnam thar sku gsung yig gsum gyis// kha dog rang rgyud bzhin du bsgyur// 'od kyis sngon bzhin byin
723b5(rgyud 'grel): rlabs bstim// rnam shes thugs te yi ge gsung // 'od ni sku yi rang bzhin la// dpa' sgeg byams pa gar byang rgyal// gsal ma chos nyid bdag mo la// sku gsung sgyu 'phrul ldan pa yi// thabs dang shes rab
723b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor par bskyed/ rnam thar dbu dang ye shes phyag/ khams gsum sku gsung thugs rgyas btob// sa bcu gnyis la nges par phyin// byang chub sems dpa'i dbang skur te// rdo rje thugs las pur byung nas// che mchog
724a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyun gyis dbang skur nas// 'gu ya yak+Sha rak+Sha gsum// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur te// bdag gi 'od 'phros nam mkha'i ya// bde gshegs rgyun gyis byin brlabs pas// che mchog dbang mchog dpal mchog/
724a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum// thabs dang shes rab 'khyil par sgom// dbang mchog rol pa'i sems 'od nyid// che mchog mkha' la bsdu bAr bya// de nyid dpal mchog la zhugs te// dpal mchog rang gi gsang lam nas// dngas ma'i ye shes snying /
724a3(rgyud 'grel): po thim// gzhi yi sku gsung thugs nyid kyang // de bzhin 'dus pa nyid du bya// rtsa ba brgyad kyi snying po yis// dus bzhi'i baude ba mchog du bsdus// rten gyi rtsa nas thig le zhugs// mi shigs ye shes thag le ni// sku gsu
724a4(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag/ gcig dang du ma rnam spangs pa// sna tshogs snang po mtshan du med// rang dbang sgyur ba'i tsu rings las// rdo rje sems dpa' mtshon gang pa// dbu lnga ye shes sems dpa' bzhugs// dkyil la
724a5(rgyud 'grel): mang po'i 'phro 'du can// gtsug byung thugs rje'i dbang thob nas// thobs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// stong phyug gcig gi rtse bcud rnams// sangs rgyas stong gi dkyil 'khor du// sngon byung rigs kyi bdag por 'gyur
724a6(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha'i khams kyang de bzhin no// oM hri ma ha su ka badz+ra hUM ho// hUM ma skrod yid kyis byon pa'i gnas mchog dam pa la// yid bzhin rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // dus gsum 'gyur ba med pa'o/
724b1(rgyud 'grel): gdan steng na// rtag pa chen po chog gi sku bzhugs pa// mnyam rdzogs dpe la 'das pa'i rgyan mnga' zhing // yid bzhin rin chen gter la bde spyod pa// bde ba chen po bdag la bstan spyod pa// rtag pa chen po longs
724b2(rgyud 'grel): spyod rjegs pa'i sku// rdzogs chen 'gyur meng g.yung drung bdal ba'i ngang // bde chen dbyings kyi yum dang mnyam sbyor bas// ting 'dzin bdud rtsi'i thugs ni 'gro ba yongs kyi bcud// rnam dag ye shes sman gyis mun na ga/
724b3(rgyud 'grel): bsal// ye shes sgron mye'i thugs kyis brag chags srig/ rdo rje spu gri'i tshems kyis dug gsum bcad// rnga mo chen hUM nyid ring pos khri tshun bskul// thugs dam mu la dza las dmyal khams sreg/ ye shes rol pas
724b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud drug gnas nas sgrol// srid gsum thig les zhal gyi rgyus spros spro ba skyed// ye shes byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yongs kyi dpal// dpal chen du med khro rgyal gsum gyi d+he// kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems
724b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' la sogs te// dus gsum sangs rgyu ste kun gyi lha phung yin// ma lus 'dod pa'i dpal du gyur par mdzod// spyod yul 'gyur bar mthong bas na// gsung ba'i gnas su nyon mongs yid// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
724b6(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba la// kun gzhi ye shes snying po yi// 'od kyis khams gsum sbyangs bsdus te// mtshan gang 'od du gsal ba la// dkar po hUM gnas rnam shes so// de dag sku gsung thugs bdag ste// shin tu 'od 'dris
725a1(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid du b+ha// rlung brtsegs bcud g.yo'i mtshon mthong na// ring po rgyu gnyis nas su nus// du ba'i tshul grangs 'od du ngasdu// de bzhin zla ba yang shes par// 'od zlum gsang ba'i lam zhugs//
725a2(rgyud 'grel): phyir 'byung phyogs bcu khyab bdal bas// khams dag phyir mtha' dbus drung ni// phyi nang yul sems bral bya'i don// dran pas las kyi rgyun bcad de// rang gnas mthong bar gyur pa yin// gsang ba zhabs kyi rnam pa ni//
725a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyang rnam shes gnyis 'dus te// lce rtse rkan la sbyor byas nas// hUM rings blangs ste he ru gyur// sna tshogs mchog ldan rgyan rdzogs pa// hUM brjod nas lam byung ste// 'og min la sogs 'gro bar bya// 'dod pa
725a4(rgyud 'grel): nges par 'grub par 'gyur// thegs mchog gsang mtha'i mngon byas nas// gzhi bzhin ma lus bdag nyid phyir// rgya bral cig dang du ma spangs// 'das dong ma 'das dus gsum gyi// ro myong dag phyir rnam
725a5(rgyud 'grel): rtog bral// ye shes dbyings las mi zhan phyir// thugs rje chen pos ma lus mkhyen// sku dang gsung thugs yon tan las// khyab dang bde dang rtag dbang bsgyur// rkyen gyis skye 'jig med pa yi// rtag tshon rdo rje'i
725a6(rgyud 'grel): sku zhes bya// rang bzhin gnas rgyud ye shes phyag/ rgya khyon bsam yas mngon sum du// yul 'dra rang bzhin dang gnas pa// 'khrul dang rnam par rgyud log pa'i// rtog gsum las rkyen rab rib zhin snang ba//
725b1(rgyud 'grel): thabs mkhas spyan mnga' rgyud bzhin sgro skur bral// rgyud gsum thur ma gsal phyir gab gsungs pa// spyad yig goms rnams snang rgyud nyams su shar// gsal byas 'das dang da ltar rang rig mi gra thob shog/ sgyu 'phrul
725b2(rgyud 'grel): dpe chung rang gnas kyi rim pa'o// sgeg pa rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// gsadra ba chen po'i rgyud dag las// sku gdung spel mchod rim pa zhig/ bdag
725b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan snang dang mi snang phyir // legs par bsdus te bstan par bya'o// pha dang ma yi sems ldan mis// mtha' yas bu yi sems bzhag ste// tshogs chen zung lnga lum bya'i phyir// mo rtog nyid du rtog med 'dug/ de lnga
725b4(rgyud 'grel): skad cig las kyi lnga// gsal bya dgu 'am bcu gcig ldan+da// 'phro 'dus dbang byin thob pa dang // grangs te sngags kyi nga rgyal bskyed// sa man dza da a ha hi so// se gol kyai ta dzaM yis dgug/ dza hU~M ba~M hos ste byas te//
725b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bru brgyad sngags kyis brtan par bya// de ltar gsal ba'i rnal 'byor pas// thugs ka'i hUM gi 'od 'phros pas// skor por sbyangaso la gnas gdan sngags// brjod pas gzhal yas grang na ge sum ldan// 'byung
725b6(rgyud 'grel): rje'i rgyu nyid byin brlab pa// spyi dang khyad par lnga pa nyid// khong stong rgyan ldan rnam dag sngags// nga rgyal ldan brjod stong chen rgyu// lhun grub ci bsam snang byin brlab// phyi ma lnga yis dbyings phyug ma// khong stong
726a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyan ldan oM bri ra// dzA dud+ya badz+ra swA hA yis// rdo rje ye shes srog ldan bya// de bzhin spyan la 'degs pa'i rgyus// oM dang badz+ra di ru dzA// a dang a ra swA hA yis// snga ma ji bzhin byin brlab bo//
726a2(rgyud 'grel): mA ma ka lI rdo rje gdams// tha chung sgreng ste oM r+m+ma ri ni// di re badz+ra sAhA yaMs// ting 'dzin srog dang ldan par bya/ gos dkar khrod stong sbyor spros pas// oM dang badz+ra a ga na aM// ga sha swA hA'i gsang sngogs kyis//
726a3(rgyud 'grel): gom bzhin du byin gyis brlab// sgrol mthal mo bArlab bya zhing // oM dang badz+ra a ni l-i// spu tsa la mo hUMts+tsho/ da ra swAngs byin brlab bo// shes rab grangs 'dzin thabs kyis bdab// hUM badz+ra grig/ mu dA du shwA ra
726a4(rgyud 'grel): snyom gyi sngags brjod cing // 'byung lnga ye shes rdo rje la// skor phor reg pas gzhal yas gdan// nang de phyi rol sku gdung dbyibs// mi bskyod yab yum 'khril zhugs pa'i// 'od kyis don mdzad lha chen skor//
726a5(rgyud 'grel): de nyid 'byung lnga gang yin mkha'// gang brlabs rang gi lha mos na'ang // so so'i gsang sngags brjod byas te// srog ldan rnal 'byor snga ma bzhin// 'phrin lngas rnams las grub 'dod pas// rgyu lnga bzhi las/
726a6(rgyud 'grel): rtsam pa ni// zhi la snang mdzad gsang sngags ldan// shan ting ku ru swA hA sa mdzes// chos sku thig la dkor 'od kyis// gzas dgu gdon byas 'od thim zhing // rgyas la 'byung ldan yab yum sdigs//
726b1(rgyud 'grel): pus ting ku ru swA hA yis// sku gsung se re rgyas 'od zer 'phros// bkug gdan 'od thim bdag rgyas byas// dbang la rta mgrin mtha' yas sngags// che ge ba shAM ku ru yis// zla gam 'od 'bar 'phros bkug
726b2(rgyud 'grel): pas// gdan byas 'od thim dbang po bsgyur// drag po badz+ra he ru'i sngags// che gre gsod pa'i sngags brjod pas// chos sku gru gsum 'od nag gis// bkug ste gdon bstim bsgral bar bya'o// don yod grub
726b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rnal 'byor pas// chos sku lhun gru ba lha gnas bya// chos rnams rang bzhin rtogs 'dod pas// mtha' yas rnal 'byor rten 'brel sngags// 'od kyis bsgrib sbyangs rtogs skal ljon// nang du gdan
726b4(rgyud 'grel): gtso bzhugaso la'o// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// lha de nye bar bsgrub pa nI// lha'i snying po bris bcug brjod// lha de nyo bar 'grub par 'gyur// 'jig rten lha de dbang med bkug/ mchid sogs rdzogs
726b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i las bya'o// gang zhig 'phos prA'i las byed na// gang goms lha'i rnal 'byor gyis// bta pra ste mA thA gnyis mtha' ru// sarba tir ya gA te/ hUM phaT zhes brjod pas byol song gi rgyudu sbyangs pa'o// byi tsa gnyis/
726b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / sarba s+pho ta ka te he duM hUM phaT/ kyis yi dgas rgyud sbyangs so// da ha gnyis sarba na ra ga te haM duM hUM phaT brjod 'od 'phros pas// sngon bzhin bkug la 'od kyis sbyong // yang ni mi bskyod rnal 'byor ldan//
727a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyun bcad sngags kyis spyad pa'o// de nas sku gdung byin brlab ste// rdo rje gdams la the bong rnags// oM ye d+harmA he tu pra b+hA bA hwe tAn te ShAn ta thA ga two d+ha ba dang / t+ye ShA na tsa yo ni ro d+ha e bam
727a2(rgyud 'grel): b+hU dI/ mU hA shra ma NA ye swAhA/ zhes brjod do// chos kyi skur byin gyis brlob bo// rgyu 'bras kyi chos sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis bye rab pa ni// phyag rgya de nyid las/ oM badz+ra ku sha mi ti u pa da/ sa~M myaga.a
727a3(rgyud 'grel): ri ti/ i tra ba la aMg tu// ma ga pa ra pu ra rnam phyi ti~M ku ru swA hA/ zhes rgyu'i chos rdzogs par byin gyis brlob bo// 'bros bu'i chos rdzogs par byin gyis brlab pa ni/ mnyam pa'i phyag rgya 'od 'phro
727a4(rgyud 'grel): wAr+ya byas le// oM badz+ra dz+nyA na pan tsa ka yA gu na gar khang // bu ma te/ shi ti na ku ru swA hA// dz+nyA nau bag sa man ta/ a mo ki sa man ta/ a mo ka ya swA hA/ zhes sku dang ye shes su gsol ba las// 'bras
727a5(rgyud 'grel): bu'i tshos thams cad rdzogs par bsam mo// de la rang bzhin gnas pa yang // spyan lasnga byas pa brgya rtsa brgyad// stong khri 'bum sogs 'bad byas la// rab gnas sbyin sreg rgyas par sbyar// yi dam
727a6(rgyud 'grel): nar ma'i sbyor ba la// rang bzhin mchod rten lhar bcas pas// snyan dbab spyan drong bstim brtan pas// sngon bzhin byas la phyag gis mchod// a ti pra ti pu ho yis// spyi sprul phyog dang lan
727b1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs bya'o// kun bzangs mchod pa nam mkha'i mdzod// sngags dang phyag rgya mchos par bya'o// gzed zhal rgyan ldan a ha rAs// phyag dang zhal bsil gsol bya// lha mo bzhi'i sngags phyag rgyas// spyan
727b2(rgyud 'grel): shangs sku la thim par bya// oM 'jig rten brtan g.yo thams cad la// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gnas mod kyang // bzungs 'dzin rnamo rtog zhugs pa yis// rang gis bsgribs shing bdag tu bcings// kun gyis/
727b3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag rtogs bya'i phyir// de bzhin chos su gzugs brnyan brtan// yang dag thams cad rdzogs pa'i don// sna tshogs 'phrin las rnam par rol// don gyi snying po mchog gnas dang // byang chub chos rnams rab tu
727b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs// 'jig rten gtso mchog rab tu bskor// u ho// ho chos sku'i yon tan lhun gyis grub pa yi// thal sbyar po de ka ya bag/ tsi ta ti sta badz+ra stan// bdag gzhan gnyis ka'i don gyi phyir// 'khor lo dang
727b5(rgyud 'grel): mchu'i tshul bzhin du// bka' yi bcud bsdus bsod nams kyis// mtha' yas mngon par sangs rgyas shog/ sku gdung las kyi 'phreng ba rdzogs so// / bcom ldan 'das dang la kun tu bzang po
727b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// don dang bral ba'i 'jig rten na// snang srid bde ba'i longs spyod la// chags pa spyad pas 'khyams pa rnams// 'di ltar spyad na grol zhes gsungs// lta ba byin brlabs
728a1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa dang // spyan drang mchod dang rol pa dang // lhag ma'i las dang bsngo ba brgyad// rgyun du mi stong rnal 'byor yin// dbang po yul dus rnam shes kun// shes rab thabs sbyor ye sangs
728a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas// 'byung ba yum gyi mkha' klong las// sprul pa rang 'byung longs spyod lha// byang chub sems kyi klong bdal bas// gnyis med cig pa'i longs spyod yin// lte ba 'di la gang gnas pa// sangs rgyas pa gcig
728a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang med// dang por longs spyod kun ldan nas// bdag nyid lung gis khrag 'thung las// yig 'bru gsum 'phros thim tsam gyis// sbyang pa sngags kyis kha bskang ba'o// bdag nyid khrag 'thung gsal pa las//
728a4(rgyud 'grel): lto bar b+h+rUM las gzhal yasu suM// rim pa lU yi dkyil 'khor lha// mi bskyod rdzogs pa'i tshul gyi sa bsgom// snga ma dza yi phyag rgya yis// 'bar des 'phags pa 'khor dang bcas// nam mkha'i khams
728a5(rgyud 'grel): kun gang bar dmigs// de nyid phrig le'i tshul du bsgom// rim pa bzhin du glos te sbyang // sngags kyis lha mo rim pa bzhi no// shes rab thab tshul mnyes pas mchod// bla med dngos grub stsol bar bsam//
728a6(rgyud 'grel): AM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ke te a mr-i tai hUM AM ba lin ta kha raM khe r-i Da ki nau// kha raM yo gaM ni// ngang taM a la la hok+ka zhes rgyas par mchod do// de nas bdag nyid mnyam bzhag pas// rnam gsum tshul
728b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis rol bar bya// bdag nyid rang gi lha mnyes pas// mchod sbyin yin te dgos grub bo// bdag nyid mnyam bzhag ta gi rgyal// ma tshogs dbang phyug dam la bsdu// sngags 'dis mchod la 'phrin las bcol/
728b2(rgyud 'grel): rang gi gnas su las lA dAgye// IM ta gi ni a gat+tA ya/ AM gat+ta yA/ a be sha ya/ A be sha ya/ pra be sha ya pra be sha yA/ b+han+d+ha ya/ b+hAn+ta ya/ to sha ya/ two sha ya// mo ha na/ mo ha nA// sar+b+ba DA ki na nAn/ hI da ya
728b3(rgyud 'grel): hUM dza// dza hUM bam hU~M/ ta kI ni dza/ ces pa dang / oM badz+ri ta ki ni/ pr-i ti dza man b+ha lan+ti ta/ hUM phuT kha'i// IM tAM hI he/ ces thim paM ra mchod do// pha ma la sogs 'gro drug la// tshad med gtor ma 'di bsngos pas
728b4(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod ldan zhing tshogs bsngags nas// thams cad myur du sangs rgyas shog/ oM sarba s+thA ti nan+da e mr-i twe hUM/ zhes byam+bas pra dang snying rjes dmigs la// ci 'dod pa 'byung bar bsam zhing gte //
728b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phrin lusr-i bcol ba ni// sdang ba'i sgra thul// gnod pa'i bgegs tshom// zhing bcu gdul du lhogs// rnal 'byor pa'i bsam pa yi bzhin du 'grub par mdzad du gsol// ya hi g+ha dza// au bra laMn+ma taM te/
728b6(rgyud 'grel): dzo ba li nai ba la ba de gu he se ma ye swA hA// rnal 'byor longs spyod gol ba'i phyi rabs lo// ma spangs rol pas 'bras bu lhun grub pa/ yid dam za tshogs gtor ma 'di btang bas// kun gyis rdo rje 'chang
729a1(rgyud 'grel): gri gral thob shog/ za tshogs gtor ma'i lung rdzogs so// // bcom ldan 'das dpal sgrol byed thugs rje'i rgyu lnga po shin tu rnam par grol ba nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// mnyam
729a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid chos sku gsang ba'i sku// longs spyod rdzogs sku sprul pa'i sku// sku lnga'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das// kun bzang ngang la phyag 'tshal te// rgyal ba'i dgongs pa kun 'dus las// mdo don chos kyi rnal grol
729a3(rgyud 'grel): sgo de shis de 'jug bde bsgrub phyir// mi 'gul tsam du bsdus te ba shed// kun bzang thugs rjes 'gro don du// theg pa gsum snang 'dul mdzad pa'i// don dam nges pa'i theg mchog las// gsang sgo mtshon pa'i mdo
729a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud don// rnam pa gsum du shos bya ste// bya ba'i gzhi dang byed pa'i rkyen/ bya bral 'bras bu'i mthar phyin dag/ ji snyed chos kyi rtsa bar bshad// phyi nang bye brag ji snyed pa'i// chos rnams thams cad byang chub sems//
729a5(rgyud 'grel): ji bzhin dang du ye gnas pa// shes par bya ba'i rgyu don yin// rtsol bcas spyod pas 'dres 'jug pa'i// thag pa de ni bya byed rkyen// gzhan du 'bras bu re rtsol med// bsgrub bya nyid la lam gnas pas// thabs
729a6(rgyud 'grel): chen theg 'di bye bral ba'o// de yang phyi nang nyid la'ang // gzhi dang thabs dang 'bras bu yi// tshul gsum bye brag chos su bshad// gzhi ni snga ma'i don nyid de// thabs ni lam yin rnam pa gsum// gol
729b1(rgyud 'grel): sgrib ngo bo yan lag ste/ gol sa lhung ba'i sgo dgu dang // nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib sogs dang // thun mong rtog pa brgya bcu gcig/ dgu bcu la sogs skyon rnams dang // shes pa'i bye brag drug la sogs// mi mthun
729b2(rgyud 'grel): gol sgrib phyogs su bshang // ngo bo thabs dang shes rab ste// rol pa'i kau ra la sogs pa'i// man ngag thabs kyi bad+yer 'jug dang // blos bsama? skem pa'i tshul 'gro ba'o// der ni 'jig pa rnam gsum ste/ rtog
729b3(rgyud 'grel): dpyod don dang yi ge yi// rjes 'jug dang po sngon 'gro nyid// blo yi stobs kyis rnam pa gnyis// lus las snang ba'i chos rnams la// rigs pa'i gtan tshigs mtha' dag dang // man ngag nges pa'i tshad ma yis/
729b4(rgyud 'grel): so sor rtog dang rtsol med par// rims dang cig car gtan la 'bebs// de nas 'jug pa'i tshul sgo ni// don la rims dang cig car pa'o// don ni chos nying sring po la// rjes su 'jug pa sems yin te// de
729b5(rgyud 'grel): yang skabs kyi khyad par gyis// lam lnga'i skabs dang bcur 'gyur bas// rim par bskyod pa'i lam du bshad// blo zhan rim gyis 'jug pa'ang yul dang shes pa'i tshul lta bur// ji bzhin pa la blo bzhag pas/
729b6(rgyud 'grel): rigs pa'i khyad par skabs su 'phags// gsal dang bcan dang yun rings dang // shin tu ring dang tshad las 'das// mi mthun phyogs dang phrang pa'i tshe// de dbang gyur dang cung zad du/ mi 'gyur thang cig
730a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa dang // gsal bar bstan pa'i ring goms dang / nga dbang gyur nas ches bstan dang // spyod lam kun tu rlung gnas yin// de dag zag bcas bsam gtan te// gnyis myed yul
730a2(rgyud 'grel): bral de mthong min// mnyam nyid gsang ba'i bde don la// dang dang mos dang der rtsol dang // des de g.yo dang cher g.yos dong // mthong dang 'dra bar 'gyur yin te// skaR+Sha phran 'bring dang chen po dang // gcig pa gnyi
730a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zla ba 'dra// rang gi mtshan nyid mngon sum du// gsal bar mthong bas dbug ste phyin te// zag pa zad nas 'jig rten 'das// gsum pa'i ro bong spyan 'dra yin// mthong ba'i don lnga mnyam gnas pas//
730a4(rgyud 'grel): brtan par 'gyur te lung chen thob// 'bras bu cher 'byung bzhi pa 'dra// rang dang smr-i yi tho snyad bral// dmigs med kun gas la ye shes nyid/ g.yo dang zla ba dang bstan rdzogs pa'i// rim pas mthar phyin
730a5(rgyud 'grel): grasam dA snang // lnga brgyad cu drug tshul du gsal// de dag sa dang rnal 'byor skabs// sems lam bcu dAdA wA zhes bya// gang dgA tho chen mngon rtogs pas// mAnyam nyid yul bral rang gsalo bAr+ya//
730a6(rgyud 'grel): mi ga yi cig car gang 'jug pa// sa dang lam gyi grangs rtsol med// yi go mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor dag/ blo yi khyad par che phra ba'i// thams cad gsal rdzogs cig car dang // lnga dang bcu la sogs
730b1(rgyud 'grel): bar snang // lam lnga rnal 'byor rigs 'dzin gyi// sa drudu gnas skabs ye shes dang // sgrib dang gol sa rtogs pa dang // spyod dang ting 'dzin dam tshig dang // dus dang dngos grub mthar phyin dang // lha
730b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i khyad par gnas 'gyur sogs// bye brag lam lnga'i chos su snang rnal 'byor sna bcu'i lam rnams la'ang // khyad par de dag rnam bcur gsal// lha yi phyag rgya cig pa dang // gnyiso 'brel yan
730b3(rgyud 'grel): lag rdzogs pa dang // 'khor lo gcig dang rnam spros dang // shin tu rnam sposau dkyil 'khor dang // gling gcig gang dang stong gsum dang // grangs med shin tu grangs ming+ga dang // chos dbyings mtha' yus
730b4(rgyud 'grel): rab gsal rdzogs// de dag rnam pa'i khyad par yang // rtog dang mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor dang // chu zla lta bur gzung med drang // gzung 'dzin gnyis bral de nyid dang // ci la'ang mi gnas mnyam nyid
730b5(rgyud 'grel): dang // rang gi mtshan nyid gsil nges dang // zag pa med dang wAn grub pa'i// rap+na'i brong tha ma'i rim pa yis// thob dang shin tu thob pa dang // brtan rdzogs nyid de rnam bcu'o// tshad kyang khru bzhi brgyad
730b6(rgyud 'grel): cu drug// sum cu gnyis dang drug cu bzhi// de bzhin 'gyur sogs chos dbyings rnams// lhar gsal 'phro 'du dbugs yul dang // dri sgra gzugs sogs rim bzhin 'phags// de dag
731a1(rgyud 'grel): yi rtsal yin to// shes rab la sogs kun de bzhin// khyad par gyur cing rnam par 'phel// don dang yI ge gang de'adra// so so'i gnas skabs lam bdug nyid// bgrod dang de
731a2(rgyud 'grel): chos ldan pa dang // rgyud mi gtong dang rten byed dang // dus de skabs dang 'bras bu dang // gags dang 'dra ba'i lhung gnas dang // rtsol zhing bgrod pa'i lam sems dang // spyod lam dang ni blo gnas dang // ma 'da' bsrung
731a3(rgyud 'grel): dang dus nyid dang / yon tan mthu dang bye bral dang // shes rab stobs dang khyad par las// tha snyad bye brag rnamasu gsungs// gzhan yang sems bskyed sngags la sngogs// lam gyi chos sgo tha snyad
731a4(rgyud 'grel): kun+da// lnga dang bcu sogs grags pa yau ni// dang po gnyis lnga gnas pa ni// gasdang chen 'bras bu lam gyi rten// de bzhin rim par bgrod gnas n+yA// lcong yang gzugs kyis zin pa dang // lus ngan mi srid bde
731a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro yis// yAng+ge dag gnas dang 'dod rigs sogs// bde 'gro'i gnas ngan mi srid dang // khams gsum 'jig tshogs zag bral dang // mi ldog mo gnas phyir 'ong dang // mi shes skyon bral mtha' rdzogs
731a6(rgyud 'grel): nas// sa par mi ldog sangs rgyas sar// thogs med mngon gyur lhun gyis grub// de phyir lam gyi mchog tu brjod// de rkyen yan lag rnam pa gnyis// sgrub byabyed rkyen dang shes byed pa'i// lam gyi yan lag
731b1(rgyud 'grel): sum cu gnyis// mdo dang bzhi dang bslab pa'i mtha'// mdo ni gAcu gnyis 'jug sgo dang // dam tshig lta ba ting 'dzin dang // dmigs pa bzlas pa 'phrin las dang // spyod pa dang ni thob bya'i dbang // rigs 'dzin
731b2(rgyud 'grel): sa dang sangs rgyas so// nges byed yan lag dag tu bshad// gzhi ni rnam bcu bsgrub pa dang // gsang sngags ming dang spyod pa dang // dngos grub gnas dang bzlas pa'i sgra// phyag rgya ting 'dzin lta ba dang // cho 'phrul
731b3(rgyud 'grel): dgra ste de dag ston// dpe bac+doMs mtshan nas rab tu shes// brlab pa'i mtha' ni rnam bcu ste// dam tshig bzhi dang rgyu de dgrol dang // sgo mo bsdus dang phul dbyung dang // thag bcad pa dang nyams blang dang // la
731b4(rgyud 'grel): dor spyod dang dbang rim dang // man ngag don dang mdor bsdus rnams// rnal 'byor bslab pa'i mtha' bcur bcad// gzhi 'dzin pa ni dam tshig ste// sgo gsum sdom par gnas pa'i doni// rtsa ba yan lag+na lA
731b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i// bsrung dang bsgrub pa de nyid do// rgyud 'gro li byA ni thos bsam ste// mkhas ldan dam pa'i bla mU la// dad dang sri zhu gus pa yI// don glang nyan 'dzin rtogs byed 'grol// sgo bskur ba ni theg
731b6(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams// shes par byed dang rtsol ba ste// gau la sgrib phyogs su gang gsungs dag/ bcid phyir de dag rig shes byed// phul du dbyung ba 'di don nyid// mkhas shing rab tu shes pa'o// thag bcad pa ni
732a1(rgyud 'grel): lta ba ste// ji bzhin ma nor shes rab nyid// re dogs med byar sngon 'gro don// nyams blangs pa ni ting 'dzin ste// phyag rgya bzhis sogs spros pa dang // spros myed la sogs bsam
732a2(rgyud 'grel): gtan yin// la dor ba ni spyod pa ste// dkyil 'khor bzhi dang las bzhi dang // bsgrub pa la sogs bye brag dang // phun mong thabs kyi mdza' spyod nyid// dbang ni rim par bgrod byed pa'i// lnga dang lnga sogs nus mthu bskyed//
732a3(rgyud 'grel): muna? ngag don bsgrub thabs kyi mchog/ gser 'gyur bdud rtsi lta bu'i tshul// mdor bsdu ba ni sems kyi don// ji bzhin dang rtogs kun 'dus pa'o// shes byed yan lag rnam pa gnyis// mtshon byed tshig don yi
732a4(rgyud 'grel): ge'i sgra// rgyud don yan lag rnam drug dang // de 'grel gtan la 'bebras byed pa'i// lce mig zhes su grags pa de// rgyud ni byin rlabs 'byung ba dang // lung bstan rgyud pA rnam gnyis phyir// de 'grel pa yang
732a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa gr-inyi sa// byin rlabs smra bzhi bstan pa dag/ bshad thabs lce mig rlom gnyis ti// dpyod pa'i 'dren sgo rnam 'a grol gsum// 'byo pa drug dang 'grol gyi ba ni// nges par 'byin pa rnam gsum mo
732a6(rgyud 'grel): sgo gnyis spyi dang khyad par ste// spyi'ang rnam gsum yan lag mdo// rtsa ba dag gis 'grel bar byed// khyad par gsang sgo'i rnam 'grol yang // yan lag mdo dang rtsa ba yis// 'obyed 'grel nges par
732b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byin par byed// 'byed pa rgyu dang rtsa ba dang // 'grel dang tshig dang nges par sbyor// rgyu ni gleng gzhi drug yin te// don gang gang tshe gang nyid kyis// gang du gang la bshad brjod pa'o// rtsa ba gleng bslang rkyen nyid dang // ji
732b2(rgyud 'grel): lhor bslang nas zhus bsha de tshul// 'grel pa glang brjod grang gis brjod// gang phyir gang gi stobs kyis bshad// 'dren pa brjod pa'i rgyu 'di dag/ ji ltar bshad pa'i tshul bcu ste// rang bzhin lta ba'i nges
732b3(rgyud 'grel): dron+da dang // spyi de ni bsdud dang rnam par dbye// tshig don 'grel dang 'bril shugs sbyor// rang lugs nyid dang brgal len dang // ldem da gongs brda'i dang dpe sa mtshon dang // man+ta ngag gab+dza sbas 'byin
732b4(rgyud 'grel): bsde byas rnams// dI pi bcu lta bur bshad pa'o// nges pa gtan tshigs rnam bcu gnyis// snod sgo bzhi la bstan pa bzhi// 'tsham par so sor nges byed dang // lung dang don dang rigs pa daung /
732b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshon dpe gtan tshigs mtha' dag gis// snang dang mi 'gal rgyas 'thad sbyar// de drug re raM'ang dgos pa dang // ngo bo nges tshig dmigs bzung bcas// rnam bcu gnyis kyisnga nges 'byed shes
732b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba byang chub yan lag ste// rtogs pa bzhi dang mtshan nyid bzhi// dgos 'a brel bzhi dang yan lag bzhi// der 'jug bzhi dang mtshon dpe bzhi// bsnyen bsgrub yan lag bzhi dag dong // mtshan
733a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid tshul dang sbyor ba ni// rnam pa gsum cu rtsa gnyis rnams// gzhi nyid 'brel dang zug bcas dang // mtho dang bsgom dang mthor phyin dang // sangs rgyus sa dang rnam drug du// bsdus
733a2(rgyud 'grel): te dwe yi yan lag yin// cho 'phrul ba zhi dang mngon shes lnga lnga dang // rang bzhin lnga dang 'phrin lhas bzhi// gzhan don spyod pa'i yan lag ste// bla myong sbyor ba'i chos 'grel yin// mdo bzhi thos
733a3(rgyud 'grel): mthong mngon sum dang // bya ba med dang rnam bzhir 'grel// rtse ba nges pa'i man ngag gsum// mi mthun phyogs rnams bcad pa dang // don mthun 'gro ba'i dpe mtshon dang // nges pa'i don la gnas pa yi
733a4(rgyud 'grel): don gsum tshul gyis rnam 'grel 'byin// lung bstan brgyud pa'i bstan pa yang // de bzhin tshul du 'grel ba ste// rgyud don rnam gsum khungs dang rgyu// ngo bo nyid de dang po ni// thun mong bcas gzhi
733a5(rgyud 'grel): spyi rgyud do// gdams ngag lung bstan rtso ba'i rgyud// gling gzhi spyi yi rgyud ces ba// 'khor 'dus smras dang bskul zhes pa// bstan pa 'byung ba'i rgyu rkyen ste// ngo bo 'tshogs pa drug nyid do// gleng bslang
733a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs drug rnams dang // mdo bzhi rtsa ba gsum la sogs// tshul bzhin rje sra sbyar bar bya de dag 'bras bu'i lam du bshad// 'bras bu nyid ni rdzogs sangs rgyas// sku gsung thug
733b1(rgyud 'grel): dang yon tan s+thA// nyi shu lngar bsdus mtha' lhas rnams// lhun rdzogs rnams kun mkhyen pa'o// gsang mchog gsung bdag bka' lung n+yAd rgyud do// gsang bsdus gsalta bshad mdo tsam phyogs
733b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa// ma nor ma 'gal tsam du nyams kyis bstan// de yi dge ba gang mchis yongs la bsngo// gsang ba'i mdo don bsdus pa// slob dpon d+harma bo des mdzad pa rdzogs so// / skabs
733b3(rgyud 'grel): 'grel bye brag tu bshad pa bzhugs// / mi 'khrug pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyud las 'byung ba'i skabs bshad bya// de yang rgyud nyid las/ sa dang gnas skabs ye shes dang // sgrib dang gol sa rtog pa
733b4(rgyud 'grel): dang / spyod dang ting 'dzin dam tshig dang // dus dang dngos grub mthar phyin dang // lta ba'i khyad par gnas 'gyur rnams// thams cad gcig las med na yang // grangs sam dbye ba'i bye brag rnamas+ya//
733b5(rgyud 'grel): snod kyi rtsol dang sbyar nas ni// chos rnams kun bzhir gcig pa la// kun bzhi'i gnas 'gyur rnams pa lnga// bye brag lam lnga'i chos su snang // zhes gsungs pas// lngar brjod pos 'di ni snod
733b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi// rim pas bcur yang 'gyur par dgongs so// de la lngar drangs pa ni bcu'i yang rtsa bar 'gyur ba'i phyir// blo rims su sbyor ba'i rab kyi ched du bstan ste// gang zhi ne/ sa dang zhes pa// 'gyur
734a1(rgyud 'grel): ba ma nges pa'i sa ni rkyen la rag lus pa dang // rigs thams cad pa yin ste// 'jug ldog lhung dang bcas pa yis// kun tu 'khor zhing mA nges pa'o// zhes bka' las snang ngo // gany+dzi swa pa gal chen
734a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyong ba'i sa ni// ched du brtson 'grus lam 'bad na// legs nyes 'byung ba'i nyes dpung du 'gro bas/ slab pa bcu la 'jug cing sbyor ba la brten pa'i phyir ro// de yang 'di skad du// dge dang mi dge'i las rnams
734a3(rgyud 'grel): kun// gcod sbyong sbyor ba'i tshul nyid kyis// legs nyes stobs chen 'gyed pa'o zhes snang ngo // gsum pa mi ldog gnas pa 'am// rten pas khyad par 'gro ba'i sa ni// mthong lam thob pas 'jigs
734a4(rgyud 'grel): pe wA dang bral ba'i phyir ste// mthong ba la brten nas// bogs su 'gro ba'i rten gnas nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// 'di skad du/ bdun nyid rdzogs pas 'gro ba ste// zhes pa dang / ngal so ba las thams cad mtho / mi
734a5(rgyud 'grel): ldog pa la goms byas med// zhes snang ngo // bzhi pa dmigs pa 'bras bu skye ba'i sa ni// bsgom pa'i lam ste// 'dir gsang sngags kyi gnung gis/ spyod yul mi dmigs mod kyi// dmigs par tha
734a6(rgyud 'grel): snyed 'dogs te// mthong ba'i don la blo shin tu mi dmigs pa yis// 'bras bu 'byin pa'i gzhi'i phyir ste// 'di skad du// khyed par rtsa la 'phang kun rdzogs shing // ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyor ba'o// /
734b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes snang ngo // lnga pa rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i sa ni// rgyal tshab skyes pur gyur pa'i phyir dang // mthar phyin pa'i lam pa yin pa'i phyir// nus pa'i rtsa la rdzogs pas// sangs rgyas la sbyor bar byed pa'i gnas/
734b2(rgyud 'grel): yin pa'i phyir ro// 'di skad du// phyag rgya chen po sgyur ba'i tshul chen yin// mthong ba'i gnas no bcu drug sa// zhes snang pos// chos 'phrul 'gyed nus shing phyag rgya chen po'i rig sa 'dzin yang
734b3(rgyud 'grel): yin pa'i phyir ro// gnas skabs zhes pa// rtsa badz+ra'i rgyud kyi dbang du// gnas dang skabs cig du stan ste// bzhed tshig du// yon tan mthong thos rkyen phrad dang // byin brlabs 'brel cing mtshungs
734b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas// gAyo semasa? 'byung zhing 'dun skye ba'i// dus kyi thad la bab phyir ska bA sa zhes bya'o// brlab pa 'jug pa'i skabs gnyis pa'ang // 'dri skad du// g.yo smon rgyu yis bslab bcu la// der
734b5(rgyud 'grel): mi sdod par ldang sems kyis// bcu la 'jug pa'i gzhi dang du s+yA// thad du bA bau phyir ming thob pa'o// zhes bya'o// gsum pa ro myong ba'i skabs ni/ 'di skad du// sems gsu mA rgyu yis bslab rdzogs
734b6(rgyud 'grel): nas// 'jug pa'i sems rgyus bden mthong ba// ji bzhin nyid kyi ro myong ba'i// gnas dus nges pas skabs su brjod zhes bya'o// bzhi pa yul la 'jug pa'i gnas skabs no// 'di skad du// mthong ba'i
735a1(rgyud 'grel): shes yul nges pa la// dgra dbang mi 'gyur lhag sems kyis// rang rig gnyis med mi grayo bar// byed la 'jug pa'i skabs su swA zhes bya'o// lnga pa tog chenA la
735a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas skabs ni// 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor sngon sum rgyus// rang rig mngon sum rig sems skyes// yang drag don mthong zil phebs phyir// de le di skad brjod pa yi ni zhes pa'o// bshad rgyad kyi dang
735a3(rgyud 'grel): dang skabs so so ste/ de la gnas zhes pa// 'dod pa grub pa mthar phyin pa'i gnas ni// ji skad du// rkyen gyi rnal 'byor bya byed dang // gas lam rdzogs pa dang // 'di da sngar staras da thams
735a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i lasang lam rnyed pa ni// las mthar phyin pa swa 'dir phrod cing // de la brten phyir gnas su brjod zhes bya'o// gnyis pa pa grub 'phags pa'i gnas no// ji skad nga// ngag don
735a5(rgyud 'grel): bzong // de ra rigs dris gzungs sngags yod// de phyir 'phags pa zhes bya ste// skye bo sA las 'das pa'i gnas// zhes bya'o// rnam pa bden pa grub pa yang dag pa'i gnas ni// da du
735a6(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i sa med don// mthong ba mthar phyin mi bslu zhing // phyin ci ma log la rten phyir// dang po'i dbugs chen byi 'o pa'i gnas// zhes bya'o// bzhi pa mas su rung ba'i sbyor ba'i gnas
735b1(rgyud 'grel): mthong nas goms pa mi g.yo ba'i// gnyis med gsal lA mi g.yo ba'i// ting 'dzin goms pas 'bras bur sbyor// mthar la ma rlag pa'o// zhes bya'o// lnga pa lhun gyis grub pa mnyam pa'i gnas ni// ji skad du//
735b2(rgyud 'grel): mthong gro mas stobs su gyur pa yi sA// 'bras bu thob pA'i skabs yin+da zhing // shIng 'brasna tshogs kyi dpaM lto bus// yon ton rdzogs pas blang dor med// zhes bya'o// skabs zhes pa lnga ste// sems can gyi
735b3(rgyud 'grel): skabs ni// ras bal sa bon lta bu'i gzhi// g.yo byas s+thi yi rnal 'byor gyi// bsgom bya yid la byed pa'i gzhi// da dung ma nges d+ha na tsam mo// zhes bya'o// gnyis pa 'phrogs pa'i skabs ni// ji skad du/ dad pas
735b4(rgyud 'grel): smos pas lam 'gro zhing // skyob pa pa 'dri bzod thob phyir// 'du shes rigs nges khyad par 'phags// yang rgyud du nges phyir ro// gsum paso thob pa'i skabs ni/ 'di skad du// mi slob chos mig rdul bral
735b5(rgyud 'grel): zhing // dbugs chen phyin nas mi ldog pa'i// ting 'dzin thob pa'i dus des phyir// de lo mtshan du de skad brjod// zhes bya'o// gzhi pa rigs 'dzin byang chub thob pa'i skabs ni/ byang chub sems dpany+tsa sem
735b6(rgyud 'grel): chen por// bdag phyir bzlog med gzhan don du// phyir 'ong rang dbang skye spyod phyir/ rgyal ba'i sras po gdung 'tsho ba skabs// zhes bya'o// lnga pa 'bras bu thob pa'i skabs ni/ ji skad du// byang chub chen por
736a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs sems skyes// rgyal tshab skyes bur rtsa la rdzogs pa// lam du gyur pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir// 'bras bu'i skabs zhes mtshan+da nges pa'o// zhes bya'o// ye shes dang zhes bya ba ni// mnyam par
736a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhag pa re re la// ye shes re re 'chur ba'o zhes snang bas// skabs lngar sems lnga bsgom shir gyi ye shes lnga stau// ji skad du/ yang dag bden pa gnyis med don// yid byed g.yo yi ye shes dang // bzod thob
736a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jug slob ye shes dang // ma nor mthong dga'i ye shes dang // de nyid mi 'gyur gnas ye shes// de mthar rdzogs sems ye shes so// zhes bya'o// bsgrib dang zhes pa 'di skad du// so so thun mong ma yin pa'i// sgrib
736a4(rgyud 'grel): la sa zhes rdzi byed cing zhes snang bas/ lta ste/ 'di skad du// sa 'am rnal 'byor rnam lnga po// rlung rang mthong la zhen pa yis// gong ma gong ma ma mthong phyir// lam gyi dbye bas sgrib pa'ang lnga'o// zhes bya'o// gal
736a5(rgyud 'grel): sa zhes pakaM/ 'od skad du/ thun mong rgyu yi lam lngar g+hol// khyad par sgrib lo bltos tshul gyis// lam lnga gong dmigs 'og lha can/ lhung nor phyir na sgra 'jug pa'o// zhes bya'o// rtog pa dang zhes pa ni// che'u
736a6(rgyud 'grel): byas pa'i rtogs pa ste// 'di skad du// sa lnga dang po tshig la rtog/ gnyis pa yi ge gsum pa ming // bzhi brda tha snyad lnga par rtogs// beg chags lnga yod sbyong ba'i phyir// bltos na phyags rgya 'phro 'du
736b1(rgyud 'grel): dang shes yul rnams la gnas phyir rtog/ zhes bya'o// spyod dang zhes pa ni// bzhi phyir spyod pa'ang skabs kyis bdag dang gzhan don du// sngon 'byung dang rjes 'jug tshul du 'gyur ro// de la sa dang por ni/ rtsol
736b2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang tshogs kyi sa lam yin pa'i phyir// rtsal tshogs gnyis la'ang shin tu 'bad// byin brlabs dbang sgyur thabs tshul gyis// gzhan don mtha' 'ga' bsnol bas spyod// gnyis pa bdag phyir legs
736b3(rgyud 'grel): nyes la// gcod spyod stobs phyir shin du'ang // brtson spyod dben las phyogs gcig spyod// slob spyod badri ga gzhan don kyang byed// gsum par mi dmigs shar ba yis// 'dod pa'i dngos po dbang sbyor
736b4(rgyud 'grel): phyir// bdag phyir mi dmigs gzhan phyed du// 'khor lo sgyur bas gsang sngags ston// bzhi par bdag phyir rnal 'byor spyod// gzhan la byir 'ong sa yin phyir// rang dbang can du skye zhes nas// ji ltar 'dod
736b5(rgyud 'grel): lhur thabs mchog sbyor// lnga pAr ting 'dzin rtsa la rdzogs phyi ra// dbang sgyur thabs kyi spyod pa yis// cho 'phrul bzhi sogs sna tshogs ston// gangal bya smin ning 'khor lo'ang skor/ zhes bya'o// dam tshogs
736b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba// skabs kyi ched du byed pa las// brtags kyi rtsa ba yan log rnams// kun srung bye brag dang por ni// bdud ldi dgra bzhi bzlog pa dong / spyod pa rgyun nam bzhi la gnaso// 'dun cing yi
737a1(rgyud 'grel): rang ma nyams byed// gnyis pa bslab pa bcu byed las// mi 'da' bzod las mI nyams byed// gsum bAr lta ba'i dam tshigs byed// mthong ba mi gnas martson par byed//
737a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di skad du nam mkha' lta bu'i rnal 'byor pas// namra mkha' lta bu'i dam tshig srung / zhes gsungs so// bzhi par ting nge 'dzin gyi so nyid las// mi nyams ma yengs mi 'da' ba'o// 'di skad du/ brjed pa
737a3(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis// bskyang ba med pa'i pa'i ngang du bsdum// zhes gsungs te// gzhan du ni/ phyir 'ong bar dam bcas pa gang yin pa'o// lnga par med dang phyal pa cig pu dang / lhun gyis grub pa rnam
737a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa'o// ting 'dzin dang zhes pa'ang lnga ste// rnam par mi rtog lU sgrom pa'ang / gang rung dang por yid la byed // gnyis pa 'phro 'du gcig pa dang // gsum pa yongs su mi ldog cing // bzhi par de
737a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nyid bsgom dang // lnga par kun tu snang ba sgom// de phyir rnal 'byor yin// zhes bya'o// dus dang zhes pa'ang lta ste/ gsang sngags yid la byed tsam yod// de phyir dran pa thob par smre// gsang ba'i bslab
737a6(rgyud 'grel): bcu thob pa'i dus// gnyis med rtogs pa thob pa'i dus/ ny-i rnaMm pa cwo 'i dus de mngon gyur bas mthar byin du// zhes bya'o// dngos grub zhes pa/ dang po 'dod pa grub pa dang // gnyis pa bzod pa grub pa dang // zhe
737b1(rgyud 'grel): pa bdan grub bzhi pa las// rung ba grub pa'o// lnga pa ni/ lhun gyis grub pa'i rigs thob pa'o// 'on te dang po gnyis pa ni// dmigs pa grub pa'o// gsum pa ni/ don dum bcud kyi rnam shes rgyas// bzhi pa 'kho
737b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dbyings su 'grub// lnga pa thams cad 'grub par gsungs// mthar phyin dang zhes pa// dge ba'i las mtha' gsang sngags la// 'dir phrad dang po gnyis pa ni// bslab mtha' bcu la slob phyir ro// gsum
737b3(rgyud 'grel): pa mthong mthar gsang sngags mthong // de rgyus bzhi par gsang sngags don// mthong ba goms bya de nyid mthar// phyin pa'o lnga par mthar lam 'bras// rdzogs phyir 'bras bu kun gyi mthar// rtsal chen
737b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa thob pa'o// lta ba'i khyad par zhes pa lnga ste/ dang po 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni// g.yo smon gyis gsang sngags la nyan dbang nos nas// slob du zad kyang / tshig gi tshogs pa sgra'i rnal 'byor
737b5(rgyud 'grel): yin pa'i phyir// blo sman pas gsang sngags kyis don tshig tu smra zhing // mthong ba med de// yid la byed pa'i lta ba'o// 'on kyang phyogs las de dung bzod pa'adra ma thob bo// de yang 'di skad du/ brtsol
737b6(rgyud 'grel): ba las kyi rnal 'byor pas// 'dun pa sems dpa'i rnal 'byol la// sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam drug po// shes rab brtsal gyi 'phang dmas pas// ting 'dzin rtsal yang chung ba ste// don la mthong
738a1(rgyud 'grel): bar mi 'gyur bas// zhes gsungs so// rigs chen 'byed pa'i lta ba ni// bcu yis snga gsum 'dus pa ste// 'did byed nas/ slob ba bcu'i tshe bzod pa thob ste// bden pa rnam gnyi sna dbyer
738a2(rgyud 'grel): med pa bstan pa la// mi skrag cing slar spyod pas// rang rig mtshan nyid du thos bsam gyi sgo nas shes te/ 'di smad du// don la mi skrag ngo mtshar skye// dpyod sems 'jug pa'i sems dpa' de// ngan song mi ldog
738a3(rgyud 'grel): dgon par 'jug/ zhes gsungs so// dbyigs chen 'byin pa'i lba ba nI kaM/ sa lnga par bsgoms pas chos nyid dzI lta bar mthong ste// mi ldog pa'i lto ba'o// de yang ngal sai ba las thams cad mthong // zhes gsung so//
738a4(rgyud 'grel): ldeng chen thob pa'i rnal 'byor gyi lta ba ni// mi g.yo bo'i lta ba ste/ de ltar mthong ba'o// rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i lta ba ni/ rang 'byung ye shes su bsgoms pas mngon du 'gyur ba ste/ 'di skad du/ rang 'byung
738a5(rgyud 'grel): rIng+ga rIg mngon sum snang dus na/ rang 'byung ye shwes de nyid mthong zhes bya/ zhes gsungaso// la la dag ni 'di skad du/ lta byA lnga ni shes pA lha// gsang sngags 'did pa 'dam shes dang // rnam pAr shes
738a6(rgyud 'grel): pa bslab bcu dang // bzod thob rang gi mtshan nyid shes// thams cad mi skyes ye shes dang // de las yongs su mi g.yor shes// shes pa chen po kun tu snang // mthong ba dam pa'i lta ba yin zhe
738b1(rgyud 'grel): smra'o// gnas 'gyur rnams zhes pa// skabs lnga kun gzhi lnga bag chags lnga dang bcas pa gnas 'gyur ba ste/ dran pa thob pa'i dus sems can gyi skabs su skye bo'i shes pa ma rig pa las sems g.yo
738b2(rgyud 'grel): pa 'byung bas// lam gyi gzhir gyur pas rkyen gyis bsgyur ba las kyi bag chags gnas ste/ sbyong zhing 'dod pa shes par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang po'o// spyod pa thob pa'i dus 'phags pa'i skabs su bslab
738b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bcu yang dag pa'i don la sbyor ba'i phyir/ sbyor ba bdun pa'i kun gzhir 'gyur ste// mngon du rgyu ba gnas te sbyong ngo // rtogs pa thob pa'i dus sa thob pa'i skabs su// 'og gi 'bad pas bden pa mthong
738b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir// snang ba don gyi kun+do gzhir gnas 'gyur ste/ de'i tshe kun du rgyu'i bag chags gnas te sbyong ba'o// rigs 'dzin byang chub sems dpa'i skabs goms pa thob pa'i dus su/ mthong ba la goms/
738b5(rgyud 'grel): pas sems mi g.yo ba'i phyir/ 'gyur med gnas pa'i kun gzhi ra gnas 'gyur ste/ bag chags lhan cig skyes pa'i gnas de sbyong ba'o// mthar phyin pa'i dus byang chub chen po'i 'bras bu thob pa'i
738b6(rgyud 'grel): skabs su/ sngar goms pas mngon du gyur pa'i phyir// bcil med gnas pa'i kun gzhir gnas 'gyur ste/ bag la nyal gnas pa sbyong ba'o// zhes 'chad na/ kho bo ni dang po rigs ma nges pa dang /
739a1(rgyud 'grel): chos nyid ma shes pa'i phyir der 'gyur zhes mI 'dogs pa'i phyir// dang po nas gnyis par 'gyur ba nas/ lnga pa nas sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bu dang lnga ste/ lam lngar rang rig ta
739a2(rgyud 'grel): nge 'dzin brtan pas/ yis skyes pas sgrib pa re sbyangs pa skad cig ma phyi ma la lam ldor skabs lnga'i phyir// kun gzhi'i gnas 'gyur rnam pa lngas// bye brag lam lnga'i chos su bshad// zhes gsangs so/
739a3(rgyud 'grel): bag chags lnga ni sgrib pa lngar yang gsungs te// de dag ni rgyu 'bras kyi phyir khyad yod de// 'di skad du/ de dag re zhing rgyu 'bras gnyis// snga ma snga ma gang dang gang / phyi ma phyi ma smin pa'i rgyud// de bzhin ku
739a4(rgyud 'grel): bar 'byung // zhes gsungs te/ 'chad pa'i bcu po'ang rgyud 'i bras su 'gyur bar dgongs so// yang sa bcur bshad pa bya ni// sa dang zhes pa/ 'gyur dbang ma nges pa'i sa dang // rten pa gzhi'i sa dang // gal rkyen/
739a5(rgyud 'grel): skyong ba'i sa dang // bslab pA rgyun+da gyi sna dang / bsod nams gter gyis dang / rten pas khyad par+ra du 'gro ba'i swa dang // dmigs pas 'bras bu skye ba'i sa dang / gnas pa mI 'gyur pa'i sa dang // bdal pa chos
739a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi sa dang / rdzogs pa spyir chib kyi sa'o// de yang bcur bstan pa ni/ gas pa snga gos rims 'jug gi 'bring gi yul lo// gzhi bcu ro de las spros pa ni/ tha ma'i dbong du gsungs pa'o// de las
739b1(rgyud 'grel): lnga ni lnga'i skabs su bshad de/ sngar lnga'i ska su mA bu shadad+d+ha pa rnams cung zhig du dgrol ba ni gang zhe na// dang po gnyis pa rten pa gzhi'i sa ni// 'di skad du/ dang po gsang ba'i bslab pa la/ rtsol bar sbyong ba la brten nas/ dang
739b2(rgyud 'grel): las kyi rnal 'byor ste// sa rnams kun gyi gzhi rten no// zhes gsungs so// gal chen bshad zin to// de'i cha bslab pa rgyun gyi sa ni/ 'dir bslab pa bcu la zhugs nas mi gtong bar rgyun du 'bado pas phyogs su byed pa'i
739b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas yin pa'i phyir ro// 'di skad du/ bslab pa'i mtha' bcu mthar phyin cing // ji ltar zla ba yar gsal bzhin// bslab pa'i ye shes 'phel 'gyur te/ zhes gsungs te/ bsod na mas gter gyi sa ni/ 'di skad du/
739b4(rgyud 'grel): bslab pa ban+da mthar phyin pa yi// bsod nams yon tan zad mi sh+les// slab pas mthur phyin+da bsgom pa'i sa// mthong lamA thob la ma rag pa'o// zhes gsungs so// drug pa dang bdun pa dang brgyad pA gsum
739b5(rgyud 'grel): bshad zin to// dgu po lnga pA las 'phros pa bdal ba chos nyid ni/ rang gi kun gzhi'i chos nyid dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa des bgros pa med par kun khyab par rtogs pa'i gnas yin pa'i
739b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir ro// de yang yul don ye shes do sbyar bas// shes par byas pa thams cad rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// bcu pa rdzogs pa spyir cheb pa ni/ 'di skad du/ bcu po'i mtha ma dang po las// mthar rdzogs
740a1(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi rtog yin te/ glong yangs na mkha'i snying po la// sprin med nyi ma 'bum gyis bdal// cir snang ci'ang ma yin pa'i// mi skye mi 'gag ngo bo las// ji ltar bltas dgu der snang bas// theg mchog
740a2(rgyud 'grel): spyi rgyu rlabs kyis bcad// zhes gsungs so// gnas skabs zhes pa de gnyis kun 'dus wArA/ gnas skabs bcur yang sbyar te// 'dun pa skye ba'i gnas skabs dang / zhes pa la sogs pas mngon no// dgongs
740a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dus ltar so sor bshad na/ dang po bshad zin to// gnyis pa'i gnas nI/ dz+nyAn pa grub pa lam gyi gnas te/ lAm rnams kyi gzhir gyur pa'i phyir ro// gsum pa bshad zin to// bzhi pa ni bzod pa grub pa slob pa
740a4(rgyud 'grel): glanas te// zab mo'i don la bya zod pa thob pas// ye shes 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir// bslab pa bcu lA slob pa'i sa yin pa'i phyir ro// lnga pa bslab blo grub pa rtser cheb pa'i gnas de bslab pa bcu khrod du chud cing rtser
740a5(rgyud 'grel): cheb pa'i sa yin pa'i phyir ro// drug pa bdun pa brgyad pa bshad zin to// rdeng du gyur pa chos nyid kyi gnas dgu par/ bsgoms pas phebs pa stobasu gyur pa de 'dir chos nyid rdeng du gyur pa'i phyir ro// bcu pa 'bras
740a6(rgyud 'grel): bu grub pa rdzogs pa'i gnas ni/ mthar phyin pa'i phyir ro// skabs zhes pa/ dang po bshad/ gnyis pa rtsol ba sbyor ba'i skabs te/ smon pas slob pa la rtsol ba'i phyir ro// gsum pa bshad/ bzhi pa 'du shes 'gyur ba'i
740b1(rgyud 'grel): skabs nI/ rigs phyed pas sbyor ba'i sems kyis 'du shes yang dag pa'i yos su 'gyur te// yis 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir ro// lnga pa sbyor chen la 'jug pa'i skabs ni/ bslab bcus chib pas thos bsam gyi
740b2(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba'i don bsgom pa la 'jug pa'i phyir ro// drug pa bdun pa brgyad pa bshad zin to// dgu bya rdeng du gyur po'i skabs te/ rtags chen thob pa'i phyir ro// bcu pa las su rung ba'i skabs te/ rdzog sems
740b3(rgyud 'grel): skyes pas bskyed du bya ba'i lam med pa'i phyir ro// ye shes dang zhes pa sngar brjod pa'i gtani tshogs kyis/ skabs bcur sems bcu skyes pas sems dang chos 'phrad pa'i ye shes grol bar sa thang re'o// /
740b4(rgyud 'grel): de la dang po brjod zin/ smon pas khong du chud 'dod pa'i/ bden gnyis mgo mthong yid la byed// smon pa'i ye shes gong mra'i rgyu// de rgyus der mi brtan par ldang // bden gnyis rang gi mtshan nyid du// shes
740b5(rgyud 'grel): pa gcod spyong sbyor ba yi// bslab pa'i ye shes ye shes gsum// bzhi pa de rgyus sbyor sems kyis// lhag pa'i bden pa gnyis dri byer med don// thos la mi skrag spyod cing 'phel// bzod thob yang shes mi
740b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyu// lnga pa de rgyu so ye shes skyes// bden pa dbyer mang thos bsam gyis// ge ba'i don la 'jug sems pas// mthong la sbyor ba'i ye shes so// drug dang bdun pa brjod zin te// brgyad par 'di mtsha
741a1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i chos rnams thams cad kun/ mnyam pa chen po'i ngang du gsal// zhes gsungs te// rigs pa'i sems kyis mnyam nyid mthong ba'i ye sheso// dgu par gnas pa'i sems kyis dbyings dang yis dbyer
741a2(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i don shar ba ste/ 'di skad du/ srid pa'i sems can thams cad dang / thar pa'i chos kyi rnams grangs kun// sor thamams cad snang ba ste// kun kyang mnyam pa'i ngang du gsal/ zhes gsungs so// bcu pa rdzogs po'i
741a3(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis rang 'byung ye shes rdzogs par shar ba ste/ 'di skad du// sa chu me rlung snod bcud rnams// kun kyang rang bzhin chos nyid don// chos nyid don las gzhan med pa// rang 'byung ye shes gsal ba'o// zhes gsungs
741a4(rgyud 'grel): so/ sgrib dang zhes pa bcu ste/ sa 'og ma bcus gong ma'i lta ba rnams yul du mi gyur par brjod zin te// yang las kyi bag chags phra rags ni// gnyis pa dang po dag la bsgribu/ mngon du rgyu ba rab 'bring gsum//
741a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa bzhi dang lnga la sgrub// kun tu rgyu ba drug pa ste/ lhan cig skyes pa bdun la gnas// bag la nyal pa phra rags 'bring // brgyad dang dgu dang bcu la gnas// zhes gsungs so// gol sa zhes pa/ 'di skad du// rgyu/
741a6(rgyud 'grel): yi tshogs dang drod rtse mo// bzod dang 'jig rten chos mchog dang // mthong sgom mthar lam rnams su gol// yang na 'og ma 'og ma nyid// zhes gsungs so// rtog pa dang zhes pa bcu ste/ 'di skad du/ bag cha
741b1(rgyud 'grel): lnga yi phra rags bcu// sa bcur ldan pas chos nyid la/ ched du byed dang phyag rgya yang khyon dang 'phro 'du'i rtog sogs bcu// zhes gsungs so// spyod dang zhes pa bcu ste/ dang po bshad zin to// gnyis pa ni 'di skad
741b2(rgyud 'grel): du bslab pa sbyong dang nges pa lnga// deg dang ma dgra gis spyod pa'o// zhes 'byung bas// phra min gyi spyod pa'o// gsum pa bshad zin to// bzhi pa ni ngal snong mi ldog dgon par 'jug/ bar chang dag kyang de lngas 'byung
741b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsungs pas/ phyogs cig pa sgom pa'i spyod pa'o// lnga pa ni/ spyod pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor yin// zhes 'byung bas// rgyun gyi spyod pa'o// drug pa ni// bdag don shes rab dang mthun pa'o// gzhan don du 'di skad do//
741b4(rgyud 'grel): sgyus mas sbyong ba'i skyes bu de// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i tshe byang du/ rin cen bdun dang dpung tshogs kyis// dbang sgyur thubs kyi theg pa ston/ zhes gsungs s+ho// bdun pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor ba'o// zhes 'byung
741b5(rgyud 'grel): gi bdag den gzhan don du 'di skad du/ de gis skyes bu dam pa de// 'bras bu nyid la lam shes pas// lAm+bi gyi yan lag bde rdzogs te// gzhan dag smin par bya ba'i phyir// ji ltar 'dod pa ra thabs mchog
741b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyor// zhes gsungs so// brgyad pa bdag don sbyor ba'i spyod pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin mang po la bsgom pa'i phyir ro// gzhan don du/ 'di skad du/ de bas rgyal tshab skyes bu de// chos kyi rgyal po gang de yi/ gdung
742a1(rgyud 'grel): 'tsho ba dga' ldan theg chen ston/ mi gnas bcu dus cho 'phrul snang // zhes gsungs so// dgu pa ni/ sgyu ma'ang sgyu ma yin spyod pa'o// zhes gsungs pas// ye shes sgyu ma'i spyod pa'o//
742a2(rgyud 'grel): bcu pa ni lhun gyis grub pa'i spyod pa'o// yang kun 'dus las/ sa brgyad 'di skad du/ sbyor dang sgrol bar byed pa dang // ma byin len dang ngag sprul byed// rnal 'byor dma? chog spyod pa'i cho ga/ smye rnyed par bya ba'i
742a3(rgyud 'grel): las yin no// zhes gsungs so// dgu pa ni// thams cad mnyam pa'i dang la gnas// ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul las// dngos su spyod pa thams cad bya// de ni dam chog chen po yin// zhes gsungs so// bcu
742a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni// spyod dang spyod pa bya med pas// srid dang mu stegs 'jig rten pa'i// spyod par snang ba thams cad kun// lhun gyis grub pa'o mdzad spyod do// zhes gsungs so// dam tshig zhes pa bzhed tshig las//
742a5(rgyud 'grel): rang rang spyod las mi 'da' bA'i// dam+ba bca' bcu ni dam tshig go// zhes gsungs/ de phyir dang po bshad zin to// gnyis pa rtsol bya las mi 'da'// bzhi pa bslab pa las mi 'da'// lnga pa 'jug sgom
742a6(rgyud 'grel): las mi 'do'/ dgu pa chos nyid dam tshig gsum// brgyad pa dngos po bzhi la spyod po las mi 'da'// bcu pa bzhi las mi 'anga'o// brgyad pa 'di skad du/ 'dod pas chags pas 'joms pa dang / gti
742b1(rgyud 'grel): mug nga rgyal phrag dog rnams// rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig ste/ don dang ldan pa'i skyes bus spyod// dgu pa mi dam tshig dam pa gang zhe na/ rtogs pa dam pas dam tshig ste/ rtogs par byed pa gang yin pa/ de ni
742b2(rgyud 'grel): dum tshig chen po'o// bcu pa ni// med pa phyol ba cig pu dang // lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i dam tshig tshe// 'di zhes ris su tshad med pa// 'di ni bsrung ba'i dam tshig go// zhes gsungs so// ting nge 'dzin zhes pa'ang bcu
742b3(rgyud 'grel): ste dang po yid la byed thob nas/ gnyis pa de goms brtan pa'o// gsum pa 'phro 'du gcig pa thob// bzhi pa de goms lnga pur brta na// drug par mi ldog bdun de nyid// brgyad par kun snang thob nas ni//
742b4(rgyud 'grel): dgu pA goms nas ban+du pA ra nI// de brtan las su rung ba'o// zhes gsungs so// slob dpon bde baR+Sha gsal mdzad kyis ni/ 'di skad du/ dang po yide la byed pa ste// N+Den+da pAs yon tran 'byung gzhi'i
742b5(rgyud 'grel): phyir// rin chen+da myu gu'i ta 'dzin thob// gsum pa nyes pa gcod spyong phyir// dug 'joms sman gyi ting nge 'dzin// bzhi pa brar chad 'byung ba'i phyir// rtse cig 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin// lde pa bsod
742b6(rgyud 'grel): nams gter gyi phyir// tshogs chen rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ drug pa tshos mig rdul bral phyir// mngon par rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bsgoms pas yon 'byung ba yi// mi zad mdzod ni bdun pa'o// /
743a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad pa cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i phyir// 'byung chen sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin// dgu pa chos nyid bdul ba'i phyir// rnam dag dbyings kyi ting nge 'dzin// bcu par+ya ma luswA spyan rtogs phyir// thams cad
743a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin dang // sbyang gAs la phye mtsho'i ting dri 'dzin/ zhes gsungs pa'o// dus dang zhes pa/ lha ni bshad pa dang yang mthun no// bskyed tshig las// dang po rje su yi ring phyir// 'don pa skye ba'i du
743a3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya// gnyis pa slob pa la brtson phyir// rtsol ba sbyor ba'i dus nyid do// gsum pA gal chen sbyong ba'i phyir// bslab pa 'jug pa'i dus su brjod// bzhi pa rigs chen 'byed pa'i phyir// bslab gnas 'du
743a4(rgyud 'grel): shes 'gyur ba'i dus// lnga pa mthong don sbyor ba'i phyir// sbyong chen 'jug pa'i dus tshon yin/ drug pa thams cad mthong ba'i phyir// dang po dbyugs chen phyin pa dus// bdun po de don goms
743a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'i phyir// / yul la 'jug pa'i dus su brjo dro// brgyad pa nges don phebs pa'i phyir// rtogs chen nyid la phebs pa'i dus// dgu pa de stobs gyur pa'i phyir// rdeng du gyur pa'i dus zhes bya// bcu pa shin tu
743a6(rgyud 'grel): mtha ro phyin phyir// las rung pha ma'i dbugs phyin dus// zhes gsungs so// dngos grub zhes pa'ang bcu ste/ sa bcu 'og ma 'og ma yin/ gong ma gong ma thob pa nyid/ skabs kyi rgyu 'bras yod pa'i phyir// gan+da/
743b1(rgyud 'grel): skabs zhugs pa'i dngos grub bo// 'di ltar yang 'chad de/ dang pos 'dod pa'i dngos grub dang // gnyis pas sbyor ba'i dngos grub dang // gsum pas sbyong spyod dngos grub dang // bzhi pas
743b2(rgyud 'grel): drod rtags dngos grub dang // lbu par bslob rdzogs dngos 'grub dang // drug par rtogs pa 'grub pa dang / bdun pa mi g.yo thob pa dang // brgyad par cho 'phrul 'grub pa dang // da gu pro ra ye shes rgyu ma 'grub// bcu
743b3(rgyud 'grel): pAr rang 'gyung ye shes nyid// zhes gsungs so// mthar phyin dang zhes pa/ 'dun pa'i nang nas 'di 'dun dang / 'bras bu 'dun phyir mthar phyin pa'o// de bzhin stsol ba thams cad kyi// mchog 'di stsol ba mthu
743b4(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa'o// des don grub la brtson pa'i phyir// brtson pa'i mabyar byin gsum par thob// bzod pa'i nang nus mchog 'gyur phyir// gsang don bzod pa mthar phyin mchog/ bslab pa lhag pa bcu nyid phyir/
743b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa mthar phyin lnga pa nyid/ gnyis med bden rtogs mchog yin phyir// drug pas mthong ba mthar phyin no// rang rigs don goms mchog phyir// bdun por ting 'dzin gomus mthar phyin// de nyid
743b6(rgyud 'grel): stobs kyis rang rigs pa// rig pa'i nang na mthar phyin pa'o// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med la// rigs pa rdeng gyur gnas mthar phyin// thams cad rang 'byung klong brdal phyir// gong na med pa'i 'bras
744a1(rgyud 'grel): mthar phyir// zhes gsungs so// lta ba'i khyad par zhes pa/ dang po tshig tshogs sgra'i rnal 'byor yin pa'i phyir/ tshig tsam lta ba'o// gnyis pa lhag pa'i bden pa gnyis// yid la byed pa'i lta ba
744a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum pas bden gnyis rang mtshan du// mgo mthong gnyis meng bzod pa theb// bzhi pa gnyis su med pa la// mi skrag spelo byed g.yo dang thob// lnga par bslab bcu spyir cib pas// gnyis med thag chod de la
744a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jug/ drug pa de rgyas ji bzhin mthong // de yang 'di skad du/ rgyud nyid las/ chos kun mi mthong chos nyid kyang // mi mthong sems can sems mi mthong // sangs rgyas mi mthong gang mthong ba/ des ni yang dag
744a4(rgyud 'grel): bden pa mthong // zhes gsungs so// bdun pa de nyid goms pa yis// mi g.yo lta ba shes rab can// brgyad pa rang rig 'brus bu sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid du goms pa'i rgyus mthong ste// 'di skad du/ sangs
744a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas sems can thams cad dang // dngos por brtags pa thaM kun// don gyi dang du gcig pa ste/ de nyid sku gsungs thugs kyi bdagra// zhes gsungs so// dgu par dbyings dang yis yab yum dbyer med pa'i bde
744a6(rgyud 'grel): ba chen po rdeng du gyur te/ 'di skad du/ snod du gyur pa yum gyis dbyings// bcud rnams rgyal ba yab kyi mkha'// 'byung 'jug rigs pas longs spyod ste/ 'di ni rdo rje'i dam yin zhes gsungaso// bcu pa'i lta ba
744b1(rgyud 'grel): bza' gtad dang bral ba ste/ 'di skad du/ ma spangs bzhin du ldan grub pas// dbyer med pa ni chos kyi dbyings// dbyings las gzhan du lta yul med// 'di ni lta ba'i dam tshig ge/ zhes gsungs so// gnas 'gyur
744b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams zhes pa/ lnga'i bzlas bcur 'gyur te/ bzhed tshig las// sa bcur sems bcur skyes pa yiswa// ting 'dzin stobs bstan ye shes ro// sheR+Sha pa'i skad cig snga ma yis// rang rang sgrib bcom phyi ma la// gang nis
744b3(rgyud 'grel): gang du sangs rgyas pa/ gnas 'gyur bcu la lam rtag sna bcu// zhes gsungs so// 'on+do ta kun gzhi'i gnas 'gyur ba ni// skye bo nas 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor du/ gnas 'gyur na'ang / de bzhin gshegs par rtsa la chen
744b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i skad cig ma la bag la nyal// rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes kyis bcom nas/ phyi ma la sku lnga mngon du bya ste/ brtan du bar gnas 'gyur ba dang drug du 'gro bas// kun gzhi'i gnas 'gyur rnam pa lngas/
744b5(rgyud 'grel): brag lam lnga'i chos su snang / zhes pa dang 'gal/ 'on te 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor du gnas ma 'gyur ro zhe na 'dra/ 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor pa la// yid la byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis lha'i skur rang gi chags tshad
744b6(rgyud 'grel): tsam du phyogs pa dang / g.yo ba'i sems skyes pa/ glegs bam bcu gnyis kyi dbang thob pas// bdag nyid na mkha' la 'gro po'i lhas mthong bas// de dag skye bo la meng la/ sa 'di pa la yod pa'i phyir//
745a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas ma 'gyur na rigs pa dang 'gal lo/ zhes the tsom skye ba la// de 'di ltar bcad par bya te// de ltar snang mod kyi/ 'dun pa pa ni skye bo las 'phags mod kyang / der gnas 'gyur zhes mi bya ste/ skye
745a2(rgyud 'grel): bo'i tshe rgyu rkyen med pa ma yin yang / nges pa'i shes pas sbyangs pas/ 'dun pa thob pa ma yin pa'i phyir/ der gnas 'gyur na/ gnas 'gyur 'bras bur 'gyur ba'i dang drug du 'gyur bas/ gong du lngas zhes pa'i
745a3(rgyud 'grel): lung dang yong 'gal/ rigs pas lam lhur gnas 'gyur nas rtsal chen rdzogs par brjod na/ de ni lhun gyis grub pa' rigs 'dzin yin gyi/ rgyal ba sangs rgyas nyid ma yin+da pa'i phyir/ rgyal bar 'gyur da
745a4(rgyud 'grel): pas// rigs pa dang 'gal lo// de'i phyir 'dun pa pa de/ chos nyid la da dung bzod pa tsam yang ma thib ste/ ma mthong ba'i phyir/ skye bo las 'phags kyang gnas 'gyur zhes mi bya'o// des na 'dun par mis
745a5(rgyud 'grel): lha bstan par bsgoms pas/ mthu bo rtan tsam na/ 'du shes klungasu zhugs pas las bgu chags bslabs bkag sbyangs nos/ sbyor ba 'dun pa'i kun gzhi thob pa gnas 'gyur ba dang po'o// de bzhin
745a6(rgyud 'grel): dus 'og nas gong du 'gyur bzhin// rtsal chen nas bder gsheg su 'gyur ba dang lnga'o// de'i phyir 'dun pa nas yar sangs rgyas su kun gzhi lnga gnas lan lngar 'gyur ba'i phyir lam lngar snang ste// der
745b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba byas pa'o// des na gong gi lung nyid dang mi 'gal la// mthar sangs rgyas chen po nyid du gnas 'gyur bas// rigs pa dang yung mi 'gal lo// dka' 'grel rgyud kyi skabs tshig dka' ba bkrol// lung
745b2(rgyud 'grel): dang rigs pas mdun pa su rgyab sbyar nas/ dka' bas bsdus pa'i dge rtsa ci mchis pa/ mtha' yas rgyud la smin cing grol thob shog/ slob dpon stir ma sti sa sbyor ba'o/ skabs 'grel bye brag rnam par
745b3(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa zhes bya ba rdzogaso// // dpal rdo rje mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dang po las can rnal 'byor las// sogs pa'i rnal 'byor bcu po rnams// yi ge rtog spyod don la 'jug/ de 'dir nges pa rnam
745b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis// don 'jug byang chub ljon pa'i shing // bskyod phyir lcogs par bstan par bya'o// de la blo gros zhes can phyir// shes rab thabs kyis nges gsungs pa'i// thog mar blo gros ldan pa yis// saur rtog
745b5(rgyud 'grel): pa mngon 'gro bas// mtha'i bcu slob cing de nyid la/ ngo bo dris tshig dgos pa dang // gal po re'ang chos rtags dang // ldan pas de 'dir thugs bcad dgos// de yis don du 'gyur gzhi'i phyir// gnas dang cha rkyen
745b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan byas nas// sngon 'gro las rnams rdzogs byas te/ ljon shing bskyed pa'i las la 'bad// rnal 'byor lnga'ang khyad par las// rnal 'byor chen po'i skabs bcu sems// snga ma phyi ma rgyu 'bras tshul// gyur pa bcu drug rgyun
746a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis rdzogs// 'dun pa skye ba'i skabs dag la// mur pa'i sprin las skar phran gzer// snang ba lta bur gsal ba yis// don mchog thos dang rtog dpyod pas// lhag pa'i gsang ba'i bden gnyis tshal/
746a2(rgyud 'grel): min spyi yi mtshan nyid du// sgra la brten nas g.yos la bsgom// bdag don 'jug pa dang po'i tshe// bying rgod la sogs gnyen pos spong // nyams gsum mtho'i la 'jug pa'i drug// nang dungu bus bzer 'phro mthong/
746a3(rgyud 'grel): nyer mtshan rtags tshul gnyi kar sbyar// stsol ba skyong ba'i skabs dgra la/ mtha' bcu nyid la 'jug par stsol// g.yo yi rgyu yis chos rnams kun// bden gnyis rang gi mtshan nyid du// rtogs par smon pas khyad par
746a4(rgyud 'grel): phyir// ma nges sems las lhag par bsgom// de tshe rong mtshan nyams rims mtha'// skar ma phal pa rab ribo mthong // dang po las kyi rnal 'byor 'di// yang dag tshol la brtson bya dgos// sems sbyin g.yeng spong bskrun
