746a5(rgyud 'grel): byos nas// ngan song las rnams gcod par 'gyur// bslab pa 'jug pa'i skabs dag la// mtha' bcur zhugs te gcod spyong zhing kau/ de tshe lhag pa'i bden gnyis kyang // smon rgyu bcu rkyen ljon pa yis// gnyis
746a6(rgyud 'grel): ming rtogs pa g.yo zhing ldang // dbyer med rang gi mtshan nyid du/ ldang ba'i sems bsgoms 'phel stobs kyis// mi zer ska ro chen lta bu'ang mthong // 'du shes 'gyur ba'i rna ba sa dag la// bcu mthar gnas pas/
746b1(rgyud 'grel): 'du shes kyang // don la bzod pa thob par 'gyur// gnyis med don la sbyor sems skye// yul dang dbang po rnams shes chos// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// rang rig snang phyir snang kun sems// yul med sems
746b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang dbyings mdog mtshan// yod med bral bas rigs rgyud min// de phyir ma skyes snang stong mtha'// dbyer med bsgom pa'i nyams mtha' la// 'gal med 'khor lo zlo chos snang // sbyor chen 'jug pa'i
746b3(rgyud 'grel): skyabs dag la// ngan song mi ldog sngon thob cing // mtha' ba cu rtser chi ba gnyis med don// rtogs mthar phyin la ma reg pa/ bstan pas de don 'jug sems skye// nyams gsum mtha' la sgron med 'am// zla
746b4(rgyud 'grel): cho sna gnyis pa'i rtags mthong 'gyur// dbugs phyin mthong la ma rag kyang // le los yul lam brtson ni// mthong lam mi thob lha mi yis// gnas bzlog zag pas bcung zad 'khor// bsgrub pa'i rigs
746b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gang de la'ang // bdag gi don 'jug sum cu gnyis// rang rang shes 'jug 'byor pa sngon// tshol thos bzhi bzhir skabs la'adra sbyar// 'o na mod kyang sems lnga yi// rim pa ji bzhin khyad par 'gyur/
746b6(rgyud 'grel): ro myong ba'i skabs dag la// dga' ba lhag pa'i sems 'byung ste/ ci phyir sngon du bcu mthor bas// mnyan bsam bsgoms las chos nyid do// ma myong ma mthong sus shes myong // chos kun mo mthong
747a1(rgyud 'grel): chos nyid kyang // mi mthong sems can sems mi mthong // sangs rgyas mi mthong gang mthong ba// de ni yang dag bden pa mthong // 'jigs pa lnga bral bde ba'i sems// bsgom pa bum pa mAr me'i tshul
747a2(rgyud 'grel): de nyid mthong dang chos gsum thong // de nyid mthong ba'i khyad par gyis// spyod lam dngos gzhir gang spyad kyang // 'ching bar mi 'gyur grol 'gyur thubs// thams cad der sbyangs lam gnas mchog/ yul la 'jug pa'i skabs dag
747a3(rgyud 'grel): la/ mi 'gyur lhag pa'i sems 'byung ba// ji ltar ji bzhin nyid mthong nas// shes rab dngos yul de nyid la// rnal 'byor yang ngag 'jog pa'i tshe// gnyis med rang gi mi g.yo bar// mthong lam 'du byed dang bral bya// phra mo'i bying
747a4(rgyud 'grel): rgod dbang 'gyur bral// shin tu mi g.yo'i sems ldan pas// bzhi pa'i ri bong can mthong 'phel// lam byas pa yi sngo ltas dag/ rang 'byung chen po'i rtags mchog nye// gdul bya'i 'dod pa ji lta bar// phyir 'ong sngon dang
747a5(rgyud 'grel): smod 'tshod ston// rtog chen dag gi skabs dag la// rig pa lhag pa'i sems 'byung ste// rnal 'byor yang dag 'jog pa'i rgyus// dngos gnyis sems kyi cho 'phrul phyir// bdag nyid chen po gsal bar rig/ rnal 'byor
747a6(rgyud 'grel): yul 'das rig pa yi// mngon sum skabs kyis byas pa'i phyir// lam rim rdeng chung rtogs chen po// rang 'byung ye shes nye bar bstan// gdung 'tshogs dga' ldan thog chen ston// rjeng du gyur pa'i skabs dag la// gnas po
747b1(rgyud 'grel): lhag pa'i sems 'byung ba 'am// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// rang rig dbyings kyi rtse lnga snang phyir/ yul don ye shes de sbyar bas// shes par bya ba thams cad rdzogs// bde chen stobs ldan po chom med// spyod yul
747b2(rgyud 'grel): chos nyid bdal gnas pa// rang 'byung ye shes rtogs thob pas// don gsal brtan pa'i sgron mAM 'dra// de mthong brgyad pa'i skar 'dzin mtho'o// rtags chen ye shes grub phyir thob// las su rung ba'i skabs dag la/
747b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa lhag pa'i sems 'byung ste// ci phyir mtha' bcus bcu yi// spyir chib chos kun rang rig nyid// rang 'byung rang snang rgyu rkyen bral// de nyid ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs// ye shes dbyings zhes bya ba'i don/ tha snyad tsam
747b4(rgyud 'grel): du rtogs chud nas// thams cad rdzogs pa spyir chib pas// pha mI'i dbugs chen 'di che 'byung // mnyam bzhug ma bzhag spyad las 'das// rang rig mngon sum chen po che// s+ya bcu rnal 'byor phra mo rnams// rang sems
747b5(rgyud 'grel): cig la g.yo thob bstan// rim pas gsal dang mi gsal ba'i// stobs kyis khyad par 'gyur ba yin// rdzogs sems de rjes gsum rim gyis// klong yangs chub la mngon sangs rgyaso// ji snyed nyid kyi sku gsung thun

753b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// khru brgyad spangs la khru bzhi lce// yu ba drang po ring po la// btags pa brgyad ni rgyal mtshan tshul// kha dog so sor gcig 'dra'o// kha dog sna tshogs nas 'bras tshul// gcus gcag rtsi bsu 'brel pa'o// dkar po dmar po de bzhin ser// sngon mo
753b2(rgyud 'grel): dang ni nag dang ldan// tshon sna lnga po de la ni// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor gang yin bsgom// thig skud dkyil 'khor gang yin pa// yum grangs bzhin du bsgrol bar bya// rta babs brgyad dang dri zhim shing // chu srin khas bzung zlums gzugs// khru
753b3(rgyud 'grel): phyed bzhi mgo rgya mdud can// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi zur bzhi la// chags pa'i mtshan ma chags pa ni// rdo rje mda' bzhi khru do gzugs// thugs rje chags pas 'gro ba 'drin// mi shes rgya mo 'dral ba ni// mtha' gnyis gcod dang mi gnas phyir// khru do zur
753b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi legs par bre// seng ldeng tsher ma can la sogs// sor ni brgyad pa cod pan can// khro bo lngas bsngags par chod selce// bum pa nag po ra ri med// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i cho gar ldan// dkyil 'khor dag gi mtha' ma yang // sngon po dmar po gang yod pa// mu
753b5(rgyud 'grel): tig me tog la sogs pa// bsdogs pa'i dbus na rin can can// tsong tsong dag la sbyangs par bya// rta babs par ni tsong tsong las// gser dngul zangs khar sbyangs pa'i sgra// dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan yod brjod// gtsang ma'i spu dang a shwad
753b6(rgyud 'grel): shun// dar dkar dag dang gsum la ni// lnga yab dar shing gser dngul sogs// tsang tsong dag la sbyang bar bya// rin cen yid 'ong phreng ba'i tshogs// tsong tsong dog la sbyang bar bya// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 'gro ba ma lus rang bzhin//
754a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshon// gzugs brnyan chu zla'i mig rgyu zhes// rtogs par bya phyir sbyangs par bya// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// thugs kyi ye shes mtshon pa'i phyir// mkhas pas rin can la sogs pas// sa gzhi snying
754a2(rgyud 'grel): po can du bya// 'phan phran nyid la bskal bzangs dang // bkra shis tsa ka lis brgyan po// nyi zla pad+mas mo tshon pa yang // tsong tsong dag la sbyangs pa'o// yon chab bdug spos dri chab pre/ me tog mar me khal dag dang // lha bshos khur ba lha grangaso//
754a3(rgyud 'grel): 'o ma sbrang rtsi bu ram mar// bre re btung ba bca' ba'i tshogs// gtor ma'i rgyu cha sna tshogs dang // 'byung po'i kha zas sogs par bya// gzhan yang zhi ba'i mchod rdzas ni// til dang yungs kar 'bras yos 'bras// nas dang gro dang ga bur rnams//
754a4(rgyud 'grel): phul gang yin no sran thug dang // 'bras chan ma du bre gang shis// gzhan yang rgyas dbang drag po yi// thug pa thams cad bre re'o// gzhan ma kun yang phul re'o// lha bshos khur ba lde gu rnams// lha grangs bzhin du sogs par bya// pad+ma lhor
754a5(rgyud 'grel): gding ku sha'i nub// khyi ni shar gyi gru gsum byang // las bzhi gdan ni dgod par bya// rnam par rgyal lam khro phyogs ho// spyan sogs yum bzhi lhag chad 'bum// dbang po zhi ba zla ba 'dra// dbang po rgyas pa pad+ma 'dra// dbang po dbong ni nyi ma
754a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dradrad dbang po drag po dud pa 'dra// dbyig pa bgrang 'phreng spyi blugs bzung // dang po ting 'dzin gyis bskol nas// bu mo pa zla ba pad+ma dang // dud pa'i mdangs ldan bsil byed yum// bdud rtsi 'o ma bu ram zho// bkang ba'i bum pa so so la//
754b1(rgyud 'grel): rin cen pan byang gdugs ldan te// rnam snang mdzad dang gsum dag gi/ zhabs kyi drung du bzung ba dang // khams gsum sems can thams cad kyi// las dang sdug bsngal zhi bar byed// oM g+ha ga na ga ga ne/ lo tsa na/ dza le dzu le tsun de// ga
754b2(rgyud 'grel): tang gu tang shin ting ku ru swa hA// dpal rtse rnon po rtse gsum pos// dug gsum mjoms pa'i las rnams mdzod// lus ngag yid gsum sbyang ba dang // btab pas gshes chags rlig par byed// ho ma zlum lham zla gam e// rdo rje pad+ma
754b3(rgyud 'grel): mda' gzhu dang // gtsang thod rgya mdzes brgyan gdengs// zhi rgyas dbang grag lha rnams mchod// ya ma ba e'i dkyil 'khor dang // phying bu dang ni dar gtsang 'bob// du yod pa la zung re'o// yam shing dkar ser dmar nag la// khung gi
754b4(rgyud 'grel): khyad par rang sor gcal// bachid dang bcu drug nyi shu bzhi// bud shing khru gang do gsum chu// sbom pa sngags mkhan mdzub mo tsam// zhi ba yi ni lha grangs bzhin// yam shing mdzub gang bcag khru gang // brkyang khru gang du shes par bya// bud shing khru ga
754b5(rgyud 'grel): dode bzhi'o// rgyas pa yi ni lha grangs bzhin// dbang gi yam bud zhi ba'i tshad// drug po'i yam bud rgyas pa'i tshad// zhi ba'i dris bsku rgyas sbrang rtsi// dbang cag tsun dan bsres pas bsku// zho can ser skyar nub shing la// sor bzhi ya rtse ral gr-i
754b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// rting zlum zur bzhi zor 'dra dang // zur gsum rngu thur chad du bya// lo ma sor bzhi so so shing // sor gnyis rtsa ba ba shus lha grangs// thabs kyi bye brag che chung las// zho can ser skyar rtsub shing la// yu ba sgoms su mthe bo tsam
755a1(rgyud 'grel): srid du khru do gung phyed gang // sor bzhi sku kha run sor gcig/ zab sor gnyis la so so'i dbyibs// de dbus gtso mo phyag mtshan bri// kha ran phyogs bzhir phyag rgya bzhag bar bar rdo rje pad+ma gzhu// thos pas mtshan ma
755a2(rgyud 'grel): dgang gzar bya// sring khru gang la sgyu sor gnyis// zabs sor gcig de'i dbus su ni// gtso bo phyag rgyas mtshan blugs gzar// blugs gzar stong sbub mdun du bzhag/ zho can ser skya rtsub shing la// mgo mdud dag la gtso yum dgod// rtsibs
755a3(rgyud 'grel): la 'khor gyi yig 'bru dgod// rked mdud sgo ba khru khyud gang // rtse mo ya ma bau e phaT// gtso bo phyog mtshan spyir bris te// rtsibs la tshes kyi yig 'bru 'bar// khru gang tshad bya srid du'o// sbom phra mtho gang sor bzhi bya// sgyu sor btso brgyad zabasu
755a4(rgyud 'grel): ni sor ni brgyad pa de dbus su// ri rab rgya mtsho bri bar bya// ngos la ri bdun mtsho yang dgod// so so gtun gyi kha ran la// rdo rje pad+ma mda' gzhu me 'od 'bar// thod rtsang me 'od 'bar gling mtsho// ji bzhin dkyil 'khor dag la'ang brgyan// las
755a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi sngags pa'i chas gos ni// thugs kyi ze'u lding stod g.yogs dang // brjid pa'i chos gos smad dkris dang // gar gyi gsang gos so so mdog/ g.yab mos spyan 'dren phyag 'tshal ni// so so kha dog dar dag la// ba dan bzhi yang 'bar 'drar
755a6(rgyud 'grel): bya// dkar po ser po dmar nag la// ho ma'i bag ba ma 'khor ba'o// dri zhim ser skyur rtsub shing gi/ sa phyogs de dag nye ba ru// shing gi lha ste mdog dkar la// rin can sna tshogs dri zhim bcas// phul la snying rje byams bsgoms la// rten 'brel brjod
755b1(rgyud 'grel): de rin phul la// me yi phyogs nas bcad par bya// srid du ho ma grur mnyam la// sgrom phra khA gang yod pa'i shing // bzhi gnyis gsum gnyis mchog du gces// gzhan yang ro bsreg shing dag la// sbom phra khru do yod pa yi// shar nub gnyisu re re
755b2(rgyud 'grel): yang na srid du mchod rnam yang na ni// dngos grub gsol sgo gzhan shing gnyis// shing rgyu phra sbom mdo dang gsum// theg pa'i khyad par bstan pa ni// kri yog ma ha yo ga gsum// gang gi sgo zhugs de lhas sbyang // goms pa'i dbang du shes pa'i
755b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ rim pa gsum du shes par bya// de stong khang pa lus mgo tshad// phrag gnon bzhi yang bzhir dmigs la// tshogs nas shing gi bdag po la// mchod pa gtor ma sna tshogs ni// stegs bu khru gang pad+mo bris// de dbus shing lha 'bag bris
755b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhag las kyi skal ldan gang dag gis// dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa ni// yo byad thams cad tshang ba mchog/ che chung mang nyung rgyu las tshad// ci yod yid 'ong mdzes par dgram// de dag byin gyis brlabs pa ni// khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal
755b5(rgyud 'grel): dang // bdud rtsi 'khyil pas byin gyis brlab// oM badz+ra kro d+ha tri lo ka/ bi dza ya/ oM oM hUM A A a// bla re gtsug tor rnam rgyal brlab// A~M tAM AM aM hUM/ ba dan 'phyan gtso des byin brlab// oM tso bo'i sa bon oM aM haM gdugs ni gtsug tor
755b6(rgyud 'grel): gdun dkar brlab// oM su~M IM aM hUM/ rgyal mtshan ko du des byin brlab// oM rat+na ke du oM aM hUM// lnga ldi so so las rigs brlab// oM sarba karma tri lo ka bi dza ya A~M aM hUM/ tshon lnga bde gshegs lnga yis brlab// de yang dkyil 'khor gang
756a1(rgyud 'grel): yin nyid/ ser po oM au aM hUM// bsgyur te smon lam btab pa ra bya// dkar po IM hUM oM aM hUM// nAg po oM s+phu A~M a~M hUM// dmar po UM a nAM a hUM/ ljang gu oM ha oM aM hUM/ srang bu gang yin gtso bos brlab/
756a2(rgyud 'grel): oM oM oM aM lpA/ na pas phyag rgya bzhi byin brlab/ dza hUM baM ho/ A~M A~M hU~M/ mda' bzhi rdo rje chags pas brlab// A badz+ra rA gA AM aM hU~M/ ral gri rdo rje rnon pos brlab// oM pad+ma tig sne i aM hUM/ phur pa khro bo lngas byin brlab// A~M a pa ratsi
756a3(rgyud 'grel): ta/ ya mA nA ka/ ha ya grI ba/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da lo/ ma ha pa la/ AM a hU~M/ bum pa gang yin yum gyis brlab/ A da du shwa ri o aM hUM/ bag pa 'khor bsrung ba chen mos brlab// hUM hUM yu a pri ti ha ta A~M a~M hUM swA hA// do shal gtsug tor rgyal bas
756a4(rgyud 'grel): brlab/ oM traM au aM hUM/ dril bu ku lan da ris brlab/ A~M ku lan da ri prad nyo pa ba pa sho yo gA gA shu ny+tsa IM aM hU~M/ Ta yab rgyal po bzhis byin paR+Shag oM ti sh+ma ti shU/ be pu ru ta ka/ be ru ba shA/ be sha ra ma ne/ oM aM hUM zhor bu kun gyi yon+tan brlab/
756a5(rgyud 'grel): AM sarba rat+na ku a~M aM hUM/ me long rdo rje sems dpas brlab// oM badz+ra swa ta a da rI sha A~M a~M hI/ spyan snying sangs rgyas kun gyis brlab// A b+hU d+ha sarba ku li tsi ta dz+nyA na A~M A hraM/ nyi zla thabs dang shes rab brlab/ A~M sUr+ya tsan+taM du na prad
756a6(rgyud 'grel): nya oM aM hU~M/ btung ba mA ma kis byin brlab// oM rat+na badz+ra A~M aM hUM/ bdug pa me tog dri chu me/ AM badz+ra d+hU paM puSh+pe gan+d+he a lo ge oM aM hU~M// lha bshos khur ba bca' ba'i tshogs// ku lan da ris byin gyis brlab// oM badz+ro ku lin da ri
756b1(rgyud 'grel): oM aM hUM/ phung po lnga nyid rnam grol lngar bsgyur zhing / oM da shu dz+nyA na A~M aM hUM/ Sho ma la sogs mngar gsum ni/ mA ma kis ni byin gyis brlab/ oM mA ma ki A~M aM hUM/ gtor ma thug pa d+hags ldan brlab// oM swasti badz+ra A~M aM hUM/ 'bru
756b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams mA ma kis byin parlabyA/ oM mA ma ki ai aM hUM/ 'bras yos ma du gos dkar mos brlab// oM pad+ma badz+ra A~M aM hU~M/ gA byar sman rnams las thams cad pa// oM badz+ra a mr-i ta kuN+Da li A~M aM hU~M/ gtsang 'bob sangs rgyas sbyin gyis brlag
756b3(rgyud 'grel): A lam te sha ra tau da du AM aM hrI/ yam shing bud shing thums cad ni// me lhas byin gyis brlab par bya// oM ag+ni ye A~M A~M hU~M/ shig te'u chen tre'u sogs// sangs rgyas spyan gyis byin gyis brlab// A muM badz+ra A~M aM hUM/ zangs phye ske tshe la la phud
756b4(rgyud 'grel): kro ti shwa ri sangs rgyas spyan gyi brlab// kro ti shwa ri swa ta badz+rI/ oM aM hUM/ tshe ra ti'u la sogs mA ma kis// oM mA ma ki A~M aM hU~M/ de gang gzar gang yin yum gyis brlab// blugs gzar gang yin yab kyis brlab// phur bu gang yin gtso 'khor khro//
756b5(rgyud 'grel): gtun shing gang yin gtso bo 'khor// mda' gzhu ma mo tsa'u ris brlab// badz+ra tse'u r+ye A~M aM hUM/ gzhan rnams thams cad bdud rtsi 'khyil bas brlab// g.yab dar rlung lhas byin gyis brlab// oM badz+ra ba ya bya AM aM hUM/ zhal khab ma
756b6(rgyud 'grel): ma kis byin brlab// bsregs shing bum gyis brlab par bya// oM bruM ma ya sbyar// A aM hUM/ chos gos 'bru lngas byin brlab bzhag/ ku sha gting ba'i gdan stengs su/ bsngags
757a1(rgyud 'grel): grayog sharA lta sA nyal du gzhug/ lha rnams kyis ni legs dgu ston// byin gyis brlab pa mA byasA na// las rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// de bas nan tan bskyed de bya// yang na rnam par
757a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba 'am// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa nyid kyis brlab kyang rung // dkyil 'khor ci yang bzhengs pa la// 'phrin las bzhi bzhi hom ldan bya// yang na ting 'dzin bye brag las// las bzhi cho ga rdzog pa mchog/ cho ga
757a3(rgyud 'grel): mo tshang las mi 'grub// de phyir sta gon rdzogs par bya// u dum+ba ra'i me tog bzhin// ston pa 'o na'i shin tu yang // de bas na nI 'jig rten du// 'byung ba yA ni shinr-i tu dkon// dam pa'i chos kyang ston pa dka'// dam
757a4(rgyud 'grel): chos ston pa srid par dka'// gsang sngags chos ni ston dka'o// gsang sngags chos ni ston dka' yang // dkyil 'khor du ni 'jug dkA'o// bskal par ni sngags spyad pa yi// las dbang gis dang mthong bas//
757a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po ni ma yin yang // rgyal po ni chen por 'gyur// badre bar gshegs pa thams cad kyis// yon tan ni mchog kyang thob// tshe ring ni longs spyod kyang // phun sum ni tshogs par 'gyur// las rnams
757a6(rgyud 'grel): ni thams cad kyang // btang snyoms ni yan lag go/ dkyil 'khor baM ba'i las ngag dang // cho 'phrul bzhi yi che ba dang // gang zhig dkyil 'khor nang gzhug pa// gsum po de ni gzhan don gsungs//
757b1(rgyud 'grel): dang po las gsungs rim pa ni// tshes grangs chos glog bzhi dag dang // srad bu tshad ldan bgegs bsngal bsrung // thugs dam bskul g.yog dbang bskur sbyang// rang bzhin sa thig slar bsdu dang // tshon dgye
757b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya rgyan rnams dgod// gsum lnga bdun dang bcu gcig dang // bcu gsum bco lnga yar gyis shis// zhi dang rgyas pa mchog du bshad// bcu bdun nyi shu gnyis brgyad de// dbang dad drag po dkyil 'khor mchog/
757b3(rgyud 'grel): dus dang mtshan ma kri ya'o// nyi ma dge zhing rgyu dkar bzang // mtshan ma'i sems rtog mi dmigs pa// de ni chos dbyings gnas pa yin// de ltar dus dang mthun pa dang // phyogs bzhi'i dge bsnyen gtsang sbra can//
757b4(rgyud 'grel): sha dang chang bcang bud med spangs// tshul du shis pas rgyun mi bcad// shar du sdud pa tshigs su bcad// lhor ni bzang po spyod pa'o// nub du snang ba brgyad gsang ba'i modo// byang du gser 'od dram pa gdon/
757b5(rgyud 'grel): gus par mchod cing bden par klag/ tshon sna lnga skud bu mos bkal// de nyid kyis ni brgyar bzlas te// rgyu bzangs tshad la phebs pa dang // bzang po'i ltas dang sbyar nas nI// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig
757b6(rgyud 'grel): gdab bo// lag na rdo rje bgegs bskrad bya// srung ba chen mos bdag gzhan bsrung // phyogs bcu'o ga tso la sogs pa yi// thugs dam bskul nas srad bu thim// de lnga'i rigs bzhi thugs las phyung //
758a1(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo gang yin thugs zhugs phyung // de nas gtso bo gang yin gyis// sangs rgyas zhing rnams sbyang ba dang // myur du sems can don bsgrub dang // las kyi bdag po gang byed pa'o//
758a2(rgyud 'grel): las rnams ma lus khyod kyis byos// las kyi rdo rje don yod grub// khwa dog sna tshogs 'byung ba la// oM aM hUM/ swAhA karma zhes ni de la dbang bsgyur ro// bdag nyid shAr lho mtshams 'greng ste// sngags
758a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yog byang shar mtshams su ni// dpung btsugs thal sbyar 'dug pa yis// dkyil 'khor gang bzhengs las rnams ni// gang bzhengs gtso bo bka' bzhin du// las kyi byed par bdag gyur pas/ thams cad
758a4(rgyud 'grel): ma lus blodag gis bgyi// de nas thub dbang bskur byas nas// de nas sbyang ba bya ba ni// bdag po gang yin ting 'dzin las// yam gyis phra drog gtor rlung gis// de las rdo rje rtse 'bar ba// 'od 'phros
758a5(rgyud 'grel): dngos po'i mtshan ma bsreg/ bdag nyid yi ge khaM gyur gtso// mnga'i bdag de'i byin brlabs chu// rgyun gyi khams dag de nyid mer// de yi byin brlabs yon tan bcu// de mthus las byed las rnams
758a6(rgyud 'grel): 'grub// mkhas pas thig gdab tsa ta'i mig/ lha mos gshegs bskul skud la thim// hUM las rdo rje rtse lngar gyur// lte ba'i thad kar thal bkan la// g.yas pa bkan bzhag motheb ngos sbyar//
758b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas sbub log nam mkhar gdab// lan cig gnyis gsum btab pa'i mthus// rang bzhin byon dang ting 'dzin gsal// ngan song gsum bde zhus bshad stong // mchog gsum lha tshogs mchod
758b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal// AM bruM shu n+ya ta g+hanya' na badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko haM// zhes pas rang bzhin thig gdab par bya// bdag nyid shar+ya lho'i mtshams song ste// las bdag byang shar mtshams 'dug ste/ de nas dkyil
758b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor thig gang bya ba// dam tshig bskul dang las bya'o// oM badz+ra sa ma ya su tra ma ti kra ma hUM// tshwa da ldan sngags g.yog med pur mchog/ sems can don byas bdag nyid kyis// slar yang thugs kAr
758b4(rgyud 'grel): bsdu bar bya// oM badz+ra sa ha ra na hUM hrI hUM// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ni// yon tan 'phrin lngas rigs lnga yi// gtso bo gang yAn de nyid la// gsang gsum zhes su bsgrags pa'ang mchog/ mtshon ni/
758b5(rgyud 'grel): dridri dang panau tsa dang // rin chen phung po gsum du bstan// yon tan sru 'dra las thugs bzhin// dbus kyi pho brang bskor ba yin// 'khor lo rdo rje ra ba ni// phye ma dkar po nyis rim bri// las kyi lha las
758b6(rgyud 'grel): ma gtogs pa'i// phal ba dang ni bsrung bkra shis// phye ma dkar po zhig kyang bri// sgo yi tshon sna pan tsa'o// gnyis pa tri la sgo khang rtsig/ brkyang bris phyag rgya dgod pa yang // gtso bo'i gzugs la 'khor phyag
759a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya// phal la sogs pa'i yig 'bru'o// tha mal pa dag thig le'o// tshon la sogs pa'i las rnams kun// dpung ldan phyogs nas bya bar shis// dbang ldan 'dren pa'i lha dbang phyogs//
759a2(rgyud 'grel): tshon ni nung nas dgye bar bya// de nas phyag rgya nor bu bum// dgod pa nyid du bya ba yin// gzungs thag slob dpon gzung bar shris// de 'og tshon rnams rim gyis btang // de nas phyag rgya 'am yig 'bru bzhag/ tha
759a3(rgyud 'grel): myur bsgo yi tshon bkye nas// de'i 'og skye ba'i phyag rgya dang // glang seng rnams kyang dgod par bya// maN+Dal thams cad byi dor ni// dang po ba lci de 'og tu// rnams lngas bskus nas de 'og du// dri chu'i chus ni byug par bya//
759a4(rgyud 'grel): tshon 'gyed dus su thugs dam bskul// sems can khams ni zhi byed pa'i// de ni chos dbyings ro yin pas// sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngon gsungs te// de bas bdag gis bka' bzhin du// tshon 'gyed pa yi las
759a5(rgyud 'grel): bgyid nA// rgyal bas kun phyin dbang bskur cig/ phyag rgya dgod phyir thugs dam bskul// sku gsung thugs rtags mtshan ma 'di// 'gro la phan phyir dgod do zhes// sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngon gsungs te// rgyal
759a6(rgyud 'grel): pa kun byin dbang bskur tsog/ rgyan rnams dang po nor bu ste// de la sogs pa dgod par bya// byin gyis brlabs pa'i rin po ches// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyi rlobs// sngags rnams gong ma de las ni/ ti
759b1(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra bsnun paR+Sha bas// rin chen sna tshogs rgyu las byas// kha dog dbyibs su ldan pa yi// shes rab yul gyi bum pa 'dis// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// rten gyis 'bras bu mtshon 'brel rtags//
759b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin pas// thugs rje gzungs thag chen po 'dis// dkyil 'khor 'dri la byin gyis rlobs// 'phrin las yon tan lhun grub pa'i// bla re kun bzang dang nyid rtags// 'bras bu rtags kyi phyag rgya yis//
759b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i// sku yi phyag rgya mtshon mdzad cing // mtshan dang dpe byad phan chen gyis// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// nyon mongs gdung
759b4(rgyud 'grel): ba sel mdzad cing // gridugs mdzes gser gyi yu bar ldan// skyabs chen byams pa chen po yis// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// nyon mongs bdud las rgyal mdzad pa'i// rgyal bu rgyal ba'i rgyal
759b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan te// rtags kyi rgyal mtshan chen po yis// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// 'phrin las chu 'phrul bzhi bzhi yis// las rnams rgya mtsho rdzogs mdzad pa'i// snyan pa'i ba dan gsung
759b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms pas// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// rgyu dang 'bras bur 'brel pa'i rtags// kha dog sna lnga 'bar ba yi// lhab lhub lnga ldi chen po yis// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlabs// thugs
760a1(rgyud 'grel): rje gzungs thag ye shes bzhi// sangs rgyas bzhi yi 'phrin las thugs// thugs rje'i sbrad bu 'brel gzungs kyis// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// tshad med bzhi dang bsdu sa
760a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhis// 'gro ba'i don rnams rdzogs mdzad pa'i// dri zhimA rta babs phyag rgya yis// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// 'gro rmongs 'khyam pa'i mun sel mdzod// gti mug go dpral shes rab
760a3(rgyud 'grel): mangs// gting 'bugs byang chub lam 'grod pas// dkyil 'khor 'di lnga byin gyis rlobs// 'khor ba'i dra ba chags pa'i rgyun// mtha' gnyis gcod mdzad byams pa'i mgron// she snga rab rtag
760a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi ral gri 'dis// dkyil 'khor 'di lnga byin gyis rlobs// khro gtum+bu rngam pa'i tshul 'chang bas// log par lta ba'i zhe sdang 'dul// ye shes 'brur bu'i kI la yas// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlob
760a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma'i yul rnams sel mdzad cing // srung dang mtshams kyi lus mdzad pA// bgrab 'khor srung ba chen po 'dis// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// dus gsum sangs rgyasA mau lus pa'i//
760a6(rgyud 'grel): dpe byad rtag kyi do shal chun// yid 'ong me tog 'bar ba yis// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i rtags// rin chen mchog gsum mtshan brjod pa'i// gasrung dbyangs/
760b1(rgyud 'grel): drug cu ldan gril 'dis// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// mtshan ma'i bag chags kun sel ba'i// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad la// rgyal chen bzhis phul mchod mchogra gis// dkyil
760b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// chos rnams gzugs brnyan 'dra ba yi// rang bzhin drug pas rtog pa med// ma rmongs ston pa'i me longs 'di// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// zhi ba'i mtha' la
760b3(rgyud 'grel): mi gnas shing // 'jig rten kun dang mthun 'jug rtags// thabs drang shes rab nyi zla 'dis// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// gzhan yang mchod pa'i rgyan 'os drang // lha ba shos phyogs kyi/
760b4(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma yis// rgyu drug 'gro tshom byed mthu yi// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// gnyis pa bdag zhugs cho 'phrul gyis// che ba'i don thabs bstan pas 'dzin// ting nge 'dzin dang byin gyis
760b5(rgyud 'grel): brlab// dbang bskur mchod pa'i cho 'phrul lo// bdag nyid dang por rnam 'dug dang // ting 'dzin zhugs pra rnam gnyis so// bdag shar sgor 'dug 'dzin pa la// dam bca' dbang thob stong rje yis//
760b6(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab don byed par// 'phags pa kun mkhyen spyan drangs la// AM aM hUM swahA lnga yis// byin gyis brlab la swa dbang bskur// phyag rgya go tsa haM gyis bgo/ du sh+ya ho dang san ti ti t+ta dang /
761a1(rgyud 'grel): ya tha badz+ra swa tashwA ta oM baM// dgongs pas bsgrub pa bzhugs dang bskyed// de nas khro bos bgegs mtshams bcang// zhugs pas de bzhin nyid kun snang // rgyu las byung ba rim
761a2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed// de steng gzhal yas khrang rgyan ldan// nang du gtan dag bskyed pa'i steng // 'khor lo yid 'ongs gru chad dang // sgo dang sgo khang byang dang bcas// sems can pad+ma nyi zla'i bdan// ci rigs parA ni
761a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzes par bya// de stang sems nyid dag po yi// rgya las chos nyid mngon byang chub// de gzugs zla ba yig 'bru drang // phyag mtshan dang ni sku rdzogs pa'o// 'bras bu lnga dang bskyed pa lnga// ston pa'i tshe
761a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul lnga rgyu lnga// chos nyid rgyu las rnam snang mngon byang chub// gzugs brtan zla ba mi bskyed mngon byang chub// yig 'bru rin chen 'byung ldan mngon byang chub// phyag mtshan snang ba mtha' yas mngon
761a5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub// gzugs sku don yod grub pa mngon byang chub// snang stong sra brtan sreg byed dang / 'gyed 'dzin shugs bskyod zad par lnga// ni mkha' so me chu rlung go// de yi byi ni rlabs thams cad mngon
761a6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub// rgyu las bag chags gnas 'gyur tshos dbyings bskyed// zla ba kun bzhi gnas 'gyur me long bskyed// yi ga 'bru nyon mongs gnas gyur mnyam sems bskyed// phyag mtshan yid gyur so/
761b1(rgyud 'grel): sor rtogs sems bskyed// sku ni sgo lnga bya ba nan tan bskyed// rtag chad 'dzin gzung bdag gzhan grub// chos nyid rgyu las rnam snang mngon bstan pa// bsam gtan tshul de sangs rgyas rjes dran sku// oM tsA ta/
761b2(rgyud 'grel): pra ti be trang ka ro ya mau// e ma'o// do nau dam rang bzhin+do spros med sems kyi dbyings// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i thugs dang ye nas mnyam// mngon par byang chub na mkha'i mtshan nyid de// chos kyi dbyings nyid mi
761b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas ji bzhin ngang // gzugs bArnyan zla ba ma bskyod mngon ston pas// ye shes tshul de dge 'dun rjes dran sku// au bo te tsi ta tsan+na utwo ta yA mi// sle ma'o// bsod nams ye shes tshogs
761b4(rgyud 'grel): chen+da yongs rdzogs pa// zla ba nye ba bzhin du snang ba ste// kun tu bzang po ye nasa? dag pa'i don// mngon par byang chub rang bzhin 'od kyang gsal// yig 'bru rin chen 'byung ldan mAngon bstan pa// sbyin
761b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshul de gtong ba rjes dran sku// A~M hUM swa hI aM ha ti b+hA// e ma'o// ma rig sel cing yang dag rig bskyod pa// gsung gi rang bzhin che ba'i byin rlabs te/ gsang ba bsgrub pa'i mchog du bsngags
761b6(rgyud 'grel): pas na/ don gyi snying po spros med byang chub dbyings// phyag mtshan so so mtha' yas mngon bstan pa// tshul khrims tshul te gnyis rtogs chos dran sku/ tsakra badz+ra d+ha rma rat+na pad+ma karma sa b+he
762a1(rgyud 'grel): at+ma ko haM/ e ma'o// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// thugs nyid ye shes lnga yi rtags su snang // maM g.yo mi ldog mchog gi rang bzhin pas// ji bzhin mnyam pas byang chub
762a2(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i ngang // skur gyur gzugs las don yod skur ston pa// brtson 'grus tshul tAM lha rjes dran pa'i sku// IM hUM swa aM ha ya thA swa te shA ta a haM// e ma'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// ma skyes
762a3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes mnyam pa nyid // thabs la mkhas pas thugs rje yis// de nyid phyag rgya chen por snang // sngags ni sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs// tshigs bcad don grub rtogs tshang phul// de bzhin gshegs
762a4(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad kyi// dgyes pa'i phyag ni spyi bor bzhag/ byin gyis brlabs phyir// AM aM hUM// dbang skur swa 'bar rin po che// yongs su grub dang gzhan dbang dang // kun brtags pa ni thams cang la'o//
762a5(rgyud 'grel): yongs su grub pa zhes pa ni// rnam snang mdzad chen de nyid do// gzhan dbang rjes su bstan pa ni// sangs rgyas mang pos sngags gsungs rtogs// kun brtags zhes su bstan pa ni// 'og min gnas dang /
762a6(rgyud 'grel): ri rab zom// rdo rje gdan sogs sten pa'o// 'khor rnams thams cad sgo mdun bskyed// 'bras bu lnga ni yongs su grub// bskyed pa gzhan dbang yin par bshang / ston pa'i cho 'phrul kun brtags
762b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// snyan gsan gsol spyan 'dren las bzhug/ dam tshig phyag 'tshal mchod stong chos// byang chub sdom go byin rlabs dang // mtshams bcad dam tshig dpoDa rigs bya/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rab
762b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byams na// rgyal ba glang po zhugs 'khor dang bcas// mgon pa de can ji snyed pa// thams cad kun nase gongs su gsol// gnyis med rnam dag dbyings mchog na// mnyam nyid gnas las de bzhin
762b3(rgyud 'grel): go shegs// bskul ba'i sa la gzhengs nas kyang // sems can don la rab brtson pa'i// rgyal ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// byang chub sems dpa' lham dral dang // khro bo khro mo la sogs kun
762b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud lnga'i sems can sbyang ba dang // khyad par bdag dang yon bdag dang // dkyil 'khor 'di la byin+da brlabs don// rang bzhin rdzogs chen bzhugs gnas nas// ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan gzhal
762b5(rgyud 'grel): yas 'dir// thugs rjes byon dgongasuM spyan 'dren byon// e ha h+ye b+hud+d+ha nga du shA rI bod ngi swa ta swa tau'i sarba ma ma dzA// chos dbyangs na mkha'i dkyil yangs na// rgyal ba'i bzhugs gnas khyud
762b6(rgyud 'grel): par can// rab 'byams mchod pa'i sprin klubs shing // nyi zla bang sogs gdan steng nas// mi mjed 'dzam gling 'jig rten 'dir// bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas khang // bla me mchod
763a1(rgyud 'grel): pa rgyun bshams nas// 'gro ba'i don phyir spyan 'dun na// dus gsum gshegs pa'i 'jig rten+d+ra b+h+yon+tu// thugs rje dam can smon lam gyis// sems can don phyir chos sku lam+b+ha// garba/
763a2(rgyud 'grel): skur longs spyod rdzogs skur snang // thugs rjes sprul skur gshegs po bzhin// dkyil 'khor ma nyams dam pa 'dir// byin gyis brlabs kyis gshegs su gsol// dkyil 'khor gang lags lha tshogs
763a3(rgyud 'grel): kun// mtshams choms mtshos bsdebs spyan drang lo/ stobs bcu'i rtsal 'chang mi yi seng ger spyon// gti mug mun sel 'jig rten sgron ma spyon// nyon mongs nang sel sman pa'i rgyal po spyon// bdud ris
763a4(rgyud 'grel): 'pham mdzad thar pa'i lam ston spyon// dbang mdzad rgyal 'dir smyon mchod pa bzhes// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs ma lus gnas 'dir spyon// e mA sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yang dag spyan 'dren brtan pa'i bdag/
763a5(rgyud 'grel): gang phyir bdag gis spyan drangs pas// dkyil 'khor 'di lnga brten par 'gyur// e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rin chen zhags pa dam po'i bdag/ rdul phran bzhu gas pa thams cad kyang // slar yang
763a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis dran par bgyi// e ma sangs rgyas thams kyi// pad+ma lcags sgrogs dam po'i bdag/ bcings pa kun las grol ba rnams// sems can don du bcing bar 'dod/ e ma sangs rgyas thams cad
763b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya bram dril bu bab brtan bdag/ kun gyi chos bdag gyur pa yang // bran+da du yang ni gyur cing bzhugs// dzA hUM baM ho// e hUM hi bA ga ban// ma hA kA ru ni kr-i sha ho// sa ma yA dza hUM// oM la sogs pa'i lha rnams
763b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags// rti la a gang dzas brgyan cing // so so skye gsung thugs kyi lha// ma lus pa rnams spyan drang ngo // mdor na 'jig rten khams rnamasu// sems can rnams kyi don kyi phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs
763b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis// rdo rje rin cen pad+mo dang // rgya gram 'khor los bskor du gsol// mgon po thugs rje cheraro ldan pa// thams cad kun mkhyen rgyud rlig pa// 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis// 'gro ba'i don rnams
763b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad du gsol// gtor ma las rnams kun gyi mchogs// lus kyi sna la brtan pa na/ shar du bstan pa gasrung ba la// lhor ni srid pa mnyam pa yin// nub du klu gdug bzlog pa'o// byang nas las la
763b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa'o// de dag so so srung mtshams bcad// a ha hi bos la lIs la bzhugs// byin gyis brlabs byas mchod bstod cing sgron lam+ba btab cing slar teng gtang // lag pa'i phyag rgya bcas nas
763b6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ snying po 'jug la gdags pa ni// badz+ra satwa sa ma ya karma gdags shing dbyangs dang sbyar ba'o// thugs brtsor ldan pa'i dgongs pa cin// ji ltar 'phrin las bcol ba bzhin// 'khor ba yul rings pa
764a1(rgyud 'grel): sring du// don rnams mdzad cing+ga brtan por bzhugs// lag pa'i phyag rgya bcas nas ni// snying po mjug la gdags pa ni/ dz+nyA hUM baM to// sa ma las+t+r-i/ sa ma ya ho// sa ma yA sa twa ti shwA badz+ra A
764a2(rgyud 'grel): gang dza// na ma sar+tha ta tha ga ta ban+d+ha nang ka ro ya mi// ai sarba tA tha ga ta pu tsa pash+tsa/ na ya at+ma na ni r+ya ta ya mI/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa a ti ti b+hA swa maM// AM sadzA ta thA ga ta pu tsa a bi she ka ya// at+mA naM nIH
764a3(rgyud 'grel): r+ya ta ya mI// au sarba te thA ga ta badz+ra rat+na a bi shIn tsa maM// oM sarba ta thA gA ta puM tsA pra bar+t+ta na ya// at+ma naM nir+ya tA ya mi// e sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra dar+tha pr-i bad+da ya mI// oM sarbe t+ya thA ga tA pu tsa karma ni// At+ma nI
764a4(rgyud 'grel): ya mi// oM sarba ta thA gA ta badz+ra kiR+Ya ku ru maM// de nas mchod pa'i rim pa ni// dang por sbyin sreg laswa bzhi ste// de nAs lhag pa'i mchod skabs gsol// de nas thun mongs mchod rnamA lA// de nas stod pa'i
764a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'o// de nus mtsha sprin bya bar bshad// de kun dag yid gdung dbyangs mchod // mchod pa'i dang po 'di yin no// de 'og rjes kyi mchod pra lu// sbyin sreg mchod sbyin rnams kyi mchog/ bsgribs
764a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyar mchog ni nyi ma'i lha// mi yi mchog ni rgyal po ste// rgya mtsho chu bo rnams kyi mchog/ zla ba rgyu skar rnam kyi mchog/ nyi ma snang byed rnams kyi gtso// bsgrub pa'i gachog ni gsang sngags te/ las
764b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi mchog ni rnam bzha'o// gnas kyi mchog ni dkyil 'khor bzhi// steng dang 'og dang thad kar yang // 'gro ba'i 'gro ba ji snyed pa// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// smra ba'i mchog ni rdzogs sangs rgyas// bstan pa'i
764b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog ni rdzogs chen po// rdo rje'i rgyud du bsngags pa yin// bzlas pa bdun dang bar skabs dang // de bzhin bzlasde pa'i 'og tu yang / bsngags bsdu sbyin sreg bya ba ni// thams cad du yang byasngags pa
764b3(rgyud 'grel): yin// sbyin sreg byas nas bzlas bya ba// dang por shin tu 'dod pa yin// bzlas dang sbyin sreg 'brel bA nI// de ni bar du 'dod pa yin// bzlas pa'i 'jog sbyin sreg gang // de ni shin tu gtso bor bshad
764b4(rgyud 'grel): drang pos bu lon rtog pa bsal// bar du lha rnams tshim bya'i phyir// tha mas lhag chad bskang ba'i don// baM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsal bya'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la// dang byams yid
764b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis mchod sbyin bya// las rnams brtsams par byas nas ni// gtum chen rngam yang lhan ner 'gyur// lha rnams dkar po byams dang ldan// zlum po dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad bar// lha rnams
764b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bcas brgyan par bzhugs// ho ma mchog zlum gdengs pa la// rdo rje pad+mas rab brgyan te// phur pa dkar po drug gdab par// yid la shin tu gsal byas te// byin za dge ba'i ram sbar
765a1(rgyud 'grel): bstan// yaM shing dkar po rnams kyi me/ rAM s+phur+yA rdo rje khro bo yis// drang byams bzhag ste snyoms zhugs la// til bsregs bzhin du sdig sreg shig/ oM che ge mos sarba pA pa da hu
765a2(rgyud 'grel): ha na hUM pa Da// dzA la raM/ kar lho kha khyer de nyid la// ngam tshig nyid kyi raM spros te// zhal gcig phyog bzhi zla dkar bzhin// zhi ba lus dang lta ba'i thabs// skyed mtshan+da dkar po'i gdan bzhugs bsam// ye
765a3(rgyud 'grel): shes ag+ne thugs dam bskul// oM na mo badz+ra pa na s+ya// oM na mo gnya' na s+ya tA ag+ne ye dwe ba dz+wa la ro// lan gsum brjod pas zhal phyogs shing // spyan gzigs thugs dgongs de nyid la// dam tshig
765a4(rgyud 'grel): pa yis lcags kyu bAcas// gnyis min dbyings las bskul ba yi// ye shes drang srong chen po nyid// sngon gyi smon lAmra thugs rje yis// byin gyis rlob phyir gshegs su gsol// dzA hUM baM ho// e ha hi
765a5(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra ha ri ba gA pa dzi ba lo ke ta ya sha daM hau// de ba ba ta ye sA hA/ na mo badz+ra pa nA s+ye// oM gnya' na a g+ne/ ki li ki li/ ngan+ta la po tA// i ha i ha/ A gA nga dzu hAM ta sha na ya swA hA/ ye shes me lha
765a6(rgyud 'grel): byon nas ni/ dam tshig bskyed dang gcig gyur na// mdun du bzhugs pa de nyid la// gnyis min drang srong ag+ne la// bdug spos chur gtsang ba ni// stong gsum kun tu dri mchog 'byung 'gyur ba'o// spos lnga sna sbyar
765b1(rgyud 'grel): chu gtsang rgyal ba'i 'khrus// ye shes sprin phung mkha' las char 'bebs pa// mi gtsang dri ma'i tshogs kun ngag gyur cig/ swa b+hA ba sarba d+harma shud+d+ho haM// dag pa nyid du byas nas kyang // mchod pa lnga yis mchod
765b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhag/ gnyis min drang srong ag+na lo// gdug spos me tog me dri ba shos// yon bdag don du 'bul lags na// thugs rjes dragongs nas bzhes su gsol// oM dz+nyA na satwA sa mA ya// satwA sa ma nI
765b3(rgyud 'grel): ye/ t+yu be praSh+pe// a lo ke/ nA ne gAn daM pa hA ra sarba d+hA ra ma prA tsA phan tsa swA hA// de nas mchod snod shing rta la// bzhugs pa nyid du bya ba 'am// kha khyer bzhag la las mchod bstod// de nA ma yi dngos
765b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid pa'i// rang bzhin rnam rgyal khro bo phyogs// de la sogs pa grong nyid du// spyan drangs mdun du gsal bsgoms lnga// ti 'dzin gsal ba'i me nyid sbyang // rnam par rgyal ba bos nas ni// gzugs brnyan
765b5(rgyud 'grel): shar g.yas 'am 'phral ba'o// rnam rgyal du yi lus gnyis gcig/ de nyid na ni bzhugs bsam pa// dad pa dang ni dam+b+ha tshig gis// tshur gshegs khams gsum rnam rgyal gtse// 'bar ba'i nang du
765b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs nas ni// sreg blugs zhal zos pazhes me sbyongs/ dzA hUM baM haM/ e h+ye hi// oM trai lo kya bai dza ya sa ma ti mu tra hUM phaT a gang dzi/ de ltar spyan drangs de nyid kyis// gang na mchog dam pa bstan pa ni/
766a1(rgyud 'grel): me tog lag du thogs nas ni// mya ngan mi 'da' thugs rje'i drung // nyon mongs mi spyod gos pa me// ma chags rlung bzhin dag pas na// pad+ma'i gdun la bzhugs su gsol// pad+ma sa ma
766a2(rgyud 'grel): ya haM/ de ltar gdan la bzhugs pa yang // yang dag nyid ni ngag mod kyi// dri mi'i mtshan ma med mod kyang // 'jig rten smi zhu'i tshul gyis su// phyag dang zhabs ni bsil mdzod cig/ a ha ra bi shud+d+ha
766a3(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA wA// de nas mchod pa dbulnga ba ni// khro bo khyams gsum rnam rgyal gyis// che ge mo zhig sdig gshegs nas// dkyil 'khor chen+da por dbang bskur te// yang drag nyid du bsgrub pa lnga// bar cha
766a4(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i log rtog ni// gnod sbyin skar 'dra' gdong la sogs// chad pa bcad cing bka' phab ste// bka' 'am sngags kyi tshig tsam gyis// zhi ba la sogs rnam bzhi ni// blan pa zhin du nI byed par
766a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// de phyir dang por khro bo ma ched// de phyir rnam par rgyal sogs la// mar khu shag te lu shu gu 'di/ yor+ya bdagi don du 'bul lags ni// thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// stong ga'i thang
766a6(rgyud 'grel): ka nas 'bul bar bya// oM tre lo kya b+hi dza ya kro d+hi ya ti pya ti pya na pu tsa na ye swA hA/ lag g.yas ma theb srin nyi ma a// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// blangs te sku gsung thugs mnyes phyir//
766b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i gan dang mchod rdzas dang // chos mkhan nyid la sra byang chub sems// dkar po shel dag byung ba yis// gang la dmigs pa der bstim pas// lha dang nyon mongs bag chags zhi// khro rgyal khams gsum
766b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam rgyal la// mngar gsum 'o thug nas kyi thug/ 'bras kyi log pan 'bras yos dang / 'bru sna lnga lA sogs pa 'bul// bdug spos me tog me dri bshog/ oM tra lo kya b+hi dza ya kro d+ha ya// du pa pu spa// a lo ke gnA de//
766b3(rgyud 'grel): a ha ra/ sar+b+ba d+harma da ra pu tsA pan tsa swA hA/ ti pya ti pya ye swA hA/ de nas stong de mchod pa ni/ rdo rje dril bu dbyangs ldan lA// sku yi 'geng 'gyur bcas par bya// zhi rgyas gnyis la rdor drilA nang / dbang drag rdor dril
766b4(rgyud 'grel): phyir bskor gsal// ye shes bskal pa'i me lta 'bar ba'i 'di// mra rig 'dod pa'i bdud khams thams cang sreg/ sprin gnyis 'thabs bzhin khro gnyer brjid pa'i zhal// zhe sdang gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams
766b5(rgyud 'grel): 'joms// dpa' bo chen po dpa' mtshan stag lpags can// log 'dren srin po'i bgegs kyi mtha' gnon pa'i// khro bo'i rgyal po dug gsum 'joms mdzad pa// khams gsum sems can dran 'gro las stsol ba/

767a2(rgyud 'grel): mimri ta pan tsa pU tsa swA hA// be gshegs khro chen rnam par rgyal// thugs rje che dang bdug 'brel prasa?// gzhal yas nyi du bzhugs nas kyang // me nyid sbyang po'i la sra bcol ba'o// de nas lig gla yas kha phaR+Ya bstan/
767a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa tshur bstan mkhrig ma stsol// ma theb gnyis mthil bzhag sor brgyad bskyod// oM ki li ki lI badz+ra bi ma la re'u tri pra tri ti// mra hA kro d+hA// badz+ra yan dza ha grin ta hUM phaT// sbyang pa'i las nI lha tshogs kyi// mdun/
767a4(rgyud 'grel): du bya bar yang dag bshad// de nas dkon mchog gsum po ste// sbyang dang spyan 'dren god na dag dang // mchod pa la sogs rnam rgyal bzhin// mugon po thugs rje cher ldan pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ston pa po// bsod//
767a5(rgyud 'grel): nams yon tan rgya mtsho bzhi// de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo// dag pas 'dod chags bral ba'i rgyu// dge bas ngan song las sgrol zhing // gcig tu drin dam mchog gyur pa// zhi gyur chos laM phyag 'tshalo//
767a6(rgyud 'grel): grol nas grol ba'i lam yang ston// bslab pa dag lo rab du gus// zhing gi dam pa yon tan bzhi// dge 'dun la yang phyag 'tshal lo// bla med dkon mchog gsum po yi// zhi ba la sogs grub por gsol//
767b1(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshegaso dkon mchog gsum// khyed kyis byams pa'i las kun mdzad// ngang ba'i yid kyis bskyed pa yi// gzhal yAs nyid du gshegasu gsol// oM badz+ra bA ga a gra mA ya haM ge tsa// me lha gnyis min spyan drang
767b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i// mdun du kri lis me nyid sbyang // de naso gra yasa? pa mthe bo yis// mthe'u chung drung gtsugs ga ya so nas ni// dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshuR+Ya gshegs zhes ni bos nas ni// dzA hUM baM ho// e h+ye hi ma hA b+hu ho do bar
767b3(rgyud 'grel): ri grI/ tad dzI mA ni tritA/ u ti mA hA rAM// a smi sa ni/ rdzi to b+ha byA/ ag+ne ye// a gad dzA/ ha bya ka byA/ ma hA na yA swA hA// de nas bzhugs par bya ba ni// lha yi drang srong kun dang ni// sreg sbyin bstabs pA ra zhal ches pa/
767b4(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje dam tshig brtan pas ni/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs gsol// Ig+na ye sa ma ya s+t+waM// biM shwA sa~M b+ha ba/ bi ga ti p+te/ dza~M ba laM hit+ta ag sha di po ya shud+d+ha swA hA// phyag zhal bsil ba byas nas ni// gnyis min drang srong
767b5(rgyud 'grel): ma lha la/ sha ga ti'u la sogs bdun gsum 'bral// oM raM raM ag+ne ye ha byA ka bya ti byA nA ye pU tsa na swA hA/ ru puM bu swa a lo kle grAn daM pU ts+tsha pan tsa swA hUM// do nAs rdo rje dril bur bo cus// 'gong gyur bcus la bstod
767b6(rgyud 'grel): ba ni// tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon gyi sras// me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog/ 'byung po yongs la bskyabs pa'i phyir// thugs rje'i dbang gis skur sprul pa// rig pa grub pa'i drang srong mchog/ nyon mongs sregs

768a2(rgyud 'grel): rtsi bcud ldan gun+de bsnams// chos kyi bdud rtsi yongs lnga bsil// nyes pa'i skyon bral tshangs par spyod// 'jig rten gnas kyang mya ngan 'das// zhi pa brnyes kyang thugs rje che// de bas bsted de phyag kyang 'tshag
768a3(rgyud 'grel): ag+ne chun po'i thugs dam bzhin// me nyid ye shesra mer byin rlobs// las kyi lha rnams mchod pa yi// srog rdzas stobs pa'i las mdzod bzhugs// shing rta gcig la bzhugs gsol la// phyogs mtshams lnga
768a4(rgyud 'grel): la bskor zhing mchod// ag+ne ye gang ka ra pU tsa ti shwa/ los kyi lha rnams mchod pa yi// me sbyang spyan drang gdan dbul bsil// las brtan phyag 'tshal mchod bstod dgu// snang stong mchod rten chos nyid mkha'//
768a5(rgyud 'grel): chos dbyings ye shes rnam dgu spyi// byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya mdzad// phyag 'tshal rnam par snang mdzod lo'o// s+ya brtan rdo rje gzugs brnyan sa// me ling ye shes thugs kyi sku// sa gnon chen po phyag rgya mdzad// phyag 'tshal
768a6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' mi bskyod la'o// srog byed rin cen yog 'bru me// mnyam nyid ye shes yon tan sku// mchod sbyin chen po phyag rgya mdzad// phyag 'tshal 'byung ldan dpal khyod la'o// dgyes 'dzin pad+ma phyog mtshan chu/

768b4(rgyud 'grel): yis grub pa bsgom byas te// byams bcos zhi ba'i tho ba yis// brdungs pas gdug rtsub zhi bar 'gyur// sham pa ta shin ti ku ru swA hA// dngul phye 'bras mtshan dkar paM la// 'o mras sbyar ba'i gtor ma yis//

769a6(rgyud 'grel): swA hA// yag sha shan ting ku ru swA hA/ kri ha shan ting ku ru swA hA// gung hing gung si shan ting kuM ru swA hA// ra tang r-i tang pra tang pra tang shan ting ku ru swA hA// na bi ra lan sha ne ting ku ru swA hA// bau hi si nan tan teng ku ru swA hA/

772b4(rgyud 'grel): ba thams cad bskyed pa'i yum// dam chos mdo sde bzhi la bskyabs su 'chi// rab tu lam stor 'khor bar mig zum pa'i// 'gro ba bskabs med rnams kyi pha ma mdzad// 'phrin las bzhi yis rtse gcig don
772b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad gtso// theg chen dge 'dun tshegs la skyabs su 'chi// de nas dkyil 'khor lha tshogs la// gus dang phyi bcas pas phyag byas mchod// gtsang zhing gtsang mar byashams pa'i rdzas// khrus chab bdug
772b6(rgyud 'grel): spos me dri bshos// dkyil 'khor lha tshegs rnams la 'bul// thugs rje dgongs nas bzhes su gsolo// na ma sa sa man+ta bud+d+hA nan// ga ga na sa ma ye swA hA// oM bi sho bi shud+d+he swA hA// na mas sa man+ta
773a1(rgyud 'grel): bud+d+hA nan// d+harma tAt+tA nA nu ga te swA hA// nams sa man+ta bud+d+ha nan// ma hA man+ta but+sa te swA hA// na mas+tha man+ta bud+d+ha nan// da r+Ni pa ra na/ a ga ga sa ga ga gaM ne'u da ra ya swA hA// na maswa mAn+ta bud+d+hA nan// b+hi shud+d+ha gan+tod+d+ha
773a2(rgyud 'grel): ba ya swA hA// na masma man+ta bud+d+hA nana?/ e ra ra/ se re ra/ ka ra rA/ ba laM ti/ ma ni swA hA/ nang stong mchod rten chos nyid mkha'// chos dbyings ye shes rnam dag sku// byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya mdzad// phyag 'tshal
773a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par mdzad la'o// de lta bu'i yon tan bcas pa la// rdo rje sems dpa' byams pa'i mchod// spos kyi sprin lding 'dug pa 'phro// gtsug gtor rgyal ba'i gdugs kyis khebs// byams pa thabs dang shes ra
773a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi// badz+ra d+hU pA mchod pas rol// rIn chen 'byung ldan snying rje'i mchodade// ut+pal mthing ga me tog 'thor// rin chen zla gam dbyings su sbyor// snying rje thabs dang shes rab kyi// rut+na prASh+pe'i mchod pas
773a5(rgyud 'grel): rol// snang ba mtha' yas dga' ba'i mchod// dpal gyi sgron ma phyag na bsnams// chos kyi rgyal mtshan rlab 'dar 'dzugs// dga' ba'i thobs dang shes rab kyis// pad+ma A lo'i mchod pas rol//
773a6(rgyud 'grel): don yod grub pa'i btang snyoms mchod// tsan ngan bdud rtsi'i charo 'bebs ma// dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i thig ler 'bebs// spos spor thabs dang shes rab kyis// kaR+Ya gan+d+ha'o mchod pas rol// de ltar
773b1(rgyud 'grel): rigs la nye ba'i bzungs// mchod pa phul ba'i lan dag du// rnam par snang mdzad chen po yis// rdo rje sems dpa' rtogs pa'i yul// dung mdog sgeg mo rdo rje 'dzin// sems dpa' dkar po ye shes 'bebs// me
773b2(rgyud 'grel): long lta bu'i ye shes la// badz+ra la se'i mchod pas rol// rin chen 'byung ldan mnyam pa'i yul// yid bzhin rin chen gtsug 'bar ma// 'jam dpal rnon po'i dngos grub 'dzin// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye
773b3(rgyud 'grel): shes la// rat+na ma le'i mchod pas rol// snang ba mtha' yas mkhyen pa'i yul// pad+ma dbyangs mkhan rma bya'i 'grin// spyan ras gzigs kyi shes rab bskyed// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la// pad+ma girti'i
773b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pas rol// don yod grub pa las kyi yul// grar mkhan 'gying ma gzi dang ldan// lus kyi 'khor lo rnam par sbyar// bya ba nan tan ye shes la// karma nI rti'i mchod pas rol// de ltar gzungs
773b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi mchod byas nas// rigs bzhi tshad med bsdu ba bzhi// mchod phyir dpal gyis gsungs pa'o// sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa'i rtogs// byams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid// dpa' bar 'gro ba rnam dag la//
773b6(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra a gu sha'i mchod pas rol// don mthun phun sum tshogs pa'i rtags// snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid // rin chen phyag rgyas shes pa la// rat+na pa sha'i mchod pas rol// don spyad phun sum tshogs pa'i
774a1(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid// shes rab sgrol mas mdzad pa la// pad+ma s+pho ta'i mchod pasnga rol// snyan pa phun sum tshogs pa'i rtags// btang snyoms chen po'i ngo bo nyid// chos spyan chen po
774a2(rgyud 'grel): kun rigs la// kaR+Ya gran+d+ha'i mchod pas rol// de ltar tshad med mchod byas nas// rigs rnams byin gyis rlobs pas mchod// zhe sdang ma skyes rdo rje dam tshig ma// ye shes me long pha rol phyin pa'i ngang //
774a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med rgyas 'debs drin ldan phyag rgya ma// satwa badz+ra dbyings phyag mchod pas rol// du rgyal bdag med ron chen dam tshig mya// ye shes mnyam nyid pha rol phyin pa'i ngang // mi 'gyur rmongs byed drin ldan phyag rgya
774a4(rgyud 'grel): mAHrat+na 'adz+ra dbyings phyug mchod pos rol// 'dod chags mi dmigs ches kyi dmachog sa// ye shes kun rtogs pha rol phyin pad+d+hi dang // mi rtog za byed dri ldan phyag rgya ma// bid+ma bad+d+ha dbyings phyug mchod pas
774a5(rgyud 'grel): rol// nga rgyal ma grub rgya gram dam tshig ma// ye shes nan tan pha rol phyin pa'i ngang // mi skye tshe 'phel dri ldan phyag rgya ma// karma badz+ra dbyings phyug mchod pas rol// de ltar byin brlabs mchod byas nas// rgyan gyi
774a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod par gsungs pa ni// bde gshegs rgyal ba 'khor bcas ni// mchod gnas dam pa dam dpal gyi zhing // yidu 'ong ba'i mchod sprin dang // rol mo sil snyan 'phen godugs dang // bla ro rgyal mtshan ltab lhub
774b1(rgyud 'grel): dang // me tog 'phreng dang bdug spos srogs// mchod sbyin sna tshogs phyogs bcur sprul// mchod sprin rigs sngags bden pa dang // na mkha'i mdzod sngags ting 'dzin thugs// sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byams su//
774b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshud sprin sna tshogs klubs gyur cig/ na mo rat+na d+hA ya yi// na mo b+h+r-i ga ba te// badz+rI sA ra pra mdza ne/ ta thA ga twe ya/ ar+thA taM sAmya k+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA// oM badz+rI badz+re mahA bad+d+he// ma hA te dzA badz+re/ ma hA bid+yA badz+ri/ ma
774b3(rgyud 'grel): bo d+hi tsit+ta badz+re// ma hA dzi d+hi maN+Di/ pa saM kra ma Na badz+re// sarba karma a yU ra Na/ bi sho d+hA na badz+re sA hA/ na mis+sarba ta thA ga tu b+h+yo// bi shra mu khaM b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba thA khaM ung+ga te/ s+pha ra Ni i maM ga ge na khaM swA hA// de nas yum lnga las
774b4(rgyud 'grel): brtan mchod// shes rab dbyings phyug rigs yum lta// phyag rgya'i tshogs la byin+da rlob cing // thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhor gyur pas// 'gro ba'i don rnams mdzad du gsol// shes rab debyings ma rigs kyi yum
774b5(rgyud 'grel): lnga ste// chos dbyings ye shrIs mkha' sogs gsal ba lo// gsang chen bde bo'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dang // thabs lhur rol zhing brtan por bzhugasu gsol// yum rnams bdag la mchod thabs ni// bsgrub
774b6(rgyud 'grel): mchod bcu drug gzhung bzhin bya// bcom ldan rnam snang mdzad chen gyi// chos dbyings ye shes chen po'i yul// yum chen b+hud+d+ha lo tsa na// thams cad zad par khas dbang bskur// bde bshegs kun gyi yum rtson mo//
775a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal kun tu bzang mo la'o// bcom ldan rdo rje sems pA yi// me long ye shes chen po'i yul// yum chen badz+ra lo tsa nA// thams cad zad par sas dbang bsgyur// rdo rje rigs gtso mang po'i yum// phyaH/
775a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal sangs rgyas spyan khyod la'o// bcom ldan rin chen 'byung ldan gyis// mnyam nyid ye shes chen po'i yul// yum chen rat+na lo tsa na// thams cad zad par mes dbang bskur// rin chen rigs gtso mang po'o
775a3(rgyud 'grel): yum// phyag 'tshal ni bza' kar mo la'o// bcom ldan snang ba mtha' yas kyi// kun rtog ye shes chen po'i yul// yum chen pad+ma lo tsa na// thams cad zad par chus dbang bskur// pad+mo'i rigs gtso mang po'i yum//
775a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal mU ma kI nyid la'o// bcom ldan don yod grub pa yi/ nun+da tan ye shes chen po'i yul// yum chen karma lo tsa na// thams cad zad par rlung dbang bskur// lus kyi rigs gtso mang po'i yum// phyag 'tshal
775a5(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig sgrol ma'o// de nas sems dpe'i bcu drug kyang // ci rigs pa 'am yang na ni// mtshan+da rgya rtsa brgyad pa yis mchod// de nas la sde la sogs brgyad// byi nang gnyis kyi lha mo dam tshig ma// phyag rgya bzhi yi
775a6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes gsal ba la// rol pa chen pos mchod pas gtso bo yi// dgongs pa skongs la grol ba'i don rnams mdzod// ye shes dus bzhi gzugs nye gzungs// sbrul sku 'khor bar mi ldog cing // mya ngan 'das
775b1(rgyud 'grel): la mi chags pa'i// don rnam mdzad cing brtan por bzhugs// rdo rje sgeg mo byang chub sems kyi dang // mchog sbyin smon byed gzi brjid 'bar zhing sdud// mdog kar gser gyi khu tshur skur rten te// phyag 'tshul rdo rje
775b2(rgyud 'grel): smon byed sgeg mo la'o// rin chen dpal phreng gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin// ying+ga bzhin mchog 'byung gzi brjod 'bar zhing skor// sngo bstangs rine chen phreng bas re 'dod skongs// phyag 'tshal bdud rtsi char 'beb
775b3(rgyud 'grel): phregleng ba la'o// pad+ma dbyangs mkhan gsung rab rgya mtshor sgrogs// snyan pas yid 'phrog gzi brjod 'bar ldan skongs// mdog dmar gser gyi pi pang phyag na bsnams// phyag 'tshal thabs kyis yid 'phrog
775b4(rgyud 'grel): gir ti la'o// las kyi grar mkhan 'phrin las rgya mtsho sgrol// gzugs mdzes skyod pas rol mo phyogs bcur mdzad// mdog ljang sna tshogs skur ston gzi brjid 'bar// phyag 'tshal yid 'ong mdzes bskyod
775b5(rgyud 'grel): ni ti la'o// spos kyi sprin ljang bdug pa phro// kun tu tshim byed dri bsung thim// mthon skya gser gyi pog phor bsnams// phyag 'tshal rnam dag bdug pa la'o// bltas mdzes r-in chen phung po 'phro// byang chub yin
775b6(rgyud 'grel): lag me tog rgyan// mthon ting me tog gzhong bu bsnams// phyag 'tshal skyon med me tig la'o// 'od gsal 'phros pas kun tu khyab// gti mug thibs po sel mdzad pa// dmar skya chos kyi mar me bsnams
776a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal sgron 'bar mar me lnga'o// tsan dan bdud rtsi char 'bebs ma// bdud rtsi bsil dro 'jam pa'i dbyangs// ljang sngon dung por phyag na bsnams// 'i phyag 'tshal reg bya dri chu la'o// rdzu 'phrul che
776a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bskal bzangs dang // phyogs skyong bcu dang bkra shis brgyad// rdo rje lcags kyu 'gugs byed dang // rin chen zhags pa gsol ka dang // pad+ma lcags sgrog pho nya'i las// rgya grom dril bu shes rab mchog/ dpe med rgyas
776a3(rgyud 'grel): sras rang rgyal dang // dgra bcom rgyal chen lha chen dang lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang // lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding // mi 'am tsi dang lto phye che// sa bdag bza' skar rigs 'dzin dang // srin po log 'dren sha za dang // rgyu drug
776a4(rgyud 'grel): dag gi mthu can sogs// thams cad ci rigs pa yisra mchod// dkyil 'khor bdag po du nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor lha yi ting 'dzin zhugs// lce thog a las zla dkyil te// oM bsgoms rdo rje ye shes bsam// rdo rje
776a5(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu sgoms nas ni// chos kyi phyag rgya can+da gyis ni// slob ma de la bshad pAr+ya bya// au d+har+m+ma/ hUM d+hAma?/ traM d+har+m+mahri d+harma/ a d+harma/ sa ma ya stAM// d+harma/ ya nA ya sU d+hArma/ a ho su ka d+harma// sa du sa du/ su
776a6(rgyud 'grel): bai hAM/ swo d+hArmaM/ ru po ha taM d+hArma/ o rta pro ba ti d+ha ma/ ha ha hUM ha d+harma/ sarba ka ri d+hirma/ du ka tshe da d+harma/ bud b+ho ngi d+harma/ pra ti sha ba ta d+harma/ su ba shing tr-i d+hama?/ ni ba ya stau d+harma/ shud tru bkr-i d+harma/ sarba sid d+ha
776b1(rgyud 'grel): d+harma/ ma ha rA ti d+har+m+ma/ ru pa sho pre d+harma/ shu ro tra ber+ya d+har+m+ma/ srarba bu rtse d+harma/ pra ha ta ni d+harma/ 56/ we taH la? gan dang kai d+ham/ maM ya ti ngas ma/ sa ma n+yAMt+matar// ho s+pho ta baM byaM d+harma/ gan d+ha a u d+harma// dwe ltar lha tshogs sku gsung
776b2(rgyud 'grel): thugs// dkyil 'khor gang yin thams cad kyi// so sor snying po tha mar ni// d+harmas btags la brjod pas ni// lha rnams thugs dgongs dngos grub stsol// kun rdzob dang ni don dam gyi// byang chub sems ni
776b3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed par bya// sdom pa yi ni dam tshig dang // dge ba'i chos rnams sdud pa dang // sems can don byar bcas pa yi// rnam pa gsum dang ldan par bshad// rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgyar bcas// oM badz+ra ka ba tsa rakra a a
776b4(rgyud 'grel): titau sta haM// de nas sku gsung thugs kyis brlab// ka ya oM/ bag aM/ tsi tra hUM/ 'khor lo phyag rgya ting 'dzin sngags// bar du gcod pe grasal bar bya// oM dz+nyA na tsikra phaT+Ta/ d+yA yiswa ba shang phyog thams cad
776b5(rgyud 'grel): ni// dam pas gsungs pa'i tshig yin pas// khyod kyang de las ma 'da' zhig/ oM badz+ra sa ma yar+thi tha a/ byang chub rigs can nyid du ni// sngags ni brjod pas gyur pa'o// oM b+ho d+hi tsi ta a saM me/ tri sa ma me/
776b6(rgyud 'grel): ma ha sa ma ya swA hA// hUM hUM hUM/ gsum pa dkyil 'khor mjug gzhug pa/ slob dpon zhugs dang slob ma gzhug/ gshegs dang lhag chang khe bskang dang // mthun par slar gshegs gsol ba dang // las
777a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi mchod nas bdag nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor sems kyis na mkha' la// bteg nas byang chub sems kyis ni// zhugs pa nyid du thub pas gsungs// bdug spos lag du thog nas/ blo gros
777a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas lha rnams la// gus pas gsol ba legs par grang ba// de 'og sgo bzhi dbye bar bshad// zhug sa lha gnyisu med bsgoms la// 'gro ba drang ba'i las bya'o// bcom ldan na mkha'i sangs kun// thugs
777a3(rgyud 'grel): rje chen po mthu ldan lags// bdag nyid rab tu bskul ba'i phyir// rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan lhas// bdag la dbang mchog 'dir stsol cig/ dkyil 'khor la ni 'khor lor bshad// de nyid dam tshig
777a4(rgyud 'grel): yin par bshad// sangs rgyas bkA ya dkyil 'khor du// br-idag nyid dad pas mjug lags na// dkyil 'khor bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis// bdag la byin gyis brlab du gsol// bde bar gshegaso bcom ldan
777a5(rgyud 'grel): 'das// bsod nams can du bdag nyid 'gyur// sngon gyi las kyis 'brel pa lags// thugs rjes sras su dgongs par mdzad// at+ma ko hau/ maN+Da la sarba A be sha sA b+hA ba// rdo rje mdzub sogs legs
777a6(rgyud 'grel): par ni// sbyar la bkan te bsdebs nas su// khros nas rab tu dbye ba ni// sgo dbye ba yi mtshan nyid do// gnas rab sgo bzhi zhe sdang dang // nga rgyal 'dod chags phra dog bzhis// sngon med dus nas bcad lags na//
777b1(rgyud 'grel): tshad med bsdu brgyad rigs bzhi yis// thugs rje thabs la sprul pa yi// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog drang // dril bu phyag rgya'i mchog nyid kyis// ding nyid thar sgo dbye ru gsol// oM badz+ra rat+na pad+ma karma/ kro dag 'dod
777b2(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya tsa tA ra// pra be sha shi gran mA ra ya hUM phaT// de nas bdag rdo rje rin chen dang // pad+ma rgya gram shugs kyis ni// rab tu gal te zhugs nas ni sa// gnyis su med par sangs rgyas 'gyur// snying rjes slob ma la
777b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs la// lha mo sbrul sras bsgom byas drang // de nas sngags g.yog ngag gis ni// slob ma'i las rnams brtson bya ba// phyag 'tshal gsol 'jug khrus bkra shis// dam bca' me tog gtor mig dbye// srong
777b4(rgyud 'grel): dpon lan stsal lhas dbang bskur// dom tshig dpogs dang dbang bskur dang // smon lam lha ngo bstan yon dbul// dge ba'i rtsa ba lnga pa'o// de nas shar sgo dag du ni// bdug spos lag du thog nas ni// shar
777b5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs mngon dga'i pho brang 'di'i// bcom ldan rdo rje sems la sogs// skal ldan rgyal sras dag pa zhig/ ngag yid dang bas gus phyag 'tshal// lho phyogs dpal ldan po brang 'di'i// bcom ldan rin chen
777b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ldan sogs// skal ldan rgyal sras dag pa zhig/ nub phyogs bde ldan pho brang 'di'i// bcom ldan snang ba mtha' yas sogs// skal ldan rgyal sras dag pa zhig/ byang phyogs rnam dag pho brang 'di'i//
778a1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan don yod grub pa sogs// skal ldan rgyal sras dag pa zhig/ bcom ldan snying po'i pho brang 'di'i// bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad sogs// skal ldan rgyal sras dag pa zhig/ ngag yid
778a2(rgyud 'grel): dang bas gus phyag 'tshal// bdag nyid dam tshig rdo rje ste// rdo rje sems dpa' yin pa'i phyir// rdo rje bla na med pa 'di// de ring bdag la dbab du gsol// bdag ni dam tshig rin chen ste// bdag ni dAm tshig pad mo ste//
778a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni dam tshig rgya gram ste// bdag ni dam tshig 'khor lo ste// rnam par snang mdzad yin par grag/ 'khor lo bla na med pa'i nga // de ring bdag la dbab du gsol// shar phyogs mngon dga'i pho brang 'dir//
778a4(rgyud 'grel): med byang chub sems bskyed de// dngos grub dam pa sgrub pa'i phyirI// bdag gis dad pas 'jug par bgyi// lho phyogs dpal ldan pho brang 'dir// nub phyogs bde ldan po brang 'dir// byad phyin rnams pho brang 'dir//
778a5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan snying po'i pho brang 'dir// bdag gi slob ma gzhug par bgyi// phyogs su lta ba dgrol ba'i phyir// mthu las 'ongs la gnas par bgyi// rdo rje sems dpa' me long yul// kun bzong phyag rgya'i bum pa ste//
778a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis min byang chub sems rtags chus// zhe sdang rnam smin dag gyur cig/ rin chen 'byung ldan mnyam shes yul// nam bza'i phyag rgya bum pa ste// gnyis meng byang chub sems rtags chus// nga rgyal rnam
778b1(rgyud 'grel): smin dag gyur cig/ snang ba mtha' yas kun rtog yul// ma ma'i phyag rgya bum pa ste// gnyis min byang chub sems rtags chus// 'dod chags rnam smin dag gyur cig/ don grub nan+na tan ye shes yul// sgrol ma'i
778b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bum pA ste// gnyis min byang chub sems rtags chus// phra drug rnam smin dag gyur cig/ rnam snang chos dbyings ye shes yul// spyan gyi phyag rgya bum pa ste// gnyis man byang chub sems rtags chus//
778b3(rgyud 'grel): gti mgo rnam smin+d+ra dag gyur cig/ mi 'khrugs rgyal po'i srid dang gti mug+na rnam sbyong ba// mgon po yon tan mtho' dag rdzogs pa'i bkra shis dang // dge mnyam bsam sems ldan pa'i bkras shis gang yin
778b4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ bkris nges ni deng 'dir zhi byed legs gyur sh+log/ sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan+da rgyun gyis brgyan byas shing // yang drag 'byor pa'i sbyin pas sbyin mdzad mi bsgrub// rin chen 'byung zhes bya ba'i bkra shis/
778b5(rgyud 'grel): gang yin pa// bsam gtan dam pa ting 'dzin pha rol phyin gnas shing // ye shes pad+ma'i stong bzhugs dpag med tshe ldan zhing / che grangs med pa ro byin gyis brlabs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// sems can
778b6(rgyud 'grel): don phyir las la thugs ni sbyor mdzad cing // 'gro ba thams cad bcings pa bcings las grol gyur pa// thub mchog don yod grub pa'i bkris gang yin pa// rnam par snang mdzad ye shes dam pa mtsho
779a1(rgyud 'grel): tshan ldan// zla ba nya 'dra sku mnga' srid mthar 'byin pa// dgongs pa mtha' dag rdzogs pa'i bak+Sha shis gang yin pa// bkra ba shis des ni deng 'dir zhi byed legs gyur shog/ yan
779a2(rgyud 'grel): mA gA lan shu ba sha man to sa ya dzi na ta ka sha s+yai ag sho bya rA tsa// bi shi na ta s+ya// sarba ku na// maM ga la s+ya/ naN+Da maM gA la da/ b+ha b+ha du shan ti/ ka sa pra dz+nyA na ban/ du t+yaM/ yon man dga' ldan ma ni ku lanaM/
779a3(rgyud 'grel): hi na bu ha ra// pa pa du sha sha tsi na swe ta/ no ta ne/ kha la na/ pau pi pra ti na/ tan mnga' 'ga' lan// b+ha b+hA dra shan taM/ ka ri na ba da na t+ya/ yan mang 'ga' lan/ a ga nau/ a yur byed dwe sa s+ye/ mA na pra ra
779a4(rgyud 'grel): ta la yas s+ye/ 'ga' rna badz+ra/ pa ri gA te/ s+yA s+yai/ ta thA ga te/ ya me/ tanra mang 'ga' lan/ b+ha b+hU drA shan te/ kar na d+ya phaT/ t+ya/ yan man 'ga' lan/ ma ma mu ne/ pa ra sha s+ye/ ka oM mo ka song ti/ sAt+ma tA
779a5(rgyud 'grel): ra kar ma na nau/ bu da sha bA na/ sha ta la s+ya/ yo tsau ta man se sa s+ye/ mun+da sa s+ye/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha b+han d+ha me bya// tan man 'ga' lan/ b+ha b+ha du shan te/ kaR+Ya rna ta t+ya/ yana? mang 'ga' la no/ sa ga la pu ra rna/ ma to ra swa s+ya/
779a6(rgyud 'grel): bai ro tsa na s+ye/ bar ta nyarni/ ma ha rarna ba se/ sa pu ra rar+tha/ tsa tra pro she/ ha ban do ka si/ tan mang 'ga' lanau/ b+ha b+ha du shan te ka rna ta pad t+yai// de la de bzhin gshegs gtso chos rnams kun la dbang bskuro// rdo rje rigs
779b1(rgyud 'grel): gtso chen po dang // khams gsum bdag por dbang bskur ro// rin chen rigs gtso chen po dang // lha mis mchod par dbang bskur ro// pad+ma'i rigs gtso chen po dang // chos kyi rgyal po chen por dbang bskur ro// las kyi
779b2(rgyud 'grel): rigs gtso chen po dang / las bzhis gzhan don spyod dbang bskur// bkra shis brjod pa'i byin rlabs kyis// 'jig rten dag du mi rnams kun// grags pa rnams spel bgegs kyang med// sems nyid bder 'gro
779b3(rgyud 'grel): nges byed la// mthar yang nges pa kho nar ni// zhi ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// de nas dam bcwa' bya ba ni// dpa' bo chen po rgyud dag las// sdom pa chen po legs par blang bar bya// rje la sdom pa'i yon tan ni//
779b4(rgyud 'grel): dang pos sdom pas rgyud gnyis sbyang // thu ma'i sdom pas lha man sbyong // rdo rje rin chen pad+ma yi// sdom pa yis ni ngan 'gro sbyong // de bas sdom pA gnod pa mchog/ de 'og dam poca' yang dag bya// sangs rgyas
779b5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sem sde can don byed brtan paro gzung // de ni spyi yi tshul khrims so// rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la// rdo rje dril bu
779b6(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag rgya dang // yang dag nyid du gzung bar bya// slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi// rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi// dmo tshig yid du 'ong ba la// nyin re bzhin nam dus drug du// sbyin pa
780a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin// byang chub chen po las byung ba// pad+ma rigs mchog drag pa la// phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bgyi// las kyi rigs mchog chen
780a2(rgyud 'grel): po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang dag nyid du gzung brla bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang // bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// ding nas brtsams te gzung
780a3(rgyud 'grel): bar bgyi// nam du yang ni mi spang ngo // sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bdag gi bsdom pa ma lus gzung // de nas shar sgo gnas pa de// na bza' stong slad dur dmar dwak+Shi// rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya 'char// bcug
780a4(rgyud 'grel): la lag du rin chen dang // me taMgra phreng ba la sogs thogs// gdong gra yogs dar dukar gyis g.yogs nas// a sa me tri sa me// ma ha sa ma yu hUM// oM badz+ra a ti ti sh+tsa hUM// oM badz+ra sau ma ya hUM/ sngon gyi
780a5(rgyud 'grel): rabyas grangs med nas// dge ba'i las kyis bsnyen pa'i lha// lhag pa'i lha ni gang yin pa// da lta nyid du bab par shog/ sangs rgyas dngos grub thob pa'i phyir// bdag la thugs brtser dgongs nas kyang / 'gro la phan pa'i
780a6(rgyud 'grel): gtso chen gyis// sman par dgongs nas bzhesu gsol// oM badz+ra pra ti gr-i ha na hUM/ oM badz+ra pra ti tsa sa ma ya sa s+ho// bo de tsi ta pu tsa ho// me tog rin chen la sogs pa// gang las bab pa rigs kyi lha// gtso bo'i rigs de bsgrub
780b1(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// dngos grub myur de the tsom med// de nas lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// rin chen lhar bcas blangs nas ni// slob ma'i spyir bzhag thim gyur nas// mi gnyis gcig pa'i lhar bsams nas// oM badz+rA sa ma yA/
780b2(rgyud 'grel): nI tha ya me/ oM AM hUM/ a b+hi shin tsa a/ da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed// dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la bltos// khyod ni thon cen 'di nyid lu// gsang ba chen po'i snod du 'gyur// rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed// thob
780b3(rgyud 'grel): pa mnyam med de ring thob// dam tshig gong 'og ma 'da' zhig/ bla mod byang chub chen po thob// oM badz+ra ha sdod ga ta ya hUM/ oM badz+ra pra be sha ya hUM phaT/ slob dpon ldan gnyis dbyangs sbyar te// rdo rje phyag rgya bcas
780b4(rgyud 'grel): lA/ da yI dam tshig rdo rje ste// rdo rje sems dpa' yin bur grags// rdo rje ye shrIs bla med 'di// de ring khyod la sbyin par bya// oM badz+ra sA mA ya a b+hi shin+da tsa a a/ dA ni dam tshig rin chen ste// nga nI dam tshig pad+ma ste/
780b5(rgyud 'grel): da ni dam tshig rgyu grum ste// nga ni dam tshig 'khor lo ste// snying po 'khor lo yin par grags// 'khor lo ye shrIs blo me dra 'di// di ring khyod lA sbyin par bya// oM rat+na pad+ma karma tsakra/ aM b+hi shin tsa a A/
780b6(rgyud 'grel): ma ya rdzi tha/ 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam las 'das na sreg par bya// dam tshig srungs na dngos grub ni// rdo bdud rtsi chu yis 'grub// dzaM ste dam tshig 'das na ni// de mi thag du bkas nas gshegs// rdo rje
781a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin rgyal khros nas kyang // bdun rgyud rigs ni rlag par mdzad// de bas rtag tu bu khyod kyis// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i dam tshig dang // sdom pa dang ni bla ma'i bka'// shin tu mos pas bsrung b+ha/
781a2(rgyud 'grel): byas khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya// mA byin par yang blo nga mi bya// brdzun dang 'dod la spyod pa rnams// dngos grub 'dod pas bya ba min// chung ni btung bar mi bya zhing // shwa la sogs pa bza' mi bya// sen gnod par sbyor ba ni// ni
781a3(rgyud 'grel): yang bya ba ma yin te// dkon mchog gsum ni yong mi spang // dus kun tu ni byang chub sems// snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang // lha dang bla ma de bzhino// sdig la sogs pa gang yin dang // bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya// lho la phul
781a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i snying po dang // de yi grib mar 'gom mi bya// phyag rgya'i gzugs la'ang de bzhin no// sngags dang lha la smad mi bya// gdon gyi la sogs bya ba men// mu stegs can la'ang smad mi bya// mdor na yid gnyis ngogs mi bya// bdag dri
781a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid sngags dang ni// thams cad 'dra bas de bzhi no// de nas dbang mchog bsgyur ba ni// ba ga ci slob ma'i phyogs dag du// khru gang ba'i dkyil 'khor la// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri// tshen ni dmar pos legs bris la// bkra shis
781a6(rgyud 'grel): brgyad kyi phyag rgya bgod// dbu rgyan cod pan me tog phreng // phyag rgya bzhi dang rin chen bdun// gser byas thur ma 'khor me long // dung dang bkra shis ras thog bzhag/ bdug spos ras sar gdugs sham can// rnga yab bsil ya
781b1(rgyud 'grel): zho phor gang // bum pa bzhi sogs mi res gzung // mchod pa la sogs bkra shi sa brjod// oM bri ta bri ta sarba a ra na ni hUM phaT/ oM tra tha tra tha sarba a ba ra na ni hUM phaT/ oM bi tra bi ba tra ba sarba a pa tAd tA na ni hUM phaT
781b2(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugasu byin gyi brlab// de nas thur ma me long dung // 'khor lo rtsa ba'i yig 'bras bskur// phreng ba bum pa nyan pa dang // gsang sngags phyag cod pan dang // 'khor sbyar mi dbang dbu rgyan dang // las dang bcu'i gzungs
781b3(rgyud 'grel): rje'o// bcu gsum su ni non dbang bskur// 'khor lo rin chen bstabs pas ni// sa bcu kun la dbang ba dang // theg pa mtha' dag ston pa yi// chos kyi rgyal po chen por shog/ glang po rin chen bstabs pas ni// theg pa kun gyi
781b4(rgyud 'grel): don rtogs nas// phyogs bcu kun la dbang thob nas// byang chub 'bras bu thob par shog/ rta mchog rin chen bstabs pas ni// rdzu 'phrul rkang bzhi'i dbang thob nas// nyon mongs rgya mtsho brgal ba yi// tharA pa'i 'bras bu
781b5(rgyud 'grel): thob par shog/ nor bu rin chen bstabs pas ni// 'jig rten dag tu de bzhin gshegs// dpe byad mtshan gyis brgyan pa yi// gser gyi sku mdog thob par shog/ dmag mI rin chen bstabs bas ni// mi 'jigs bzhi yi
781b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang thob nas// phas kyi rgol ba tshir gcod pa'i// go cha chen po bgos par shog/ blon po rin chen bstabs pas ni// sum cu rtsa gsum dbang phyug rje// rdzu 'phrul che ba'i brgya byin gyis// lha yi rgyal po thob par shog/
782a1(rgyud 'grel): btsun mo rin chen bstabs pas ni/ shes rab yum gyi dbang thob cing // skye 'gag med pa'i don rtogs nas// bla meng+ga 'bras bu thob par shog+sa/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin brlabs pa'i// nyon mongs
782a2(rgyud 'grel): sel ba'i grub rdzas dpa' bo 'di// bar chang bgegs kyi tshogs rnams rnam 'jig cing // / dngos grub mchog thob dang 'dir bkra shis shog/ ji ltar lha yi dbang po brgya byin gyis// byin gyis brlabs pa'i rtsa mchog
782a3(rgyud 'grel): pu da nA// durbaM'i gdan la rdzogs nas bdud btul ltar// ding 'dir bkra shrIs phun sum tshogs par shog/ ji ltar sngon gyi drang srong a gastis// byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyugs kyi dngos grub 'dri// khyim bdag dbang phyug
782a4(rgyud 'grel): che la byin pa yi// skye dgu'i spos gyur bcud ldan bkra shis sh+log/ rdo rje dang ni rin chen chu skyes dang // de bzhin las kyi sems dpa'i dbang bsgyur ba'i// li kris 'jig rten gsum po dbang bsdus shing // dngos grub mchog
782a5(rgyud 'grel): thob dang 'dir bkra shis shog/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dung // nA ra yaM nar dung sgra bsgrags pa ltar// bu khyod dam pa'i chos skra rab sgrogs shing // 'gro ba 'dren mdzad dring 'dir bkra shis shog/ chos
782a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// smig rgya lta bur yang dag rtag pa'i mthus// ma rig mun sel ye shes thob gyur nas// dngos grub mchog thob ding 'dir bkra shis shog/ ji ltar glang po chen
782b1(rgyud 'grel): po A gastis// 'gri'u wang srog gis dbang por gyur pa ltar// de bzhin bu khyod chos srog 'dzin gyur nas// dngos grub mchog thob ding 'dir bkra shis shog/ ji ltar rgyu dang sa bon chung ngus las// 'bras bu
782b2(rgyud 'grel): cher smin shring tog bilba ltar// de bzhin bsod nams rgya tshogs chung ngus las// 'bras bu bla med byang chub thob par shog/ gtsug tor spyan ljags go chas bskur// lag gnyis bcings te gung gshibla ste
782b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzubo gnyis bkug sbyar gtsug to rA ro// na ma sa man t+yaM bud d+hA nan/ hUM hUM hUM/ lag gnyis bcings t+yaM gung+ga srin lag+na/ brgyang ste mthe bo nr-i nga bcug mig/ na ma sa man ta bud d+hA nan/ ga ga na ba ra la/
782b4(rgyud 'grel): krA na/ ga ru na ma ya/ ta thA ga ta tsak+ShA swA hA// lag gnyis thal+la mo khong stong sbyar// mdzub gnyis dkr-is lnga srin lagro gtug/ mthong gnyis gshibs ljags su bshad// na ma sa man ta bud
782b5(rgyud 'grel): d+h+yA nan/ t+yA thA ga ta dzi hra sarba d+harma pya ti ti sh+tsa/ lag pa gnyis ni khong stong sbyar// mdzub gnyis ngos nas bkris pa ni// go cha'i phyag rgya zhes bshad// nA ma sa man ta bud+d+he nAn// pra tsan d+ha badz+ra la ya bi ru hUM/ dri nas
782b6(rgyud 'grel): slob ma'i thog dag du// gdugs mdzes gser gyi yu ba can// theg chen chos kyi ngo bo ste// nyon mongs gdung ba sel byed pa'i// dbang mchog dam pa'i dbang bsku ro// sum cu rtsa lngas liT dbang bsku// de nas dag pa bsgo ba ni nas
783a1(rgyud 'grel): sgra yi rjesu leg sbyar zhing // blo dang ldan pas smon lam gda'// shar phyogs sgo lA prarba bas+t+ra// sngon dang thog ma purba bsdu// de mthun rdo rje sems lnga sogs// sgrib gnyis byang bas tshogs gnyis rdzogs// de bzhin
783a2(rgyud 'grel): slob ma tshoT rngoT nas// me long ye shos thob par shog/ lho sgo nga shi na bsdu'o// sbyin gnas lo yang da shi bsdu'o// nub sgo bas ci mas bsdu'o// phyi ma'i ma 'ongs pas cis bsdus// byang sgo u da ra mi byasdu// thugs rjes gzungs la
783a3(rgyud 'grel): u da bsdu// gong gi rigs dang ye shes 'dra// sngon gyi smon lam don bstan pa// dri ma med pa'i dpe bzhin no// dkyil 'khor rang bzhin lha dag kyang // ci rigs par ni bstun por bya// tAn+ta rgya mtsho dbyings kyi gting rum nas// ngo
783a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog cha shes btus pa'i nying khu ste// sbyor ba'i lam rgyud phyogs 'ga' 'grel pa yis// mchog thob rnam snang mdzad kyi zhal thong shog// rgya gar gyi mkhyen po ste ra ma ti si// ye ge'i gzhung rgyang phyi nang las// nges
783a5(rgyud 'grel): don mdo bsdus te mdzad pa/ rgyan dam pa'i le'u// / bam po gcig du byas pa rdzogaso// / cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis// skad phyi mo dang thug pa'o// mad+mo laM//
783a6(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams stobs rgyas kyis mtshan mar gyur 'gro ba yis// che 'bas du mar bsags pa'i sdig sgrib ma lus kun// dge 'angs dug lnga'i me lcen yis bcil ba bzhin// ring man byang chub snying po'i go 'phang myur thob kog/ ces mi dbang po lta bas sgo gsum tshig dril gyi smon las btab pa'o//
